40001001	On man sɨlɨp uŋun Yesu Kristo dakon babɨkni dakon man sɨlɨp. Yesu uŋun Dewit da kabɨkon nani. Aŋakwan Dewit uŋun Abraham da kabɨkon nani.
40001002	Abraham uŋun Aisak dakon datni. Aisak uŋun Jekop dakon datni Jekop uŋun Juda gat ae peni padɨk padɨkni gat dakon datni.
40001003	Juda uŋun Peres gat Sera gat dakon datni. (Meŋi uŋun Tamar.) Peres uŋun Esron dakon datni. Esron uŋun Ram dakon datni.
40001004	Ram uŋun Aminadap dakon datni. Aminadap uŋun Nason dakon datni. Nason uŋun Salmon dakon datni.
40001005	Salmon uŋun Boas dakon datni. (Meŋi uŋun Reap.) Boas uŋun Obet dakon datni. (Meŋi uŋun Rut.) Obet uŋun Jesi dakon datni.
40001006	Jesi uŋun kɨla amɨn madep Dewit dakon datni. Aŋakwan Dewit uŋun Solomon dakon datni. (Solomon dakon meŋi kalɨp Uria dakon mɨŋatni egɨpgut.)
40001007	Solomon uŋun Reoboam dakon datni. Reoboam uŋun Abiya dakon datni. Abiya uŋun Asa dakon datni.
40001008	Asa uŋun Jeosapat dakon datni. Jeosapat uŋun Jeoram dakon datni. Jeoram uŋun Usia dakon datni.
40001009	Usia uŋun Jotam dakon datni. Jotam uŋun As dakon datni. As uŋun Esekia dakon datni.
40001010	Esekia uŋun Manase dakon datni. Manase uŋun Emon dakon datni. Emon uŋun Josaia dakon datni.
40001011	Josaia uŋun Joiakin gat ae notni kabɨ gat dakon datni. (Uŋun amɨn kabɨ da bɨsapmon Israel amɨn uwalni da tɨmɨk Babilon mɨktɨmon paŋkɨ yopba egɨpgwit.)
40001012	Babilon paŋkɨ egɨpgwit bɨsapmon, Joiakin uŋun Sealtiel dakon datni. Sealtiel uŋun Serubabel dakon datni.
40001013	Serubabel uŋun Abiut dakon datni. Abiut uŋun Eliakim dakon datni. Eliakim uŋun Aso dakon datni.
40001014	Aso uŋun Sadok dakon datni. Sadok uŋun Akim dakon datni. Akim uŋun Eliut dakon datni.
40001015	Eliut uŋun Eleasa dakon datni. Eleasa uŋun Matan dakon datni. Matan uŋun Jekop dakon datni.
40001016	Jekop uŋun Josep dakon datni. Josep uŋun Maria dakon eni. Aŋakwan Maria da Yesu aŋalagɨt. Yesu uŋun Kristo yaŋ iyaŋ.
40001017	Abrahamon da wɨŋ Dewiron dagagɨt uŋun babɨkni 14 kabɨ. Aŋakwan Dewiron da wɨŋ uwalni da tɨmɨk Babilon mɨktɨmon paŋkɨwit bɨsap uŋun babɨkni 14 kabɨ. Aŋakwan Babilon egɨpgwiron da wɨŋ Kristo altagɨt uŋun kɨsi babɨkni 14 kabɨ.
40001018	Yesu Kristo altagɨt uŋun dakon gen yaŋ. Meŋi Maria uŋun Josep da pasak do kɨlɨ manjɨwit. Mani dɨma paŋakwan Maria uŋun monjɨ kwap kɨlɨ awɨlgɨt. Monjɨ kwap awɨlgɨt uŋun Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon da awɨlgɨt.
40001019	Aŋakwan Josep uŋun Maria monjɨ kwapni kɨnda awɨlak yaŋ nandaŋek yɨpmaŋ det do nandagɨt. Mani eni amɨn kɨlegɨ do amɨn morap da ɨŋamon Maria mayagɨ ɨm do dɨma nandagɨt. Yaŋ do aŋek pasɨlɨkon da kɨrɨŋɨk ɨm do nandagɨt.
40001020	Josep yaŋ nandaŋek egakwan Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo kɨnda da dɨpmɨnon altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Josep, Dewit da kabɨkon nani, Maria da monjɨ kwap uŋun Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon awɨlak, do Maria pak do dɨma pasolgi.
40001021	Uŋun monjɨ wɨli aŋalaŋban mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni dɨwarɨni wɨrɨrɨgek iyɨ do tɨmɨtdɨsak, do mani Yesu yaŋ iyɨki.”
40001022	Uŋun yo morap altaŋakwa Amɨn Tagɨ da kombɨ amɨn aŋtagap aban gen yagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ tosok.
40001023	“Nandaki. Mɨŋat kɨnda amɨn gat dɨma pakbi kɨnda da monjɨ kwap awɨlek monjɨ wɨli kɨnda aŋalasak. Aŋalaŋban mani Emanuel yaŋ yoni.” (Emanuel dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ: “Piŋkop nin gat egɨsak.”)
40001024	Josep dɨpmɨnon da pɨdaŋek Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo da gen iyɨgɨt uŋun guramɨgek mɨŋatni Maria pagɨt.
40001025	Mani kaloŋɨ dɨma pagek egɨ wɨgɨ Maria da monjɨ wɨli kɨnda aŋalagɨt. Aŋalaŋban Josep da mani Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt.
40002001	Judia mɨktɨmon kokup kɨnda mani Betlehem uŋudon Maria da Yesu aŋalagɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon Erot da kɨla amɨn madep yɨkgɨt. Yesu altaŋakwan nandak nandak amɨn gɨldat wɨsak tetgɨn da Jerusalem kokup papmon apgwit.
40002002	Abɨŋ Jerusalem amɨn yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep altagɨt uŋun dukwan yɨkdak? Nin gɨkni gɨldat wɨsak tetgɨn da kaŋek gawak ɨm do abamaŋ.”
40002003	Kɨla amɨn madep Erot gen yawit uŋun nandaŋek wɨrɨpdakgɨt. Ae amɨn morap Jerusalem egɨpgwit uŋunyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn nandaŋek wɨrɨpdakgwit.
40002004	Erot da gen uŋun nandaŋek Israel amɨn dakon mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat yaŋ yoban abɨŋ muwukgwit. Muwukba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kristo ni kokupmon altosak do yaŋbi?”
40002005	Yaŋban kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Judia mɨktɨmon Betlehem kokupmon altosak. Kombɨ amɨn kɨnda da kalɨpsigwan yaŋ mandagɨt,
40002006	‘Betlehem, Judia mɨktɨmon tosok, gagon kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda altokdɨsak, do gak Judia mɨktɨm dakon kokup morap yapmaŋdal. Uŋun amɨn da amɨn kabɨno Israel uŋun dakon kɨla amɨn madep egɨpdɨsak.’ ”
40002007	Yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek yoyɨŋban kɨwit. Kɨŋakwa pasɨlɨkon da gɨk dakon mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn Erot da yoyɨŋban apgwit. Apba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gɨk uŋun ni bɨsapmonsi altagɨt?”
40002008	Yoyɨŋban gɨk noman tagɨt dakon bɨsap iyɨŋba nandaŋek Betlehem kokupmon yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kɨŋ monjɨ uŋun kɨlegɨsi wusɨŋ koni. Kaŋek abɨŋ nayɨŋba nakyo kɨsi kɨŋ gawak ɨbeŋ.”
40002009	Yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek kɨŋakwa gɨk gɨldat wɨsak tetgɨn da kalɨp kawit aeni altaŋ yomgut. Gɨk uŋun kɨŋakwan yol aŋkɨ Monjɨ si pakgɨt yut da tɨlagon yɨkban kawit.
40002010	Gɨk uŋun kaŋek but galak madepsi
40002011	nandaŋek yutnon wɨgek Monjɨ gat meŋi Maria gat pɨndakgwit. Pɨndagek ŋwakbeŋ aŋek Monjɨ gawak ɨmgwit. Yaŋ aŋek yɨkni wɨtdalek gol ae yo dɨwarɨ kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi yumaŋ nogɨ wukwi but galak do ɨmgwit.
40002012	Piŋkop da dɨpmɨnon Erot do dɨma tobɨl kɨni do yoyɨŋban nandaŋek kosit ŋwakŋwarɨ naŋ mɨktɨmnikon si kɨwit.
40002013	Nandak nandak amɨn uŋun kɨŋ mudaŋakwa, Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo da Josep dɨpmɨnon altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Erot da Monjɨ aŋakban kɨmotjak do wɨsɨkdɨsak, do gak pɨdaŋ monjɨ ŋakŋak gat meŋi gat tɨmɨkbɨ Isip mɨktɨmon pasal kɨni. Isip sigɨn egakwa nak da aesi apni do don gayɨkeŋ.”
40002014	Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn Josep uŋun kalbi monjɨ ŋakŋak gat meŋi gat tɨmɨkban Isip kɨk do kosit wasawit.
40002015	Yaŋ aŋakwa kombɨ amɨn kɨnda da kalɨpsigwan gen yagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Amɨn Tagɨ da aŋtagap aban yaŋ yagɨt: “Monjɨno Isip egɨsak uŋun opjak do yaŋ ɨmɨsat.” Josep gat mɨŋatni Monjiyo gat Isip mɨktɨmon paŋkɨ egakwa Erot don kɨmakgɨt.
40002016	Erot da nandak nandak amɨn nak aŋkewalaŋ yaŋ nandaŋek butjap madepsi nandagɨt. Yaŋ nandaŋek Betlehem kokupmon ae kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ Betlehem da kapmatjok tawit uŋudon monjɨ wɨli morap bɨlakni bamorɨ dɨma yapbi uŋun emat amɨni da kɨsisi dapmaŋ mudoni do gen teban yɨpgut. Nandak nandak amɨn da gɨk ni bɨsapmon noman tagɨt uŋun kɨlɨ iyɨwit, do monjɨ morap uŋun bɨsapmon altawit uŋun kɨsi kɨmotni do gen teban yɨpgut.
40002017	Yaŋ aban kombɨ amɨn Jeremaia da kalɨpsigwan gen yagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ:
40002018	“Rama kokupmon kunam ae bupmɨ kapyo madepsi altosok. Resel uŋun monji kɨmakgwit uŋun do nandaŋek kunam madepsi takdak. Monjɨni kɨsi kɨmakgwit, do amɨn da burɨ aŋteban ak do aŋtɨdok aŋ. Kunamni kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmni do dɨma nandagɨt.”
40002019	Erot kɨmagakwan Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo da Isip mɨktɨmon Josep dɨpmɨnon altaŋ ɨmgut.
40002020	Altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Monjɨ aŋat do yawit amɨn uŋun kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit. Do gak pɨdaŋ Monjɨ gat meŋi gat tɨmɨkbɨ aesi tobɨl Israel mɨktɨmon kɨni.”
40002021	Yaŋban Monjɨ gat meŋi gat tɨmɨkban Israel kɨwit.
40002022	Mani Erot kɨmagakwan monji Akelas da kɨla amɨn madep tamoni abɨdaŋek Judia mɨktɨm kɨla agɨt, do Judia mɨktɨmon kɨk do pasalgɨt. Josep dɨpmɨnon gen kɨnda yaŋ nandagɨt, “Ji Judia mɨktɨmon dɨma kɨni. Galili tetgɨn do kɨni.”
40002023	Uŋun nandaŋek kokup kɨnda mani Nasaret, Galili mɨktɨmon tosok, uŋudon paŋkɨ egɨpgwit. Yaŋ aba kombɨ amɨn dakon gen bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Nasaret amɨn yaŋ iyɨni.”
40003001	Uŋun bɨsapmon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn Jon uŋun abɨŋ altagɨt. Abɨŋ altaŋek Judia mɨktɨmon amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋudon kwa Piŋkop gen yoyɨgɨt.
40003002	Yoyɨŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon bɨsap kwaŋ tosok, do ji but tobɨl ani.”
40003003	Kalɨpsigwan kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da Jon do gen yaŋ mandagɨt: “Mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yosok, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ dakon kosit aŋdɨmdɨm ani, kositni pasɨŋ aŋmɨlɨp ani.’ ”
40003004	Jon da ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk paŋ egɨpgut uŋun bɨt madep kɨnda mani kamel uŋun dakon daŋgwani baŋ wasaŋbi. Aŋek bɨt gɨp kɨnda naŋ bobaŋ napmɨ do wamgut. Japni uŋun pɨlak pɨlak ae kabaŋ kok.
40003005	Amɨn morapmɨ Jerusalem kokup papmon egɨpgwit, ae Judia mɨktɨmon egɨpgwit, ae Jodan Pakbi terɨ terɨ egɨpgwit uŋun kɨsi Jonon kɨwit.
40003006	Kɨŋ yokwini yaŋkwok aŋakwa Jodan Pakbikon telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgut.
40003007	Aŋakwan Parisi amɨn morapmɨ gat Sadyusi amɨn morapmɨ gat telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomjak do Jonon apgwit. Apba pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ dakon gwakni kabɨ, Piŋkop da butjap nandaŋek yokwi pakpak do yo yokwisi aŋ yomdɨsak. Piŋkop dakon butjap apdɨsak namɨn da uŋun dakon but pɨso dayɨk da uŋun yap do pasal kwaŋ?
40003008	Ji but tobɨl bamɨsi aŋek aŋpakjikon but tobɨl dakon bamɨ aŋalon ani.
40003009	Ji dɨsi do ‘Nin Abraham dakon babɨkni’ yaŋ dɨma yoni. Yaŋsi dayɨsat, Piŋkop da yaŋban on tɨp kabɨ da Abraham dakon babɨkni tagɨ dagoni. Ji uŋun Abrahamon da altawit uŋun da yo madep dɨma asak.
40003010	Pareŋka uŋun kɨndap mibɨlon yɨpbi da tosok. Kɨndap morap bamɨ tagɨ dɨma toni uŋun mandaŋ kɨndapmon maba pɨgɨ sokdaŋ.
40003011	“Nak amɨn pakbisi baŋ telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomɨsat uŋun amɨn but tobɨl bamɨ aŋ dakon tɨlak asak. Mani nak da manjikon abɨsak amɨn uŋun dakon tapmɨm da nak dakon tapmɨm yapmaŋdak. Nak yombem yokwi da kandap gwɨlni tagɨ dɨma abɨdaŋ awɨlɨ. Uŋun amɨn da Telagɨ Wup gat ae kɨndap gat soŋ damdɨsak.
40003012	Uŋun wit dakon sɨbɨt sɨbɨt wɨrɨrɨt kɨndap kɨrɨŋni kɨsitnikon taŋakwan apdɨsak. Abɨŋek bamɨ kokwinɨk tamonikon yopmaŋek sɨbɨt sɨbɨt wɨrɨrɨk maban kɨndap kɨmot kɨmorɨ mɨni uŋudon sokdaŋ.”
40003013	Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu Galili Provins yɨpmaŋek Jodan Pakbikon, Jon da telagɨ pakbi soŋ ɨmjak do opgut.
40003014	Mani Jon da kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da telagɨ pakbi soŋ gabeŋ do abɨl, uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Gak da telagɨ pakbi soŋ nabi kaŋ, uŋun da tagɨ asak.”
40003015	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Dɨma, gak telagɨ pakbi soŋ nabi. Yaŋ aŋaki Piŋkop da yo morap aneŋ do nandɨsak uŋun kɨndasok dɨma yapmaŋek kɨsisi aŋ mudoneŋ.” Yaŋban Jon da geni guramɨkgɨt.
40003016	Pakbi soŋek Yesu pakbikon da wɨgɨt. Wɨŋek uŋudon gɨn kundu wɨtdal kɨŋakwan Yesu yaŋ kagɨt, Piŋkop dakon Wup kɨnarɨm da mɨktɨmon paŋ uŋun da tɨlak pɨŋ kwenikon yɨkgɨt.
40003017	Aŋakwan Kwen Kokupgwan da gen kɨnda yaŋ altagɨt: “Uŋun Monjɨno. Butno uŋun do tagɨsi aŋakwan but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat.”
40004001	Uŋun bɨsapmon Telagɨ Wup da Yesu Sunduk da aŋkewaljak do mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon aŋkɨgɨt.
40004002	Aŋkɨ yɨpban Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egakwan gɨldat 40 ae pɨlɨn 40 mudagɨt, do jap do agɨt.
40004003	Aŋakwan Paŋkewal Amɨn da abɨŋ altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak asi Piŋkop dakon Monji egɨsalon yoyɨŋbɨ tɨp on da bret dagabɨt.”
40004004	Mani Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Bret dagɨn amɨn egɨp egɨp tagɨ dɨma yomjak. Piŋkop dakon gen kɨsi morap paŋek egɨp egɨp paŋ.’ ”
40004005	Yaŋ yaŋban Sunduk da Yesu aŋaŋ Piŋkop dakon telagɨ kokup papmon Jerusalem aŋaŋ kɨgɨt. Aŋkɨ Telagɨ Yut Madep da kwenon kwensi yɨpgut.
40004006	Yɨpmaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Uŋun da aŋeloni yoyɨŋban kɨlago tagɨsi ani. Ae kandapgo tɨpmon dɨma gɨtni yaŋ do aŋelo da gak kɨsit da kendak abɨŋ gepni.’ Gen yaŋ tosok, do gak asi Piŋkop dakon Monji kaŋ, gak amon mibɨlɨkon paŋ ma.”
40004007	Mani Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop dakon papia da gen kɨnda gat yaŋ yosok, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji dakon tapmɨm kok do aŋek dɨmasi aŋkewaldo.’ ”
40004008	Sunduk da aeni Yesu iyɨŋ aŋaŋ ɨleŋ dubagɨsi kɨndakon awɨgɨgɨt. Awɨgɨ on mɨktɨmon mɨktɨm madep madep morap kɨsi ae uŋudon yo tɨlɨmni toŋ gat kɨsi yolɨgɨt.
40004009	Yolɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ŋwakbeŋ aŋek gawak nabi kaŋ, on yo morap kɨsi gabeŋ.”
40004010	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Sunduk gak nepmaŋdet! Piŋkop dakon papia da yaŋ yosok: ‘Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji uŋun naŋ gɨn gawak ɨmɨŋek oman aŋɨmni.’ ”
40004011	Yaŋ iyɨŋban Sunduk Yesu yɨpmaŋ dek kɨŋakwan aŋelo da abɨŋ Yesu aŋpulugawit.
40004012	Yesu Jon dam tebanon yɨpgwit yaŋ nandaŋek tobɨl Galili mɨktɨmon kɨgɨt.
40004013	Nasaret kokup yɨpmaŋek Kapaneam kokupmon kɨŋ uŋudon egɨpgut. Kapaneam uŋun Galili Pakbi Ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon, Sebulan ae Naptali mɨktɨmon uŋudon tosok.
40004014	Kapaneam kokupmon ekwan kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da gen kɨnda yagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ:
40004015	“Sebulan mɨktɨm, ae Naptali mɨktɨm, Jodan Pakbi usugap tet do Galili mɨktɨmon tomal. Uŋun mɨktɨm bamot kosit tapmon pɨkwaŋ mɨktɨmon tomal. Galili mɨktɨmon Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon nani morapmɨ ekwaŋ.
40004016	Uŋun amɨn pɨlɨn tukgwan egek kɨmot do pasolgoŋ, mani uŋun da teŋteŋɨ madep altaŋ yoban kɨlɨ kaŋ.”
40004017	Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu wasaŋek Piŋkop dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon bɨsap kwaŋ tosok, do ji but tobɨl ani.”
40004018	Yesu da Galili Pakbi Ɨdap kɨdɨpmɨŋ agek tap kɨlap do pi agak amɨn bamorɨ pɨndakgɨt. Kɨnda uŋun mani Saimon (ae mani kɨnda Pita), uŋun gat ae padɨge Andru gat pɨndakgɨt. Uŋun amɨn bamot tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni pakbi ɨdapgwan mabal pɨgakwan egɨpgumal.
40004019	Uŋun amɨn bamot pɨndagek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nolgɨl, aŋakwal amɨn tɨmɨt tɨmɨt dakon kosit dolɨko.”
40004020	Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni yopmaŋek yolgɨmal.
40004021	Yesu tɨmɨsok dɨ kɨŋek ae amɨn bamorɨ gat pɨndakgɨt, kɨnda uŋun Jems, Sebedi dakon monji, ae padɨge Jon. Uŋun bamot gat datni gat boron yɨgek tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni bɨsawɨk paŋmɨlɨp aŋyo aŋakwal pɨndakgɨt. Pɨndagek yaŋ yoban
40004022	nandaŋek uŋudon gɨn botni gat datni Sebedi gat yopmaŋek yolgɨmal.
40004023	Yesu Galili mɨktɨm morap kɨsi agek muwut muwut yutnikon amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt. Aŋek Piŋkop da amɨn kɨla akdɨsak dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Yaŋ aŋek sotni toŋ ae gɨptɨmni yokwisi awit amɨn kɨsi morap paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
40004024	Yaŋ aŋakwan gen bini da kɨŋ ɨreŋtaŋ Siria mɨktɨm kɨsi arɨpmɨ agɨt. Do amɨn da sot amɨn mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gat, ae amɨn gɨptɨmɨkon tepmɨ madepsi pawit amɨn gat, ae koŋni toŋ gat, ae sot kɨnda uŋun amɨn mɨktɨmon maŋ pagek gɨptɨmni nɨmnɨmɨkgaŋ uŋun gat, ae kɨdarɨ alek taŋbi uŋun kɨsi paŋapba Yesu da paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
40004025	Aŋakwan Galili mɨŋat amɨn morapmɨ gat, ae Dekapolis amɨn gat, ae Jerusalem, ae Judia, ae Jodan Pakbi usugap tet amɨn gat kɨsi da Yesu yolgwit.
40005001	Yesu mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep pɨndagek ɨleŋon pawɨgɨ yɨgakwan paŋdet kabɨni iyɨ yɨkgɨron apgwit.
40005002	Apba yoyɨŋ degek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
40005003	“Amɨn morap iyɨ do nak butnokon yo tagɨ mɨnisi yaŋ nandaŋ amɨn, uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan ekwaŋ, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
40005004	Amɨn morap burɨkon da bupmɨ kunamyo madep aŋ, uŋun Piŋkop da butni paŋteban akdɨsak, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
40005005	Amɨn morap iyɨ do nandaba paŋ, uŋun Piŋkop da yo morap yom do yagɨt uŋun yoban tɨmɨtdaŋ, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
40005006	Amɨn morap aŋpak kɨlegɨ do amɨn da jap pakbiyo do nandaŋ uŋudeŋsi nandaŋ amɨn, uŋun Piŋkop da arɨpnikon yoban tugokdaŋ, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
40005007	Amɨn morap notni do bupmɨ nandaŋ, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da bupmɨ nandaŋ yomdɨsak, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
40005008	Amɨn morap burɨ kɨlegɨsi toŋ, uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop kokdaŋ, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
40005009	Amɨn morap emat pɨdokyo aŋakwa nawa gen yoŋ amɨn do, amɨn da Piŋkop dakon monjɨni yaŋ yoyɨkdaŋ, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
40005010	Amɨn morap aŋpak kɨlegɨ aŋakwa aŋpakni kɨlegɨ do aŋek amɨn da yokwi aŋyomaŋ, uŋuden amɨn da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan egɨpdaŋ, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
40005011	“Amɨn da ji do Yesu dakon amɨn kabɨ yaŋ yaŋek yaŋba yokwi tok, ae top gen mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yaŋ damni, ae yokwiyo kɨsi aŋdamni kaŋ, ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.
40005012	Kalɨp kombɨ amɨn yaŋ gɨn dapmaŋ yolyo awit. Do jiyo kɨsi aŋpakji kɨlegɨ dakon tomni wukwisi Kwen Kokupmon tɨmɨtdaŋ, do but galak nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.”
40005013	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji amɨn dakon tap ekwaŋ. Mani tap galagɨni pasɨlni kaŋ, niaŋsi aŋek galagɨni aŋkaluk aneŋ? Galagɨni yɨpmaŋ detjak kaŋ, pini mɨni. Ɨsal maba kwa amɨn da bamoŋ.
40005014	“Ji amɨn dakon teŋteŋɨ yombem da ekwaŋ. Kokup madep kɨnda ɨleŋon taŋban yo kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋyoŋgam asak.
40005015	Amɨn da lam koleŋ kwoba baŋ dɨma wɨtjɨŋba toŋ. Kwen tamonikon yopba yut kagagwan amɨn ekwaŋ uŋun kɨsi teŋteŋaŋ yomaŋ.
40005016	Yaŋgɨn, teŋteŋɨsi da amɨn da dabɨlon teŋteŋosak. Yaŋ aŋakwa amɨn da aŋpakji tagɨsi kaŋek Kwen Kokup Datji aŋkɨsini.”
40005017	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak gen teban ae kombɨ amɨn dakon gen abo kɨŋ ɨsalɨ asak do dɨma pɨgɨm. Gen teban ae kombɨ amɨn dakon gen bamɨ toŋ aŋmudoni do pɨgɨm.
40005018	Nak asisi dayɨsat, kundu gat mɨktɨm gat tonjil da arɨpmon gen teban dakon gen jɨmjɨmjok kɨnda dɨma pasɨldɨsak. Gen kɨsi morap taŋ bamɨ toŋ akdaŋ.
40005019	Amɨn kɨnda da gen teban monɨŋɨsok kɨnda yapmaŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ yaŋ gɨn ani do yoyɨŋdetjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Kwen Kokup Piŋkop da Kɨla Asak kokupmon mani pɨŋbisi. Mani amɨn kɨnda da gen teban guramɨgek amɨn dɨwarɨ yaŋ gɨn ani do yoyɨŋdetjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Kwen Kokup Piŋkop da Kɨla Asak kokupmon mani wukwisi.
40005020	Asisi dayɨsat, ji dakon aŋpak kɨlegɨ uŋun da gen teban yoyɨŋdet ae Parisi amɨn dakon aŋpak dɨma yapni kaŋ, ji Piŋkop da Kwen Kokup Kɨla Asagon dɨma wɨgɨkdaŋ.”
40005021	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen kɨnda babɨk da abɨdawit uŋun ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn dɨma dapba kɨmotni. Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda aŋakban kɨmotjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn gen pikon kɨsak.’
40005022	Mani nak yaŋ dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda notni do butjap nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn gen pikon kɨsak. Ae amɨn kɨnda notni do yaŋba yokwi tok asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ madepmon kɨsak. Ae amɨn kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda ‘Gak nandaŋ kokwingo tagɨ mɨni!’ yaŋ iyɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Tɨpdom dakon kɨndap tebanon pɨgɨsak.
40005023	“Do paretgo altakon paŋobɨŋek notgo kɨnda da nandaba yokwi tok aŋgamɨsak yaŋ nandɨsal kaŋ,
40005024	paretgo alta da kapmatjok yopbɨ toni. Yopbɨ taŋakwa mibɨltok gak kwi notgo uŋun gat but kaloŋ anjil. But kaloŋ aŋek don kɨŋ Piŋkop do paret aki.
40005025	“Amɨn kɨnda da gen pikon gep do gen yaŋ gaban kaŋ, jil gen pi tamokon kɨk do aŋek kosiron kɨŋek gen uŋun tepmɨsi aŋmɨlɨp ak do pi anjil. Yaŋ dɨma anjil kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨn da kɨsiron gepban uŋun da obip amɨn da kɨsiron gepban dam teban yutnon gepdɨsak.
40005026	Asisi gayɨsat, gak dam tebanon sigɨn egaki wɨgɨ moneŋ niaŋ yopbi do gayɨni uŋun kɨsisi yopmaŋek don waŋga kɨkdɨsal.”
40005027	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ae gen kɨnda babɨk da abɨdawit uŋun ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Mɨŋat eyo kɨlɨ abi amɨn ji yumabi aŋpak dɨma ani.’
40005028	Mani abɨsok nak da yaŋ dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda mɨŋat kɨnda kaŋek uŋun do galak taŋ ɨmjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn butnikon da yumabi kɨlɨ ak.
40005029	Dabɨlgo amɨn tet da yokwikon gepban kaŋ, pɨlɨk mabɨ kɨsak. Gɨptɨm dɨwatgo kɨnda pasɨljak kaŋ, uŋun da yo madep dɨma asak. Mani gɨptɨmgo kɨsi kaloŋ maba Tɨpdomon pɨgɨsak kaŋ, uŋun da jɨgɨsi.
40005030	Ae kɨsitgo amɨn tet da yokwikon gepban kaŋ, mandaŋ dagaŋ mabɨ kɨsak. Gɨptɨm dɨwatgo kɨnda pasɨljak kaŋ, uŋun da yo madep dɨma asak. Mani gɨptɨmgo kɨsi kaloŋ maba Tɨpdomon pɨgɨsak kaŋ, uŋun da jɨgɨsi.”
40005031	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Kalɨp gen yaŋ yawit: ‘Amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatni kwɨnɨt do kaŋ, mɨŋat paŋkwɨnɨt dakon but pɨso papia kɨnda mɨŋatni do mandaŋ ɨmjak.’
40005032	Mani abɨsok nak da yaŋ dayɨsat, mɨŋatgo kwɨnɨk yɨpbɨ kwan wɨli kaluk pasak kaŋ, eni gak da gulusuŋ al, do mɨŋatgo da yumabi asak. Aŋakwan wɨli uŋun kaluk pasak uŋun kɨsi yumabi asak. Do mɨŋatgo yumabi dɨma aŋakwan ɨsal dogɨn dɨma kwɨnɨkgi.”
40005033	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ae gen kɨnda babɨk da abɨdawit uŋun ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn Tagɨ da dabɨlon gen yaŋ paŋteban asal uŋun dɨma yapmaŋek kɨsi guramɨgek abi.’
40005034	Mani nak abɨsok yaŋ dayɨsat, gen yaŋ paŋteban ak dɨmasi ani. Kwen Kokup uŋun Piŋkop dakon kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamoni, do Kwen Kokup manon da genji dɨma paŋteban ani.
40005035	Ae mɨktɨm uŋun Piŋkop dakon kandap yɨpyɨp tamoni, do mɨktɨm da manon genji dɨma yaŋ paŋteban ani. Ae Jerusalem uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ Madep Wɨkwisi dakon kokup papni, do Jerusalem da manon genji dɨma yaŋ paŋteban ani.
40005036	Ae ji da busuŋ daŋgwanji kɨnda kulabɨk aba kwakwagɨ bo pɨli uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma asak, do busuŋji da manon genji dɨma yaŋ paŋteban ani.
40005037	Ji ‘asi’ bo ‘dɨma’ yaŋ gɨn yoni kaŋ, uŋun da tagɨ. Gen uŋun da kwenon saŋbeŋek yoŋ uŋun Yokwi Ami da paŋalon asak.”
40005038	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ae gen kɨnda babɨk da abɨdawit uŋun ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda dakon dabɨl aŋupbal asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn dakon dabɨlniyo kɨsi aŋupbal ani. Ae amɨn kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda dakon geni aŋak bɨrɨpmɨtjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn dakon geni kɨsi aŋak bɨrɨpmɨtni.’
40005039	Mani nak da abɨsok yaŋ dayɨsat, amɨn da yokwi aŋdaba kobogɨ do yokwi dɨma aŋyomni. Amɨn kɨnda da mogɨm kulbak gɨkban kaŋ, mogɨmgo terɨ kɨnda kɨsi aŋtobɨl ɨbi.
40005040	Amɨn kɨnda da gen pikon gepmaŋek kobogɨ do paba pɨgɨkgo abɨdok do yosak kaŋ, mɨrɨm ɨmalgo gat kɨsi ɨbi.
40005041	Ae amɨn kɨnda da yɨkni ɨmegek kosit 1 kilomita kɨki do tebaisi gayɨsak kaŋ, yɨk uŋun ɨmegek 2 kilomita kɨki.
40005042	Ae amɨn kɨnda da yo kɨnda ɨbi do gayɨsak kaŋ, ɨbi. Ae amɨn kɨnda da gagon goman ak do gayɨŋban kaŋ, manji dɨma ɨbi.”
40005043	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ae gen kɨnda babɨk da abɨdawit uŋun ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Notgo do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek uwalgo do nandabɨ yokwi toni.’
40005044	Mani nak da yaŋ dayɨsat, ji uwalji do but dasi galak taŋ yomni. Aŋek yokwi aŋdamaŋ amɨn do bɨsit ani.
40005045	Yaŋ aŋek Piŋkop Datji Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun dakon monjinisi egɨpni. Uŋun da gɨldatni yɨpban amɨn yokwi ae kɨlegɨ kɨsikon mosok. Ae sɨkak yɨpban amɨn aŋpak kɨlegɨ aŋ ae yokwi aŋ kɨsikon mosok.
40005046	Amɨn yokwi takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn da notni baŋgɨn but dasi galak taŋ yomaŋ. Jiyo yaŋ gɨn ani kaŋ, Piŋkop da kobogɨ do yo tagɨ kɨnda dɨma damdɨsak.
40005047	Ji notji baŋgɨn gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ yoyɨni kaŋ, uŋun da tagɨ dɨma asak. Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn kabɨ kɨsi yaŋ gɨn aŋ.
40005048	Kwen Kokup Datji gwaljɨgɨ mɨni kɨlegɨsi egɨsak, do jiyo yaŋ gɨn gwaljɨgɨ mɨni kɨlegɨsi egɨpni.”
40006001	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Amɨn da dandani yaŋ do uŋun da dabɨlon aŋpak tagɨ ani kaŋ, Datji Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun da uŋun dakon kobogɨ do yo tagɨ kɨnda dɨma daban abɨdokdaŋ.
40006002	“Wadak wadak amɨn do yo yom do aki bɨsapmon jamba but amɨn dɨwarɨ da muwut muwut yutnon ae kosit madepmon aŋ, uŋudeŋ amɨn kɨnda yabekbɨ mibɨltaŋ gamɨŋek kweŋ dɨma pɨsosak. Yaŋ aŋ amɨn uŋun amɨn da nandaba wukwan yomni yaŋ do aŋ. Nak asisi dayɨsat, uŋun kobogɨ kɨsisi wagɨlni tɨmɨkgaŋ.
40006003	Mani yo do wadak wadak aŋ amɨn do yo yobi bɨsapmon noman amɨn da gandani do dɨma yobi.
40006004	Yaŋ aŋaki Datgo yo pasɨlɨ pɨndakdak uŋun da kobogɨ do yo tagɨ gamdɨsak.”
40006005	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji bɨsit ani bɨsapmon jamba but amɨn da aŋ uŋudeŋ dɨma ani. Jamba but amɨn uŋun muwut muwut yut madepmon ae kokup papmon kosit amal amalon uŋudon agek bɨsit ak do galagɨsi nandaŋ. Uŋun amɨn amɨn da pɨndatni do yaŋ aŋ. Nak asisi dayɨsat, kobogɨni kɨsi wagɨlni tɨmɨkgaŋ.
40006006	Mani gak bɨsit ak do nandɨsal kaŋ, yutgokon wɨgɨ yoma sopmaŋek Datgo pasɨlɨ egɨsak uŋun bɨsit iyɨki. Yaŋ aŋaki Datgo yo pasɨlɨ pɨndakdak uŋun da kobogɨ tagɨsi gamdɨsak.
40006007	Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ gen ɨsalɨ morapmɨ yaŋapno piŋkopnin da genin nandɨsak yaŋ nandaŋ. Mani ji bɨsit ani bɨsapmon yaŋ dɨma ani.
40006008	Ji uŋun amɨn da aŋ uŋudeŋ dɨma ani, nido Datji dɨma iyɨŋakwa yo morap do wadak wadak aŋ uŋun nandaŋ mudosok.
40006009	Ji bɨsit yaŋ ani: ‘Datnin Kwen Kokup egɨsal, gak dakon man telagɨ tosak.
40006010	Amɨn Kɨla Agakgo yɨpbɨ ninon apjak. Gak dakon gen guramɨt Kwen Kokup tosok, mɨktɨmon ninon yaŋ gɨn tosak.
40006011	Abɨsok gɨldat dakon jap arɨpninon nibi.
40006012	Nin amɨn notnin dakon yokwini yopmaŋgamaŋ. Uŋudeŋ gɨn yokwinin wɨrɨrɨk nibi.
40006013	Paŋkewalon dɨmasi nipbi. Yokwi Ami da kɨsiron naŋ pulugaŋ nipbi.’
40006014	“Ji notji dakon yokwini yopmaŋ yomni kaŋ, Datji Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun da yokwisi yopmaŋ damjak.
40006015	Mani amɨn dakon yokwini dɨma yopmaŋ yomni kaŋ, Datji da yokwisi dɨma yopmaŋ damjak.”
40006016	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egɨp do nandaŋ kaŋ, jamba but amɨn da aŋ uŋudeŋ tomno dabɨlyosi dɨma ɨŋan toni. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, amɨn da ji Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap dɨma noŋ yaŋ dandani. Nak asisi dayɨsat, uŋun amɨn kobogɨni kɨsi wagɨlni tɨmɨk mudoŋ.
40006017	Mani ji Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egɨp do nandaŋ kaŋ, busuŋ daŋgwanji wayɨgek tomno dabɨlyosi pakbi baŋ sugoni.
40006018	Yaŋ aŋakwa amɨn da ji jap kelek ekwaŋ yaŋ dɨma nandaŋ damni. Mani Datji pasɨlɨ egek yo pasɨlɨ pɨndakdak uŋun da dandaŋek kobogɨ tagɨsi damdɨsak.”
40006019	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji on mɨktɨmon yo tagɨsi paŋmuwut do nandak nandak dɨma ani. Uŋun yo monɨŋ da nokdaŋ, ae maŋut maŋut akdaŋ, ae kabo noknok da yutji tuwɨlek paŋkɨsɨbɨkdaŋ.
40006020	Yo tagɨsi Kwen Kokupmon paŋmuwut do nandak nandak ani. Uŋudon yo monɨŋ da dɨma nokdaŋ, ae maŋut maŋut dɨma akdaŋ, ae kabo noknok da yutji tuwɨlek arɨpmɨ dɨma tɨmɨtdaŋ.
40006021	Yo kabɨgo tagɨsi dukwan toŋ, but nandak nandakyosi kɨsi uŋudon gɨn tokdɨsak.”
40006022	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Dabɨl uŋun gɨptɨm dakon teŋteŋɨ. Dabɨlgo tagɨsi kaŋ, gɨptɨmgo kaloŋ teŋteŋɨni toŋ.
40006023	Mani dabɨlgo yokwi kaŋ, gɨptɨmgo kɨsi pɨlɨn tuksi asak. Do teŋteŋɨ butgokon tosok uŋun pɨlɨn tuksi asak kaŋ, uŋun da pɨlɨn tuk madepsi asak.”
40006024	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn tagɨ bamorɨ dakon oman arɨpmɨ dɨma asak. Yaŋ kaŋ, kɨnda naŋgɨn galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek kɨnda do nandaban yokwi taŋ ɨmdɨsak. Ae kɨnda dakon gen guramɨgek kɨnda manji ɨmdɨsak. Ji Piŋkop gat ae moneŋ gat kɨsi dakon oman monjɨni arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ.”
40006025	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yagɨt, “Uŋun do aŋek yaŋ dayɨsat, ji egɨp egɨpji do nandaba kɨk aŋek jap pakbiyo ni baŋ noneŋ yaŋ dɨma nandani. Ae gɨptɨmji do nandaŋek ɨmal dukon baŋ paneŋ, yaŋ nandaŋek nandaba kɨk dɨma ani. Egɨp egɨpji da jap yapmaŋdak, ae gɨptɨmji da ɨmal yapmaŋdak.
40006026	Ji mɨnam pɨndakgaŋ uŋun do nandani. Jap yet dɨma kwaokgaŋ, ae jap paŋmuwut yutnon jap dɨma paŋek paŋmuwuk yopmaŋgaŋ. Mani Datji Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun da jap upmokdok. Ji pɨŋbi aŋakwa mɨnam da yo madep yaŋ nandaŋ, ma?
40006027	Ji nandaba kɨk aŋek egɨp egɨpji tɨmɨsok dɨ gat tagɨ saŋbeŋba wɨgɨsak yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨmasi.
40006028	“Ji nido ɨmal do nandaba kɨk aŋ? Jareŋ oni taŋ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun do nandani. Pi madep aŋek ɨmal dɨma bupmaŋgaŋ.
40006029	Mani yaŋ dayɨsat, jareŋ pɨndakgaŋ uŋun dakon tɨlɨmni da kalɨp kɨla amɨn madep Solomon dakon tɨlɨmni tagɨsi pagɨt uŋun yapmaŋdak.
40006030	On joŋ taŋ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun aŋwa amɨn da baljaŋ kɨndapmon sokdaŋ. Mani Piŋkop da si paŋtɨlɨm asak, do nandaŋ gadatji pɨsɨpmɨsok amɨn ji yaŋsi nandani, Piŋkop da ji do nandaban yo madepsi aŋakwan ɨmal tɨlɨmɨ toŋsi baŋ paŋ damdɨsak.
40006031	“Nandaba kɨk aŋek jap pakbiyo dukon baŋ noneŋ, bo ɨmal dukon baŋ paneŋ yaŋ dɨma nandani.
40006032	Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn kabɨ da yo morap uŋuden wusɨk do nandaba kɨk aŋ. Mani Datji Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun da ji uŋun yo morap do wadaŋ uŋun nandaŋ mudosok.
40006033	Do mibɨltok Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun wɨsɨŋ kok do pini ani, ae aŋpakni kɨlegɨ wusɨk do pini ani. Yaŋ aŋakwa yo dɨwarɨ do wadak wadak aŋ uŋun kɨsi damdɨsak.
40006034	Do aŋwa gɨldat do nandaba kɨk dɨma ani. Gɨldat kaloŋ kaloŋ dakon jɨgɨ uŋun iyɨ da arɨpmon taŋ taŋ aŋ.”
40007001	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yagɨt, “Ji amɨn dakon aŋpak dɨma kokwinɨtni. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, Piŋkop da jiyo kɨsi kokwin akdɨsak.
40007002	Amɨn dakon aŋpak kokwin niaŋsi ani, Piŋkop da jiyo kɨsi uŋudeŋ gɨn kokwin akdɨsak.
40007003	Gaga da dabɨlon kɨndap kwɨk tosok uŋun do dɨma nandaŋek notgo da dabɨlon jɨmjɨm nido kosol?
40007004	Gaga da dabɨlon kɨndap kwɨk taŋakwan niaŋon da notgo ‘Dabɨlgokon jɨmjɨm tosok uŋun paŋ gamdɨsat’ yaŋ tagɨ iyɨki?
40007005	Gak jamba but amɨn. Mibɨltok gaga da dabɨlon kɨndap kwɨk tosok uŋun abɨ kɨŋakwan notgo da dabɨlon jɨmjɨmjok tosok uŋun kaŋbɨ pɨsaŋakwan tagɨ paki.
40007006	“Yo telagɨ pɨŋan do dɨma yomni. Yoba tobɨlek ɨnjɨŋ dabam. Ae kɨndɨrɨŋji tagɨsi bɨt do dɨma yomni. Yoba kandap da dɨ bamaŋ mɨsɨŋɨkbam.”
40007007	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨŋba yo damjak. Pinisi aŋek wusɨŋ pɨndatni. Yoma domon tɨdaŋba Piŋkop da wɨtdal damjak.
40007008	Amɨn morap Piŋkop bɨsit iyaŋ uŋun yo tɨmɨkgaŋ, ae yo wɨsaŋ amɨn uŋun bamɨ koŋ, ae yoma domon tɨdoŋ amɨn uŋun wɨtdal yomɨsak.
40007009	Monjɨsi kɨnda da datni bret do iyɨŋban tɨp kɨnda tagɨ ɨmjak?
40007010	Bo tap kɨlap do iyɨŋban tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ kɨnda tagɨ ɨmjak? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨmasi.
40007011	Ji yokwi morapmɨ aŋ, mani yo tagɨsi monjɨsi do yom do nandaŋ. Do yaŋsi nandani. Bɨsit iyɨŋba Datji Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun da but galagon da yo tagɨsi damdɨsak.
40007012	“Amɨn da aŋpak tagɨsi niaŋsi aŋdamni do nandaŋ, uŋun aŋpak amɨn do aŋyomni. Moses dakon gen teban gat ae kombɨ amɨn dakon gen gat da yaŋsi ani do yosok.”
40007013	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji wigat gɨtni naŋ pɨgɨni. Amɨn wagɨl tasɨk tokdaŋ dakon kokupmon pɨgɨk dakon wigat gat ae kositni gat uŋun ɨlalogɨsi, do uŋun naŋ yolek pɨgɨk uŋun tagapmɨsi. Amɨn morapmɨsi da wigat uŋun naŋ pɨkwaŋ.
40007014	Mani egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨnikon kɨgɨk dakon wigat gat ae kositni uŋun gɨtnisi, uŋudon kɨgɨk dakon pini jɨgɨsi. Amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ dagɨn wigat uŋun kaŋ kwoŋ.”
40007015	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji kombɨ amɨn toptopmɨ uŋun do pɨndak kɨmotni. Gɨptɨmni yaworɨsi sipsip yombem, mani burɨgwan joŋ pɨŋan butni taŋ yomaŋ.
40007016	Ji aŋpakni pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek kombɨ amɨn toptopmɨ yaŋ pɨndakba pɨsoni. Nap kelɨ toŋ da wain sop arɨpmɨ dɨma potni. Ae jal da kɨmɨp arɨpmɨ dɨma wigɨljak.
40007017	Kɨndap tagɨ da bamɨ tagɨ pokgoŋ, ae kɨndap yokwi da bamɨ yokwi pokgoŋ.
40007018	Kɨndap tagɨ da bamɨ yokwi arɨpmɨ dɨma potni, ae kɨndap yokwi da bamɨ tagɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma potni.
40007019	Kɨndap morap bamɨ dɨma pokgoŋ uŋun amɨn da mandaŋ kɨndapmon sosoŋ.
40007020	Yaŋdo, ji aŋpakni pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek kombɨ amɨn toptopmɨ yaŋ pɨndakba pɨsoni.
40007021	‘Amɨn Tagɨno’ yaŋ yaŋ namaŋ amɨn uŋun kɨsisi Piŋkop da Kwen Kokup Kɨla Asagon dɨma wɨgɨkdaŋ. Datno Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun dakon gen guramɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun dagɨn wɨgɨkdaŋ.
40007022	Amɨn morapmɨ da bɨsap madepmon yaŋsi nayɨkdaŋ, ‘Amɨn Tagɨnin, nin gak da manon kombɨ gen yagɨmaŋ, ae koŋ yolgɨmaŋ, ae pi madep agɨmaŋ.’
40007023	Yaŋ yaŋba yaŋsi yoyɨkdɨsat, ‘Yokwi pakpak amɨn, ji dɨma nandaŋ damɨsat. Nepmaŋ dek kɨŋ mudabɨt!’ ”
40007024	“Nak dakon gen guramɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun amɨn kɨnda yombem. Uŋun amɨn nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi, yutni mɨktɨm tebaikon wɨtjɨgɨt.
40007025	Aŋakwan sɨkak pakbi kulup mɨrɨmyo da abɨŋ tɨdaŋ aŋtɨdok aba mɨktɨm tebaikon wɨtjɨŋbi, do tebai tagɨt.
40007026	Mani geno dɨma guramɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun amɨn kɨnda yombem. Uŋun nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma, do yutni mɨktɨm yaworɨkon wɨtjɨgɨt.
40007027	Aŋakwan sɨkak pakbi kulup mɨrɨmyo da abɨŋ tɨdaŋ tuwɨlba maŋ tasɨk tagɨt.”
40007028	Yesu gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋban mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep da kaŋek tamtam yaŋ ɨmgwit.
40007029	Nido yoyɨŋdet pi agɨt uŋun gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn yapmaŋ mudaŋek ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt. Amɨn kɨnda da pi uŋun asak do yaŋ mudaŋ ɨbi da tɨlak agɨt.
40008001	Yesu ɨleŋon da pɨŋ kɨŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo morapmɨ da yolgwit.
40008002	Yolek amɨn wuda tebani toŋ kɨnda da Yesukon kɨŋ ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek tokeŋ do nandɨsal kaŋ, tagɨ aŋmɨlɨp abɨ kɨlek tokeŋ.”
40008003	Yaŋban Yesu da kɨsitni amɨn uŋun da kwenon wɨtjɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨlek toki do nandɨsat, do pasɨl gamni!” Yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn wudani kɨbɨdaŋakwa gɨptɨmni kɨlek tagɨt.
40008004	Kɨlek taŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nandaki, gak uŋun do amɨn dɨma yoyɨŋek mukwa sogogon kɨŋek gɨptɨmgo yolɨki. Aŋek Moses da yagɨt uŋun da tɨlagon paret aŋaki amɨn da asi kɨlek tal yaŋ gandani.”
40008005	Yesu Kapaneam kokupmon pɨgakwan Rom dakon emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn kɨnda da abɨŋ aŋpulugosak do aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
40008006	“Amɨn Tagɨ, oman monjɨno yutnon pokdok. Kɨdarɨ alek taŋ, ae tepmɨ madepsi nandɨsak.”
40008007	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da kɨŋ aŋmɨlɨp abeŋ.”
40008008	-
40008009	Yaŋban mibɨltok amɨn uŋun da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nak madepno da yoŋgamgwan egɨsat, do nak da yutnon wɨki uŋun da tagɨ dɨma asak. Ɨsal yum gen gɨn yaŋaki oman monjɨno kɨlek tosak. Nak naga mibɨltok amɨno egakwan pɨŋbini egɨsat. Ae emat amɨno uŋun nak dakon pɨŋbino ekwaŋ. Emat amɨno kɨnda ‘Kɨ!’ yaŋ iyɨko kɨsak. Ae kɨnda ‘Ap!’ yaŋ iyɨko abɨsak. Ae oman amɨno kɨnda ‘Pi on aki!’ yaŋ iyɨko pi asak. Do ɨsal yum gen gɨn yaŋaki oman monjɨno kɨlek tosak.”
40008010	Yesu da gen uŋun yagɨt do nandaban yo madepsi aban buŋon yol awɨlgwit amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, Israel amɨnon nandaŋ gadatni madep on amɨn dakon yombem kɨnda dɨma kagɨm.
40008011	Yaŋ dayɨsat, amɨn morapmɨsi da gɨldat wɨsak, ae si pɨgɨsak tetgɨn da apba Kwen Kokup Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan Abraham, Aisak, ae Jekop gat jap noknok tamo madepmon yɨtdaŋ.
40008012	Mani Juda amɨn kalɨp Piŋkop da iyɨ Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan pɨgɨni do manjɨkbi uŋun maban pɨlɨn tukgwan pɨgɨkdaŋ. Uŋungwan kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek egɨpdaŋ.”
40008013	Yaŋ yaŋek emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨŋ yo altoni do nandaŋ teban tal uŋun yaŋ gɨn noman taŋ ɨmeŋ kokdɨsal.” Gen uŋun iyɨgɨt uŋun bɨsapmonsi oman monjɨni kɨlek tagɨt.
40008014	Yesu uŋudon da kɨŋ Pita da yutnon wɨgɨ kaŋban Pita dakon yopmi gɨptɨmɨ kɨndapmɨ soŋakwan sot aŋek pakgɨt.
40008015	Yaŋ kaŋek kɨsitni kɨsirɨkon wutjɨŋban sotni yɨpmaŋ dekgɨt. Yaŋ aban pɨdaŋek Yesu do jap paŋnoman agɨt.
40008016	Gɨldat pɨgakwan pɨlɨndo koŋni toŋ amɨn morapmɨ paŋpaŋ apba gen yaŋek koŋ yol yomgut. Aŋek sot amɨn kɨsisi paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
40008017	Yaŋ aŋakwan kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da kalɨpsigwan gen mandagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Iyɨ sotnin mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ iyɨ do tɨmɨgakwan kɨlek tagɨmaŋ.”
40008018	Yesu da amɨn morapmɨ aŋgwasɨŋek akba pɨndagek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nin pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda do kɨno.”
40008019	Aŋakwan gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn kɨnda da obɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, gak dukwan dukwan agɨpbi uŋun nak gol awɨlgeŋ gɨn.”
40008020	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Joŋ pɨŋan uŋun mɨktɨmgwan yutni toŋ. Ae mɨnam kwen akwaŋ uŋun yutni toŋ. Mani Amɨn Dakon Monjɨ uŋun dɨpmɨn potpot tamoni mɨni.”
40008021	Yaŋban paŋdetni kɨnda da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nandaŋ namɨŋaki kɨŋ datno wayɨk yɨpmaŋek don abɨŋ golgeŋ.”
40008022	Mani Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨmakbi da kɨmakbi notni iyɨ tagɨ wayɨtni. Aŋakwa gak nak nol.”
40008023	Yaŋ yaŋek boron wɨgakwan paŋdetni kɨsi yolek wɨgɨwit.
40008024	Wɨgɨ pakbi ɨdapmon kɨŋakwa tepmɨsi mɨrɨm madepsi da abɨŋ pakbi tamalɨgakwan boron pɨgɨwit. Yaŋ aŋakwan Yesu dɨpmɨn pagakwan
40008025	paŋdetni da kɨŋ aŋyolek iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nin paŋpuluga! Pakbi oni naŋ kɨmotdamaŋ!”
40008026	Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido pasolgoŋ? Nandaŋ gadatji pɨsɨpmɨ.” Yaŋ yaŋek pɨdaŋ agek mɨrɨm gat ae pakbi gat tebai yoyɨŋban mɨrɨm yawogakwan pakbi wayɨŋ dɨmasi agɨt.
40008027	Aban paŋdetni tamtam yaŋek yawit, “On niaŋen amɨn kɨnda da mɨrɨm pakbiyo yoyɨŋban geni guramɨkgamal?”
40008028	Yesu pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda Gadara mɨktɨmon kɨŋ altaŋban amɨn bamorɨ koŋni toŋ uŋun da amɨn kɨmakba paŋkɨ tɨp kɨnamgwan yopmaŋgaŋ mɨktɨmon da abɨŋ Yesu altaŋ ɨmgumal. Uŋun amɨn bamot amɨn dapdapni yokwisi. Do amɨn uŋun do pasalek uŋun kosit naŋ dɨma agɨpgwit.
40008029	Uŋun amɨn bamot da yaŋ tɨdaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Piŋkop dakon Monji, niaŋsi aŋnim do abɨsal? Tepmɨ yomyom bɨsap dɨma noman taŋakwan tepmɨ pi nimdɨsal?”
40008030	Dubagɨ yaŋgok bɨt kabɨ madep dɨ jap naŋek egɨpgwit.
40008031	Koŋ uŋun da Yesu bɨsit tebaisi yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Nol nipbɨ abɨgɨneŋ kaŋ, uŋun bɨt kabɨ da butgwan pɨgɨneŋ do nandamaŋ.”
40008032	Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji abɨgɨt!” Yaŋ yaŋban koŋ da amɨnon da wɨŋ kɨŋek bɨt da butgwan pɨgɨwit. Pɨgakwa bɨt uŋun tɨmtɨm yaŋek gɨlokon da pakbi ɨdapgwan maŋek pakbi naŋ kɨmakgwit.
40008033	Kɨmagakwa bɨt kɨla amɨn da tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨŋ kokupmon bɨt gat ae koŋni toŋ amɨn gat dakon geni amɨn yoyɨwit.
40008034	Yoyɨŋba amɨn kɨsisi Yesu kok do abɨŋ mudawit. Abɨŋ kaŋek mɨktɨm uŋun yɨpmaŋek kɨsak do bɨsit tebai iyɨwit.
40009001	Yesu bot kɨnda abɨdaŋek pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda iyɨ da kokupmon kɨgɨt.
40009002	Aŋakwan amɨn kabɨ kɨnda da amɨn kɨsit kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi kɨnda wamaŋ uŋudon aŋapgwit. Aŋapba Yesu da nandaŋ gadatni pɨndagek amɨn uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Monjɨ, dɨma pasolgi, dɨwarɨgo wɨrɨrɨk gamɨsat.”
40009003	Yaŋ yaŋban gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn dɨwarɨ da notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Ma! On amɨn Piŋkop kulabɨsak!”
40009004	Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da pɨndak mudaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nidosi butjikon da nandak nandak yokwi uŋun nandaŋ?
40009005	-
40009006	Dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt ae amɨn kɨsit kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi paŋmɨlɨp agak uŋun kɨsi amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma agagɨ. Mani nak Amɨn Dakon Monji. Amɨn gɨptɨm paŋmɨlɨp agak dakon pi abeŋ do yaŋ mudaŋ nabi, do nandani, on mɨktɨmon dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt dakon pi abeŋ do yaŋ mudaŋ nabi yaŋsi nandaba pɨsosak.” Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn kɨsit kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek yutgokon kɨ.”
40009007	Yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek amɨn uŋun pɨdaŋ yutnikon kɨgɨt.
40009008	Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep uŋun yo ŋwakŋwarɨsi kaŋek pasalgwit. Aŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yaŋ yawit, “Mao, Piŋkop da tapmɨm madepsi amɨn do yomɨsak!”
40009009	Yesu uŋudon da kɨŋ amɨn kɨnda kagɨt mani Matyu, uŋun takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt yut kabeŋon yɨkgɨt. Kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nol.” Yaŋban Matyu pɨdaŋ Yesu yolgɨt.
40009010	Yesu Matyu da yutnon yɨgek jap naŋek takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn morapmɨ ae yokwi pakpak amɨn morapmɨ da apba Yesu gat paŋdetni gat kɨsi yɨgek jap nawit.
40009011	Jap naŋakwa pɨndagek Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdetji uŋun nido takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn gat yokwi pakpak amɨn gat kɨsi yɨgek jap noŋ?”
40009012	Yesu da gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Sotni mɨni amɨn wuda wamagon dɨma kwaŋ. Sotni toŋ amɨn dagɨn wuda wamagon kwaŋ.
40009013	Ji kɨŋ Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandaŋ kɨmotni. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Ji da paret aŋ uŋun do dɨma galak tosot. Ji da amɨn do bupmɨ nandaŋ yomni uŋun do galak tosot.’ Gen yaŋ tosok, do nandani, amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ ɨlɨt do dɨma pɨgɨm. Yokwi pakpak amɨn yaŋ ɨlɨt do pɨgɨm.”
40009014	Yaŋ yaŋban Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn dakon paŋdetni da abɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin gat ae Parisi amɨn gat Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egapno gak dakon paŋdet kabɨgo nido yaŋ dɨma aŋ?”
40009015	Iyɨŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Monjɨsok kɨnda mɨŋat pak do asak bɨsapmon monjɨsok notni gat kɨsi ekwaŋ, do bupmɨ dɨma nandaŋ. Mani don monji uŋun gwayeŋ aŋaŋ kɨŋakwa notni uŋun bɨsapmon Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek ekwaŋ.”
40009016	“Nin ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk garaŋɨ pudaŋkwi kon ɨmal dɨwat kalugɨ pakbikon dɨma sugaŋbi kɨnda naŋ dɨma bupmaŋgamaŋ. Yaŋ kaŋ, pakbikon sugono ɨmal dɨwat uŋun da garaŋɨ ɨlɨkban pudaŋ kɨ madepsi akdɨsak.
40009017	Ae wain kalugɨ meme gɨp kalɨpmɨkon dɨma koleno pɨgɨsak. Yaŋ kaŋ, wain da paptaŋban meme gɨp sulukwan wain gat meme gɨp gat kɨsi yokwi tokdamal. Amɨn da wain kalugɨ meme gɨp kalugɨkon koleŋba wain gat meme gɨp gat kɨsi tagɨ tomal.”
40009018	Gen uŋun yoyɨŋakwan kɨla amɨn kɨnda da abɨŋ Yesu burɨkon gawak ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gwano ongwanjok kɨmokdok, mani gak da kɨŋ kɨsitgo da kwenikon wutjɨŋbɨ pɨdosak.”
40009019	Iyɨŋban nandaŋek Yesu paŋdetni gat kɨsi kɨwit.
40009020	Kɨŋakwa mɨŋat kɨnda da abɨŋ manjigwan da Yesu dakon ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni ɨleŋɨkon ɨgayɨgɨt. Mɨŋat uŋun dagaŋ mok aŋek yawini maŋakwa egakwan bɨlak 12 agɨt.
40009021	Mɨŋat uŋun ɨlɨkba pɨgɨknikon ɨgayɨŋek noman tokeŋ yaŋ nandagɨt.
40009022	Aban Yesu da tobɨl kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gwano, dɨma pasolgi. Nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨsal, do kɨlek tosol.” Yaŋ yaŋban uŋudon gɨn gɨptɨmni kɨlek tagɨt.
40009023	Yesu kɨla amɨn da yutnon wɨgek kasɨsɨŋ pɨsok amɨn gat ae mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep kunam upbalapyo aŋakwa pɨndagek
40009024	yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Abɨgɨt. Mɨŋatjok uŋun dɨma kuŋwak, uŋun yum dɨpmɨn pokdok.” Yesu da yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek jɨkgo yanjaŋ ɨmgwit.
40009025	Yaŋ aba yoyɨŋban yomakon pɨgɨ mudaŋakwa wɨgɨ mɨŋatjok kɨsirɨkon abɨdaŋban pɨdagɨt.
40009026	Yaŋ aban wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ uŋun agɨt dakon gen bini yoyɨŋba uŋun mɨktɨm dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨsi da nandawit.
40009027	Yesu uŋun mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋ kɨŋakwan dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn bamorɨ da abɨŋ yolgumal. Yolek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨmal, “Dewit Dakon Monji, bupmɨ nandaŋ nim!”
40009028	Yesu yutnon wɨgakwan amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni bamot uŋudon wɨŋbal yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak da dabɨljil paŋmɨlɨp abeŋ do nandaŋ gadaŋ namamal bo dɨma?” Yaŋban iyɨgɨmal, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nandaŋ gadaŋ gamamak.”
40009029	Yaŋ yaŋbal Yesu da kɨsitni dabɨlnikon wɨtjɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nandaŋ gadaŋ namamal uŋun da arɨpmon gɨn noman taŋ damdɨsak.”
40009030	Yaŋban dabɨlɨ sɨŋtaŋakwal Yesu da yaŋsop tebai aŋyomɨŋek yoyɨgɨt, “Yo madep asat do amɨn dɨmasi yoyɨnjil.”
40009031	Mani Yesu dakon gen yaŋbal uŋun mɨktɨmon madepsi ɨreŋtaŋ aŋaŋ kɨgɨt.
40009032	Amɨn bamot uŋun Yesu yɨpmaŋ dek kɨŋakwal amɨn kadɨm koŋni toŋ kɨnda Yesukon aŋaŋ opgwit.
40009033	Aŋopba Yesu da koŋni yol ɨmɨŋakwan amɨn kadɨm uŋun gen yagɨt. Yaŋ aban amɨn da kaŋek nandaba yo ŋwakŋwarɨsi aban yaŋ yawit, “Yo uŋuden kɨnda Israel mɨktɨmon dɨma altagɨt.”
40009034	Mani Parisi amɨn da yaŋ yawit, “Koŋ dakon kɨla amɨn madep da tapmɨmon koŋ yoldak.”
40009035	Yesu kokup monɨŋ ae kokup pap kɨsi agek Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutni taŋ taŋ awiron wɨgek amɨn yoyɨŋ degek Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi do yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Aŋek gɨptɨmnikon sot wudaniyo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ tawit uŋun paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
40009036	Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo madepsi pɨndakban paŋpulugogɨ mɨni yokwi egɨpgwit. Sipsip kɨla amɨni mɨni yombemsi ekwa pɨndagek bupmɨsi nandaŋ yomgut.
40009037	Yesu burɨ da bupmɨsi nandaŋek paŋdet kabɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Pigaga jap bamɨ madepsi taŋ pektaŋ, mani pi monjɨ bamɨ pakpak amɨn morapmɨ dɨma.
40009038	Do ji bamɨ pakpak dakon Amɨn Tagɨni bɨsit iyɨŋba pi amɨn paŋalon aŋ yopban pinikon kɨŋ jap paŋ paŋmuwutni.”
40010001	Yesu da paŋdetni 12 kabɨ yoyɨŋban apba koŋ yolyol ae sot mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ kɨsisi paŋmɨlɨp agak dakon pi ani do yaŋ mudaŋ yomgut.
40010002	Yabekbi 12 kabɨ dakon man uŋun yaŋ: mibɨltok Saimon (mani kɨnda Pita), ae padɨge Andru, Sebedi dakon monji Jems, ae padɨge Jon.
40010003	ae Pilip, Batolomiu, Tomas, ae takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn Matyu, ae Alpius dakon monji, Jems, ae Tadius,
40010004	ae Saimon (uŋun kalɨp Selot da kabɨkon egɨpgut), ae Judas Iskariot. (Judas uŋun da don Yesu uwal da kɨsiron yɨpgut.)
40010005	Yesu da amɨn 12 kabɨ uŋun yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon bo ae Samaria amɨn da kokupmon dɨma kɨni.
40010006	Kɨŋek Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon bɨsap uŋun kwaŋ tosok uŋun dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋoni.
40010008	Aŋek sotni toŋ amɨn paŋmɨlɨp ani, ae amɨn kɨmakbi paba pɨdoni, ae wuda tebani toŋ paŋmɨlɨp ani, ae koŋni toŋ amɨn koŋni yol yomni. Ji yo yumaŋ nogɨ mɨni yumsi tɨmɨkgaŋ, do amɨn do yumsi yomni. Tomni do dɨma nandani.
40010009	Kosit agɨpni bɨsapmon yɨk dɨma ɨmetni, paba pɨgɨk bamorɨ dɨma tɨmɨtni, ae kandap gwɨl gat kosit dakon wɨn kɨrɨŋyo kɨsi dɨma tɨmɨtni. Pi aŋakwa wadak wadakji amɨn da damdaŋ.
40010011	Kokup pap kɨndakon bo ae kokup monɨŋ kɨndakon kɨŋ altoni kaŋ, uŋun kokupmon amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨnda wusɨŋ kaŋ uŋun gat gɨn egek yɨpmaŋ kɨni.
40010012	Yut kɨndakon wɨgɨni bɨsapmon, uŋun yutnon amɨn ‘Amɨn Tagɨ dakon but yawot jikon tosak’ yaŋ yoyɨni.
40010013	Ae uŋun yutnon amɨn da ji but dasi tɨmɨtni kaŋ, ji dakon but yawot uŋun amɨnon tosak. Mani but dasi dɨma tɨmɨtni kaŋ, but yawotji uŋun dɨsikon gɨn tosak.
40010014	Amɨn kɨnda da ji but dasi dɨma tɨmɨtjak bo ae genji nandak do kurak tosak kaŋ, yut kokupyoni yɨpmaŋ degek kandap jikon kɨmbabaŋ tegoni uŋun tɨdaŋba kɨni.
40010015	Asisi dayɨsat, kokwin agak bɨsap madepmon, uŋuden amɨn da Sodom kokup amɨn gat ae Gomora kokup amɨn gat da jɨgɨ pakdaŋ uŋun si yapmaŋek jɨgɨ madepsi pakdaŋ.”
40010016	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nandani, nak da ji sipsip yombem baŋ joŋ pɨŋan da bɨkbɨgon yabekdat. Do tuŋon amɨn da nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi aŋek akwaŋ uŋun da tɨlagon agɨpni. Ae kɨnarɨm dakon aŋpak yolek yaworɨsi agɨpni.
40010017	Amɨn do pɨndak kɨmotni. Gen kokwin amɨn kabɨnikon depmaŋek muwut muwut yutnikon baljokdaŋ.
40010018	Nak dakon man abɨŋ yɨp do aŋek ji tɨmɨk paŋpaŋ gapmanon ae kɨla amɨn madepmon paŋkɨkdaŋ. Paŋkwa kɨla amɨn madepmon ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon nak dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋoni.
40010019	Gen pikon paŋkɨ depmaŋakwa gen ni baŋ yoneŋ ae gen kobogɨ niaŋ yoyɨneŋ yaŋ nandaŋek pasol pasol dɨma ani. Uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn ni gen baŋ yoyɨni uŋun Piŋkop da dolɨkdɨsak.
40010020	Ji da dɨma yokdaŋ. Datji dakon Wup da ji da dulumon da yokdɨsak, do pasol pasol dɨma ani.
40010021	“Peni da padɨge si aŋakba kɨmotjak do gen pikon yɨpdɨsak. Ae dat da monjɨ gwayoni yaŋ gɨn akdɨsak. Aŋakwa monjɨ gwayoni da meŋi datniyo do uwal aŋek si dapba kɨmotni do amɨn yoyɨkdaŋ.
40010022	Nak nandaŋ namaŋ do aŋek amɨn morapmɨ da ji do nandaba yokwi tok aŋdamdaŋ. Mani tebai agek egɨ wɨgakwa bɨsap madepmon wɨgɨsak amɨn Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtdɨsak.
40010023	Kokup kɨndakon amɨn da uwal aŋdaba kaŋ, kokup uŋun yɨpmaŋek pasal kokup kɨndakon kɨni. Nak asi dayɨsat, ji Israel amɨn dakon kokup morapmon pi wasɨp dɨma aŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji apdɨsak.
40010024	“Papia yut mɨŋat monjɨyo da yoyɨŋdetni dɨma yapmaŋgaŋ. Ae oman amɨn da madepni dɨma yapmaŋgaŋ.
40010025	Mɨŋat monjɨyo da yoyɨŋdetni da tɨlagon egɨpni kaŋ, uŋun tagɨ. Ae oman amɨn da madepni da tɨlagon egɨpni kaŋ, uŋun kɨsi tagɨ. Yut dakon ami nak do Belsebul yaŋ nayɨni kaŋ, gwakni ji do nandaba pɨŋbisi aŋakwa man wagɨl yokwisi damdaŋ.”
40010026	Yesu da gen saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji amɨn da yo yokwi aŋ damni do dɨma pasolni. Yo wɨtjɨŋbi da toŋ uŋun don noman tokdaŋ. Ae gen pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun don amɨn kɨsi da nandakdaŋ.
40010027	Gen pɨlɨn kaga dayɨsat, uŋun gɨldat kalba yaŋ teŋteŋoni. Gen pɨsɨk mɨrakjikon dayɨsat uŋun yut kwenon da agek yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ yomni.
40010028	Amɨn da gɨp dapba kɨmokgoŋ uŋun do dɨma pasolni, wupji arɨpmɨ dɨma dapba kɨmotdaŋ. Ji Piŋkop dosi pasolni. Uŋun da gɨp gat wup gat kɨsi Tɨpdomon maban pɨgɨ tasɨk tokdaŋ.
40010029	Mɨnam monɨŋ uŋun yo monɨŋɨsok, bamorɨ dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun moneŋ gɨman tabɨlɨ kaloŋɨ gɨn. Mani Datji da kɨnda mɨktɨmon dɨma mosak do nandɨsak kaŋ, arɨpmɨ dɨma mokdɨsak.
40010030	Piŋkop da busuŋ daŋgwanji niaŋ da toŋ uŋun kɨsisi nandaŋ mudosok,
40010031	do dɨma pasolni. Mɨnam monɨŋ monɨŋ morapmɨ dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun madep dɨma, mani ji dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun wukwisi.”
40010032	Yesu da gen saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda mɨŋat amɨnyokon ‘Nak Yesu dakon amɨn’ yaŋ yosak kaŋ, nak da Datno Kwen Kokup egɨsak ‘Uŋun amɨn nak dakon amɨn’ yaŋ iyɨkdɨsat.
40010033	Mani amɨn kɨnda mɨŋat amɨnyokon ‘Nak Yesu dakon amɨn dɨma’ yaŋ yosak kaŋ, nak da Datno Kwen Kokup egɨsak ‘Uŋun amɨn nak dakon amɨn dɨma’ yaŋ iyɨkdɨsat.”
40010034	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak da mɨktɨmon emat aŋyawot ak do pɨgɨm yaŋ dɨma nandani. Nak emat agak sɨbanaŋ aŋaŋ pɨgɨm.
40010035	Nak uwal pɨdok pɨdokyo noman tosak do pɨgɨm. ‘Amɨn kɨnda da datni uwal aŋ ɨmdɨsak. Ae gwa kɨnda da meŋi uwal aŋ ɨmdɨsak. Aŋakwan mɨŋat kɨnda da namdi uwal aŋ ɨmdɨsak.
40010036	Aŋakwan amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon gwakni da uwalni dagokdaŋ.’
40010037	“Amɨn kɨnda meŋi datniyo do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun yapmaŋek nak do wukwisi yaŋ dɨma nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn nak dakon notno dɨma. Ae amɨn kɨnda monji bo ae gwi do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun yapmaŋek nak do wukwisi yaŋ dɨma nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn nak dakon notno dɨma.
40010038	Ae amɨn kɨnda tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨgek nak dɨma noljak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn nak dakon notno dɨma.
40010039	Amɨn kɨnda mɨktɨmon tagɨsi egɨp do nandaŋek pi madepsi asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨpni pasɨl ɨmdɨsak. Mani amɨn kɨnda nak do nandaŋek egɨp egɨpni yɨpjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokdɨsak.”
40010040	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda ji but dasi tɨmɨkdak, uŋun nak naŋ abɨdosok. Amɨn kɨnda nak abɨdosok, Piŋkop nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun naŋ abɨdosok.
40010041	Amɨn kɨnda da nak kombɨ amɨn kɨnda aŋpulugosot yaŋ nandaŋek kombɨ amɨn kɨnda abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ yutnikon kɨlani asak kaŋ, Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi kombɨ amɨn do yomɨsak yaŋ gɨn uŋun amɨn do ɨmdɨsak. Ae amɨn kɨnda da nak amɨn kɨlegɨsi kɨnda aŋpulugosot yaŋ nandaŋek amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨnda abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ yutnikon kɨlani asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da yo tagɨsi amɨn kɨlegɨ da tɨmɨkgaŋ yaŋ gɨn tɨmɨtdɨsak.
40010042	Ae amɨn kɨnda da nak Yesu dakon paŋdetni kɨnda aŋpulugosot yaŋ nandaŋek nak dakon paŋdetno mani mɨni kɨnda do pakbi mɨrɨmjok kɨnda koleŋ ɨmjak kaŋ, asisi dayɨsat, kobogɨ do yo tagɨsi tɨmɨtdɨsak.”
40011001	Yesu paŋdetni 12 kabɨ yoyɨŋ dek mudaŋek uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek Galili mɨktɨm dakon kokup pap tawit uŋudon agek Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
40011002	Aŋakwan Jon dam tebanon yɨgek Kristo da pi agɨt dakon gen bin nandaŋek paŋdet kabɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
40011003	“Ji Yesukon kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨni, ‘Piŋkop da amɨn yabet do yagɨt uŋun gak, bo nin amɨn kɨnda don apdɨsak uŋun do jomjom aneŋ?’ ”
40011004	Yaŋba Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kɨŋ yo morap kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋ uŋun Jon iyɨni.
40011005	Dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn sɨŋtoŋ, kandapmɨ alek taŋbi kosit akwaŋ, wuda tebani toŋ amɨn kɨlek toŋ, mɨragɨ mɨni gen nandaŋ, kɨmakbi kɨmoron da pɨdoŋ, ae yoni mɨni amɨn da Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi nandaŋ.
40011006	Amɨn kɨnda nak nandaŋek nandaŋ gadatni dɨma wɨtdal kɨsak uŋun amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨgɨ toŋ egɨsak.”
40011007	Yoyɨŋban Jon dakon paŋdet kabɨni kɨŋakwa Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep Jon do yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji mɨktɨm amɨni mɨnikon ninaŋ kok do kɨwit? Mɨrɨm da nagal paŋwayɨŋ aban pɨndat do kɨwit?
40011008	Uŋun dɨma kaŋ, ninaŋ kok do kɨwit? Amɨn kɨnda da ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni mani toŋsi pagɨt uŋun kok do kɨwit? Dɨma, kɨla amɨn madep da yutnon uŋuden amɨn da ekwaŋ.
40011009	Dɨma kaŋ, ae ninaŋ kok do kɨwit? Kombɨ amɨn kɨnda kok do kɨwit? Asi ji kombɨ amɨn kok do kɨwit. Mani Jon da kombɨ amɨn dɨwarɨ yapmaŋ mudosok.
40011010	Uŋun amɨn dogɨn Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Nandani, geno yaŋ teŋteŋosak do amɨn kɨnda yabekgo uŋun da mibɨltaŋ gamjak. Aŋek kositgo aŋnoman asak.’
40011011	Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn morap mɨktɨmon altoŋ uŋun Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn da yapmaŋ mudosok. Mani amɨn morap Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan pɨŋbisi ekwaŋ uŋun da Jon yapmaŋgaŋ.
40011012	-
40011013	“Kombɨ amɨn morap gat ae gen teban papia kɨsi da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Akdɨsak uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋaŋakwa wɨŋ Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok pini wasagɨt bɨsapmon wɨgɨt. Jon da Piŋkop dakon gen wasaŋek yagɨron da wɨŋ abɨsok ekwamaŋon Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨlani Ak do pi madepsi asak. Aŋakwan amɨn da uŋun kɨrɨŋɨt do pi madep aŋ. Yaŋ aŋek emat jɨgɨyo morapmɨsi paŋalon aŋ.
40011014	-
40011015	Uŋun papia da Elaija don apjak do yagɨt. Ji but bamot aŋ yaŋ nandɨsat. Gen on nandak do galak toŋ amɨn ji pakyaŋsi nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsoni. Jon uŋun Elaija.
40011016	“Amɨn abɨsok ekwaŋ uŋun nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma. Uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ tɨmɨsok dɨ dayɨko nandabɨt. Uŋun mɨŋat monjɨyo da yaŋ, yumaŋ gwayek tamokon yɨgek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yoŋ,
40011017	‘Nin kasɨsɨŋ kɨlɨ pɨsomaŋ, mani ji kap ak do dɨma nandayɨŋ. Nin bupmɨ kap yamaŋ, mani ji bupmɨ nandaŋek kunam tat do dɨma nandayɨŋ.’ ”
40011018	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Jon abɨŋek jap morapmɨ dɨma nagɨt, ae wain dɨma nagɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan, ‘Koŋni toŋ’ yaŋ yawit.
40011019	Ae Amɨn Dakon Monji da abɨŋ jap pakbiyo agɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan kaŋek yaŋ yawit, ‘Kabɨt, jap morapmɨ noknok amɨn ae wain morapmɨsi noknok amɨn. Takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt ae yokwi pakpak amɨn dakon notni.’ Yaŋ yaŋ ɨmgwit, mani Piŋkop da pi morap agɨt uŋun pɨndagek nandano nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi gɨn asak.”
40011020	Kokup pap dɨwarɨkon Yesu wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ morapmɨ agɨt, mani but tobɨl dɨma awit. Do Yesu da tebaisi yaŋ yagɨt,
40011021	“Korasin ae Betsaida amɨn, awa! Nak wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ abo pɨndagek ji but tobɨl dɨma awit. Tair kokupmon amɨn gat Saidon kokupmon amɨn gat da pɨndakgwit tam, but tobɨl bamɨsi abam. Aŋek bupmɨ dakon yɨk ɨmalyo paŋek abɨlagon yɨkbam.
40011022	Mani nak yaŋ dayɨsat, gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon Tair gat Saidon kokupmon amɨn gat da kobogɨ do jɨgɨ tagapmɨ paŋakwa ji da kobogɨ do jɨgɨ madepsi pakdaŋ.
40011023	Aŋakwa Kapaneam kokupmon amɨn, ji ason Kwen Kokupmon wɨgɨni yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨmasi. Ji mibɨlɨgwan Tɨpdomon pɨgɨkdaŋ. Nak wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ abo pɨndagek ji but tobɨl dɨma awit. Uŋun morap Sodom kokupmon amɨn da pɨndakgwit tam, abɨsok Sodom tosok gɨn.
40011024	Do yaŋsi dayɨsat, Piŋkop da amɨn kokwin ak do bɨsap yɨpguron Sodom amɨn da jɨgɨ pakdaŋ uŋun si yapmaŋek ji da jɨgɨ madepsi pakdaŋ.”
40011025	Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Dat, kundu ae mɨktɨm dakon Amɨn Tagɨ, amɨn dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm dakon nandak nandakni uŋun wukwisi, mani iyɨ do nandaba wɨgɨsak, do uŋuden amɨn do gen bamɨ morap si paŋkɨsɨbɨsal. Aŋek amɨn monɨŋɨ da tɨlagon ekwaŋ amɨn, uŋun do yolɨsal.
40011026	O Dat, gak gaga dakon galaktok yolek yaŋ asal.
40011027	“Datno da yo morap kɨlɨ namgut. Dat uŋun dagɨn Monji nandaŋ ɨmɨsak. Aŋek Monjɨ gat ae amɨn Monjɨ da Dat dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨsak uŋun amɨn dagɨn Datno nandaŋ ɨmaŋ.
40011028	“Jɨgɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ paŋek wararɨ nandaŋ amɨn, ji nagon opba bɨkbɨk dabo yɨk yawotni.
40011029	-
40011030	Bulmakau da tegon amɨn da yɨk pawɨl kɨndap kɨrɨŋ paŋteban aba yo jɨgɨ ɨlɨkgaŋ, uŋun da tɨlak ji nak dakon kɨndap kɨrɨŋ pani. Nak dakon kɨndap kɨrɨŋ uŋun yaworɨ ae yɨk ɨmetni uŋun tagapmɨ. Nak amɨn yaworɨ ae butno pɨŋbi, do nak gat egek Piŋkop do dayɨŋ dekgo butji yaworɨ tosak.”
40012001	Sabat kɨndakon Yesu gat paŋdetni uŋun wit pi kɨnda da bɨkbɨk naŋ kɨwit. Kɨŋek paŋdetni jap do awit, do wit bamɨ dɨwarɨ jɨmɨk dagaŋ nawit.
40012002	Aŋakwa pɨndagek Parisi amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Pɨndat, paŋdet kabɨgo Sabat bɨsapmon nido gen teban yapmaŋek pi aŋ?”
40012003	Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Dewit gat amɨn kabɨni gat da jap do aŋek yo awit uŋun ji manjɨŋ nandaŋyo awit bo dɨma?
40012004	Dewit uŋun telagɨ yutnon wɨgɨ bret Piŋkop do parekbi uŋun abɨdaŋ naŋek amɨn kabɨni kɨsi do yoban nawit. Bret uŋun telagɨ, amɨn ɨsalɨ da dɨma noknogɨ, mukwa sogok amɨn dagɨn tagɨ nawit.
40012005	Bo ae Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda mukwa sogok amɨn do yosok uŋun kɨsi dɨma manjɨŋ nandaŋyo awit? Mukwa sogok amɨn Sabat bɨsap morapmon gen teban yapmaŋek pi aŋ, mani dɨwarɨni mɨni ekwaŋ.
40012006	Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun yaŋ: ‘Nak ji da paret aŋ uŋun do dɨma galak tosot. Nak ji da amɨn do bupmɨ nandaŋ yomni uŋun do galak tosot.’ Ji uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandabam tam, gulusuŋni mɨni amɨn gen dɨma yaŋ yobam. Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun Sabat bɨsap dakon Amɨn Tagɨ egɨsak.”
40012009	Yesu uŋudon da muwut muwut yutni kɨndakon wɨgek
40012010	amɨn kɨsirɨ gɨreŋɨkbi kɨnda ekwan kagɨt. Amɨn yɨkgwit uŋun da Yesu gen teban kɨnda yapmaŋakwan gen pikon yɨpneŋ yaŋ nandaŋek iyɨwit, “Sabat bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda da notni kɨnda aŋmɨlɨp asak kaŋ, uŋun gen teban yapmaŋdak?”
40012011	Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Niaŋ nandaŋ? Jikon da kɨnda dakon sipsipni kɨnda Sabat bɨsapmon gapmagwan mosak kaŋ, yum kaŋakwa uŋungwan di egɨpjak? Dɨmasi, aŋpulugaŋek abɨdaŋ ɨlɨkba wɨkdɨsak.
40012012	Sipsip uŋun yo ɨsalɨ, mani amɨn da yo madepsi. Yaŋdo, Sabat bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda aŋpulugoneŋ kaŋ, gen teban yapmaŋgaŋ yaŋ dɨma nandani.”
40012013	Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn kɨsirɨ gɨreŋɨkbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨsitgo aŋnɨŋnɨŋ a.” Yaŋban amɨn uŋun kɨsirɨ aŋnɨŋnɨŋ aban kɨlek taŋ kɨsirɨ terɨ kɨnda yombem gɨn agɨt.
40012014	Aŋakwan Parisi amɨn da kɨŋ “Niaŋ aŋek Yesu aŋatneŋ?” yaŋon da gen paŋkosit awit.
40012015	Yesu uŋun Parisi amɨn da yo aŋ ɨmdo yawit uŋun kɨlɨ pɨndak mudagɨt, do kokup uŋun yɨpmaŋek kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da yolgwit. Aŋakwa sot amɨn kɨsisi paŋmɨlɨp aŋek
40012016	Yesu iyɨ niaŋen amɨn kɨnda uŋun amɨn dɨma yoyɨni do yaŋsop aŋyomgut.
40012017	Yaŋ aŋakwan Piŋkop da kalɨpsigwan kombɨ amɨn Aisaia aŋtagap aban gen yagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ:
40012018	“On uŋun oman monjɨno, nak da naga manjɨgɨm. Nak uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat. Nak da Wupno yɨpmaŋ ɨbo amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ egɨ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun gen kokwin kɨlegɨsi dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨŋ teŋteŋokdɨsak.
40012019	Uŋun pɨdok pɨdok dɨma asak, ae dɨma yaŋ tɨdosak. Do kokup pap da kosiron amɨn kɨnda da tekni dɨma nandakdɨsak.
40012020	Nagal si gawut do asak uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma jokgaljak. Ae lam kɨmot do asak uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma aban kɨmotjak. Pi tebai aŋakwan wɨgɨ aŋpak kɨlegɨ da aŋpak yokwi wutjɨban tapmɨmɨ mɨni akdɨsak.
40012021	Aŋakwan amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ egɨ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun da mani do nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek paŋpulugosak do nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom akdaŋ.”
40012022	Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da koŋni toŋ amɨn kɨnda aŋaŋ Yesukon aŋopgwit. Uŋun amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni ae kadɨm. Yesu da aŋmɨlɨp aban gen yaŋek dabɨlɨ pɨsagɨt.
40012023	Yaŋ aban mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep da kaŋ wurɨpdagek yawit, “On amɨn Dewit dakon monji bo?”
40012024	Mani Parisi amɨn da gen uŋun nandaŋek yawit, “On amɨn koŋ dakon mibɨltok amɨn madepni Belsebul uŋun da tapmɨmon koŋ yoldak.”
40012025	Yaŋba Yesu da nandak nandakni pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨktɨm kɨnda da pudaŋ kabi bamorɨ aŋek emat wamjil kaŋ, uŋun mɨktɨm yokwi tokdɨsak. Ae kokup pap kɨnda bo ae yut kɨnda dakon amɨn da pudaŋ kabi bamorɨ aŋek emat wamni kaŋ, uŋunyo kɨsi tagɨ dɨma egɨpdaŋ.
40012026	Yaŋgɨn Sunduk da Sunduk yoljak kaŋ, Sunduk da iyɨ waseŋ kɨ kabi bamorɨ aŋek yo morap kɨla agak dakon tapmɨm pasɨl ɨmdɨsak.
40012027	Nak Belsebul da aŋpulugaŋban koŋ yoldat kaŋ, dɨsi dakon notji koŋ yolgaŋ uŋun amɨn kabɨ ni tapmɨmon da koŋ yolgaŋ? Uŋun amɨn kabɨ da genji kokwinɨgek gulusuŋ yoŋ yaŋ tagɨ dayɨni.
40012028	Mani Piŋkop dakon Wup da nak aŋpulugaŋban koŋ yoldat kaŋ, Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni jikon kɨlɨ abɨk.
40012029	“Amɨn kɨnda da niaŋ aŋek amɨn tebai kɨnda da yutnon wɨgɨ yo kabɨni tagɨ tɨmɨtjak? Mibɨltok amɨn tebai uŋun nap teban naŋ wamaŋ yɨpmaŋek yo kabɨni tagɨ tɨmɨtjak.
40012030	“Amɨn nak dakon notno dɨma, uŋun da nak uwal aŋnamaŋ. Ae amɨn nak dɨma aŋpulugaŋban amɨn paŋmuwukgamaŋ, uŋun amɨn da amɨn paŋwaseŋban waseŋ kwaŋ.
40012031	“Do yaŋ dayɨsat, Piŋkop da yokwi morap gat ae Piŋkop do yaŋba yokwi tok agak morap tagɨ wɨrɨrɨtjak. Mani amɨn kɨnda Telagɨ Wup do yaŋba yokwi tok asak kaŋ, Piŋkop da uŋun amɨn dakon dɨwarɨni dɨma wɨrɨrɨk ɨmdɨsak.
40012032	Amɨn kɨnda Amɨn Dakon Monji do yaŋba yokwi tok asak kaŋ, Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni tagɨ wɨrɨrɨk ɨmjak. Mani amɨn kɨnda Telagɨ Wup do yaŋba yokwi tok asak kaŋ, Piŋkop da abɨsok on mɨktɨmon ae don bɨsap madepmon kɨsi dɨwarɨni uŋun dɨma wɨrɨrɨk ɨmdɨsak.”
40012033	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Kɨndap kɨnda tagɨsi kaŋ, bamɨ kɨsi tagɨ. Ae kɨndap yokwi kaŋ, bamɨ kɨsi yokwi. Amɨn da kɨndap bamɨ pɨndagek kɨndap yokwi bo ae tagɨ yaŋ pɨndakgaŋ.
40012034	Ji tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ yombem. Gen tagɨsi niaŋsi aŋek yoni? Yo ni da butjigwan toŋ uŋun gen yogokjikon paŋalon aŋ.
40012035	Amɨn kɨlegɨ uŋun burɨkon yo tagɨsi morapmɨ toŋ, do aŋpak kɨlegɨsi aŋ. Ae amɨn yokwi uŋun burɨkon yo yokwi morapmɨ toŋ, do aŋpak yokwi aŋ.
40012036	“Mani yaŋ dayɨsat, gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon ɨsal dogɨn gen yum yawit amɨn morap Piŋkop da mibɨlɨ nido yawit uŋun do yoyɨŋban kobogɨ iyɨŋ iyɨŋ akdaŋ.
40012037	Gaga gen yosol uŋun da tɨlagon gak amɨn kɨlegɨ bo amɨn yokwi yaŋ gayɨkdɨsak.”
40012038	Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn dɨ gat ae Parisi amɨn dɨ gat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, gak da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda abɨ kaŋek asi gak Piŋkop dakon pi naŋ asal yaŋ gandaneŋ.”
40012039	Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn on bɨsapmon ekwaŋ uŋun amɨn yokwisi gɨn. Piŋkop dakon pi naŋ asat yaŋ nandak do wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda kok do yoŋ. Mani kɨnda dɨma kokdaŋ. Kombɨ amɨn Jona dakon tɨlak naŋgɨn kokdaŋ.
40012040	Jona gɨldat kapbɨ ae pɨlɨn kapbɨ yaŋ tap kɨlap da but kagagwan egɨpgut, yaŋgɨn Amɨn Dakon Monji mɨktɨm kagagwan gɨldat kapbɨ ae pɨlɨn kapbɨ yaŋ potdɨsak.
40012041	Niniwe amɨn Jona da Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋban but tobɨl awit. Mani ji da binapmon amɨn kɨnda egɨsak uŋun da Jona yapmaŋ mudosok, mani ji but tobɨl dɨma aŋ. Do gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon Niniwe amɨn da pɨdaŋ agek abɨsok ekwaŋ amɨn kabɨ dakon aŋpak yokwi uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋokdaŋ.
40012042	Mɨktɨm saut tetgɨn dakon kɨla amɨn mɨŋat madep uŋun Solomon dakon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi iyɨŋakwan nandak do mɨktɨm dubagɨsikon da apgut. Mani amɨn kɨnda oni egɨsak, uŋun da Solomon yapmaŋdak, mani geni dɨma nandaŋ. Do gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon uŋun kɨla amɨn mɨŋat madep da pɨdaŋ agek abɨsok ekwaŋ amɨn kabɨ dakon aŋpak yokwi uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋokdɨsak.”
40012043	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Koŋ kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda yɨpmaŋ degek kɨŋ mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon agek yɨk yawot tamo wɨsisak. Mani tamo kɨnda dɨma kosok do
40012044	yaŋ yosok, ‘Nak aeno tobɨl yut kalɨp egɨpgumon kɨkeŋ.’ Kɨŋ kaŋban yut uŋun ɨsal tosok ae sɨbɨt sɨbɨt ɨkdɨgaŋ aŋtɨlɨm abi kosok.
40012045	Yaŋ kosok, do kɨŋ koŋ 7 kabɨ iyɨ yapmaŋek wagɨl yokwisi gat tɨmɨkban kwa uŋun yutnon egek aŋpak yokwisi aŋ. Mibɨltok uŋun amɨn yokwi egɨpgut, mani abɨsok uŋun yapmaŋek wagɨl yokwisi egɨsak. Yaŋgɨn abɨsok yokwi pakpak amɨn ekwaŋon yaŋ gɨn altosok.”
40012046	Yesu mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep gen yoyɨŋakwan meŋi padɨk padɨkni paŋabɨŋ yomakon agek Yesu gat yaŋ nandat ak do yawit.
40012047	Yaŋba yutgwan amɨn kɨnda da Yesu iyɨgɨt, “Meŋgo padɨk padɨkgo yomakon abeŋ da gak gat yaŋ nandat ak do yoŋ.”
40012048	Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Meŋno padɨk padɨkno uŋun namɨn?”
40012049	Yaŋek paŋdetni kabɨkon kɨsit sugaŋek yagɨt, “Meŋno padɨk padɨkno oni.
40012050	Datno Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun dakon gen guramɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun meŋno padɨk padɨkno ae samɨnoyo.”
40013001	Uŋun gɨldaron gɨn Yesu yut uŋun yɨpmaŋek pakbi ɨdap da ɨleŋon pabɨgɨ yɨkgɨt.
40013002	Yɨgakwan amɨn morapmɨsi da opba pɨndakgɨt, do bot kɨndakon wɨgɨgɨt. Boron pawɨgɨ yɨgakwan amɨn pakbi ɨdap da ɨleŋon akgwit.
40013003	Agakwa Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda uŋun jap yet tɨŋtɨŋok do pigaga kɨgɨt.
40013004	Jap yet tɨŋtɨŋaŋakwan dɨwarɨ kosiron maŋba mɨnam da abɨŋ nawit.
40013005	-
40013006	Ae yerɨ dɨwarɨ da mɨktɨm tɨpmɨ toŋ tɨmon mawit. Uŋun kwenjok tawit, do tepmɨ kwawit, mani tɨp kwenon mɨktɨm morapmɨ dɨma, do gelɨ tagɨ dɨma yopba kɨwit. Do gɨldat da wɨŋ pɨndakban alek tawit.
40013007	Aŋakwa jap yet dɨwarɨ joŋ kelɨ toŋ tɨmgwan mawit. Uŋun joŋ kelɨ toŋ gat kɨsi kwaŋek wutjɨŋba kɨbɨdawit.
40013008	Ae jap yet dɨwarɨ da mɨktɨm tagɨsikon maŋ kwawit. Maŋ kwaŋakwa dɨwarɨ da bamɨ 100, ae dɨwarɨ da 60, ae dɨwarɨ da 30 yaŋ tawit.
40013009	Gen yosot uŋun pakyaŋsi nandani.”
40013010	Tɨlak gen uŋun yoyɨŋ mudaŋban paŋdet kabɨni da abɨŋ iyɨwit, “Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo madep gen yoyɨŋek tɨlak gen baŋ nido yoyɨsal?”
40013011	Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ pasɨlɨ tosok uŋun ji da tagɨ nandani do Piŋkop da nandɨsak, mani uŋun amɨn do dɨma yolɨsak.
40013012	Amɨn nak dakon gen nandaŋek burɨkon yɨpmaŋdak uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da saŋbeŋek nandak nandak tagɨ madepsi ɨmdɨsak. Mani amɨn nak dakon gen nandaŋek burɨkon dɨma yɨpmaŋdak uŋun amɨn nak dakon gen dɨwarɨ nandagɨt uŋun pasɨl ɨmdɨsak.
40013013	Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do tɨlak gen gɨn yosot. Amɨn uŋun dabɨl sɨŋtaŋek koŋ, mani yo kɨnda dɨma koŋ. Mɨrak paŋek nandaŋ, mani dɨma nandaba pɨsosok.
40013014	Amɨn da yaŋ aŋakwa kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da kombɨ gen kɨnda yagɨt uŋun bamɨ toŋ asak. Gen uŋun yaŋ yagɨt: ‘Ji bɨsap morapmɨsi gen nandakdaŋ, mani mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaba pɨsokdɨsak. Bɨsap morapmɨ dabɨl sɨŋtaŋek kokdaŋ, mani dɨma kaŋba pɨsokdɨsak.
40013015	Uŋun do aŋek on amɨn but teban kɨlɨ awit. Gen kalugɨ dɨ gat nandak do kurak taŋek mɨrakni paŋ sopgwit, ae dabɨlni wamaŋ sopgwit. Yaŋ dɨma awit tam, dabɨlni ae mɨrakni ae butniyo da kaŋ nandaŋyo aba pɨsaŋban nagon tobɨlba tagɨ paŋmɨlɨp abom.’
40013016	Mani ji dabɨlji da tagɨ pɨndakgaŋ, ae mɨrakji da tagɨ nandaŋ, do ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
40013017	Asisi dayɨsat, kalɨp kombɨ amɨn morapmɨ gat ae amɨn kɨlegɨ morapmɨ gat da yo ji da abɨsok pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋ uŋun pɨndat do but kɨndap pawit, mani dɨma pɨndakgwit. Ae abɨsok ji da gen nandaŋ uŋun nandak do but kɨndap pawit, mani dɨma nandawit.”
40013018	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Kɨlɨ jap yet tɨŋtɨŋok dakon tɨlak gen dakon mibɨlɨ dayɨko nandani.
40013019	Amɨn Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon gen nandaŋek butni dɨma pɨsoŋ uŋun jap yet kosiron mawit uŋuden. Yokwi Ami da abɨŋ gen tagɨ butnikon toŋ uŋun gwayeŋ paŋkɨsak.
40013020	Jap yet tɨpmɨ toŋ tɨmon mawit uŋun amɨn kɨnda yombem. Uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨgon da abɨdosok.
40013021	Mani butnikon gelɨ tagɨ dɨma yɨpban kɨgɨt, do bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok akdak. Jɨgɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ altaŋ ɨmni ae Piŋkop dakon gen dakon uwal apni bɨsapmon nandaŋ gadatni yɨpban wɨtdal kɨsak.
40013022	Ae jap yet joŋ kelɨ toŋ tɨmon mawit uŋun amɨn kɨnda yombem. Uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen nandɨsak, mani mɨktɨm dakon yo do nandaba kɨk asak, ae moneŋ da aŋkɨlɨkban uŋun do galagɨsi nandaŋakwan uŋun da Piŋkop gen wɨtjɨŋban bamɨ dɨma tosok.
40013023	Mani jap yet mɨktɨm tagɨsikon mawit uŋun amɨn kɨnda yombem. Uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandaŋ kɨmokdok. Uŋun amɨn bamɨ 100, ae kɨnda bamɨ 60, ae kɨnda bamɨ 30 yaŋ taŋtaŋ aŋ.”
40013024	Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda gat yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun yaŋ. Amɨn kɨnda da jap yet pigagani kon tɨŋtɨŋagɨt.
40013025	Mani amɨn dɨpmɨn pak mudaŋakwa uwalni da abɨŋ jap yet tagɨ yopgut uŋun bɨkbɨkgwan joŋ yokwi dakon yerɨ tɨŋtɨŋaŋek kɨgɨt.
40013026	Jap yet kwaŋek bamɨ tok do aŋakwa joŋ yokwi kɨsi kwaŋ wɨwit.
40013027	“Kwaŋakwa pɨndagek pi monjɨ da kɨŋ pi ami aŋalon aŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, gak pigokon jap yet tagɨ baŋgɨn yopgul kagagwan joŋ yokwi uŋun niaŋon da kwawit?’
40013028	“Iyɨŋba yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Uwal kɨnda da tɨŋtɨŋagɨt.’ “Yaŋban iyɨwit, ‘Niaŋ nandɨsal? Kɨŋ joŋ yokwi pɨlɨtneŋ do nandɨsal bo niaŋ?’
40013029	“Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Dɨma. Joŋ yokwi pɨlɨtni kaŋ, jap bamɨ dɨ kɨsi pɨlɨtdaŋ.
40013030	Yum pɨndagakwa jap gat joŋ gat kɨsi kwaŋakwa bamɨ pakpak bɨsapmon jap bamɨ pakpak pi monjɨno yaŋ yoyɨkeŋ: Mibɨltok ji joŋ yokwi kɨndapmon sok do baljaŋ gwɨlɨk yopni. Aŋek jap bamɨ paŋ ɨlɨgek jap yutnokon pawɨgɨ yopni.’ ”
40013031	Tɨlak gen kɨnda gat yaŋ yoyɨgɨt: “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun mastat yet yombem. Amɨn kɨnda da mastat yet pinikon kwaokgɨt.
40013032	Mastat yet uŋun jap yet kɨsi morap dakon pɨŋbi. Yerɨ monɨŋɨsisok. Mani kwaotno madepsi kwosok. Jap dɨwarɨ dakon tagok tagokni uŋun yapmaŋ mudaŋek kɨndap da yaŋ kwosok. Ae kɨlɨŋɨ madep yopban kɨŋakwa mɨnam morapmɨ da paŋabɨŋ uŋungwan yɨkgaŋ.”
40013033	Yesu da aeni tɨlak gen kɨnda gat yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun yis yombem. Mɨŋat kɨnda da plaua ɨdap madep kɨnda gat ɨktagɨldak. Yaŋ aŋakwan plaua uŋun kɨsisi paptaŋ madep tawit.”
40013034	Gen morap uŋun Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ yoyɨgɨt uŋun tɨlak genon dagɨn yagɨt. Gen noman dɨma yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Tɨlak gengɨn yoyɨgɨt.
40013035	Yaŋ aŋakwan kombɨ gen kɨnda kalɨp yaŋbi uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Nak da ji tɨlak gen dayɨkeŋ. Yo kalɨpsi Piŋkop da mɨktɨm wasagɨt bɨsapmon pasɨlɨ tawit da ae abɨsok toŋ uŋun do dayɨkeŋ.”
40013036	Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi yopmaŋek yutnon wɨgakwan paŋdetni da Yesukon kɨŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Joŋ pigaga kwoŋ dakon tɨlak gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yaŋbɨ nandano.”
40013037	Iyɨŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jap yet tagɨ yopmaŋdak amɨn uŋun Amɨn Dakon Monji.
40013038	Pi uŋun on mɨktɨm. Aŋek jap yet tagɨ uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan ekwaŋ mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo. Ae joŋ yokwi uŋun Yokwi Ami dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo.
40013039	Aŋek uwal joŋ tɨŋtɨŋagɨt uŋun Sunduk, ae jap pakpak bɨsap uŋun mɨktɨm da mudosak bɨsap madep. Ae jap bamɨ pakpak pi monjɨ uŋun Piŋkop dakon aŋelo kabɨni.
40013040	“Amɨn da joŋ pɨlɨk kɨndapmon sosoŋ uŋudeŋ gɨn bɨsap mudok mudogɨkon yaŋ gɨn altokdɨsak.
40013041	-
40013042	Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun aŋelo kabɨni yabekban uŋun da yo morap yokwi agak dakon yo paŋalon aŋ gat ae yokwi pakpak amɨn gat kɨsi Iyɨ Kɨla Asak da kagagwan baŋ pɨlɨk maba kɨndap tepmɨsi sosok uŋungwan pɨgɨkdaŋ. Pɨgɨ uŋungwan kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋek egɨpdaŋ.
40013043	Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨlegɨ kabɨ Datni da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan gɨldat da teŋteŋosok uŋudeŋ teŋteŋaŋek egɨpdaŋ. Nak da gen yosot pakyaŋsi nandani.”
40013044	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun moneŋ kɨnam kɨnda wɨtjɨŋbi yombem. Amɨn kɨnda da moneŋ kɨnam kɨnda mɨktɨm kagagwan yɨpbi naŋ kaŋkwaŋ aeni aŋkɨ sɨbɨgɨt. Aŋek but galak nandaŋek yo kabɨni taŋ ɨmgwit uŋun kɨsisi amɨnon yumaŋ naŋek uŋun dakon moneŋɨ baŋ uŋun mɨktɨm tɨm yumaŋ nagɨt.”
40013045	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ae Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun moneŋ ɨlɨt amɨn kɨnda yombem. Uŋun amɨn yo tomni wɨkwisi wɨsɨŋ pɨndat do pi asak.
40013046	Aŋek kɨndɨrɨŋ kɨnda wagɨl mani toŋsi tomni wukwisi kɨnda kosok bɨsapmon kɨŋ yo kabɨni taŋ ɨmgwit uŋun kɨsisi amɨnon yumaŋ naŋek uŋun dakon moneŋɨ baŋ uŋun kɨndɨrɨŋ tagɨsi yumgut.”
40013047	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Aeno tɨlak gen kɨnda dayɨko nandani. Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨk yombem. Amɨn da uŋun yɨk pakbi ɨdapgwan yɨpba pɨkwan tap kɨlap mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yɨkgwan pɨkwaŋ.
40013048	Pɨgɨ tugaŋba ɨlɨkba ɨleŋɨkon wɨkwan yɨgek tap kɨlap kokwinɨkgaŋ. Tagɨ amɨn ɨdap madepmon yopmaŋek yokwi amɨn maba kwaŋ.
40013049	Mɨktɨm dakon bɨsap mudosak bɨsapmon yaŋ gɨn altokdɨsak. Aŋelo kabɨ da abɨŋ amɨn yokwi amɨn kɨlegɨ da bɨkbɨgon ekwaŋ uŋun tɨmɨtdaŋ.
40013050	Tɨmɨgek maba kɨndap tebanon pɨgek uŋungwan kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋek egɨpdaŋ.”
40013051	Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen morap dayɨsat uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandaŋ mudoŋ bo dɨma?” Yoyɨŋban iyɨwit, “O, nandaŋ mudomaŋ.”
40013052	Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Gen teban dakon yoyɨŋdet amɨn Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ kaluk nandaŋek nandaŋ gadasak uŋun yut kɨnda dakon ami yombem. Uŋun amɨn yo kabɨ yopyop tamonikon kɨŋ yo kalugɨ ae kalɨpmɨ kɨsi paŋabɨŋ amɨn yolɨsak.”
40013053	Yesu uŋun tɨlak gen morap yoyɨŋ mudaŋek uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek
40013054	iyɨ da kokupmon kɨgɨt. Uŋudon Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgɨ amɨn yoyɨŋ degakwan tamtam yaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi ae wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agak dakon tapmɨm dukwan baŋ pagɨt?
40013055	Uŋun kɨsit kɨlda dakon monji. Meŋi uŋun Maria, ma? Ae padɨk padɨk kabɨni Jems, Josep, Saimon ae Judas, ma?
40013056	Aŋek samɨni kabɨ bɨkbɨk ninon ekwaŋ. Yo morap uŋun dukon tɨmɨkgɨt?”
40013057	Yaŋ yaŋek kurak taŋ ɨmɨŋek nandaba pɨŋban ɨmgwit. Yaŋ nandaŋek egakwa Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kombɨ amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon kokupni ae dɨwatniyo da nandaba pɨŋban ɨmɨŋakwa mɨktɨm dɨwarɨkon amɨn da nandaba wɨkwan ɨmaŋ.”
40013058	Amɨn uŋun dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit, do Yesu uŋudon wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ morapmɨ dɨma agɨt.
40014001	Kɨla amɨn madep Erot uŋun Yesu dakon gen bin nandaŋek
40014002	oman amɨn kabɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn uŋun kɨmoron da pɨdak, do wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agak uŋun dakon tapmɨm taŋ ɨmɨsak.”
40014003	-
40014004	Kalɨp Erot da padɨge Pilip dakon mɨŋatni Erodias tuwɨl pagɨt. Aban Jon da Erot yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen teban yapmaŋek padɨgɨgo dakon mɨŋatni tuwɨl pal. Uŋun tagɨ dɨma.” Gen uŋun nandaŋek Erot da obip amɨni yabekban kɨŋ Jon abɨdaŋek nap teban naŋ wamaŋ dam tebanon yɨpgwit.
40014005	Erot uŋun Jon aŋakban kɨmotjak do nandagɨt, mani amɨn da Jon uŋun kombɨ amɨn kɨnda yaŋ nandawit. Do amɨn do pasalek Jon dɨma aŋakgɨt.
40014006	Don Erot dakon altok altok bɨsap do nandaŋek jap noknok awit bɨsapmon Erodias dakon gwi da kap aban Erot da kaŋek nandaban yo madepsi agɨt.
40014007	Aŋek yaŋ teban tok kɨnda aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yo nido nayɨki, tagɨ gabeŋ.”
40014008	Iyɨŋban meŋi da gwi nandak nandak ɨban Erot yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn uŋun dakon busuŋɨ ɨdapmon yɨpmaŋ nabi.”
40014009	Gen yaŋ yaŋban Erot burɨkon jɨgɨ nandagɨt, mani amɨn jap nawit uŋun da ɨŋamon yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun do pasalek gen yagɨt dɨma kɨrɨŋɨkgɨt. Obip amɨni yoyɨŋban mɨŋatjok da gen iyɨgɨt uŋudeŋ aŋek
40014010	dam tebanon kɨŋ Jon dakon busuŋɨ mandaŋ dagawit.
40014011	Mandaŋ dagaŋ ɨdapmon yɨpmaŋ aŋabɨŋ mɨŋatjok uŋun do ɨba aŋkɨ meŋi do ɨmgut.
40014012	Aŋakwan Jon dakon paŋdetni da kɨŋ bumjotni abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ wayɨkgwit. Wayɨgek kɨŋ Yesu uŋun dakon geni iyɨwit.
40014013	Yesu uŋun Jon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt dakon gen bin nandaŋek iyɨ gɨn bot kɨnda abɨdaŋek mɨktɨm amɨni mɨnikon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep Yesu uŋudon kɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek kokupni yopmaŋ yopmaŋ aŋek pakbi ɨdap ɨleŋɨ naŋ yol aŋkɨwit.
40014014	Aŋakwa bot uŋun paŋkɨ ɨleŋɨkon agakwan Yesu pɨŋ ɨleŋɨkon wɨŋek amɨn kabɨ madepsi pɨndak bupmɨ nandaŋek sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
40014015	Aŋakwan pɨlɨndo paŋdetni da abɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Mɨktɨm amɨni mɨnikon ekwamaŋ, ae gɨldat kɨlɨ pɨgɨkdɨsak, do yoyɨŋbɨ amɨn kabɨ madep kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ kɨŋek iyɨ do jap yumaŋ noni.”
40014016	Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nido kɨni? Dɨsi jap yomgut.”
40014017	Yoyɨŋban yaŋ yawit, “Ninon jap morapmɨ dɨma. Bret kɨsit kɨnda ae tap kɨlap bamorɨ dagɨn taŋ nimaŋ.”
40014018	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Uŋun nagon paŋopni.”
40014019	Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn morap joŋ tɨmon yɨtni do yoyɨgɨt. Aŋek bret kɨsit kɨnda ae tap kɨlap bamot pabɨdaŋek Kwen Kokup sɨŋtaŋek gɨsamɨkgɨt. Yaŋ aŋek bret jokgalek paŋdetni do yoban uŋun da amɨn do yomgwit.
40014020	Yoba tɨmɨk amɨn morap kɨsisi arɨpmɨsi nawit. Naŋba bret dɨwat tawit uŋun paŋdetni da sɨmɨlba yɨk madepsi 12 kabɨ yaŋ tugawit.
40014021	Wɨli 5 tausen da jap nawit. Ae mɨŋat monjɨyo jap nawit uŋun dɨma manjɨkbi.
40014022	Yesu paŋdet kabɨni boron wɨgek pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda uŋun da kalɨp wɨgɨni do yoyɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwa Yesu mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep yoyɨŋban kɨwit.
40014023	Yoyɨŋban kɨŋakwa iyɨ gɨn ɨleŋ kɨndakon bɨsit ak do wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgɨ gɨldat pɨgakwan iyɨ gɨn ɨleŋon egɨpgut.
40014024	Yesu ɨleŋon egakwan paŋdet kabɨni boron da kɨŋ dubak taŋakwa mɨrɨm da abɨŋ bot tomnikon tɨdaŋakwan pakbi da madepsi tamalɨgakwan bot tobɨl tobɨl agɨt.
40014025	Kɨlɨ wɨsawɨsa do Yesu da pakbi ɨdapmon bamaŋ bamaŋ kɨŋ paŋdetni kabɨkon noman taŋ yomgut.
40014026	Pakbi ɨdapmon bamaŋ bamaŋ apban kaŋek paŋdetni si pasalgwit. Aŋek “Koŋ kɨnda abɨsak!” yaŋ yaŋek yaŋ tɨdawit.
40014027	Yaŋ tɨdaŋakwa uŋudon gɨn Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji si teban taŋek egɨpni. Nak naga abɨsat. Dɨma pasolni.”
40014028	Yoyɨŋban Pita da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gaga abɨsal kaŋ, yaŋbɨ pakbi kwenon da bamaŋ bamaŋ gagon opbo.”
40014029	Iyɨŋban Yesu da yagɨt, “Kɨlɨ op.” Yaŋ yaŋban Pita da bot yɨpmaŋek pɨŋ pakbi kwenon bamaŋek Yesukon kɨgɨt.
40014030	Kɨŋakwan mɨrɨm uŋun tebai aban kaŋ pasalek pakbi kagagwan tɨmɨsok dɨ pɨgek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ nak aŋpuluga!”
40014031	Yaŋ tɨdaŋban uŋudon gɨn Yesu da Pita abɨdaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak nandaŋ gadatgo pɨsɨpmɨ, nido but bamot asal?”
40014032	Yaŋ iyɨŋban boron wɨgakwal mɨrɨm dagagɨt.
40014033	Dagaŋakwan boron yɨkgwit amɨn uŋun Yesu gawak ɨmɨŋek yawit, “Asisi, gak Piŋkop dakon Monji.”
40014034	Pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda Genesaret mɨktɨmon kɨŋ ɨleŋɨkon wɨgakwan
40014035	uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn da Yesu kaŋ nandaŋyo awit. Kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋek Yesu abɨk dakon gen bin saŋbeŋba mɨktɨm terɨ terɨ kɨgɨt. Kwan nandaŋek sot amɨn kɨsisi paŋabɨŋ yopmaŋakwa
40014036	sot amɨn da Yesu dakon paba pɨgɨk dɨwatni ɨgayɨk do bɨsit tebai iyɨwit. Ɨgayɨwit amɨn uŋun kɨlek taŋ mudawit.
40015001	Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn dɨwarɨ gat Jerusalem kokup papmon da obɨŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit,
40015002	“Nido paŋdet kabɨgo babɨk dakon gen teban yapmaŋek kɨsirɨ dɨma sugaŋek jap noŋ?”
40015003	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Piŋkop dakon gen teban yɨpmaŋek babɨkji dakon gen paŋteban aŋek uŋun baŋ paŋ ekwaŋ. Uŋun tagɨ dɨma.
40015004	Piŋkop da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Ji meŋ datyo dakon pɨŋbi egek geni guramɨtni’ ae kɨnda gat yaŋ yosok, ‘Amɨn kɨnda da meŋ datyo do gen yokwi kɨnda yosak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn si aŋakba kɨmotjak.’
40015005	Mani ji da amɨn gulusuŋ yoyɨŋ degek yaŋ yoyaŋ, ‘Meŋ datyo do nandaba wɨkwanek yo kabɨ uŋun do paŋpulugogɨ uŋun Piŋkop do paretni kaŋ uŋun tagɨ’ ji da suŋ yaŋ yoyaŋ.
40015006	Ji yaŋ aŋek babɨkji dakon gen teban guramɨgek Piŋkop dakon gen teban maba kɨsak.
40015007	Ji jamba but amɨn, Piŋkop da kombɨ amɨn Aisaia dakon nandak nandak aŋtagap aban ji do gen yaŋsi mandagɨt:
40015008	‘Uŋun amɨn kabɨ gen kaga dagɨn nak man madep namaŋ, mani but dasi nak dɨma nandaŋ namaŋ.
40015009	Iyɨ dakon gen teban do, “On uŋun Piŋkop dakon gen” yaŋ yaŋek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgaŋ. Nak gawak namaŋ uŋun koko yo ɨsalɨ asak.’ ”
40015010	Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep yaŋ ɨlɨkban apba yoyɨgɨt, “Gen dayɨko mɨrak yopmaŋek nandaba pɨsosak.
40015011	Yo si nono pɨkwaŋ uŋun do Piŋkop da nandaban yokwi dɨma asak. Mani gen yomaŋ uŋun do Piŋkop da nandaban yokwi tosok.”
40015012	Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni da obɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gen on yaŋaki Parisi amɨn dakon but yokwi toŋ gak uŋun dɨ nandɨsal, bo dɨma?”
40015013	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kwen Kokup Datno yo iyɨ dɨma kwaokgɨt uŋun gelɨmbɨl pɨlɨk mudokdɨsak.
40015014	Ji on amɨn do nandaba kɨk dɨma ani. On amɨn kosit yolɨk amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni yombem. Dabɨlɨ mɨni kɨnda da notni kɨnda kosit yolɨsak kaŋ, kɨsi bamot gapmakon mokdamal.”
40015015	Yaŋban Pita da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak amɨn tɨlak gen yoyɨl uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ tagɨ niyɨŋbɨ nandaneŋ?”
40015016	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Jiyo kɨsi dɨma nandaŋ pɨsoŋ?
40015017	Jap morap nomaŋ uŋun kwasopninon pɨgek kosirɨ naŋ abɨgɨsak.
40015018	Mani gen yokwi yomaŋ uŋun nandak nandakninon da wɨŋ butnin paŋupbal asak.
40015019	Yo uŋun yaŋ do yosot: nandak nandak yokwi, amɨn dapba kɨmot, yumabi aŋpak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, kabo, topmon da gen pikon yopyop, ae yaŋba yokwi tok.
40015020	Amɨn da uŋun aŋpak morap aŋakwa Piŋkop da pɨndakban yokwi aŋ. Mani ji kɨsitji dɨma sugaŋek jap noŋ uŋun da yokwi dɨma asak.”
40015021	Yesu kokup uŋun yɨpmaŋek Tair ae Saidon kokup bamot tomal uŋudon kɨgɨt.
40015022	Kɨŋ altaŋakwan Kenan mɨŋat kɨnda uŋudon egɨpgut uŋun da abɨŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, Dewit Dakon Monjɨ, bupmɨ nandaŋ nam! Gwano koŋ da madepsi aŋupbal asak.”
40015023	Yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma iyɨgɨt. Aŋakwan paŋdet kabɨni da obɨŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Mɨŋat on yaŋ tɨdaŋek jɨgɨ nimɨŋek noldak. Uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Iyɨŋbɨ kwan.”
40015024	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da nak Israel amɨn sipsip kabɨni pasɨlbi uŋun baŋgɨn paŋpulugokeŋ do yabekgɨt.”
40015025	Yaŋban nandaŋek mɨŋat da abɨŋ gawak ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, aŋpulugoki dosi nandɨsat!”
40015026	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat monjɨyo dakon jap pɨŋan do yomyomɨ mɨni.”
40015027	Yaŋban mɨŋat da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, bamɨ yosol, mani pɨŋan tewɨgɨ da tamokon da jap jɨmjɨm moŋ uŋun tagɨ noŋ.”
40015028	Yaŋban Yesu da nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “O mɨŋat, nandaŋ gadatgo uŋun wukwisi. Yo nido yal uŋun yaŋ gɨn altaŋ gamdɨsak.” Yaŋ iyɨŋakwan uŋudon gɨn gwi kɨlek tagɨt.
40015029	Yesu uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek Galili Pakbi Ɨdap da ɨleŋɨkon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋek uŋudon da ɨleŋ kɨndakon pawɨgɨ yɨkgɨt.
40015030	Pawɨgɨ yɨgakwan mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi da sot amɨn morapmɨ paŋapgwit. Kandapmɨ yokwi ae gɨreŋɨkbi, dabɨlɨ mɨni, amɨn kadɨm, ae sot mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ toŋ uŋun Yesu da buron paŋabɨŋ yopmaŋakwa paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
40015031	Aŋakwan kadɨm da gen yawit, ae kandapmɨ yokwi ae gɨreŋɨkbi da kosit agɨpgwit, ae dabɨlɨ mɨni da sɨŋtawit. Amɨn da uŋun pɨndagek Israel dakon Piŋkop do tamtam yaŋek aŋkɨsiwit.
40015032	Yesu da paŋdet kabɨni yaŋ yoban apba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo nin gat gɨldat kapbɨ egɨpmamaŋ. Kɨlɨ japni kɨsi naŋ mudaŋ, do nak bupmɨ nandaŋ yomɨsat. Jap dɨma yomɨŋek yabetno kɨni kaŋ, kosiron ɨŋam kɨmot aŋek maŋ potdaŋ.”
40015033	Yaŋban paŋdetni da yaŋ iyɨwit, “On mɨktɨm amɨni mɨnikon bret morapmɨ dukon baŋ on mɨŋat amɨn morapyo yomno noni?”
40015034	Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Jikon bret niaŋ da toŋ?” Yaŋban yawit, “Ninon bret 7 ae tap kɨlap monɨŋgok bamorɨsok dagɨn taŋ nimaŋ.”
40015035	Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo madep mɨktɨmon pabɨŋ yɨtni do yoyɨgɨt.
40015036	Yoyɨŋban yɨgakwa Yesu da bret 7 kabɨ gat ae tap kɨlap gat tɨmɨk Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek pudaŋ paŋdetni do yoban uŋun da amɨn do yoba nawit.
40015037	Kɨsi arɨpmɨsi naŋba jap dɨwat tawit uŋun paŋdetni da tɨmɨgek yɨk madepsi 7 kabɨ sɨmɨlgwit.
40015038	Wɨli 4 tausen da jap nawit. Ae mɨŋat monjɨyo jap nawit uŋun dɨma manjɨkbi.
40015039	Yesu uŋun mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi yoyɨŋban kɨŋakwa iyɨ boron wɨgek Magadan tet do kɨgɨt.
40016001	Parisi amɨn ae Sadyusi amɨn dɨwarɨ da Yesu aŋkewal do aŋek opgwit. Asi Piŋkop dakon pi naŋ asak bo dɨma yaŋ do wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda aban koni do iyɨwit.
40016002	Iyɨŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Gɨldat pɨgɨk do aŋakwan ji yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Kwen gami asak, do aŋwa bɨsap tagɨsi.’
40016003	Ae wɨsa dagokdosi ji yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Gɨkwem pɨli ae kwen gami asak, do sɨkak mɨrɨmyo akdɨsak.’ Ji gɨldat wɨsayo pɨndagek kokwin tagɨsi aŋ, mani abɨsok bɨsap ekwamaŋ uŋun kaŋek kokwin tagɨ dɨma aŋ.
40016004	Amɨn on bɨsapmon ekwaŋ uŋun amɨn yokwisi gɨn. Piŋkop dakon pi naŋ asat yaŋ nandak do wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda kok do yoŋ. Mani kɨnda dɨma kokdaŋ. Kombɨ amɨn Jona dakon tɨlak naŋgɨn kokdaŋ.” Yaŋ yoyɨŋek yopmaŋ kɨgɨt.
40016005	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda kɨwit bɨsapmon paŋdetni bret do ɨŋtaŋek kɨwit.
