40016006	Yaŋ aba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Parisi gat ae Sadyusi amɨn gat uŋun dakon yis do pakyaŋsi kaŋ kɨmotni.”
40016007	Yaŋban notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Ninon bret mɨni uŋun do bo yosok?”
40016008	Gen uŋun yaŋba Yesu burɨkon da pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido ninon bret mɨni yaŋ yoŋ? Ji nandaŋ gadatji pɨsɨpmɨ!
40016009	Ji butji sigɨn pakyaŋsi dɨma nandaŋ pɨsoŋ, ma? Nak bret 5 kabɨ baŋ amɨn 5 tausen do yobo naŋakwa dɨwarɨ yɨk morapmɨ sɨmɨlba tugawit ji uŋun do si ɨŋtoŋ?
40016010	Ae bret 7 kabɨ baŋ amɨn 4 tausen do yobo naŋakwa dɨwarɨ yɨk morapmɨ sɨmɨlba tugawit ji uŋun do si ɨŋtoŋ?
40016011	Nak bret do yat yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Dɨma. Ji Parisi gat ae Sadyusi amɨn gat dakon yisni do pakyaŋsi kaŋ kɨmotni, nak uŋun do dayɨt.”
40016012	Yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek burɨ pɨsawit. Bret dakon yis do dɨma yosok, Parisi gat ae Sadyusi amɨn gat dakon yoyɨŋdetni toptopmɨ do kaŋ kɨmotneŋ do yosok yaŋ nandawit.
40016013	Yesu Sisaria Pilipai kokup pap aŋkapmat aŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji do namɨn amɨn kɨnda yaŋ yoŋ?”
40016014	Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Dɨwarɨ da Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn yaŋ yoŋ, ae dɨwarɨ da Elaija yaŋ yoŋ, ae dɨwarɨ da kombɨ amɨn Jeremaia, bo kombɨ amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda yaŋ yoŋ.”
40016015	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ae dɨsi nak do namɨn yaŋ yoŋ?”
40016016	Yaŋ yoyɨŋban Saimon Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Kristo, Piŋkop egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun dakon Monji egɨsal.”
40016017	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Saimon, Jon dakon monji, gak kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ abi. Gen yal uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn kɨnda da dɨma golɨgɨt. Kwen Kokup Dat da iyɨ golɨgɨt.
40016018	Nak yaŋ gayɨsat, mango uŋun Pita. Aŋakwan tɨp uŋun da kwenon paŋmuwukbi kabɨno paŋ- muwuk yopbo Tɨpdom dakon tapmɨm da arɨpmɨ dɨma pabɨŋ yopmaŋakwan toktogɨsi taŋ aŋ aŋ kɨkdɨsak.
40016019	Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon yoma wɨtdal gabeŋ. Gen mɨktɨmon yaŋ aŋteban abi, Kwen Kokupmon Piŋkop da yaŋ gɨn yaŋ aŋteban asak. Ae gen mɨktɨmon yaŋ wɨtdalbi, Kwen Kokup-mon Piŋkop da yaŋ gɨn yaŋ wɨtdaljak.”
40016020	Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da paŋdetni dɨma yoni do kɨrɨŋɨk yomɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak Kristo egɨsat uŋun amɨn kɨnda dɨmasi iyɨni.”
40016021	Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu da wasaŋek yo noman taŋ ɨmdaŋ uŋun do paŋdetni yoyɨŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak Jerusalem kokup papmon kɨŋek kɨla amɨn, ae mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn uŋun da yo yokwisi aŋ namɨŋek nɨkba kɨmotdɨsat. Aŋek gɨldat kapbɨ aŋakwan Piŋkop da aban pɨdokdɨsat.”
40016022	Yaŋban Pita da uŋun gen nandaŋek Yesu ɨleŋɨkon aŋkɨ tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ! Uŋun yo morap dɨmasi altaŋ gamni!”
40016023	Yaŋban Yesu da Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Sunduk gak nepmaŋ det! Kosit sopsop dɨma aŋnam. Gak Piŋkop dakon nandak nandak naŋ dɨma yoldal, gak amɨn dakon nandak nandak naŋ yoldal.”
40016024	Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda nak nol do nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn iyɨ dakon galaktok morapni kɨsi yopmaŋ mudaŋek tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨgek nak noljak.
40016025	Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon yɨyɨtni tagɨsi tosak do nandaŋek pi madep asak kaŋ, egɨp egɨpni pasɨl ɨmjak. Mani amɨn kɨnda nak do nandaŋek egɨp egɨpni do nandaban yo madep dɨma asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdosak.
40016026	Amɨn kɨnda da mɨktɨm dakon yo morap paŋ egakwan egɨp egɨpni pasɨljak kaŋ, uŋun yo morap da niaŋ aŋek aŋpulugoni? Bo egɨp egɨpni aeni abɨdok do tomni ninaŋ yumjak?
40016027	Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun Datni dakon tɨlɨmni gat ae aŋelo kabɨni gat apdɨsak. Uŋun bɨsapmon mɨŋat amɨn morapyo aŋpakni awit uŋun da arɨpmon tomni yomdɨsak.
40016028	Nak asisi dayɨsat, on akgaŋ kabɨkon da dɨ dɨma kɨmagek egakwa gɨn Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun kɨla amɨn madep mani paŋek apban kokdaŋ.”
40017001	Gɨldat 6 kabɨ mudaŋakwa Yesu da Pita, Jems ae padɨge Jon yoyɨŋban buŋon yolba ɨleŋ dubagɨ kɨndakon pawɨgɨ iyɨ gɨn egɨpgwit.
40017002	Ɨleŋon egek kaŋakwa Yesu dakon gɨptɨm ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt. Aŋakwan tomno dabɨlniyo gɨldat da yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Ae ɨmalniyo kɨsi kwakwagɨsi ae teŋteŋɨni toŋsi agɨt.
40017003	Yaŋ aban kaŋakwa Moses gat Elaija gat altaŋbal Yesu gat gen yaŋ nandatyo aba pɨndakgwit.
40017004	Yaŋ aŋakwa Pita da Yesu iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, nin ɨdon egɨp do tagɨsi nandamaŋ. Gak da tagɨ yaŋ nandabɨ kaŋ, nak da yut kabeŋ kapbɨ abeŋ. Kɨnda gak do, kɨnda Moses do ae kɨnda Elaija do abeŋ.”
40017005	Pita da gen yaŋakwan gɨn gɨkwem teŋteŋɨni madep da pɨŋ ɨlɨmɨk yomɨŋakwan gen kɨnda uŋungwan da yaŋ noman tagɨt, “Uŋun Monjɨno, but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat, ae uŋun do nandabo wagɨl tagɨsisi asak. Ji geni nandani.”
40017006	Paŋdetni gen uŋun nandaŋek mɨktɨmon maŋ pagek madepsi pasal nɨmnɨmɨkgwit.
40017007	Yaŋ aba Yesu da abɨŋ gɨptɨmɨkon wɨtjɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dɨma pasalek pɨdabɨt.”
40017008	Yaŋ yaŋban pɨdaŋ kwen sɨŋtaŋek amɨn bamot dɨma pɨndakgwit, Yesu naŋgɨn kawit.
40017009	Ɨleŋon da tobɨl pɨŋek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yo uŋun pɨndaŋ uŋun dakon gen amɨn kɨnda dɨma iyɨni. Aŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji kɨmoron da pɨdosak uŋun bɨsapmon tagɨ yoyɨni.”
40017010	Paŋdetni da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da gen kɨnda yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Elaija mibɨltok abɨŋakwan Kristo uŋun buŋon apjak.’ Gen uŋun nido yoŋ?”
40017011	Iyɨŋba Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen uŋun bamɨ yoŋ. Elaija da abɨŋ yo morap paŋkaluk akdɨsak.
40017012	Mani Elaija kɨlɨ apgut, aban amɨn da dɨma kaŋba pɨsagɨt, do galaktokni yolek yo yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ aŋ ɨmgwit. Ae Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋunyo kɨsi yo yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yaŋ gɨn aŋɨmdaŋ.”
40017013	Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni da Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn do yosok yaŋ nandaba pɨsagɨt.
40017014	Yesu gat paŋdetni kapbɨ gat ɨleŋon da pɨŋ mɨŋat amɨn morapmɨ muwukgwit kabɨkon kɨŋakwa amɨn kɨnda da abɨŋ Yesu da buron gawagek yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
40017015	“Amɨn Tagɨ, gak monjɨno do bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨbi! Uŋun bɨsap morapmɨ tebaisi nɨmnɨmɨgek jɨgɨ tepmɨyo madepsi pasak. Aŋek bɨsap morapmɨ kɨndapmon mosok bo ae pakbi kagagwan maŋ pɨgɨsak.
40017016	Nak paŋdet kabɨgokon aŋkɨko aŋmɨlɨp ak do aŋtɨdok ayɨŋ.”
40017017	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji nandaŋ gadatji mɨni amɨn, ji aŋpakji yokwisi. Nak bɨsap niaŋ da ji gat egek jɨgɨsi guramɨk dabeŋ? Monjɨ uŋun nagon aŋopgut!”
40017018	Yaŋ yoyɨŋban aŋopba Yesu da koŋ uŋun gen tebaisi iyɨŋban wɨŋ abɨgɨŋakwan uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn monji uŋun kɨlek tagɨt.
40017019	Aŋakwan don paŋdetni iyɨ gɨn obɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin nido koŋ uŋun yol do aŋtɨdok amaŋ?”
40017020	-
40017021	Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dakon nandaŋ gadatji uŋun pɨsɨpmɨsi, yaŋ do aŋek aŋtɨdok ayɨŋ. Nak asisi dayɨsat, ji dakon nandaŋ gadatji uŋun monɨŋɨsisok, mastat yet yombem taŋ damɨsak kaŋ, ji kabap on iyɨŋba tuwɨl kɨ tɨmɨ kɨndakon tagɨ kɨsak. Ae pi morap kɨsi tagɨ ani.”
40017022	Yesu paŋdetni gat Galili mɨktɨmon muwugek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Dakon Monji amɨn da uwal da kɨsiron yɨpba
40017023	uŋun da aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak. Aŋakwa gɨldat kapbɨ aŋakwan Piŋkop da kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdokdɨsak.” Gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek bupmɨsi nandawit.
40017024	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Kapaneam kokupmon kɨŋ altaŋakwa Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn da Pitakon kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdetgo Telagɨ Yut Madep do takis yopmaŋdak bo dɨma?”
40017025	Yaŋba Pita da yagɨt, “O, yopmaŋdak.” Pita da yaŋ yoyɨŋek yutnon wɨgɨ gen kɨnda dɨma yaŋakwan Yesu da kalɨp yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Saimon gak niaŋ nandɨsal? On mɨktɨmon kɨla amɨn madep madep takis tɨmɨkgaŋ, uŋun takis namɨn da yopmaŋgaŋ? Iyɨ dakon monjini da bo amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ da yopmaŋgaŋ?”
40017026	Yaŋban Pita da yagɨt, “Amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ da yopmaŋgaŋ.” Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Yaŋdo, iyɨ dakon monjini da takis dɨma yopmaŋgaŋ.
40017027	Mani nin takis dɨma yopneŋ kaŋ, uwal aŋnimdaŋ. Do gak pakbi ɨdapmon kɨŋ nap yɨpbɨ pɨkwan tap kɨlap mibɨltok aŋatjak uŋun da gen kagakon moneŋ kɨnda taŋban kokdɨsal. Uŋun moneŋ naŋ nit do Telagɨ Yut Madep do takis yopbi.”
40018001	Uŋun bɨsapmon paŋdetni da Yesukon kɨŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan namɨn da amɨn dɨwarɨ yapmaŋek man madepni toŋ?”
40018002	Yaŋba Yesu da amɨn monɨŋ kɨnda iyɨŋban opban paŋdetni da bɨkbɨgon yɨpban agakwan
40018003	yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, ji kulabɨk aŋek amɨn monɨŋ da tɨlagon dɨma egɨpni kaŋ, ji Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan dɨma egɨpdaŋ.
40018004	Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ do nandaban pɨŋakwan amɨn monɨŋ da tɨlagon egɨpjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan man madepni toŋ.
40018005	Ae amɨn kɨnda da amɨn monɨŋ oden kɨnda nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨŋek egakwan aŋpulugosok kaŋ, uŋun amɨn nak naŋ aŋpulugosok.”
40018006	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn monɨŋ kɨnda nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨŋek egakwan yokwi asak do yabetjak kaŋ, uŋun dakon kobogɨ yokwisi. Yabet dɨma aŋakwan amɨn da wit mɨsɨŋɨt tɨp madep tegɨkon wamaŋ maba tap ɨlarɨgwan pɨgek kɨmotjak kaŋ uŋun tagɨ.
40018007	“Mɨktɨmon amɨn ekwaŋ, awa! Amɨn dɨwarɨ da yokwikon depdaŋ. Mani yokwi ani do yabetdaŋ amɨn, awa!
40018008	“Kɨsitgo bo kandapgo da yokwi aki do gayɨŋban kaŋ, mandaŋ dagaŋ mabɨ kɨsak. Gwɨnɨmbɨl egek Tɨpdomon kɨndap tebanon pɨgɨki yaŋ do kɨsitgo bo kandapgo mandaŋ dagaŋek tagapmɨ egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn aki.
40018009	Ae dabɨlgo da yokwi aki do gayɨsak kaŋ, pɨlɨk mabɨ kɨsak. Gwɨnɨmbɨl egek Tɨpdomon kɨndap tebanon pɨgɨki yaŋ do dabɨlgo kɨnda pɨlɨgek tagapmɨ egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn aki.
40018010	-
40018011	Ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Amɨn monɨŋ dakon aŋeloni Kwen Kokupmon Piŋkop da ɨŋamon toktogɨsi ekwaŋ. Do amɨn monɨŋ do nandaba yo ɨsalɨ dɨma ani.”
40018012	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji niaŋ nandaŋ? Amɨn kɨnda sipsipni 100 kabɨkon da kɨnda pasɨljak kaŋ, niaŋ asak? Kaŋ 99 kabɨ ɨleŋ obakon yopban jap naŋek egakwa kaloŋɨ pasɨljak uŋun wusɨk do kɨsak.
40018013	“Nak asisi dayɨsat, sipsipni kaŋ kwosak bɨsapmon but galak madepsi nandakdɨsak. 99 kabɨ dɨma pasɨlgwit uŋun do tagɨ nandɨsak. Mani kaloŋɨ pasɨljak naŋ kaŋ kwokdɨsak uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi nandakdɨsak.
40018014	Yaŋgɨn Kwen Kokup Datji da amɨn monɨŋ kɨnda pasɨljak do dɨma galak tosok.”
40018015	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Notgo kɨnda yokwi aŋgaban kaŋ, kɨŋ kaŋbɨ dɨsilgɨn gen uŋun yaŋ aŋmɨlɨp ak do pi anjil. Gengo nandaŋ yawokban kaŋ notgo abɨdaŋbɨ gagakon apjak.
40018016	Mani gengo dɨma nandaŋ yawokban kaŋ, amɨn kaloŋɨ bo bamorɨ yaŋ tɨmɨkbɨ kɨni. ‘Yaŋ aŋek ji amɨn bamorɨ bo kapbɨ da gen uŋun tagɨ aŋteban ani.’
40018017	Uŋun amɨn kapbɨ dakon gen dɨma nandɨsak kaŋ, kɨŋ paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon mibɨlni yoyɨni. Aŋek paŋmuwukbi kabɨ dakon gen dɨma nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yokwisi asak. Uŋun amɨn do Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn ae takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmni.
40018018	“Nak asisi dayɨsat, gen mɨktɨmon yaŋ aŋteban asal, Kwen Kokupmon Piŋkop da yaŋ gɨn yaŋ aŋteban akdɨsak. Ae gen mɨktɨmon yaŋ wɨtdaldal, Kwen Kokupmon Piŋkop da yaŋ gɨn yaŋ wɨtdaldɨsak.
40018019	-
40018020	“Nak saŋbeŋek yaŋ dayɨsat, on mɨktɨmon amɨn bamorɨ bo kapbɨ nak da manon da muwutni kaŋ, nak bɨkbɨknikon egɨpbeŋ, do but kaloŋ aŋek yo kɨnda do bɨsit yoni kaŋ, Datno Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun da tagɨ damjak.”
40018021	Uŋun bɨsapmon Pita da abɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, notno kɨnda da yokwi aŋnaban kosirɨ niaŋ da yokwini yopmaŋ ɨbeŋ? Kosirɨ 7 kabɨ bo niaŋ?”
40018022	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak yaŋ gayɨsat, yokwini kosirɨ 7 kabɨ dɨma, yokwini yopmaŋ ɨbɨ kosirɨ 77 kabɨ yaŋ asak.
40018023	“Nandani, Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun yaŋ. Kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda pi monjɨni da goman aŋ ɨmgwit, uŋun gomani paŋkɨlek ak do nandagɨt.
40018024	Wasaŋek gomani paŋkɨlek aŋakwan amɨn kɨnda aŋaŋ opgwit. Uŋun amɨn goman moneŋ 50 milion danari.
40018025	Mani goman uŋun sopsop dakon moneŋ uŋun da arɨpmon dɨma taŋ ɨmgut. Do kɨla amɨn madep da uŋun amɨn gat gwakni gat oman amɨn egakwa tomni do amɨn da moneŋ ɨba gomani sopjak do yagɨt. Ae yo morapni yumaŋ naŋ mudaŋek uŋun dakon moneŋ baŋ goman sopjak do amɨn tagɨni da gen tebai yagɨt.
40018026	“Oman monjɨ gen uŋun nandaŋek amɨn tagɨ ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek bɨsit tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan egaki don gomango kɨsisi sopbeŋ.’
40018027	Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn tagɨni da bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek goman madepni yɨpmaŋ ɨmɨŋakwan ɨsal kɨgɨt.
40018028	“Aŋakwan oman monjɨ uŋun waŋga pɨgɨ pi ɨsalni kɨnda uŋun goman moneŋ 10 danari taŋ ɨmgut uŋun kagɨt. Kaŋek tegɨkon tebai abɨdaŋek gen tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gomano agɨl uŋun paŋop!’
40018029	“Pi ɨsalni uŋun geni nandaŋek ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek bɨsit tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan egaki don gomango gabeŋ.’
40018030	“Mani geni dɨma nandaŋek pi ɨsalni abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ dam tebanon yɨpmaŋek gomani ɨmɨŋek don waŋga pɨsak do yagɨt.
40018031	Aŋakwan pi ɨsalni dɨwarɨ da kaŋek burɨ yokwi taŋba kɨŋ amɨn tagɨnikon yo uŋun agɨt do iyɨwit.
40018032	“Yaŋba nandaŋek amɨn tagɨ uŋun da oman monjɨ uŋun iyɨŋban opban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak pi monjɨ yokwi. Gak bɨsit tebai nayɨŋbɨ goman kɨsisi yɨpmaŋ gamɨt.
40018033	Nak da bupmɨ nandaŋ gamɨt, gak nido pi ɨsalgo do bupmɨ yaŋ gɨn dɨma nandaŋ ɨmɨl?’
40018034	Yaŋ yaŋek japmɨ nandaŋek obip amɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Ji aŋakba tepmɨ nandaŋek gomano kɨsisi sopban don yɨpbo kɨsak.’ ”
40018035	Tɨlak gen on dakon wasɨpmɨ do Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yaŋgɨn notji da yokwi aŋdaba yokwi yopyop but dasi nandaŋek dɨma ani kaŋ, Kwen Kokup Datno da yo jɨgɨ yaŋ gɨn aŋ damdɨsak.”
40019001	Yesu gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋek Galili mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋek Jodan Pakbi terɨ kɨnda Judia mɨktɨmon kɨgɨt.
40019002	Kɨŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi da yol aŋaŋ kɨŋakwa Yesu da sot amɨn morapmɨ paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
40019003	Aŋakwan Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ da Yesukon abɨŋ aŋkewalek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin da gen tebanon niaŋ tosok? Amɨn kɨnda da mɨŋatni galak toknikon tagɨ kwɨnɨtjak, bo dɨma?”
40019004	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun dɨma manjɨŋ kawit? Uŋun yaŋ tosok, ‘Wasok wasogɨkon Piŋkop da amɨn wasaŋek mɨŋat ae wɨliyo kɨsi wasagɨt.’
40019005	Wasaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Wɨli da meŋi datniyo yopmaŋek mɨŋatni gat muwukbal gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ anjil.’
40019006	Gen yaŋ tosok, do amɨn wam da bamorɨ dɨma, gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ amal. Uŋun do Piŋkop da mɨŋat wɨli kɨlɨ paŋmuwukgɨt, do amɨn da dɨma paŋwasekdo.”
40019007	Yaŋ yaŋban Parisi amɨn da iyɨwit, “Yaŋ kaŋ ae mibɨlɨ nido Moses da gen teban kɨnda yaŋ mandagɨt? Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatni kwɨnɨt do kaŋ, mɨŋat paŋkwɨnɨt papia kɨnda mandaŋ ɨmɨŋek kwɨnɨtjak.’ ”
40019008	Yaŋba Yesu da yagɨt, “Moses uŋun but tebanji do aŋek gen teban uŋun mandagɨt. Mani wasok wasogɨkon mɨŋat paŋkwɨnɨt dakon kosit uŋuden kɨnda dɨma tagɨt.
40019009	Yaŋ dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatni yumabi dɨma aŋakwan kwɨnɨgek mɨŋat kaluk pasak kaŋ, uŋun wɨli iyɨ yumabi asak.”
40019010	Paŋdetni da gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yaŋ kaŋ mɨŋat eyo dɨma aŋek egɨpdo.”
40019011	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn dɨwarɨ Piŋkop da paŋpulugaŋakwan mɨŋat dɨma paŋek tagɨ egɨpni.
40019012	Ae amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋun gɨptɨmni yokwi da altoŋ, ae dɨwarɨ amɨn da yabi pabi, ae dɨwarɨ Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon pi do nandaŋek egɨp egɨpni parekgaŋ, yaŋ do aŋek mɨŋat dɨma paŋ. Gen on abɨdok do nandaŋ amɨn uŋun tagɨ abɨdoni.”
40019013	Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da mɨŋat monjɨyoni Yesu da kɨsitni kwenikon wutjɨŋek bɨsit aŋyomjak do paŋopgwit. Paŋopba paŋdetni da dɨma paŋopni do tebai yoyɨwit.
40019014	Yaŋ aba Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat monjɨyo yopba nagon apgut. Dɨma kɨrɨŋɨk yomni. Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun amɨn mɨŋat monjɨyo da tɨlagon ekwaŋ uŋuden amɨn dakon.”
40019015	Yaŋ yaŋek kɨsitni mɨŋat monjɨyo da kwenon wutjɨŋek don uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋ kɨgɨt.
40019016	Bɨsap kɨndakon amɨn kɨnda da Yesukon obɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, nak ni aŋpak tagɨ kɨnda naŋ aŋek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokeŋ?”
40019017	Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak aŋpak tagɨ do nido nayɨsal? Amɨn Kaloŋɨ gɨn uŋun tagɨsi. Gak Piŋkop dakon gen teban guramɨgek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨnikon tagɨ kɨki.”
40019018	Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Gak ni gen teban do yosol?” Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn dɨma dapba kɨmotni, mɨŋat eyo kɨlɨ abi ji yumabi dɨma ani, yo kabo dɨma noni, top gen yaŋek amɨn notji yum dogɨn gen pikon dɨma yopni,
40019019	meŋ dat do nandaba wukwanek geni guramɨtni, ae gaga do but dasi niaŋ galak tosol, uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yobi.”
40019020	Yaŋ yaŋban monjɨ gɨmoŋɨ da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak uŋun gen teban morap guramɨk mudosot. Mani yo kɨnda gat ninaŋsi aŋek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokeŋ?”
40019021	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨlegɨsi egɨp do nandɨsal kaŋ, kɨŋ yo morapgo yumaŋ naŋek uŋun dakon moneŋ baŋ yoni mɨni amɨn do yobi. Yaŋ aŋaki yo tagɨsi Kwen Kokupmon taŋ gamdɨsak. Yaŋ aŋek abɨŋ nak nol.”
40019022	Amɨn uŋun yoni morapmɨ taŋ ɨmgwit, do gen uŋun nandaŋ burɨ jɨk taŋban si kɨgɨt.
40019023	Kɨŋakwan Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, yoni morapmɨ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan pɨgɨk do aŋtɨdok akdaŋ.
40019024	Asisi, bɨt madepsi kamel uŋun da ɨmal bupbup da kosit gwagagon arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨgɨ asak. Mani uŋun yapmaŋek yoni morapmɨ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun da kagagwan arɨpmɨ dɨmasi pɨgɨgɨ asak.”
40019025	Yaŋban paŋdetni nandaŋ wɨrɨpdagek yaŋ yawit, “Yaŋ kaŋ namɨn amɨn da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdosak?”
40019026	Yaŋba Yesu da paŋdet kabɨni pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn iyɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma ani, mani Piŋkop da yo morap ak do tagɨ asak.”
40019027	Yaŋban Pita da Yesu gen kɨnda yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nin yo morap yopmaŋek gak naŋ gɨn gol awɨlgamaŋ. Do nin yo ni baŋ tɨmɨtneŋ?”
40019028	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, yo aeni kalugɨ mudoni uŋun bɨsap madepmon Amɨn Dakon Monji man madep paŋek kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamoni tɨlɨmɨ toŋ uŋudon yɨtdɨsak. Aŋakwan ji nak nolgaŋ amɨn uŋun bɨsapmon kɨla amɨn madep tamo 12 kabɨ uŋudon yɨgek Israel amɨn kabi 12 dakon gen kokwin kɨla agak pi akdaŋ.
40019029	Amɨn morap nak do nandaŋek yutni, notni, sami, meŋi, datni, mɨŋat monjɨyoni, ae jap pini yopmaŋ detni, uŋun yo morapni kosirɨ 100 yaŋ tɨmɨk tɨmɨk akdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokdaŋ.
40019030	Mani amɨn morapmɨ abɨsok mibɨltok ekwaŋ uŋun da buŋon amɨn akdaŋ. Aŋakwa amɨn morapmɨ abɨsok buŋon ekwaŋ uŋun da mibɨltok amɨn akdaŋ.”
40020001	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun yaŋ. Amɨn kɨnda mɨktɨmni morapmɨ. Uŋun amɨn wɨsa dagokdosi kɨŋ pi monjɨ wain pinikon pi ani do tɨmɨkgɨt.
40020002	Gɨldat kaloŋɨ do moneŋ 1 danari tɨmɨtni do yoyɨŋban but kaloŋ aba wain pinikon yabekban kɨwit.
40020003	“Kɨŋakwa tɨmɨ dɨ egɨ 9 kilok aŋakwan pi ami kɨŋ makeron amɨn dɨwarɨ ɨsal ekwa pɨndagek
40020004	yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Jiyo kɨsi wain pinokon kɨŋ pi aŋakwa pi ani da arɨpmon moneŋ dabeŋ.’ Yaŋban nandaŋek wain pinikon kɨwit.
40020005	“Kɨŋakwa don gɨldat binap aeni makeron kɨŋ dɨ gat tɨmɨkgɨt. Aeni 3 kilok kɨŋ yaŋ gɨn pi monjɨ dɨ gat tɨmɨkgɨt.
40020006	Aŋek egɨ pɨlɨndosi kɨŋ amɨn dɨwarɨ ɨsal agakwa pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Ji nido gɨldat daman pini mɨni ɨsal ekwaŋ?’
40020007	“Yaŋban gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨwit, ‘Amɨn kɨnda da nin pi dɨma nimɨk.’ “Yaŋ yaŋba pi dakon ami da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Ji kɨsi kɨŋ wain pinokon pi ani.’
40020008	“Yaŋ yoyɨŋek egɨ pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo pi ami da kɨŋ pi monjɨ dakon kɨla amɨn yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Pi monjɨ yaŋ paŋmuwugek moneŋni yobi. Buŋonsi abeŋ uŋudon da wasaŋek yomɨŋaki wɨgɨ mibɨltok abeŋ uŋudon dagosak.’
40020009	“Yaŋ paŋ muwugek pi monjɨ pɨlɨndosi abeŋ uŋun do moneŋ 1 danari yomɨŋ yomɨŋ agɨt.
40020010	Yaŋ aban kaŋek pi monjɨ mibɨltok apgwit uŋun nin da moneŋ madep tɨmɨtdamaŋ yaŋ nandawit. Mani dɨma, kɨsi morap moneŋ 1 danari gɨn tɨmɨk tɨmɨk awit.
40020011	Mibɨltok abeŋ amɨn uŋun moneŋ 1 danari tɨmɨgek pi uŋun dakon ami do nandaba yokwi taŋban
40020012	yaŋ iyɨwit, ‘Nin wɨsa dagokdosi abɨŋ pi aŋapno gɨldat da madepsi nindaŋakwan pɨlɨn tosok. Buŋonsi abeŋ uŋun bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok pi ayɨŋ, do nido moneŋ tɨlak kaloŋɨ kongɨn nimɨsal?’
40020013	“Yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek amɨn tagɨ da pi monjɨ kɨnda yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Not, nak da gak yokwi kɨnda dɨma aŋgamɨt. Nak moneŋ 1 danari gabeŋ do gayɨko gaga but kaloŋ al.
40020014	Do gak moneŋgo abɨdaŋek kɨ. Naga da galaktogon amɨn buŋon abeŋ uŋun gat moneŋ tɨlak kaloŋɨkon damɨsat.
40020015	Uŋun nak dakon yo. Naga dakon galaktok yolek moneŋno tagɨ kokwinɨk dabeŋ. Nak amɨn do yo tagɨsi aŋapbo gak nido nandaba yokwi tok asal?’ ”
40020016	Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da wasɨp do yaŋ yagɨt, “Yaŋgɨn buŋon amɨn da mibɨltokdaŋ, aŋakwa mibɨltok amɨn da buŋon amɨn akdaŋ.”
40020017	Yesu Jerusalem kokup papmon kɨŋek paŋdetni 12 kabɨ tɨmɨkban iyɨ gɨn kosiron kɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
40020018	“Nin abɨsok Jerusalem kɨŋapno amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn uŋun da kɨsiron yɨpdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek gen pikon yɨpmaŋek kɨmotjak do yaŋ dagok akdaŋ.
40020019	Yaŋ dagok aŋek Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da kɨsiron yɨpdaŋ. Yɨpba uŋun da toptopmon da man madep ɨmɨŋek, baljaŋek tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak. Kɨmagek gɨldat kapbɨ aŋakwan Piŋkop da kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdokdɨsak.”
40020020	Yaŋ yaŋakwan Sebedi dakon monji bamot gat meŋi gat Yesukon kɨŋ altaŋek meŋi da ŋwakbeŋ aŋek Yesu da yo kɨnda aŋ yomjak do iyɨgɨt.
40020021	Iyɨŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da ninaŋ abeŋ do nandɨsal?” Iyɨŋban yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak kɨla amɨn madep egɨpbi bɨsapmon on monjɨ bamotno man madep paŋek kɨnda da gak da amɨn tet do ae kɨnda da gwandeŋ tet do yɨtjil do yaŋ dagok aŋyobi do nandɨsat.”
40020022	Yaŋban Yesu da monjɨ bamot yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil gen uŋun yomal dɨma nandaŋ pɨsaŋek yomal. Nak da tepmɨ madep pakdɨsat uŋun tagɨ panjil?” Yaŋban iyɨgɨmal, “Tagɨ pandeŋ.”
40020023	Yaŋ yaŋbal Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Uŋun asi, tepmɨ pakdɨsat uŋun pakdamal. Mani namɨn da nak da amɨn tet do ae gwandeŋ tet do yɨtjak, uŋun nak da arɨpmɨ dɨma yaŋ dagokeŋ. Tamo uŋun Datno da amɨn kɨlɨ manjɨŋ yopgut uŋun dakon.”
40020024	Paŋdetni 10 kabɨ gen uŋun nandaŋek amɨn bamot uŋun do butjap nandawit.
40020025	Yaŋ nandaŋakwa Yesu da yoyɨŋban opba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ dakon kɨla amɨni dakon mibɨlɨ dɨsi nandaŋ. Uŋun iyɨ do nandaba wukwanek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyoni da geni guramɨk kɨmotni do nandaŋ.
40020026	Mani uŋun dakon aŋpak uŋun jikon dɨma tosak. Jikon da amɨn kɨnda amɨn tagɨ man pak do nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn oman amɨnji egek amɨn tagɨ man pasak.
40020027	Amɨn kɨnda jikon da mibɨltok amɨn egɨp do nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn mɨŋat amɨn morap dakon oman amɨni egek mibɨltok amɨn asak.
40020028	Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun yaŋ gɨn kɨlɨ agɨt. Amɨn da oman aŋ tyuɨmni do dɨma pɨgɨt. Iyɨ mɨŋat amɨn morap paŋpulugokdo, ae iyɨ dakon gɨptɨmnaŋ paregek yumaŋ naŋ yop do pɨgɨt.”
40020029	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Jeriko kokup pap yɨpmaŋ degakwa mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo madepsi da yolgwit.
40020030	Kɨŋakwa kosit ɨleŋon dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn bamorɨ yɨkgɨmal. Yɨgakwal amɨn da “Yesu abɨsak” yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨmal, “Amɨn Tagɨ, Dewit Dakon Monji, bupmɨ nandaŋ nim!”
40020031	Yaŋ tɨdaŋbal amɨn kabɨ madepsi da dɨma yaŋ tɨdonjil do yaŋsop aŋyomgwit. Mani madepsi sigɨn yaŋ tɨdaŋek yagɨmal, “Amɨn Tagɨ, Dewit Dakon Monji, bupmɨ nandaŋ nim!”
40020032	Yaŋ tɨdaŋbal Yesu da nandaŋ kosiron agek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak ninaŋ aŋ dabeŋ do nandamal?”
40020033	Yoyɨŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nit sɨŋtok do nandamak.”
40020034	Yaŋbal Yesu bupmɨ nandaŋek kɨsit da dabɨlɨ wɨtjɨŋban uŋudon gɨn sɨŋtaŋek Yesu yolgɨmal.
40021001	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Jerusalem kokup pap aŋkapmat aŋek Betpage kokupmon kɨŋ altawit. (Kokup uŋun Ɨleŋ Olipmon tosok.) Altaŋek Yesu da paŋdetni bamorɨ yabegek
40021002	yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil ason kokup komaŋ uŋudon kɨŋ altaŋek uŋudon gɨn donki meŋi kɨnda napmon agakwan monji ɨsal akban pɨndatdamal. Uŋun wɨtdal ɨlɨk ɨdon paŋopjil.
40021003	Amɨn kɨnda da ‘Nido yaŋ amal’ yaŋ dayɨŋban kaŋ, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ da pi kɨnda ak do aŋek yosok’ yaŋ iyɨŋbal uŋun da tepmɨ daban paŋopjil.”
40021004	Yaŋ yaŋakwan kombɨ amɨn kɨnda da kalɨpsigwan gen yagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ:
40021005	“Saion kokup pap amɨn do gen yaŋ yoyɨki, ‘Kabɨt, kɨla amɨn madepgo abɨsak. Burɨ maŋbi da donki da kwenon yɨgek abɨsak. Donki gɨmoŋɨ da kwenon yɨgek abɨsak.’ ”
40021006	Yesu da paŋdet bamot yoyɨŋban geni guramɨgek kɨgɨmal.
40021007	Kɨŋ donki meŋi gat monji gat paŋabɨŋ ɨmalni donki bamot da kwenikon yopmaŋakwal Yesu pawɨgɨ uŋudon yɨkgɨt.
40021008	Yaŋ aŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da kosiron ɨmalni kukwaŋ yalɨwit. Aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ da kɨŋ kɨndap kɨlɨŋ mandaŋ paŋobɨŋ kosiron yalɨwit.
40021009	Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi mibɨltok kɨwit ae buŋon yolgwit kɨsi da gen pap yaŋek yaŋ yawit: “Osana! Dewit Dakon Monji aŋkɨsino! Amɨn on Amɨn Tagɨ da manon abɨsak, uŋun Piŋkop da gɨsamɨgakwan abɨsak. Piŋkop Wɨkwisi aŋkɨsino!”
40021010	Yesu uŋun Jerusalem kokup papmon pɨgakwan kokup amɨn kɨsi da burɨ pɨdaŋba yaŋ yawit, “On namɨn amɨnsi kɨnda?”
40021011	Yaŋba Yesu gat agɨpgwit mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep da yaŋ yawit, “On Yesu, uŋun kombɨ amɨn kɨnda, Nasaret kokup Galili mɨktɨmon da abɨsak.”
40021012	Yesu kɨŋ Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan pɨgɨ moneŋ ɨlɨt pi awit amɨn uŋun yolban waŋga abɨgɨwit. Yaŋ aŋek moneŋ kulabɨk awit amɨn gat mɨnam yumaŋ nawit amɨn dakon tamo uŋun kɨsi paŋtobɨlban tagal kɨwit.
40021013	Yaŋ aŋek gen yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Nak dakon yut uŋun mɨŋat amɨnyo da abɨŋ bɨsit aŋnamni do tosok.’ Mani ji da kulabɨk aba ‘kabo noknok dakon pasɨlɨ tamo’ yombem asak.”
40021014	Yesu Telagɨ Yut Madepmon egakwan amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni ae kandapmɨ yokwi uŋudon opba paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
40021015	Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨt uŋun do japmɨ nandawit. Ae mɨŋat monjɨyo da Telagɨ Yut Madepmon yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Osana! Dewit Dakon Monji aŋkɨsino!” Yaŋ yaŋba uŋunyo kɨsi do japmɨ nandawit.
40021016	Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak on gen yoŋ nandɨsal?” Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen yoŋ uŋun nandɨsat, mani ji gen kɨnda tosok uŋun dɨma manjaŋ? Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Gak mɨŋat monjɨyo gat ae monjɨ ŋakŋak gat paŋtagap aŋaki mango yaŋ aŋenokgoŋ.’ ”
40021017	Yaŋ yoyɨŋek kokup pap uŋun yɨpmaŋ waŋga pɨgek uŋun pɨlɨn kaga Betani kokupmon paŋkɨ pakgɨt.
40021018	Wɨsa dagaŋakwan Yesu aeni kokup papmon tobɨl kɨŋek kosiron jap do agɨt.
40021019	Aŋek kosit ɨleŋon pik kɨndap kɨnda akban kagɨt. Kaŋek kapmatjok da kɨŋ bamɨ dɨ dɨma pɨndakgɨt. Tamɨ gɨn pɨndagek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak buŋon ae bamɨ dɨmasi toki dosi nandɨsat!” Yaŋ iyɨŋakwan uŋudon gɨn wagɨlsi kɨbɨdagɨt. Tamɨ kɨsi alek taŋ mudawit.
40021020	Aŋakwa paŋdetni da pɨndagek tamtam yaŋek iyɨwit, “Pik kɨndap niaŋon da tepmɨ kɨbɨdak?”
40021021	Uŋun do ji yo morap tɨmɨt do nandaŋ uŋun Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋ kɨmagek bɨsit iyɨni kaŋ, uŋun yo morap damdɨsak.”
40021023	Yesu uŋudon da kɨŋ Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan pɨgɨ amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt. Yoyɨŋ degakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ ae kɨla amɨn dɨwarɨ Yesukon obɨŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Namɨn da pi uŋun abi do yaŋ mudaŋ gamgut da yo uŋun asal? Ae namɨn da man madep gamgut?”
40021024	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak gen kɨnda dayɨkdɨsat. Dayɨko kobogɨ nayɨni kaŋ, nakyo kɨsi kobogɨ tagɨ dayɨkeŋ.
40021025	Jon telagɨ pakbi sogɨt bɨsapmon, Piŋkop da yabekban pi agɨt bo amɨn da yabekba agɨt?” Yaŋban iyɨ gɨn notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “ ‘Piŋkop da yabekgɨt’ yaŋ iyɨneŋ kaŋ, gen kobogɨ yaŋ niyɨkdɨsak, ‘Yaŋ kaŋ ji nido dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit?’
40021026	Mani amɨn morapmɨ da Jon do kombɨ amɨn bamɨsi kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋ, do ‘Amɨn da yabekgwit’ yaŋ iyɨneŋ kaŋ, uŋun kɨsi tagɨ dɨma asak. Yaŋ kaŋ Jon dakon man bin aŋupbal ano mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep da nindapdaŋ.”
40021027	Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu do gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin dɨma nandamaŋ.” Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nakyo kɨsi namɨn da pi uŋun abeŋ do yaŋ mudaŋ namgut uŋun dɨma dayɨkeŋ.”
40021028	Yesu da mukwa sogok amɨn tagɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn gat saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda monjɨ bamorɨ gat egɨpgwit. Egek monji mibɨltogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Monjɨno abɨsok kɨŋ wain pinokon pi aki.’
40021029	“Iyɨŋban yagɨt, ‘Pi dɨma akeŋ.’ Mani don nandak nandakni kulabɨk aŋek kɨŋ pi agɨt.
40021030	“Aŋakwan datni da kɨŋ monji buŋon nani yaŋ gɨn iyɨŋban monji da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Dat, pi tagɨ abeŋ’, mani pikon dɨma kɨgɨt.
40021031	“Niaŋ nandaŋ? Monjɨ bamoron da jɨt amɨn da datni dakon gen guramɨkgɨt?” Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Mibɨltok amɨn.” Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi yosot, takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn yokwi gat ae kosit oba mɨŋat gat da ji gwapmaŋek Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan mibɨltaŋ damɨŋek kwaŋ.
40021032	Jon da jikon obɨŋek kosit kɨlegɨ dayɨŋ dolɨŋban geni nandaba bamɨ dɨma agɨt. Mani takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn yokwi gat ae kosit oba mɨŋat gat da geni nandaba bamɨ agɨt. Ji uŋun kawit mani nandak nandakji kulabɨk aŋek geni nandaba bamɨ dɨma agɨt.”
40021033	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak tɨlak gen kɨnda gat yoko nandabɨt. Amɨn kɨnda da wain pini aŋek nagal aŋ uŋun nagalon wain sop bamaŋ tɨl do gapma kɨnda wayɨkgɨt. Wayɨk mudaŋek kabo noknok pɨndat do yut dubak kɨnda aban wɨgɨgɨt. Yut aŋ mudaŋek amɨn da moneŋ pini dɨ aŋek pi ami do bamɨ dɨ paŋ ɨmni yaŋ nandaŋek pi uŋun da kɨsiron yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm dubagɨkon kɨgɨt.
40021034	Kɨŋ egɨ don wain sop pakpak bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan pi monjɨni yabekban wain bamɨ tɨmɨk paŋopni do kɨwit.
40021035	“Kɨŋ altaŋba wain pi dakon kɨla amɨn da uŋun pi monjɨ tɨmɨgek, kɨnda aŋak ukwayɨtyo awit, aŋek kɨnda aŋakba kɨmagakwan, kɨnda tɨp baŋ aŋakgwit.
40021036	Yaŋ aba pi ami da aeni pi monjɨni mibɨltok yabekgɨt uŋun dakon tɨlak yapmaŋek morapmɨ yabekgɨt. Yabekban kwa pi kɨla amɨn da mibɨltok awit uŋudeŋ gɨn yokwi aŋyomgwit.
40021037	Buŋonsi iyɨ dakon monji naŋ yabegek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Monjɨno kwan kɨla amɨn da uŋun do nandaba wukwan ɨmdaŋ.’
40021038	“Mani kɨla amɨn da monji kaŋek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, ‘Amɨn on da egɨ don datni dakon yo morap tɨmɨtdɨsak, do aŋatno kɨmagakwan wain pini nin do aŋawatneŋ.’
40021039	Yaŋ yaŋek monjɨ uŋun abɨdaŋ ɨlɨk pigaga da waŋga aŋaŋ abɨgɨ aŋakba kɨmakgɨt.
40021040	“Ji niaŋ nandaŋ? Don pi ami da abɨŋ pi kɨla amɨn niaŋ aŋyomjak?”
40021041	Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Pi ami da abɨŋ uŋun amɨn yokwi kobogɨ yo yokwisi aŋyomdɨsak. Aŋek wain pi uŋun amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ da kɨsiron yɨpban uŋun da wain sop pakpak bɨsapmon bamɨ tagɨ paŋ ɨmni.”
40021042	Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun dɨma manjɨŋ nandawit? Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Yut agak amɨn da gwak yokwi yaŋ yaŋek maba kɨgɨt. Mani Amɨn Tagɨ da uŋun gwak yut kodɨgɨkon tɨp kɨnda naŋ tɨdagɨt da gwak teban akdak. Yo uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ da iyɨ aban nin da kono yo masɨ masɨmɨsi asak.’
40021043	Uŋun do nak yaŋ dayɨsat, Piŋkop da iyɨ Amɨn Kɨla Asak jikon tosok uŋun ji da kɨsiron naŋ gwayeŋ amɨn kabi kɨnda bamɨ tagɨ paŋalon agagɨ uŋun da kɨsiron yɨpdɨsak.
40021044	Amɨn morap gwak kwenon da maŋ dapba bɨsal kɨkdaŋ, ae gwak da amɨn morap da kwenon mosak uŋun wagɨl bɨsal kɨ mudokdaŋ.”
40021045	Yesu da tɨlak gen bamot uŋun yaŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae Parisi amɨn gat da nin do yosok yaŋ nandawit.
40021046	Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu abɨdokdosi nandawit, mani mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi uŋun da Yesu do kombɨ amɨn kɨnda yaŋ nandawit, do abɨdok do si pasalgwit.
40022001	Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda gat yaŋek amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
40022002	“Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun dakon tɨlak kɨnda uŋun yaŋ. Kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda monji do mɨŋat paŋek soŋnok madepsi agɨt.
40022003	Kɨlɨ jap noknok bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan kalɨp yaŋ yomgut amɨn yoyɨŋba opni do pi monjɨni yabekban kɨwit. Mani kɨŋ yoyɨŋba op do dɨma galak tawit.
40022004	“Yaŋ aba pi monjɨ dɨ gat aeni yabekgɨt. Yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Ji kɨŋ mibɨltok but pɨso yoyɨŋbi amɨn uŋun yaŋ yoyɨni: Nandani, nak bapalo gat ae bulmakau binap amɨn nelagɨ toŋsi kɨlɨ dapmaŋ mandaŋ soŋ yopmat. Jap morap kɨlɨ soŋ paŋnoman aŋ yopmat. Do ji opba monjino do mɨŋat pagɨm uŋun dakon soŋnok aneŋ.’
40022005	“Pi monjɨni uŋun gen aŋaŋ uŋun amɨn kabɨkon aŋkɨwit, mani geni nandak do kuragɨ nandaŋek iyɨ da galak togon kɨŋ kɨŋ awit. Kɨnda uŋun pigagani kɨgɨt, ae kɨnda moneŋ ɨlɨt pinikon kɨgɨt.
40022006	Yaŋ aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ da pi monjɨ tɨmɨgek yo yokwi aŋ yomɨŋek dapba kɨmakgwit.
40022007	Yaŋ aba kɨla amɨn madep uŋun japmɨsi nandaŋek emat amɨni yabekban kɨŋ pi monjɨni dapgwit amɨn uŋun kɨsisi dapba mɨni awit. Aŋek kokupni sowit.
40022008	“Aŋakwa kɨla amɨn madep da pi monjɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Mɨŋat pakpak dakon jap kɨlɨ paŋ noman abi, mani si yaŋ yomgum amɨn uŋun amɨn yokwi, do nak dakon jap dɨma noni.
40022009	Yaŋdo, ji kɨŋ kosit papmon agek amɨn pɨndak yoyɨŋba apba jap pakbiyo aneŋ.’
40022010	Yaŋ yoyɨŋban pi monjɨni kosit papmon kɨŋ amɨn aŋpakni tagɨ ae aŋpakni yokwi kɨsi pɨndak yoyɨŋba opba jap noknok yut madep uŋun yɨkba tugagɨt.
40022011	“Yɨgakwa kɨla amɨn madep da amɨn obeŋ uŋun pɨndat do yutnon wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgɨ kaŋban amɨn kɨnda mɨŋat paŋek jap noknok aŋ bɨsapmon ɨmal tagɨsi paŋ uŋuden kɨnda dɨma pagɨt kagɨt.
40022012	Kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Not, gak nidosi mɨŋat pakpak bɨsap madep dakon ɨmal tagɨsi dɨma paŋek ɨdon wɨl?’ Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn uŋun geni mɨni yɨkgɨt.
40022013	Geni mɨni yɨgakwan amɨn madep da pi monjɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Ji on amɨn abɨdaŋek kɨsit kandapmɨyo wamaŋ waŋga abɨgɨ maba pɨlɨn tukgwan pɨgɨsak. Uŋudon kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek egɨpdɨsak.’ ”
40022014	Yesu uŋun tɨlak gen yoyɨŋ mudaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn yaŋ yobi uŋun da morapmɨsi asak, mani yutnon amɨn tagɨ gat yɨtni do kokwinɨkbi uŋun da tagapmɨ.”
40022015	Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ da kɨŋ Yesu suŋ kɨnda yaŋban nandaŋek gen pikon yɨpneŋ yaŋ do gen paŋkosit awit.
40022016	Aŋek iyɨ dakon paŋdetni gat ae Erot da kabɨkon amɨn dɨwarɨ gat yabekba kɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, gak gen bamɨ yogok amɨn kɨnda yaŋ nandamaŋ. Gak amɨn do dɨma pasoldol. Amɨn mani toŋ ae mani mɨni uŋun kɨsi Piŋkop dakon aŋpak yoyɨŋ dek mudosol.
40022017	Gak niaŋ nandɨsal? Sisa do takis ɨmno tagɨ asak?”
40022018	Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da niaŋon da nak abɨŋ nep do nandaŋ kokwin aŋ uŋun pɨndak mudaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jamba but amɨn ji nak nido aŋkewalgaŋ?
40022019	Moneŋ tabɨlɨ kɨnda takis do yɨpmaŋgaŋ kɨnda aŋobɨŋ naba koko.” Yaŋ yaŋban moneŋ tabɨlɨ kɨnda aŋobɨŋ ɨba
40022020	yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On wup gat ae man mandabi gat uŋun namɨn dakon?”
40022021	Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Sisa dakon.” Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yo Sisa dakon uŋun Sisa iyɨ do ɨmdo, ae yo Piŋkop dakon uŋun Piŋkop iyɨ do ɨmdo.”
40022022	Yesu da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi aban yɨpmaŋ kɨwit.
40022023	Uŋun gɨldaron gɨn Sadyusi amɨn dɨwarɨ da Yesukon apgwit. (Sadyusi amɨn kabɨ amɨn kɨmakbi dɨma pɨdoŋ yaŋ nandaŋ.) Abɨŋek yaŋ iyɨwit,
40022024	“Yoyɨŋdet, Moses da gen kɨnda yaŋ mandagɨt, ‘Amɨn kɨnda monji mɨni da kɨmagakwan mɨŋatni ɨsal egɨpjak kaŋ, padɨge da paŋakwan yawi dɨwatni dɨma pasɨlni yaŋ do monjɨ paŋalasak.’
40022025	Nin da bɨkbɨgon peni padɨgeyo 7 kabɨ egɨpgwit. Mibɨltok nani uŋun mɨŋat paŋek monjɨ mɨni egek kɨmakban padɨge da kwabatni pagɨt.
40022026	Paŋek uŋunyo kɨsi monjɨ mɨni egek kɨmakgɨt. Ae uŋun da buŋon nani kɨsi yaŋ gɨn agɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwa amɨn 7 kabɨ uŋun kɨsi kɨmak mudawit.
40022027	Kɨmak mudaŋakwa mɨŋat uŋun don kɨmakgɨt.
40022028	Wɨli 7 kabɨ kɨsi da pawit, do amɨn da kɨmoron da pɨdoni bɨsap madepmon namɨn dakon mɨŋatni asak?”
40022029	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun dɨma nandaŋ. Ae Piŋkop dakon tapmɨmni uŋun kɨsi dɨma kaŋ nandaŋ yo aŋek ji gen gulusuŋ yoŋ.
40022030	Pɨdot pɨdot bɨsap madepmon mɨŋat wɨliyo agak dɨma tokdɨsak. Aŋelo Kwen Kokup ɨsal ekwaŋ uŋun da tɨlagon egɨpdaŋ.
40022031	Ji kɨmoron da pɨdot pɨdot dakon mibɨlɨ pakyaŋsi dɨma nandaba pɨsosok. Piŋkop da uŋun do kɨlɨ dayɨgɨt. Ji dɨma manjɨŋ nandaŋ, ma? Yaŋ yagɨt:
40022032	‘Nak Abraham, Aisak, ae Jekop dakon Piŋkopni.’ Piŋkop uŋun amɨn kɨmakbi dakon Piŋkop dɨma, amɨn egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun dakon Piŋkop.”
40022033	Yesu da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi da yoyɨŋdet uŋun agɨt do tamtam yawit.
40022034	Sadyusi amɨn da Yesu aŋkewal do iyɨŋba gen tagɨsi yaŋakwan kobogɨ iyɨk do dɨma nandawit. Parisi amɨn da uŋun nandaŋek Yesukon opgwit.
40022035	Obɨŋ gen teban dakon mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨni kɨnda da Yesu aŋkewalek yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
40022036	“Yoyɨŋdet, ni gen teban da gen teban morap kɨsi yapmaŋ mudosok?”
40022037	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ji Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji uŋun but gat ae nandak nandak gat kɨsisi paregek but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek egɨpni.
40022038	Gen teban on da gen teban dɨwarɨ yapmaŋ mudosok.
40022039	Ae uŋun da buŋon nani mibɨltok yosok uŋun yombem gɨn. Uŋun yaŋ yosok: Gaga do but dasi niaŋ galak tosol, uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yobi.
40022040	On gen teban bamot da gen teban dɨwarɨ gat ae kombɨ amɨn dakon gen morap kɨsi tɨmɨkgamal.”
40022041	Parisi amɨn sigɨn egakwa Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
40022042	“Ji Kristo do namɨn dakon monjɨ yaŋ nandaŋ?” Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Dewit dakon monji.”
40022043	Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Yaŋ kaŋ nido Telagɨ Wup da Dewit aŋpulugaŋakwan Kristo do ‘Amɨn Tagɨ’ yaŋ iyɨgɨt? Dewit uŋun yaŋ yagɨt:
40022044	‘Piŋkop da nak dakon Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak abɨŋ nak da amɨnsi tet do yɨkbɨ don uwalgo kandap gɨbaŋgogwan yopbo gengo guramɨtni.” ’
40022045	Dewit da Kristo Amɨn Tagɨno yaŋ iyɨgɨt. Uŋun do niaŋon da Kristo uŋun Dewit dakon Amɨn Tagɨni ae monji kɨsi egɨsak?”
40022046	Yaŋ yaŋakwan amɨn kɨnda da gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma iyɨwit. Ae uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn wasaŋek Yesu gen iyɨk do pasalgwit.
40023001	Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi gat iyɨ dakon paŋdet kabɨni gat yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
40023002	“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat ae Parisi amɨn gat da kalɨp Moses da man madepni gat yɨgek gen teban yoyɨŋ dekgɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn dayɨŋ dekgaŋ.
40023003	Yaŋdo, gen morap dayɨŋ dekgaŋ uŋun kɨsi guramɨk mudoni. Mani gen dayaŋ uŋun iyɨ dɨma guramɨkgaŋ, do aŋpak aŋ uŋun dɨma yolni.
40023004	Uŋun da gen teban mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ jɨgɨsi guramɨtni do dayaŋ, mani iyɨ paŋpulugaŋba guramɨtni do kɨsitjok kɨnda dɨmasi yɨpmaŋgaŋ.
40023005	“Yo morap aŋ uŋun amɨn da pɨndatni yaŋ do aŋ. Piŋkop dakon gen sop sɨmɨl sɨmɨl kɨnam madepsi ɨŋamɨkon wamaŋgaŋ, ae ɨmalnikon nap tɨlɨmɨ toŋ dubagɨsi uŋun baŋ paŋ.
40023006	Jap noknok tamokon ae muwut muwut yutnikon amɨn mani toŋ da yɨkgaŋ tamokon yɨt do galak toŋ.
40023007	Aŋek amɨn da maket tamokon ‘Yoyɨŋdet, gɨldat tagɨ’ yaŋ yoyɨni yaŋ do galak toŋ.
40023008	“Ji dakon Yoyɨŋdetji kaloŋɨ kɨnda dagɨn egɨsak, do amɨn da ji gawak damɨŋek ‘Yoyɨŋdet’ yaŋ dɨma dayɨni. Ji kɨsi morap not dagɨn ekwaŋ.
40023009	Datji kaloŋɨ uŋun Kwen Kokup egɨsak, do mɨktɨm amɨn kɨnda do dat yaŋ dɨma iyɨni.
40023010	Ae ji dakon Madepji kaloŋɨ uŋun Kristo, do amɨn kɨnda do gawak ɨmɨŋek madepno yaŋ dɨma iyɨni.
40023011	Ji da binapmon mibɨltok amɨnji ekwaŋ uŋun oman amɨnji egɨ damni.
40023012	Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ do nandaban wɨgɨsak amɨn uŋun mani mɨni da egɨpdɨsak, aŋakwan amɨn kɨnda iyɨ do nandaban pɨsak amɨn uŋun mani toŋ da egɨpdɨsak.”
40023013	-
40023014	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn, ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan pɨgɨk do aŋ amɨn ji da kosit sopmaŋ yomaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek dɨsiyo kɨsi uŋungwan dɨma pɨkwaŋ.
40023015	“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Ji amɨn kaloŋɨ kɨnda da paŋdetji dagosak do pi teban aŋek tap kwenon da mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ akwaŋ. Ji Tɨpdom do amɨn aŋ, do amɨn kɨnda abɨdoni kaŋ, iyɨŋ dekba uŋun amɨn yaŋ gɨn Tɨpdom do amɨn akdɨsak. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, ji da aŋpak yokwi aŋ uŋun si yapmaŋek uŋun amɨn aŋpak yokwisi asak.
40023016	“Kosit yolɨk amɨn, ji dabɨlji mɨni da ekwaŋ. Awa! Ji yaŋ yoŋ: ‘Amɨn kɨnda da Piŋkop dakon Telagɨ Yut Madep do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban aŋek ae don tagɨ kɨrɨŋɨtjak. Mani amɨn kɨnda da telagɨ yut dakon gol do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, tagɨ dɨma kɨrɨŋɨtjak.’
40023017	Ji nandaŋ kokwinji mɨni, dabɨlji mɨni. Yo ni da Piŋkop da dabɨlon yo madep asak? Gol yutgwan toŋ uŋun bo ae Telagɨ Yut Madep? Nandani, gol telagɨ yutgwan toŋ do telagɨ yut da aban telagɨ asak.
40023018	“Ae kɨnda yoŋ uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn kɨnda da alta do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, tagɨ kɨrɨŋɨtjak. Mani amɨn kɨnda da altakon paret toŋ do geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, tagɨ dɨma kɨrɨŋɨtjak.’
40023019	Ji dabɨlji mɨni. Yo ni da Piŋkop da dabɨlon yo madep asak? Paret altakon toŋ uŋun bo ae alta? Nandani, paret altakon toŋ do alta da aban telagɨ asak.
40023020	Yaŋdo, amɨn kɨnda alta do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, alta gat ae yo morap altakon toŋ uŋun kɨsi do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak.
40023021	Ae amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop dakon telagɨ yut do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, telagɨ yut gat ae Piŋkop yutnikon egɨsak uŋun gat kɨsi do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak.
40023022	Ae amɨn kɨnda Kwen Kokup do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, Piŋkop dakon kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo gat ae Piŋkop iyɨ tamonikon yɨkdak uŋun gat kɨsi do geni yaŋ aŋteban asak.
40023023	“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Ji jap tam galagɨsi pi kagasi toŋ uŋun paŋ kabi 10 kabɨ kokwinɨgek uŋudon baŋ kabi kɨndanaŋ Piŋkop do paret tagɨ aŋ. Mani gen tebanon gen madep madep toŋ uŋun yapmaŋ mudoŋ. Amɨnon gen kokwin kɨlegɨ ani do yosok, ae amɨn bupmɨ nandaŋ yomni do yosok, ae nandaŋ gadat dakon bamɨ aŋpak jikon noman tosak do yosok. Ji uŋun dɨma aŋ. Gen tebanon gen madep madep toŋ uŋun guramɨk mudaŋek paret do yosok uŋun kɨsi guramɨtni kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi.
40023024	Kosit yolɨk amɨn, ji dabɨlji mɨni da ekwaŋ. Ji dakon tɨlak uŋun yaŋ. Amɨn da pakbi nok do aŋek yo monɨŋ pakbikon toŋ uŋun pɨndak maba kɨŋakwa pakbi noŋ, mani kamel madep dɨma noknogɨ uŋun dɨma kaŋek kaloŋ galaukba pɨgɨsak.
40023025	“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Ji kap ɨdapyo dakon manji sugoŋ, mani burɨgwan da kabo ae sukwap nandak nandakyo tugawit da toŋ.
40023026	Parisi dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn, ji mibɨltok kap dakon burɨ ɨkdɨgoni kaŋ, manji iyɨ tagɨ kɨlek tosak.
40023027	“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Ji amɨn kɨmakba yopmaŋgaŋ tɨp kɨnam yombem. Kwen da kwak soŋbi do kwakwagɨ tagɨsi asak. Mani mɨkgwan amɨn kɨdat gat ae yo garagɨ tɨgɨ morapmɨ toŋ.
40023028	Jiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn ekwaŋ. Amɨn da dandaba ji amɨn kɨlegɨsi ekwaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, mani butjikon ji jamba but amɨnsi ae gen teban yapyap amɨnsi ekwaŋ.
40023029	“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Ji kombɨ amɨn ae amɨn kɨlegɨ kalɨpsi egɨ kɨmakba yopgwit tamo paŋtɨlɨm aŋ.
40023030	Aŋek yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Nin kalɨpsi babɨknin da bɨsapmon egɨpgumaŋ tam, nin paŋpulugaŋek kombɨ amɨn dɨma dapnom.’
40023031	Gen yaŋ yaŋakwa ji kombɨ amɨn dapdap dakon babɨkni yaŋsi nandaŋ damamaŋ.
40023032	Do ji kɨŋ babɨkji da wasaŋek aŋpak yokwi awit uŋun aŋ mudoni.
40023033	Ji tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ dakon gwakni kabɨ. Piŋkop da ji yaŋ dagaŋ depban Tɨpdom do amɨn aŋakwa namɨn da pulugaŋ depjak?
40023034	“Do yaŋ dayɨsat, nak da kombɨ amɨn ae nandak nandak amɨn ae yoyɨŋdet amɨn yabekgo jikon apdaŋ. Apba ji da uŋun amɨn dɨwarɨ yolba pasal kokupmɨ kokupmɨ kɨkdaŋ. Aŋakwa dɨwarɨ tɨmɨgek dapba kɨmotdaŋ, ae dɨwarɨ tɨlak kɨndapmon dapdaŋ, ae dɨwarɨ muwut muwut yutjikon nap kɨrɨŋbaŋ baljokdaŋ.
40023035	Yaŋ do aŋek on mɨktɨmon amɨn kɨlegɨ morap dapba kɨmakgwit uŋun dakon kobogɨ ji da tɨmɨtdaŋ. Wasok wasok do amɨn kɨlegɨ Abel aŋagek ae amɨn kɨlegɨ morapmɨ kɨsi dapgwit. Egɨ wɨgɨ wasɨp do ji da Berekia dakon monji Sekaraia Telagɨ Yut Madep ae altayo da binapmon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt. Uŋun dakon kobogɨ yo jɨgɨsi ji da tɨmɨtdaŋ.
40023036	Nak asisi dayɨsat, abɨsok amɨn ekwaŋ ji da uŋun dakon kobogɨ yo jɨgɨsi tɨmɨtdaŋ.
40023037	“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem amɨn, ji kombɨ amɨn dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Amɨn Piŋkop da yabekban jikon abaŋ uŋun ji da tɨpbaŋ dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Pup meŋi da monjini paŋmuwuk pɨrɨgwan yopmaŋdak, uŋun da tɨlak nak da bɨsap morapmɨ ji paŋmuwut do nandagɨm, mani ji da kurak taŋ namgwit.
40023038	Nak asisi dayɨsat, kokup yomasiyo yokwi taŋek yumsi tokdɨsak.
40023039	Ji nak dɨma nandaŋek egɨ wɨgɨ ni bɨsapmon nak do ‘Amɨn on Amɨn Tagɨ da manon abɨsak, uŋun Piŋkop da gɨsamɨgakwan abɨsak’ yaŋ nak do yoni uŋun bɨsapmon nandakdaŋ.”
40024001	Yesu Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon nagal yɨpmaŋek waŋga kɨŋakwan paŋdetni da Yesukon kɨŋek Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon yut madep madep pɨndatjak do yolɨwit.
40024002	Yolɨŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On yut madep madep pɨndakgaŋ uŋun dakon tɨp notni da kwenon dɨma taŋ taŋ akdaŋ. Tuwɨlba kɨsisi maŋ mudokdaŋ.”
40024003	Yesu Ɨleŋ Olipmon yɨgakwan paŋdetni da iyɨ gɨn kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gen uŋun niyɨl uŋun ni bɨsapmon altokdaŋ? Ninaŋ kaŋek gak aego tobɨl abɨŋaki on mɨktɨm dakon bɨsap mudokdɨsak yaŋ nandaneŋ?”
40024004	Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn da paŋkewalni do kaŋ kɨmotni.
40024005	Amɨn morapmɨ da abɨŋ nak dakon man yaŋek yaŋ yokdaŋ, ‘Nak naga Kristo.’ Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn morapmɨ paŋkewaldaŋ.
40024006	Uŋun bɨsapmon emat wuwɨk gat ae dubagɨkon emat aŋ uŋun dakon gen bin apba nandaŋek butji dɨma pasolni. Uŋun yo morap altokdaŋ, mani mɨktɨm da mudosak bɨsap madep kɨlɨ uŋun noman tosok yaŋ dɨma nandani.
40024007	Mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn da pɨdaŋba mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn gat emat wamdaŋ. Ae kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda dakon amɨn da pɨdaŋba kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda dakon amɨn gat emat wamdaŋ. Aŋakwa mɨktɨm dɨwarɨkon wudɨp akdaŋ. Ae amɨn da jap do madepsi aŋek dɨwarɨ da kɨmotdaŋ.
40024008	Mɨŋat monjɨ kwapmɨ toŋ da monjɨ altok do aŋakwa wasaŋek tepmɨ paŋ, yaŋ gɨn uŋun yo morap altaŋakwa bɨsap madep kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandani.
40024009	“Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da ji tɨmɨgek tepmɨ damɨŋek dɨkba kɨmotdaŋ. Ae ji nak nolgaŋ do aŋek amɨn kɨsi morap da ji do butjap nandaŋ damdaŋ.
40024010	Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn morapmɨ nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namaŋ uŋun nandaŋ gadatni yopba wɨtdal kɨŋakwa notni do nandaba yokwi tok aŋek uwal da kɨsiron yopmaŋ yopmaŋ akdaŋ.
40024011	Aŋakwa kombɨ amɨn toptopmɨ morapmɨ da altaŋek amɨn morapmɨ paŋkewalba nandaŋ yomɨŋek yoldaŋ.
40024012	Aŋakwa aŋpak yokwi da madepsi ɨreŋ taŋ aŋ aŋ kɨkdɨsak. Yaŋ aŋakwa amɨn morapmɨ da not do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak yɨpba wɨtdal kɨkdɨsak.
40024013	Mani amɨn morap tebaisi sigɨn agakwa wɨgɨ mibɨ bɨsapmon wɨgɨsak uŋun Piŋkop da pulugaŋ yopdɨsak.
40024014	Amɨn da mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo ekwaŋ uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ mudaŋakwa bɨsap madep uŋun apdɨsak.”
40024015	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo wagɨl yokwisi kɨnda don Telagɨ Yut Madepmon akban kokdaŋ. Kombɨ amɨn Daniel da uŋun do kɨlɨ yagɨt.” (On gen manjɨsak amɨn uŋun da pakyaŋsi nandɨsak.)
40024016	“Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn Judia mɨktɨmon egɨpni uŋun pasal kabapgwan tepmɨsi wɨgɨni.
40024017	Amɨn kɨnda yut kwenon egɨpjak kaŋ, yo kabɨni tɨmɨt do yutgwan pɨgɨk do nandak nandak dɨmasi asak.
40024018	Ae amɨn kɨnda pigaga egɨpjak kaŋ, yutnon ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni kɨŋ abɨdok do nandak nandak dɨmasi asak.
40024019	Uŋun bɨsapmon mɨŋat monjɨ kwapni toŋ, ae mɨŋat monjɨ mum noŋ uŋun bupmɨsi.
40024020	Ji da Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨŋba nandaŋakwan yo uŋun ais bɨsapmon bo Sabat bɨsapmon dɨma noman toni.
40024021	Uŋun bɨsapmon yo jɨgɨsi altokdaŋ. Piŋkop da mibɨlɨkon yo morap wasagɨron da egɨ abɨsok ekwamaŋon yo jɨgɨsi uŋuden kɨnda dɨma altagɨt, ae buŋon dɨma altokdɨsak.
40024022	Amɨn Tagɨ da uŋun bɨsap dɨma aŋpɨsɨp asak tam mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi kɨmak mudonom. Mani mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ iyɨ do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt uŋun do bupmɨ nandaŋek bɨsap aŋpɨsɨp asak.
40024023	“Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda da ‘Kristo oni!’ bo ‘Asoni!’ yaŋ yaŋban kaŋ, top yosok yaŋ nandani.
40024024	Amɨn dɨwarɨ da abɨŋ ‘Nak Kristo’ yaŋ top yokdaŋ. Ae dɨwarɨ da ‘Nak kombɨ amɨn kɨnda’ yaŋ top yokdaŋ. Yaŋ yaŋek wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ akdaŋ. Aŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ Piŋkop da iyɨ do kɨlɨ manjɨkbi uŋun paŋkewal do pini madep akdaŋ. Mani arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋkewaldaŋ.
40024025	“Nandani, yo jɨgɨsi morap uŋun dɨma altaŋakwa mibɨltok dayɨsat.
40024026	-
40024027	Mal da gɨldat wɨsak tetgɨn da teŋteŋaŋ kɨŋ gɨldat pɨgɨsak tetgɨn noman taŋban komaŋ, uŋun da tɨlak Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun apban amɨn kɨsi da kokdaŋ. Do amɨn kɨnda da ‘Kristo uŋun mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon egɨsak!’ yaŋ dayɨŋban kaŋ, uŋudon dɨma kɨni. Bo amɨn kɨnda da ‘Kristo yut uŋudon pasɨlek egɨsak!’ yaŋ dayɨŋban kaŋ, top yosok yaŋ nandani.
40024028	Yo kɨmakbi da toŋ sɨŋgɨŋ uŋudon abɨŋ muwukgaŋ.”
40024029	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo jɨgɨ dakon bɨsap mudaŋakwan, ‘Gɨldat dabɨl pɨlɨn tuk akdɨsak, ae kanek dɨma teŋteŋokdɨsak. Ae gɨk kundu yɨpmaŋek mokdaŋ. Aŋakwa kwen kundukon yo tebai toŋ uŋun da kwakwalɨtdaŋ.’
40024030	Uŋun bɨsapmon Amɨn Dakon Monji dakon tɨlak kundukon altaŋban kaŋek mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn kɨsi morap da kunam tatdaŋ. Kaŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji tapmɨmni gat ae tɨlɨm madepni gat gɨkwemon da apban kokdaŋ.
40024031	Kweŋ madepsi da yaŋakwan aŋelo kabɨni yabekban kɨŋ amɨn iyɨ do manjɨkbi kabɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun paŋmuwutdaŋ.”
40024032	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji pik kɨndap kaŋek butji pɨsosak. Kɨlɨŋɨ pakbini toŋ ae tamɨ kaluk yopmaŋdak, uŋun bɨsapmon gɨldat bɨsap kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandaŋ.
40024033	Uŋudeŋ gɨn yo morap dayɨt uŋun da altaŋakwa mɨktɨm da mudosak bɨsap madep kɨlɨ uŋunjok kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandani.
40024034	“Nak asisi dayɨsat, uŋun bɨsapmon egɨpni amɨn dɨma kɨmagakwa yo morap uŋun kɨsi altaŋ mudokdaŋ.
40024035	Kundu gat mɨktɨm gat pasɨldamal, mani nak dakon gen uŋun dɨmasi pasɨldɨsak.”
40024036	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo morap altosak uŋun dakon bɨsap uŋun amɨn kɨnda da dɨma nandɨsak. Kwen Kokup aŋeloyo dɨma nandaŋ, ae Monjɨyo kɨsi dɨma nandɨsak. Dat da iyɨ gɨn nandɨsak.
40024037	Noa da bɨsapmon amɨn egɨpgwit uŋudeŋ gɨn Amɨn Dakon Monji apjak bɨsapmon yaŋ gɨn egɨpdaŋ.
40024038	Kulup madep dɨma altaŋakwan jap pakbiyo aŋek mɨŋat pakpak awit. Yaŋ aŋek egakwa Noa tap wakgakon wɨgɨgɨt.
40024039	Wɨgakwan yo jɨgɨ altaŋ nimdaŋ uŋun dɨma nandawit. Butni dɨma pɨsaŋakwa kulup madep da altaŋek wutjɨŋban pasɨlgwit. Amɨn yaŋ gɨn egakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji apdɨsak.
40024040	Amɨn bamorɨ pigaga egakwal Piŋkop da kɨnda yapmaŋek kɨnda abɨdokdɨsak.
40024041	Mɨŋat bamorɨ da plaua wasaŋek yɨgakwal kɨnda yapmaŋek kɨnda abɨdokdɨsak.
40024042	“Yaŋdo, kaŋ kɨmotni. Amɨn Tagɨsi ni gɨldaron apdɨsak uŋun ji dɨma nandaŋ.
40024043	Nandaŋ pɨsoni. Yut kɨnda dakon ami kalbi kabo noknok ni bɨsapmon apdɨsak yaŋ nandagɨt tam, kɨla aŋakwan yutni arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlban.
40024044	Dɨma apdɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek egakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋudon apdɨsak. Yaŋdo, ji tagap taŋek egɨpni.”
40024045	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Oman monjɨ kɨnda nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi ae pi agakni tagɨsi, uŋuden oman monjɨ amɨn tagɨni da oman monjɨni dɨwarɨ kɨlani asak do manjɨsak. Yaŋ aban jap yomyom bɨsapmon japni yomɨŋ yomɨŋ asak.
40024046	Oman monjɨ uŋun amɨn tagɨni da tobɨl abɨŋ kaŋban pini tagɨsi asak kaŋ tagɨsi.
40024047	Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn tagɨni da uŋun oman monjɨ iyɨŋban yo morapni kɨla akdɨsak.
40024048	Mani oman monjɨ kɨnda pi yokwi asak uŋun burɨkon da yaŋ nandɨsak, ‘Amɨn tagɨno uŋun tepmɨ dɨma apdɨsak.’
40024049	Yaŋ nandaŋek oman monjɨ notni dapmaŋek pakbi teban naŋek but upbal aŋ amɨn gat muwugek jap pakbiyo aŋ.
40024050	Yaŋ aŋek dɨma apdɨsak yaŋ nandaŋakwan amɨn tagɨni da but pɨsogɨ mɨni apdɨsak.
40024051	Abɨŋek uŋun oman monjɨ tepmɨ pi ɨmɨŋek yɨpban jamba but amɨn gat kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek egɨpdaŋ.”
40025001	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Uŋun bɨsap madepmon Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni dakon tɨlak kɨnda uŋun yaŋ. Amɨn kɨnda mɨŋat pak do agɨt. Aŋakwan mɨŋat uŋun pakdɨsak dakon notni mɨŋatjok 10 kabɨ da lamni tɨmɨgek kosiron kɨŋ wɨli uŋun kaŋ abɨdaŋ aŋop do kɨwit.
40025002	Mɨŋatjok 5 kabɨ uŋun nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma, ae 5 kabɨ uŋun nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi.
40025003	Mɨŋatjok nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma uŋun lamni tɨmɨgek lam kolek do pakbi dɨ gat dɨma paŋkɨwit.
40025004	Mani mɨŋatjok nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi uŋun lamni tɨmɨgek lam kolek do pakbi dɨ gat kɨsi tɨmɨgek kɨwit.
40025005	Kɨŋ jomjom aŋ egakwa amɨn uŋun tepmɨ dɨma abɨŋakwan dɨpmɨni wɨŋba dɨpmɨn pak mudawit.
40025006	“Pak mudaŋakwa kalbi binap aban amɨn kɨnda yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Amɨn mɨŋat pak do asak kɨlɨ uŋun abɨsak! Opba kɨŋ abɨdono!’
40025007	“Yaŋ yaŋban mɨŋatjok kɨsi pɨdaŋ lamni paŋkosit
40025008	aŋakwa mɨŋatjok nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma uŋun da mɨŋatjok nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi yaŋ yoyɨwit, ‘Nin do pakbi dɨwatji nimgut, lamnin kɨmotdaŋ.’
40025009	“Yaŋba nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi da yaŋ yoyɨwit, ‘Pakbi on nin kɨsi da arɨpmon dɨma toŋ. Ji kɨŋ yumaŋ nok yutnon pakbi yumni.’
40025010	“Kɨŋakwa amɨn mɨŋat pak do agɨt uŋun apgut. Apban mɨŋat tagap taŋek egɨpgwit uŋun gat soŋnok ak do yutnon wɨgakwa yoma sopgwit.
40025011	“Buŋon don mɨŋat kabɨ pakbi do kɨwit uŋun abɨŋ yawit, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, amɨn tagɨ, abɨŋ yoma wɨtdal nim!’
40025012	“Mani amɨn tagɨ da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Nak asisi dayɨsat, nak dɨmasi nandaŋ damɨsat.’ ”
40025013	Yesu da tɨlak gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨsi altaŋ damjak uŋun dakon bɨsap ji dɨma nandaŋ, do tagap taŋek egɨpni.”
40025014	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun do tɨlak kɨnda ako mibɨlɨ nandani. Amɨn kɨnda kokup dubagɨ kɨndakon kɨk do aŋek pi monjɨni yaŋ yoban opba yo kabɨni kɨla ani do yoyɨgɨt.
40025015	Pi monjɨ kaloŋ kaloŋ dakon pi agakni da arɨpmon moneŋni kɨla ani do yomgut. Kɨnda do moneŋ 25 tausen danari, ae kɨnda do 10 tausen danari, ae kɨnda do 5 tausen danari yaŋ yomɨŋ mudaŋek kɨgɨt.
40025016	Kɨŋakwan uŋudon gɨn 25 tausen danari tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn uŋun yomɨŋ gwayek aŋakwan 25 tausen danari kɨnda gat noman tagɨt.
40025017	Ae 10 tausen danari tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn uŋunyo yaŋ gɨn aŋakwan 10 tausen danari kɨnda gat noman tagɨt.
40025018	Mani 5 tausen danari tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn uŋun kɨŋ gapma wayɨgek amɨn tagɨni dakon moneŋni gapmakon yopban ɨsal tawit.
40025019	“Amɨn tagɨni bɨsap dubagɨ egek aeni tobɨl apgut. Abɨŋ moneŋni yomgut uŋun dakon pini niaŋ awit uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do yoyɨgɨt.
40025020	Yoyɨŋban 25 tausen danari tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn uŋun da yomɨŋ gwayek aŋakwan 25 tausen danari kɨnda gat noman tagɨt uŋun yolɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, gak da 25 tausen danari kɨla akeŋ do namgul uŋun pini ako 25 tausen danari kɨnda gat oni noman tak.’
40025021	“Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn tagɨ da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Gak pi monjɨno gen guramɨt tagɨsi agɨl. Aŋek pigo dakon kɨla tagɨsi agɨl. Yo monɨŋɨsok gabo kɨla tagɨsi agɨl do yo madep gabo kɨla tagɨ aki. Gak apbɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ando.’
40025022	“Ae 10 tausen danari tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn uŋun da abɨŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, gak da 10 tausen danari kɨla akeŋ do namgul uŋun pini ako 10 tausen danari kɨnda gat oni noman tak.’
40025023	“Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn tagɨ da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Gak pi monjɨno gen guramɨt tagɨsi agɨl. Aŋek pigo dakon kɨla tagɨsi agɨl. Yo monɨŋɨsok gabo kɨla tagɨsi agɨl, do yo madep gabo kɨla tagɨ aki. Gak apbɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ando.’
40025024	“Ae 5 tausen danari tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn uŋun da abɨŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, gak dakon mibɨlgo nandɨsat, gak bupmɨgo mɨni. Amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ da pi aŋakwa jap bamɨ gak da pasal, ae mɨktɨmon jap yet tɨŋtɨŋoŋ dakon bamɨ gaga do pasal.
40025025	Yaŋ asal, do pasalek moneŋgo 5 tausen danari namgul uŋun aŋkɨ mɨktɨm kagagwan yɨpbo tagɨt. Moneŋgo uŋun oni.’
40025026	“Yaŋban amɨn tagɨni da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak oman monjɨ yokwi, pi ak do kurak tosol. Nak dakon mibɨlno kɨlɨ nandagɨl. Nak amɨn da pigaga jap bamɨ pasat, ae amɨn da jap yet tɨŋtɨŋoŋ dakon bamɨ naga do pasat.
40025027	Yaŋ nandagɨl, do moneŋno beŋon yopgul tam uŋun tagɨ. Yaŋ agɨl tam abɨŋ nak da moneŋno gat ae beŋ da dɨwarɨ saŋbesak uŋun gat tagɨ tɨmɨkgom.’
40025028	-
40025029	“Amɨn yoni taŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun nak da saŋbeŋek yo ɨbo morapmɨsi taŋ ɨmdaŋ. Ae amɨn yoni kaloŋɨsok taŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun nak da uŋunjok gwayeŋ mudokeŋ. Yaŋdo, on amɨn moneŋni uŋun gwayeŋ moneŋ 50 tausen danari taŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun amɨn do ɨmni.
40025030	Aŋek on oman monjɨ kurak tok amɨn waŋga abɨgɨ maba pɨlɨn tukgwan pɨgɨsak. Uŋudon kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek egɨpdɨsak.”
40025031	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn Dakon Monji apjak bɨsapmon Kwen Kokup dakon tɨlɨmni gat ae aŋelo kabɨni gat abɨŋek kɨla amɨn madep yɨyɨt tamokon uŋudon yɨtdɨsak.
40025032	Yɨgakwan amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun abɨŋ burɨkon muwuk mudoni. Abɨŋ muwukba kɨla amɨn da sipsip ae meme kokwinɨkgaŋ uŋun da tɨlagon amɨn kokwinɨtdɨsak.
40025033	Kokwinɨgek sipsip amɨnsi tet do yopmaŋek meme gwandeŋ tet do yopdɨsak.
40025034	“Kɨla Amɨn Madep uŋun da amɨnsi tet do amɨn yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Datno da gɨsam dabi amɨn, abɨŋek Datno dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni ji do aŋnoman abi uŋun abɨŋek abɨdoni. Uŋun mɨktɨm wasok wasogɨkon ji do kɨlɨ aŋnoman agɨt da tosok.
40025035	Nak kalɨp jap do abo jap naba nagɨm, ae pakbi do abo pakbi naba nagɨm, ae kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon da apbo but dasi abɨdaŋba yutjikon paŋkɨ egɨpgum.
40025036	Ɨmalno mɨni egapbo ɨmal namgwit. Sot abo aŋpulugawit. Dam teban yutnon yɨgapbo abɨŋ nandawit.’
40025037	“Yaŋ yaŋban kɨlegɨ kabɨ da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨni, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ, ni bɨsapmon jap do abɨ gandaŋek jap gamgumaŋ, ae ni bɨsapmon pakbi do asal yaŋ gandaŋek pakbi gamgumaŋ?
40025038	Ae ni bɨsapmon kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon da abɨsal yaŋ gandaŋek aŋkɨ yutninon gepgumaŋ, ae ni bɨsapmon ɨmalgo mɨni yaŋ gandaŋek ɨmal gamgumaŋ?
40025039	Ae ni bɨsapmon sot asal yaŋ gandaŋek kɨlago agɨmaŋ, ae ni bɨsapmon dam teban yutnon yɨkdal yaŋ gandaŋek abɨŋ gandagɨmaŋ?’
40025040	“Yaŋba Amɨn Madep da yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Asisi dayɨsat, yo morap notno kɨnda mani mɨni do awit uŋun yo morap nak do awit.’
40025041	“Yaŋ yoyɨŋek Amɨn Madep uŋun da tobɨl gwandeŋ tet do amɨn yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Jobɨt pabi kabɨ ji aŋgwikon kɨŋek kɨndapmon pɨgɨt. Uŋun kɨndap uŋun Sunduk gat aŋelo kabɨni gat uŋun do aŋnoman abi, uŋun kɨmot kɨmorɨ mɨni.
40025042	Kalɨp jap do abo jap dɨma namgwit, ae pakbi do abo pakbi dɨma namgwit.
40025043	Kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon da apbo yutjikon dɨma aŋkɨ nepgwit, ae ɨmalno mɨni egapbo ɨmal dɨma namgwit, ae sot agɨm ae dam teban yutnon yɨkgɨm bɨsapmon kɨlano dɨma awit.’
40025044	“Yaŋ yaŋban gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨni, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ ni bɨsapmon gandano jap do agɨl, bo pakbi do agɨl, bo kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon da apgul, bo ɨmalgo mɨni, bo sot agɨl, bo dam teban yutnon yɨkgɨl, abɨ dɨma aŋpulugagɨmaŋ?’
40025045	“Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Nak asisi dayɨsat, yo morap amɨn mani mɨni do dɨma awit uŋun nak do awit.’
40025046	“Yaŋ yoyɨŋban uŋun amɨn kabɨ kobogɨ yokwisi dagok dagogɨ mɨni pakdaŋ. Mani kɨlegɨ amɨn kabɨ uŋun da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni uŋudon kɨkdaŋ.”
40026001	Yesu uŋun gen morap yaŋ mudaŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
40026002	“Dɨsi nandaŋ, gɨldat bamorɨ gɨn egek Yapyap Bɨlak egɨpmɨ. Uŋun bɨsapmon Amɨn Dakon Monji amɨn da abɨdaŋ uwal da kɨsiron yɨpba tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋatdaŋ.”
40026003	Uŋun bɨsapmon mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae Israel dakon kɨla amɨn uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn Kaiapas uŋun da yutnon muwukgwit.
40026004	Muwugek Yesu ni kosiron da pasɨlek abɨdaŋ aŋatno kɨmotjak uŋun dakon gen yawit.
40026005	Yaŋ yaŋek yawit, “Telagɨ bɨsap madepmon dɨma abɨdoneŋ. Yaŋ aneŋ kaŋ, mɨŋat amɨnyokon pɨdok pɨdok noman tokdɨsak.”
40026006	Yesu Betani kokupmon amɨn kɨnda mani Saimon uŋun da yutnon yɨkgɨt. (Saimon uŋun kalɨp wuda tebani toŋ egɨpgut.)
40026007	Yesu jap noknok tamokon yɨgakwan mɨŋat kɨnda pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi abɨdaŋ awɨŋ Yesu da busuŋon tagalgɨt. (Uŋun pakbi yumaŋ nogɨ wukwisi ae tɨbɨrɨ uŋun tɨpnaŋ wasaŋbi.)
40026008	Yaŋ aban paŋdet kabɨni da kaŋek burɨ yokwi taŋba yaŋ yawit, “Nidosi aŋek pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi uŋun yumsi tagaldak?
40026009	Amɨn da yubam tam, moneŋ madepsi tɨmɨk yoni mɨni amɨn do yomnom.”
40026010	Yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat on nido jɨgɨ ɨmaŋ? Mɨŋat on nak do yo tagɨsi asak.
40026011	Yoni mɨni amɨn ji gat bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ egɨpdaŋ, mani nak ji gat bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ dɨma egɨpdamaŋ.
40026012	On mɨŋat da mibɨltok gɨptɨmnokon pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi naŋ soŋ namɨŋek kɨmakbi tamokon nepni do aŋtagap asak.
40026013	Asisi dayɨsat, mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn da Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋek mɨŋat on da yo ak uŋun dakon gen bin kɨsi yoyɨŋakwa nandakdaŋ. Aŋakwa uŋun mɨŋat dakon man bini dɨma pasɨldɨsak.”
40026014	Uŋun bɨsapmon paŋdetni 12 kabɨkon da kɨnda mani Judas Iskariot uŋun da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨkon kɨgɨt.
40026015	Kɨŋ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yesu kɨsitjikon yɨpbo ninaŋ namni?” Yaŋban silwa moneŋ tabɨlɨ 30 yaŋ manjɨŋ ɨmgwit.
40026016	Ɨba wasaŋek Yesu kɨsitnikon yɨpjak do kosit wɨsɨgɨt.
40026017	Bret Yisni Mɨni Bɨlak wasok wasogɨkon paŋdetni da Yesukon kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin kɨŋ dukwan Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap paŋkosit aneŋ do nandɨsal?”
40026018	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kokup papmon kɨŋ amɨn kɨnda kokdaŋ. Kaŋek yaŋ iyɨni: Yoyɨŋdet da yaŋ yosok, Nak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun kwaŋ tosok. Nak gat paŋdet kabɨno gat gak da yutnon apno Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap noneŋ.”
40026019	Yaŋban paŋdetni da Yesu dakon gen guramɨgek kɨŋ Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap paŋkosit awit.
40026020	Yaŋ aŋek pɨlɨn taŋakwan Yesu gat paŋdetni 12 kabɨ gat yɨgek jap nawit.
40026021	Jap naŋ yɨgek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, jikon da kɨnda da uwal da kɨsiron nepdɨsak.”
40026022	Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni burɨ yokwi taŋba kaloŋ kaloŋ yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nak do dɨma yosol, ma?”
40026023	Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Kɨnda nak gat jap ɨdapmon kɨsitnit kaloŋɨ yɨpmaŋgamak, uŋun amɨn da nak uwalno da kɨsiron nepdɨsak.
40026024	Asi Piŋkop da papiakon gen mandabi uŋun da tɨlagon Amɨn Dakon Monji kɨmoron kɨkdɨsak. Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak amɨn, awa! Uŋun amɨn meŋi da dɨma aŋalagɨt tam tagɨ.”
40026025	Yaŋ yaŋban uwal da kɨsiron yɨpyɨp amɨn Judas da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, nak do dɨma yosol, ma?” Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Uŋun gak mani.”
40026026	Jap naŋ yɨgakwa Yesu da bret kɨnda abɨdaŋ, Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek, pudaŋ paŋdetni do yomgut. Yomɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Pabɨdaŋek noni, on nak dakon gɨptɨm tɨmno.”
40026027	Yaŋ yaŋek wain kɨnam abɨdaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek yomɨŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji kɨsi da noni.
40026028	On yawino. Piŋkop gat amɨn gat saŋbek saŋbek abi uŋun aŋteban asak. Amɨn morapmɨ dakon dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yom do parekdat.
40026029	Nak asisi dayɨsat, nak wain ae dɨma naŋek egɨ wɨgɨ Datno da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan don ji gat wain kalugɨ noneŋ.”
40026030	Yaŋ yaŋban kap kɨnda yaŋek yomakon pɨgek Ɨleŋ Olipmon wɨgɨwit.
40026031	Ɨleŋ Olipmon wɨgek Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Sipsip dakon kɨla amɨn aŋakgo kɨmagakwan sipsip bɨrapmɨgɨ iyɨ iyɨ kɨkdaŋ.’ Gen uŋun da arɨpmon abɨsok kalbi yo morap nagon noman taŋakwa pɨndagek ji manji namdaŋ.
40026032	Mani kɨmoron da pɨdaŋek nak da kalɨp Galili mɨktɨmon mibɨltaŋ damɨŋek kɨkeŋ.”
40026033	Yaŋban Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn dɨwarɨ da manji gamɨŋakwa nak yaŋ dɨmasi abeŋ.”
40026034	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Asisi gayɨsat, abɨsok kalbi pup gen dɨma yaŋakwan gak da nak do ‘Uŋun amɨn dɨma nandaŋ ɨmɨsat’ yaŋ kosit kapbɨ yokdɨsal.”
40026035	Yaŋban Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Uwal da gɨkba kɨmagaki nakyo kɨsi nɨkba kɨmokgeŋ do ani kaŋ, gak do wasɨp dɨma yokeŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdet kabɨ dɨwarɨ kɨsi yaŋ gɨn yawit.
40026036	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda mani Getsemani uŋudon kɨwit. Kɨŋ altaŋek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji ɨdon yɨgakwa nak asɨdon kɨŋ bɨsit akeŋ.”
40026037	Yaŋ yaŋek Pita gat ae Sebedi dakon monjɨ yat tɨmɨkban kɨwit. Kɨŋ burɨkon jɨgɨ madepsi nandaŋek
40026038	yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Butno jɨk taŋakwan kɨmot kɨmotno noman taŋ naban nandɨsat. Do ji nak gat kɨsi ɨdon Piŋkop do nandaŋek egɨpneŋ.”
40026039	Yaŋ yaŋek tɨmɨsok dɨ kɨŋek mɨktɨmon maŋ pagek bɨsit yaŋ agɨt, “O Dat, yo morap tagɨ aki. Do nak da kwenon jɨgɨ apdɨsak uŋun kukwoki do nandɨsat. Mani nak dakon nandak nandak dɨma yolgi. Gak dakon galak tok niaŋsi tosok uŋun dagɨn noman toni.”
40026040	Yaŋ yaŋek tobɨl paŋdetni kapbɨ egɨpgwiron kɨŋ pɨndakban dɨpmɨn pakgwit pɨndagek Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ji nak gat awa kaloŋɨ da arɨpmon gɨn Piŋkop do nandaŋek dɨma egɨpneŋ?
40026041	Ji teban taŋek bɨsit aŋek egɨpni. Yaŋ aŋek egɨpni kaŋ, paŋkewalon arɨpmɨ dɨma mokdaŋ. But da nak nol do galak tosok mani gɨp dakon tapmɨmni mɨni.”
40026042	Yaŋ yaŋek aeni tobɨl kɨŋ bɨsit yaŋ agɨt, “Datno, jɨgɨ pakeŋdosi nandɨsal kaŋ, tagɨ pakeŋ.”
40026043	Bɨsit aban dagaŋban abɨŋ pɨndakban paŋdetni dɨpmɨn do yokwisi aŋek aeni dɨpmɨn sigɨn pakgwit.
40026044	Yaŋ pɨndagek aeni tobɨl kɨŋ bɨsit mibɨltok agɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn agɨt.
40026045	Yaŋ aŋek tobɨl abɨŋ paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dɨpmɨn sigɨn pagek tapmɨm paŋ, ma? Bɨsap kɨlɨ abɨk. Amɨn Dakon Monji yokwi pakpak da kɨsiron kɨlɨ uŋun yɨpmaŋgaŋ.
40026046	Pɨdaŋba kɨno! Kabɨt, uwal da kɨsiron nepjak amɨn kɨlɨ abɨk.”
40026047	Yesu gen yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn paŋdetni 12 kabɨkon da kɨnda mani Judas altaŋ yomgut. Amɨn kabɨ madep emat agak sɨbani ae kɨndap kɨrɨŋni tɨmɨgek buŋon yolgwit. Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn gat da yabekba opgwit.
40026048	Uwal da kɨsiron yɨpyɨp amɨn da gen kɨnda kɨlɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda nak da mandaŋ noko kaŋ, uŋun amɨn naŋ tebai abɨdoni.”
40026049	Judas tepmɨ Yesukon kɨŋ altaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, kalbi tagɨsi!” Yaŋ iyɨŋek mandaŋ nagɨt.
40026050	Yaŋ aban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Not, yo ak do nandaŋek abɨl uŋun abi.” Yaŋ iyɨŋban emat amɨn da Yesu tebai abɨdawit.
40026051	Aba Yesu da kabɨkon nani kɨnda da emat agak sɨbani ɨlɨkban wɨŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon oman monjɨni mɨragɨ mandaŋ dagagɨt.
40026052	Aban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak emat agak sɨbago yɨgɨkon sɨmɨl. Emat agak sɨba pawɨlgaŋ amɨn uŋun emat agak sɨba da mandaŋ yoba kɨmokgoŋ.
40026053	Nak Datno arɨpmɨ tagɨ iyɨko uŋun da aŋelo 72 tausen yabekban abɨŋ nak tagɨ aŋpulugoni. Gak uŋun dɨma nandɨsal, ma?
40026054	Mani yaŋ abeŋ kaŋ, Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun niaŋon da bamɨ toŋ asak? Uwalno da yo yaŋsi aŋnamni do yosok.”
40026055	Yaŋ yaŋek uŋudon gɨn Yesu da amɨn kabɨ madep yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nak do kabo noknok kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋek emat agak sɨba ae kɨndap kɨrɨŋyo tɨmɨgek nak abɨdok do abeŋ, ma? Nak gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan ji gat egek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨm. Uŋun bɨsapmon nak abɨdok do dɨma nandawit.
40026056	Mani Piŋkop da papiakon kombɨ amɨn da gen mandawit yaŋ gɨn bamɨ noman tosok.” Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdet morapni Yesu yɨpmaŋek pasal kɨŋ mudawit.
40026057	Yesu abɨdawit amɨn uŋun Yesu abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn Kaiapas da yutnon aŋkɨwit. Uŋudon gen teban dakon yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat ae kɨla amɨn gat kɨsi muwukgwit.
40026058	Pita kagɨ kagɨsok da Yesu yol aŋkɨŋek, mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon yoma nagalgwan pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨkwan obip amɨn gat yɨgek Yesu yo niaŋsi aŋɨba kokeŋ yaŋ do pɨndak egɨpgut.
40026059	Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae gen kokwin amɨn kɨsi morap gat da yaŋ nandawit, amɨn dɨ yaŋ yomno abɨŋ Yesu top gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋek gulusuŋ agɨt yaŋ yaŋakwa aŋatno kɨmotjak yaŋ nandawit.
40026060	Mani amɨn morapmɨ yaŋ yoba abɨŋek top gen morapmɨ yawit, mani asi gulusuŋ kɨnda agɨt yaŋ dɨma kawit. Don amɨn bamorɨ da abɨŋ yaŋ yagɨmal,
40026061	“Nin da nandaŋapno Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak da Piŋkop dakon Telagɨ Yut Madep uŋun tuwɨlek gɨldat kapbɨ da butgwan ae wɨtjɨkeŋ.’ ”
40026062	Yaŋ yaŋakwal mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da pɨdaŋ agek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma yoyɨki? On amɨn morap gen yaŋ gaba niaŋ nandaŋ yomɨsal?”
40026063	Mani Yesu da gen kɨnda dɨma yagɨt. Yaŋ aban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da aeni iyɨgɨt, “Gak Piŋkop egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun da manon yaŋ teban tok aŋek gen bamɨsi yoki. Gak asi Kristo, Piŋkop dakon Monji bo dɨma? Kɨlɨ bamɨ ya!”
40026064	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen yosol uŋun bamɨ. Ji don kaŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji Tapmɨm Ami da amɨnsi tet do yɨkban kokdaŋ. Aŋek kaŋakwa kundukon gɨkwemon da apban kokdaŋ.”
40026065	Yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn burɨ wagɨl yokwi taŋban iyɨ dakon paba pɨgɨkni pudaŋek yagɨt, “Mibɨlni nandak do amɨn nido saŋbeŋek yoyɨno apni? Iyɨ Piŋkop kulabɨŋek ‘nak Piŋkop dakon Monji’ yaŋ yosok,
40026066	do ji da niaŋ aŋ ɨmneŋ do nandaŋ?” Yaŋban kɨsi morap da yawit, “Gulusuŋ asak, do si kɨmotjak.”
40026067	Yaŋ yaŋek dɨwarɨ da ɨlɨp sul ɨmɨŋek kɨsit da aŋakgwit. Ae dɨwarɨ da mogɨm kulbak aŋagek
40026068	yaŋ iyɨwit, “Kristo gak namɨn da gɨkdak? Kombɨ gen ya!”
40026069	Aŋakwa Pita uŋun yut da nagalgwan yɨgakwan mukwa sogok mibɨltok amɨn dakon oman mɨŋatjok kɨnda da abɨŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Yesu Galili amɨn gat kɨsi egɨpgwit.”
40026070	Yaŋban Pita da wasɨp yaŋek yagɨt, “Gak da gen uŋun yosol nak dɨma nandɨsat.”
40026071	Yaŋ yaŋek wigaron pɨgakwan oman mɨŋat kɨnda Pita kaŋek amɨn uŋudon akgwit yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn uŋun Yesu Nasaret amɨn gat kɨsi egɨpgwit.”
40026072	Yaŋ yaŋban Pita aeni geni aŋteban aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Asisi, nak uŋun amɨn dɨmasi nandaŋ ɨmɨsat!”
40026073	Tɨmɨsok dɨ egek amɨn kapmatjok akgwit uŋun da kɨŋ Pita yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak dakon tek nandano asi gak uŋun amɨn kabɨ dakon kokup ɨsalni kɨnda yaŋ asak, do gak uŋun da kabɨkon nani yaŋ nandamaŋ.”
40026074	Yaŋ yaŋba Pita da tebaisi yaŋek yagɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, amɨn uŋun yoŋ nak dɨmasi nandaŋ ɨmɨsat. Top yosot kaŋ, Piŋkop da nak tagɨ aŋupbal asak!” Yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn pup gen yagɨt.
40026075	Yaŋban nandaŋek Pita Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun do burɨ pɨsagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ yagɨt: “Pup da gen dɨma yaŋakwan gak da nak do wasɨp yaŋbɨ kosit kapbɨ akdɨsak.” Pita da gen uŋun do burɨ pɨsaŋban waŋga pɨgɨ kunam madepsi takgɨt.
40027001	Wɨsawɨsa do mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn gat da muwugek Yesu aŋakba kɨmotjak do yaŋ dagok awit.
40027002	Aŋek Yesu kɨsirɨ wamaŋ aŋkɨ gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn Pailat da kɨsiron yɨpgwit.
40027003	Judas Yesu uwal da kɨsiron yɨpgut amɨn kaŋban Yesu kɨmotjak do yaŋ dagok aŋakwa mabisi at yaŋ nandagɨt. Aŋek nandak nandakni kulabɨk aŋek silwa moneŋ 30 yaŋ tɨmɨkgɨt uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn gat do aeni paŋtobɨl yomgut.
40027004	Yomɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak suŋsi aŋek amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨnda uwal da kɨsiron yɨpmat. Uŋun ji da aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak.” Yoyɨŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Uŋun nin dakon yo dɨma. Uŋun gak dakon yo gɨn.”
40027005	Yaŋ yaŋba Judas silwa moneŋ uŋun telagɨ yut da nagalgwan dapban pɨgakwa kɨŋ iyɨ tɨpgut.
40027006	Aban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ da silwa moneŋ uŋun tɨmɨgek yaŋ yawit, “Moneŋ on yawi dakon tomni. Do telagɨ yut dakon moneŋ gat kɨsi yopneŋ kaŋ, gen tebanin yapdamaŋ.”
40027007	Yaŋ yaŋek uŋun moneŋ baŋ mɨktɨm kwoba wasawit mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda yumaŋ nawit. Yumaŋ naŋek amɨn dubagɨkon da abɨŋ kɨmokgoŋ uŋun dakon amɨn kɨmakba yopyop tamo kɨnda wasawit.
40027008	Yaŋ awit do uŋun mɨktɨm tɨm uŋun do Yawi Mɨktɨm yaŋ yawit da yoŋ.
40027009	Yaŋ aŋakwa kombɨ amɨn Jeremaia da gen mandagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ, “Israel amɨn da uŋun amɨn yumaŋ noni do silwa moneŋ 30 baŋ tomni yomgwit.
40027010	Yaŋ aŋek Amɨn Tagɨ da nayɨgɨt, uŋun da tɨlagon uŋun moneŋ baŋ mɨktɨm kwoba wasawit mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda yumaŋ nawit.”
40027011	Yesu gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn Pailat da ɨŋamon agakwan Pailat da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep, ma?” Yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yagɨt, “Yosol uŋun mani.”
40027012	Yaŋ yaŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn dɨwarɨ gat da gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋba gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma yoyɨgɨt.
40027013	Yaŋ aban Pailat da aeni iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn on da gak wasok yokwi agɨl do gen morapmɨ yaŋ gamaŋ. Uŋun dɨma nandɨsal, ma?”
40027014	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨsok kɨnda dɨmasi yaŋakwan Pailat da Yesu do nandaban ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
40027015	Bɨlagɨ bɨlagɨ Yapyap Bɨlak bɨsapmon gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn da wasok kɨnda yaŋ agɨt. Mɨŋat amɨnyo da amɨn kɨnda dam tebanon yɨkdak uŋun mani yaŋakwa, Pailat da pulugaŋ yopban kɨŋ kɨŋ awit.
40027016	Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn yokwisi kɨnda dam tebanon yɨkgɨt, mani Barabas.
40027017	-
40027018	Amɨn abɨŋ muwugakwa Pailat da amɨn da Yesu do nandaba yokwi taŋban top yaŋek gen pikon yɨpgwit yaŋ nandagɨt. Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu aŋkutnaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dakon galaktok namɨn naŋ pulugaŋ yɨpbo jikon opjak, Barabas do nandaŋ bo Yesu mani kɨnda Kristo yaŋ yoŋ uŋun naŋ?”
40027019	Yaŋ yaŋek Pailat gen kokwin tamokon yɨgakwan mɨŋatni da gen kɨnda yaŋ yɨpban apgut, “Nak uŋun amɨn kalbi dɨpmɨnon kat, do jɨgɨsi nandɨsat. Uŋun amɨn kɨlegɨsi, do gak yo kɨnda dɨmasi aŋ ɨbi.”
40027020	Mani mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn gat da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep burɨ sugaŋek yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ji Pailat da Barabas naŋ pulugaŋek Yesu naŋ aŋakban kɨmotjak do iyɨni.”
40027021	Yaŋba Pailat da aeni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dakon galaktok on amɨn bamoron baŋ namɨn naŋ pulugaŋ yɨpbo kɨsak do nandaŋ?” Yoyɨŋban “Barabas naŋ” yaŋ yawit.
40027022	Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yesu, mani kɨnda Kristo yaŋ yoŋ, uŋun do ninaŋ aŋ ɨbeŋ?” Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn kɨsi da yaŋ yawit, “Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak!”
40027023	Yaŋba Pailat da yoyɨgɨt, “Mibɨlɨ nido? Ni gulusuŋ naŋ agɨt?” Yaŋban mibɨltok yawit si yapmaŋek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak!”
40027024	Yaŋba Pailat da iyɨ yaŋ nandagɨt, “Gen yoko dɨma nandaŋek emat madepsi akdaŋ.” Yaŋ nandaŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep da dabɨlon kɨsitni pakbikon sugaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn kɨmakban nak da dɨwarɨ dɨma pakeŋ, ji da pani.”
40027025	Yaŋban amɨn kɨsi da geni yaŋ aŋtobɨl ɨmgwit, “Nin gat ae mɨŋat monjɨyonin gat da kɨmotjak dakon kobogɨ tagɨ paneŋ.”
40027026	Yaŋ yaŋba Pailat da Barabas pulugaŋ yɨpban mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyokon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan emat amɨn yoyɨŋban Yesu baljawit. Aba don tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak do yoyɨgɨt.
40027027	Gapman dakon emat amɨn da Yesu abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ gapman dakon yut madepmon wɨgakwa emat amɨn dɨwarɨ kɨsi abɨŋ Yesu aŋgwasɨŋek akgwit.
40027028	Aŋek Yesu iyɨ dakon ɨmalni ɨlɨgek kɨla amɨn madep da ɨmal gami dubak paŋ uŋuden kɨnda paŋ ɨmgwit.
40027029	Yaŋ aŋek nap kelɨ toŋ naŋ kɨla amɨn madep dakon pelɨt yombem kɨnda wasaŋ busuŋɨkon aba pɨgɨgɨt. Aba pɨgakwan kɨndap kɨrɨŋ kɨnda kɨsirɨ amɨnsi tet do yɨpmaŋ ɨmgwit. Yɨpmaŋ ɨmɨŋek gawak ɨmɨŋek topmon da man madep ɨmɨŋek gen yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gɨldat tagɨ, Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep!”
40027030	Aŋek ɨlɨp sul ɨmɨŋek kɨndap kɨrɨŋ kɨsirɨkon yɨpgwit uŋun gwayeŋ busuŋɨkon kosirɨ morapmɨ baljawit.
40027031	Aŋek topmon da man madep ɨmɨŋ mudaŋek ɨmal gami ɨlɨgek iyɨ dakon pabɨ pɨgɨk paŋ ɨmgwit. Paŋ ɨmɨŋek tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak do ɨlɨk aŋaŋ kɨwit.
40027032	Kosiron kɨŋek emat amɨn da Sairini kokupmon amɨn kɨnda kawit, mani Saimon. Uŋun tebai iyɨŋba Yesu dakon tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨkban kɨwit.
40027033	Kɨŋ mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda mani Golgata uŋudon altawit. (Golgata dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun Busuŋ Kɨdat Ɨleŋ.)
40027034	Kɨŋ altaŋek wain gat ae pakbi ɨsɨpmɨ kɨnda gat ɨktagɨlek ɨmɨŋba naŋ nandat aŋek nok do kurak tagɨt.
40027035	Aŋakwan tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋagek emat amɨn da satu wasok aŋek ɨmalni kokwinɨk tɨmɨkgwit.
40027036	Satu wasok aba mudaŋban mɨktɨmon pabɨŋ yɨgek kɨla aŋek kaŋ egɨpgwit.
40027037	Kwen busuŋɨkon mibɨlɨ nido aŋakgwit uŋun dakon but pɨso yaŋ mandawit, ON YESU, JUDA AMƗN DAKON KƗLA AMƗN MADEPNI
40027038	Kabo noknok bamorɨ Yesu gat kɨsi dapgwit. Kɨnda amɨnsi tetdo, ae kɨnda gwandeŋ tet do tɨlak kɨndapmon dapmaŋ dapmaŋ awit.
40027039	Amɨn kɨŋ ap awit uŋun da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek wunda kwalkwal aŋek yaŋ iyɨwit,
40027040	“Gak Telagɨ Yut Madep tuwɨlek gɨldat kapbɨ da butgwan ae wɨtjɨk do yagɨl, do gɨptɨmgo aŋkutnoki! Gak asi Piŋkop dakon Monji egɨsalon tɨlak kɨndapmon da pɨ!”
40027041	Yaŋ yaŋba mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat ae kɨla amɨn gat uŋun kɨsi yaŋ gɨn jɨgɨlak iyɨŋek yawit,
40027042	“Amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋpulugagɨt da nido iyɨ aŋpulugok do aŋtɨdok asak? On Israel amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madepni ma! Kaŋ tɨlak kɨndapmon da pɨŋban kaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmneŋ.
40027043	Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ yosok, ‘Nak Piŋkop dakon Monji egɨsat.’ Piŋkop da Monji aŋpulugok do nandɨsak kaŋ, tagɨ aŋpulugosak.”
40027044	Uŋudeŋ gɨn kabo noknok bamot terɨ terɨ dapbi uŋunyo kɨsi yaŋba yokwi tok yaŋ gɨn agɨmal.
40027045	Gɨldat binap 12 kilok mɨktɨm kɨsi pɨlɨn tuk aŋakwan kɨŋ pɨlɨndo 3 kilok agɨt.
40027046	kilok aŋakwan Yesu da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” Gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yaŋ: “Piŋkopno, Piŋkopno, nido nepmaŋ dekdal?”
40027047	Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn dɨwarɨ kapmatjok akgwit uŋun nandaŋek yawit, “Nandaŋ, uŋun Elaija do yaŋ ɨmɨsak.”
40027048	Yaŋba uŋudon gɨn amɨn kɨnda tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨŋ yo kɨnda gugɨdan yombem jol dɨwaron wamaŋ wain gat ae pakbi ɨsɨpmɨ gat uŋungwan sɨbɨŋek Yesu da nosak do aŋenak ɨmgut.
40027049	Aŋakwan dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Yum kaŋba koneŋ. Elaija da abɨŋ aŋpulugaŋban koneŋ bo dɨma?”
40027050	Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu aeni yaŋ tɨdaŋek wupni yɨpban kɨŋakwan kɨmakgɨt.
40027051	Kɨmagakwan uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon yoma ɨmal uŋun kwen da sulugɨ pɨŋ mibɨlɨkon dagaŋek tɨmɨ bamorɨ agɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan mɨktɨm wudɨp aŋakwan tɨp madep morapmɨ da sulugɨwit.
40027052	Uŋun yo morap altaŋakwa amɨn kɨmakba yopmaŋgaŋ tamo wɨtdal kɨŋakwa Piŋkop dakon amɨn morapmɨ kalɨp kɨmakba yopbi uŋun pɨdawit.
40027053	Pɨdaŋ don Yesu da kɨmoron da pɨdaŋakwan telagɨ kokup papmon pukwa amɨn morapmɨ da pɨndakgwit.
40027054	Aŋakwa emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn gat ae emat amɨn Yesu do kaŋ egɨpgwit amɨn uŋun wudɨp ae yo morap altawit uŋun pɨndagek si pasalgwit. Pasalek yaŋsi yawit, “On amɨn asisi Piŋkop dakon Monji egɨpgut.”
40027055	Aŋakwa mɨŋat dɨwarɨ dubagɨsogon da agek yo uŋun pɨndakgwit. Yesu Galili mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋ abɨŋakwan uŋun mɨŋat kabɨ da yol awɨlek oman aŋ ɨmɨŋek agɨpgwit.
40027056	Uŋun kabɨkon kɨnda mani Maria, kokupni Makdala. Ae Maria ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda Jems gat Josep gat dakon meŋi. Ae Sebedi dakon monjɨ bamot uŋun dakon meŋi kɨsi akgwit.
40027057	Pɨlɨndo yoni morapmɨ amɨn kɨnda Arimatea kokupmon da apgut. Uŋun mani Josep. Uŋun Yesu dakon paŋdetni kɨnda.
40027058	Josep uŋun Pailaron kɨŋ Yesu dakon bumjotni abɨdok do iyɨgɨt. Iyɨŋban emat amɨni yoyɨŋban bumjotni Josep do ɨmgwit.
40027059	Ɨmɨŋba abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ ɨmal garagɨ mɨni kɨnda naŋ wamaŋek
40027060	aŋkɨ iyɨ dakon tɨp kɨnam amɨn kɨmakbi do kaluk pasɨŋbi uŋungwan aŋkɨ yɨpgut. Yɨpmaŋek tɨp madepsi kɨnda aŋtobɨlban abɨŋ yoma sopmaŋakwan yɨpmaŋ kɨgɨt.
40027061	Maria Makdala kokupmon nani gat ae Maria kɨnda gat tɨp kɨnam da kapmatjok yɨgek yo agɨt uŋun nomansi kagɨmal.
40027062	Sabat bɨsap do tagap tok aŋ mudaŋek wɨsa dagokdo mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae Parisi amɨn gat Pailaron kɨwit.
40027063	Kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Top amɨn si egɨpgut bɨsapmon gen kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Gɨldat kapbɨ mudaŋakwa kɨmoron da pɨdokeŋ’ yaŋ yagɨt.
40027064	Yaŋ yagɨt, do gak obip amɨngo tebaisi yoyɨŋbɨ tɨp kɨnam dakon kɨla tebaisi aŋakwa wɨgɨ gɨldat kapbɨ mudoni. Yaŋ dɨma ani kaŋ, paŋdetni da abɨŋ bumjotni kabo aŋkɨsɨbɨŋ aŋkɨŋek Yesu kɨlɨ pɨdak yaŋ amɨn yoyɨkdaŋ. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, mibɨltok iyɨ do top gen yagɨt uŋun yapmaŋek top gen yokdaŋ uŋun da yo yokwisi kɨnda akdɨsak.”
40027065	Yaŋba Pailat da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji obip amɨn tɨmɨkba kɨŋ tɨp kɨnam uŋun niaŋsi aŋek kɨlani ak do nandaŋ uŋun da tɨlagon yoyɨŋba ani.”
40027066	Yaŋ yoyɨŋban tɨp kɨnamon kɨŋ tɨp madep yoma kaga sopguron tɨlak kɨnda dɨma abɨdoni do yɨpgwit. Yɨpmaŋek obip amɨn da kɨlani tebaisi ani do yopba akgwit.
40028001	Sabat bɨsap mudaŋakwan pakgwit da Sonda wɨsa dagokdo Maria Makdala kokupmon nani gat ae Maria kɨnda gat tɨp kɨnam kok do kɨgɨmal.
40028002	Kɨŋakwal uŋudon gɨn wudɨp madep agɨt. Aŋakwan Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo kɨnda Kwen Kokupmon da pɨŋ tɨp madep uŋun aŋtobɨlban kɨŋakwan kwenikon yɨkgɨt.
40028003	Aŋelo uŋun mal da yaŋ teŋteŋaŋakwan ɨmalni uŋun gɨk sitnaŋ yombem kwakwagɨsi agɨt.
40028004	Obip amɨn uŋun kaŋ pasal nɨmnɨmɨk maŋ pagek kɨmakbi yombem awit.
40028005	Yaŋ aŋakwa aŋelo da mɨŋat bamot yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil dɨma pasoljil. Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakbi naŋ wusɨk do abamal yaŋ nandɨsat.
40028006	Yesu yagɨt da arɨpmon Piŋkop da kɨlɨ aban pɨdak. Ɨdon dɨma egɨsak. Abɨŋ tamoni do konjil.
40028007	Jil tepmɨsi kɨŋ paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨnjil, ‘Uŋun Piŋkop da kɨmoron naŋ kɨlɨ aban pɨdak. Mibɨltaŋ damɨŋek Galili mɨktɨmon kɨk, do uŋudon kɨŋ koni.’ Nak gen on dayɨk do pɨt.”
40028008	Yaŋ yoyɨŋban mɨŋat bamot uŋun pasalgɨmal, mani kɨsɨk kɨsɨk nandaŋek tɨmtɨm yaŋek paŋdet kabɨni gen uŋun yoyɨk do kɨgɨmal.
40028009	Kɨŋakwal Yesu gat domdom aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Wɨsa dagokdo tagɨsi.” Yaŋ yoyɨŋban kandapmɨ abɨdaŋek gawak ɨmgumal.
40028010	Aŋakwal Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨma pasoljil. Jil kɨŋ notnoni kabɨ yoyɨŋbal Galili kɨŋ uŋudon nandani.”
40028011	Mɨŋat bamot kɨŋakwal obip amɨn dɨwarɨ tɨp kɨnam dakon kɨla awit uŋun da kokup papmon kɨŋ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ yo morap altawit uŋun dakon gen morap yoyɨŋ mudawit.
40028012	Yoyɨŋba mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat ae kɨla amɨn gat muwugek niaŋ ano kɨlek tosak yaŋ do gen paŋkosit awit. Aŋek obip amɨn do moneŋ madepsi yomɨŋek
40028013	yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ji yaŋsi yoni, ‘Nin kalbi pak ɨŋtaŋapno paŋdetni da abɨŋ bumjotni kabo aŋkɨsɨbeŋ.’
40028014	Gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn da uŋun dakon geni nandɨsak kaŋ, nin da iyɨno burɨ maŋakwan jikon jɨgɨ kɨnda dɨma tosak.”
40028015	Yaŋ yoyɨŋba obip amɨn moneŋ tɨmɨgek geni guramɨkgwit. Gen uŋun Juda amɨn da yaŋ aŋ ɨreŋ aba abɨsokyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn yoŋ.
40028016	Paŋdetni 11 kabɨ Galili mɨktɨmon kɨŋ, Yesu da kabap kɨnda uŋudon wɨgɨni do kɨlɨ yoyɨgɨt uŋudon wɨgɨwit.
40028017	Wɨgɨ Yesu kaŋek gawak ɨmgwit, mani dɨwarɨ da but bamot awit.
40028018	Aŋakwa Yesu da paŋdet kabɨnikon kɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da yo morap Kwen Kokupmon ae mɨktɨmon kɨla abeŋ dakon pi nak do yaŋ mudaŋ namgut.
40028019	Uŋun do ji mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨŋ mɨŋat amɨn morapyo paŋpulugaŋba nak dakon paŋdet kabɨno dagoni. Aŋek Dat ae Monji ae Telagɨ Wup uŋun da manon telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomni.
40028020	Nak da gen dayɨŋ dolɨgɨm uŋun kɨsisi guramɨtni do yoyɨŋdetni. Nandani, nak ji gat gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ egapno mɨktɨm dakon bɨsap mudosak.”
41001001	Yesu Kristo, Piŋkop dakon Monji, uŋun dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi ɨdon da wasosok.
41001002	Kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da gen yaŋ mandagɨt: “Nandani, geno yaŋ teŋteŋosak do amɨn kɨnda yabekgo uŋun da mibɨltaŋ gamjak. Aŋek kositgo aŋnoman asak.
