41001003	Mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yosok, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ dakon kosit aŋdɨmdɨm ani, kositni pasɨŋ aŋmɨlɨp ani.’ ”
41001004	Gen uŋun da tɨlagon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn Jon da mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon kɨŋ altagɨt. Altaŋek but tobɨl aŋek telagɨ pakbi soŋakwa Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yomjak do yoyɨgɨt.
41001005	Aŋakwan Judia mɨktɨmon ae Jerusalem kokup papmon egɨpgwit amɨn Jonon kɨwit. Yokwini yaŋkwok aŋakwa Jodan Pakbikon telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgut.
41001006	Jon da ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk paŋ egɨpgut uŋun bɨt madep kɨnda mani kamel uŋun dakon daŋgwani baŋ wasaŋbi. Aŋek bɨt gɨp kɨnda bobaŋ napmɨ do wamgut. Japni uŋun pɨlak pɨlak ae kabaŋ kok.
41001007	Gen yaŋ yagɨt: “Amɨn kɨnda nak da manjikon apdɨsak. Uŋun dakon tapmɨm da nak dakon tapmɨm yapmaŋdak. Nak oman monjɨni dakon pɨŋbinisi egɨsat, do kandap gwɨlni dakon nap pabɨŋ yɨgek tagɨ dɨma wɨtdalgeŋ.
41001008	Nak pakbisi baŋ telagɨ pakbi soŋ damɨsat, mani uŋun da Telagɨ Wup soŋ damdɨsak.”
41001009	Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu Nasaret kokup Galili Provins yɨpmaŋek apgut. Apban Jon da Jodan Pakbikon telagɨ pakbi soŋ ɨmgut.
41001010	Aban pakbikon da wɨŋek wɨŋek Yesu yaŋ kagɨt: Kundu wɨtdal kɨŋakwan Telagɨ Wup kɨnarɨm da mɨktɨmon paŋ uŋun da tɨlak iyɨkon pɨgɨt.
41001011	Aŋakwan Kwen Kokupgwan da gen kɨnda yaŋ altagɨt: “Gak Monjɨno. Butdasi galak taŋ gamɨsat. Butno gak do tagɨsi asak.”
41001012	Uŋudon gɨn Wup da Yesu yabekban mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon kɨgɨt.
41001013	Kɨŋ uŋudon gɨldat 40 egakwan Sunduk da aŋkewalgɨt. Bɨt kɨlapyo da bɨkbɨgon egakwan aŋelo da aŋpulugawit.
41001014	Jon dam teban yutnon yɨpba yɨgakwan Yesu Galili Provinskon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋ Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek yaŋ yagɨt,
41001015	“Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Akdɨsak uŋun dakon bɨsap kwaŋ tosok. Uŋun do ji but tobɨl aŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi uŋun do nandaŋ gadani.”
41001016	Yesu da Galili Pakbi Ɨdap kɨdɨpmɨŋ kɨŋek Saimon gat padɨge Andru gat pɨndakgɨt. Uŋun amɨn bamot tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni pakbi ɨdapmon mabal pɨgakwan egɨpgumal. Pini uŋun tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl do pi agak amɨn bamot.
41001017	Uŋun amɨn bamot pɨndagek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nolgɨl, aŋakwal amɨn tɨmɨt tɨmɨt dakon kosit dolɨko.”
41001018	Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni yopmaŋek Yesu yolgɨmal.
41001019	Yesu da tɨmɨsok dɨ kɨŋek Jems, Sebedi dakon monji gat padɨge Jon gat pɨndakgɨt. Uŋun bamot boron yɨgek tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni bɨsawɨk paŋmɨlɨp aŋyo aŋakwal pɨndakgɨt.
41001020	Pɨndagek uŋudon gɨn yaŋ yoban nandaŋek datni Sebedi gat pi amɨni gat boron si yɨgakwa Yesu yolgɨmal.
41001021	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Kapaneam kokupmon kɨwit. Kɨŋ altaŋek Sabat bɨsapmon Yesu da Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgek Piŋkop gen yoyɨgɨt.
41001022	Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da tɨlagon dɨma yagɨt, amɨn mani toŋ da tɨlagon yagɨt, do amɨn da Piŋkop gen yogokni do nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
41001023	Aŋakwan uŋudon gɨn koŋni toŋ amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt,
41001024	“Yesu, Nasaret amɨn, gak nibaŋ aŋnim do nandɨsal? Nin paŋupbal ak do abɨl? Nak nandaŋ gamɨsat, gak Piŋkop Dakon Telagɨ Amɨni.”
41001025	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da gen tebaisi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen dɨma yaŋek amɨn on yɨpmaŋ det!”
41001026	Yaŋban koŋ da amɨn uŋun ukwayɨgek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yɨpmaŋ degek wɨŋ kɨgɨt.
41001027	Wɨŋ kɨŋakwan amɨn da uŋun kaŋek wurɨpdagek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Mao, uŋun ni yo kɨnda da altosok? On amɨn gen ŋwakŋwarɨsi yosok. Amɨn mani toŋ da tɨlagon yosok. Koŋ gen yoyɨŋban geni guramɨkgaŋ.”
41001028	Yaŋ yaŋakwa man bini da tepmɨsi ɨreŋ taŋek Galili Provins arɨpmɨsi agɨt.
41001029	Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon da pɨŋek uŋudon gɨn Jems gat Jon gat tɨmɨkban, Saimon gat Andru gat uŋun da yutnon wɨgɨwit.
41001030	Uŋun yutnon Saimon yopmi gɨptɨmɨ kɨndapmɨ soŋakwan sot aŋek pakgɨt. Uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ
41001031	iyɨŋba Yesu kɨŋ kɨsitnikon abɨdaŋek ɨlɨkban pɨdagɨt. Yaŋ aban sotni yɨpmaŋakwan jap noni do oman agɨt.
41001032	Gɨldat pɨgakwan pɨlɨndo sot amɨn gat koŋni toŋ amɨn gat kɨsisi Yesukon paŋpaŋ apgwit.
41001033	Aŋek kokup amɨn kɨsi morap yut uŋun da yomakon muwukgwit.
41001034	Muwugakwa Yesu da amɨn morapmɨsi sot mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ awit uŋun paŋmɨlɨp agɨt. Aŋek koŋni toŋ amɨn morapmɨ koŋni yol yomgut. Aŋek koŋ uŋun nandaŋ ɨmgwit, do yaŋsop aŋyomgut.
41001035	Wɨsa dɨma dagaŋakwan Yesu pɨlisisok pɨdaŋ yut yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon paŋkɨ egek bɨsit pi agɨt.
41001036	Aŋakwan Saimon gat notni kabɨ gat Yesu wɨsɨŋek apgwit.
41001037	Abɨŋ aŋalon aŋek iyɨwit, “Amɨn morapmɨsi da gak wɨsaŋ.”
41001038	Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak uŋun amɨn kabɨ dogɨn dɨma pɨgɨm. Do nin kokup taŋ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋudon kɨŋek Piŋkop gen yoyɨkeŋ. Nak pi uŋun ak do pɨgɨm.”
41001039	Yaŋ yaŋek Galili Provinskon dukwan dukwan kɨsi agek Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut morapmon Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋek koŋ yol yomɨŋek agɨpgut.
41001040	Amɨn wuda tebani toŋ kɨnda da uŋudon kɨŋek ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek bɨsit tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek tokeŋ do nandɨsal kaŋ, tagɨ aŋmɨlɨp abɨ kɨlek tokeŋ.”
41001041	Yaŋban Yesu da uŋun do bupmɨ nandaŋek kɨsitni amɨn uŋun da kwenon wɨtjɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨlek toki do nandɨsat, do pasɨl gamni!”
41001042	Yaŋ iyɨŋban uŋudon gɨn wudani kɨbɨdaŋakwa gɨptɨmni kɨlek tagɨt.
41001043	Kɨlek taŋban uŋudon gɨn Yesu da amɨn uŋun yabegek gen tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
41001044	“Gak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ amɨn dɨma yoyɨki. Aŋek mukwa sogok amɨnon kɨŋek gɨptɨmgo yolɨki. Aŋek Moses da yagɨt uŋun da tɨlagon paret aŋaki amɨn da asi kɨlek tal yaŋ gandani.”
41001045	Yaŋ yaŋban yum kaŋek kɨŋ gen bin yaŋ aŋɨreŋ agɨt. Uŋun do aŋek Yesu kokup papmon noman kɨsak do nandaban tɨdok tagɨt. Kokup ɨleŋɨ ɨleŋɨkon gɨn agakwan amɨn morap dukwan dukwan egɨpgwit Yesukon apgwit.
41002001	Yesu gɨldat dɨ egɨ aeni Kapaneam kokupmon kɨŋek yutnikon wɨgakwan kokup amɨn da abapni dakon gen nandawit.
41002002	Nandaŋek morapmɨsi da yutnon muwuk tugaŋek dɨwarɨ yomakon yɨk tugaŋba Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨgɨt.
41002003	Yoyɨŋakwan amɨn kabɨ kɨnda apgwiron da amɨn 4 kabɨ da amɨn kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi kɨnda wamaŋ uŋudon aŋapgwit.
41002004	Aŋek yutnon awɨgɨ Yesu da buron yɨpdo aŋek amɨnon kwa tɨdaŋba yut kwenon awɨgɨwit. Awɨgek Yesu da si yɨkgɨt da kwenon yut tuwɨlba kosit pɨsaŋakwan uŋudon da amɨn uŋun wayɨgon pagakwan nap aŋyawot aŋakwa pɨgɨgɨt.
41002005	Yaŋ aŋakwa Yesu da nandaŋ gadatni kaŋek amɨn kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Monjɨ, dɨwarɨgo yopmaŋ gamɨsat.”
41002006	Yaŋ yaŋban gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋudon yɨkgwit uŋun da burɨ da yaŋ nandawit,
41002007	“Ma, amɨn on ni gen naŋ yosok? On Piŋkop kulabɨsak on! Namɨn amɨn da dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt pi asak? Uŋun pi Piŋkop dagɨn agagɨ!”
41002008	Yaŋ nandaŋakwa Yesu uŋun burɨkon da pɨndak nandaŋ yomɨŋ mudaŋek yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido butjikon da nandak nandak uŋun nandaŋ namaŋ?
41002009	Jit da tagapmɨ, amɨn kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi yaŋ iyɨkdo, ‘Dɨwarɨgo wɨrɨrɨk gamɨsat’, bo uŋudeŋ iyɨkdo, ‘Pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek pɨlɨk bamok aki’?
41002010	Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun mɨktɨmon dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt dakon pi asak do yaŋ mudaŋ ɨbi yaŋ nandaba pɨsosak do on amɨn aŋmɨlɨp abeŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
41002011	“Nak gayɨsat, pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek yutgokon kɨ.”
41002012	Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn amɨn morapmɨ da dabɨlon yalɨŋ potni tɨmɨgek abɨgɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan amɨn kawit uŋun da tamtam yaŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yawit, “Yo kalugɨsi altaŋban komaŋ!”
41002013	Yesu yaŋ aŋek aeni pakbi ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨgakwan amɨn morapmɨ yol aŋaŋ uŋudon kwa Piŋkop gen yoyɨgɨt.
41002014	Aŋek uŋudon da kɨŋek Liwai, Alpius dakon monji, takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt yutnikon yɨgakwan kagɨt. Kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nol.” Yaŋban Liwai pɨdaŋek Yesu yolgɨt.
41002015	Aŋakwan Yesu Liwai da yutnon kwan yɨgek jap nawit. Moneŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn ae yokwi pakpak amɨn morapmɨ Yesu gat paŋdetni gat jap nawit. (Uŋuden amɨn morapmɨsi da Yesu yolgwit.)
41002016	Uŋudon Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ yɨkgwit uŋun gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn. Uŋun da Yesu moneŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn gat ae yokwi pakpak amɨn gat kɨsi yɨgek jap naŋba kaŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ma, uŋun nido takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn gat ae yokwi pakpak amɨn gat kɨsi yɨgek jap noŋ? Uŋun tagɨ dɨma.”
41002017	Yaŋba Yesu da nandaŋek yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn sotni mɨni uŋun wuda wamagon dɨma kwaŋ. Amɨn sotni toŋ uŋun dagɨn wuda wamagon kwaŋ. Nak amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ ɨlɨt do dɨma opgum, yokwi pakpak yaŋ ɨlɨt do opgum.”
41002018	Jon dakon paŋdetni gat ae Parisi amɨn gat uŋun bɨsapmon Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egɨpgwit. Aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋun Yesukon kɨŋek yaŋ iyɨwit: “Jon dakon paŋdetni gat ae Parisi amɨn dakon paŋdetni gat uŋun Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egakwa gak dakon paŋdetgoni nido jap naŋek ekwaŋ?”
41002019	Iyɨŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Monjɨsok mɨŋat pak do aŋ uŋun bɨsapmon notni gat jap kelek tagɨ egɨpni? Dɨma. Monjɨsok egakwan jap kelek arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ.
41002020	Mani don monjɨ uŋun abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ kɨŋakwa notni uŋun bɨsapmon jap kelek ekwaŋ.
41002021	“Nin ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk garaŋɨ pudaŋkwikon ɨmal dɨwat kalugɨ pakbikon dɨma sugaŋbi kɨnda naŋ bupnom kaŋ, pakbikon sugono ɨmal dɨwat uŋun da garaŋɨ ɨlɨkban pudaŋ kɨ madepsi akdɨsak.
41002022	Ae amɨn kɨnda da wain kalugɨ tɨbɨrɨ meme gɨp baŋ wasaŋbi tɨbɨrɨ kalɨpmɨkon kolesak kaŋ uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Yaŋ asak kaŋ, wain da pukwa paptaŋ meme gɨp kɨrɨŋɨgakwa wain maŋ mudokdaŋ. Amɨn da wain kalugɨ meme gɨp kalugɨkon koleŋba wain gat meme gɨp gat kɨsi tagɨ tomal.”
41002023	Sabat kɨndakon Yesu gat paŋdetni gat uŋun wit pi kaga kɨndakon kɨwit. Kɨŋek paŋdetni da wit bamɨ dɨwarɨ jɨmɨk dagawit.
41002024	Aŋakwa Parisi amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Pɨndat, amɨn Sabat bɨsapmon nido gen teban yapmaŋek pi aŋ?”
41002025	Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Dewit ae amɨn kabɨni jap do aŋek yo awit uŋun ji manjɨŋ nandaŋyo awit bo dɨma?
41002026	Uŋun Abiata da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn egɨpgut bɨsapmon yaŋ awit. Piŋkop da yutnon wɨgek bret Piŋkop do parekbi uŋun tɨmɨk naŋek amɨn kabɨni kɨsi do yoban nawit. Bret uŋun amɨn ɨsalɨ da dɨma nok nogɨ, mukwa sogok amɨn dagɨn tagɨ nawit.”
41002027	Yaŋ yaŋek yagɨt, “Sabat bɨsap uŋun do nandaba yo madep aŋakwan amɨn kɨrɨŋɨk yomaŋ uŋun da tagɨ dɨma asak. Sabat bɨsap uŋun amɨn paŋpulugok do aŋek yɨpbi.
41002028	Yaŋdo, Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun Sabat bɨsap uŋun dakon Amɨn Tagɨni egɨsak.”
41003001	Yesu aeni bɨsap kɨnda gat Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgek amɨn kɨnda kɨsirɨ gɨreŋɨkbi kɨnda yɨkban kagɨt.
41003002	Uŋun da Sabat bɨsapmon amɨn paŋmɨlɨp aban kaŋek gen pikon yɨpneŋ yaŋon da amɨn dɨwarɨ Yesu tebai kaŋek yɨkgwit.
41003003	Aŋakwa Yesu da amɨn kɨsirɨ gɨreŋɨkbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn da ɨŋamon pɨdaŋ at.”
41003004	Pɨdaŋ agakwan mɨŋat amɨnyo yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Sabat bɨsap dakon gen teban da yokwi aneŋ do yosok? Bo tagɨ aneŋ do yosok? Amɨn paŋmɨlɨp aneŋ do yosok, bo dapba kɨmotni do yosok?” Yaŋban gen tamoni dɨma iyɨwit.
41003005	Yaŋ aŋakwa but tebani do butjap nandagɨt. Aŋek butni yokwi taŋban kobok tobɨl tobɨl aŋek pɨndagek amɨn kɨsirɨ gɨreŋɨkbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨsitgo aŋnɨŋnɨŋ a.” Yaŋban amɨn uŋun kɨsirɨ aŋnɨŋnɨŋ aban kɨlek tagɨt.
41003006	Aŋakwan uŋudon gɨn Parisi amɨn kɨŋek Erot dakon amɨn kabɨ uŋun gat muwugek “Niaŋ aŋek aŋatneŋ?” yaŋ do gen paŋkosit awit.
41003007	Yaŋ aŋakwa Yesu da paŋdetni tɨmɨkban pakbi ɨdapmon kɨwit. Kɨŋakwa Galili amɨn morapmɨsi da yolgwit. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, Judia mɨktɨmon da,
41003008	ae Jerusalem kokup papmon da, ae Idumea mɨktɨmon da, ae Jodan Pakbi usugap tet amɨn, ae Tair ae Saidon kokup tetgɨn do amɨn morapmɨ da Yesu dakon wasok agakni dakon gen bin nandaŋek apgwit.
41003009	Amɨn madepsi apgwit do Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn morapmɨsi do gɨtni gɨtni aba kaŋ bot kɨnda aŋnoman aba nak uŋudon mɨlkaŋ wɨgɨkeŋ.”
41003010	Yesu da sot wudani toŋ morapmɨ paŋmɨlɨp agɨt, uŋun do aŋek sot wudani toŋ amɨn Yesu ɨgayɨk do aŋek ukwayɨt ukwayɨt aŋek Yesu da buron kɨwit.
41003011	Kɨŋakwa koŋ uŋun Yesu kaŋek mɨktɨmon gawagek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Gak Piŋkop dakon Monji.”
41003012	Mani Yesu da mibɨlni dɨma yaŋ teŋteŋoni do yaŋsop tebaisi aŋyomgut.
41003013	Kɨlɨ Yesu pakbi ɨdap yɨpmaŋek ɨleŋ kɨndakon wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgek yabekbini dagoni do nandagɨt amɨn yoyɨŋban iyɨkon abɨŋ muwukgwit.
41003014	-
41003015	Amɨn 12 uŋun gat egɨpni do yabekbi kabɨni tɨmɨkgɨt. Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji yabekgo kɨŋ Piŋkop gen amɨn yoyɨni, ae koŋ yolni do yaŋ mudaŋ dabo koŋ yolni.”
41003016	Yabekbini 12 uŋun dakon mani yaŋ: Saimon (mani kalugɨ Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt),
41003017	ae Jems, Sebedi dakon monji, ae Jems dakon padɨge Jon (uŋun bamot mani Boanages yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ Kɨrɨrɨŋ Amɨn),
41003018	ae Andru, Pilip, Batolomiu, Matyu, Tomas, Jems Alpius dakon monji, Tadius, Saimon Selot,
41003019	ae Judas Iskariot (uŋun egɨ don Yesu uwalni da kɨsiron yɨpgut).
41003020	Aŋek Yesu yutnon wɨgakwan amɨn kabɨ madepsi aeni uŋudon muwukgwit. Muwugakwa Yesu gat paŋdetni gat jap noni dakon bɨkbɨk dɨma pɨsaŋ yomgut.
41003021	Aŋek dabɨni uŋun bini nandaŋek “Burɨ upbal tak” yaŋ yaŋek yutnikon iyɨŋ aŋaŋ kɨk do apgwit.
41003022	Aŋakwa gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn Jerusalem kokup papmon da apgwit uŋun da Yesu do yaŋ yawit, “Koŋ dakon amɨn tagɨni Belsebul uŋun da burɨgwan egakwan uŋun dakon tapmɨmon da koŋ yoldak.”
41003023	Yaŋba Yesu da paŋmuwugek tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt: “Sunduk da Sunduk notni arɨpmɨ dɨma yolyolɨ.
41003024	Mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn da pudaŋ kabɨ bamorɨ aŋek emat wamjil kaŋ, uŋun mɨktɨm tebai dɨma tokdɨsak.
41003025	Ae amɨn yurɨ kɨnda dakon amɨn da pudaŋ kɨ kabɨ bamot aŋek emat wamjil kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yut tebai dɨma egɨpdaŋ.
41003026	Uŋudeŋ gɨn Sunduk da pudaŋ kɨ kabi bamot aŋek iyɨ emat wamjil kaŋ, amɨn kabɨni tebai dɨma egɨpdaŋ. Yaŋ ani kaŋ pasɨl mudokdaŋ.
41003027	“Bo namɨn dasi amɨn tebai kɨnda yɨgakwan yutnikon wɨgɨ yo kabɨni gwayeŋ tɨmɨtjak? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma. Mibɨltok tebai kendagek kɨsit kandapmɨyo wamaŋek yo kabɨni tagɨ gwayeni.
41003028	“Nak asisi dayɨsat, Piŋkop da yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gat ae Piŋkop abɨŋ yɨp do manji gen yogok gat dakon dɨwarɨ tagɨ wɨrɨrɨtjak.
41003029	Mani amɨn kɨnda da Telagɨ Wup abɨŋ yɨp do manji gen kɨnda yosak kaŋ, Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni dɨma wɨrɨrɨtjak. Uŋun dɨmasisi, uŋun dɨwarɨni mudok mudogɨ mɨni taŋ wɨgɨkdɨsak.”
41003030	Amɨn da Yesu burɨkon koŋ kɨnda egɨsak yaŋ yawit uŋun do aŋek gen uŋun yagɨt.
41003031	Gen yaŋ yoyɨŋakwan meŋi padɨk padɨkni da abɨŋ yomakon agek Yesu yomakon pɨsak do gen yɨpba wɨgɨgɨt.
41003032	Wɨkwan amɨn Yesu gat yɨkgwit uŋun da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Meŋgo padɨk padɨkgo yomakon da gak do yoŋ.”
41003033	Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Meŋno padɨk padɨkno uŋun namɨn?”
41003034	Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn aŋgwasɨŋek yɨkgwit kabɨkon dabɨl sɨŋtaŋek yagɨt, “Nak dakon meŋno ae padɨk padɨkno oni.
41003035	Piŋkop dakon gen guramɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun nak dakon meŋno ae padɨk padɨkno ae samɨno kabɨ.”
41004001	Bɨsap kɨndakon pakbi ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon mɨŋat amɨnyo aeni yoyɨŋ dekgɨt. Amɨn madepsi da abɨŋ uŋudon muwugakwa Yesu boron wɨgɨgɨt. Boron yɨgakwan amɨn morap ɨleŋɨkon yɨkgwit.
41004002	Yɨgakwa Yesu da tɨlak gen morapmɨ yoyɨŋek kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt,
41004003	“Nandani! Amɨn kɨnda da jap yet tɨŋtɨŋok do pigaga kɨgɨt.
41004004	Jap yet tɨŋtɨŋaŋakwan dɨwarɨ da kosiron maŋba mɨnam da abɨŋ nawit.
41004005	-
41004006	Yerɨ dɨwarɨ da mɨktɨm tɨpmɨ toŋ tɨmon mawit. Uŋun kwenjok tawit, do tepmɨ kwawit, mani tɨp kwenon mɨktɨm morapmɨ dɨma, do gelɨ tagɨ dɨma yopba kɨwit. Do gɨldat da wɨŋ pɨndakban alek tawit.
41004007	Ae jap yet dɨwarɨ da joŋ kelɨ toŋ tɨmgwan mawit. Uŋun joŋ kelɨ toŋ gat kɨsi kwaŋek wutjɨŋba kɨmak mudawit.
41004008	Ae jap yet dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm nelagɨ toŋ uŋudon maŋ kwawit. Dɨwarɨ bamɨ 100, ae dɨwarɨ bamɨ 60, ae dɨwarɨ bamɨ 30 tawit.”
41004009	Gen uŋun yaŋek aeni saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen on nandak do galak toŋ amɨn ji pakyaŋsi nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsoni.”
41004010	Amɨn kabɨ madep kɨŋakwa iyɨ dakon paŋdetni 12 kabɨ gat ae amɨn dɨwarɨ gat da tɨlak gen dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do iyɨwit.
41004011	Iyɨŋba yagɨt, “Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni dakon gen pasɨlɨ uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ ji baŋ dayɨŋ teŋteŋosot. Mani Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek waŋga ekwaŋ amɨn tɨlak gen gɨn nandaŋ.
41004012	‘Uŋun dabɨl da yo asat uŋun pɨndakgaŋ mani mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaŋ, ae geno nandaŋ, mani mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaŋ pɨsoŋ. Do Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni wɨrɨrɨk yomjak do but tobɨl ak do dɨma nandaŋ.’ ”
41004013	Yaŋ yaŋek yagɨt, “Tɨlak gen yat dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaŋ kaŋ, tɨlak gen dɨwarɨ yoko niaŋ aŋek nandaŋ pɨsoni?
41004014	Amɨn jap yet tɨŋtɨŋosok uŋun Piŋkop gen tɨŋtɨŋosok.
41004015	Amɨn Piŋkop gen nandaŋek butni dɨma pɨsoŋ uŋun jap yet kosiron mawit uŋuden. Sunduk da abɨŋ gen tagɨ butnikon toŋ uŋun gwayeŋ paŋkɨsak.
41004016	Amɨn dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm tɨpmɨ toŋ tɨm yombem, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gen nandaŋek but galagon da abɨdoŋ.
41004017	Mani butnikon gelɨ tagɨ dɨma yɨpban kɨgɨt do bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok akgaŋ. Jɨgɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ae Piŋkop dakon gen dakon uwal apni bɨsapmon nandaŋ gadatni yopba wɨtdal kɨkdaŋ.
41004018	Ae amɨn dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm nap kelɨ toŋ tɨm yombem. Uŋun Piŋkop gen nandaŋ,
41004019	mani nandak nandakni mɨktɨm dakon yo morap do nandaŋ, ae moneŋ paŋmuwut dakon galaktok da Piŋkop gen wɨtjɨŋba bamɨ dɨma tosok.
41004020	Ae amɨn dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm nelagɨ toŋ tɨm yombem, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gen nandaŋek abɨdoŋ. Uŋun amɨn bamɨ 100, ae kɨnda bamɨ 60, ae kɨnda bamɨ 30, yaŋ taŋ taŋ aŋ.”
41004021	Gen kɨnda saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Namɨn da lam koleŋek kwoba naŋ gap asak, bo pɨgat kagagwan yɨpjak? Dɨmasi, tamonikon yɨpno teŋteŋosok.
41004022	Yo pasɨlɨ toŋ ae yo wɨtjɨŋbi da toŋ uŋun kɨsi teŋteŋɨkon tokdaŋ.
41004023	Gen on nandak do galak toŋ amɨn ji pakyaŋsi nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsoni.”
41004024	Yaŋ yaŋek yagɨt, “Ji gen uŋun nandaŋ uŋun pakyaŋsi nandani. Ji Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek guramɨtni kaŋ, Piŋkop da saŋbeŋek damdɨsak. Mani geni dɨma nandani kaŋ, saŋbeŋek dɨma damdɨsak.
41004025	Nak dakon gen nandaŋek burɨkon yɨpmaŋdak uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da saŋbeŋek nandak nandak ɨmdɨsak. Mani geno nandaŋek burɨkon dɨma yɨpmaŋdak uŋun amɨn geno dɨwarɨ nandagɨt uŋun pasɨl ɨmdaŋ.”
41004026	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandani do tɨlak gen kɨnda gat dayɨko nandani. Amɨn kɨnda jap yet pigaga tɨŋtɨŋosok.
41004027	Kalbi dɨpmɨn pokdok ae gɨldat kalba waŋga waŋga agakwan jap yet kwoŋ. Mani niaŋsi aŋek kwoŋ uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandɨsak.
41004028	Mɨktɨm da iyɨ upmagakwan gɨgɨ wɨŋ tamɨ yopmaŋek bamɨ toŋ.
41004029	Bamɨ taŋakwa pi ami da bamɨ pasak.”
41004030	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yo nikon tɨlak ako nandani?
41004031	Uŋun mastat yet yombem. Mastat dakon yerɨ uŋun jap yet kɨsi morap dakon pɨŋbi, monɨŋɨsisok.
41004032	Mani mɨktɨmon kwaotno madepsi kwosok. Jap dɨwarɨ dakon tagok tagokni uŋun yapmaŋ mudosok. Kɨlɨŋɨ madep yopban kɨŋakwa mɨnam morapmɨ da paŋabɨŋ uŋun da yoŋgamgwan yɨkgaŋ.”
41004033	Yesu da nandak nandakni da arɨpmon Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋek tɨlak gen uŋuden morapmɨ yoyɨgɨt.
41004034	Amɨn madep kabɨkon Piŋkop gen tɨlak genon dagɨn yoyɨgɨt. Mani paŋdetni gat egek tɨlak gen dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
41004035	Uŋun gɨldat da pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo Yesu boron yɨgek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda do kɨno.”
41004036	Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni amɨn kabɨ madep yopmaŋ degek boron wɨkwa paŋdetni gat kɨsi kɨwit. Ae bot dɨwarɨ gat kɨsi kɨwit.
41004037	Kɨŋakwa mɨrɨm madep aŋek pakbi tamalɨgakwan boron pɨgɨwit. Pɨgɨ tugaŋban bot pakbigwan pɨgɨk do agɨt.
41004038	Aŋakwan Yesu bot buŋɨkon busuŋ kɨdɨŋ kɨndakon wɨtjɨŋek dɨpmɨn pagakwan paŋdetni da aŋyolek iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, nin pakbi naŋ kɨmotneŋ do nandabɨ yo ɨsalɨ asak?”
41004039	Yaŋ iyɨŋba Yesu da pɨdaŋ agek mɨrɨm gat ae pakbi gat tebai yoyɨŋek yagɨt, “Yawokgɨl!” Yaŋban mɨrɨm yawogakwan pakbi wayɨŋ dɨmasi agɨt.
41004040	Aŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido pasolgoŋ? Sigɨn dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namaŋ, ma?”
41004041	Yaŋban paŋdetni si pasalek iyɨ gɨn yawit, “On niaŋen amɨn kɨnda da mɨrɨm ae pakbiyo yoyɨŋban geni guramɨkgamal?”
41005001	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda Gerasa amɨn da mɨktɨmon kɨwit.
41005002	Boron da pɨŋakwan, amɨn kɨnda koŋni toŋ uŋun da amɨn kɨmakba paŋkɨ tɨp kɨnamgwan yopmaŋgaŋ mɨktɨmon da abɨŋ altaŋ ɨmgut.
41005003	Amɨn uŋun amɨn da kɨsitni ae kandapmɨyo nap teban naŋ wamwamɨ dakon arɨp dɨma agɨt.
41005004	Amɨn da bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kɨsit kandapyoni wamgwit, mani uŋun amɨn tebai do nap teban si paŋdagagɨt. Amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨdogɨ.
41005005	Uŋun pɨlɨn kaga ae gɨldat kalba amɨn kɨmakba yopmaŋgaŋ mɨktɨmon ae kabapmon egek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek gɨptɨmɨ tɨpbaŋ mandagɨt.
41005006	Yesu dubagɨkon akban kaŋek tɨmtɨm yaŋek Yesu da buron kɨŋ gawak ɨmgut.
41005007	Aŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yesu, Piŋkop Wɨkwisi dakon Monji, gak niaŋsi aŋnam do abɨsal? Piŋkop da manon tepmɨ pi dɨma nabi do yaŋ teban ta.”
41005008	Uŋun da yaŋ yagɨt, nido Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Koŋ gak on amɨn yɨpmaŋ degek wɨŋ kɨ!”
41005009	Yaŋban Yesu da aŋtobɨlek iyɨgɨt, “Mango namɨn?” Yaŋ iyɨŋban yagɨt, “Nak mano Amɨn Kabɨ Madep. Nin morapmɨ da ekwamaŋ.”
41005010	Yaŋ yaŋek bɨsit tebai saŋbek saŋbek iyɨwit, “Nin nolbɨ on mɨktɨm tɨm dɨma yɨpmaŋ detneŋ.”
41005011	Mɨktɨm uŋun da ɨleŋon bɨt kabɨ madep jap naŋek egɨpgwit.
41005012	Koŋ uŋun Yesu da nandaŋ yoban bɨt da butgwan pɨgɨni do bɨsit tebai iyɨwit.
41005013	Yaŋba Yesu da nandaŋ yoban koŋ da amɨnon da wɨŋek bɨt da butgwan pɨgɨwit. Pɨgakwa bɨt uŋun pasal abɨgɨŋek pakbi ɨdap tagɨt uŋungwan pɨgek kɨmakgwit. Bɨt kaloŋɨsok dɨma, 2 tausen da kɨmakgwit.
41005014	Kɨmagakwa bɨt dakon kɨla amɨn da kokup kapmat tagɨt ae mɨktɨm dɨwarɨkon kɨŋ yo uŋun noman tawit dakon gen bin yoyɨwit. Yoyɨŋba amɨn da yo noman tagɨt uŋun kok do aŋek abɨŋ mudawit.
41005015	Yesukon abɨŋek amɨn koŋni morapmɨ gat egɨpgut uŋun burɨ pɨsagɨt ae ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni toŋ da yɨkban kawit. Yaŋ yɨkban kaŋ pasalgwit.
41005016	Yo dabɨl da kaŋ nandaŋyo awit amɨn uŋun da koŋ gat egɨpgut amɨn gat ae bɨt kabɨ dakon gen bin gat kɨsi amɨn yoyɨŋ mudawit.
41005017	Gen uŋun nandaŋ mudaŋek Yesu mɨktɨm uŋun yɨpmaŋ kɨsak do tebai iyɨwit.
41005018	Iyɨŋba nandaŋek Yesu uŋun boron wɨgakwan amɨn koŋ gat egɨpgut uŋun da Yesu yol do bɨsit tebai iyɨgɨt.
41005019	Tebaisi iyɨŋban kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak yutgokon kɨŋ Amɨn Tagɨ da gak do bupmɨ nandaŋek wasok madep ak uŋun dakon gen bin yawi dɨwat kabɨgo yoyɨŋ mudoki.”
41005020	Yaŋban amɨn uŋun kɨŋ Yesu da yo agɨt uŋun dakon gen bin Dekapolis mɨktɨm uŋudon amɨn yoyɨŋban nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
41005021	Yesu uŋun boron wɨgek pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda do wɨgakwan amɨn morapmɨsi abɨŋ muwukgwit.
41005022	Muwugakwa Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut dakon kɨla amɨn kɨnda mani Jairus, uŋun da abɨŋ Yesu kaŋek burɨkon kɨŋek gawak ɨmgut.
41005023	Aŋek si aŋpulugosak do madepsi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gwano kɨmotdɨsak, do abɨŋek kɨsitgo da wɨtjɨŋbɨ kɨlek taŋek egɨpjak.”
41005024	Iyɨŋban nandaŋek Yesu gat kɨgɨmal. Kɨŋakwal amɨn morapmɨ da yolek gadat gadat tebaisi awit.
41005025	Aŋakwa binapnikon mɨŋat kɨnda akgɨt, uŋun dagaŋ mok aŋek yawini maŋakwa egakwan bɨlak 12 agɨt.
41005026	Aŋakwan wuda wamak morapmɨ da aŋpulugok do pi aŋtɨdok aŋakwa tepmɨ madepsi nandaŋek egɨpgut. Wuda wamak yumaŋ nok do aŋek moneŋni kɨsi yomɨŋ mudagɨt. Aban sotni dɨma tagap tagɨt, si madep tagɨt.
41005027	Aban mɨŋat uŋun da Yesu dakon bin nandaŋek, mɨŋat amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋun da bɨkbɨgon egek manjikon kɨŋek ɨlɨkba pɨgɨknikon ɨgayɨgɨt.
41005028	Ɨgayɨŋek yaŋ nandagɨt, “Ɨlɨkba pɨgɨknikon ɨgayɨkeŋ kaŋ, kɨlek tokeŋ.”
41005029	Yaŋ nandaŋek ɨgayɨŋban uŋudon gɨn yawini jɨptaŋban gɨptɨmɨ kɨlek taŋban nandagɨt.
41005030	Aban Yesu uŋun tapmɨmni abɨkwa nandaŋek tobɨlek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkno namɨn da ɨgayɨsak?”
41005031	Yaŋban paŋdetni da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn da gadat gadat tebaisi aŋakwa namɨn da ɨgayɨŋ namɨsak yaŋ nido yosol?”
41005032	Mani Yesu uŋun amɨn ɨgayɨŋ ɨmgut uŋun kok do sigɨn wɨsɨgɨt.
41005033	Mɨŋat uŋun gɨptɨmɨkon wasok noman tagɨt uŋun nandaŋek burɨ sugaŋban nɨmnɨmɨgek Yesu da buron gawak ɨmɨŋek mibɨlni yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
41005034	Mibɨlni yaŋ teŋteŋaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gwano, nandaŋ gadatgo da gak aŋkɨlek ak. Uŋun do butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan kɨki. Sotgo kɨlɨ pasɨlak.”
41005035	Yesu gen yaŋ iyɨŋakwan, muwut muwut yutni dakon kɨla amɨn Jairus da yutnon da amɨn dɨwarɨ da abɨŋ Jairus yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gwago kɨlɨ kuŋwak, uŋun do nido yoyɨŋdet ɨsal dogɨn jɨgɨ ɨmɨsal?”
41005036	Yaŋba Yesu da gen uŋun nandagɨt, mani dɨma nandabi wup agɨt. Aŋek kɨla amɨn yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Dɨma pasolgi. Ɨsal nandaŋ gadat aki.”
41005037	Yaŋ yaŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ yopmaŋek, Pita, Jems ae padɨge Jon uŋun baŋgɨn tɨmɨkban kɨwit.
41005038	Kɨŋ kɨla amɨn da yomakon altaŋek amɨn da upbalap madep ae gen kunamyo aŋakwa pɨndak nandaŋyo agɨt.
41005039	Aŋek yutnon wɨgek amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido kunam kugɨyo madepsi aŋ? Mɨŋatjok uŋun dɨma kuŋwak, uŋun ɨsal dɨpmɨn pokdok.”
41005040	Yesu da yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek jɨkgo yanjaŋ ɨmgwit. Yaŋ aba yoyɨŋban yomakon pɨgɨ mudaŋakwa, mɨŋatjok dakon meŋi datniyo ae paŋdetni tɨmɨkban mɨŋatjok pakgɨron wɨgɨwit.
41005041	Wɨgɨ mɨŋatjok kɨsirɨkon abɨdaŋek iyɨgɨt, “Talita kum!” (Uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ, “Mɨŋatjok pɨdoki do gayɨsat!”)
41005042	Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn mɨŋatjok pɨdaŋek kɨŋ ap aban kaŋek yaŋ kɨmakgwit. (Mɨŋatjok bɨlakni 12 kabɨ.)
41005043	Aŋakwa Yesu da amɨn dɨma yoyɨni do yaŋsop tebaisi aŋyomgut. Aŋek mɨŋatjok jap ɨmɨŋba nosak do yoyɨgɨt.
41006001	Aŋakwa Yesu uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek, kokupnikon kɨŋakwan paŋdetni yolgwit.
41006002	Paŋkɨ egek Sabat bɨsapmon Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgɨ Piŋkop gen yoyɨgɨt. Aŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek yɨkgwit amɨn uŋun tamtam yaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Yo uŋun dukon tɨmɨkgɨt? Nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi gat ae wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agak uŋun namɨnon tɨmɨkgɨt?
41006003	Uŋun kɨsit kɨlda kɨnda, Maria dakon monji. Padɨk padɨkni uŋun Jems, Josep, Judas ae Saimon. Ae samɨni binapninon ekwaŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋek ɨŋtaŋ ɨmɨŋek nandaba pɨŋban ɨmgwit.
41006004	Yaŋ nandaŋek egakwa Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kombɨ amɨn kɨnda man bini mɨktɨm dɨwarɨkon toŋ, mani iyɨ da kokupmon yawi dɨwatni gat ae yutnikon amɨn gat da mani dɨma aŋenokgoŋ.”
41006005	Uŋudon wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ ak do aŋtɨdok agɨt. Uŋun yum amɨn sotni toŋ kaloŋɨsok dɨ baŋ kɨsitni kwenikon wɨtjɨŋek paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
41006006	Aŋek nandaŋ gadatni mɨni do, uŋun do nandaban ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt. Yaŋ nandaŋek kokup taŋ aŋaŋ kɨwit uŋudon kɨŋ Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
41006007	Yesu paŋdetni 12 kabɨ yaŋ yoban opba, bamot bamot Piŋkop dakon gen yoni do yabekgɨt. Yabegek koŋ yolni do yaŋ mudaŋ yomɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
41006008	“Ji yo dɨwarɨ dɨ dɨma paŋek kɨni, wɨn kɨrɨŋ baŋgɨn pabɨdaŋek kɨni. Jap bo yɨk bo moneŋyo dɨma paŋek kɨni.
41006009	Kandap gwɨl paŋek agɨpni, aŋek paba pɨgɨk kaloŋɨ gɨn ɨlɨkba pɨgɨsak.
41006010	Kokup kɨndakon kɨŋ yut kɨndakon gɨn yɨgek pɨŋ kɨni.
41006011	Kokup kɨndakon kɨŋ altaŋba not dɨma aŋdamɨŋek genji dɨma nandaŋek manji damni kaŋ, kandapjikon kɨmbabaŋ toŋ uŋun kokup yɨp do aŋek tɨdaŋba kɨni. Yaŋ aŋakwa uŋun kokup amɨn da ‘Geni dɨma nandamaŋ, uŋun do aŋ’ yaŋ nandani.”
41006012	Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni da kɨŋek amɨn but tobɨl ani do yoyɨwit.
41006013	Yaŋ yoyɨŋek koŋ morapmɨ yol yomɨŋek sot amɨn morapmɨ bɨt nelak soŋ yoba kɨlek tawit.
41006014	Yesu dakon man bin ɨreŋ taŋban kɨla amɨn madep Erot uŋun kɨsi da nandagɨt. Amɨn dɨwarɨ da Yesu do yaŋ yawit, “Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn uŋun kɨmoron da pɨdagɨt, aŋek wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agak dakon tapmɨm taŋ ɨmɨsak” yaŋ yawit.
41006015	Yaŋ yaŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Uŋun Elaija.” Ae dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Uŋun kombɨ amɨn kɨnda, kombɨ amɨn kalɨp egɨpgwit uŋuden amɨn kɨnda.”
41006016	Mani Erot uŋun nandaŋek yagɨt, “Kalɨp nak da Jon dakon tegɨ mandaŋ dagagɨm, uŋun amɨn dasi kɨmoron da pɨdagɨt.”
41006017	-
41006018	Kalɨp Erot da padɨge Pilip dakon mɨŋatni Erodias tuwɨl pagɨt. Aban Jon da Erot yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen teban yapmaŋek padɨgɨgo dakon mɨŋatni tuwɨl pal. Uŋun tagɨ dɨma.” Gen uŋun nandaŋek Erot da obip amɨni yabekban kɨŋ Jon abɨdaŋek nap teban naŋ wamaŋ dam tebanon yɨpgwit.
41006019	Jon da gen yaŋ yaŋban Erodias da Jon do nandaban yokwi taŋban aŋakba kɨmotjak do si nandagɨt. Mani arɨpmɨ dɨma,
41006020	nido Erot da Jon do pasalek yaŋ nandagɨt, “Jon uŋun amɨn kɨlegɨ ae telagɨsi.” Yaŋ nandaŋek si aŋkutnagɨt. Erot da Jon dakon gen nandaŋek but morap agɨt, mani geni nandak do galak tagɨt.
41006021	Buŋon Erodias da Jon aŋakba kɨmotjak uŋun dakon kosit kagɨt. Altok altok bɨsapnikon Erot da jap noknok ak do amɨn madep paŋmuwukgɨt. Gapman dakon pi amɨn madep ae emat amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨni ae Galili mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn kɨsi paŋmuwukgɨt.
41006022	Jap naŋ yɨgakwa Erodias dakon gwi da paŋabɨŋ ɨŋamnikon kap agɨt. Aban Erot ae amɨn jap nawit uŋun kɨsi da kaŋ galak tawit. Kaŋ galak taŋ Erot da mɨŋat gɨmoŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ni yo do galak tosol uŋun nayɨŋbɨ tagɨ gabeŋ.”
41006023	Yaŋ yaŋek yaŋ teban tok gen kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo nido nayɨki, tagɨ gabeŋ. Mɨktɨmno terɨ kɨnda pɨdaŋ gak do tagɨ gabeŋ.”
41006024	Yaŋban mɨŋat gɨmoŋ uŋun da waŋga kɨŋ meŋi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ni yo naŋ namjak do iyɨkeŋ?” Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Kɨŋ Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn uŋun dakon busuŋɨ uŋun do iyɨki.”
41006025	Meŋi yaŋ yaŋban mɨŋat gɨmoŋ uŋun tepmɨ wɨgek Erot yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn dakon busuŋɨ abɨsok gɨn ɨdapmon yɨpmaŋ nabi.”
41006026	Gen yaŋ yaŋban Erot burɨ wagɨl yokwi tagɨt. Mani amɨn jap nawit uŋun da ɨŋamon yaŋ teban tok gen yagɨt uŋun kɨrɨŋɨt do mayak taŋek gen yagɨt uŋun dɨma kɨrɨŋɨkgɨt.
41006027	Uŋudon gɨn emat amɨn kɨnda Jon dakon busuŋɨ aŋopjak do yabekgɨt. Yabekban uŋun da kɨŋ dam teban yutnon wɨgɨ Jon dakon tegɨ mandaŋ dagagɨt.
41006028	Mandaŋ dagaŋ ɨdapmon yɨpmaŋ aŋabɨŋ mɨŋatjok uŋun do ɨban aŋkɨ meŋi do ɨmgut.
41006029	Aŋakwan Jon dakon paŋdetni gen bini nandaŋek kɨŋ bumjotni abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ tɨp kɨnamon yɨpgwit.
41006030	Don yabekbi kabɨ da abɨŋ Yesu aŋgwasɨŋek yo awit ae Piŋkop gen yawit uŋun dakon geni iyɨwit.
41006031	Iyɨŋ mudaŋba amɨn morapmɨsi kɨŋ abɨŋ abɨŋ aŋakwa Yesu gat yabekbi kabɨni gat jap noknok dakon bɨkbɨk dɨma pɨsaŋ yomgut. Aban Yesu da yabekbi kabɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Opba mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ tɨmon kɨno. Uŋudon egek tapmɨm pani.”
41006032	Yaŋ yaŋek boron wɨgek mɨktɨm amɨn da dɨma ekwaŋ tɨmon kɨwit.
41006033	Mani amɨn morapmɨ da uŋudon kwaŋ yaŋ pɨndak nandaŋyo awit. Yaŋ nandaŋek kokup morapni yopmaŋ yopmaŋ aŋek amɨn morapmɨ mɨktɨm kosit tɨmtɨm yaŋek uŋun da kalɨp kɨŋ altawit.
41006034	Kɨŋ altaŋakwa Yesu boron da ɨleŋɨkon obɨŋek amɨn morapmɨsi pɨndagek sipsip kɨla amɨni mɨni yombem da egɨpgwit, do bupmɨsi nandaŋ yomgut. Yaŋ nandaŋek uŋudon gɨn wasaŋek Piŋkop gen morapmɨ yoyɨgɨt.
41006035	Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋakwan pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo paŋdetni da abɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋon ekwamaŋ, ae gɨldat kɨlɨ pɨgɨkdɨsak,
41006036	do yoyɨŋbɨ amɨn kabɨ madep kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ ae kokup terɨ dɨŋgwan kɨŋek jap yumaŋ noni.”
41006037	Iyɨŋba yagɨt, “Disi jap yoba noni.” Yaŋban paŋdetni da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn morapmɨsi ekwaŋ, do moneŋ 200 danari baŋ jap yumneŋ kaŋ arɨpmɨ asak. Yaŋ aneŋ do yosol, ma?”
41006038	Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Disikon bret niaŋ da toŋ. Kɨŋ pɨndakgɨt.” Kɨŋ pɨndak abɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Bret kɨsit kɨnda, ae tap kɨlap bamorɨ yaŋ gɨn taŋ nimaŋ.”
41006039	Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨŋban paŋdetni da amɨn kɨsisi kosirɨ kosirɨ joŋ tɨmon yɨtni do yoyɨwit.
41006040	Kosirɨ kɨnda 50 ae kosirɨ kɨnda 100 yaŋ yɨk aŋaŋ kɨwit.
41006041	Yɨk mudaŋba bret kɨsit kɨnda ae tap kɨlap bamot uŋun gat tɨmɨgek Kwen Kokup sɨŋtaŋek gɨsamɨkgɨt. Gɨsamɨgek bret jokgal paŋdetni do yoban uŋun da amɨn do kokwinɨk yomgwit. Ae tap kɨlap yaŋ gɨn kokwinɨk paŋdetni do yoban uŋun da amɨn do yomgwit.
41006042	Yoba tɨmɨgek amɨn kɨsisi jap arɨpmɨsi nawit.
41006043	Naŋba arɨpmɨ aŋakwan bret dɨwat ae tap kɨlap dɨwat tawit uŋun paŋdetni da yɨk madepsi 12 kabɨ sɨmɨlba tugawit.
41006044	Amɨn jap nawit uŋun 5 tausen yaŋ da nawit.
41006045	Uŋudon gɨn Yesu da paŋdetni yoyɨŋban boron wɨgek Betsaida kokupmon mibɨl taŋ kɨŋakwa Yesu da amɨn kabɨ madep uŋun yoyɨŋban waseŋ kɨwit.
41006046	Yoyɨŋban kɨŋakwa iyɨ bɨsit pi ak do kabapmon wɨgɨgɨt.
41006047	Pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo bot pakbi ɨdap binapmon taŋakwan Yesu iyɨ gɨn tap kɨdɨpmɨŋon egɨpgut.
41006048	Egakwan mɨrɨm madep aŋakwan paŋdetni pakbi wayɨt do aŋtɨdok aŋakwa pɨndakgɨt. Yaŋ pɨndagek wɨsa wɨsa do pakbi ɨdapmon bamaŋ bamaŋ kɨŋek kɨŋ paŋdetni yap do agɨt.
41006049	Pakbi ɨdap kwenon kɨŋakwan kaŋek paŋdetni kɨsi da yaŋ nandawit, “Koŋ kɨnda da abɨsak!”
41006050	Yaŋ nandaŋek madepsi pasalek yaŋ tɨdawit. Mani uŋudon gɨn Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji teban taŋek atni. Nak naga obɨsat. Dɨma pasolni.”
41006051	Yaŋ yaŋek boron wɨgakwan mɨrɨm yawokgɨt. Yawogakwan paŋdetni da tamtamsi yawit.
41006052	Nido Yesu da mɨŋat amɨnyo do bret kokwinɨk yomgut uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandawit. But nandak nandakni dɨma pɨsaŋakwan egɨpgwit.
41006053	Pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda Genesaret mɨktɨmon wɨgek bot ɨleŋɨkon aŋteban awit.
41006054	Aŋteban aŋek bot yɨpmaŋek pɨgakwa uŋudon gɨn mɨŋat amɨnyo da Yesu kaŋ nandaŋyo awit.
41006055	Yaŋ kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋek tɨmtɨm yaŋek kokupmɨ kokupmɨ kɨŋ yoyɨŋba sotni toŋ amɨn wayɨk wamaŋek Yesu dukwan dukwan egɨpgut uŋudon paŋkɨwit.
41006056	Aŋek kokup pap bo kokup monɨŋ ae dukwan dukwan kɨgɨt amɨn da sot amɨn muwut muwut tamokon uŋudon paŋabɨŋ yopgwit. Aŋek paba pɨgɨk dɨwatnikon ɨgayɨni do bɨsit tebai iyɨwit. Yaŋ ɨgayɨwit amɨn uŋun kɨlek taŋ mudawit.
41007001	Parisi amɨn gat gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat Jerusalem kokup papmon da obɨŋ Yesu aŋgwasɨŋek muwukgwit.
41007002	Muwugek paŋdet kabɨnikon da dɨwarɨ kɨsitni dɨma sugaŋek jap ɨsal tɨmɨk naŋyo aba pɨndakgwit.
41007003	Parisi amɨn ae Juda amɨn kɨsisi babɨkni dakon gen teban yolek kɨsirɨ sugaŋek gɨn jap naŋ naŋ aŋ.
41007004	Ae maket tamokon da tobɨlek obɨŋ yaŋ gɨn kɨsirɨ sugaŋek jap noŋ. Uŋun gɨn dɨma, gen teban morapmɨ yolek kap, kwoba, ɨdapyo kɨsi sugoŋ.
41007005	Yaŋdo, Parisi amɨn ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nido paŋdetgoni uŋun babɨk dakon gen teban yapmaŋek kɨsirɨ dɨma sugaŋek jap noŋ?”
41007006	Yaŋba aŋtobɨlek yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da kombɨ amɨn Aisaia dakon nandak nandakni aŋtagap aban jamba but amɨn ji do gen yaŋ mandagɨt: ‘Uŋun amɨn kabɨ gen kaga dagɨn nak man madep namaŋ, mani but dasi nak dɨma nandaŋ namaŋ.
41007007	Iyɨ dakon gen teban do, “On uŋun Piŋkop dakon gen” yaŋ yaŋek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgaŋ. Nak gawak namaŋ uŋun koko yo ɨsalɨ asak.’
41007008	Ji Piŋkop dakon gen teban yɨpmaŋek babɨkji dakon gen paŋteban aŋek paŋ ekwaŋ.”
41007009	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji Piŋkop dakon gen teban yum pɨndagek dɨsi dakon yaŋ teban tok gen guramɨkgaŋ.
41007010	Moses da kalɨp yaŋ mandagɨt: ‘Ji meŋ datyo dakon pɨŋbi egek geni guramɨtni’, ae ‘Amɨn kɨnda da meŋ datyo do gen yokwi kɨnda yosak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn si aŋakba kɨmotjak.’
41007011	Mani dɨsi Moses dakon gen maba kwanek yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Amɨn kɨnda da meŋi bo datni yaŋ iyɨsak, “Nak yo on kɨlɨ Piŋkop do manjɨgɨm. Dɨma tam tagɨ paŋpulugokom.” ’
41007012	Yaŋ yaŋek meŋi ae datni dɨma paŋpulugosok. Aŋek ji da uŋun amɨn do yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Uŋun amɨn tagɨ asak nido yo uŋun Piŋkop do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt.’
41007013	Ji yaŋ aŋek babɨkji dakon yaŋ teban tok gen guramɨgek Piŋkop dakon gen maba kɨsak. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, yo morap dɨwarɨ kɨsi yaŋ gɨn aŋ.”
41007014	Yesu da aeni amɨn yaŋ ɨlɨkban apba yoyɨgɨt, “Gen dayɨko ji morap kɨsi da mɨrak yopmaŋek nandaba pɨsosak.
41007015	-
41007016	Yo kɨnda amɨn kwasopgwan pɨgɨsak uŋun da amɨn dakon but arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋupbal asak. Yo kɨnda amɨn butgwan da wɨŋ waŋga kɨsak uŋun da amɨn dakon but aŋupbal asak.”
41007017	Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn kabɨ madep yopmaŋek yutnon wɨgakwan paŋdetni da tɨlak gen dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do iyɨwit.
41007018	Iyɨŋba Yesu yaŋ yagɨt, “Jiyo kɨsi nandak nandakji mɨni aŋakwan uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaŋ, ma? Yo kɨnda amɨn kwasopgwan pɨgɨsak uŋun da amɨn dakon but arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋupbal asak.
41007019	Nido but nandak nandak nikon dɨma pɨgɨsak, ɨsal kwasopnikon pɨgakwan uŋun da aŋkosit aŋakwan kosirɨ naŋ abɨgɨsak.” (Yesu yaŋ yagɨt, do jap kɨsisi Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlegɨ gɨn.)
41007020	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo amɨn but nandak nandagon da wɨŋ waŋga kwaŋ uŋun da amɨn dakon but paŋupbal aŋ.
41007021	Yo amɨn but nandak nandagon da wɨsak uŋun yaŋ: nandak nandak yokwi, yumabi aŋpak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, yo kabo, amɨn dapdap,
41007022	amɨn wam kɨlɨ abi da yumabi aŋpak, pɨndak galaktok, aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, top gen yogok, kwen wɨgɨk, tagɨsi ekwaŋ amɨn do nandaba yokwi tok nandak nandak, ae not do yokwi yogok, gen kɨrɨŋɨt, ae ŋugɨgɨ aŋpak.
41007023	Uŋun yokwi morap amɨn buron da wɨŋ waŋga kwaŋ uŋun da amɨn paŋupbal aŋ.”
41007024	Yesu da uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek Tair kokupmon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋ yut kɨndakon wɨgek pasɨlɨ egek yɨk yawot akeŋ yaŋ nandagɨt, mani pasɨlɨ egɨp do aŋtɨdok agɨt.
41007025	Uŋun bɨsapmon mɨŋat kɨnda gwi koŋni toŋ uŋun da Yesu dakon gen bini nandaŋek abɨŋ Yesu da kandap mibɨlon gawak ɨmgut.
41007026	Uŋun mɨŋat Israel mɨŋat kɨnda dɨma, uŋun Grik mɨŋat kɨnda Ponisia tetgɨn Siria mɨktɨmon altagɨt. Yesu da gwi dakon koŋ yol ɨmjak do bɨsit tebai iyɨgɨt.
41007027	Iyɨŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mibɨltok Juda amɨn paŋpulugaŋek ae don mɨktɨm dɨwarɨkon amɨn paŋpulugokeŋ. Yosol uŋudeŋ abeŋ kaŋ, mɨŋat monjɨyo dakon jap pɨŋan do yomdɨsat. Uŋun tagɨ dɨma.”
41007028	Yaŋban mɨŋat da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, asi yosol, mani mɨŋat monjɨyo da jap naŋakwa jɨmjɨmɨ mibɨlɨkon moŋ uŋun pɨŋan da si noŋ.”
41007029	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen kobogɨ tagɨsi yosol, do koŋ gwago kɨlɨ yɨpmaŋ dek, do tobɨlek yutgokon kɨŋek koki.”
41007030	Yaŋ iyɨŋban mɨŋat uŋun yutnikon kɨŋ kaŋban gwi koŋni mɨni da tamokon pakban kagɨt.
41007031	Kɨlɨ Yesu Tair kokup yɨpmaŋek Saidon kokup kɨŋ yapmaŋek Dekapolis mɨktɨm uŋun kɨsi yapmaŋek Galili Pakbi Ɨdap uŋudon kɨgɨt.
41007032	Kɨŋ altaŋakwan amɨn kabɨ kɨnda da amɨn kadɨm mɨragɨ mɨni kɨnda aŋaŋ opgwit. Aŋobɨŋ Yesu da kɨsitni gɨptɨmɨkon wɨtjɨsak do bɨsit tebai iyɨwit.
41007033	Iyɨŋba nandaŋek Yesu da amɨn kadɨm uŋun abɨdaŋban amɨn kabɨ madep yopmaŋek ɨleŋɨkon kɨgɨmal. Kɨŋ Yesu da kɨsitni amɨn uŋun da mɨragon yɨpban pɨgɨgɨt. Aŋek kɨsitnikon ɨlɨp sulek melɨkon wɨtjɨgɨt.
41007034	Yaŋ aŋek Kwen Kokup sɨŋtaŋek yaŋba kɨk aŋek iyɨgɨt, “Epata!” (Uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ “Pɨsoki!”)
41007035	Yaŋ iyɨŋban uŋudon gɨn mɨragɨ pɨsagɨt, ae melɨ tagap taŋek gen kɨlegɨsi yagɨt.
41007036	Aban Yesu da wasok agɨt uŋun dakon gen bin amɨn dɨma yoyɨni do yaŋsop aŋyomgut. Mani amɨn da geni dɨma nandaŋek yaŋba madepsi ɨreŋ tagɨt.
41007037	Mɨŋat amɨnyo da tamtam yaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Yo morap asak uŋun wagɨl tagɨsi asak. Wasok aban mɨragɨ mɨni uŋun da gen nandaŋ, ae amɨn kadɨm da gen yoŋ.”
41008001	Uŋun bɨsapmon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep aeni abɨŋ muwukgwit. Jap mɨni do Yesu da paŋdetni yoyɨŋban apba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
41008002	“On mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo nin gat gɨldat kapbɨ ekwamaŋ. Kɨlɨ japni kɨsi naŋ mudaŋ, do bupmɨ nandaŋ yomɨsat.
41008003	Dɨwarɨ da kokup dubagɨkon da apgwit, do yabekgo kɨni kaŋ, kosiron jap do aŋek dabɨlɨ upbal taŋba maŋ potdaŋ.”
41008004	Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni da yaŋ iyɨwit, “On ekwamaŋon amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ, do jap dukon baŋ paŋabɨŋ on mɨŋat amɨn madep yomneŋ?”
41008005	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jikon bret niaŋ da toŋ?” Yaŋban iyɨwit, “7 kabɨ.”
41008006	Yaŋba Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep yoyɨŋban mɨktɨmon yɨkgwit. Yɨgakwa bret 7 kabɨ tɨmɨgek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek paŋdetni da kokwinɨk yomni do yomgut. Yoban mɨŋat amɨnyo do yomgwit.
41008007	Tap kɨlap monɨŋ monɨŋ kaloŋ kaloŋ kɨsi taŋ yomgwit. Uŋun kɨsi gɨsamɨgek paŋdetni da kokwinɨk yomni do yomgut.
41008008	Mɨŋat amɨn jap naŋba arɨpmɨ aŋakwa jap dɨwat tawit uŋun paŋdetni da yɨk madepsi 7 yaŋ sɨmɨlba tugawit.
41008009	(Amɨn jap nawit uŋun 4 tausen yaŋ da nawit.) Yaŋ aŋek Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep yabekban kɨŋakwa,
41008010	paŋdetni gat boron wɨgek mɨktɨm Dalmanuta tetgɨn do kɨwit.
41008011	Uŋun bɨsapmon Parisi amɨn da abɨŋ Yesu aŋkewal do aŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda abɨ kaŋek nin da gandano Piŋkop da gak yabekban pɨl da pini asal yaŋ gandaneŋ.”
41008012	Yaŋ yaŋba burɨ yokwi taŋban yaŋba kɨk aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Apmiap amɨn ekwaŋ nido wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda kok do yoŋ? Nak asisi dayɨsat, wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda dɨma koni, dɨmasi.”
41008013	Yaŋ yoyɨŋek boron wɨgek pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda kɨwit.
41008014	Kɨŋek paŋdet kabɨni ɨŋtaŋek bret dɨwarɨ dɨma paŋkɨwit, bret kaloŋɨ kɨnda da gɨn boron tagɨt.
41008015	Yaŋ aba Yesu da nawa gen yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Parisi amɨn gat ae Erot gat uŋun dakon yis do pasalek kaŋ kɨmotni.”
41008016	Yaŋban notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Ninon bret mɨni uŋun do bo yosok?”
41008017	Gen uŋun yaŋba nandaŋek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido ‘ninon bret mɨni’ yaŋ yoŋ? Gen dayɨsat uŋun dɨma nandaba pɨsosok, ma? Nandak nandak kositji sopgwit?
41008018	Dabɨlji toŋ mani yo dɨma kaŋba pɨsosok? Mɨrakji toŋ mani dɨma nandaŋ? Kɨlɨ ɨŋtaŋ mudaŋ, ma?
41008019	Nak amɨn 5 tausen do bret 5 kabɨ pɨdaŋ yomgum bɨsapmon, ji jap dɨwat yɨk madepsi niaŋ da sɨmɨlba tugawit?” Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yɨk madepsi 12 kabɨ.”
41008020	Yaŋba yagɨt, “Nak amɨn 4 tausen do bret 7 kabɨ pɨdaŋ yomgum bɨsapmon, ji jap dɨwat yɨk madepsi niaŋ da sɨmɨlba tugawit?” Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yɨk madepsi 7 kabɨ.”
41008021	Yaŋ yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji sigɨn dɨma nandaba pɨsosok, ma?”
41008022	Betsaida kokupmon kɨŋ altaŋba amɨn dɨ da amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni kɨnda aŋaŋ opgwit. Aŋobɨŋek Yesu da kɨsitni da wɨtjɨsak do bɨsit tebai iyɨwit.
41008023	Amɨn uŋun kɨsirɨkon da abɨdaŋek yaŋban kokup yɨpmaŋek waŋga pɨgɨgɨmal. Pɨgɨ dabɨlɨkon ɨlɨp sulek kɨsit da wɨtjɨŋ yɨpmaŋek iyɨgɨt, “Yo dɨ pɨndakdal, bo dɨma?”
41008024	Amɨn uŋun sɨŋtaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak amɨn pɨndakdat. Mani pɨndakgo kɨndap yombem da obɨgɨ abɨgɨyo yaŋ aŋ.”
41008025	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da aeni dabɨlɨkon kɨsirɨ wɨtjɨgɨt. Yaŋ aban dabɨlɨ wagɨl kɨlek taŋban yo morap tagɨ pɨndakgɨt.
41008026	Dabɨlɨ kɨlek taŋban Yesu da yabegek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kokupmon dɨma kɨki, yutgokon kɨki.”
41008027	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Sisaria Pilipai kokup pap uŋun dakon kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ tawit uŋudon kɨwit. Kɨŋek paŋdetni kosiron yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat amɨn da nak do namɨn yaŋ yoŋ?”
41008028	Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Dɨwarɨ da gak do Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn yaŋ yoŋ, ae dɨ da Elaija yaŋ yoŋ, ae dɨ da kombɨ amɨn kɨnda kalɨp egɨpgut uŋun da pɨdak da egɨsak yaŋ yoŋ.”
41008029	Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ae dɨsi nak do namɨn yaŋ yoŋ?” Yaŋban Pita da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Kristo.”
41008030	Yaŋban Yesu da mibɨlni amɨn dɨmasi yoyɨni do yoyɨgɨt.
41008031	Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu da wasaŋek paŋdetni yoyɨŋ degek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Dakon Monji da tepmɨ madepsi pakdɨsak. Aŋakwan kɨla amɨn, ae mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da manji ɨmɨŋek aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak. Kɨmagek gɨldat kapbɨ aŋakwan kɨmoron da pɨdokdɨsak.”
41008032	Gen uŋun yaŋ teŋteŋaŋban Pita da Yesu abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ ɨleŋɨkon agek tebai iyɨgɨt.
41008033	Mani Yesu da tobɨl paŋdetni pɨndagek Pita gen tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Sunduk, gak nepmaŋ det. Gak Piŋkop dakon nandak nandak dɨma yoldal, amɨn dakon nandak nandak yoldal.”
41008034	-
41008035	Yaŋ iyɨŋek amɨn kabɨ madep gat paŋdetni gat yoyɨŋban iyɨ akgɨron apgwit. Apba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon yɨyɨtni tagɨsi tosak do nandaŋek pi madep asak kaŋ, egɨp egɨpni pasɨl ɨmjak. Mani amɨn kɨnda nak do nandaŋek, ae Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi do nandaŋek, egɨp egɨpni do nandaban yo madep dɨma asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn asak. Amɨn kɨnda nak nol do nandɨsak kaŋ, iyɨ dakon galaktok manji yomɨŋek tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨgek noljak.
41008036	-
41008037	Amɨn kɨnda mɨktɨm dakon yo morap kɨsi paŋ egakwan egɨp egɨpni pasɨl ɨmjak kaŋ, uŋun yo morap da arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋpulugoni. Egɨp egɨpni uŋun yo kɨnda naŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma yumjak, wagɨlsi pasɨl ɨmjak.
41008038	Abɨsok mɨŋat amɨnyo ekwaŋ uŋun Piŋkop manji ɨmɨŋek yo yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ aŋ. Uŋun kabɨkon da amɨn kɨnda nak ae geno do mayagɨ nandɨsak kaŋ, Datni dakon tɨlɨmni paŋek telagɨ aŋelo kabɨ gat apni bɨsapmon, Amɨn Dakon Monji da uŋun amɨn do mayagɨ yaŋ gɨn nandakdɨsak.”
41009001	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, on akgaŋ kabɨkon dɨ dɨma kɨmagek Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni tapmɨmɨ toŋsi apban kokdaŋ.”
41009002	Gɨldat 6 mudaŋakwa Yesu da Pita, Jems, ae Jon yoyɨŋban buŋon yolba ɨleŋ dubagɨ kɨndakon wɨgɨwit. Ɨleŋon iyɨ gɨn egek kaŋakwa Yesu dakon gɨptɨm kulabɨk aŋek ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
41009003	Aŋakwan Yesu dakon ɨmalni kwakwagɨsi teŋteŋagɨt. Uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨma agagɨ, kwakwagɨsi agɨt.
41009004	Yaŋ aban kaŋakwa Elaija gat Moses gat altaŋbal Yesu gat gen yaŋ nandat aba pɨndakgwit.
41009005	Yaŋ aba Pita da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, nin ɨdon egɨp do tagɨsi nandamaŋ. Nin yut kabeŋ kapbɨ aneŋ. Kɨnda gak do, kɨnda Moses do, ae kɨnda Elaija do aneŋ.”
41009006	(Pita gat notni gat madepsi pasalgwit, ae ni gen baŋ yoneŋ yaŋ kɨnda dɨma nandawit, do Pita gen uŋun yumsi yagɨt.)
41009007	Yaŋ yaŋban gɨkwem da pɨŋ ɨlɨmɨk yomaŋakwan gen kɨnda uŋungwan da yaŋ altagɨt, “Uŋun Monjɨno, nak uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat. Ji geni nandani.”
41009008	Gen uŋun nandaŋek uŋudon gɨn terɨ terɨ sɨŋtaŋek amɨn bamot ae dɨma pɨndakgwit. Yesu iyɨ gɨn kawit.
41009009	Ɨleŋon da tobɨl pɨŋek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yo uŋun pɨndakgaŋ uŋun dakon gen amɨn kɨnda dɨmasi iyɨni. Aŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji kɨmoron da pɨdosak, uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn tagɨ yoyɨni.”
41009010	Yoyɨŋban paŋdetni da gen uŋun iyɨ gɨn yaŋ nandaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Kɨmoron da pɨdot pɨdot uŋun yo kɨnda nido nandaŋek yosok.”
41009011	Aŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da gen kɨnda yaŋ yoŋ ‘Elaija mibɨltok abɨŋakwan Kristo buŋon apjak.’ Gen uŋun nido yoŋ?”
41009012	-
41009013	Iyɨŋba Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen uŋun bamɨ yoŋ. Elaija kɨlɨ abɨŋ yo morap paŋmɨlɨp agɨt. Aŋakwan amɨn da galaktokni yolek yo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun da tɨlagon aŋ ɨmgwit. Mani Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda mandabi uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji manji ɨmɨŋek yo yokwi madepsi aŋ ɨmdaŋ.’ Uŋun gen mibɨlɨ nido tosok?”
41009014	Yesu paŋdetni kapbɨ gat kɨŋ notni kabɨkon altawit. Kɨŋ altaŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep notni paŋgwasɨŋba pɨndakgwit. Ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn dɨwarɨ da apba notni gat gen emat aba pɨndakgwit.
41009015	Aŋakwa mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep Yesu kaŋek but galak nandaŋek uŋudon gɨn Yesukon kɨŋek “Gɨldat tagɨ!” yaŋ iyɨwit.
41009016	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji gen emat nido aŋ?”
41009017	Yaŋban uŋun mɨŋat amɨn kabɨkon da amɨn kɨnda da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, monjɨno koŋ da burɨkon yɨgek gen yogok kositni sopmaŋdak, do gagon aŋobɨsat.
41009018	Koŋ da bɨsap morapmɨ yaŋ asak. Monjɨno tebai abɨdaŋek maban mɨktɨmon maŋ pagek tarak kwakwagɨ da gen kaganikon pawɨŋ tɨmɨkdak, aŋakwan geni wamtɨmsisak, ae gɨptɨmɨ kɨsisi kɨtɨraŋ kɨsak. Nak paŋdetgoni koŋ yolni do yoyɨko aŋtɨdok aŋ, uŋun da arɨpmɨ dɨmasi yolyolɨ.”
41009019	Gen uŋun nandaŋek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nandaŋ gadatji mɨni amɨn nak bɨsap niaŋ da ji gat egɨpbeŋ? Ae bɨsap niaŋ da ji dakon jɨgɨ guramɨkgeŋ? Monjɨ uŋun nagon aŋopgut.”
41009020	Yaŋ yaŋban monjɨ uŋun Yesukon aŋopgwit. Aŋopba koŋ da Yesu kaŋek uŋudon gɨn monjɨ maban mɨktɨmon pagek tobɨl tobɨl aŋek tarak kwakwagɨ da gen kaganikon pawɨŋ tɨmɨkgɨt.
41009021	Yaŋ aban Yesu da datni iyɨgɨt, “Bɨsap niaŋ da yaŋ agɨt?” Yaŋban datni da yagɨt, “Ŋakŋagɨkon da altaŋ ɨmgut da tosok.
41009022	Bɨsap morapmɨ koŋ da aŋakgo kɨmotjak yaŋ nandaŋek maban kɨndapmon ae pakbikon pɨgɨgɨt. Tapmɨm taŋ gamɨsak kaŋ, nit do bupmɨ nandaŋek paŋpulugoki.”
41009023	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Tapmɨm taŋ namɨsak bo dɨma nido but bamot aŋ namɨsal? Amɨn nandaŋ gadatni toŋ uŋun yo morap tagɨ aŋ mudoni.”
41009024	Iyɨŋban uŋudon gɨn monjɨ dakon datni da madepsi yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak nandaŋ gadasat, mani nandaŋ gadatno uŋun madep dɨma, do nak aŋpuluga!”
41009025	Yaŋban Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep tɨmtɨm yaŋek apba pɨndagek koŋ tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Koŋ, gen kaga ae mɨrak sopsop amɨn, gak monjɨ on yɨpmaŋdet! Wagɨl kɨŋek buŋon on monjɨgwan dɨmasi pɨgɨki!”
41009026	Yaŋban koŋ da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek monjɨ uŋun maban bumjot yombem pagakwan koŋ yɨpmaŋek wɨŋ kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da monjɨ kaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Kuŋwakni.”
41009027	Mani Yesu da kɨsirɨkon abɨdaŋek aban pɨdaŋ akgɨt.
41009028	Yaŋ aŋek Yesu yut kɨndakon wɨgakwan paŋdetni da iyɨ gɨn egek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nido koŋ uŋun nin da yol do aŋtɨdok amaŋ?”
41009029	Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Koŋ uŋuden uŋun yum yolyolɨ dɨma. Bɨsiron da tagɨ yolyolɨ.”
41009030	-
41009031	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat mɨktɨm uŋun yɨpmaŋek Galili mɨktɨm da binapgwan kɨwit. Kɨŋakwa Yesu paŋdetni yoyɨŋdet ak do nandagɨt, do gen bini amɨn da dɨma nandani do si pasɨlek kɨwit. Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Dakon Monji don amɨn da kɨsiron yɨpba aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak. Kɨmak gɨldat kapbɨ aŋakwan kɨmoron da pɨdokdɨsak.”
41009032	Yaŋ yoyɨŋban gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt ae iyɨk do si pasalgwit.
41009033	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Kapaneam kokupmon kɨŋ pɨsaŋek yutnon wɨgek Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kosiron ji ni gen naŋ yaŋ?”
41009034	Kosiron gen emat aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Nin kabɨkon namɨn da mibɨltok amɨn asak?” Yaŋ yawit, do gen kobogɨ iyɨk do mayak tawit.
41009035	Aŋakwa pabɨŋ yɨgek paŋdetni 12 kabɨ yoyɨŋban apba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda mibɨltok amɨn ak do nandɨsak kaŋ, buŋonsi agek amɨn morap dakon oman amɨn egɨpjak.”
41009036	Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn monɨŋ kɨnda abɨdaŋ aŋobɨŋ bɨkbɨknikon yɨpban agakwan kɨsirɨ da abɨdaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
41009037	“Amɨn kɨnda nak do nandaŋek amɨn monɨŋ oden kɨnda but da abɨdosak kaŋ, uŋun nak naŋ abɨdosok. Ae amɨn kɨnda nak abɨdosak kaŋ, uŋun nak naŋ gɨn dɨma abɨdosok, Datno nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun naŋ abɨdosok.”
41009038	Yaŋban Jon da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, nin kaŋapno amɨn kɨnda da gak da manon koŋ yolban kamaŋ. Mani nin da kabɨkon nani kɨnda dɨma, do yaŋsop aŋ ɨmɨmaŋ.”
41009039	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Dɨma kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmni. Amɨn kɨnda nak dakon man yaŋek wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ asak uŋun amɨn nikon da nak do yaŋba yokwi tok asak? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma.
41009040	Amɨn kɨnda uwal dɨma aŋ nimjak amɨn uŋun notnin.
41009041	Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda nak do nandaŋek ji do Kristo dakon amɨn kabɨ yaŋ nandaŋek pakbi koleŋ damjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn dakon yumaŋ nogɨ dɨma pasɨl ɨmjak.”
41009042	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn monɨŋ kɨnda nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨŋakwan yokwi asak do yabekban yokwi asak kaŋ, yabet asak amɨn wit mɨsɨŋɨt tɨp madep kɨnda tegɨkon amɨn da wamaŋ maba tap ɨlarɨsigwan pɨgek tagɨ kɨmotjak.
41009043	-
41009044	“Kɨsitgo da yokwi aki do gayɨŋban kaŋ, kɨsitgo mandaŋ dagoki. Gwɨnɨmbɨl egek Tɨpdomon kɨndap tebanon pɨgɨki yaŋ do kɨsitgo mandaŋ dagaŋek tagapmɨ egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn aki.
41009045	-
41009046	Ae kandapgo da yokwi aki do gayɨŋban kaŋ, kandapgo mandaŋ dagoki. Gwɨnɨmbɨl egek Tɨpdomon kɨndap tebanon pɨgɨki yaŋ do kandapgo mandaŋ dagaŋek tagapmɨ egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn aki.
41009047	Ae dabɨlgo da yokwi aki do gayɨŋban kaŋ, dabɨlgo pɨlɨkgi. Gwɨnɨmbɨl egek Tɨpdomon kɨndap tebanon pɨgɨki yaŋ do dabɨlgo kɨnda pɨlɨgek tagapmɨ Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asagon tagɨ wɨgɨki.
41009048	‘Tɨpdomon namat dɨma kɨmokgoŋ, ae kɨndap dɨma kɨmokdok.’
41009049	Tap gat kɨndap gat amɨn kɨsikon altosak.
41009050	Tap uŋun yo galagɨsi. Mani tap dakon galagɨ pasɨljak kaŋ, niaŋsi aŋek galagɨni aŋkaluk aneŋ? Ji tap yombem egek notji gat but kaloŋsi egɨpni.”
41010001	Yesu uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek Judia mɨktɨmon ae Jodan Pakbi terɨ kɨnda uŋudon kɨgɨt. Uŋudon egakwan mɨŋat amɨn madepsi apgwit. Apba Yesu iyɨ aŋ aŋ agɨt uŋudeŋ ae Piŋkop gen yoyɨgɨt.
41010002	Yoyɨŋakwan Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ da abɨŋ Yesu gen yokwi kɨnda yaŋban kaŋek gen pikon yɨpneŋ yaŋ nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gen tebanin da amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatni tagɨ kwɨnɨtjak do yosok bo dɨma?”
41010003	Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Moses da ni gen teban naŋ damgut?”
41010004	Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Moses da yaŋ mandagɨt: Amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatni kwɨnɨt do kaŋ, mɨŋat paŋkwɨnɨt papia kɨnda mandaŋ ɨmɨŋek kwɨnɨtjak.”
41010005	Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yagɨt, “Moses uŋun but tebanji do aŋek gen teban uŋun mandagɨt.
41010006	Mani wasok wasogɨkon Piŋkop da amɨn wasaŋek ‘mɨŋat ae wɨliyo kɨsi wasagɨt.’
41010007	‘Uŋun do aŋek wɨli da meŋi datniyo yopmaŋek mɨŋatni gat muwukbal
41010008	gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ anjil.’ Gen yaŋ tosok, do amɨn wam da bamorɨ dɨma, gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ amal.
41010009	Uŋun do Piŋkop da mɨŋat wɨli kɨlɨ paŋmuwukgɨt, do amɨn da dɨma paŋwasekdo.”
41010010	Yaŋ yaŋban yutnon wɨgek paŋdetni da uŋun gen dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do iyɨwit.
41010011	IIyɨŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da mɨŋatni yɨpmaŋek kɨŋ mɨŋat kalugɨ pasak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yumabi asak.
41010012	Ae mɨŋat kɨnda da eni yɨpmaŋek kɨŋ wɨli kalugɨ pasak kaŋ, uŋun mɨŋat yumabi asak.”
41010013	Amɨn da mɨŋat monjɨyoni Yesukon tɨmɨk paŋopgwit. Paŋobɨŋ Yesu da kɨsirɨ kwenikon wɨtjɨsak do iyɨwit. Mani paŋdetni da yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Dɨma paŋopni. Paŋkɨt!”
41010014	Yaŋba Yesu da burɨ yokwi taŋban yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat monjɨ yopba nagon apgut. Dɨma kɨrɨŋɨk yomni. Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun amɨn mɨŋat monjɨyo da tɨlagon ekwaŋ uŋuden amɨn dakon.
41010015	Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda da mɨŋat monjɨyo da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak abɨdoŋ uŋun da tɨlak dɨma abɨdoni kaŋ, uŋungwan arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨkdaŋ.”
41010016	Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da mɨŋat monjɨyo tɨmɨgek kɨsirɨ kwenikon wɨtjɨŋek gɨsam yomgut.
41010017	Yesu pɨdaŋ kɨk do aŋakwan amɨn kɨnda tɨmtɨm yaŋek abɨŋ gawak ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet gɨman, niaŋsi aŋek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokeŋ?”
41010018	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak nido nak do amɨn tagɨsi yaŋ nayɨsal? Piŋkop kaloŋɨ gɨn uŋun amɨn tagɨsi.
41010019	Gak gen teban nandaŋ mudosol, uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn dɨma dapba kɨmotni; mɨŋat eyo kɨlɨ abi ji yumabi dɨma ani; yo kabo dɨma noni; top dɨma yoni; top gen yaŋek amɨn notji yum dogɨn gen pikon dɨma yopni; amɨn dakon yo kabɨ paŋkɨlɨgek dɨma tɨmɨtni; meŋ dat do nandaba wukwanek geni guramɨtni.’ ”
41010020	Yaŋban amɨn uŋun yaŋ yagɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, nak monɨŋɨsogon da gen teban morap guramɨk aŋ aŋ opgum da obɨsat.”
41010021	Yaŋban Yesu da kaŋ galak taŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yo kaloŋɨ tosok uŋun dɨma asal. Gak kɨŋ yo morapgo yumaŋ naŋek uŋun dakon moneŋ baŋ yoni mɨni amɨn do yobi. Yaŋ aŋaki yo tagɨsi Kwen Kokupmon taŋ gamdɨsak. Yaŋ aŋek abɨŋ nak nol.”
41010022	Amɨn uŋun yoni morapmɨ taŋ ɨmgwit, do gen uŋun nandaŋ but yokwi nandaŋek si kɨgɨt.
41010023	Kɨŋakwan Yesu da paŋdetni pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yoni morapmɨ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan pɨgɨk do aŋtɨdok aŋ.”
41010024	Gen uŋun nandaŋek nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt. Mani Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Monjɨnoni, amɨn Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan pɨgɨk do aŋtɨdok aŋ.
41010025	Asisi, bɨt madepsi kamel uŋun da ɨmal bupbup da kosit gwagagon arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨgɨ asak. Mani uŋun yapmaŋek yoni morapmɨ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun da kagagwan arɨpmɨ dɨmasi pɨgɨgɨ asak.”
41010026	Yaŋban paŋdetni nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi aban notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Yaŋ kaŋ namɨn da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdosak?”
41010027	Yaŋba Yesu da paŋdet kabɨni pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn iyɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma ani, mani Piŋkop da arɨpmɨ tagɨ asak. Piŋkop da yo morap ak do tagɨ asak.”
41010028	Yaŋban Pita da Yesu gen kɨnda yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nin yo morap yopmaŋek gak naŋ gɨn gol awɨlgamaŋ.”
41010029	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda da nak do ae Gen Bin Tagɨsi do nandaŋek yutni, peni padɨk padɨkyo, sami, meŋi, datni, mɨŋat monjɨyoni, ae mɨktɨmni yopmaŋ detjak kaŋ,
41010030	tamoni do Piŋkop da yo madepsi ɨmdɨsak. Mɨktɨmon egɨpjak bɨsapmon yo morap kalɨp yopmaŋ dekgɨt uŋun dakon tɨlak yapmaŋek yo morapmɨ ɨmdɨsak. Uŋun amɨn da yutni, peni padɨk padɨkyo, sami, meŋi, mɨŋat monjɨyo ae mɨktɨm morapmɨsi tɨmɨtdɨsak. Mani uŋun gɨn dɨma, amɨn da yo yokwi aŋyomdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋakwa bɨsap madep apjak bɨsapmon egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokdɨsak.
41010031	Mani amɨn morapmɨ abɨsok mibɨltok ekwaŋ uŋun da buŋon amɨn akdaŋ. Aŋakwa amɨn morapmɨ abɨsok buŋon ekwaŋ uŋun da mibɨltok amɨn akdaŋ.”
41010032	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Jerusalem kokup papmon wɨgɨk do aŋek Yesu iyɨ mibɨltok aŋyoban kɨwit. Kɨŋakwa paŋdetni da nandak nandak morapmɨ aŋakwa amɨn buŋon yolgwit uŋun da but pasol awit. Yaŋ aŋakwa Yesu da paŋdetni 12 kabɨ aeni tɨmɨk paŋmuwugek yo altaŋ ɨmni uŋun dakon but pɨso yoyɨŋek
41010033	yaŋ yagɨt, “Nin abɨsok Jerusalem kɨŋapno amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn uŋun da kɨsiron yɨpdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek gen pikon yɨpmaŋek kɨmotjak do yaŋ dagok akdaŋ. Yaŋ dagok aŋek Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da kɨsiron yɨpdaŋ.
41010034	Uŋun amɨn kabɨ da aŋsolat aŋek, ɨlɨp sul ɨmɨŋek, baljaŋek aŋakba kɨmotjak. Gɨldat kapbɨ aŋakwan kɨmoron da pɨdokdɨsak.”
41010035	Jems gat Jon gat, Sebedi dakon monjɨ bamot, uŋun da Yesukon altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Yoyɨŋdet, nit yo kɨnda do gayɨkdamak, uŋun gak da abi do nandamak.”
41010036	Yaŋbal yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Niaŋ abeŋ do nandamal?”
41010037	Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Gak don tɨlɨmgo gat yɨkgi bɨsapmon nit kɨnda da gak da amɨn tetdo, ae kɨnda da gwandeŋ tet do yɨtdeŋ do nandamak.”
41010038	Yaŋbal Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil gen uŋun yomal uŋun dɨma nandaŋ pɨsaŋek yomal. Nak da tepmɨ madep pakdɨsat uŋun tagɨ panjil?”
41010039	Yaŋban iyɨgɨmal, “Tagɨ pandeŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋbal Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Uŋun asi, tepmɨ pakdɨsat uŋun pakdamal.
41010040	Mani, namɨn da nak da amɨn tet do yɨtjak, ae namɨn da gwandeŋ tet do yɨtjak uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma yaŋ dagokeŋ. Tamo uŋun Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlɨ manjɨŋ yopgut uŋun dakon gɨn.”
41010041	Paŋdetni 10 kabɨ gen uŋun nandaŋek Jems gat Jon gat do butjap nandawit.
41010042	Mani Yesu da yoyɨŋban opba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nandaŋ, Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ dakon amɨn tagɨ da iyɨ do nandaba wukwanek pi madepsi amɨn do yoba aŋ. Ae geni guramɨk kɨmotni do nandaŋ.
41010043	Mani uŋun dakon aŋpak uŋun jikon dɨma tosak. Jikon da amɨn kɨnda amɨn tagɨ man pak do nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn oman amɨnji egek amɨn tagɨ man pasak.
41010044	Amɨn kɨnda jikon da mibɨltok amɨn egɨp do nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn mɨŋat amɨn morap dakon oman amɨni egek mibɨltok amɨn tagɨ egɨpjak.
41010045	Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun yaŋ gɨn kɨlɨ agɨt. Amɨn da oman aŋɨmni do dɨma pɨgɨt. Iyɨ mɨŋat amɨn morap paŋpulugokdo, ae iyɨ dakon gɨptɨmnaŋ paregek yumaŋ naŋ yop do pɨgɨt.”
41010046	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Jeriko kokup papmon kɨŋ altawit. Yesu uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋ degakwan paŋdet kabɨni gat ae mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep gat kɨsi kɨwit. Kɨŋakwa kosit ɨleŋon amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni kɨnda yɨkgɨt, mani Batimeus, uŋun Timeus dakon monji. Uŋun amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni do amɨn da moneŋ ɨmni do bɨsit yoyɨŋek yɨkgɨt.
41010047	Yɨgakwan amɨn da “Yesu Nasaret amɨn obɨsak” yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek gen madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yagɨt, “Yesu, Dewit Dakon Monji, bupmɨ nandaŋ nam!”
41010048	Yaŋ tɨdaŋban amɨn morapmɨ da gen tebai iyɨŋek dɨma yaŋ tɨdosak do iyɨwit. Mani madepsi sigɨn yaŋ tɨdaŋek yagɨt, “Dewit Dakon Monji, bupmɨ nandaŋ nam!”
41010049	Yaŋ tɨdaŋban Yesu da nandaŋek kosiron agek yaŋ yagɨt, “Iyɨŋba apban.” Yaŋban amɨn da dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn yaŋ iyɨwit, “But galak nandaŋek pɨda. Opbi do yosok.”
41010050	Gen uŋun yaŋba nandaŋek ɨmalni kukwaŋ yɨpmaŋek Yesukon opgut.
41010051	Opban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak ninaŋ aŋgabeŋ do nandɨsal?” Yaŋban dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, nak sɨŋtok do nandɨsat.”
41010052	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨsal, do kɨlek taŋek kɨki.” Yaŋ iyɨŋban uŋudon gɨn dabɨlɨ sɨŋtaŋek Yesu yolgɨt.
41011001	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Jerusalem kokup pap aŋkapmat aŋek Betpage ae Betani kokupmon kɨŋ altawit. (Kokup bamot uŋun Ɨleŋ Olipmon tomal.) Altaŋek Yesu da paŋdetni bamorɨ yabegek,
41011002	yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil ason kokup komaŋ uŋudon kɨŋ altaŋek uŋudon gɨn donki bɨlagɨ kɨnda napmon akban konjil. Uŋun donki amɨn da kwenikon dɨma yɨkbi. Napmɨ wɨtdalek aŋopjil.
41011003	Amɨn kɨnda da ‘Nido yaŋ amal’ yaŋ dayɨŋban kaŋ yaŋ iyɨnjil, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ da pi kɨnda ak do aŋek yosok. Donjok yɨpban opdɨsak.’ ”
41011004	Uŋun amɨn bamot kɨŋ donki bɨlagɨ uŋun kosiron kagɨmal. Uŋun amɨn kɨnda da yoma kagakon gwɨlɨkba akgɨt. Napmɨ wɨtdalbal,
41011005	amɨn akgwit en da pɨndagek yawit, “Nibaŋ ak do aŋek on donki bɨlagɨ wɨtdalgamal?”
41011006	Yaŋba Yesu da gen yoyɨgɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn yoyɨgɨmal. Abal nandaŋ yomɨŋakwa donki aŋkɨgɨmal.
41011007	Yesukon altaŋek ɨmalni ɨlɨk donki bɨlagɨ da kwenon yopmaŋakwal Yesu pawɨgɨ uŋudon yɨkgɨt.
41011008	Yaŋ aŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da kosiron ɨmalni yalɨwit. Aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ da kɨŋ kɨndap kɨlɨŋ mandaŋ paŋobɨŋ kosiron yalɨwit
41011009	Amɨn mibɨltok kɨwit ae buŋon yolgwit kɨsi da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Osana! Piŋkop aŋkɨsino! ‘Piŋkop dakon gɨsamɨ toŋ amɨn uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ da manon abɨsak.’
41011010	Osana! Babɨknin Dewit da amɨn kɨla agɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn on amɨn kɨla amɨn madepnin egɨp do abɨsak, uŋun do Piŋkop Wɨkwisi Kwen Kokup Amɨn aŋkɨsino!”
41011011	Yesu Jerusalem kɨŋ altaŋek Telagɨ Yut Madep uŋun da nagalgwan pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨgɨ yo morap pɨndak aŋ aŋ kɨgɨt, mani gɨldat pɨgɨk do aŋakwan paŋdetni 12 kabɨ gat tobɨlek Betani kokupmon kɨwit.
41011012	Wɨsa dagaŋakwan Betani kokup yɨpmaŋ dek obɨŋ kosiron Yesu jap do agɨt.
41011013	Yaŋ aŋek pik kɨndap kɨnda dubagɨkon da tam dɨrɨm kagɨt. Yaŋ kaŋek bamɨ dɨ toŋ bo dɨma yaŋ do kapmatjok da kɨŋ wɨsɨgɨt. Mani bamɨ dɨ dɨma pɨndakgɨt. Tamɨ gɨn pɨndakgɨt, nido pik kɨndap dakon bamɨ toktok bɨsap dɨma.
41011014	Yesu da kɨndap uŋun yaŋ kaŋek yagɨt, “Buŋon bamɨ dɨmasi toki, aŋaki amɨn da dɨmasi paŋ noni dosi nandɨsat.” Gen yagɨt uŋun paŋdetni da nandawit.
41011015	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Jerusalem kɨŋ altawit. Kɨŋ altaŋek Yesu Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan pɨgɨ pɨndakban amɨn moneŋ ɨlɨt pi awit. Uŋun wasaŋek amɨn yolban waŋga abɨgɨwit. Yaŋ aŋek moneŋ kulabɨk awit amɨn dakon tamo, ae mɨnam baŋ moneŋ ɨlɨt awit amɨn dakon tamo uŋun kɨsi paŋtobɨlban tagal kɨwit.
41011016	Yaŋ aŋek amɨn Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan yoni tɨmɨgek kɨŋ ap dɨma ani do yaŋsop aŋyomgut.
41011017	Yaŋsop aŋyomɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨŋ dekgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ mandabi: ‘Nak dakon yut uŋun amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun da abɨŋ bɨsit aŋnamni do tosak.’ Mani ji da kulabɨk aba ‘kabo noknok dakon pasɨlɨ tamo asak.’ ”
41011018	Yaŋ yaŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gen uŋun nandaŋek Yesu aŋakba kɨmotjak do kosit wɨsɨwit. Uŋun Yesu do si pasalgwit, nido mɨŋat amɨnyo da Yesu dakon gen yogokni do tamtam yawit.
41011019	Yaŋ yaŋakwa pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Jerusalem yɨpmaŋek kɨwit.
41011020	Wɨsa dagokdo Yesu gat paŋdetni gat kosiron kɨwit. Kɨŋek pik kɨndap uŋun kɨlɨ wagɨlsi kɨbɨdagɨt kawit.
41011021	Yaŋ kaŋek Pita da Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, ka! Apma pik kɨndap yokwi tosak do yagɨl abɨsok oni kɨbɨdak!”
41011022	Yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni.
41011023	Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda da ɨleŋ kɨnda yaŋ iyɨsak, ‘Gak pɨdaŋ tap kaga pɨgɨ’ yaŋ iyɨŋek but bamot dɨma asak kaŋ, uŋun iyɨsak uŋudeŋ gɨn altokdɨsak.
41011024	Uŋun do nak yaŋ dayɨsat, ni yo kɨnda do Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨŋek yo uŋun tɨmɨtni do nandaŋ gadaŋ kɨmotni kaŋ, yaŋ gɨn tɨmɨtdaŋ.
41011025	-
41011026	Ji bɨsit ani bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda da yokwi aŋ damgut kaŋ, yokwini yopmaŋ ɨbi. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, Kwen Kokup Datji da yokwisi yaŋ gɨn yopdɨsak.”
41011027	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat aeni Jerusalem kɨŋ altawit. Aŋek Yesu Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan pɨgɨ agɨpgut. Agakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ, ae gen teban dakon yoyɨŋdet amɨn, ae kɨla amɨn Yesukon opgwit. Obɨŋek yaŋ iyɨwit,
41011028	“Namɨn da pi uŋun abi do yaŋ mudaŋ gamgut da yo uŋun asal? Ae namɨn da man madep gamgut?”
41011029	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak jibaŋ gen kɨnda dayɨkdɨsat. Dayɨko kobogɨ nayɨni kaŋ, nakyo kɨsi kobogɨ tagɨ dayɨkeŋ.
41011030	Jon telagɨ pakbi sogɨt bɨsapmon, Piŋkop da yabekban pi agɨt, bo amɨn da yabekba agɨt? Uŋun do nayɨni.”
41011031	Yaŋban iyɨ gɨn notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Kobogɨ ni gen kɨnda naŋ iyɨneŋ? ‘Piŋkop da yabekgɨt’ yaŋ iyɨneŋ kaŋ, gen tebai yaŋ niyɨsak, ‘Ji nido dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit?’
41011032	Mani ‘Amɨn da yabekgɨt’ yaŋ iyɨneŋ kaŋ, uŋun kɨsi tagɨ dɨma asak, nido amɨn morapmɨ da Jon do kombɨ amɨn bamɨsi kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋ. Do Jon dakon man bin aŋupbal aneŋ kaŋ nindapdaŋ.” Yaŋ do si pasalek
41011033	Yesu do gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin dɨma nandamaŋ.” Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nakyo kɨsi namɨn da pi uŋun abeŋ do yaŋ mudaŋ namgut da pi asat uŋun dɨma dayɨkeŋ.”
41012001	Ae Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da wain pini aŋek nagal agɨt. Aŋek uŋun nagalon wain sop bamaŋ tɨl do gapma kɨnda wayɨkgɨt. Aŋek kɨla amɨn da kabo noknok pɨndat do yut dubak kɨnda wɨtjɨŋban wɨgɨgɨt. Yut wɨtjɨŋek kɨla amɨn da pini aŋek bamɨ pakpak bɨsapmon bamɨ dɨ namni yaŋ nandaŋek wain pi uŋun da kɨsiron yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm dubagɨkon kɨgɨt.
41012002	“Wain sop pakpak bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan oman monjɨ kɨnda yabekban wain bamɨ tɨmɨk paŋopjak do kɨgɨt.
41012003	Kɨŋ altaŋban wain pi dakon kɨla amɨn da uŋun pi monjɨ abɨdaŋ aŋagek bamɨ kɨnda dɨma ɨmɨŋek yɨpba kɨgɨt.
41012004	Yaŋ aba pi ami da aeni oman monjɨ kɨnda yabekdak. Uŋun pi monjɨ busuŋɨkon aŋagek yo yokwisi aŋɨmgwit.
41012005	Yaŋ aba kɨnda gat yabekban kwan aŋakba kɨmakgɨt. Yaŋ aba pi monjɨ morapmɨ yabekgɨt. Dɨwarɨ si baljaŋek dɨwarɨ dapba kɨmakgwit.
41012006	“Dapmaŋakwa kaloŋɨ kɨnda egɨpgut uŋun iyɨ dakon monji. Monji uŋun do galagɨsi nandagɨt. Buŋon iyɨ dakon monji yabegek yaŋ nandagɨt, ‘Monjɨno kwan kɨla amɨn da uŋun do nandaba wukwanek geni nandaŋek bamɨ dɨ ɨmni.’
41012007	“Mani kɨla amɨn da monjɨ kaŋek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, ‘Amɨn on da egɨ don datni dakon yo morap tɨmɨtdɨsak, do nin amɨn on aŋagek wain pini nin do aŋawatneŋ.’
41012008	Yaŋ yaŋek monjɨ uŋun aŋakba kɨmakgɨt. Kɨmakban bumjotni pigaga naŋ maba waŋga kɨgɨt.
41012009	“Ji niaŋ nandaŋ? Don pi ami da abɨŋ pi kɨla amɨn niaŋ aŋyomjak? Pi ami da abɨŋ uŋun kɨla amɨn dapban kɨmotdaŋ. Dapban kɨmagakwa wain pi uŋun amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ da kɨsiron yɨpdɨsak.
41012010	Ji Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun dɨma manjɨŋ nandawit? Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Yut agak amɨn da gwak yokwi yaŋ yaŋek maba kɨgɨt, uŋun gwak amɨn da yut kodɨgɨkon tɨp kɨnda naŋ tɨdawit da akdak.
41012011	Yo uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ da agɨt, aŋakwan nin da kono yo masɨ masɨmɨsi asak.’ ”
41012012	Yaŋ yoyɨŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae kɨla amɨn da “Tɨlak gen uŋun nin do yosok” yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu abɨdok do nandawit. Mani mɨŋat amɨn do pasalek yɨpba si kɨgɨt.
41012013	Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ gat ae Erot da kabɨkon amɨn dɨwarɨ gat da Yesu dakon gen nandaŋek suŋ kɨnda yaŋban abɨdoni do kɨla amɨn da yabekgwit.
41012014	Yesukon kɨŋ altaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, gak gen bamɨ yogok amɨn yaŋ nandamaŋ. Gak amɨn do dɨma pasoldol. Amɨn mani toŋ ae amɨn mani mɨni uŋun kɨsi Piŋkop dakon aŋpak yoyɨŋ dek mudosol. Gak niaŋ nandɨsal? Sisa do moneŋ ɨmno tagɨ asak bo dɨma? Ɨmneŋ bo dɨma?”
41012015	Mani Yesu da uŋun jamba but amɨn yaŋ nandaŋ yomɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido nak aŋkewalgaŋ? Moneŋ tabɨlɨ kɨnda aŋabɨŋ naba koko.”
41012016	Moneŋ tabɨlɨ kɨnda aŋobɨŋ ɨba abɨdaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On wup gat ae man mandabi gat uŋun namɨn dakon?” Yaŋban yaŋ yawit, “Sisa dakon.”
41012017	Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Sisa dakon yo uŋun Sisa iyɨ do ɨmni, ae Piŋkop dakon yo uŋun Piŋkop iyɨ do ɨmni.” Gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek Yesu do nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
41012018	Yaŋ aŋakwa Sadyusi amɨn dɨwarɨ da Yesukon apgwit. (Uŋun amɨn kabɨ amɨn kɨmakbi arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨdoni yaŋ nandaŋ.) Abɨŋek yaŋ iyɨwit,
41012019	“Yoyɨŋdet, Moses da gen kɨnda yaŋ mandagɨt, ‘Amɨn kɨnda monjɨ mɨni da kɨmagakwan mɨŋatni ɨsal egɨpjak kaŋ, padɨge da paŋakwan monjɨ paŋalasak.’
41012020	Bɨsap kɨndakon peni padɨge 7 kabɨ egɨpgwit. Mibɨltok nani uŋun mɨŋat paŋek monji mɨni egek kɨmakgɨt.
41012021	Kɨmakban uŋun da buŋon nani da sakwabat paŋek yaŋ gɨn monji mɨni egɨ kɨmakgɨt. Ae uŋun da buŋon nani yaŋ gɨn agɨt.
41012022	Uŋuden gɨn notni dɨwarɨ kɨsi mɨŋat uŋun paŋek monji mɨni da kɨmakgwit. Kɨmagakwa mɨŋat uŋun don kɨmakgɨt.
41012023	Wɨli 7 kabɨ kɨsi da pawit, do amɨn da kɨmoron da pɨdoni bɨsap madepmon namɨn dakon mɨŋatni asak?”
41012024	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun dɨma kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋ. Ae Piŋkop dakon teban tok tosok uŋun kɨsi dɨma kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋ. Uŋun do aŋek ji gen gulusuŋ yoŋ.
41012025	Kɨmakbi da pɨdoni bɨsapmon mɨŋat eyo agak dɨma tokdɨsak. Aŋelo Kwen Kokup ɨsal ekwaŋ uŋun da tɨlagon egɨpdaŋ.
41012026	Nak amɨn da kɨmoron da pɨdot pɨdot uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dayɨkeŋ. Moses da gen kɨnda mandagɨt ji manjɨŋ nandaŋ bo dɨma? Moses da kɨndap kɨnda soŋban kaŋakwan Piŋkop da gen yaŋ iyɨgɨt: ‘Nak Abraham, Aisak, ae Jekop dakon Piŋkop.’
41012027	Uŋun do nak yaŋ dayɨsat, Piŋkop uŋun amɨn kɨmakbi dakon Piŋkop dɨma, amɨn egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun dakon Piŋkop.”
41012028	Aŋakwan gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn kɨnda da abɨŋ pɨndakban Yesu gat Sadyusi amɨn gat gen emat awit. Yesu da gen kobogɨ tagɨsi yoyɨŋban nandaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ni gen teban da gen teban morap yapmaŋ mudaŋek mibɨltok asak?”
41012029	Yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gen teban mibɨltok asak uŋun yaŋ: ‘Israel amɨn kabɨ, gen uŋun nandani. Amɨn Tagɨ kaloŋ gɨn uŋun Piŋkopnin.
41012030	Ji Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji uŋun but gat, ae wup gat, ae tapmɨmgo gat, ae nandak nandakgo gat kɨsi but dasi galak taŋ ɨbi.’
41012031	Ae uŋun da buŋon yaŋ tosok: ‘Gaga do but dasi niaŋ galak tosol, uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yobi.’ Uŋun gen teban bamot da gen teban morap yapmaŋ mudomal.”
41012032	Yaŋban uŋun gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, tagɨsi yosol. Uŋun asisi, Piŋkop uŋun kaloŋ dagɨn egɨsak, ae Piŋkop kɨnda dɨma egɨsak.
41012033	Notgo do galagɨ niaŋ nandɨsal uŋun si yapmaŋek Piŋkop do galagɨ madepsi nandaŋ ɨmni. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ uŋun do nandaŋek ae oman aŋ ɨmɨŋek egɨpni. Yaŋ aŋek gaga do but dasi niaŋ galak tosol, uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yobi. Uŋun gen bamot da mukwa sogok mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yapmaŋ mudomal.”
41012034	Yaŋban Yesu da amɨn nandaŋ kokwini toŋ kɨnda da yosok yaŋ nandaŋek iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun gak kɨlɨ aŋkwaŋ asal.” Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn morap Yesu gen saŋbeŋek iyɨk do pasalgwit.
41012035	Yesu telagɨ yut nagalgwan egek amɨn yoyɨŋ degek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da gen kɨnda yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Kristo uŋun Dewit dakon yawi dɨwatni.’ Mibɨlɨ nido yaŋ yoŋ?
41012036	Dewit Telagɨ Wup da aŋpulugaŋban iyɨ yaŋ yagɨt: ‘Piŋkop da nak dakon Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak abɨŋ nak da amɨnsi tet do yɨkbɨ don uwalgo kandap gɨbaŋgogwan yopbo gengo guramɨtni.” ’
41012037	Dewit da uŋun amɨn do Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, do Kristo uŋun Dewit dakon yawi dɨwatni dɨma, uŋun Amɨn Tagɨni.” Yesu da gen uŋun yaŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep da nandaŋ galak tawit.
41012038	Aŋakwa Yesu da yoyɨŋ degek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da dayɨŋdet aŋ uŋun do pɨndak kɨmotni. Uŋun amɨn ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni dubagɨ paŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo da makeron ‘gɨldat tagɨ’ yaŋ yoyɨni yaŋ do galak toŋ.
41012039	Muwut muwut yutnikon ae jap noknok bɨsap madepmon amɨn mani toŋ da yɨyɨt tamokon yɨt do galak toŋ.
41012040	Uŋun amɨn sakwabat paŋkewalek yutni tɨmɨkgaŋ. Ae amɨn da pɨndatni yaŋ do bɨsit dubagɨsi aŋ. Uŋuden amɨn gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon kobogɨ do yo jɨgɨsi pakdaŋ.”
41012041	Yesu Telagɨ Yut Madepmon wɨgek paret yopyop tamo da kapmatjok yɨkgɨt. Yɨgek pɨndagakwan amɨn morapmɨ da paret yopgwit. Moneŋ morapmɨ taŋ yomgwit amɨn uŋun da moneŋ madep yopgwit.
41012042	Aŋakwa sakwabat yoni mɨni kɨnda da abɨŋ moneŋ gɨmani tabɨlɨ bamorɨ monɨŋɨsisok paret yopyop tamokon yopgut.
41012043	Yaŋ yopban kaŋek Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ paŋmuwugek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, on sakwabat uŋun da paret yopmaŋdak uŋun da amɨn morap da yopmaŋ si yapmaŋdak.
41012044	Amɨn morap uŋun moneŋni morapmɨ taŋ yomaŋakwa dɨwarɨ gɨn paret ɨdapmon yopmaŋ. Mani on mɨŋat wadak wadaksi aŋek moneŋni kɨsi yopmaŋdak. Kɨlɨ jap yumaŋ nosak moneŋni dɨ dɨma taŋ ɨmaŋ.”
41013001	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat telagɨ yut madep dakon nagal yɨpmaŋ waŋga pɨŋakwa monjɨ kɨnda da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, tɨp madepsi baŋ yut tagɨsisi dɨ awit do dɨgo pɨndat!”
41013002	Yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “On yut madep pɨndakdal, uŋun dakon tɨp notni da kwenon dɨma taŋ taŋ akdaŋ. Tuwɨlba kɨsisi maŋ mudokdaŋ.”
41013003	Yesu Ɨleŋ Olipmon yɨgakwan Telagɨ Yut Madep ason tet tagɨt. Aŋakwan Pita, Jems, Jon ae Andru da iyɨ gɨn Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit,
41013004	“Gak da gen uŋun yal, uŋun ni bɨsapmon altokdaŋ? Ni yo da mibɨltok altaŋban kaŋek uŋun yo morap altosak dakon bɨsap kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandaneŋ?”
41013005	Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn da paŋkewalni do kaŋ kɨmotni.
41013006	Amɨn morapmɨ da abɨŋ nak dakon man yaŋek yaŋ yokdaŋ, ‘Nak naga Kristo.’ Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn morapmɨ paŋkewaldaŋ.
41013007	Uŋun bɨsapmon emat wuwɨk gat ae dubagɨkon emat aŋ uŋun dakon gen bin apba nandaŋek butji dɨma pasolni. Uŋun yo morap altokdaŋ, mani mɨktɨm da mudosak bɨsap madep kɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ dɨma nandani.
41013008	Mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn da pɨdaŋba mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn gat emat wamdaŋ. Ae kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda dakon amɨn da pɨdaŋba kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda dakon amɨn gat emat wamdaŋ. Aŋakwa mɨktɨm dɨwarɨkon wudɨp akdɨsak, ae mɨktɨm dɨwarɨkon amɨn da jap do madepsi aŋek dɨwarɨ da kɨmotdaŋ. Mɨŋat monjɨ kwapmɨ toŋ da monjɨ altok do aŋek sugaŋba tepmɨ nandaŋ, uŋudeŋ gɨn uŋun yo morap altoni bɨsapmon, bɨsap madep kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandani.
41013009	“Uŋun bɨsapmon ji dɨsi do kɨla ani. Amɨn da gen pikon depdaŋ ae Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon pawɨgɨ nap kɨrɨŋbaŋ baljokdaŋ. Ji nak nandaŋ namaŋ do amɨn da ji paŋkɨ mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep da ɨŋamon depba atdaŋ. Uŋun bɨsapmon nak dakon gen yoyɨni.
41013010	Mɨktɨm da mudosak bɨsap madep tepmɨ dɨma apdɨsak. Mibɨltok amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun da Gen Bin Tagɨsi nandani.
41013011	Amɨn da ji tɨmɨk paŋpaŋ gen pikon depni bɨsapmon dɨma pasolni. Ni gen baŋ yoyɨneŋ yaŋ dɨma nandani. Uŋun bɨsapmon Piŋkop da ni gen dayɨsak uŋun baŋ yoyɨni. Yaŋ aŋakwa ji dakon gen dɨma asak, uŋun Telagɨ Wup dakon gen asak.
41013012	“Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da yaŋ akdaŋ: peni kɨnda da padɨge uwal da kɨsiron yɨpban aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak, ae amɨn kɨnda da mɨŋat monjɨyoni uwal da kɨsiron yopban dapba kɨmotdaŋ, ae mɨŋat monjɨyo da meŋi datniyo do yaŋ gɨn akdaŋ.
41013013	Yaŋ aba ji nak nolgaŋ do aŋek amɨn kɨsi morap da ji do butjap nandakdaŋ. Mani tebai agek egɨ wɨgakwa bɨsap madepmon wɨgɨsak amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtdɨsak.”
41013014	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo yokwisi amɨn paŋupbal ak kɨnda don dɨma toktogɨ tamokon akban kokdaŋ.” (On gen manjɨsak amɨn da pakyaŋsi nandɨsak.) “Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn Judia mɨktɨmon egɨpni uŋun pasal kabapgwan tepmɨsi wɨgɨni.
41013015	Amɨn kɨnda yut kwenon egɨpjak kaŋ, yo kabɨni tɨmɨt do yutgwan dɨma pɨgɨsak.
41013016	“Ae amɨn kɨnda pigaga egɨpjak kaŋ, yutnon ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni kɨŋ abɨdok do dɨmasi kɨsak.
41013017	Uŋun bɨsapmon mɨŋat monjɨ kwapni toŋ, ae mɨŋat monjɨ mum noŋ uŋun bupmɨsi.
41013018	Ji da Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨŋba nandaŋakwan yo uŋun ais bɨsapmon dɨma altoni.
41013019	Uŋun bɨsapmon yo jɨgɨsi altokdaŋ. Piŋkop da yo morap wasagɨron da egɨ abɨsok ekwamaŋon yo jɨgɨsi uŋuden kɨnda dɨma altagɨt. Ae buŋon yo jɨgɨ uŋuden aeni dɨma altokdaŋ.
41013020	Amɨn Tagɨ da uŋun bɨsap dɨma aŋpɨsɨp asak tam mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi pasɨlnom. Mani mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ iyɨ do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt uŋun do bupmɨ nandaŋek bɨsap aŋpɨsɨp akdɨsak.
41013021	“Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda da ‘Kristo oni!’ bo ‘Asoni!’ yaŋ yaŋban kaŋ, geni dɨma nandaŋ gadani.
41013022	Amɨn dɨwarɨ da abɨŋ ‘Nak Kristo’ yaŋ yokdaŋ. Ae dɨwarɨ da ‘Nak kombɨ amɨn kɨnda’ yaŋ yokdaŋ. Yaŋ yaŋek wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ akdaŋ. Aŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ Piŋkop da iyɨ do kɨlɨ manjɨkbi uŋun paŋkɨlɨkba kosit kɨlegɨ yɨpmaŋ detni do pini madep akdaŋ. Mani arɨpmɨ dɨma akdaŋ.
41013023	Yo jɨgɨsi morap uŋun dɨma altaŋakwa wagɨl dayɨsat, do dɨsi kaŋ kɨmotni.”
41013024	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo jɨgɨ dakon bɨsap mudaŋakwan ‘gɨldat dabɨl pɨlɨn tuk akdɨsak, ae kanek dɨma teŋteŋokdɨsak.
41013025	Ae gɨk kundu yɨpmaŋek mokdaŋ, aŋakwa kwen kundukon yo tebai toŋ uŋun da kwakwalɨtdaŋ.’
41013026	“Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji kaŋba tapmɨmni ae tɨlɨmni gat gɨkwemon da apban kokdaŋ.
41013027	Uŋun da aŋelo kabɨni yabekban kɨŋ amɨn iyɨ do manjɨkbi kabɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun paŋmuwutdaŋ.”
41013028	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji pik kɨndap kaŋek butji pɨsosak. Kɨlɨŋɨ pakbini toŋ ae tamɨ kaluk yopmaŋdak, uŋun bɨsapmon gɨldat bɨsap kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandaŋ.
41013029	Uŋudeŋ gɨn yo morap dayɨt uŋun da altaŋakwa mɨktɨm da mudosak bɨsap madep kɨlɨ uŋunjok kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandani.
41013030	Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn uŋun bɨsapmon nani dɨma kɨmagakwa yo morap uŋun kɨsi altaŋ mudokdaŋ.
41013031	Kundu gat mɨktɨm gat pasɨldamal, mani nak dakon gen uŋun dɨmasi pasɨldɨsak.”
41013032	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo morap altokdɨsak uŋun dakon bɨsap amɨn kɨnda da dɨma nandɨsak. Kwen Kokup aŋeloyo dɨma nandaŋ, ae Monjɨyo kɨsi dɨma nandɨsak. Dat da iyɨ gɨn nandɨsak.
41013033	Yo morap altokdaŋ dakon bɨsap ji dɨma nandaŋ, do kaŋ kɨmagek egɨpni.”
41013034	Yaŋ yaŋek tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda kokup kɨndakon kɨk do aŋek oman amɨni do pi kokwinɨk yomɨŋek yut dakon kɨla ani do yoyɨsak. Aŋek yoma sopsop dakon kɨla amɨn yoma kɨlani tebai asak do iyɨsak.
41013035	“Uŋun do aŋek ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Ji yut dakon ami ni bɨsapmon apjak uŋun dɨma nandaŋ. Apjak bɨsap uŋun pɨlɨndo bo kalbi binap bo pup da gen yosok bɨsapmon bo wɨsa dagokdo uŋun ji dɨma nandaŋ.
41013036	Tepmɨ abɨŋ dandaban dɨpmɨn potni kaŋ, uŋun tagɨ dɨma.
41013037	Gen dayɨsat uŋun amɨn morap kɨsi do yosot. Kaŋ kɨmotni.”
41014001	Gɨldat bamorɨ egek don Yapyap Bɨlak ae Bret Yisni Mɨni Dakon Jap Noknok Bɨsap Madep altok do aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da muwugek yaŋ yawit, “Niaŋ aŋek Yesu aŋkewalek abɨdaŋ aŋatno kɨmotjak?”
41014002	Yaŋ yaŋek yawit, “Telagɨ bɨsap madepmon dɨma abɨdoneŋ. Yaŋ aneŋ kaŋ, mɨŋat amɨnyokon pɨdok pɨdok noman tokdɨsak.”
41014003	Yesu Betani kokupmon amɨn kɨnda mani Saimon uŋun da yutnon yɨkgɨt. (Saimon uŋun kalɨp wuda tebani toŋ egɨpgut.) Yesu jap noknok tamokon yɨgakwan mɨŋat kɨnda pakbi kɨbaŋɨ toŋ tagɨsi kɨnamɨ kɨnda abɨdaŋek wɨgɨgɨt. Awɨŋ gapmɨ jokgalek Yesu da busuŋon tagalgɨt. (Uŋun pakbi dakon yumaŋ nogɨ madepsi ae tɨbɨrɨ uŋun tɨpnaŋ wasaŋbi.)
41014004	Yaŋ aban amɨn dɨwarɨ da kaŋek burɨ yokwi taŋba notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Nidosi pakbi kɨbaŋɨ toŋ tagɨsi uŋun yumsi tagaldak?
41014005	Amɨn da yubam tam, moneŋ madepsi tɨmɨk yoni mɨni amɨn do yomnom.” Yaŋ yaŋek mɨŋat uŋun gen tebai iyɨwit.
41014006	Iyɨŋba Yesu da nandaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji mɨŋat on yum koni. Nido jɨgɨ ɨmaŋ? Mɨŋat on nak do yo tagɨsi asak.
41014007	Yoni mɨni amɨn ji gat bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ egɨpdaŋ, do tagɨ paŋpulugoni. Mani nak ji gat bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ dɨma egɨpdamaŋ.
41014008	Yo mɨŋat da agagɨ kɨlɨ aban dagak. Nak kɨmokgo gapmakon nepni do uŋun mɨŋat da pakbi kɨbaŋɨ toŋ naŋ kɨlɨ soŋ namɨk.
41014009	Nak asisi dayɨsat, mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn da Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋek mɨŋat on da yo ak uŋun dakon gen bin kɨsi yoyɨŋakwa nandakdaŋ. Aŋek uŋun mɨŋat dakon man bini dɨma pasɨldɨsak.”
41014010	Uŋun bɨsapmon paŋdetni 12 kabɨkon kɨnda egɨpgut mani Judas Iskariot. Uŋun da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨkon kɨŋek Yesu kɨsitnikon yɨpjak do yoyɨgɨt.
41014011	Yoyɨŋban but galak nandaŋek moneŋ ɨmni do yaŋ teban tawit. Judas uŋun nandaŋek Yesu kɨsitnikon yɨpjak dakon kosit wɨsɨgɨt.
41014012	Aŋakwan Bret Yisni Mɨni Dakon Jap Noknok Bɨsap Madep altagɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon Israel amɨn da Yapyap Bɨlak do nandaŋek sipsip monɨŋ dapmaŋ soŋ noŋ. Uŋun bɨsapmon paŋdetni da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin kɨŋ dukwan Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap paŋkosit aneŋ do nandɨsal?”
41014013	Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da paŋdetni bamorɨ yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kokupmon kɨŋ kaŋbal amɨn kɨnda pakbi kwoba kɨnda guramɨk apban jil gat domdom akdaŋ. Jil uŋun amɨn naŋ yol aŋkɨnjil.
41014014	Kaŋbal yut kɨndakon wɨkwan kaŋ, uŋun yut dakon ami yaŋ iyɨnjil, ‘Yoyɨŋdetnit da yosok, “Nak gat paŋdetnoni gat da Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap noneŋ dakon yut burɨ dukwan tosok?” ’
41014015	Yaŋ iyɨŋbal uŋun amɨn da yut madep kɨnda kwen nani do dolɨsak. Uŋun yutnon jap noknok tamo ae amɨn yɨyɨt tamo kɨlɨ paŋnoman abi da toŋ. Uŋudon japnin paŋkosit anjil.”
41014016	Yoyɨŋban kokupmon kɨŋ Yesu da yo morap do yoyɨgɨt uŋudeŋsi pɨndakgɨmal. Yaŋ pɨndagek Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap paŋkosit agɨmal.
41014017	Pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo Yesu gat paŋdetni 12 kabɨ gat uŋun yutnon opgwit.
41014018	Obɨŋ jap noknok tamokon jap naŋ yɨgek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, jikon da kɨnda da nak uwalno da kɨsiron nepdɨsak. Uŋun amɨn nin gat yɨgek jap nomaŋ.”
41014019	Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni burɨ yokwi taŋba kaloŋ kaloŋ yaŋ yawit, “Nak dɨma, ma?”
41014020	Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “12 kabɨ jikon kɨnda nak gat bret ɨdapmon sɨbɨŋek nomak uŋun.
41014021	Asi, Piŋkop da papiakon gen mandabi uŋun da arɨpmon Amɨn Dakon Monji kɨmot akdɨsak. Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak amɨn, awa! Uŋun amɨn meŋi da dɨma aŋalagɨt tam tagɨ.”
41014022	Jap naŋ yɨgakwa Yesu da bret kɨnda abɨdaŋ, Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek, pudaŋ paŋdetni do yomgut. Yomɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Tɨmɨgek noni, on nak dakon gɨptɨm tɨmno.”
41014023	Yaŋ yaŋek aeni wain kɨnam abɨdaŋek, Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek, yoban kɨsi da nawit.
41014024	Naŋakwa Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On yawino. Amɨn morapmɨ gat saŋbek saŋbek ak do parekdat.
41014025	Nak asisi dayɨsat, nak wain ae dɨma naŋek egɨ wɨgɨ Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Agak kokupmon don wain kalugɨ nokeŋ.”
41014026	Yaŋ yaŋban kap kɨnda yaŋek yomakon pɨgek Ɨleŋ Olipmon wɨgɨwit.
