41014027	Ɨleŋ Olipmon wɨgakwa Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun da arɨpmon ji manji namdaŋ. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Sipsip dakon kɨla amɨn aŋakgo kɨmagakwan sipsip waseŋ kɨ iyɨ iyɨ kɨkdaŋ.’
41014028	Mani kɨmoron da pɨdaŋek nak da kalɨp Galili mɨktɨmon mibɨltaŋ damɨŋek kɨkeŋ.”
41014029	Yaŋban Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon nandaŋ gadat wɨtdal kɨsak kaŋ, nak yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma abeŋ.”
41014030	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi gayɨsat, abɨsok kalbi pup kosit bamot dɨma yaŋakwan gak da nak do wasɨp kosit kapbɨ yokdɨsal.”
41014031	Yaŋban Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Uwal da gɨgek nakyo kɨsi nɨt do ani kaŋ, gak do wasɨp dɨma yokeŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋban notni kabɨ kɨsi yaŋ gɨn yawit.
41014032	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat mɨktɨm kɨnda mani Getsemani uŋudon kɨwit. Kɨŋ altaŋek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji ɨdon yɨgakwa nak bɨsit akeŋ.”
41014033	Yaŋ yaŋek Pita, Jems, ae Jon kɨsi tɨmɨkban kɨwit. Kɨŋ burɨkon jɨgɨ madepsi nandaŋek
41014034	yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Butno jɨk taŋakwan kɨmot kɨmotno noman taŋ naban nandɨsat. Do ji ɨdon Piŋkop do nandaŋek egɨpni.”
41014035	Yaŋ yaŋek aŋgwikon kɨŋ mɨktɨmon maŋ pagek bɨsit agɨt. Kosit kɨnda tosagon uŋun bɨsap yokwi yapjak yaŋ nandaŋek bɨsit yaŋ yagɨt,
41014036	“Aba, Dat, gak da yo morap tagɨ aki. Do nak da kwenon jɨgɨ apdɨsak uŋun kukwoki do nandɨsat. Mani nak dakon galaktok dɨma yolgi, gaga dakon galaktok uŋun gɨn yolgi.”
41014037	Yaŋ yaŋek tobɨl paŋdetni kapbɨ egɨpgwiron kɨŋ pɨndakban dɨpmɨn pakgwit. Pɨndagek Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Saimon, gak dɨpmɨn pokdol, ma? Bɨsap awa kaloŋɨ da arɨpmon gɨn nak gat Piŋkop do nandaŋek dɨma egɨpneŋ?
41014038	Ji teban taŋek bɨsit aŋek egɨpni. Yaŋ aŋek egɨpni kaŋ, paŋkewalon arɨpmɨ dɨma moni. But da nak nol do galak tosok mani gɨp dakon teban tokni mɨni.”
41014039	Yaŋ yaŋek aeni tobɨlek kɨŋ bɨsit mibɨltok agɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn agɨt.
41014040	Bɨsit aŋek abɨŋ pɨndakban paŋdetni dɨpmɨn do yokwisi aŋek aeni dɨpmɨn sigɨn pakgwit. Paŋyolban pɨdaŋ ni gen naŋ iyɨneŋ yaŋ do ɨŋtaŋek ɨsal yɨkgwit.
41014041	Aeni kɨŋ bɨsit aŋ tobɨl abɨŋ paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dɨpmɨn sigɨn pagek tapmɨm paŋ, ma? Dɨpmɨn arɨpmɨ kwayɨŋ. Bɨsap kɨlɨ abɨk. Amɨn Dakon Monji yokwi pakpak da kɨsiron kɨlɨ uŋun yɨpmaŋgaŋ.
41014042	Pɨdaŋba kɨno! Kabɨt, uwal da kɨsiron nepjak amɨn kɨlɨ abɨk.”
41014043	Yesu gen yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn paŋdetni 12 kabɨkon da kɨnda mani Judas altaŋ yomgut. Amɨn kabɨ madep emat agak sɨbani ae kɨndap kɨrɨŋni tɨmɨgek buŋon yolgwit. Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae kɨla amɨn uŋun da yabekba apgwit.
41014044	Uwal da kɨsiron yɨpyɨp amɨn da gen kɨnda kɨlɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda nak da mandaŋ noko kaŋ, uŋun amɨn naŋ abɨdoni. Abɨdaŋek kɨlani tebai aŋek aŋaŋ kɨni.”
41014045	Judas uŋudon gɨn Yesukon kɨŋ altaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet!” Yaŋ iyɨŋek mogɨmɨkon mandaŋ nagɨt.
41014046	Yaŋ aban kaŋek Yesu tebai abɨdawit.
41014047	Aba uŋun akgwit kabɨkon da kɨnda da emat agak sɨbani ɨlɨkgɨt. Ɨlɨgek mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon oman monjɨ mɨragɨ mandaŋ dagagɨt.
41014048	Mandaŋ dagaŋban Yesu da obip amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nak do kabo noknok kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋek emat agak sɨba ae kɨndap kɨrɨŋ tɨmɨgek nak abɨdok do abeŋ, ma?
41014049	Nak gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan ji gat egek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨm. Uŋun bɨsapmon nak abɨdok do dɨma nandawit? Mani Piŋkop da papiakon nak do gen mandabi uŋun da arɨpmon noman tosak.”
41014050	Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdet morapni yɨpmaŋek pasal kɨŋ mudawit.
41014051	Kɨŋ mudaŋakwa monjɨsok kɨnda ɨmalni kwakwagɨ kɨndanaŋ gɨn ɨmegek Yesu yolgɨt. Emat amɨn da uŋun monjɨsok kɨsi abɨdok do awit,
41014052	mani ɨmalni naŋ kukwaŋek pasal molaŋ molaŋ kɨgɨt.
41014053	Yesu abɨdawit amɨn uŋun da Yesu abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ da yutnon wɨgɨwit. Uŋun yutnon mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet ae kɨla amɨn kɨsi muwuk egɨpgwit.
41014054	Pita kagɨ kagɨsok da Yesu yol aŋkɨŋek, mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da nagalgwan pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨkwan obip amɨn gat kɨndapmon yɨgek kɨndapni alɨwit.
41014055	Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae gen kokwin amɨn kɨsi morap gat da yaŋ nandawit, amɨn dɨ yaŋ yomno abɨŋ Yesu top gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋek gulusuŋ agɨt yaŋ yaŋakwa aŋatno kɨmotjak yaŋ nandawit, mani Yesu suŋ kɨnda dɨma agɨt yaŋ kawit.
41014056	Aŋakwa amɨn morapmɨ da Yesu do top sɨtnok genyo yaŋba geni dakon kosirɨ dɨma pɨsagɨt.
41014057	Aba amɨn dɨwarɨ da pɨdaŋ Yesu do top sɨtnok gen yaŋ yawit,
41014058	“Nin da nandaŋapno Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak da Telagɨ Yut Madep amɨn da awit uŋun tuwɨlek gɨldat kapbɨ da butgwan yut ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda abeŋ. Yut uŋun amɨn kɨsit da agagɨ dakon tɨlak dɨma abeŋ.’ ”
41014059	Mani gen uŋun yawit uŋun kɨsi upbal taŋek gen dakon kosirɨ dɨma pɨsagɨt.
41014060	Kɨlɨ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn kɨla amɨn da ɨŋamon agek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma yoyɨki? On amɨn morap gen yaŋ gaba niaŋ nandaŋ yomɨsal?”
41014061	Mani Yesu gen kagani sopmaŋek gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma iyɨgɨt. Yaŋ aban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da aeni iyɨgɨt, “Gak Kristo? Gak Piŋkop gawak ɨmamaŋ uŋun dakon Monji bo dɨma?”
41014062	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Uŋun nak mani. Ji don kaŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji Tapmɨm Ami da amɨnsi tet do yɨkban kokdaŋ. Aŋek kaŋakwa Kwen Kokup dakon gɨkwemon da apban kokdaŋ.”
41014063	Yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn iyɨ dakon paba pɨgɨkni pudagɨt. Yaŋ aŋek yagɨt, “Mibɨlni nandak do amɨn nido saŋbeŋek yoyɨno apni?
41014064	Iyɨ do ‘nak Piŋkop dakon Monji’ yaŋ yosok, do ji da niaŋ aŋ ɨmneŋ do nandaŋ?” Yaŋban kɨsi morap da yawit, “Gulusuŋ asak, do si kɨmotjak.”
41014065	Yaŋ yaŋek dɨwarɨ da ɨlɨp sul ɨmgwit. Yaŋ aŋek dabɨlɨ ɨmal naŋ wamaŋ sopmaŋek kɨsit da aŋakgwit. Kɨsit da aŋagek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Namɨn da gɨkdak? Kombɨ gen ya!” Yaŋ iyɨŋakwa obip amɨn da abɨdaŋek aŋakgwit.
41014066	Aŋakwa Pita uŋun yut da nagalgwan egakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon oman mɨŋatjok kɨnda da opgut.
41014067	Obɨŋ Pita kɨndap alɨŋek ekwan kagɨt. Mɨŋat uŋun da pakyaŋsi yɨpban kwan kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Yesu Nasaret kokupmon nani gat kɨsi egɨpgumal.”
41014068	Yaŋban Pita da wasɨp yaŋek yagɨt, “Gak da gen uŋun yosol nak dɨma nandɨsat.” Yaŋ yaŋek nagalon da wigat mibɨlon pɨgɨgɨt.
41014069	Aŋakwan oman mɨŋatjok uŋun da Pita aeni kaŋek amɨn uŋudon akgwit yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn uŋun Yesu da kabɨkon nani kɨnda.”
41014070	Mani aeni wasɨp yaŋek yagɨt, “Dɨma.” Tɨmɨsok dɨ egek amɨn kapmatjok akgwit uŋun da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak asi Yesu da kabɨkon nani kɨnda. Gak Galili amɨn kɨnda.”
41014071	Yaŋ yaŋba Pita da tebaisi yaŋek yagɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, amɨn uŋun yoŋ nak dɨmasi nandaŋ ɨmɨsat. Top yosot kaŋ, jobɨt tagɨ tɨmɨkgeŋ.”
41014072	Yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn pup gen yaŋban kosit bamot agɨt. Yaŋban nandaŋek Pita Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun do nandagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak dakon man kosit kapbɨ wasɨp yaŋaki pup da kosit bamot gen yosak.” Gen uŋun do nandaŋek burɨ yokwi taŋban kunam madepsi takgɨt.
41015001	Wɨsawɨsa do mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ ae kɨla amɨn ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ morap gat da muwugek gen kɨnda aŋteban awit. Aŋek Yesu nap teban naŋ wamaŋ ɨlɨk aŋaŋ Pailat da kɨsiron aŋkɨ yɨpgwit.
41015002	Yɨpba Pailat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep, ma?” Yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yagɨt, “Yosol uŋun mani.”
41015003	Yaŋ yaŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ da gen morapmɨ yaŋ ɨmgwit.
41015004	Yaŋba Pailat da aeni Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma yoyɨki? Amɨn on da yokwi agɨl do gen morapmɨ yaŋ gamaŋ.”
41015005	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma yagɨt. Yaŋ aban kaŋek Pailat nandaban ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
41015006	Bɨlagɨ bɨlagɨ Yapyap Bɨlak bɨsapmon wasok kɨnda yaŋ awit: Juda mɨŋat amɨnyo da dam tebanon yɨkdak amɨn kɨnda dakon man yaŋakwa, Pailat da yopban kɨŋ kɨŋ awit.
41015007	Yesu gen pikon yɨpgwit bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda mani Barabas uŋun gat notni gat dam tebanon yɨkgwit. Uŋun amɨn kabɨ Rom gapman do japmɨ nandaŋek emat wamaŋek amɨn kɨnda aŋakba kɨmakgɨt. Uŋun do dam tebanon yopgwit.
41015008	Kɨlɨ amɨn morapmɨ da Pailaron kɨŋ altaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Bɨlagɨ bɨlagɨ asal, uŋudeŋ gɨn dam tebanon yɨkdak kɨnda pulugaŋ yɨpbɨ kɨsak.”
41015009	Yaŋba Pailat da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep naŋ yɨpbo kɨsak do nandaŋ?”
41015010	Pailat yaŋ yagɨt nido iyɨ nandagɨt: mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ Yesu do nandaba yokwi taŋban top yaŋek gen pikon yɨpgwit.
41015011	Mani mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep burɨ sugaŋek yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ji Pailat da Barabas naŋ yɨpban kɨsak do iyɨni.” Yaŋ yoyɨŋba amɨn da yaŋ gɨn iyɨwit.
41015012	Yaŋba Pailat da aeni yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn ji da ‘Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep’ yaŋ iyaŋ, niaŋ aŋ ɨbeŋ do nandaŋ?”
41015013	Yaŋban yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakbɨ kɨmotjak!”
41015014	Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Mibɨlɨ nido? Ni gulusuŋ naŋ agɨt?” Yaŋban mibɨltok yawit si yapmaŋek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakbɨ kɨmotjak!”
41015015	Yaŋba Pailat da amɨn dakon burɨ moni do Barabas pulugaŋ yɨpban mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyokon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan emat amɨn yoyɨŋban Yesu baljawit. Aba don tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak do yoyɨgɨt.
41015016	Emat amɨn da Yesu abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ gapman yut madep da nagalgwan pɨgɨwit. Pɨgek emat amɨn notni dɨwarɨ kɨsisi yaŋ yoba abɨŋ mudawit.
41015017	Muwugek Yesu do paba pɨgɨk gami kɨnda paŋ ɨmgwit. Yaŋ aŋek nap kelɨ toŋ kɨnda naŋ kɨla amɨn madep dakon pelɨt yombem kɨnda wasaŋek busuŋɨkon wamaŋ ɨmgwit.
41015018	Wamaŋ ɨmɨŋek top iyɨŋek yaŋ yawit, “Gɨldat tagɨ, Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep!”
41015019	Yaŋ yaŋek kɨndap kɨrɨŋ naŋ busuŋɨkon aŋagek ɨlɨp sul ɨmgwit. Yaŋ aŋek gawak ɨmɨŋek toptopmon da man madep ɨmgwit.
41015020	Aŋek topmon da man madep ɨmɨŋ mudaŋek ɨmal gami ɨlɨgek iyɨ dakon pabɨ pɨgɨk paŋ ɨmgwit. Paŋ ɨmɨŋek tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak do ɨlɨk aŋaŋ kɨwit.
41015021	Kosiron kɨŋ amɨn kɨnda kokup pap kɨk do apban kawit, mani Saimon. Uŋun Sairini kokupmon nani kɨnda, Aleksanda gat Rupas gat dakon datni. Emat amɨn da Saimon gen tebai iyɨŋba Yesu dakon tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨkban kɨwit.
41015022	Kɨŋ mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda mani Golgata uŋudon altawit. (Golgata uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun Busuŋ Kɨdat Ɨleŋ.)
41015023	Kɨŋ altaŋek wain gat pakbi ɨsipmɨ kɨnda mani mea gat ɨktagɨlek ɨmɨŋba nok do kurak tagɨt.
41015024	Aŋek tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgwit. Aŋagek ɨmalni tɨmɨt do satu wasok awit.
41015025	Wɨsa dagokdo 9 kilok aŋakwan aŋakgwit.
41015026	Aŋagek mibɨlɨ yaŋ do aŋakgamaŋ uŋun dakon but pɨso gen yaŋ mandawit, JUDA AMƗN DAKON KƗLA AMƗN MADEP.
41015027	Yesu da ɨleŋ bamoron kabo noknok bamorɨ kɨsi dapgwit.
41015028	Dapba Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Yokwi pakpak amɨn uŋun kabɨkon aŋakbi.”
41015029	Amɨn kɨŋ ap awit uŋun da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek wunda kwalkwal aŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Ae! Gak Telagɨ Yut Madep tuwɨlek gɨldat kapbɨ da butgwan kaluk ak do yagɨl,
41015030	do gɨptɨmgo aŋkutnaŋek tɨlak kɨndapmon da pɨ!”
41015031	Yaŋ yaŋba mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn kɨsi yaŋ gɨn notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek aŋsolat aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋpulugagɨt da nido iyɨ dakon gɨptɨm aŋpulugok do aŋtɨdok asak?
41015032	On amɨn Kristo, asi Juda amɨn dakon Kɨla Amɨn Madepni kaŋ, tɨlak kɨndapmon da pɨŋban kaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmneŋ.” Uŋudeŋ gɨn kabo noknok bamot terɨ terɨ dapbi uŋunyo kɨsi yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmgumal.
41015033	Gɨldat binap 12 kilok aŋakwan mɨktɨm kɨsi pɨlɨn tuk aŋakwan kɨŋ pɨlɨndo 3 kilok agɨt.
41015034	Kɨŋ 3 kilok aŋakwan Yesu da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Eloi, eloi lama sabaktani?” Gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yaŋ: “Piŋkopno, Piŋkopno, nido nepmaŋ dekdal?”
41015035	Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn dɨwarɨ kapmatjok akgwit uŋun nandaŋek yawit, “Nandaŋ, uŋun Elaija do yaŋ ɨmɨsak.”
41015036	Yaŋba amɨn kɨnda tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨŋ yo kɨnda gugɨdan yombem jol dɨwaron wamaŋ wain gat ae pakbi ɨsɨpmɨ gat uŋungwan sɨbɨŋek Yesu da nosak do aŋenakgɨt. Aŋenagek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji yɨpba koneŋ. Elaija da asi abɨŋ tɨlak kɨndapmon naŋ abɨdaŋ abɨŋban koneŋ, bo dɨma.”
41015037	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek kɨmakgɨt.
41015038	Kɨmagakwan Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon yoma ɨmal uŋun kwen da sulugɨ pɨŋ mibɨlɨkon dagaŋ kɨ tɨmɨ bamorɨ agɨt.
41015039	Aŋakwan emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn da Yesu ɨŋamɨkon kɨmakban kaŋek yagɨt, “On amɨn asisi Piŋkop dakon Monji egɨpgut.”
41015040	Aŋakwan mɨŋat dɨwarɨ dubagɨsogon da agek pɨndak nandaŋyo awit. Uŋun mɨŋat kabɨkon kɨnda mani Maria, kokupni Makdala, ae Maria ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda uŋun Jems buŋon nani gat Josep gat dakon meŋi, ae Salome gat kɨsi akgwit.
41015041	Yesu Galili mɨktɨmon egɨpgut bɨsapmon uŋun mɨŋat kabɨ da yol awɨlek oman aŋ ɨmɨŋek egɨpgwit. Uŋun dagɨn dɨma, ae mɨŋat dɨwarɨ kɨsi Yesu gat Jerusalem kokup papmon kɨwit uŋun kɨsi kaŋakwa Yesu kɨmakgɨt.
41015042	Sabat dakon tagaptok bɨsap Neŋgo pɨlɨndo
41015043	Josep Arimatea kokupmon nani da apgut. Uŋun gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ dakon kɨla amɨn egɨpgut. Amɨn morapmɨ da nandaba wukwan ɨmgwit. Ae uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Akdɨsak uŋun do jomjom aŋek egɨpgut. Josep uŋun pasol pasolɨ mɨni Pailaron kɨŋ Yesu dakon bumjotni abɨdok do iyɨgɨt.
41015044	Iyɨŋban Pailat da emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn yaŋ ɨban opban iyɨgɨt, “Asi Yesu kuŋwak, bo dɨma?”
41015045	Iyɨŋban emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn da yaŋ yagɨt, “Asi kuŋwak.” Yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek Josep da bumjot aŋkɨsak do yaŋ mudaŋ ɨmgut.
41015046	Aban Josep da kɨŋ ɨmal kwakwagɨ kɨnda yumaŋ aŋabɨŋ Yesu dakon bumjot tɨlak kɨndapmon naŋ abɨŋ uŋun ɨmal naŋ wamgut. Wamaŋ aŋkɨ tɨp kɨnam kɨndakon yɨpmaŋek tɨp madepsi kɨnda aŋtobɨlban abɨŋ yoma sopgut.
41015047	Maria Makdala kokupmon nani gat ae Maria Josep dakon meŋi gat da kaŋakwal Yesu dakon bumjotni yɨpgut.
41016001	Sabat bɨsap mudaŋakwan pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo Maria Makdala kokupmon nani, ae Maria Jems dakon meŋi, ae Salome, uŋun mɨŋat kapbɨ da bɨt nelak, ae yo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi, Yesu dakon bumjotni soŋ ɨm do yumaŋ paŋkosit awit.
41016002	Yaŋ aŋek pakgwit da Sonda wɨsa dagokdo tɨp kɨnamon kɨk do kɨŋakwa gɨldat wɨgɨt.
41016003	Kɨŋek kosiron yaŋ nandat aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Namɨn da tɨp kɨnam dakon tɨp madep aŋtobɨlban pɨsosak?”
41016004	Yaŋ yaŋek kɨŋ kaŋba tɨp madep kɨlɨ aŋtobɨlbi kawit.
41016005	Yaŋ kaŋek tɨp kɨnamgwan pɨgɨ wɨli gɨmoŋɨ kɨnda kawit. Uŋun ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk kwakwagɨ dubagɨ kɨnda pabi da amɨnsi tet do yɨkban kawit. Kaŋek wurɨpdagek pasalgwit.
41016006	Yaŋ nandaŋakwa yoyɨgɨt, “Ji wurɨpdagek dɨma pasolni. Yesu Nasaret kokupmon nani tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakbi uŋun kok do abeŋ. Uŋun kɨlɨ pɨdaŋ kɨk, ɨdon mɨni. Tamoni oni kabɨt.
41016007	Kɨŋ paŋdetni gat Pita gat yaŋ yoyɨni, ‘Uŋun da kalɨp Galili mɨktɨmon mibɨltaŋ damɨŋek kɨk do kɨlɨ dayɨgɨt, do uŋudon kɨŋ koni.’ ”
41016008	Yaŋ yoyɨŋban mɨŋat kapbɨ uŋun pasal nɨmnɨmɨgek tɨp kɨnamon da wɨŋ tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨwit. Kɨŋ pasol pasol aŋek amɨn dɨ dɨma yoyɨwit.
41016009	Yesu Sonda wɨsa dagokdo kɨmoron da pɨdaŋek mibɨltok Maria Makdala kokupmon nani altaŋ ɨmgut. (Uŋun mɨŋat Yesu da kalɨp koŋ 7 kabɨ burɨgwan egɨpgwit baŋ yol ɨmgut.)
41016010	Altaŋ ɨban kɨŋ Yesu dakon paŋdet kabɨni kunam takba pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
41016011	“Yesu kalugɨ egakwan kat.” Yaŋ yaŋban gen uŋun do nandaba bamɨ dɨma agɨt.
41016012	Buŋon paŋdetni bamorɨ da kokup kɨndakon kɨk do kɨŋakwal Yesu da gɨptɨmɨ kulabɨk aŋek altaŋ yoban amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda yaŋ kagɨmal.
41016013	Altaŋ yoban tobɨl kɨŋ notni dɨwarɨ yoyɨŋbal nandaba bamɨ dɨma agɨt.
41016014	Aeni don paŋdetni 11 kabɨ muwuk yɨgek jap naŋakwa altaŋ yomgut. Altaŋ yomɨŋek gen tebaisi yaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji amɨn da ‘pɨdak da egɨsak’ yaŋ dayɨŋba nido nandaba bamɨ dɨma ak? Nandaŋ gadatji mɨni?”
41016015	Aeni saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨŋ Gen Bin Tagɨsi amɨn kɨsisi yoyɨŋ mudoni.
41016016	Amɨn kɨnda nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨŋek telagɨ pakbi sosak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Kwen Kokup do amɨn asak. Ae amɨn kɨnda nak dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Tɨpdom do amɨn asak.
41016017	Nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namni amɨn tapmɨm yobo wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ yaŋ baŋ akdaŋ: nak dakon man yaŋek koŋ yoldaŋ, ae gen ŋwakŋwarɨ yokdaŋ.
41016018	Ae uŋun amɨn da tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ abɨdokdaŋ, ae pakbi emarɨ toŋ naŋba uŋun da dɨma paŋupbal akdaŋ. Uŋun amɨn da sot amɨn kɨsirɨ kwenikon wɨtjɨŋba sotni mudokdaŋ.”
41016019	Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu gen uŋun yoyɨŋ mudaŋakwan Piŋkop da aŋenakban Kwen Kokup wɨgɨgɨt da Piŋkop da amɨnsi tet do yɨkdak.
41016020	Aŋakwan paŋdetni mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨŋ Piŋkop dakon geni yoyɨŋ aŋaŋ kɨwit. Kɨŋakwa Amɨn Tagɨ uŋun gat egek paŋpulugaŋakwan wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ aŋek geni joŋɨk paŋteban agɨt.
42001001	-
42001003	Kɨla amɨn madep Tiopilas, amɨn morapmɨ da Piŋkop da yo morap nin da binapmon agɨt uŋun dakon geni papiakon mandak do awit. Yo morap wasaŋek altaŋakwa dabɨl da si pɨndagek yaŋ teŋteŋok awit amɨn dakon gen yolek mandawit. Uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gen do pi awit. Ae nak uŋun yo morap si wasaŋek noman taŋ aŋaŋ opgwit uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ pakyaŋsi nandak do pini madepsi agɨm. Do gen morap on papiakon kɨlegɨsi mandaŋ yɨpbo gagon opjak kaŋ nandabo tagɨsi asak.
42001004	Papia on manjɨŋek amɨn da gen morap gayɨwit uŋun nandabɨ bamɨsi asak.
42001005	Erot da Judia mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep yɨkgɨt bɨsapmon mukwa sogok amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut mani Sekaraia. Sekaraia uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn Abiya da kabɨkon nani kɨnda. Mɨŋatni Elisabet uŋun Aron da kabɨkon nani.
42001006	Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlegɨsi egek Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen teban madep ae monɨŋɨ kɨsi guramɨkgɨmal.
42001007	Mani Elisabet monjɨ suŋ egɨpgut, do ɨsal egek mɨŋat amɨn pelaŋyo agɨmal.
42001008	Bɨsap kɨndakon Sekaraia gat mukwa sogok amɨn notni gat Piŋkop da dabɨlon mukwa sogok pi awit.
42001009	Aŋek namɨn dasi Amɨn Tagɨ da telagɨ tamogwan wɨgɨ yo kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi sosak yaŋ do aŋpakni yolek satu wasok awit. Yaŋ aba Sekaraia dakon man da noman taŋban mukwa sok do wɨgɨgɨt.
42001010	Wɨgɨ mukwa soŋakwan yomakon mɨŋat amɨn morap muwuk egek bɨsit pi awit.
42001011	Aŋakwa Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo kɨnda Sekaraia altaŋ ɨmgut. Uŋun alta mukwa kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi sosoŋ da tosok uŋun da amɨnsi tet do akgɨt.
42001012	Akban kaŋek Sekaraia wurɨpdagek pasalgɨt.
42001013	Mani aŋelo da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Sekaraia, Piŋkop da bɨsitgo kɨlɨ nandagɨt, do dɨma pasolgi. Mɨŋatgo Elisabet da monji wɨli kɨnda aŋalakdɨsak. Mani Jon yaŋ iyɨki.
42001014	-
42001015	Amɨn Tagɨ da ɨŋamon mani wukwisi tokdɨsak, do gak butgo tagɨsi aŋakwan kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdɨsal. Ae amɨn morapmɨ da monjɨ uŋun altosak bɨsapmon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ. Meŋ da butgwan yɨtjagon da Telagɨ Wup da tugaŋ ɨban egɨ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak. Wain ae pakbi tebanyo dɨmasi nosak.
42001016	Uŋun da Israel amɨn morapmɨ paŋtobɨlban aeni Amɨn Tagɨni Piŋkopmon kɨkdaŋ.
42001017	Elaija dakon aŋpak tapmɨmyo paŋek Amɨn Tagɨ mibɨltaŋ ɨmɨŋek kɨkdɨsak. Uŋun da mɨŋat monjɨyo gat datni gat dakon but paŋkɨlek aban but kaloŋ akdaŋ. Ae gen kɨrɨŋɨt amɨn dakon nandak nandak paŋmɨlɨp aban amɨn kɨlegɨ dakon nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi yombem akdaŋ. Aŋek amɨn paŋtagap aban tagap taŋakwa Amɨn Tagɨ apdɨsak.”
42001018	Yaŋ yaŋban Sekaraia da aŋelo iyɨgɨt, “Nit mɨŋat amɨn pelaŋyo kɨlɨ agɨmak. Do gen yaŋaki but bamot asat. Gen uŋun niaŋon da bamɨ yosol yaŋ nandakeŋ?”
42001019	Yaŋban aŋelo da yagɨt, “Nak Gebriel, nak Piŋkop da ɨŋamon akdat da yabekban gak do gen tagɨsi on gayɨk do abɨsat.
42001020	Gen gayɨsat uŋun asi Piŋkop da bɨsap yɨpgut uŋun bɨsapmon noman tokdɨsak, mani nandabɨ bamɨ dɨma asak, do gen yogok kositgo sopmaŋakwan gen dɨmasi yaŋek egɨ wɨgaki gen gayɨsat uŋun bamɨ noman tokdɨsak.”
42001021	Yaŋ nandat aŋek egakwal amɨn jomjom aŋegek Sekaraia nido bɨsap dubak Telagɨ Yut Madepmon egɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek but morap awit.
42001022	Yaŋ nandaŋek egakwa Sekaraia yomakon pɨŋ gen yok do aŋtɨdok aŋek kɨsit dagɨn tɨlak aŋyomgut. Yaŋ aŋakwan kaŋek Telagɨ Yut Madepmon dɨpmɨn yombem kɨnda bo kak yaŋ nandawit.
42001023	Sekaraia Telagɨ Yut Madepmon pi agak bɨsapni mudaŋakwan tobɨl kokupnikon kɨgɨt.
42001024	Paŋkɨ egakwan don mɨŋatni Elisabet monjɨ kwap awɨlek yutnon pasɨlɨ egakwan kanek 5 mudawit.
42001025	Aŋakwan yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ da nak aŋpulugaŋban monjɨ kwap awɨldat. Kalɨp monjɨ mɨni egek amɨn da dabɨlon mayagɨsi nandagɨm, mani abɨsok kɨlɨ uŋun mayagɨno mudosok.”
42001026	-
42001027	Elisabet monjɨ kwap awɨlgɨt uŋun dakon kanek 6 mudaŋakwan Piŋkop da aŋeloni Gebriel yabekban mɨŋatjok kɨnda mani Maria uŋun do kɨgɨt. Galili mɨktɨmon, kokup kɨnda mani Nasaret uŋudon egɨpgut. Maria uŋun amɨn kɨnda mani Josep, Dewit da kabɨkon nani uŋun pasak do manjɨkbi.
42001028	Gebriel Mariakon altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gɨldat tagɨ. Amɨn Tagɨ gak gat egɨsak. Piŋkop da mɨŋat dɨwarɨ yapmaŋek gak do yo madep yaŋ nandɨsak.”
42001029	Maria gen uŋun nandaŋek burɨgwan da jɨgɨsi nandaŋek yaŋ nandagɨt, “Ni gen kɨnda naŋ nayɨsak?”
42001030	Yaŋ nandaŋakwan iyɨgɨt, “Maria, dɨma pasolgi. Piŋkop da gak do nandaban tagɨsi asak.
42001031	Nandaki, gak monjɨ kwap awɨlek monjɨ kɨnda aŋalakdɨsal. Monjɨ uŋun mani Yesu yaŋsi iyɨki.
42001032	Uŋun da amɨn man madepni toŋ kɨnda egakwan amɨn da Piŋkop Wɨkwisi Dakon Monji yaŋ iyɨkdaŋ. Kalɨp babi Dewit da kɨla amɨn madep egɨpgut, uŋun da tɨlagon Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkop da yɨpban kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda egɨpdɨsak.
42001033	Uŋun da Jekop dakon dɨwatni dakon kɨla amɨn madepni bɨsap dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨ aŋaŋ kɨŋek kɨlani akdɨsak.”
42001034	Yaŋ yaŋban Maria da aŋelo yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yo yosol uŋun niaŋ aŋek altosak? Nak amɨn kɨnda pagɨm.”
42001035	Yaŋban aŋelo da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Telagɨ Wup da gagon obɨŋakwan Piŋkop Wɨkwisi uŋun dakon tapmɨm da gak kɨbɨtdɨsak. Uŋun do aŋek monjɨ aŋalaki uŋun telagɨ egakwan amɨn da Piŋkop dakon Monji yaŋ iyɨkdaŋ.
42001036	Nandaki, mamago Elisabet mɨŋat pelaŋ kɨlɨ agɨt, mani monjɨ kwapni toŋ, do monji wɨli kɨnda aŋalakdɨsak. Kalɨp amɨn da ‘Monjɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋalasak’ yaŋ yawit, mani abɨsok monjɨ kwap kɨnda awɨlakwan kanek 6 mudosok.
42001037	Piŋkop da yo kɨnda ak do nandɨsak kaŋ, arɨpmɨ dɨmasi aŋtɨdok asak.”
42001038	Yaŋban Maria da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak Amɨn Tagɨ dakon oman mɨŋat egɨsat, do uŋun yosol nagon yaŋ gɨn noman tosak dosi nandɨsat.” Yaŋ yaŋakwan aŋelo da yɨpmaŋ kɨgɨt.
42001039	Uŋun bɨsapmon Maria tepmɨ kɨŋek mɨktɨm ɨleŋɨ toŋ tɨmon Judia mɨktɨm dakon kokup pap kɨndakon kɨgɨt.
42001040	Kɨŋ Sekaraia da yutnon wɨgɨ Elisabet gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt.
42001041	Iyɨŋakwan uŋudon gɨn Elisabet monjɨ burɨgwan yɨkgɨt uŋun wɨgɨ mok agɨt. Aŋakwan Elisabet Telagɨ Wup da burɨkon pɨgɨ tugaŋban
42001042	madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yagɨt, “Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi mɨŋat dɨwarɨ do yomɨsak uŋun si yapmaŋ mudaŋek gɨsamni madepsi gamɨsak. Ae monjɨ uŋun gak da buron yɨkdak uŋunyo kɨsi Piŋkop da gɨsamɨkdak!
42001043	Amɨn Tagɨno dakon meŋi nagon nido obɨsak? Nak mɨŋat tagɨ dɨma.
42001044	Gak da gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ nayɨŋaki uŋudon gɨn monjɨ butnogwan yɨkdak kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek wɨgɨ mok ak.
42001045	Amɨn Tagɨ da gen gayɨgɨt uŋun nandabɨ bamɨ asisi noman tokdɨsak yaŋ nandagɨl, do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ abi.”
42001046	-
42001049	Yaŋ yaŋban Maria da yagɨt, “Nak oman mɨŋatni gɨn, ae mano mɨnisi, mani nak do yo tagɨsi asak, do but dasi Amɨn Tagɨ aŋkɨsisat. Aŋakwan butno da Piŋkop Paŋpulugok Amɨno do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk asak. Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami da nak do yo madepsi kɨnda asak, do abɨsok ae don kɨsi amɨn da Piŋkop da gɨsamni madepsi namɨsak uŋun do yokdaŋ. Mani uŋun telagɨsi tosok.
42001050	Amɨn Piŋkop do pasolgoŋ uŋun amɨn bupmɨ nandaŋ yomɨsak. Abɨsok ae don mɨŋat amɨn morapyo yaŋ gɨnsi bupmɨ nandaŋ yomɨŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak.
42001051	Iyɨ dakon kɨsit dasi pi tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨt. Amɨn iyɨ do nandaba wɨgɨwit amɨn uŋun yolban waseŋ kɨwit.
42001052	Kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo madepmon yɨkgaŋ uŋun pabɨŋ yopmaŋek mani mɨni amɨn paŋenokdok.
42001053	Amɨn jap do aŋ uŋun yo tagɨsi morapmɨ yomɨŋakwan burɨ tugoŋ. Aŋek amɨn yoni morapmɨ uŋun yolban yoni mɨni da kwaŋ.
42001054	-
42001055	Iyɨ dakon oman monjɨni Israel paŋpulugaŋek yaŋ teban tok gen Abraham gat ae babɨkni gat do yoyɨgɨt uŋun dɨma ɨŋtagɨt. Yaŋ teban tok geni aŋteban aŋek uŋun yawi dɨwatni dagok dagogɨ mɨni bupmɨ nandaŋ yomɨŋ aŋaŋ kɨsak.”
42001056	Maria kanek kapbɨ Elisabet gat egek don kokupnikon tobɨl kɨgɨt.
42001057	Elisabet da monjɨ aŋalasak dakon bɨsap abɨŋakwan monji wɨli aŋalagɨt.
42001058	Aŋalaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋakwan Amɨn Tagɨ da bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmgut dakon gen nandaŋek kokup ɨsalni gat ae yawi dɨwatni gat kɨsi da but galaksi nandawit.
42001059	Altaŋ gɨldatni 8 mudaŋakwan gɨptɨmni mandak do apgwit. Abɨŋek datni Sekaraia dakon man naŋ iyɨk do nandawit,
42001060	mani meŋi da yaŋ yagɨt, “Dɨma, mani Jon yaŋsi iyɨneŋ.”
42001061	Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Yawi dɨwatjikon Jon man kɨnda dɨma tosok.”
42001062	Yaŋ yaŋek datni ni man naŋ yok do nandɨsak yaŋ do kɨsit tɨlak aŋ ɨmgwit.
42001063	Aba Sekaraia da yo kɨnda kaŋ ɨba kɨlda mandɨsak do tɨlak aŋ yoban ɨba yaŋ mandagɨt, “Mani uŋun Jon.” Yaŋ mandaban nandaba yo ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
42001064	Uŋudon gɨn gen yogokni pɨsaŋakwan gen wasaŋek yaŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsigɨt.
42001065	Aŋakwan kokup ɨsalni da kaŋ pasalek uŋun dakon geni yaŋba Judia mɨktɨm ɨleŋɨ toŋ tɨmon kokup morap tawit amɨn kɨsisi da nandawit.
42001066	Aŋek uŋun do nandaŋ kokwin aŋek egɨpgwit. Amɨn Tagɨ dakon tapmɨm taŋ ɨmgut, do yaŋ yawit, “Uŋun monjɨ tagaŋek niaŋ amɨn kɨnda egɨpdɨsak?”
42001067	Jon dakon datni Sekaraia Telagɨ Wup da burɨkon pɨgɨ tugaŋban kombɨ gen yaŋek yaŋ yagɨt:
42001068	“Israel dakon Piŋkop da abɨŋ amɨni yokwikon baŋ yumaŋ naŋ nipgut, do Amɨn Tagɨ aŋkɨsino.
42001069	Oman monjɨni Dewit da kabɨkon da nin paŋpulugosak do amɨn tebaisi kɨnda aŋnoman agɨt.
42001070	Kalɨp kombɨ amɨn telagɨ da yaŋ yawit,
42001071	‘Piŋkop da uwalnin gat ae amɨn morap nin do nandaba yokwi tok aŋ nimaŋ amɨn da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ nipdɨsak.’
42001072	Saŋbek saŋbek telagɨsi agɨt uŋun sigɨn nandaŋek babɨknin bupmɨ nandaŋ yom do yagɨt.
42001073	-
42001074	Babɨknin Abraham yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Nak asisi uwalji da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ depbo pasol pasolɨ mɨni egek oman amɨno egɨpdaŋ.
42001075	Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ nak da ɨŋamon telagɨsi ae kɨlegɨsi egɨ aŋaŋ kɨkdaŋ.’
42001076	“Jon, monjɨno, gak don Piŋkop Wɨkwisi dakon kombɨ amɨn kɨnda yaŋ gayɨkdaŋ. Gak Amɨn Tagɨ mibɨltaŋ ɨmɨŋek kositni yuldɨsal.
42001077	-
42001078	Aŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyoni yoyɨŋ dekbɨ mibɨlni nandaba pɨsosak. Piŋkopnin uŋun bupmɨni madepsi, do dɨwarɨni wɨrɨrɨk yomɨŋek pulugaŋ tɨmɨtdɨsak yaŋ nandani. Uŋun da Kwen Kokup dakon teŋteŋɨ madep yɨpban
42001079	pɨlɨn tukgwan ekwaŋ amɨn da teŋteŋɨ kokdaŋ. Uŋun da kosit nolɨŋban kaŋek but yawot dakon kositnaŋ kɨneŋ.”
42001080	Uŋun monjɨ, wup gɨpyo kɨsi tapmɨmɨ toŋsi tagagɨt. Aŋakwan mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ tɨmon egakwan don noman taŋban Israel amɨn da kawit.
42002001	Uŋun bɨsapmon Rom dakon kɨla amɨn madep Sisa Ogastus da gen teban kɨnda yɨpgut. Pi monjɨni kɨŋ amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun mani mandani do gen teban yɨpgut.
42002002	Man mandawit uŋun pi kaluksi awit. Uŋun bɨsapmon Kwirinius da Siria provins dakon kɨla amɨn madep egɨpgut.
42002003	Sisa Ogastus da gen teban yaŋ yɨpgut, do amɨn kɨsisi mani mandani do kokupni kokupni kɨŋ mudawit.
42002004	Josep uŋun Galili provinskon, Nasaret kokupmon egɨpgut. Mani Dewit da yawi dɨwaron da altagɨt, do Judia provinskon, Dewit dakon kokup Betlehem uŋudon kɨgɨt.
42002005	Mɨŋatni pasak do manjɨkbi Maria uŋun gat kɨsi mani mandani do kɨgɨmal. Uŋun bɨsapmon Maria monjɨ kwapni toŋ da kɨgɨt.
42002006	Kɨŋ Betlehem kokupmon altaŋ egakwal Maria monjɨ altosak dakon bɨsapni apgut.
42002007	Amɨn da yumaŋ naŋek dɨpmɨn pokgoŋ yut uŋun amɨn da yɨkba tugagɨt, do bulmakau yut kɨndakon pawɨgɨ yɨkgɨmal. Yɨgakwal monjɨ mibɨltogɨ altaŋban Maria da ɨmalnaŋ wamaŋ bulmakau ɨdapmon yɨpban pakgɨt.
42002008	Bulmakau yutnon yɨgakwa Betlehem kokup da kapmatjok sipsip kɨla amɨn dɨwarɨ da pɨlɨn kaga sipsip kɨla aŋek joŋ tɨmon egɨpgwit.
42002009	Egakwa Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo kɨnda da altaŋ yomgut. Aban Amɨn Tagɨ dakon teŋteŋɨ da teŋteŋaŋ yoban madepsi pasalgwit.
42002010	Aŋakwa aŋelo da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dɨma pasolni. Nandani, nak gen tagɨsi kɨnda aŋabɨsat. Uŋun amɨn kɨsi da nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi akdaŋ.
42002011	Abɨsok Amɨn Tagɨ Kristo uŋun Dewit da kokupmon ji do altak. Uŋun ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do altak.
42002012	Ji kɨŋ monjɨ ŋakŋak ɨmalnaŋ wabi bulmakau ɨdapmon potdɨsak do wɨsɨŋ koni. Uŋun kaŋek bamɨ dayɨsat yaŋ nandani.”
42002013	Gen yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn Kwen Kokup aŋelo morapmɨsi da pɨŋ notnikon muwugek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yaŋ yawit:
42002014	“Ason Kwen Kokup Piŋkop aŋkɨsino. Mɨktɨmon amɨn galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun kabɨkon but yawot tosak.”
42002015	Aŋelo da Kwen Kokup tobɨl wɨgakwa sipsip kɨla amɨn da notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Nin Betlehem kokupmon wɨgɨ Amɨn Tagɨ da gen niyɨsak uŋun dakon bamɨ kono.”
42002016	Yaŋ yaŋek tepmɨsi wɨgɨ Maria gat Josep gat paŋalon aŋek, monjɨ ŋakŋak uŋun bulmakau ɨdapmon pakban kawit.
42002017	Kaŋek monjɨ dakon gen bin nandawit uŋun yaŋ teŋteŋaŋba
42002018	nandaŋek amɨn kɨsisi nandaba yo ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
42002019	Aŋakwa Maria da gen uŋun nandaban yo madep aban nandaŋek egɨpgut.
42002020	Aŋakwan sipsip kɨla amɨn da tobɨl kɨŋek aŋelo da gen yoyɨgɨt uŋun da arɨpmon pɨndakgwit, do Piŋkop aŋkɨsiwit.
42002021	Gɨldatni 8 aŋakwan, gɨptɨm mandak bɨsapmon, mani Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit. Dɨma altaŋakwan aŋelo da uŋun man kɨlɨ yagɨt.
42002022	Josep gat Maria gat Piŋkop da ɨŋamon kɨlek tok dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ noman tagɨt. Uŋun dakon gen Moses dakon gen tebanon tosok. Do Maria gat Josep gat da Yesu Monjɨ Amɨn Tagɨ do paret do Jerusalem aŋkɨgɨmal.
42002023	Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen teban kɨnda mandabi naŋ yolek kɨgɨmal. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Mɨŋat kɨnda monjɨ mibɨltogɨ uŋun wɨli kaŋ, uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ do paret do.”
42002024	Ae Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen teban yolek paret ak do kɨgɨmal. Gen teban uŋun yaŋ tosok: “Kɨnarɨm bamorɨ bo ae yɨgɨ yɨgɨ bulagɨ bamorɨ baŋ mukwa soni.”
42002025	Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda Jerusalem egɨpgut uŋun mani Simeon. Uŋun amɨn aŋpakni kɨlegɨsi ae Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨŋ aŋkɨsiŋyo aŋek egɨpgut. Piŋkop da Israel amɨn kabɨ but yokwikon egɨpgwit uŋun butni paŋteban asak do manjɨkbi amɨn uŋun do jomjom aŋek egɨpgut. Simeon uŋun Telagɨ Wup da burɨkon tugaŋbi amɨn kɨnda.
42002026	Telagɨ Wup da burɨkon gen yaŋ kɨlɨ iyɨgɨt, “Gak tepmɨ dɨma kɨmotdɨsal. Amɨn Tagɨ dakon Kristo kaŋek don kɨmotdɨsal.”
42002027	Simeon Telagɨ Wup da aŋtagap aban Telagɨ Yut Madepmon kɨgɨt. Aŋakwan Yesu meŋi datniyo da gen teban yolek Yesu aŋaŋ opgumal.
42002028	Aŋopbal Simeon da Yesu bedaŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yaŋ yagɨt:
42002029	“Amɨn Tagɨ Tapmɨm Ami, kalɨp yagɨl uŋun da tɨlagon oman amɨngo nak but yaworon da tagɨ kɨmokgeŋ.
42002030	Nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do aŋek yo asal uŋun dabɨlno da kɨlɨ uŋun kosot.
42002031	Amɨn morap da dabɨlon yo aŋnoman asal oni komaŋ.
42002032	Uŋun da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun dakon but paŋteŋteŋ aban Piŋkop dakon mibɨlɨ nandakdaŋ. Aŋek gak dakon amɨn kabɨgo Israel dakon tɨlɨmni egɨpdɨsak.”
42002033	Yesu dakon meŋi datniyo Simeon da gen yagɨt uŋun nandaŋek nandabal ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
42002034	Aŋakwal Simeon da gɨsam yomɨŋek Monjɨ dakon meŋi Maria yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nandaki, Israel amɨn morapmɨ da on Monjɨ do aŋek maŋ potdaŋ, ae morapmɨ da pɨdokdaŋ. But tobɨl ani do Piŋkop da yabekgɨt, mani yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmdaŋ.
42002035	Yaŋ aŋek amɨn morapmɨ dakon nandak nandak pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun paŋteŋteŋ akdɨsak. Aŋek but yokwi da emat agak sɨba da yaŋ wamgo sugokdɨsak.”
42002036	Uŋun bɨsapmon kombɨ amɨn mɨŋat pelaŋsi kɨnda egɨpgut, mani Ana. Uŋun Panuel, Ase da kabɨkon nani dakon gwi. Uŋun kalɨp amɨn paban egakwal bɨlak 7 kabɨ mudaŋakwan eni kɨmakgɨt.
42002037	Eni kɨmagakwan sakwabat egakwan bɨlakni 84 agɨt. Ana uŋun telagɨ yut dɨma yɨpmaŋ dekgɨt. Jap kelek egek bɨsit pi aŋek kalbi ae gɨldat kalba Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨŋek egɨpgut.
42002038	Uŋun bɨsapmon uŋun kɨsi obɨŋ Monjɨ kaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋek Piŋkop da Jerusalem amɨn paŋpulugosak do jomjom awit amɨn, uŋun baŋ Monjɨ dakon gen yoyɨgɨt.
42002039	Yo morap Amɨn Tagɨ da gen tebanon tosok uŋun aŋ mudaŋek tobɨl Galili provinskon iyɨ da kokup Nasaret uŋudon kɨwit.
42002040	Monjɨ tagaŋ teban taŋek nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi taŋ ɨmgut. Ae Piŋkop dakon gɨsamni madepsi taŋ ɨmgut.
42002041	Bɨlagɨ bɨlagɨ Yesu dakon meŋi datniyo Yapyap Bɨlak kok do Jerusalem kɨŋ kɨŋ awit.
42002042	Yesu bɨlakni 12 aŋakwan Yapyap Bɨlak dakon aŋpak yolek Jerusalem kɨwit.
42002043	Uŋun bɨlak dakon bɨsap madep mudaŋakwan meŋi datniyo tobɨl kokupnikon kɨk do kɨgɨmal. Mani Yesu Jerusalem sigɨn egɨpgut. Egakwan meŋi datniyo Yesu sigɨn egɨsak yaŋ dɨma nandagɨmal.
42002044	Amɨn agɨpgwit gat akwaŋ bo yaŋ nandaŋek agakwal gɨldat kɨnda mudagɨt. Don dɨwatni ae notni agɨpgwit da bɨkbɨknikon wusɨgɨmal.
42002045	Wusɨŋ dɨma aŋalon aŋ aeni tobɨl Yesu wusɨŋek Jerusalem kɨgɨmal.
42002046	Kɨŋ gɨldat kapbɨ wusɨŋ mudaŋek don Telagɨ Yut Madepmon aŋalon agɨmal. Uŋudon kaŋbal yoyɨŋdet amɨn da binapmon yɨgek gen yaŋakwa nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandak do yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ agɨt.
42002047	Amɨn morap mɨrak paŋek yɨkgwit uŋun nandak nandakni ae kobogɨ bamɨsi yagɨt uŋun do nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
42002048	Meŋi datniyo kaŋ wɨrɨpdagek meŋi da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Monjɨ, gak nido yaŋ aŋaki wusamak? Datgo gat nit gak do nandaba kɨk aŋek wusamak.”
42002049	Mani kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil nido nak wusɨk do pi amal? Nak Datno da yutnon egɨpmɨsi egɨsat jil uŋun dɨma nandamal?”
42002050	Mani gen yoyɨgɨt dakon mibɨlɨ nandabal dɨma pɨsagɨt.
42002051	Yesu meŋi datni yolban tobɨl Nasaret si kɨŋek bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ meŋi datni dakon geni guramɨkgɨt. Aŋakwan meŋi da uŋun yo morap agɨt do nandaban yo madep aban nandaŋek egɨpgut.
42002052	Yesu tagaŋek nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi taŋ ɨmgut, ae Piŋkop da galak taŋ ɨmɨŋakwan amɨnyo kɨsi da galak taŋ ɨmgwit.
42003001	Sisa Taiberius da Rom dakon kɨla amɨn madep egakwan bɨlak 15 aŋakwan Pontias Pailat da Juda gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn egɨpgut. Ae uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn Erot da Galili mɨktɨm kɨla agɨt. Aŋakwan padɨge Pilip da Ituria mɨktɨm ae Takonitis mɨktɨm kɨla agɨt. Aŋakwan Lisanias da Abilene mɨktɨm kɨla agɨt.
42003002	Aŋakwan Anas gat Kaiapas gat da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn egɨpgumal. Uŋun bɨsapmon Sekaraia dakon monji Jon mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon egakwan Piŋkop da geni ɨmgut.
42003003	Ɨban Jon uŋun Jodan Pakbi oba tosogon mɨktɨm morap toŋ uŋudon agek Piŋkop dakon gen yagɨt. Amɨn but tobɨl aŋek telagɨ pakbi soŋakwa Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yomjak do yoyɨgɨt.
42003004	Yaŋ aŋakwan kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da papiakon gen mandabi uŋun bamɨ tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yosok, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ dakon kosit aŋdɨmdɨm ani, kositni pasɨŋ aŋmɨlɨp ani.
42003005	Aŋek daŋgap madep pekba tugoni ae ɨleŋ morap pasɨŋba kositni kɨlegɨsi asak. Ae kosit gɨreŋɨ paŋmɨlɨp aba kɨlegɨsi asak. Ae kosit yokwi paŋmɨlɨp aba wagɨl gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi asak.
42003006	Yaŋ aŋakwa mɨŋat amɨn morapyo da Piŋkop da nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do aŋek pi asak uŋun koni.’ ”
42003007	Amɨn morapmɨ Jon da telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomjak do abɨŋakwa yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ dakon gwakni kabɨ. Piŋkop da butjap nandaŋek yokwi pakpak do yo yokwisi aŋ yomdɨsak. Piŋkop dakon butjap apdɨsak yaŋ namɨn da uŋun dakon but pɨso dayɨk da uŋun yap do pasal kwaŋ?
42003008	Ji but tobɨl bamɨsi aŋek aŋpakjikon but tobɨl dakon bamɨ aŋalon ani. Ji dɨsi do ‘Nin Abraham dakon babɨkni’ yaŋ dɨma yoni. Nak yaŋsi dayɨsat, Piŋkop da yaŋban on tɨp kabɨ da Abraham dakon babɨkni tagɨ dagoni. Ji uŋun Abrahamon da altawit uŋun da yo madep dɨma asak.
42003009	Pareŋka kɨndap mibɨlon yɨpbi da tosok. Kɨndap morap bamɨ tagɨ dɨma toni uŋun mandaŋ kɨndapmon maba pɨgɨ sokdaŋ.”
42003010	Amɨn da Jon dakon gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin niaŋsi aneŋ?”
42003011	Yaŋba Jon da kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda paba pɨgɨkni bamorɨ kaŋ, mɨnini amɨn do kɨnda ɨmjak. Ae japni taŋ ɨmaŋ amɨnyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn asak.”
42003012	Yaŋ yaŋban takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn dɨwarɨ telagɨ pakbi sok do apgwit uŋun da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, nin niaŋsi aneŋ?”
42003013	Iyɨŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji takis gapman da dayɨsak uŋun da arɨpmon gɨn tɨmɨtni. Ae saŋbeŋek dɨ gat dɨma tɨmɨtni.”
42003014	Ae emat amɨn dɨwarɨ da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Ae nin niaŋsi aneŋ?” Iyɨŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji amɨn yo yokwi aŋ yomɨŋek top yoyɨŋek moneŋni dɨma tɨmɨtni. Topmon da gen pikon dɨma yopni. Pi aŋ dakon yumaŋ nogɨ tɨmɨkgaŋ uŋun arɨpninon tɨmɨkgamaŋ yaŋ nandaba mudosak.”
42003015	Amɨn da butni pɨdaŋban but morap aŋek yaŋ nandawit, “Jon uŋun Kristo bo?”
42003016	Yaŋ nandaŋakwa Jon da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak pakbisi baŋ telagɨ pakbi soŋ damɨsat. Mani nak da manjikon abɨsak amɨn uŋun dakon tapmɨm da nak dakon tapmɨm yapmaŋdak. Nak yombem yokwi da kandap gwɨl napni tagɨ dɨma wɨtdalgeŋ. Uŋun amɨn da Telagɨ Wup gat ae kɨndap gat soŋ damdɨsak.
42003017	Uŋun wit dakon sɨbɨt sɨbɨt wɨrɨrɨt kɨndap kɨrɨŋni kɨsitnikon taŋakwan apdɨsak. Abɨŋek bamɨ kokwinɨk tamonikon yopmaŋek sɨbɨt sɨbɨt wɨrɨrɨk maban kɨndap kɨmot kɨmorɨ mɨni uŋudon sokdaŋ.”
42003018	Jon nawa gen morapmɨ gat kɨsi amɨn dakon but pɨsoni do yoyɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ yomgut.
42003019	Jon da gapman dakon kɨla amɨn madep Erot tebai kaŋ yagɨt, nido Erot da padɨge dakon mɨŋatni Erodias tuwɨl pagɨt, ae aŋpak yokwi dɨ kɨsi agɨt.
42003020	Erot yokwi kɨnda gat sigɨn saŋbeŋ aŋek Jon dam tebanon yɨpgut.
42003021	Amɨn morap telagɨ pakbi soŋakwa Yesu yo kɨsi sogɨt. Soŋek bɨsit aŋakwan kundu wɨtdal kɨgɨt.
42003022	Wɨtdal kɨŋakwan Telagɨ Wup kɨnarɨm da mɨktɨmon paŋ uŋun da tɨlak Yesukon pɨgɨt. Aŋakwan Kwen Kokupgwan da gen kɨnda yaŋ altagɨt: “Gak Monjɨno. Butdasi galak taŋ gamɨsat. Butno gak do tagɨsi asak.”
42003023	Yesu bɨlakni 30 da tɨlak aŋakwan pini wasagɨt. Yesu uŋun Josep dakon monji amɨn da yaŋ nandawit. Josep uŋun Eli dakon monji.
42003024	Eli uŋun Matat dakon monji. Matat uŋun Liwai dakon monji. Liwai uŋun Melki dakon monji. Melki uŋun Janai dakon monji. Janai uŋun Josep dakon monji.
42003025	Josep uŋun Matatias dakon monji. Matatias uŋun Amos dakon monji. Amos uŋun Naum dakon monji. Naum uŋun Esli dakon monji. Esli uŋun Nagai dakon monji.
42003026	Nagai uŋun Mat dakon monji. Mat uŋun Matatias dakon monji. Matatias uŋun Semen dakon monji. Semen uŋun Josek dakon monji. Josek uŋun Joda dakon monji.
42003027	Joda uŋun Joanan dakon monji. Joanan uŋun Resa dakon monji. Resa uŋun Serubabel dakon monji. Serubabel uŋun Sealtiel dakon monji. Sealtiel uŋun Neri dakon monji.
42003028	Neri uŋun Melki dakon monji. Melki uŋun Adi dakon monji. Adi uŋun Kosam dakon monji. Kosam uŋun Elmadam dakon monji. Elmadam uŋun Er dakon monji.
42003029	Er uŋun Josua dakon monji. Josua uŋun Eliesa dakon monji. Eliesa uŋun Jorim dakon monji. Jorim uŋun Matat dakon monji. Matat uŋun Liwai dakon monji.
42003030	Liwai uŋun Simeon dakon monji. Simeon uŋun Juda dakon monji. Juda uŋun Josep dakon monji. Josep uŋun Jonam dakon monji. Jonam uŋun Eliakim dakon monji.
42003031	Eliakim uŋun Melea dakon monji. Melea uŋun Mena dakon monji. Mena uŋun Matata dakon monji. Matata uŋun Natan dakon monji. Natan uŋun Dewit dakon monji.
42003032	Dewit uŋun Jesi dakon monji. Jesi uŋun Obet dakon monji. Obet uŋun Boas dakon monji. Boas uŋun Salmon dakon monji. Salmon uŋun Nason dakon monji.
42003033	Nason uŋun Aminadap dakon monji. Aminadap uŋun Atmin dakon monji. Atmin uŋun Ani dakon monji. Ani uŋun Esron dakon monji. Esron uŋun Peres dakon monji. Peres uŋun Juda dakon monji.
42003034	Juda uŋun Jekop dakon monji. Jekop uŋun Aisak dakon monji. Aisak uŋun Abraham dakon monji. Abraham uŋun Tera dakon monji. Tera uŋun Nao dakon monji.
42003035	Nao uŋun Seruk dakon monji. Seruk uŋun Reu dakon monji. Reu uŋun Pelek dakon monji. Pelek uŋun Ebe dakon monji. Ebe uŋun Sela dakon monji.
42003036	Sela uŋun Kainan dakon monji. Kainan uŋun Apaksat dakon monji. Apaksat uŋun Siem dakon monji. Siem uŋun Noa dakon monji. Noa uŋun Lamek dakon monji.
42003037	Lamek uŋun Metusela dakon monji. Metusela uŋun Enok dakon monji. Enok uŋun Jaret dakon monji. Jaret uŋun Malalel dakon monji. Malalel uŋun Kenan dakon monji.
42003038	Kenan uŋun Enos dakon monji. Enos uŋun Set dakon monji. Set uŋun Adam dakon monji. Adam uŋun Piŋkop dakon monji.
42004001	Yesu Telagɨ Wup da burɨkon tugaŋban Jodan Pakbikon da tobɨl apgut. Abɨŋakwan Telagɨ Wup da iyɨŋ aŋaŋ mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon aŋkɨgɨt.
42004002	Kɨŋ uŋudon gɨldat 40 japmɨ mɨni egek jap do madepsi agɨt. Aŋakwan Sunduk da aŋkewalgɨt.
42004003	Aŋkewalek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak asi Piŋkop dakon Monji egɨsalon yaŋbɨ tɨp on da bret dagaŋban.”
42004004	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Bret dagɨn amɨn egɨp egɨp tagɨ dɨma yomjak.’ ”
42004005	Yaŋ yaŋban Sunduk da Yesu iyɨŋ aŋaŋ ɨleŋ dubagɨsi kɨndakon wɨgek uŋudon gɨn on mɨktɨmon mɨktɨm madep madep morap kɨsi yolɨŋban pɨndakgɨt.
42004006	Aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “On mɨktɨm madep kɨsi kɨlani aki do yaŋ mudaŋ gabo man madep paki. On mɨktɨm madep kɨsi nak dakon, do amɨn kɨnda do ɨm do nandakeŋ kaŋ tagɨ ɨbeŋ.
42004007	Gawak nabi kaŋ, on yo morap gak do gamɨŋ mudokeŋ.”
42004008	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji uŋun naŋ gɨn gawak ɨmɨŋek oman aŋɨmni.’ ”
42004009	-
42004011	Yaŋ yaŋban Sunduk da Yesu iyɨŋ aŋaŋ Jerusalem kokup papmon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋ Telagɨ Yut Madep da kwenon awɨgɨ yɨpmaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda yaŋ tosok: ‘Uŋun da aŋeloni yoyɨŋban kɨlago tagɨsi ani. Ae kandapgo tɨpmon dɨma gɨtni yaŋ do aŋelo da gak kɨsit da kendak abɨŋ gepni.’ Gen yaŋ tosok, do gak asi Piŋkop dakon Monji kaŋ, gak amon mibɨlɨkon paŋ ma.”
42004012	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda yaŋ yosok: ‘Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji dakon tapmɨm kok do aŋek dɨmasi aŋkewaldo.’ ”
42004013	Sunduk da paŋkewal morap uŋun aŋ mudaŋek ae bɨsap kɨndakon don aŋkewalgeŋ yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu yɨpmaŋ kɨgɨt.
42004014	Yesu uŋun Wup da teban togon aeni tobɨl Galili mɨktɨmon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn morapyo kokup terɨ terɨ egɨpgwit uŋun da gen bini nandawit.
42004015	Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan amɨn kɨsi da aŋkɨsiwit.
42004016	Yesu uŋun Nasaret kokupmon kɨgɨt. Kalɨp uŋun kokupmon egek tagaŋ teban taŋek amɨn tagɨ agɨt. Sabat bɨsapmon Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgɨ wɨgɨ agɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn Sabat kɨndakon wɨgɨgɨt. Aŋek Piŋkop dakon gen manjɨk do pɨdaŋ akgɨt.
42004017	Pɨdaŋ agakwan kombɨ amɨn Aisaia dakon papia ɨba abɨdaŋ wɨtdalek gen yaŋ naŋ manjɨgɨt:
42004018	“Amɨn Tagɨ dakon Wupni nagon tosok, nido amɨn yoni mɨnikon kɨŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨkeŋ do nak manjɨŋek but nelak tagɨl namgut. Ae dam tebanon ekwaŋ amɨn pulugaŋ kɨ abɨgɨni yaŋ yoyɨkeŋ do yabekgɨt. Ae dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn tagɨ sɨŋtoni, ae amɨn da pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ amɨn uŋun pulugaŋ yopbeŋ do yabekgɨt.
42004019	Amɨn Tagɨ da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni yo tagɨsi aŋyomdɨsak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ abɨsak uŋun dakon yaŋ teŋteŋok akeŋ do yabekgɨt.”
42004020	Yesu uŋun gen manjɨŋ mudaŋek papia gɨroŋɨgek kɨla amɨn do ɨmɨŋek yɨkgɨt. Yɨgakwan uŋun muwut muwut yutnon amɨn kɨsi dabɨlni Yesukon gɨn taŋakwan yɨkgwit.
42004021	Aŋakwa Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop dakon gen manjɨko nandayɨŋ uŋun abɨsok dabɨljikon bamɨ toŋ asak.”
42004022	Yaŋban amɨn gen yagɨt do nandaba tagɨsi aŋakwan yawit, “Mao! On Josep dakon monji da niaŋonsi da gen galagɨsi on yosok?”
42004023	Yaŋba Yesu yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn da gen kɨnda yoŋ uŋun yaŋ: ‘Wuda wamak gaga dakon gɨptɨm aŋmɨlɨp a.’ Uŋun gen nak nayɨkdaŋ, ma? Ae ‘Kapaneam kokupmon wasok agɨl do amɨn da yaŋba nandagɨmaŋ uŋun yomaninon yaŋ gɨn abi do nandamaŋ’ yaŋ nayɨkdaŋ, ma?
42004024	Nak asisi dayɨsat, kombɨ amɨn morap kokup kaloŋni da geni dɨma nandaŋ yomaŋ.
42004025	Asisi, kombɨ amɨn Elaija da bɨsapmon sɨkak dɨma maŋakwan bɨlak kapbɨ ae kanek 6 yaŋ egek jap do madepsi awit. Uŋun bɨsapmon Israel mɨktɨmon sakwabat morapmɨ egɨpgwit.
42004026	Mani Piŋkop da Elaija Israel sakwabat kɨnda do dɨma yabekgɨt. Sakwabat kɨnda Sarepat kokupmon egɨpgut uŋun do yabekban kɨgɨt. Sarepat uŋun Saidon kokup da tetgɨn do tosok.
42004027	Ae kombɨ amɨn Elisa da bɨsapmon Israel mɨktɨmon wuda tebani toŋ amɨn morapmɨ egɨpgwit, mani kɨnda dɨma kɨlek tagɨt. Siria mɨktɨmon nani amɨn kɨnda mani Neman uŋun dagɨn kɨlek tagɨt.”
42004028	Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn muwut muwut yutnon egɨpgwit kɨsi da japmɨsi nandaŋek
42004029	pɨdaŋ Yesu yolba kokup da waŋga pɨgɨgɨt. Kokup uŋun ɨleŋon tagɨt, do tɨpdomon maba pɨgɨsak do aŋkɨwit.
42004030	Mani amɨn da bɨkbɨgon da si kɨgɨt.
42004031	Yesu Nasaret kokup yɨpmaŋek Galili mɨktɨmon kokup kɨnda mani Kapaneam uŋudon pɨgɨgɨt. Pabɨgɨ egek Sabat bɨsap morapmon amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
42004032	Yoyɨŋ degakwan amɨn kɨnda man madepni toŋ da gen ŋwakŋwarɨsi niyɨsak yaŋ nandawit.
42004033	Koŋni toŋ amɨn kɨnda Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon yɨkgɨt. Uŋun da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt,
42004034	“Yesu, Nasaret amɨn, gak nibaŋ aŋnim do nandɨsal? Nin paŋupbal ak do abɨl? Nak nandaŋ gamɨsat, gak Piŋkop Dakon Telagɨ Amɨni.”
42004035	Mani Yesu da koŋ tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen dɨma yaŋek amɨn on yɨpmaŋ det!” Yaŋ iyɨŋakwan koŋ uŋun da amɨn ukwayɨkban maŋ amɨn da binapmon pakgɨt. Pagakwan amɨn uŋun dɨma aŋupbal aŋek yɨpmaŋ kɨgɨt.
42004036	Amɨn da uŋun kaŋ wurɨpdagek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yawit, “Mao, niaŋ gen kɨnda yosok? Amɨn man madepni toŋ ae tapmɨmni toŋ da tɨlagon koŋ gen tebai yoyɨŋban geni nandaŋek pasal kwaŋ.”
42004037	Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da pi agɨt dakon gen uŋun provins dakon amɨn kɨsi da nandawit.
42004038	Yesu Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut yɨpmaŋek Saimon da yutnon kɨgɨt. Saimon dakon yopmi sot aŋek gɨptɨmni kɨndapmɨ sogɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan Yesu da aŋpulugosak do iyɨwit.
42004039	Aba Yesu uŋun mɨŋat da kapmatjok paŋkɨ agek gɨptɨmni kɨndapmɨ sogɨt uŋun pasɨl ɨmjak do tebai yagɨt. Yaŋban sotni pasɨl ɨmɨŋakwan uŋudon gɨn pɨdaŋek japni paŋkosit agɨt.
42004040	Gɨldat si pɨgɨk do aŋakwan amɨn da notni sot mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ awit uŋun Yesukon paŋopgwit. Paŋopba Yesu da kɨsitni kwenikon kaloŋ kaloŋ wutjɨŋek paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
42004041	Ae amɨn morapmɨ koŋni toŋ uŋun yol yomgut. Yolakwan koŋ da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Gak Piŋkop dakon Monji.” Yesu uŋun Kristo yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmgwit, do Yesu da koŋ gen dɨmasi yoni do kɨrɨŋɨk yomgut.
42004042	Wɨsa dagokdosi Yesu amɨn dɨma egɨpgwit tɨm kɨndakon kɨgɨt. Aŋakwan amɨn da wusɨŋ aŋalon aŋek dɨma yopmaŋ kɨsak do nandaŋek abɨdok do awit.
42004043	Mani yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Akdɨsak uŋun dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi kokup pap dɨwarɨkon kɨsi agek yoyɨŋ teŋteŋokeŋ. Nak Piŋkop da uŋun pi abeŋ dosi yabekgɨt.”
42004044	Yaŋ yaŋek Judia mɨktɨmon muwut muwut yut taŋ aŋaŋ kɨwit uŋudon agek Piŋkop gen yoyɨgɨt.
42005001	Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu Genesaret Pakbi Ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon agek Piŋkop dakon gen yaŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da abɨŋ uŋun da kapmatsisok aŋgwasɨŋek nandawit.
42005002	Yesu bot bamorɨ ɨleŋɨkon taŋbal pɨndakgɨt. Uŋun tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl amɨn da yopba taŋakwal tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni pakbikon sugawit.
42005003	Yesu uŋun bot kɨndakon mɨlkaŋ wɨgɨgɨt. Bot uŋun Saimon dakon. Uŋun boron wɨgek Saimon yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Bot ɨmɨŋdɨlbɨ tɨmɨsok dɨ pakbikon kwan.” Yaŋ iyɨŋek Yesu boron yɨgek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
42005004	Yoyɨŋ dek mudaŋek Saimon yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Tɨmɨsok dɨ gat kɨŋek pakbi ɨlarɨkon kɨŋek tap kɨlap sɨmɨl do yɨk yopba pɨgɨni.”
42005005	Yaŋban Saimon da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, nin kalbi tap kɨlap sɨmɨl do pi madep aŋek tap kɨlap kɨnda dɨma ɨlɨgapdo wɨsa dagak. Mani gak dakon gen guramɨgek yɨk yum yopno pɨgɨni.”
42005006	Yoyɨgɨt uŋudeŋ aŋakwa tap kɨlap morapmɨsi yɨgon pɨgɨ tugaŋek yɨk dagok do awit.
42005007	Aŋakwa notni bot kɨndakon agɨpgwit amɨn da abɨŋ paŋpulugoni do kɨsit da tɨlak aŋ yomgwit. Tɨlak aŋ yoba apba tap kɨlap bot bamot kɨsikon yopba tugaŋ jɨk taŋek pakbi kagagwan pɨgɨk do agɨmal.
42005008	-
42005010	Saimon gat notni kabɨ gat tap kɨlap ɨlɨkgwit uŋun pɨndagek tamtam yawit. Ae Saimon dakon pi ɨsal bamotni Jems gat Jon gat Sebedi dakon monji yat uŋun kɨsi tamtam yagɨmal. Aŋek Saimon Pita da Yesu ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nepmaŋ dek kɨ. Nak yokwi pakpak!” Yaŋban Yesu da Saimon yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak dɨma pasolbi. Abɨsok onda wasaŋek gak amɨn tɨmɨtdɨsal.”
42005011	Yaŋ yaŋban bot bamotni ɨlɨkba ɨleŋɨkon wɨgakwal yo morapni kɨsi yopmaŋek Yesu yolgwit.
42005012	Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu kokup pap kɨndakon egakwan amɨn wuda tebani toŋ kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun da Yesu kaŋek ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek mɨktɨmon gawagek Yesu bɨsit tebai iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek tokeŋ do nandɨsal kaŋ, tagɨ aŋmɨlɨp abɨ kɨlek tokeŋ.”
42005013	Yaŋban Yesu da kɨsitni amɨn uŋun kwenikon wɨtjɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨlek toki do nandɨsat, do pasɨl gamni!” Yaŋ yaŋban uŋudon gɨn wuda tebani pasɨl ɨmɨŋakwa kɨlek tagɨt.
42005014	Aban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak amɨn dɨmasi yoyɨŋek kɨŋ mukwa sogok amɨnon gɨptɨmgo yolɨki. Aŋek Moses da yagɨt uŋun da tɨlagon paret aŋaki amɨn da asi kɨlek tal yaŋ gandani.”
42005015	Mani Yesu da yo agɨt dakon geni sigɨn kɨŋ ɨreŋ tagɨt. Aŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da geni nandak do opgwit. Ae sotni paŋmɨlɨp aŋyomjak do opgwit.
42005016	Mani Yesu bɨsap morapmɨ mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ tɨmon paŋkɨ egek bɨsit pi agɨt.
42005017	Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu amɨn yoyɨŋ degakwan Parisi amɨn ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨnyo kɨsi paŋobɨŋ yɨkgwit. Uŋun amɨn Jerusalem, ae Galili dakon kokup morap toŋ, ae Judia mɨktɨmon da opgwit. Yesu Amɨn Tagɨ dakon tapmɨm taŋ ɨmgut, do sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
42005018	Aŋakwan amɨn kabi kɨnda da amɨn kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi kɨnda wamaŋ aŋaŋ opgwit. Uŋun wayɨgon yɨpba pagakwan aŋaŋ Yesu da akgɨron awɨgɨk do awit.
42005019	Mani amɨn morapmɨ, do yutnon awɨgɨk do aŋtɨdok awit. Do yut kwenon wɨgɨ yut tuwɨlek amɨn uŋun wayɨgon pagakwan napmon da abɨdaŋakwa amɨn morap da binapmon pɨgek Yesu da buronsi pɨgɨgɨt.
42005020	Yesu da nandaŋ gadatni pɨndagek yagɨt, “Not, dɨwarɨgo yopmaŋ gamɨsat.”
42005021	Yaŋban Parisi amɨn gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da iyɨ yaŋ nandawit, “On namɨn amɨn kɨnda da Piŋkop kulabɨŋek gen uŋun yosok? Dɨwarɨ yopyop uŋun amɨn kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨmasi agagɨ. Uŋun Piŋkop kaloŋ dagɨn asak.”
42005022	Yesu da nandak nandakni uŋun pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido butjikon da nandak nandak uŋun nandaŋ namaŋ?
42005023	Dɨwarɨ yopyop ae amɨn kɨsit kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi paŋmɨlɨp agak uŋun kɨsi amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma agagɨ.
42005024	Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji on mɨktɨmon dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt dakon pi asak do yaŋ mudaŋ ɨbi yaŋ nandaba pɨsosak do on amɨn aŋmɨlɨp abeŋ.” Yesu yaŋ yaŋek kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi amɨn kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak gayɨsat, gak pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek yutgokon kɨ.”
42005025	Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn amɨn uŋun pɨdaŋek yalɨŋ potni tɨmɨgek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yutnikon kɨgɨt.
42005026	Aŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn morapyo uŋun kaŋ wurɨpdagek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yawit, “Abɨsok yo ŋwakŋwarɨsi altaŋban komaŋ.”
42005027	Uŋun da kwenon Yesu yomakon pɨgek kɨŋ kaŋban takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt yut kabeŋon takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn kɨnda yɨkban kagɨt. Uŋun mani Liwai. Yesu da Liwai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nol.”
42005028	Yaŋ iyɨŋban Liwai pɨdaŋ yo morapni kɨsi yopmaŋek Yesu yolgɨt.
42005029	Aŋek Liwai da yutnikon Yesu do jap madepsi paŋkosit agɨt. Yaŋ aban takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn morapmɨ gat ae amɨn dɨwarɨ gat kɨsi yɨgek jap nawit.
42005030	Aŋakwa Parisi amɨn gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn Parisi da kabɨkon nani uŋun da Yesu dakon paŋdetni do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋek yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ji jap pakbiyo takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn ae yokwi pakpak amɨn gat nido aŋ?”
42005031	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn sotni mɨni uŋun wuda wamagon dɨma kwaŋ. Amɨn sotni toŋ uŋun dagɨn wuda wamagon kwaŋ.
42005032	Nak amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ ɨlɨt do dɨma pɨgɨm. Yokwi pakpak yaŋ ɨlɨkgo but tobɨl ani do pɨgɨm.”
42005033	Parisi amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Jon dakon paŋdetni bɨsap morapmɨ Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egek bɨsit pi aŋ. Ae Parisi amɨn nin dakon paŋdetnin kɨsi yaŋ gɨn aŋ. Mani gak dakon paŋdetgoni jap pakbiyo aŋek ekwaŋ.”
42005034	Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Monjɨ kɨnda mɨŋat pasak bɨsapmon uŋun jap noknok bɨsap madep kɨnda, ae monjɨ notni gat ekwaŋ, do jap kelek tagɨ dɨma egɨpni.
42005035	Mani don monjɨ uŋun abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ kɨŋakwa notni uŋun bɨsapmon jap kelek ekwaŋ.”
42005036	Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda gat yoyɨŋek yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da ɨmal kalugɨ kɨnda pudaŋ ɨmal garaŋɨ dagaŋ kwi kɨndakon bupjak kaŋ uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Yaŋ asak kaŋ, ɨmal kalugɨ aŋupbal asak. Ae ɨmal kalugɨ uŋun kalɨpmɨ gat arɨp dɨma.
42005037	Ae amɨn kɨnda da wain kalugɨ tɨbɨrɨ meme gɨp baŋ wasaŋbi kalɨpmɨ kɨndakon kolesak kaŋ uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Yaŋ asak kaŋ, wain da pukwa paptaŋ meme gɨp kɨrɨŋɨgakwa wain maŋ mudokdaŋ. Ae meme gɨpyo kɨsi yokwi tokdɨsak.
42005038	Do wain kalugɨ meme gɨp kalugɨkon kolaŋ.
42005039	Ae wain kalɨpmɨ nosok amɨn wain kalugɨ nok do kuragɨ nandaŋek yaŋ yosok, ‘Wain kalɨpmɨ uŋun tagɨsi.’ ”
42006001	Sabat bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu wit pi binap kɨnda naŋ kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan paŋdetni da wit bamɨ dɨ jɨmɨk kɨsit da mɨsɨŋɨkba gɨpmɨ maŋakwa bamɨ si nawit.
42006002	Aŋakwa Parisi amɨn dɨ da pɨndagek yawit, “Ji Sabat bɨsap dakon gen teban yapmaŋek nido yaŋ aŋ?”
42006003	Yaŋba Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Dewit gat amɨn kabɨni gat da jap do awit bɨsapmon yo awit uŋun dɨ manjɨŋ nandaŋ bo dɨma?
42006004	Dewit uŋun Piŋkop da yutnon wɨgɨ bret Piŋkop do parekbi uŋun tɨmɨkgɨt. Bret uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn dagɨn tagɨ noknogɨ. Mani Dewit da naŋek amɨn kabɨni kɨsi do yomgut.”
42006005	Yesu da sigɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun Sabat bɨsap dakon Amɨn Tagɨ.”
42006006	Sabat bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgek yoyɨŋdet agɨt. Uŋudon amɨn kɨsirɨ amɨnsi tetni gɨreŋɨkbi kɨnda egɨpgut.
42006007	Parisi amɨn gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da Yesu Sabat bɨsapmon amɨn paŋmɨlɨp aban kaŋek gen yaŋ ɨmneŋ yaŋ do kaŋ egɨpgwit.
42006008	Mani Yesu da nandak nandakni pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek amɨn kɨsirɨ gɨreŋɨkbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak pɨdaŋ amɨn da ɨŋamon at.” Iyɨŋban amɨn uŋun pɨdaŋ akgɨt.
42006009	Pɨdaŋ agakwan Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji niaŋ nandaŋ? Sabat bɨsap dakon gen teban uŋun aŋpak tagɨ bo yokwi aneŋ do yosok? Amɨn kutnok do yosok, bo ae amɨn si paŋupbal ano kɨmotni do yosok?”
42006010	Yesu da amɨn morap kɨsi pɨndak aŋaŋ kɨ mudaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨsitgo aŋnɨŋnɨŋ a.” Iyɨŋban yaŋ gɨn aŋakwan kɨsirɨ kɨlek tagɨt.
42006011	Mani Parisi amɨn gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da japmɨsi nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek iyɨ gɨn yaŋ nandat aŋek Yesu niaŋsi aŋ ɨmno yaŋ yawit.
42006012	Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu kalbi bɨsit pi ak do kabap kɨndakon wɨgɨ Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨgɨt. Bɨsit pi aŋ egakwan wɨsa dagaŋban
42006013	paŋdetni yaŋ yoban apba 12 kabɨ manjɨgɨt. Manjɨŋek yabekbi man yomgut.
42006014	Kɨnda uŋun mani Saimon (uŋun Yesu da Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt). Ae Saimon dakon padɨge Andru, ae Jems, Jon, Pilip, Batolomiu,
42006015	Matyu, Tomas, Alpius dakon monji Jems, ae Saimon (uŋun Selot da kabɨkon nani),
42006016	ae Jems dakon monji Judas, ae Judas Iskariot (uŋun da don Yesu uwal da kɨsiron yɨpgut).
42006017	Yesu uŋun amɨn kabɨ tɨmɨkban ɨleŋon da mɨktɨm kuldukgɨbaŋ kɨndakon pukwa paŋdetni morapmɨ gat kɨsi akgwit. Aŋakwa Judia mɨktɨm dakon amɨn morapmɨ gat, ae Jerusalem kokup papmon amɨn gat, ae tap amɨn Tair ae Saidon kokup da kapmatjok egɨpgwit amɨn uŋun gat kɨsi egɨpgwit.
42006018	Uŋun geni nandakdo, ae sotni paŋmɨlɨp asak do nandaŋek apgwit. Koŋ da paŋupbal abi amɨn uŋun Yesu da paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
42006019	Sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp agak dakon tapmɨm Yesukon da apgut, do amɨn morap kɨsitni kwenikon ɨgayɨk do awit. Yaŋ aŋek kɨlek tawit.
42006020	Yesu da paŋdetni pɨndagek yagɨt, “Yoni mɨni amɨn ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ, nido ji Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun da kagagwan ekwaŋ.
42006021	Abɨsok jap do aŋ amɨn ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ. Don jap naŋ tugokdaŋ. Abɨsok kunam takgaŋ amɨn ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ. Don jɨkgo yanjakdaŋ.
42006022	Amɨn da dandaba ji Amɨn Dakon Monji yolyol amɨn yaŋ dandaŋek nandaba yokwi tok aŋdamdaŋ. Ji uŋun gat gadaŋek dɨma egɨpni do dayɨŋek yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ damɨŋek man yokwisi damdaŋ. Yo morap uŋun altaŋ damdaŋ, mani ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.
42006023	Uŋun bɨsapmon ji butji tagɨsi taŋakwan kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek wɨgɨ mok ani. Nandani. Kobogɨ do tomni wukwisi Kwen Kokupmon taŋ damɨsak. Kalɨp babɨni da kombɨ amɨn do yo yokwi yaŋ gɨn aŋyomgwit.
42006024	“Mani yoni morapmɨ amɨn, awa! Ji yo tagɨsi wagɨl tɨmɨkgaŋ. Don butji paŋteban ak do yo dɨ dɨma tɨmɨtdaŋ.
42006025	“Abɨsok jap naŋek butji paptoŋ amɨn, awa! Don jap do akdaŋ. “Abɨsok jɨkgo yanjaŋ amɨn, awa! Don kunam tagakwa dabɨl pakbisi mokdaŋ.
42006026	“Amɨn da man madep damaŋ amɨn, awa! Kalɨp babɨkji da kombɨ amɨn toptopmɨ do yaŋ gɨn aŋ yomgwit.”
42006027	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Geno nandaŋ amɨn yaŋ dayɨsat, ji uwalji do but dasi galak taŋ yomni. Ae nandaba yokwi tok aŋ damaŋ amɨn do aŋpak tagɨ aŋyomni.
42006028	Ae jobɨt tɨmɨtni do dayaŋ amɨn, uŋun Piŋkop da paŋpulugosak do bɨsit iyɨni. Ae yokwi aŋ damaŋ amɨn do bɨsit ani.
42006029	Amɨn kɨnda da mogɨm kulbak gɨkban kaŋ, terɨ kɨnda kɨsi aŋtobɨl ɨbi. Ae amɨn kɨnda da mɨrɨm ɨmalgo gwayeŋban kaŋ, yum kaŋaki paba pɨgɨkgo kɨsi abɨdosak.
42006030	Ae amɨn morap da yo kabɨgo yobi do gayɨŋba kaŋ yobi. Ae amɨn kɨnda da yogo kɨnda abɨdaŋ aŋkɨsak kaŋ, aŋtobɨl gamjak do tebai dɨma iyɨki.
42006031	Amɨn da aŋpak niaŋsi aŋdamni do nandaŋ, uŋun aŋpak amɨn do aŋyomni.
42006032	“Amɨn butdasi galak taŋ damaŋ baŋgɨn butdasi galak taŋ yomni kaŋ, ji amɨn tagɨ dɨma. Yokwi pakpak amɨn uŋun kɨsi amɨn butdasi galak taŋ yomaŋ baŋ butdasi galak taŋ yomaŋ.
42006033	Ae aŋpak tagɨ aŋdamaŋ amɨn baŋgɨn aŋpak tagɨ aŋyomni kaŋ, ji amɨn tagɨ dɨma. Yokwi pakpak da aŋpak uŋun kɨsi aŋ.
42006034	Ae uŋun amɨn goman tagɨ sopjak yaŋ nandaŋ teban taŋek amɨn kɨnda do yo ɨmni kaŋ, ji amɨn tagɨ dɨma. Yokwi pakpak amɨn notni da goman uŋun kɨsisi sopdaŋ yaŋ nandaŋek notni do yo yomaŋ.
42006035	Mani ji uwalji do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ yomni. Aŋek amɨn do yo yomɨŋek sopni do dɨma yoyɨni. Piŋkop da yokwi pakpak ya yaŋ dɨma iyaŋ amɨn uŋun do yo tagɨ yumsi yomɨsak, do ji aŋpak tagɨsi ani kaŋ, Piŋkop Wɨkwisi da kobogɨ do yo tagɨsi damɨŋakwan monjinisi egɨpdaŋ.
42006036	Datgo da amɨn do bupmɨ nandɨsak, do jiyo yaŋ gɨn amɨn do bupmɨ nandani.”
42006037	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji amɨn dakon aŋpak dɨma kokwinɨtni kaŋ, Piŋkop da jiyo kɨsi dɨma kokwinɨtjak. Ji amɨn yokwi aba uŋun do kobogɨ tɨmɨtni do dɨma yoyɨni kaŋ, Piŋkop da jiyo kɨsi yokwisi do tebai dɨma dayɨkdɨsak. Ji amɨn dakon dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yomni kaŋ, Piŋkop da ji dakon dɨwarɨsi yaŋ gɨn yopmaŋ damdɨsak.
42006038	Ji amɨn do yo yomni kaŋ, Piŋkop da ji do yo damdɨsak. Uŋun da yo morapmɨsi damɨŋakwan tugok tugogɨsi egɨpdaŋ. Tɨlak niaŋsi yomni uŋun da tɨlak yaŋ gɨn tɨmɨtdaŋ.”
42006039	Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Dabɨlɨ mɨni kɨnda dabɨlni mɨni notni kɨnda kosit tagɨ yolɨsak? Kaŋ kɨsi bamot gapmagwan mokdamal.
42006040	Papia yut mɨŋat monjɨyo yoyɨŋdetni dɨma yapmaŋgaŋ. Mani papia yut tagɨsi wɨgɨ mudaŋek don yoyɨŋdetni yombem aŋ.
42006041	Gaga da dabɨlon kɨndap kwɨk tosok uŋun do dɨma nandaŋek notgo da dabɨlon jɨmjɨm nido kosol?
42006042	Gaga da dabɨlon kɨndap kwɨk tosok uŋun dɨma kaŋek niaŋon da notgo ‘Dabɨlgokon jɨmjɨm tosok uŋun paŋ gamdɨsat’ yaŋ iyɨki? Gak jamba but amɨn. Mibɨltok gaga da dabɨlon kɨndap kwɨk tosok uŋun abɨ kɨŋakwan notgo da dabɨlon jɨmjɨmjok tosok uŋun kaŋbɨ pɨsaŋakwan tagɨ paki.”
42006043	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yagɨt, “Kɨndap tagɨ da bamɨ yokwi arɨpmɨ dɨma potni. Ae kɨndap yokwi da bamɨ tagɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma potni.
42006044	Amɨn da kɨndap sop bamɨ baŋ pɨndagek kɨndap yokwi bo tagɨ yaŋ pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋ. Amɨn da pik kɨndap dakon bamɨ pak do nap kelɨ toŋon kɨŋ dɨma dekgaŋ. Ae wain sop kɨndap yokwi kelɨ toŋon kɨŋ dɨma paŋ.
42006045	Amɨn kɨlegɨ uŋun nandak nandakni kɨlegɨ morapmɨ butnikon toŋ, do aŋpak kɨlegɨsi asak. Aŋakwan amɨn yokwi uŋun nandak nandak yokwi butnikon toŋ, do aŋpak yokwi asak. Nandak nandak niaŋ amɨn butgwan toŋ, uŋun gen kagakon da yoŋ.”
42006046	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji nido nak Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ nayɨŋek geno dɨma guramɨkgaŋ?
42006047	Nagon obɨŋek geno nandaŋek guramɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun dakon tɨlak kɨnda dolɨkeŋ.
42006048	Amɨn kɨnda yutni ak do aŋek gapma wayɨkban mibɨlɨsigwan pɨgakwan mɨktɨmgwan tɨp madep da kwenon gwak magɨt. Aŋek don yut uŋun da kwenon agɨt. Aban pakbi madepsi ɨgek yutni tɨdaŋ tuwɨl do agɨt mani yutni tebaisi agɨt, do tebaisi akgɨt.
42006049	Mani amɨn kɨnda nak dakon gen nandaŋek dɨma guramɨkdak amɨn uŋun amɨn kɨnda yombem. Uŋun yutni teban tokni mɨni ɨsal mɨktɨm kwenon gɨn agɨt. Don pakbi ɨgek yut uŋun tɨdaŋban uŋudon gɨn tuwɨl kɨ madepsi tasɨk tagɨt.”
42007001	Yesu gen uŋun amɨn yoyɨŋ mudaŋek Kapaneam kokupmon pɨgɨgɨt.
42007002	Uŋun kokupmon Rom dakon emat amɨn 100 dakon mibɨltok amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun dakon oman amɨni si galak taŋ ɨmgut uŋun sot madep aŋek kɨmotdosi agɨt.
42007003	Aŋakwan uŋun mibɨltok amɨn da Yesu dakon gen bini nandagɨt, do Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn dɨ yabekban Yesukon kɨwit. Kɨŋ Yesu da abɨŋ oman amɨni aŋmɨlɨp asak do iyɨwit.
42007004	Aŋek Yesu da aŋpulugosak do madepsi yaŋ iyɨwit, “Uŋun amɨn tagɨsi, do geni nandaŋek kɨŋ oman monjɨni aŋpulugoki.
42007005	Uŋun amɨn da Juda amɨn nin do galak taŋ nimɨsak, ae muwut muwut yutnin wɨtjɨŋ nimgut.”
42007006	Yaŋ iyɨŋba Yesu gat kɨsi kɨwit. Kɨŋ yutni aŋkapmat aŋakwa mibɨltok amɨn da notni dɨ yabekban obɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Mibɨltok amɨn da gak do yaŋ yosok, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ, pi madep dɨma gabeŋ. Nak amɨn pɨŋbisi, do nak da yutnon wɨki uŋun da tagɨ dɨma asak.
42007007	Yaŋdo, naga gagon dɨma abɨt. Mani gak da kɨlek tosak do yaŋaki tagɨ kɨlek tosak.
42007008	Nido nak madepno da yoŋgamgwan egɨsat, do nak da uŋun dakon pɨŋbini egɨsat. Ae emat amɨno nak da yoŋgamgwan ekwaŋ, do kɨnda “Kɨ!” yaŋ iyɨko kɨsak. Ae kɨnda “Ap!” yaŋ iyɨko abɨsak. Ae oman amɨno kɨnda “Pi on aki!” yaŋ iyɨko pi asak.’ ”
42007009	Yesu gen uŋun nandaŋek nandaban yo madepsi aban tobɨlek amɨn madepsi buŋon yolgwit yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak yaŋ dayɨsat, Israel amɨnon nandaŋ gadatni madep on amɨn dakon yombem kɨnda dɨma kagɨm.”
42007010	Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn yabekgɨt uŋun tobɨl yutnon wɨgɨ oman monjɨ uŋun kɨlɨ kɨlek tagɨt kawit.
42007011	Yesu bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok egek kokup kɨnda mani Nain uŋudon kɨŋakwan paŋdetni gat ae amɨn morapmɨsi gat kɨsi kɨwit.
42007012	Kɨŋ uŋun kokup dakon tɨp dam dakon wigat aŋkapmat agɨt. Aŋek amɨn da amɨn kɨmakbi kɨnda wamaŋ aŋaŋ waŋga pɨŋba pɨndakgɨt. Amɨn kɨmakgɨt uŋun dakon meŋi uŋun sakwabat egakwan monjɨ kaloŋɨsi da kɨmakgɨt. Uŋun kokup madep dakon amɨn morapmɨsi uŋun sakwabat gat kɨsi pɨŋba pɨndakgɨt.
42007013	Amɨn Tagɨ da sakwabat uŋun kaŋek bupmɨsi nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kunam dɨma takgi.”
42007014	Yaŋ yaŋek kɨŋ bumjot abɨwit tamo wɨtjɨŋakwan bumjot guramɨkgwit amɨn uŋun akgwit. Agakwa Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Monjɨ gɨmoŋɨ pɨdoki do gayɨsat!”
42007015	Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn kɨmakbi uŋun pɨdaŋ yɨgek wasaŋek gen yagɨt. Yaŋban Yesu da meŋi do ɨmgut.
42007016	Aban amɨn morap kɨsi pasalek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yaŋ yawit, “Kombɨ amɨn madepsi kɨnda nin da bɨkbɨgon altaŋban komaŋ. Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyoni Israel paŋpulugok do abɨk.”
42007017	Ae Yesu da yo agɨt uŋun dakon gen bin da madepsi ɨreŋ taŋek Judia mɨktɨm kɨsi arɨpmɨ agɨt, ae mɨktɨm dɨwarɨkon kɨsi kɨgɨt.
42007018	Jon dakon paŋdetni da Yesu da yo morap agɨt dakon geni Jon iyɨwit.
42007019	Iyɨŋba paŋdetni bamorɨ yaŋ yoban opbal Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ iyɨnjil do yabekgɨt, “Gak Piŋkop da amɨn yabet do yagɨt uŋun, bo nin amɨn kɨnda don apdɨsak do jomjom aneŋ?”
42007020	Amɨn bamot uŋun kɨŋ Yesu altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn da yaŋ gayɨk do aŋek nit yabekban abamak, ‘Gak Piŋkop da amɨn yabet do yagɨt uŋun, bo nin amɨn kɨnda don apdɨsak do jomjom aneŋ?’ ”
42007021	Uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn Yesu amɨn sotni mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ taŋ yomgwit uŋun paŋmɨlɨp aŋek koŋni taŋ yomgwit uŋun yol yomgut. Ae dabɨlni mɨni morapmɨ paban pɨsawit.
42007022	Do gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil kɨŋ abɨsok yo pɨndak nandaŋyo amal uŋun do Jon iyɨnjil. Dabɨlni mɨni amɨn sɨŋtoŋ, ae kandapmɨ alek taŋbi amɨn kosit akwaŋ, ae wuda tebani toŋ amɨn uŋun kɨlek toŋ, ae mɨragɨ mɨni amɨn da gen nandaŋ, ae amɨn kɨmakbi pɨdoŋ, ae yoni mɨni amɨn da Gen Bin Tagɨsi nandaŋ.
42007023	Amɨn kɨnda nak nandaŋek nandaŋ gadatni dɨma wɨtdal kɨsak uŋun amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨgɨ toŋ egɨsak.”
42007024	Amɨn bamot Jon da yabekgɨt uŋun tobɨl kɨŋakwal, Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep Jon do yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji mɨktɨm amɨni mɨnikon ninaŋ kok do kɨwit? Mɨrɨm da nagal kɨnda aŋwayɨŋ aban kok do kɨwit?
42007025	Dɨma kaŋ, ninaŋ kok do kɨwit? Amɨn kɨnda yɨk ɨmalyo tagɨsi baŋgɨn pagɨt uŋun kok do kɨwit? Dɨma, yɨk ɨmalyo tagɨsi paŋek gɨptɨm dakon yoni tagɨ tagɨ dagɨn taŋ yomaŋ amɨn uŋun kɨla amɨn madep da yutnon gɨn ekwaŋ.
42007026	Mani ji ninaŋ kok do kɨwit? Kombɨ amɨn kɨnda kok do kɨwit? Uŋun bamɨ, nak asisi dayɨsat, Jon da kombɨ amɨn dɨwarɨ yapmaŋ mudosok.
42007027	Uŋun amɨn do Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ mandabi: ‘Nandani, geno yaŋ teŋteŋosak do amɨn kɨnda yabekgo uŋun da mibɨltaŋ gamjak. Aŋek kositgo aŋnoman asak.’
42007028	Nak yaŋsi dayɨsat, amɨn morap mɨktɨmon altoŋ uŋun Jon da yapmaŋ mudosok. Mani amɨn morap Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan pɨŋbisi ekwaŋ uŋun da Jon yapmaŋgaŋ.”
42007029	(Jon da amɨn gat ae takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn gat telagɨ pakbi kɨlɨ soŋ yomgut, do gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Piŋkop dakon aŋpak uŋun kɨlegɨsi.”
42007030	Mani Parisi amɨn gat ae gen teban mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn gat uŋun Jonon telagɨ pakbi dɨma sowit. Yaŋ aŋek Piŋkop da kosit kɨlegɨ yolɨk do agɨt uŋun manji ɨmgwit.)
42007031	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ni tɨlak gen kɨnda naŋ dayɨko amɨn abɨsok ekwaŋ uŋun dakon aŋpak do nandaba pɨsosak? Uŋun niaŋen amɨn dɨ da ekwaŋ?
42007032	Uŋun mɨŋat monjɨyo da yaŋ, yumaŋ gwayek tamokon yɨgek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yoŋ: ‘Nin kasɨsɨŋ kɨlɨ pɨsomaŋ, mani ji kap ak do dɨma nandayɨŋ. Nin bupmɨ kap yamaŋ, mani ji bupmɨ nandaŋek kunam tat do dɨma nandayɨŋ.’ ”
42007033	Yesu da sigɨn yaŋ yagɨt, “Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn abɨŋek bret dɨma nagɨt, ae wain dɨma nagɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan, ‘Koŋni kɨnda taŋ ɨmɨsak’ ji da gen uŋun yawit.
42007034	Ae Amɨn Dakon Monji da abɨŋ jap pakbiyo agɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan kaŋek ji da yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Kabɨt, jap morapmɨ noknok amɨn ae wain morapmɨsi noknok amɨn. Takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt ae yokwi pakpak amɨn dakon notni.’
42007035	Ji da gen uŋun yoŋ, mani Piŋkop da pi morap agɨt uŋun pɨndagek nandano nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi gɨn asak.”
42007036	Parisi amɨn kɨnda da Yesu yutnikon obɨŋ jap nosak do yaŋ ɨban yutnikon obɨŋ jap tamokon yɨkgɨt.
42007037	Uŋun kokupmon yokwi pakpak mɨŋat kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun mɨŋat Yesu Parisi da yutnon yɨgek jap nosok yaŋ amɨn da yaŋba nandaŋek pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi kɨnamɨ kɨnda abɨdaŋek yutnon wɨgɨgɨt. Tɨbɨrɨ uŋun tɨpnaŋ wasaŋbi.
42007038	Wɨgɨ Yesu da manjikon kandapnikon paŋkɨ agek kunam tagakwan dabɨl pakbini da kandapnikon maŋ guktaŋba busuŋ daŋgwani baŋ ɨkdɨgagɨt. Yaŋ aŋek kandapmɨkon mandaŋ naŋek pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi naŋ soŋ ɨmgut.
42007039	Yaŋ aŋakwan Parisi amɨn uŋun Yesu yaŋ ɨmgut iyɨ burɨkon da yaŋ nandagɨt, “On amɨn asi kombɨ amɨn kɨnda tam, on mɨŋat kɨsirɨ kwenikon wɨtjɨsak uŋun yokwi pakpak mɨŋat kɨnda yaŋ nandaban.”
42007040	Yaŋ nandaŋakwan Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Saimon, nak gen kɨnda gayɨko.” Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, kɨlɨ nayɨ.”
42007041	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn bamorɨ uŋun amɨn kɨndakon gomani toŋ. Kɨnda dakon gomani uŋun moneŋ 500 danari, ae kɨnda dakon gomani uŋun moneŋ 50 danari.
42007042	Uŋun amɨn bamot gomani sopjil dakon moneŋni arɨpmɨ dɨma, do gomani dɨma sopjil do yoyɨgɨt. Gak niaŋ nandɨsal? Yaŋ aban jit amɨn da uŋun amɨn do madepsi galak taŋ ɨmgut?”
42007043	Yaŋban Saimon da iyɨgɨt, “Goman madepni dɨma sopjak do iyɨgɨt amɨn uŋun da, yaŋ nandɨsat.” Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kokwin kɨlegɨsi aŋek yosol.”
42007044	Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da tobɨl mɨŋat uŋun kaŋek Saimon yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “On mɨŋat do koki? Nak yutgokon wɨko kandapno sugokeŋ do pakbi dɨma namɨl. Mani on mɨŋat da dabɨl pakbini naŋ kandapno sugaŋek busuŋ daŋgwani baŋ ɨkdɨgak.
42007045	Nak dɨma mandaŋ nal, mani yutgokon si wɨron da wasaŋek mɨŋat on da kandapno mandaŋ nak da sigɨn mandaŋ nosok.
42007046	Gak busuŋnokon bɨt nelak dɨma tagal namɨl. Mani mɨŋat on da pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi kandapnokon soŋ namɨk.
42007047	Do yaŋ gayɨsat, on mɨŋat dakon dɨwarɨni morapmɨ Piŋkop da yopmaŋ ɨban nak do but dasi galagɨ madepsi nandaŋ namɨsak. Mani dɨwarɨni tagapmɨsok taŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ ɨmjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da nak do galagɨ madep dɨma nandaŋ namjak.”
42007048	Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da mɨŋat uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da dɨwarɨgo yopmaŋ gamɨsat.”
42007049	Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn kabɨ Yesu gat jap naŋek yɨkgwit uŋun iyɨ gɨn yaŋ yawit, “On niaŋen amɨn kɨnda da dɨwarɨ yopyop asak?”
42007050	Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da mɨŋat uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nandaŋ gadatgo do aŋek Piŋkop da gak yokwikon naŋ abɨdosok. Butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan kɨki.”
42008001	Uŋun da kwenon Yesu kokup pap ae kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ tawit uŋudon agek Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Yabekbi 12 kabɨ kɨsi agɨpgwit.
42008002	Ae mɨŋat dɨwarɨ Yesu da koŋni yol yomgut ae sotni paŋmɨlɨp agɨt uŋun kɨsi Yesu gat agɨpgwit. Kɨnda uŋun Maria. Maria uŋun Makdala kokupmon nani yaŋ iyɨwit. Kalɨp Yesu da koŋni 7 kabɨ yol ɨmgut.
42008003	Ae Joana, Susana ae mɨŋat morapmɨ gat kɨsi Yesu gat agɨpgwit. Joana uŋun Kusa dakon mɨŋatni. Kusa uŋun Erot dakon yutni dakon kɨla amɨn kɨnda. Uŋun mɨŋat kabɨ yo kabɨni iyɨ dakon baŋ Yesu gat paŋdetni gat paŋpulugawit.
42008004	Amɨn morapmɨsi kokup morap tawiron da abɨŋ muwukgwit. Abɨŋ muwugakwa Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
42008005	“Amɨn kɨnda uŋun jap yetni pigaga paŋkɨ tɨŋtɨŋagɨt. Tɨŋtɨŋaŋakwan jap yet dɨwarɨ kosiron maŋba amɨn da bamaŋakwa mɨnam da abɨŋ si nawit.
42008006	Aŋakwa jap yet dɨwarɨ tɨpmɨ toŋ tɨmon mawit. Maŋ kwawit, mani mɨktɨm pakbini mɨni, do kɨbɨdaŋ pasɨlgwit.
42008007	Aŋakwa jap yet dɨwarɨ joŋ kelɨ toŋ tɨmgwan mawit. Uŋun joŋ kelɨ toŋ gat kɨsi kwaŋek wutjɨŋba kɨmak mudawit.
42008008	Ae jap yet dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm tagɨsikon maŋ kwawit. Uŋun bamɨ 100 taŋ taŋ awit.” Yesu da tɨlak gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen on nandak do galak toŋ amɨn ji pakyaŋsi nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsoni.”
42008009	Paŋdetni da tɨlak gen uŋun yagɨt dakon mibɨlɨ do iyɨwit.
42008010	Iyɨŋba yagɨt, “Piŋkop da ji baŋgɨn iyɨ dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun damɨsak. Mani amɨn dɨwarɨ tɨlak gen gɨn nandaŋ. ‘Do dabɨl sɨŋtaŋek kokdaŋ, mani dɨma kaŋ nandaŋyo akdaŋ. Ae gen nandakdaŋ, mani mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaba pɨsokdaŋ.’ ”
42008011	Yesu da saŋbeŋek paŋdetni baŋgɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Tɨlak gen dayɨt dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ. Jap yet uŋun Piŋkop dakon gen.
42008012	Jap yet kosiron mawit, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gen nandaŋ dakon tɨlak. Amɨn nandaŋ gadat aba Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak yaŋ do Sunduk da abɨŋ butnikon Piŋkop dakon gen gwayesak.
42008013	Ae jap yet tɨpmɨ toŋ tɨmon mawit, uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop gen nandaŋ abɨdaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ dakon tɨlak. Mani gelɨ tagɨ dɨma yɨpban kɨgɨt. Do nandaŋ gadat bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok aŋek paŋkewal altaŋ yoba tepmɨsi Piŋkop manji ɨmɨŋ mudoŋ.
42008014	Ae jap yet joŋ kelɨ toŋ bɨkbɨkgwan mawit, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek kɨŋ mɨktɨmon egɨp egɨpni do nandaba kɨk aŋ uŋun dakon tɨlak asak. Uŋun moneŋ gat ae on mɨktɨm dakon yo morap gat do galagɨ nandaŋakwa uŋun da wutjɨŋ yomɨŋakwa bamɨ dɨma toŋ.
42008015	Mani jap yet mɨktɨm tagɨsikon mawit, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek tebaisi abɨdoŋ uŋun dakon tɨlak. Uŋun burɨ kɨlegɨsi taŋakwan tebai agek bamɨ tagɨsi paŋalon aŋ.”
42008016	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn da lam koleŋ kwoba naŋ dɨma wutjɨŋba toŋ, bo ae dɨpmɨn potpot tamo da mibɨlgwan dɨma yopmaŋgaŋ. Noman tamokon yopmaŋakwa amɨn da yutnon wɨŋek teŋteŋɨ uŋun koŋ.
42008017	Yo morap pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun don nomansi altaŋ mudokdaŋ. Ae yo morap wutjɨŋbi da toŋ uŋun noman taŋ mudaŋakwa amɨn da pɨndak nandaŋyo akdaŋ.
42008018	“Ji kaŋ kɨmagek gen pakyaŋsi nandani. Taŋ yomaŋ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da dɨ gat saŋbeŋ daban tɨmɨtdaŋ. Mani mɨnini amɨn uŋun taŋ namaŋ yaŋ nandɨsak uŋun Piŋkop da gwayekdɨsak.”
42008019	Uŋun bɨsapmon meŋi padɨk padɨkyo Yesu kok do opgwit. Mani amɨn morapmɨ, do Yesu da kapmatjok kɨk do aŋtɨdok awit.
42008020	Aŋakwa amɨn dɨ da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Meŋgo padɨk padɨkgoyo yomakon agek gak gandak do yoŋ.”
42008021	Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek guramɨkgaŋ uŋun meŋno ae padɨk padɨknoni.”
42008022	Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu paŋdetni gat bot kɨndakon wɨgek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda do kɨno.” Yaŋ yaŋban kɨwit.
42008023	Boron yɨgek kɨŋakwa Yesu dɨpmɨn pakgɨt. Aŋakwan mɨrɨm madepsi kɨnda pakbi ɨdapmon obɨŋakwan boron pakbi pɨgɨ tugaŋakwa pasɨl do awit.
42008024	Aŋakwa paŋdetni da kɨŋ Yesu aŋyolek iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nin pasɨldamaŋ!” Iyɨŋba pɨdaŋ pakbi gat mɨrɨm gat tebai yoyɨŋban mɨrɨm dɨma aŋakwan pakbi yaworɨsi tagɨt.
42008025	Aŋakwan Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nandaŋ gadatji dukon yɨpmaŋ?” Yaŋban paŋdetni si pasalgwit. Aŋek wurɨpdagek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yawit, “On niaŋen amɨn kɨnda da pakbi mɨrɨmyo gen tebai yoyɨŋban geni guramɨkgamal?”
42008026	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Gerasa mɨktɨm tetgɨn kɨŋ altawit. (Gerasa mɨktɨm uŋun terɨ kɨnda taŋakwan Galili mɨktɨm uŋun pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda tosok.)
42008027	Yesu bot yɨpmaŋek ɨleŋon wɨŋakwan uŋun kokup papmon amɨn kɨnda da abɨŋ altaŋ ɨmgut. Uŋun amɨn koŋni taŋ ɨmgwit. Bɨsap dubagɨsi molaŋ egɨpgut, ae yut kɨndakon dɨma egɨpgut. Amɨn kɨmakba paŋkɨ tɨp kɨnamgwan yopmaŋgaŋ mɨktɨmon gɨn egɨpgut.
42008028	Uŋun amɨn da Yesu kaŋek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek Yesu da kandapmon maŋ pagek gen papmon da yaŋ yagɨt, “Yesu, gak Piŋkop Wɨkwisi dakon Monji, gak ninaŋ aŋnamdɨsal? Bupmɨ nandaŋ nabi. Yo yokwi dɨmasi aŋ nabi!”
42008029	Koŋ da amɨn uŋun yɨpmaŋ detjak do Yesu da kɨlɨ iyɨgɨt, uŋun do madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek gen uŋun yagɨt. Uŋun amɨn koŋ da bɨsap morapmɨ aŋupbal awit, do amɨn da bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kɨlani tebaisi aŋek nap teban tebaisi baŋ kɨsit kandapyoni paŋteban awit. Mani nap teban uŋun paŋdagaŋek koŋ da ɨmɨŋ sugaŋakwan mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ tɨmon kɨŋ kɨŋ agɨt.
42008030	Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mango namɨn?” Iyɨŋban koŋni morapmɨ taŋ ɨmgwit, do “Amɨn Kabɨ Madep” yaŋ iyɨgɨt.
42008031	Yesu da bupmɨ nandaŋ yomjak do koŋ da bɨsit tebai yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin gapma kɨdagɨ mɨni uŋungwan pɨgɨneŋ do dɨma niyɨki.”
42008032	Bɨt kabi madep kɨnda kapmatjok ɨleŋon egek jap naŋek egɨpgwit. Koŋ uŋun bɨt da butgwan pɨgɨk do Yesu bɨsit tebai iyɨŋba nandaŋ yomgut.
42008033	Aŋakwan koŋ amɨn uŋun yɨpmaŋ degek wɨŋ abɨgɨ bɨt da butgwan pɨgɨwit. Pɨgakwa bɨt uŋun tɨmtɨm yaŋek obandom naŋ pɨgɨ pakbi ɨdapgwan pɨgek pakbi naŋ kɨmakgwit.
42008034	Aŋakwa bɨt kɨla amɨn yo uŋun pɨndagek tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨŋ kokup papmon amɨn gat ae kokup terɨ terɨ egɨ aŋaŋ kɨwit uŋun amɨn gat kɨsi yoyɨwit.
42008035	Aŋakwa amɨn da yo niaŋensi kɨnda da altagɨt, uŋun kok do apgwit. Abɨŋ Yesu altaŋ ɨmɨŋek amɨn uŋun koŋni kɨlɨ yɨpmaŋ dekgwit kawit. Kaŋba amɨn uŋun Yesu da buron burɨ kɨlɨ pɨsagɨt ae ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni toŋ da yɨkgɨt. Yaŋ yɨkban kaŋ pasalgwit.
42008036	Aŋakwa yo dabɨl da kaŋ nandaŋyo awit amɨn uŋun da koŋ da aŋupbal abi amɨn niaŋon da kɨlek tagɨt uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨwit.
42008037	Yoyɨŋba Gerasa mɨktɨm dakon mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi pasol pasol madepsi nandaŋek Yesu uŋun yopmaŋ dek kɨsak do iyɨwit. Iyɨŋba boron wɨgek yopmaŋ kɨgɨt.
42008038	Mani amɨn uŋun koŋ da yɨpmaŋ dek kɨwit amɨn da Yesu yol do bɨsit tebai iyɨgɨt. Iyɨŋban Yesu da tobɨl kɨsak do yabegek yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
42008039	“Gak tobɨl yutgokon kɨŋek Piŋkop da gak aŋpulugaŋek yo madepsi ak uŋun do amɨn yoyɨki.” Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn uŋun tobɨl kɨŋ kokupni dakon amɨn morap Yesu da aŋpulugaŋek yo morap agɨt uŋun do yoyɨgɨt.
42008040	Yesu pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda do kɨŋ altaŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da but dasi abɨdawit, nido uŋun do jomjom aŋek egɨpgwit.
42008041	Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda apgut, mani Jairus. Uŋun Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut dakon kɨla amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun da Yesu da kandap mibɨlon maŋ pagek yutnikon kɨsakdosi madepsi iyɨgɨt.
42008042	Uŋun monjɨ mɨni, gwi kaloŋɨ kɨnda gɨn bɨlakni uŋun 12 da tɨlak, uŋun da si kɨmot do agɨt. Yesu yutnikon kɨk do kosiron kɨŋakwan amɨn madepsi, do gɨtni gɨtni aŋakwa kɨgɨt.
42008043	Kɨŋakwan mɨŋat kɨnda uŋungwan agɨpgɨt. Uŋun dagaŋ mok aŋek yawini maŋakwa bɨlak 12 yaŋ agɨt, mani amɨn kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋkɨlek agagɨ.
42008044	Uŋun mɨŋat Yesu da manjikon kapmatjok abɨŋek Yesu dakon ɨmal dubakni da ɨleŋɨkon ɨgayɨgɨt. Aŋakwan uŋudon gɨn yawini pasɨl ɨmgwit.
42008045	Aŋakwan Yesu da yagɨt, “Namɨn da ɨgayɨŋ namɨk?” Yaŋban amɨn morap nin dɨma dɨma yaŋakwa Pita da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, amɨn morapmɨsi da gak gat gadat gadatsi akwaŋ.”
42008046	Mani Yesu da yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da ɨgayɨŋ namɨŋakwan tapmɨmno dɨwarɨ kwan nandat.”
42008047	Yaŋban mɨŋat uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma pasɨlgeŋ yaŋ nandaŋek nɨmnɨmɨk abɨŋ Yesu da kandap mibɨlon maŋ pakgɨt. Maŋ pagek amɨn morap da dabɨlon mibɨlɨ nido Yesu ɨgayɨgɨt uŋun dakon yaŋkwok aŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ɨgayɨko sotno uŋudon gɨn pasɨlak.”
42008048	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gwano, nandaŋ gadatgo da gak aŋkɨlek ak. Butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan kɨki.”
42008049	Yesu gen uŋun yaŋakwan muwut muwut yut dakon kɨla amɨn Jairus da yutnon da amɨn kɨnda apgut. Abɨŋek Jairus yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gwago kɨlɨ kuŋwak, do yoyɨŋdet ɨsal dogɨn dɨma iyɨŋbɨ kɨsak.”
42008050	Yesu uŋun nandaŋek Jairus yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Dɨma pasolgi. Ɨsal nandaŋ gadat gɨn aŋaki gwago kɨlek tosak.”
42008051	Yaŋ yaŋek yutnikon kɨŋ altaŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ dɨma wɨgɨni do yoyɨŋek Pita, Jon, ae Jems gat, ae mɨŋatjok dakon meŋi datniyo gat tɨmɨkban yutnon wɨgɨwit.
42008052	Uŋun yutnon amɨn morapmɨ da mɨŋatjok do bupmɨ nandaŋek kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋek egɨpgwit. Aŋakwa Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kunam yopgut. Dɨma kuŋwak, ɨsal dɨpmɨn pokdok.”
42008053	Yaŋban mɨŋatjok wagɨl kuŋwak yaŋ nandaŋek jɨkgo yanjaŋ ɨmgwit.
42008054	Mani Yesu da mɨŋatjok kɨsirɨkon abɨdaŋek gen papmon da yagɨt, “Gwano, pɨda!”
42008055	Yaŋ yaŋban mɨŋatjok uŋun dakon wupmɨ aeni tobɨl abɨŋ pɨgakwan uŋudon gɨn pɨdagɨt. Pɨdaŋakwan Yesu da jap dɨ ɨba nosak do yoyɨgɨt.
42008056	Aban meŋi datni da uŋun kaŋek tamtam yagɨmal. Mani Yesu da tebai yoyɨgɨt, “Jil on yo noman taŋban komal uŋun do amɨn dɨmasi yoyɨnjil.”
42009001	Yesu da yabekbini 12 kabɨ yaŋ yoban obɨŋ muwukba sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp agak, ae koŋ kɨsisi yolni dakon pi ani do yaŋ mudaŋ yomgut.
42009002	Yomɨŋek Piŋkop da Amɨnon Kɨla Asak dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋoni, ae sot amɨnyo paŋmɨlɨp ani yaŋ do yabekgɨt.
42009003	Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kosit agɨp do yo dɨ dɨma tɨmɨtni. Wɨn kɨrɨŋ, ae yɨk, ae bret, ae moneŋ, ae paba pɨgɨk bamorɨ dɨma tɨmɨtni.
42009004	Yut kɨndakon wugɨni kaŋ, uŋudon gɨn egek kokup uŋun yɨpmaŋ kɨni.
42009005	Kwa amɨn da ji dɨma tɨmɨkba kaŋ, kokup pap uŋun yɨpmaŋ det do kandapjikon kɨmbabaŋ tegoŋ uŋun tɨdaŋba kɨni. Yaŋ aba amɨn da yokwi aŋapno uŋun do aŋek kwaŋ yaŋ nandani.”
42009006	Yaŋ yoyɨŋban kokupmɨ kokupmɨ agek Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋaŋek amɨn dakon sotni paŋmɨlɨp awit.
42009007	Gapman dakon kɨla amɨn madep mibɨltogɨ Erot da Yesu dakon gen bini nandagɨt. Dɨ da Yesu kaŋek Jon kɨmoron da aeni pɨdagɨt yaŋ yawit, do Erot but morap agɨt.
42009008	Ae dɨ da yawit, “Elaija da noman tak.” Ae dɨ da “Kombɨ amɨn kalɨpsi egɨpgwit uŋun kɨnda da kɨmoron da pɨdak” yaŋ yawit.
42009009	Mani Erot da yaŋ yagɨt, “Jon dakon tegɨ kɨlɨ mandaŋ dagagɨm. Mani abɨsok namɨn amɨn kɨnda dasi yo madepsi aŋakwan gen bini nayɨŋba nandɨsat?” Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu kok do pini agɨt.
42009010	Yabekbi kabɨ aeni tobɨl Yesukon abɨŋek yo morap awit dakon geni iyɨwit. Iyɨŋba Yesu da tɨmɨkban iyɨ gɨn kokup kɨnda mani Betsaida uŋudon kɨwit.
42009011	Aŋakwa mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi uŋun Yesu uŋudon kɨsak yaŋ kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋek buŋon yolgwit. Aŋakwa Yesu da tagɨsi nandaŋ yomɨŋek Piŋkop da Amɨnon Kɨla Asak uŋun do yoyɨŋek sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
42009012	Pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo yabekbini 12 kabɨ da obɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Kokup amɨni mɨnikon ekwamaŋ, do yoyɨŋbɨ mɨŋat amɨn morapyo kɨŋek kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ ae tɨmɨ dɨgwan kɨŋ jap pakbiyo gat ae dɨpmɨn potpot tamoyo gat wɨsini.”
42009013	Mani Yesu da yabekbini yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨsi jap yomgut.” Yoyɨŋban yawit, “Nin japnin morapmɨ dɨma. Bret 5 kabɨ gat ae tap kɨlap bamorɨ gat gɨn. Nin kɨŋ on mɨŋat amɨn morap do jap moneŋ baŋ si yumneŋ do nandɨsal?”
42009014	(Wɨli 5 tausen da tɨlak egɨpgwit.) Yaŋba Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn 50,50 yaŋ paŋmuwuk yopba yɨk yɨk ani.”
42009015	Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni da yaŋ gɨn aba amɨn kɨsi yɨk mudawit.
42009016	Yɨgakwa Yesu da bret 5 kabɨ gat ae tap kɨlap bamot gat kɨsi tɨmɨk Kwen Kokup sɨŋtaŋek gɨsamɨkgɨt. Aŋek bret gat ae tap kɨlap gat paŋdagaŋek paŋdetni do yomɨŋakwan amɨn do kokwinɨk yomgwit.
42009017	Yoba tɨmɨk amɨn morap kɨsisi arɨpmɨsi naŋakwa jap nawit dakon dɨwarɨ tawit uŋun paŋdetni da sɨmɨlba yɨgɨ 12 yaŋsi tugawit.
42009018	Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu iyɨ gɨn bɨsit pi agɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon paŋdetni kɨsi uŋudon egɨpgwit. Egɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kabɨ madep da nak do namɨn yaŋ yoŋ?”
42009019	Yoyɨŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Dɨda Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn yaŋ yoŋ, ae dɨ da Elaija yaŋ yoŋ, ae dɨ da kombɨ amɨn kalɨpmɨ kɨnda da kɨmoron da pɨdagɨt yaŋ yoŋ.”
42009020	Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Mani ji dɨsi nak do namɨn yaŋ yoŋ?” Yaŋban Pita da aŋtobɨlek iyɨgɨt, “Gak Kristo, Piŋkop da yabekban apgul.”
42009021	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨ Kristo egɨsak uŋun dakon geni amɨn kɨndakon dɨmasi yoni do yaŋsop aŋyomgut.
42009022	Aŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn Dakon Monji da egɨ yo yokwi morapmɨ noman taŋ ɨba tepmɨ pakdɨsak. Ae Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn, ae mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn uŋun da manji ɨmɨŋek aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak. Aŋakwa gɨldat kapbɨ aŋakwan pɨdokdɨsak.”
