42009023	Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn kɨsi yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda nak nol do nandɨsak kaŋ, iyɨ dakon galaktok manji yomɨŋek tɨlak kɨndapni gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ guramɨgek nak noljak.
42009024	Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon yɨyɨtni tagɨsi tosak do nandaŋek pi madep asak kaŋ, egɨp egɨpni pasɨl ɨmdɨsak. Mani amɨn kɨnda nak do nandaŋek egɨp egɨpni do nandaban yo madep dɨma asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdosak.
42009025	Amɨn kɨnda mɨktɨm dakon yo morap paŋek egɨ kɨmotjak bɨsapmon iyɨ pasɨljak kaŋ, uŋun yo morap da arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋpulugokdaŋ.
42009026	Amɨn kɨnda nak do ae nak dakon gen do mayagɨ nandɨsak kaŋ, Amɨn Dakon Monji iyɨ dakon tɨlɨmni gat ae Datni dakon tɨlɨmni gat ae Piŋkop dakon telagɨ aŋelo kabɨ dakon tɨlɨmni gat apjak bɨsapmon uŋun amɨn do mayagɨ yaŋ gɨn nandaŋ ɨmdɨsak.
42009027	Nak asisi dayɨsat, ji on akgaŋ kabɨkon da dɨ dɨma kɨmagek Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni kokdaŋ.”
42009028	Yesu uŋun gen yaŋek egɨ gɨldat 8 yaŋ da tɨlak mudaŋakwa Pita, Jon ae Jems gat tɨmɨkban ɨleŋ kɨndakon bɨsit pi ak do wɨgɨwit.
42009029	Wɨgek Yesu bɨsit pi aŋakwan tomno dabɨlni kulabɨk aŋek ɨmalni mal dakon teŋteŋɨ yombem agɨt.
42009030	-
42009031	Yaŋ aban kaŋakwa Moses gat Elaija gat tɨlɨmni gat noman tagɨmal. Noman taŋbal Yesu gat gen yaŋ nandat aba pɨndakgwit. Yesu Piŋkop dakon galaktok yolek Jerusalem kokup papmon on mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋ detjak uŋun dakon gen yawit.
42009032	Pita gat notni bamot gat dɨpmɨn do yokwisi awit. Mani dɨpmɨnon da pɨdaŋ Yesu tɨlɨmni gat ae amɨn bamot gat kɨsi akba pɨndakgwit.
42009033	Amɨn bamot Yesu yɨpmaŋ det do aŋakwal Pita da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nin ɨdon tagɨsi ekwamaŋ. Nin yut kabeŋ kapbɨ aneŋ. Kɨnda gak do, ae kɨnda Moses do, ae kɨnda Elaija do aneŋ.” (Pita gen uŋun naŋ yosot yaŋ uŋun dɨma nandaŋek yum yagɨt.)
42009034	Pita gen sigɨn yaŋakwan gɨkwem da pɨŋ ɨlɨmɨk yomaŋakwan pasalgwit.
42009035	Gɨkwem kagagwan da gen kɨnda yaŋ altagɨt, “On Monjɨno, pino asak do manjɨgɨm, do ji geni nandani.”
42009036	Yaŋ mudaŋakwan Yesu naŋgɨn kawit. Yo ɨleŋon altaŋba pɨndakgwit uŋun iyɨ dogɨn nandaba tawit. Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn dɨ dɨma yoyɨwit.
42009037	Wɨsa dagok do Yesu gat paŋdetni gat ɨleŋ yɨpmaŋ pɨgakwa amɨn kabɨ madepsi kosiron domdom awit.
42009038	Amɨn madep kabɨgwan da amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ tɨdaŋek aŋpulugosak do yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, monjɨno kaloŋɨ kɨndagɨn. Do kɨŋ koki do nandɨsat.
42009039	Bɨsap morapmɨ koŋ kɨnda da burɨgwan pɨgakwan uŋudon gɨn madepsi yaŋ tɨdosok. Aŋek tebai aŋupbal aŋakwan nɨmnɨmɨgakwan tarak da gen kaganikon wuŋ tugoŋ. Gɨptɨmɨ obɨsi aŋupbal aŋek bɨsap kaloŋ kaloŋ gɨn yɨpmaŋ dekdak.
42009040	Paŋdetgoni da yol ɨmni do bɨsit tebai yoyɨgɨm, mani aŋtɨdok awit.”
42009041	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da yagɨt, “Nandaŋ gadatji mɨni amɨn, ji aŋpakji yokwisi. Nak bɨsap niaŋ da ji gat egek jɨgɨsi guramɨk dabeŋ? Monjɨgo ɨdon aŋop.”
42009042	Monjɨ uŋun Yesu da akgɨron obɨŋakwan koŋ da monjɨ uŋun ukwayɨkban mɨktɨmon maŋ pagek nɨmnɨmɨkgɨt. Mani Yesu da koŋ tebaisi iyɨŋek monjɨ uŋun aŋmɨlɨp aban kɨlek taŋban datni do aŋtobɨl ɨmgut.
42009043	Yaŋ aban amɨn da Piŋkop dakon tapmɨm madepsi kaŋek tamtam yawit. Amɨn Yesu da yo morap agɨt do nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi aŋakwa, Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
42009044	“Gen dayɨkdɨsat uŋun pakyaŋsi nandani. Amɨn Dakon Monji amɨn da kɨsiron yɨpdaŋ.”
42009045	Mani paŋdetni gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ pasɨlɨ taŋ yomgut, do dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt. Ae gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do aŋek iyɨk do si pasalgwit.
42009046	Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu dakon paŋdetni namɨn da mibɨltok amɨnin egɨsak yaŋ do gen emat kɨnda awit.
42009047	Aŋakwa Yesu da paŋdetni dakon but pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek amɨn monɨŋ kɨnda iyɨ akgɨron aŋobɨŋ yɨpban akgɨt.
42009048	Yɨpban agakwan paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda nak do nandaŋek on amɨn monɨŋ but dasi abɨdosok, uŋun nak naŋ but dasi abɨdosok. Ae amɨn kɨnda nak but dasi abɨdosok, uŋun Dat nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun naŋ but dasi abɨdosok. Ji kabɨkon kɨnda da pɨŋbisi egɨ damjak kaŋ, uŋun da mibɨltok amɨnji asak.”
42009049	Jon Yesu da gen yagɨt nandaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nin kaŋapno amɨn kɨnda da gak da manon koŋ yolban kamaŋ. Mani nin da kabɨkon nani kɨnda dɨma, do yaŋsop aŋɨmɨmaŋ.”
42009050	Mani Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Yaŋsop dɨma aŋɨmni. Amɨn kɨnda uwal dɨma aŋdamjak kaŋ uŋun notji.”
42009051	Piŋkop da Yesu abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ Kwen Kokup wɨgɨsak dakon bɨsap kwaŋ tagɨt. Aŋakwan Yesu uŋun Jerusalem kɨkeŋ yaŋsi nandaban teban tagɨt.
42009052	Aŋek amɨn dɨ yabekban uŋun da kalɨp mibɨltaŋ Samaria dakon kokup kɨndakon yut tamoyo paŋnoman ani do kɨwit.
42009053	Mani Yesu Jerusalem kɨkdɨsak yaŋ nandawit, do uŋun kokupmon amɨn da Yesu abɨdok do dɨma galak tawit.
42009054	Jems gat Jon gat da uŋun pɨndagek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nit da yondo Kwen Kokup kɨndap da pɨŋ soŋba mɨni ani do tagɨ nandɨsal?”
42009055	Yaŋbal Yesu da tobɨl tebaisi yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨma yogogɨsi yomal!”
42009056	Yaŋ yoyɨŋban ae kokup ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨndakon kɨwit.
42009057	Kosiron kɨŋakwa amɨn kɨnda da iyɨgɨt, “Dukwan dukwan agɨpbi uŋun nak gol awɨlgeŋ gɨn.”
42009058	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Joŋ pɨŋan uŋun mɨktɨmgwan yutni toŋ. Ae mɨnam kwen akwaŋ uŋun yutni toŋ. Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun dɨpmɨn potpot tamoni mɨni.”
42009059	Yaŋ iyɨŋek ae amɨn kɨnda yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nol.” Mani amɨn uŋun da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nandaŋ namɨŋaki kɨŋ datno wayɨk yɨpmaŋek don abɨŋ golbeŋ.”
42009060	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨmakbi da kɨmakbi notni iyɨ tagɨ wayɨtni. Mani gak kɨŋ Piŋkop da Amɨnon Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋoki.”
42009061	Yaŋ yaŋban ae amɨn kɨnda da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gol do nandɨsat, mani nandaŋ namɨŋaki kɨŋ gwakno galok gen yoyɨŋek don abɨŋ golgeŋ.”
42009062	Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Sapa naŋ mɨktɨm pudaŋek dambɨ da manjigwan wusɨsak uŋuden amɨn da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ.”
42010001	Egɨ Amɨn Tagɨ da paŋdet 72 gat manjɨgɨt. Aŋek iyɨ kokup dukwan dukwan kɨk do agɨt, uŋudon mibɨltok uŋun da kalɨp kɨni do bamot bamot yabekgɨt.
42010002	Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Pigaga jap bamɨ madepsi taŋ pektaŋ, mani pi monjɨ bamɨ pakpak amɨn morapmɨ dɨma. Uŋun do ji bamɨ pakpak dakon Amɨn Tagɨ bɨsit iyɨŋba pi amɨn paŋalon aŋ yopban pinikon kɨni.
42010003	“Ji kɨŋek yaŋ nandani: Ji sipsip monɨŋ baŋ yaŋ joŋ pɨŋan da bɨkbɨgon yabekdat.
42010004	Moneŋ sɨmɨl kɨnam, ae yɨk, ae kandap gwɨl dɨma tɨmɨgek kɨni. Aŋek kosiron amɨn pɨndak ‘Gɨldat tagɨ!’ yaŋ dɨma yoyɨni.
42010005	Yut kɨndakon wɨgek mibɨltok yaŋ yoyɨni, ‘On yut amɨn butji yaworɨ tosak.’
42010006	Yut uŋudon but yawot amɨn kɨnda ekwan kaŋ, but yawot genji dakon bamɨ uŋudon tosak. Mɨnini da egɨpjak kaŋ, but yawotji dakon bamɨ jikon aeni tobɨljak.
42010007	Yut wɨgɨni uŋudon gɨn yɨk egɨyo aŋakwa jap daba noni. Pi agak amɨn uŋun tomni tagɨ tɨmɨkgaŋ. Ji yurɨ yurɨ dɨma agɨpni.
42010008	“Kokup kɨndakon kɨŋakwa not aŋ damɨŋek jap daba kaŋ uŋun si noni.
42010009	Aŋek amɨn sotni toŋ paŋmɨlɨp aŋek yaŋ yoyɨni, ‘Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Agakni ji da kapmatjok kɨlɨ abɨk.’
42010010	Kokup kɨndakon kɨŋakwa not dɨma aŋ daba kaŋ, uŋun kokup dakon kosit madepmon agek yaŋ yoyɨni,
42010011	‘Kokupji dakon kɨmbabaŋ kandapninon tegoŋ, uŋun tɨdono kɨŋakwa dɨwarɨsi taŋ damaŋ yaŋsi nandani. Aŋek yaŋsi nandani, Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni ji da kapmatjok kɨlɨ abɨk.’
42010012	Yaŋsi dayɨsat, gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon Sodom kokup amɨn da kobogɨ do jɨgɨ tagapmɨ pakdaŋ. Mani kokup uŋuden amɨn kobogɨ do jɨgɨ madepsi pakdaŋ.”
42010013	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Korasin ae Betsaida kokupmon amɨn, awa! Nak wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ abo pɨndagek ji but tobɨl dɨma awit. Tair ae Saidon kokupmon amɨn da pɨndakgwit tam, but tobɨl bamɨsi abam. Aŋek bupmɨ dakon yɨk ɨmalyo paŋek abɨlagon yɨkbam.
42010014	Mani gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon Tair gat Saidon kokupmon amɨn gat da kobogɨ do jɨgɨ tagapmɨ paŋakwa ji da kobogɨ do jɨgɨ madepsi pakdaŋ.
42010015	Aŋakwa Kapaneam kokupmon amɨn, ason Kwen Kokup nin da wɨgɨkdamaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨmasi. Ji mibɨlɨgwan Tɨpdomon pɨgɨkdaŋ.”
42010016	Yesu da paŋdetni saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dakon gen nandɨsak amɨn, uŋun da nak dakon gen nandɨsak. Ae manji damɨsak amɨn, uŋun nak naŋ manji namɨsak. Ae nak manji namɨsak amɨn, uŋun da nak yabekgɨt amɨn manji ɨmɨsak.”
42010017	Paŋdet 72 uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨgon da tobɨl abɨŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak dakon man yaŋapno koŋ da genin guramɨkgaŋ!”
42010018	Yaŋ yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Sunduk uŋun Kwen Kokup da mal da yaŋ maŋban kagɨm.
42010019	Nandani. Nak ji da tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ gat ae skopion gat bamoni, ae uwal dakon tapmɨm kɨsisi pabɨŋ yopni do yaŋ mudaŋ damɨsat. Yo kɨnda da ji arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋupbal asak.
42010020	Mani koŋ da genji guramɨkgaŋ, uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dɨma ani. Ji dakon man Kwen Kokupmon mandabi da toŋ, uŋun do nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.”
42010021	Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu Telagɨ Wup da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ɨban yaŋ yagɨt, “Dat, kundu ae mɨktɨm dakon Amɨn Tagɨ, amɨn dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm dakon nandak nandakni uŋun wukwisi, mani iyɨ do nandaba wɨgɨsak, do uŋuden amɨn do gen bamɨ morap si paŋkɨsɨbɨsal. Aŋek amɨn monɨŋɨ da tɨlagon ekwaŋ amɨn, uŋun do yolɨsal. Yaŋ asal do gak aŋkɨsisat. O Dat, gaga dakon galaktok yolek yaŋ asal.
42010022	“Datno da yo morap kɨlɨ namgut. Dat uŋun dagɨn Monjɨ nandaŋ ɨmɨsak. Aŋek Monjɨ gat ae amɨn morap Monjɨ da Dat dakon mibɨlɨ yolɨsak, uŋun amɨn dagɨn Datno nandaŋ ɨmaŋ.”
42010023	Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu tobɨl paŋdetni baŋgɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji da yo pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋ, uŋun pɨndakgaŋ amɨn uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
42010024	Nak yaŋsi dayɨsat, kalɨpsigwan kombɨ amɨn morapmɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn madep morapmɨ gat da yo ji da pɨndakgaŋ uŋun pɨndatdosi nandawit, mani dɨma pɨndakgwit. Ae gen nandaŋ uŋun nandakdosi nandawit, mani dɨma nandawit.”
42010025	Bɨsap kɨndakon gen teban dakon mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn kɨnda da pɨdaŋ agek Yesu aŋkewal do aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, yo ninaŋ aŋek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokeŋ?”
42010026	Iyɨŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gen teban papiakon gen tosok uŋun manjɨŋek niaŋ kokwinɨkdal?”
42010027	Iyɨŋban yagɨt, “Ji Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji uŋun but gat ae wup gat ae tapmɨmgo gat ae nandak nandakgo gat kɨsi but dasi galak taŋ ɨbi. Ae gaga do but dasi niaŋ galak tosol, uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yobi.”
42010028	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Kobogɨ bamɨsi yosol. Yaŋsi aŋek egɨp egɨp abɨdokdɨsal.”
42010029	Mani uŋun amɨn iyɨ do Yesu da amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨnda yaŋ kosak do nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak namɨn amɨn baŋ but dasi galak taŋ yobeŋ do yosol?”
42010030	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda Jerusalem yɨpmaŋek Jeriko kokup papmon kɨk do aŋek kosiron pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨgakwan kabo noknok da abɨdaŋ yɨk ɨmalni gwayeŋek aŋakba palɨ kɨmakban yɨpmaŋ kɨwit.
42010031	“Kɨŋakwa mukwa sogok amɨn kɨnda uŋun kosit naŋgɨn pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨgɨ amɨn uŋun kaŋek aŋpekwolek kosit ɨleŋ naŋ yapmaŋ kɨgɨt.
42010032	Yapmaŋ kɨŋakwan Liwai amɨn kɨnda obɨŋ kaŋek yaŋ gɨn aŋpekwolek yapmaŋ kɨgɨt.
42010033	“Mani Samaria amɨn kɨnda da uŋun kositnaŋ obɨŋ amɨn uŋun kaŋek bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmgut.
42010034	Bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek gɨptɨmɨ aŋak aŋupbal awit uŋun wain gat ae bɨt nelak gat baŋ soŋ ɨmɨŋek wamaŋ ɨmgut. Yaŋ aŋek amɨn uŋun kendak aŋenak iyɨ da donkikon yɨpgut. Yɨpmaŋek aŋkɨ amɨn da yumaŋ naŋek pokgoŋ yut kɨndakon yɨpmaŋek kɨlani agɨt.
42010035	Aŋek wɨsa dagok do silwa moneŋ tabɨlɨ bamorɨ uŋun yut pakgɨmal dakon kɨla amɨn do ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Kɨlani aŋaki on moneŋ da arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋakwan naŋ mudok dɨ abi kaŋ, tobɨl abɨŋek don gabeŋ.’ ”
42010036	Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da gen teban dakon nandak nandak amɨn yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Niaŋ nandɨsal, uŋun amɨn kapbɨ da kabɨkon namɨn da kabo noknok da aŋakgwit amɨn uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmgut?”
42010037	Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek aŋpulugagɨt amɨn uŋun da.” Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨŋ aŋpak yaŋ gɨn abi.”
42010038	Yesu gat paŋdetni gat kɨŋek kokup kɨndakon altawit. Uŋun kokupmon mɨŋat kɨnda egɨpgut mani Mata. Uŋun da yaŋban Yesu uŋun yutnikon wɨgɨgɨt.
42010039	Wɨkwan Mata dakon padɨge mani Maria uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ da kandap mibɨlon yɨgek geni nandagɨt.
42010040	Mani Mata uŋun jap dakon oman do nandaba kɨk morapmɨ aŋek obɨŋ Yesu iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, padɨgɨno nepmak da naga gɨn pi madep asat. Gak uŋun do dɨma nandɨsal? Iyɨŋbɨ obɨŋ nak aŋpulugaŋban.”
42010041	Yaŋban Amɨn Tagɨ da Mata yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mata, gak yo morapmɨ do nandaba kɨk aŋek butgo yokwi tosok.
42010042	Mani gak yo kaloŋɨ kɨnda dogɨn nandaki kaŋ tagɨ. Maria uŋun dogɨn nandɨsak, do tagɨ dɨma kɨrɨŋɨk ɨbeŋ.”
42011001	Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu uŋun bɨsit pi aŋek egɨpgut. Bɨsit aban mudaŋakwan paŋdetni kɨnda da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, Jon da paŋdetni bɨsit agak do yoyɨŋ dekgɨt, yaŋ gɨn niyɨŋ dekgi.”
42011002	Yaŋban Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Bɨsit ani bɨsapmon yaŋ yoni: ‘Dat, gak dakon man telagɨ tosak. Amɨn Kɨla Agakgo yɨpbɨ ninon apjak.
42011003	Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ jap arɨpninon nibi.
42011004	Nin yokwi aŋnimaŋ amɨn dakon dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yomamaŋ, do gak yaŋ gɨn nin dakon dɨwarɨnin yopmaŋ nibi. Paŋkewalon dɨma nipbi.’ ”
42011005	Yaŋ yaŋek yoyɨgɨt, “Jikon da kɨnda da kalbi binap notni da yutnon kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨsak, ‘Not, bret tɨmɨ kapbɨ nabɨ tamoni don gabeŋ.
42011006	Notno kɨnda kosit dubagɨkon da abɨk da yutnokon ɨsal yɨkdak. Japno mɨni.’
42011007	“Yaŋban notni yutgwan da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨsak, ‘Jɨgɨ dɨma nabi. Pɨdaŋek arɨpmɨ dɨma gabeŋ. Yoma beŋgan kɨlɨ at, ae gwakno gat kɨlɨ pak mudamaŋ.’
42011008	Nak yaŋ dayɨsat, amɨn uŋun notni da bɨsit iyɨk uŋun do dɨma ɨmɨsak. Mani saŋbek saŋbek yaŋakwan uŋun do kurak taŋek yo nido wadaŋek yosok uŋun kɨsi ɨmɨsak.
42011009	“Yaŋdo, nak yaŋ dayɨsat: Ji Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨŋba tagɨ damdɨsak, ae wɨsɨŋek bamɨ kokdaŋ, ae yoma domon tɨdaŋba wɨtdal damdɨsak.
42011010	Amɨn morap Piŋkop bɨsit iyaŋ uŋun yo tɨmɨkgaŋ, ae yo wɨsaŋ amɨn uŋun bamɨ koŋ, ae yoma domon tɨdoŋ amɨn uŋun wɨtdal yomɨsak.
42011011	“Dat kabɨ, ji kabɨkon da monjɨsi kɨnda da tap kɨlap do dayɨŋban tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ kɨnda tagɨ ɨmni?
42011012	Bo pup kwap do dayɨŋban skopion kɨnda tagɨ ɨmni?
42011013	Ji yokwi pakpak amɨn, mani monjɨsi do yo tagɨ yomaŋ. Do yaŋsi nandani. Ji bɨsit iyɨŋba Datji Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun da Telagɨ Wup tagɨ damjak.”
42011014	Yesu da amɨn kɨnda koŋ kɨnda da aŋkadɨm aban gen dɨma yagɨt, uŋun koŋni yol ɨmgut. Yol ɨban amɨn kadɨm uŋun gen yaŋakwan amɨn da kaŋba yo ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
42011015	Mani amɨn dɨ da yaŋ yawit, “Koŋ dakon mibɨltok amɨn Belsebul da tapmɨmon koŋ yoldak.”
42011016	Yaŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ da Yesu aŋkewal do aŋek iyɨŋba wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda aŋakwan, asi Piŋkop da yabekban pɨgɨt da pini asak yaŋ kok do nandawit.
42011017	Mani Yesu da nandak nandakni pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn da pudaŋ kɨ kabi bamorɨ aŋek emat wamjil kaŋ, mɨktɨm uŋun yokwi tokdɨsak. Ae amɨn yurɨ kɨnda da pudaŋ kɨŋek emat wamni kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yut tagɨ dɨma egɨpdaŋ.
42011018	Sunduk dakon amɨn kabɨni da pudaŋ kɨ kabi bamorɨ aŋek emat wamjil kaŋ, niaŋon da Sunduk gat amɨn kabɨni gat tebai atni? Nak da koŋ Belsebul da tapmɨmon yoldat yaŋ yoŋ.
42011019	Mani nak Belsebul da aŋpulugaŋban koŋ yoldat kaŋ, dɨsi dakon notji koŋ yolgaŋ uŋun amɨn kabɨ ni tapmɨmon da koŋ yolgaŋ? Uŋun amɨn kabɨ da genji kokwinɨgek gulusuŋ yoŋ yaŋ tagɨ dayɨni.
42011020	Mani Piŋkop da iyɨ tapmɨm namɨŋakwan koŋ yoldat kaŋ, Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni jikon kɨlɨ abɨk.
42011021	“Amɨn tebaisi kɨnda emat agak yo kabɨni tɨmɨgek iyɨ dakon yut kɨlani tebai aŋakwan, yo kabɨni tagɨsi toŋ.
42011022	Mani amɨn kɨnda uŋun yut ami dakon tapmɨm yapmaŋdak amɨn kɨnda da abɨsak. Abɨŋ aŋagek emat agak yo kabɨni tɨmɨgek tapmɨm pagɨt uŋun gwayesak. Yaŋ aŋek yo morapni kabo naŋek kokwinɨk notni do yomɨsak.
42011023	“Amɨn nak dakon notno dɨma, uŋun da nak uwal aŋnamaŋ. Ae amɨn nak dɨma aŋpulugaŋban amɨn paŋmuwukgamaŋ, uŋun amɨn da amɨn paŋwaseŋban waseŋ kwaŋ.”
42011024	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Koŋ kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda yɨpmaŋ degek kɨŋ mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon agek yɨk yawot tamo wɨsisak. Mani tamo kɨnda dɨma kosok, do yaŋ yosok, ‘Nak aeno tobɨl yut kalɨp egɨpgumon kɨkeŋ.’
42011025	Yaŋ yaŋek kɨŋ kaŋban sɨbɨt sɨbɨt wɨrɨrɨgek yo morap paŋkosit abi pɨndakdak.
42011026	Yaŋ kosok, do kɨŋ koŋ 7 kabɨ iyɨ yapmaŋek wagɨl yokwisi gat tɨmɨkban kwa uŋun yutnon egek aŋpak yokwisi aŋ. Mibɨltok uŋun amɨn yokwi egɨpgut, mani abɨsok uŋun yapmaŋek wagɨl yokwisi egɨsak.”
42011027	Yesu gen uŋun yaŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep kabɨgwan da mɨŋat kɨnda da pɨdaŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Meŋgo si aŋalaŋek mum gaban nagɨl uŋun dasi kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ asak!”
42011028	Yaŋban Yesu da yagɨt, “Mani uŋun yapmaŋek amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek guramɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.”
42011029	Amɨn morapmɨsi da Yesukon sigɨn obɨŋ muwugakwa Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn on bɨsapmon ekwaŋ uŋun amɨn yokwisi gɨn. Piŋkop dakon pi naŋ asat yaŋ nandak do wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda kok do yoŋ. Mani kɨnda dɨma kokdaŋ. Jona dakon tɨlak naŋgɨn kokdaŋ.
42011030	Kalɨpsigwan Piŋkop da kombɨ amɨn Jonakon tɨlak aban Niniwe kokup pap amɨn da asi Piŋkopmon da abɨk da asak yaŋ kawit. Uŋudeŋ gɨn yo Amɨn Dakon Monjikon noman taŋ ɨba apmiap amɨn da kaŋek asi Piŋkop da yabekban abɨk yaŋ kokdaŋ.
42011031	“Mɨktɨm saut tetgɨn dakon kɨla amɨn mɨŋat madep uŋun Solomon dakon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi iyɨŋakwan nandak do mɨktɨm dubagɨsikon da apgut. Mani amɨn kɨnda oni egɨsak, uŋun da Solomon yapmaŋdak, mani geni dɨma nandaŋ. Do gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon uŋun kɨla amɨn mɨŋat madep da pɨdaŋ agek abɨsok ekwaŋ amɨn kabɨ dakon aŋpak yokwi uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋokdɨsak.
42011032	Niniwe amɨn Jona da Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋban but tobɨl awit. Mani ji da binapmon amɨn kɨnda egɨsak uŋun da Jona yapmaŋ mudosok, mani ji but tobɨl dɨma aŋ. Do gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon Niniwe amɨn da pɨdaŋ agek abɨsok ekwaŋ amɨn kabɨ dakon aŋpak yokwi uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋokdaŋ.”
42011033	Yesu da sigɨn yagɨt, “Amɨn da lam koleŋ pasɨlɨgwan yopba dɨma toŋ. Bo ae kwoba baŋ wutjɨba dɨma toŋ. Noman tamokon yopba taŋ teŋteŋaŋakwan amɨn da wɨŋ teŋteŋɨ koŋ.
42011034	Dabɨlgo uŋun gɨptɨmgo dakon teŋteŋɨ. Dabɨlgo tagɨsi kaŋ, gɨptɨmgo kaloŋ teŋteŋɨni toŋ. Mani dabɨlgo yokwi kaŋ, gɨptɨmgo pɨlɨn tuksi tosok.
42011035	Yaŋdo, gɨptɨmgo dakon teŋteŋɨ uŋun pɨlɨn tuk asak yaŋ do kaŋ kɨmokgi.
42011036	Gɨptɨmgo kaloŋ teŋteŋɨni toŋ ae pɨlɨn tuk kɨnda dɨma tosak kaŋ, gɨptɨmgo lam dakon teŋteŋɨ dakon paŋop pɨndakdal uŋudeŋ teŋteŋokdɨsak.”
42011037	Yesu gen yaŋ mudaŋakwan Parisi amɨn kɨnda da yutnikon kwan yɨgek jap nonjil do iyɨgɨt. Iyɨŋban Yesu kɨŋ yutnikon wɨgɨ jap noknok tamokon yɨkgɨt.
42011038	Yɨgek mibɨltok kɨsirɨ dɨma sugaŋek jap naŋban Parisi amɨn uŋun da kaŋek dɨma agagɨ asak yaŋ nandagɨt.
42011039	Aban Amɨn Tagɨ da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Parisi amɨn ji kap ɨdapyo dakon manji baŋgɨn sugoŋ. Mani kabo gat ae aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gat uŋun butjigwan tugawit da toŋ.
42011040	Ji nandaŋ kokwinji tagɨ mɨni! Piŋkop da manji baŋ gɨn dɨma, burɨ gat kɨsi wasagɨt.
42011041	Ji bupmɨ amɨn do but dasi galak taŋek paŋpulugoni kaŋ, ji amɨn kɨlegɨsi.
42011042	“Mani Parisi amɨn, awa! Ji jap tam galagɨsi pi kagasi toŋ uŋun paŋ kabi 10 kabɨ yopmaŋek uŋun kabɨkon baŋ kabi kɨndanaŋ Piŋkop do paret aŋ. Mani gen kokwin kɨlegɨ agak gat, ae Piŋkop do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨm uŋun ji dɨma aŋ. Aŋpak kɨlegɨ uŋun gat ae paretyo kɨsi ani kaŋ tagɨsi.
42011043	“Parisi amɨn, awa! Ji muwut muwut yut madepmon tamo mibɨltogɨ uŋudon yɨt do galagɨ nandaŋ. Ae amɨn da maket tamokon nandaba wukwan damɨŋek gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ dayɨni do galagɨ nandaŋ.
42011044	“Parisi amɨn, awa! Ji amɨn kɨmakbi yopyop tamo mɨktɨmgwan taŋakwa amɨn da dɨma pɨndagek kwenikon bamaŋ akwaŋ ji uŋun yombem.”
42011045	Gen teban mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn kɨnda da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, Parisi amɨn do gen uŋun yaŋek, ninyo kɨsi pabɨŋ nipmaŋdal.”
42011046	Yaŋban Yesu da yagɨt, “Gen teban mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn jiyo kɨsi, awa! Ji amɨn gen teban mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ jɨgɨsi guramɨtni do yoyaŋ, mani kɨsitjok kɨnda yomɨŋek paŋpulugaŋek guramɨt do dɨmasi nandaŋ.
42011047	“Awa! Ji kombɨ amɨn dakon bumjot tamo wasoŋ. Mani babɨkji da dapba kɨmakgwit.
42011048	Babɨkji da kombɨ amɨn dapba kɨmakgwit uŋun dakon bumjot tamoni ji da paŋtɨlɨm aŋ. Yaŋ aŋ uŋun babɨknin da tagɨsi dapba kɨmakgwit yaŋ nandaŋ dakon tɨlak asak.
42011049	Uŋun do aŋek Piŋkop da nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsikon da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak da kombɨ amɨno gat ae yabekbi kabɨno gat uŋun amɨn kabɨkon yabetdɨsat. Yabekgo dɨwarɨ dapba kɨmotdaŋ, ae dɨwarɨ yo yokwisi aŋyomdaŋ.’
42011050	Yaŋ do aŋek Piŋkop da mɨktɨm wasagɨron da kombɨ amɨn morap dapba kɨmakgwit uŋun dakon kobogɨ amɨn abɨsok ekwaŋ uŋun da tɨmɨtdaŋ.
42011051	Wasok wasok do amɨn kɨlegɨ Abel aŋagek ae amɨn dɨwarɨ dapmaŋakwa wɨgɨ wasɨp do Sekaraia Telagɨ Yut Madep ae altayo da binapmon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt uŋun dakon kobogɨ yo jɨgɨsi amɨn abɨsok ekwaŋ uŋun da tɨmɨtdaŋ.
42011052	“Gen teban mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn, awa! Nandak nandak pakpak tamo dakon yoma wɨtdal dɨsi kɨlɨ gwayewit. Dɨsi uŋungwan dɨma wɨgɨwit. Aŋek uŋungwan wɨgɨk do awit amɨn ji da kosit sopsop aŋyomgwit.”
42011053	Yesu uŋun yut egɨpgut yɨpmaŋ degakwan gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat ae Parisi amɨn gat da Yesu do uwal aŋ ɨmɨŋek gen mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ iyɨwit.
42011054	Aŋkewalno suŋ kɨnda yaŋakwan gen pikon yɨpneŋ yaŋon da iyɨwit.
42012001	Amɨn tausen morapmɨ da abɨŋ muwugek gɨtni gɨtnisi aŋek notni bamaŋ bamaŋ aŋakwa Yesu da mibɨltok paŋdetni baŋ kalɨp yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Parisi amɨn dakon yisni do kaŋ kɨmotni. Uŋun jamba but amɨnsi ekwaŋ.
42012002	Yo morap gwɨlɨgwan toŋ uŋun altaŋ teŋteŋaŋ mudokdaŋ. Ae yo morap pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun amɨn da nandaba pɨsokdaŋ.
42012003	Do gen morap ji da pɨlɨn tukgwan yawit uŋun amɨn da teŋteŋɨkon nandakdaŋ. Ae gen morap yut kagagwan gen pɨsɨgon da yawit uŋun yut kwenon wɨgɨ gen papmon da yoyɨŋ teŋteŋokdaŋ.”
42012004	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Not kabɨ, yaŋsi dayɨsat. Amɨn da gɨptɨm dapba kɨmagakwa uŋun da kwenon yo dɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma akdaŋ, do uŋun do dɨma pasolni.
42012005	Mani namɨn amɨn dosi pasolni uŋun do dayɨkdɨsat. Ji Piŋkop do pasolni. Piŋkop da gɨptɨm dapban kɨmagakwa Tɨpdomon maban pɨgɨni uŋun dakon tapmɨm taŋ ɨmɨsak. Asisi dayɨsat, ji Piŋkop dosi pasolni.
42012006	Mɨnam monɨŋ uŋun yo monɨŋɨsok, 5 kabɨ dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun moneŋ gɨman tabɨlɨ bamorɨ gɨn. Mani Piŋkop da mɨnam monɨŋgok uŋun dakon kɨndasok dɨmasi ɨŋtaŋ ɨmgut.
42012007	Piŋkop da busuŋ daŋgwanji niaŋ da toŋ uŋun kɨsisi nandaŋ mudosok, do ji dɨma pasolni. Mɨnam monɨŋ monɨŋ morapmɨ dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun madep dɨma, mani ji dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun wukwisi.”
42012008	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak da yaŋsi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda da ‘Nak Yesu dakon amɨn kɨnda’ yaŋ amɨn yoyɨsak kaŋ, Amɨn Dakon Monji da Piŋkop dakon aŋelo kabɨnikon uŋun amɨn nak dakon amɨn kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨsak.
42012009	Mani amɨn kɨnda ‘Nak Yesu dakon amɨn dɨma’ yaŋ amɨn yoyɨsak kaŋ, nakyo kɨsi Piŋkop dakon aŋelo kabɨnikon uŋun amɨn nak dakon amɨn dɨma yaŋ yoyɨkeŋ.
42012010	Amɨn morap Amɨn Dakon Monji do yaŋba yokwi tok ani amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yomdɨsak, mani amɨn morap Telagɨ Wup do yaŋba yokwi tok ani amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni dɨma yopmaŋ yomdɨsak.
42012011	“Amɨn da ji Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut madepmon, bo gapmanon, bo ae amɨn mani wukwi da ɨŋamon paŋkɨ depni bɨsapmon, dɨsi kutnok do aŋek ni gen baŋ yoyɨneŋ yaŋ nandaŋek nandaba kɨk dɨma ani.
42012012	Uŋun bɨsapmonsi ni gen baŋ yoyɨni uŋun Telagɨ Wup da dayɨŋ detdɨsak.”
42012013	Uŋun amɨn kabɨ madepgwan da amɨn kɨnda da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, peno iyɨŋbɨ datnit da yo morap yopgut uŋun kokwinɨk dɨwarɨ nak do namjak.”
42012014	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Not, namɨn da jilon gen kokwin pi aŋek yo kabɨsil kokwinɨk dabeŋ do manjɨŋ nepgut?”
42012015	Yaŋ yaŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Yo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt dakon galagɨ dɨ pabam. Yo kabɨsi uŋun morapmɨsi kaŋ, uŋun da egɨp egɨp bamɨsi arɨpmɨ dɨma damdaŋ.”
42012016	Yaŋ yaŋek tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yoni morapmɨ amɨn kɨnda dakon pigagani jap bamɨ tagɨsi morapmɨ tawit.
42012017	Aŋakwa amɨn uŋun iyɨ yaŋ nandagɨt, ‘Jap bamɨ yopbeŋ dakon tamo kɨlɨ tugaŋ, do ae dɨ gat yopbeŋ dakon tamo arɨpmɨ dɨma, do niaŋsi abeŋ?’
42012018	Yaŋ nandaŋek yagɨt, ‘Nak yaŋsi abeŋ: Jap yopyop yutno kɨsi tuwɨlek madepsi wutjɨŋek wit gat ae yo kabɨno gat kɨsi uŋun yutnon yopbeŋ.
42012019	Yaŋ aŋek naga do yaŋsi yokeŋ, “Nak bɨlak morapmɨ tagɨsi egɨ aŋaŋ kɨkeŋ dakon yo morapno arɨpmɨsi. Do yaworɨsi egek jap pakbiyo madepsi aŋek bɨsap morapmɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek egɨpbeŋ.” ’
42012020	“Mani Piŋkop da iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak nandaŋ kokwingo tagɨ mɨni. Gak abɨsok kalbi kɨmotdɨsal. Yo morapgo gaga do paŋkosit agɨl uŋun amɨn da tɨmɨtdaŋ.’ ”
42012021	Yesu da gen uŋun yaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn yoni morapmɨ paŋmuwut do pi aŋegek Piŋkop do dɨma nandaŋek ekwaŋ amɨn, uŋun amɨnon yo yaŋsi altokdɨsak.”
42012022	Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yaŋsi dayɨsat, egɨp egɨpji do nandaba kɨk aŋek ‘Jap dukon baŋ noneŋ’ bo ae gɨptɨmji do nandaba kɨk aŋek ‘Ɨmal dukon baŋ paneŋ’ yaŋ dɨma nandani.
42012023	Egɨp egɨp da jap yapmaŋdak, ae gɨptɨm da ɨmal yapmaŋdak.
42012024	Ji mɨnam do nandani. Jap yet dɨma kwaokgaŋ, ae jap dɨma paŋ, ae jap paŋmuwut yutni mɨni. Mani Piŋkop da jap upmokdok. Mɨnam dakon yumaŋ nogɨ pɨŋbisi aŋakwa amɨn ji dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun madepsi.
42012025	Ji nandaba kɨk aŋek egɨp egɨpji tɨmɨsok dɨ gat tagɨ saŋbeŋba wɨgɨsak yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨmasi.
42012026	Yo monɨŋɨsok uŋuden ji da arɨpmɨ dɨmasi agagɨ, do nido yo dɨwarɨ morap do nandaba kɨk aŋ?
42012027	“Jareŋ oni taŋ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun do nandani. Pi madep aŋek ɨmal dɨma bupmaŋgaŋ. Mani yaŋ dayɨsat, jareŋ pɨndakgaŋ uŋun dakon tɨlɨmni da kalɨp kɨla amɨn madep Solomon dakon tɨlɨmni tagɨsi pagɨt uŋun yapmaŋdak.
42012028	On joŋ taŋ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun aŋwa amɨn da baljaŋ kɨndapmon sokdaŋ. Mani Piŋkop da si paŋtɨlɨm asak, do nandaŋ gadatji pɨsɨpmɨsok amɨn ji yaŋsi nandani, Piŋkop da ji do nandaban yo madepsi aŋakwan ɨmal tɨlɨmɨ toŋsi baŋ paŋ damdɨsak.
42012029	-
42012030	Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn kabɨ da yo morap uŋuden wusɨŋ pɨndat do pini aŋ. Mani Datji da yo uŋun do wadak wadak aŋ uŋun nandɨsak, do ji jap pakbiyo dukon baŋ noneŋ yaŋ nandaŋek nandaba kɨk dɨma ani.
42012031	Nandaba kɨkji yɨpmaŋek Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun wɨsɨŋ kok do pi ani. Yaŋ aŋakwa yo dɨwarɨ do wadak wadak aŋ uŋun kɨsi damdɨsak.”
42012032	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Sipsip kabɨsok, ji dɨma pasolni. Datji da iyɨ Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan egɨpni do tagɨsi nandɨsak.
42012033	Ji yo morapji taŋ damaŋ uŋun yopba amɨn da yumaŋ noni. Yaŋ aba moneŋ tɨmɨgek yoni mɨni amɨn do yomni. Aŋek yo kabɨsi tagɨsi Kwen Kokupmon paŋmuwuk yopba uŋudon tagɨsi tokdaŋ. Uŋun tamokon toni kaŋ, yo kabɨsi dɨma pasɨldaŋ, ae kabo noknok da dɨma tɨmɨtdaŋ, ae yo monɨŋ da dɨma nokdaŋ.
42012034	Yo kabɨsi tagɨsi dukwan toŋ, but nandak nandakyosi kɨsi uŋudon gɨn tokdɨsak.”
42012035	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji ɨmalji paŋek lamji koleŋek tagap taŋek egɨpni.
42012036	Oman monjɨ da tagap taŋek amɨn tagɨni da mɨŋat pakpak dakon soŋnogon da tobɨl apjak do jomjom aŋek ekwaŋ ji yaŋ gɨn tagap toni. Do ni bɨsapmon abɨŋ yoma domon tɨdosak ji yoma tepmɨ wɨtdal ɨmni.
42012037	Oman monjɨ amɨn tagɨni da pɨndakban tagap taŋek ekwaŋ kaŋ tagɨsi. Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn tagɨni da iyɨ oman dakon ɨmal paŋek oman monjɨ yoyɨŋban jap tamokon pabɨŋ yɨgakwa iyɨ jap yomdɨsak.
42012038	Amɨn tagɨ uŋun kalbi binap bo wɨsa dagokdosi abɨŋ pɨndakban tagap taŋek egɨpni kaŋ tagɨsi.
42012039	Ji yaŋ nandani. Yut kɨnda dakon ami kalbi kabo noknok ni bɨsapmon apjak yaŋ nandagɨt tam, kɨla aŋakwan arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlban.
42012040	Ji kɨsi tagap taŋek egɨpni. Dɨma apjak yaŋ nandaŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋudon apdɨsak.”
42012041	Pita da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, tɨlak gen yal uŋun nin dogɨn yal, bo ae amɨn kɨsi do yal?”
42012042	Yaŋban Amɨn Tagɨ da yagɨt, “Oman monjɨ kɨnda nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi ae pi agakni tagɨsi, uŋuden oman monjɨ amɨn tagɨni da oman monjɨni dɨwarɨ kɨlani asak do manjɨsak. Yaŋ aban jap yomyom bɨsapmon japni yomɨŋ yomɨŋ asak.
42012043	Oman monjɨ uŋun amɨn tagɨni da tobɨl abɨŋ kaŋban pini tagɨsi asak kaŋ tagɨsi.
42012044	Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn tagɨni da uŋun oman monjɨ iyɨŋban yo morapni kɨla akdɨsak.
42012045	Mani uŋun oman monjɨ burɨkon da amɨn tagɨni tepmɨ dɨma apdɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek oman monjɨ gat ae oman mɨŋat gat dapmaŋek jap pakbiyo madep aŋek pakbi tebanyo kɨsi naŋ but upbal asak kaŋ,
42012046	dɨma apdɨsak yaŋ nandaŋakwan amɨn tagɨni da but pɨsogɨ mɨni abɨŋ uŋun oman monjɨ tepmɨ pi ɨmɨŋek gen kɨrɨŋɨt amɨn kabɨ gat yopban egɨpdaŋ.
42012047	Oman monjɨ kɨnda amɨn tagɨni dakon galaktokni nandaŋek tagap taŋek galaktokni dɨma yoljak kaŋ, amɨn tagɨ da kosirɨ morapmɨ baljokdɨsak.
42012048	Mani oman monjɨ kɨnda amɨn tagɨni dakon galaktokni dɨma nandaŋek aŋpak yokwi si baljoni da arɨpmon asak kaŋ, amɨn tagɨni da kosirɨ morapmɨ dɨma baljokdɨsak. Yo morapmɨ tɨmɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun yo morapmɨ paŋtobɨl yomyomɨ. Yo morapmɨ kɨla ani do dabi amɨn uŋun yo morapmɨ paŋtobɨl yomyomɨ.”
42012049	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak mɨktɨmon kɨndap sokeŋ do pɨgɨm. Kɨlɨsi kwaŋ sok tam tagɨ.
42012050	Nak tepmɨ madepsi pakdɨsat. Butno jɨk tosok, do pako dagosak dosi nandɨsat.
42012051	Nak amɨn da mɨktɨmon but yawot pani yaŋ do pɨgɨm yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Uŋun dɨma. Yaŋ dayɨsat, nak mɨktɨm amɨnon pɨdok pɨdok paŋalon ak do pɨgɨm.
42012052	Abɨsok da wasaŋek amɨn yurɨ kɨndakon amɨn 5 kabɨ da pɨdaŋ kɨŋek bamorɨ da kapbɨ gat uwal uwal akdaŋ. Ae kapbɨ da bamorɨ gat uwal uwal akdaŋ.
42012053	Waseŋ kɨŋek dat da monji gat pɨdok pɨdok akdamal, ae meŋ da gwi gat pɨdok pɨdok akdamal, ae mɨŋat kɨnda gat namdi gat pɨdok pɨdok akdamal.”
42012054	Amɨn kabɨ madepsi yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji gɨldat da si pɨgɨsak tetgɨn do meŋi wamaŋdak yaŋ pɨndagek ‘Sɨkak mokdɨsak’ yaŋ yaŋakwa asi sɨkak mosok.
42012055	Ae saut tetgɨn dakon mɨrɨm madep abɨŋakwan ji da yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Gɨldat tepmɨsi wusɨkdɨsak.’ Yaŋ yaŋakwa asi gɨldat tepmɨsi wusɨsak.
42012056	Jamba but amɨn, ji da mɨktɨmon ae kwen yo morap toŋ pɨndagek kokwin tagɨsi aŋ. Mani abɨsok yo morap altoŋ uŋun pɨndagek kokwin nido tagɨ dɨma aŋ?”
42012057	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji dɨsi aŋpak yokwi tagɨyo nido dɨma kokwinɨkgaŋ?
42012058	Amɨn kɨnda da gen yaŋ gam do aban gen kokwin tamokon kɨk do kosiron kɨnjil bɨsapmon genjil uŋun yaŋ aŋmɨlɨp ak do pi anjil. Yaŋ dɨma aŋek kwal gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨn da obip amɨn da kɨsiron gepban uŋun da dam teban yutnon gepdɨsak.
42012059	Nak asisi gayɨsat, gak dam tebanon sigɨn egaki wɨgɨ moneŋ niaŋ yopbi do gayɨni uŋun kɨsisi yopmaŋek don waŋga kɨkdɨsal.”
42013001	Yesu da gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋakwan amɨn dɨwarɨ da Pailat da yo agɨt uŋun do iyɨwit. Pailat da obip amɨni yoyɨŋban kɨŋ Galili amɨn dɨwarɨ Piŋkop do mukwa soŋakwa uŋun dapba kɨmakgwit. Do uŋun amɨn dakon yawini gat ae paret do yo mukwa sowit dakon yawini kɨsi mawit.
42013002	Uŋun do iyɨŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Niaŋ nandaŋ? Galili amɨn kɨmakgwit uŋun dakon yokwini da Galili amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon yokwini yapgut, uŋun do aŋek jɨgɨ uŋun pawit yaŋ nandaŋ?
42013003	Uŋun dɨmasi! Nak asisi dayɨsat, ji but tobɨl dɨma ani kaŋ, uŋun amɨn kabɨ da kɨmakgwit jiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn kɨmotdaŋ.
42013004	Bo Silom yut dubak tuwɨl kɨ maŋ amɨn 18 kabɨ wɨtjɨŋban kɨmakgwit do nandani. Uŋun amɨn kabɨ dakon yokwini da Jerusalem amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon yokwini yapgut uŋun do aŋek pasɨlgwit yaŋ nandaŋ?
42013005	Uŋunyo kɨsi dɨmasi! Nak asisi dayɨsat, ji but tobɨl dɨma ani kaŋ, jiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn kɨmotdaŋ.”
42013006	Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da wain pinikon pik kɨndap kɨnda kwaokgɨt. Bɨsap kɨnda bamɨ wɨsɨk do kɨgɨt, mani bamɨ mɨni pɨndakgɨt.
42013007	Bamɨ mɨni pɨndagek pi kɨla amɨni yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Nandaki. Nak bɨlak kapbɨ abɨŋ pik kɨndap dakon sopmɨ wɨsɨŋ wɨsɨŋ aŋek mɨni pɨndakdat. Yaŋ do kɨndap on si pasɨki. Mɨktɨm dakon tapmɨm nido ɨsal dogɨn ɨlɨk mudosok?’
42013008	“Yaŋban pi kɨla amɨn da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, yum kaŋbɨ bɨlak kɨnda gat atjak. Aŋakwan mibɨlɨkon mɨktɨm wayɨgek yalɨk yopbeŋ.
42013009	Bɨlak kwenikon bamɨ tosak kaŋ tagɨsi. Mani bamɨ dɨma tosak kaŋ, tagɨ pasɨki.’ ”
42013010	Sabat bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu da Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut kɨndakon amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
42013011	Uŋudon mɨŋat kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun koŋ kɨnda da yɨgek abɨdaŋakwan sot aŋakwan bɨlak 18 agɨt. Manji gɨroŋɨkgɨt, do kwen kɨlegɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma akgɨt.
42013012	Yesu da kaŋek iyɨŋban opban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat, sotgo kɨlɨ gepmaŋ dek kɨk.”
42013013	Yaŋ iyɨŋek kɨsirɨ kwenikon wutjɨŋban uŋudon gɨn manji kɨlek taŋakwa Piŋkop aŋkɨsigɨt.
42013014	Mani muwut muwut yut dakon kɨla amɨn da Sabat bɨsapmon Yesu da amɨn aŋmɨlɨp agɨt uŋun do butjap nandagɨt. Butjap nandaŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Pi agak dakon gɨldat 6 kabɨ toŋ. Uŋun bɨsapmon sot amɨn apba tagɨ paŋmɨlɨp ani. Mani Sabat bɨsapmon dɨmasi ani.”
42013015	Yaŋban Amɨn Tagɨ da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ji jamba but amɨn! Ji Sabat bɨsapmon bulmakausi gat ae donkisi gat yutnikon baŋ wɨtdal ɨlɨk paŋkɨ yopba pakbi noŋ, ma?
42013016	Mɨŋat on Abraham dakon gwi, Sunduk da tebai abɨdaŋakwan bɨlakni 18 agɨt. Sabat bɨsapmon dɨma pulugaŋ kɨsak do nandaŋ, ma?”
42013017	Yaŋ yaŋban uwalni mayagɨ nandawit. Mani mɨŋat amɨnyo Yesu da yo morap wagɨl tagɨsisi agɨt uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk awit.
42013018	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun niaŋsi? Yo ni gat tɨlak abo?
42013019	Uŋun mastat yet yombem. Amɨn kɨnda da mastat yet kɨnda pigagani kwaokgɨt. Aŋakwan mastat uŋun kwaŋ madep taŋ kɨndap kɨnda da yaŋ agakwan mɨnam da abɨŋ kɨlɨŋɨkon yutni uŋudon awit.”
42013020	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni yo ni gat tɨlak abo?
42013021	Uŋun yis yombem. Mɨŋat kɨnda da plaua ɨdap madep kɨnda gat ɨktagɨldak. Yaŋ aŋakwan plaua uŋun kɨsisi paptaŋ madep tawit.”
42013022	Yesu uŋun Jerusalem kokup papmon kɨk do aŋek kokup pap ae kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ tawit uŋudon agek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
42013023	Aŋakwan amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, Piŋkop da amɨn kaloŋɨsok dɨ baŋgɨn yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak bo niaŋ?” Yaŋban Yesu da yoyɨgɨt,
42013024	“Nak yaŋsi dayɨsat, amɨn morapmɨ da egɨp egɨpmon wɨgɨk do pini akdaŋ, mani arɨpmɨ dɨma wɨgɨkdaŋ. Do ji yoma kosit gwagak monɨŋɨ naŋ wɨgɨk do pi tebai ani.
42013025	Yut dakon ami da pɨdaŋ yoma sopban ji da kɨŋ yomakon agek yoma tɨdaŋek yaŋ yokdaŋ, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ, nin do yoma wɨtdal nim.’ “Mani gen kobogɨ yaŋ dayɨkdɨsak, ‘Nak dɨma nandaŋ damɨsat. Ji dukon nani amɨn?’
42013026	“Yaŋ yaŋban ji da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨkdaŋ, ‘Nin gak gat kɨsi egek jap pakbiyo agɨmaŋ. Ae kokup papnin dakon kosit madepmon agek niyɨŋ dekgɨl.’
42013027	“Mani uŋun da yaŋ dayɨkdɨsak, ‘Nak asisi dayɨsat, nak dɨma nandaŋ damɨsat. Ji dukon nani uŋun dɨma nandɨsat. Yokwi pakpak ji kɨsisi nepmaŋ dek kɨt!’
42013028	“Ji Abraham, Aisak, Jekop, ae kombɨ amɨn kɨsisi Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak kokupmon ekwa pɨndatdaŋ. Mani ji maba waŋga kɨŋ mudokdaŋ. Uŋun bɨsapmon ji kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek egɨpdaŋ.
42013029	Amɨn da gɨldat wɨsak ae si pɨgɨsak tet, ae not tet ae saut tet da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak kokupmon abɨŋek jap noknok tamo madepmon yɨtdaŋ.
42013030	Nandani, amɨn dɨwarɨ abɨsok buŋon ekwaŋ, uŋun don mibɨltok amɨn akdaŋ. Ae amɨn dɨwarɨ abɨsok mibɨltok ekwaŋ, uŋun don buŋon amɨn akdaŋ.”
42013031	Uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ da abɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak ɨdon dɨma egɨpbi, kokup dɨgwan kɨki. Erot da gak gɨkban kɨmokgi do nandɨsak.”
42013032	Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kɨŋ uŋun top amɨn yaŋ iyɨni, ‘Nandaki. Nak abɨsok ae aŋwa koŋ yolgeŋ, ae sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp abeŋ. Ae pɨdaŋɨ do pi abeŋ do nandagɨm uŋun aŋwasɨp abeŋ.’
42013033	Kombɨ amɨn Jerusalem kokup papmon gɨn dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon dɨma dapba kɨmokgoŋ, do nak abɨsok ae aŋwa ae pɨdaŋɨ do sigɨn kɨkeŋ.
42013034	“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem amɨn, ji kombɨ amɨn dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Amɨn Piŋkop da yabekban jikon abaŋ uŋun ji da tɨpbaŋ dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Pup meŋi da monjini paŋmuwuk pɨrɨgwan yopmaŋdak, uŋun da tɨlak nak da bɨsap morapmɨ ji paŋmuwut do nandagɨm, mani ji da kurak taŋ namgwit.
42013035	Nak asisi dayɨsat, kokup yomasiyo yokwi taŋek yumsi tokdɨsak. Ji nak dɨma nandaŋek egɨ wɨgɨ ni bɨsapmon nak do ‘Amɨn on Amɨn Tagɨ da manon abɨsak, uŋun Piŋkop da gɨsamɨgakwan abɨsak’ yaŋ nak do yoni uŋun bɨsapmon nandakdaŋ.”
42014001	Sabat kɨndakon Yesu jap nok do Parisi amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn kɨnda da yutnon kɨgɨt. Aŋakwan yɨpba kɨk aŋek kaŋ yɨkgwit,
42014002	nido Yesu da buron gɨptɨmɨ paptaŋbi amɨn kɨnda yɨkgɨt.
42014003	Yesu da uŋun amɨn kaŋek gen teban mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn gat ae Parisi amɨn gat yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Sabat bɨsapmon sot amɨn tagɨ paŋmɨlɨp aneŋ bo dɨma? Gen teban da niaŋ yosok?”
42014004	Mani gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma iyɨwit. Yaŋ aŋakwa Yesu da amɨn uŋun abɨdaŋek aŋmɨlɨp aŋek dɨgo kɨ yaŋ iyɨŋban si kɨgɨt.
42014005	Kɨŋakwan yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jikon da kɨnda dakon monji bo bulmakauni Sabat bɨsapmon pakbi gapmakon maŋban tepmɨ tagɨ ɨlɨkba wɨsak bo dɨma?”
42014006	Yaŋban gen kobogɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma iyɨgɨ yaŋ kawit.
42014007	Yesu da amɨn jap nok do apgwit uŋun pɨndakban tamo mibɨltogɨ nanikon gɨn yɨt do awit. Do tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
42014008	“Amɨn kɨnda da mɨŋat pakpak dakon soŋnogon yaŋ gaban kɨki kaŋ, tamo mibɨltogɨ nanikon dɨma yɨkgi. Tamo uŋun amɨn madep kɨnda gak gwapmaŋdak uŋun do manjɨkbi naŋ dɨ yɨkbɨm.
42014009	Yaŋ kaŋ amɨn yaŋ daban kɨki uŋun da abɨŋ yaŋ gayɨsak, ‘On tamo on amɨn do ɨmɨŋ.’ Yaŋ gayɨŋban gak gaga do mayagɨsi nandaŋek tamo amɨn pɨŋbisi do yopbi uŋudon paŋkɨ yɨtdɨsal.
42014010	Amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ gaban kaŋ, gak tamo amɨn pɨŋbisi do yopbi uŋudon paŋkɨ yɨkgi. Yɨgaki amɨn yaŋ gamjak uŋun da ‘Not, on tamo tagɨkon pawɨŋ yɨt’ yaŋ gayɨŋban pawɨŋ yɨgaki amɨn dɨwarɨ da amɨn mani toŋ kɨnda yaŋ gandani.
42014011	Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ do nandaban wugɨsak kaŋ, Piŋkop da uŋun amɨn abɨŋ yɨpdɨsak. Mani amɨn kɨnda iyɨ do nandaban pɨsak kaŋ, Piŋkop da mani awɨgɨkdɨsak.”
42014012	Yesu da amɨn uŋun yaŋ ɨban kɨgɨt uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak jap noknok kɨnda asal kaŋ, notgo, bo ae pego padɨk padɨkgo bo ae yawi dɨwatgo bo ae yoni morapmɨ amɨn dɨbaŋ dɨma yaŋ yobi. Uŋun da kobogɨ do don yaŋ gamdaŋ.
42014013	Gak jap noknok kɨnda abi kaŋ, yoni mɨni amɨn, ae gɨptɨmɨ yokwi taŋbi, ae kandap yokwi ae dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn baŋgɨn yaŋ yobi.
42014014	Yaŋ abi kaŋ, gak kɨsɨk kɨsɨgɨ toŋsi egɨpbi. Uŋuden amɨn kobogɨ tagɨ dɨma gamni, mani Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨmoron baŋ paban pɨdoni bɨsapmon don kobogɨ gamdɨsak.”
42014015	Amɨn kɨnda jap nawitgwan da gen uŋun nandaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak kokupmon yɨgek jap nokdaŋ amɨn uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.”
42014016	Mani Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da jap madepsi kɨnda paŋkosit aŋek amɨn morapmɨ yaŋ yomgut.
42014017	Jap noknok bɨsapmon oman monjɨni kɨnda yabekban amɨn yaŋ yomgut uŋun yoyɨk do kɨgɨt. Kɨŋ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Yo morap kɨlɨ paŋkosit abi, do ji tagɨ opni.’
42014018	“Mani amɨn kɨsisi dɨma op do yawit. Kɨnda da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak pi kɨnda kaluk yumɨt uŋun kɨŋ kokeŋ. Do nandaŋ namɨŋaki dɨma opbeŋ.’
42014019	“Ae kɨnda da yagɨt, ‘Nak pi agak bulmakau 10 kabɨ yumɨt, uŋun kɨŋ paŋkɨlɨk pɨndatgeŋ. Do nandaŋ namɨŋaki dɨma opbeŋ.’
42014020	“Ae kɨnda da yagɨt, ‘Nak mɨŋat kaluk pat, do arɨpmɨ dɨma opbeŋ.’
42014021	“Oman monjɨni tobɨl obɨŋ amɨn tagɨni amɨn yoyɨŋban gen yawit dakon mibɨlɨ iyɨgɨt. Iyɨŋban yut uŋun dakon ami uŋun da butjap nandaŋek oman monjɨni tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak tepmɨsi kokup madep da kosit madep ae kosit monɨŋon kɨŋ, amɨn yoni mɨni, ae gɨptɨmɨ yokwi taŋbi, ae dabɨlɨ mɨni, ae kandap yokwi uŋun tɨmɨk paŋopbi.’
42014022	“Yaŋ iyɨŋban oman monjɨ da yaŋ gɨn aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, yo abeŋ dosi nayɨl uŋun kɨlɨ aŋmudat, mani tamo toŋ.’
42014023	“Iyɨŋban amɨn tagɨ da oman monjɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak kokup madep yɨpmaŋek kɨŋ kosit madepmon bo ae pigaga da dam kɨdɨpmɨŋ agek amɨn pɨndak tebai yoyɨŋbɨ abɨŋ yɨkba yutno tugosak.
42014024	Nak yaŋsi dayɨsat, amɨn uŋun kalɨp yaŋ yomgum uŋun da nak dakon jap jɨmjɨmjok kɨnda dɨmasi nokdaŋ.’ ”
42014025	Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi yolakwa Yesu da tobɨlek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
42014026	“Amɨn kɨnda nak nol do nandɨsak kaŋ, meŋi datni, ae mɨŋatni gwakniyo gat, ae peni samɨni padɨgeyo gat, ae iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨpni gat kɨsi do uwal dɨma aŋyomjak kaŋ, uŋuden amɨn nak dakon paŋdetno arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpjak.
42014027	Tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨgek dɨma noljak amɨn paŋdetno arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpjak.
42014028	Amɨn kɨnda yut madep kɨnda ak do kaŋ, mibɨltok yɨgek moneŋni manjɨsak. Aŋek yut tagɨ aŋ mudogɨ bo dɨma uŋun dakon nandak nandak asak.
42014029	Yaŋ dɨma aŋek yut gwak maŋek yo dɨwarɨ do wadaŋek yut dɨma aŋ mudosok kaŋ, amɨn morap koni uŋun kɨsi jɨgɨlak yaŋek yanjaŋ ɨmdaŋ.
42014030	Aŋek yaŋ yokdaŋ, ‘On amɨn yutni aŋ dɨwarɨkgɨt, mani wasɨp ak do aŋtɨdok asak.’
42014031	Bo kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda da uwalni gat emat wam do nandɨsak kaŋ, mibɨltok nandaŋ kokwin asak. Iyɨ dakon emat amɨn 10 tausen da uwalni dakon 20 tausen tagɨ yolni bo dɨma, yaŋ do nandak nandak asak.
42014032	Tagɨ dɨma yolni yaŋ nandɨsak kaŋ, uwalni kapmat dɨma abɨŋakwa amɨn kabi kɨnda yabekban kɨŋ emat dɨma wamni do gen yoyɨŋ paŋyawot aŋ.
42014033	Jiyo yaŋ gɨn yo morapji dɨma yopmaŋ mudoni kaŋ, paŋdetnoni tagɨ dɨma egɨpni.”
42014034	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Tap uŋun yo tagɨsi kɨnda. Mani galagɨni pasɨlni kaŋ, niaŋsi aŋek galagɨni aŋkaluk aneŋ?
42014035	Tap uŋuden mɨktɨm arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋpulugogɨ. Bo bulmakau dakon kok gat ɨktagɨlɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma. Tap uŋuden ɨsal mamno kwaŋ. Mɨrakni toŋ amɨn da gen on pakyaŋsi nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsoni.”
42015001	Takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn gat ae yokwi pakpak amɨn gat da geni nandak do Yesu da kapmatjok opgwit.
42015002	Aŋakwa Parisi amɨn gat gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋek yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn yokwi pakpak amɨn not aŋyoban yɨgek jap noŋ.”
42015003	Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
42015004	“Jikon da amɨn kɨnda sipsipni 100 baŋ kaloŋɨ da pasɨljak kaŋ niaŋ asak? Uŋun da sipsip 99 joŋ tɨmon yopban egakwa kaloŋɨ pasɨldak uŋun wɨsɨŋek don aŋalon asak.
42015005	Wɨsɨŋ kaŋ abɨdosok bɨsapmon but galak nandaŋek kwapmɨkon guramɨk aŋaŋ
42015006	yomanikon aŋkɨsak. Aŋkɨŋek notni gat ae kokup ɨsalni gat yaŋ yoban obɨŋ muwukba yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Sipsipno pasɨlak uŋun kɨlɨ wɨsɨŋ kat, do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ano.’ ”
42015007	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, yokwi pakpak kɨnda da but tobɨl asak kaŋ, Kwen Kokupmon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi yaŋ gɨn akdaŋ. Amɨn 99 uŋun kɨlegɨ do but tobɨl agagɨ mɨni do uŋun dakon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madep dɨma ani. Mani yokwi pakpak kɨnda but tobɨl asak uŋun dakon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk uŋun madepsi noman tosok.”
42015008	Ae Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Mɨŋat kɨnda da silwa moneŋ tabɨlɨ 10 kabɨ baŋ kaloŋɨ da yutnon maŋ pasɨljak kaŋ uŋun niaŋ asak? Uŋun da lamni koleŋek yutni ɨkdɨgaŋek tebaisi wɨsɨŋek don kosak.
42015009	Kaŋ abɨdosok bɨsapmon but galak nandaŋek notni gat ae kokup ɨsalni gat yoyɨŋban obɨŋ muwukba yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Moneŋno pasɨlak uŋun kɨlɨ wɨsɨŋ kat, do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ano.’ ”
42015010	Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, yokwi pakpak kɨnda da but tobɨl asak kaŋ, Piŋkop dakon aŋelo da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk yaŋ gɨn akdaŋ.”
42015011	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut uŋun monji bamorɨ.
42015012	Monjɨ buŋon nani da datni yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Dat, gak peno gat nit do yo morap nim do nandɨsal uŋun nak dakon dɨwarɨno abɨsok kokwinɨk nabi.’ Yaŋ yaŋban datni da yo kabɨni kokwinɨk monjɨ bamotni do yomgut.
42015013	“Yoban bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok egek monji buŋon nani da yo kabɨni kɨsisi tɨmɨk dubagɨsi kɨŋ mɨktɨm kɨndakon paŋkɨ egɨpgut. Paŋkɨ egek aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ aŋek moneŋni naŋ mudagɨt.
42015014	Moneŋni naŋ mudaŋakwan uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn da jap do madepsi aŋek dɨwarɨ da kɨmakgwit. Aŋakwa monji uŋun wadak wadak madepsi agɨt.
42015015	Do kɨŋ uŋun mɨktɨm dakon amɨn kɨndakon pi kɨnda abɨdagɨt. Aban amɨn tagɨni da yabekban bɨt damnikon kɨŋ bɨt jap yomgut.
42015016	Aŋek bɨt da bɨrap gɨp nawit uŋun pɨndak galak taŋek uŋun baŋ naŋek butno kadɨm tosak yaŋ nandagɨt. Mani amɨn kɨnda da jap kɨnda dɨma ɨmgut.
42015017	“Nandak nandakni kulabɨk aŋek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Datno dakon oman monjɨ morapni uŋun japni arɨpmɨsi taŋ yomaŋakwa ekwaŋ, mani nak ɨdon egek jap do kɨmotdɨsat.
42015018	Do yaŋsi abeŋ, nak tobɨl kɨŋ datno yaŋ iyɨkeŋ: “Dat, nak Piŋkop da ɨŋamon ae gak yo kɨsikon yo yokwisi agɨm,
42015019	do buŋon monjɨno yaŋ dɨma nayɨki. Yum oman monjɨgo yumaŋ naŋaki ekwaŋ uŋuden kɨnda da tɨlak egɨpbeŋ.” ’
42015020	Yaŋ nandaŋek pɨdaŋ datnikon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan datni dubagɨkon da monji kaŋ bupmɨ nandaŋ tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨŋ monji bedaŋek mandaŋ nagɨt.
42015021	Yaŋ aban monji da datni yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Dat, nak Piŋkop da ɨŋamon ae gagon yo yokwisi agɨm, do buŋon monjɨno yaŋ dɨma nayɨki.’
42015022	-
42015024	Mani datni da oman monjɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Monjɨno kɨmoron da yaŋ abɨsak. Pasɨlbikon naŋ aŋalon amaŋ. Do ji tepmɨ kɨŋ paba pɨgɨk dubagɨ tagɨsi kɨnda aŋabɨŋ paŋ ɨmni. Ae kɨsirɨkon sɨp tagɨsi kɨnda yɨpmaŋ ɨmɨŋek kandap gwɨl kɨsi paŋ ɨmni. Ae bulmakau monjɨ nelagɨ toŋ kɨnda naŋ aŋapba aŋak soŋ naŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ano.’ Datni da yaŋ yaŋakwan jap noknok aŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk awit.
42015025	Yaŋ aŋek egakwa monji mibɨltogɨ pigaga egɨpgut da yutnon obɨŋ aŋkapmat aŋek nandaban amɨn da kap kɨsɨk kɨsɨkyo awit.
42015026	Yaŋ aŋakwa nandaŋek oman monjɨ kɨnda yaŋ ɨban apban iyɨgɨt, ‘Uŋun nibaŋ aŋ?’
42015027	Yaŋ yaŋban iyɨgɨt, ‘Padɨgɨgo tagɨsi egɨsak da abɨk do datgo da kaŋek bulmakau monjɨ nelagɨ toŋ aŋwak.’
42015028	Yaŋ iyɨŋban monji mibɨltogɨ butjap nandaŋek yutnon wɨgɨk do kurak tagɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan datni da yomakon pɨŋek butni maŋakwan yutnon wɨgɨsak do iyɨgɨt.
42015029	Mani datni yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Dat, gak yaŋ nido asal? Nak oman monjɨ ɨsalɨ kɨnda da yaŋ bɨlak morapmɨ egek omango aŋ egɨsat. Aŋek gengo bɨsap kɨndakon dɨma kɨrɨŋɨkgɨm. Notnoni gat kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aneŋ do memesok kɨnda dɨmasi namgul.
42015030	Mani monjɨgo on yo morapgo kosit mɨŋat gat egek yomɨŋ mudagɨt, uŋun da apban kaŋek bulmakau monjɨ nelagɨ toŋ uŋun aŋwal.’
42015031	Yaŋban datni da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Monjɨno, bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ gak nak gat ekwamak. Ae yo morapno uŋun gak dakon gɨn.
42015032	Mani padɨgɨgo kɨmoron da yaŋ abɨk, ae pasɨlbikon naŋ aŋalon amaŋ, do nin but kwaktok nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨsi amaŋ.’ ”
42016001	Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yoni morapmɨ amɨn kɨnda gat ae yo morapni dakon kɨla amɨni gat egɨpgumal. Amɨn da abɨŋ yoni morapmɨ amɨn yaŋ iyɨwit, ‘Yo morapgo dakon kɨla amɨn ɨsal dogɨn yo morapgo naŋ mudok aŋgamɨsak.’
42016002	“Iyɨŋba nandaŋek yo kɨla amɨni uŋun yaŋ ɨban opban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak niaŋ aŋaki gengo nandat? Gak kɨŋ yo morapno kɨlɨ niaŋ asal uŋun dakon but pɨso kɨnda mandaŋ nabi. Gak pi uŋun saŋbeŋek dɨma akdɨsal.’
42016003	“Iyɨŋban yo kɨla agak pi amɨni uŋun iyɨ yaŋ nandagɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨno da pikon noldak, do niaŋ abeŋ? Amɨn kɨnda dakon oman monjɨni egek mɨktɨmni pudaŋ ɨbeŋ dakon tapmɨmno mɨni. Ae amɨn moneŋ do bɨsit yoyɨk do mayagɨ nandɨsat.
42016004	Do pi yopbeŋ bɨsapmon amɨn da but galagon da yaŋ naba yutnikon kɨŋ kɨŋ akeŋ do niaŋ abeŋ uŋun kɨlɨ uŋun nandɨsat.’
42016005	Yaŋ nandaŋek amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ amɨn tagɨnikon goman awit uŋun yaŋ yoban apgwit. Mibɨltok abɨŋ altagɨt amɨn yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak amɨn tagɨnokon goman niaŋ da agɨl?’
42016006	“Iyɨŋban yagɨt, ‘Olip pakbi tɨbɨrɨ madep 100 da arɨp.’ “Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak tepmɨsi yɨgek on papia tam gomango mandabikon olip pakbi tɨbɨrɨ 50 yaŋ manda.’
42016007	“Ae kɨnda abɨŋ altaŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak gomango niaŋ da?’ “Iyɨŋban yagɨt, ‘Wit yɨgɨ 100 da arɨp.’ Yaŋ iyɨŋban yagɨt, ‘On gomango mandabi papia tamon wit yɨgɨ 80 yaŋ manda.’
42016008	“Yaŋ aŋakwan amɨn tagɨni da yo agɨt uŋun kaŋban amɨn nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi da arɨpmon agɨt, do yo kɨla agak pi amɨni yokwi uŋun do nandaban wukwan ɨmgut. On mɨktɨm dakon amɨn kabɨ da nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi aŋek notni gat yumaŋ gwayek pi aŋ. Uŋun teŋteŋɨ dakon amɨn kabɨ yapmaŋgaŋ.
42016009	Nak da yaŋ dayɨsat, on mɨktɨm dakon moneŋ baŋ amɨn not aŋyomni. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, moneŋgo mudoni bɨsapmon ji egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni da yutgwan tagɨsi wɨgɨni.
42016010	“Amɨn kɨnda yo monɨŋɨsisok kɨlani tagɨ asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da yo madep kɨlani tagɨ asak. Ae amɨn kɨnda yo monɨŋɨsok kɨlani yokwi asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yo madepyo kɨsi kɨlani yokwi asak.
42016011	Yaŋdo, ji on mɨktɨm dakon moneŋ kɨlani tagɨ dɨma ani kaŋ, namɨn da nandaŋ gadaŋ damɨŋek yo tagɨsi bamɨsi daban kɨlani ani?
42016012	Ae ji amɨn dakon yo kabɨ kɨlani tagɨ dɨma ani kaŋ, namɨn da yo kabɨ dɨsi do damjak?
42016013	“Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn tagɨ bamorɨ dakon oman arɨpmɨ dɨma asak. Yaŋ kaŋ, kɨnda naŋgɨn galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek kɨnda do nandaban yokwi taŋ ɨmdɨsak. Ae kɨnda dakon gen guramɨgek kɨnda manji ɨmdɨsak. Ji Piŋkop gat ae moneŋ gat kɨsi dakon oman monjɨni arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ.”
42016014	Parisi amɨn moneŋ do galagɨsi nandaŋ, do Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun nandaŋek yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmgwit.
42016015	Mani Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji amɨn da amɨn kɨlegɨsi yaŋ dandani yaŋ do pi madep aŋ. Mani Piŋkop da butjigwan yo pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun pɨndak mudosok. Amɨn da yo tagɨsi yaŋ yoŋ uŋun Piŋkop da dabɨlon yo wagɨl ɨŋanisi.
42016016	“Gen teban gat ae kombɨ amɨn dakon gen gat yaŋ teŋteŋaŋba Jon da bɨsapmon wugɨt. Mani Jon da bɨsapmon da wasaŋek Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋoŋ. Aŋakwa amɨn uŋungwan pɨgɨk do pi tebaisi aŋ.
42016017	Mɨktɨm gat kundu gat tagɨ pasɨljil. Mani gen teban dakon gen jɨmjɨmjok kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨmasi pasɨldɨsak. Kɨsisi bamɨ taŋ mudokdaŋ.”
42016018	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatni kwɨnɨk yɨpban kɨŋakwan mɨŋat kaluk pasak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yumabi asak. Ae amɨn kɨnda mɨŋat kɨnda kalɨp eni da kwɨnɨkgɨt uŋun pasak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn kɨsi yumabi asak.”
42016019	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yoni morapmɨ amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut, uŋun bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni kɨldani toŋ tagɨsi ae ɨmalni gami baŋ paŋek yoni arɨpmɨsi taŋ ɨmɨŋakwa yaworɨsi egɨpgut.
42016020	-
42016021	Yaŋ egakwan uŋun da yut yoma kagakon yoni mɨni amɨn kɨnda mani Lasarus uŋudon pak egɨpgut. Lasarus yaŋ nandagɨt, yoni morapmɨ amɨn dakon jap tamokon da jap jɨmjɨm moŋ uŋun baŋ nokeŋ kaŋ tagɨsi yaŋ nandagɨt. Ae pɨŋan da abɨŋ wudani asɨwukgwit.
42016022	“Yoni mɨni amɨn egek kɨmakban aŋelo da abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ yɨpba Abraham gat egɨpgumal. Egakwal yoni morapmɨ amɨn uŋun yo kɨsi kɨmakban wayɨkgwit.
42016023	Aba Tɨpdomon tepmɨ madepsi nandaŋek egɨpgut. Egek sɨŋtaŋban wɨkwanek Abraham dubagɨsikon Lasarus gat kapmat kapmat yɨgakwal pɨndakgɨt.
42016024	Pɨndagek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Abraham dat, bupmɨ nandaŋ nam. Lasarus iyɨŋbɨ uŋun da pakbi jɨmjɨmjok dɨ kɨsirɨkon yopmaŋ paŋabɨŋ melnokon yopban tɨmɨsok dɨ yawotjak. Nak on kɨndapmon egek tepmɨ madepsi nandɨsat!’
42016025	“Mani Abraham da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Monjɨno, gak kalɨp egɨpgul do nandaki. Gak kalɨp yo kabɨgo tagɨsi baŋgɨn paŋek egaki Lasarus uŋun yo kabɨni yokwi baŋgɨn paŋek egɨpgut. Mani abɨsok Lasarus on kokupmon butni yaworɨsi taŋakwan gak da tepmɨ madepsi nandɨsal.
42016026	Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma. Nin da binapmon daŋgap dubagɨsi kɨnda tosok. Yaŋ tosok do ɨdon ekwaŋ amɨn jikon arɨpmɨ dɨma kɨkɨgɨ, ae uŋudon ekwaŋ amɨn ɨdon arɨpmɨ dɨma obopmɨ.’
42016027	“Yaŋ yaŋban yoni morapmɨ amɨn da gen tebaisi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Yaŋ kaŋ, dat, nandaŋ namɨŋek Lasarus iyɨŋbɨ datno da yutnon kɨŋ
42016028	padɨk padɨkno 5 kabɨ ekwaŋ uŋun nawa gen tebai yoyɨŋban nandaŋek on tepmɨ kokupmon dɨma apni.’
42016029	“Mani Abraham da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Moses gat ae kombɨ amɨn gat dakon gen do padɨk padɨkgo mɨrak yopmaŋek tagɨ nandani.’
42016030	“Yaŋban yoni morapmɨ amɨn da yagɨt, ‘Abraham dat, uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma. Mani amɨn kɨmakbi kɨnda da kɨŋ altaŋ yomjak kaŋ, padɨk padɨkno da but tobɨl tagɨ ani.’
42016031	“Yaŋban Abraham da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Moses gat ae kombɨ amɨn gat dakon gen dɨma nandani kaŋ, amɨn kɨnda kɨmoron da pɨdaŋban kaŋek nandaŋ gadat arɨpmɨ dɨma akdaŋ.’ ”
42017001	Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ da abɨŋ amɨn paŋkewalba yokwi aŋek maŋ mudokdaŋ. Mani uŋun yokwi ani do dayɨkdaŋ amɨn, awa!
42017002	Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn monɨŋ kɨnda yokwi asak do yabetjak kaŋ, uŋun dakon kobogɨ yokwisi. Yabet dɨma aŋakwan amɨn da wit mɨsɨŋɨt tɨp madep tegɨkon wamaŋ maba tap ɨlarɨgwan pɨgek kɨmotjak kaŋ uŋun da tagapmɨ.
42017003	Yaŋdo, ji dɨsi do kɨla tagɨsi ani. “Notgo kɨnda yokwi aban kaŋ, tebai iyɨŋbɨ egɨp egɨpni aŋmɨlɨp asak. Ae but tobɨl aban kaŋ, yokwini yɨpmaŋ ɨbi.
42017004	Uŋun gɨldaron gɨn kosirɨ 7 kabɨ yokwi aŋ gamɨŋek abɨŋ ‘But tobɨl at’ yaŋ gayɨsak kaŋ, yokwini yɨpmaŋ ɨmɨŋ ɨmɨŋ abi.”
42017005	Yabekbi kabɨ da Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nandaŋ gadatnin aŋpap a.”
42017006	Yaŋba Amɨn Tagɨ da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dakon nandaŋ gadatji uŋun mastat yet yombem monɨŋɨsisok taŋ damjak kaŋ, on kɨndap pɨlɨgɨ tap kagagwan pɨgɨsak do iyɨŋba genji tagɨ guramɨtjak.”
42017007	Ae Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Oman monjɨsi kɨnda pigaga da bo sipsip kɨla asagon da apban ‘Gak paŋabɨŋ yɨgek jap sot uŋun na’ yaŋ tagɨ iyɨni? Uŋun dɨmasi.
42017008	Amɨn tagɨ da oman monjɨni yaŋsi iyɨsak, ‘Gak tagap taŋek jap soŋ pɨlɨk nabɨ naŋ mudaŋapbo gak jap don noki.’
42017009	Oman monjɨ pini gɨn asak, do amɨn tagɨni da ya yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma iyɨgɨ.
42017010	Jiyo yaŋ gɨn, Piŋkop da oman morap ani do dayɨgɨt uŋun aŋ mudaŋek yaŋ gɨn yoni, ‘Nin oman monjɨ do, ɨsal pinin gɨn amaŋ.’ ”
42017011	Yesu uŋun Jerusalem kɨk do aŋek provins bamot Samaria ae Galili yo da kɨlapmɨkon da kɨgɨt.
42017012	Kɨŋek kokup kɨndakon wɨgɨk do aŋakwan amɨn wuda tebani toŋ 10 kabɨ da dubagɨkon agek
42017013	gen papmon da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yesu, Amɨn Tagɨ, bupmɨ nandaŋ nibi!”
42017014	Yaŋba pɨndagek Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kɨŋ mukwa sogok amɨn gɨptɨmji yolɨni.” Yaŋ yoyɨŋban kɨŋakwa gɨptɨmni kɨlek tawit.
42017015	Kɨlek taŋakwa kɨnda da gɨptɨmno kɨlek tak yaŋ kaŋ tobɨl obɨŋek Piŋkop gen papmon da aŋkɨsigɨt.
42017016	Aŋek Yesu da kandap mibɨlon gawak ɨmɨŋek ya yaŋ iyɨgɨt. Amɨn uŋun Samaria amɨn kɨnda.
42017017	Yesu da uŋun amɨn kaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn 10 kabɨ kɨsi gɨptɨmni kɨlek taŋ, ma? Mani 9 kabɨ uŋun dukwan ekwaŋ?
42017018	Uŋun kɨsi tagɨ dɨma abɨŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsini? On amɨn mɨktɨm ŋwakŋwarɨkon nani dagɨn abɨk.”
42017019	Yaŋ yoyɨŋek amɨn uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak pɨdaŋek kɨ. Nandaŋ gadatgo do aŋek gɨptɨmgo kɨlek tak.”
42017020	Parisi amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Ni bɨsapmon Piŋkop Amɨn Kɨla Agakni yɨpban apdɨsak?” Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Agakni yɨpban apban amɨn da dabɨlni da kaŋba pɨsosak dakon tɨlak altaŋba dɨma pɨndatdaŋ.
42017021	Bo amɨn da ‘Oni obɨk’, bo ae ‘Asoni obɨk’ yaŋ dɨma yokdaŋ. Nandani, Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun jikon kɨlɨ abɨk.”
42017022	Yaŋ yaŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji don Amɨn Dakon Monji dakon bɨsap kɨnda kok do galagɨsi nandakdaŋ. Mani dɨma kokdaŋ.
42017023	-
42017024	Mal kwen binap terɨ terɨ kɨsi teŋteŋoŋ, yaŋ gɨn Amɨn Dakon Monji apdɨsak. Do amɨn da ‘Asoni egɨsak’ bo ‘Oni egɨsak’ yaŋ dayɨŋba dɨma yolni.
42017025	Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji mibɨltok tepmɨ madepsi paŋakwan abɨsok ekwaŋ amɨn da manji ɨmdaŋ.
42017026	“Noa da bɨsapmon amɨn egɨpgwit uŋudeŋ gɨn Amɨn Dakon Monji apjak bɨsapmon yaŋ gɨn aŋ egɨpdaŋ.
42017027	Jap pakbiyo madep aŋek mɨŋat pakpakyo kɨsi awit. Yaŋ aŋek egakwa Noa tap wakgakon wɨgɨgɨt. Wugakwan pakbi madepsi paptaŋ wɨŋek amɨn kɨsisi wɨtjɨŋban pasɨlgwit.
42017028	“Lot da bɨsapmon yaŋ gɨn awit. Jap pakbiyo awit, ae yumaŋ gwayek awit, ae jap pi awit, ae yut kɨsi awit.
42017029	Mani Lot da Sodom kokup yɨpmaŋ degakwan uŋudon gɨn kɨndap gat ae salfa tɨp gat kundukon da sɨkak da yaŋ maŋek amɨn morap kɨsi paŋupbal aban pasɨlgwit.
42017030	“Amɨn Dakon Monji abɨŋ noman tosak bɨsap madepmon amɨn aŋpak yaŋ gɨn aŋ egakwa apdɨsak.
42017031	Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda yut kwenon egakwan yo kabɨni yutgwan toni kaŋ, yo kabɨni tɨmɨt do yutnon dɨmasi pɨgɨsak. Ae pigaga egɨpjak amɨnyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn yutnon yo kabɨni tɨmɨt do dɨmasi tobɨl kɨsak.
42017032	Lot dakon mɨŋatnikon yo noman taŋ ɨmgwit uŋun do nandani!
42017033	Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨp aŋkutnok do nandɨsak kaŋ, egɨp egɨpni pasɨl ɨmdɨsak. Mani amɨn kɨnda egɨp egɨpni paretjak kaŋ, egɨp egɨpni kutnaŋban taŋ ɨmdɨsak.
42017034	“Nak yaŋsi dayɨsat, uŋun kalbi amɨn bamorɨ dɨpmɨn pagakwal Piŋkop da kɨnda abɨdaŋek kɨnda yɨpdɨsak.
42017035	-
42017036	Mɨŋat bamorɨ bret sok do plaua wasaŋakwal, kɨnda abɨdaŋek kɨnda yɨpdɨsak.”
42017037	Paŋdetni da gen uŋun nandaŋek iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, uŋun yo morap dukon noman toni?” Iyɨŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨmakbi dakon bumjotni dukwan toŋ, sɨŋgɨŋ uŋudon gɨn muwukgaŋ.”
42018001	Yesu da bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ bɨsit aŋek dɨma kurak toni do tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt.
42018002	“Kokup madep kɨndakon gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨn madep kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun Piŋkop do dɨma pasalgɨt. Ae amɨn do nandaban yo ɨsalɨ aŋakwa egɨpgut.
42018003	Uŋun kokupmon sakwabat kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun mɨŋat bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨn madepmon abɨŋ abɨŋ aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Uwalno gen pikon yɨpmaŋek nak aŋkutna.’
42018004	“Bɨsap morapmɨ apban gen kokwin amɨn madep da aŋpulugok do kurak tagɨt. Mani don yaŋ nandagɨt, ‘Nak Piŋkop do dɨma pasoldot ae amɨn do nandako yo ɨsalɨ aŋ.
42018005	Mani mɨŋat uŋun bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ jɨgɨ namɨsak, do yumsi aŋpulugokeŋ. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ yaŋ gɨn apjak kaŋ, tagɨsi dɨma nandakdɨsat.’ ”
42018006	Amɨn Tagɨ da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨn yokwi uŋun da gen yagɨt uŋun do nandani.
42018007	Ji niaŋ nandaŋ? Piŋkop da iyɨ do manjɨgɨt amɨn kabɨ gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ ae pɨlɨni pɨlɨni iyɨ do yaŋ tɨdoŋ, uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma bo paŋpulugosak? Bo jomjom aŋegek tepmɨ dɨma paŋpulugosak? Uŋun dɨmasi!
42018008	Yaŋsi dayɨsat, bɨsit yaŋ ani kaŋ, tepmɨsi paŋpulugokdɨsak. Mani, Amɨn Dakon Monji mɨktɨmon apjak bɨsapmon amɨn nandaŋ gadatni toŋ pɨndatjak, bo dɨma?”
42018009	Amɨn dɨwarɨ iyɨ do amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ nandaŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ do nandaba pɨwit. Yesu da uŋun amɨn do tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt.
42018010	“Amɨn bamorɨ bɨsit ak do Telagɨ Yut Madepmon wɨgɨgɨmal. Kɨnda uŋun Parisi amɨn, ae kɨnda uŋun takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn.
42018011	“Parisi amɨn uŋun agek iyɨ burɨkon da bɨsit yaŋ agɨt, ‘Piŋkop, amɨn yokwi dɨwarɨ ekwaŋ nak uŋuden amɨn dɨma, uŋun do nak ya yaŋ gayɨsat. Kabo noknok, bo yokwi pakpak, bo yumabi agak amɨn, bo ae takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn amon akdak, nak uŋuden dɨma.
42018012	Nak Sonda kɨnda da butgwan bɨsap bamot gak do nandaŋek jap kelek egɨ egɨ asat. Ae yo morap tɨmɨkdat uŋun kokwinɨkgo 10 kabɨ aŋakwa kabi kɨnda paret do yɨpmaŋ yɨpmaŋ asat.’
42018013	“Mani takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn dubagɨkon agek but yokwi nandaŋek Kwen Kokup sɨŋtok do mayak taŋek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Piŋkop, nak yokwi pakpak, do bupmɨ nandaŋ nabi!’ ”
42018014	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak yaŋsi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda iyɨ do nandaban wugɨsak kaŋ, Piŋkop da uŋun amɨn abɨŋ yɨpdɨsak. Aŋek iyɨ do nandaba paŋ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da pawɨgɨkdɨsak. Do takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn uŋun yutnikon tobɨl kɨŋek Piŋkop da dabɨlon dɨwarɨni mɨni egɨpgut. Mani Parisi amɨn uŋun dɨma.”
42018015	Amɨn da monjɨ ŋakŋak Yesu da kɨsitni kwenikon wutjɨsak do paŋopgwit. Uŋun pɨndagek paŋdetni da kɨrɨŋɨk yomgwit.
42018016	Mani Yesu da mɨŋat monjɨyo iyɨkon apni do yoyɨŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji mɨŋat monjɨyo yopba nagon apgut. Dɨma kɨrɨŋɨk yomni. Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun amɨn mɨŋat monjɨyo da tɨlagon ekwaŋ uŋuden amɨn dakon.
42018017	Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda amɨn monɨŋ da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun abɨdoŋ uŋun da tɨlak dɨma abɨdoni kaŋ, uŋungwan arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨkdaŋ.”
42018018	Kɨla amɨn kɨnda da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet tagɨsi, nak niaŋsi aŋek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokeŋ?”
42018019	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak nido nak do amɨn tagɨsi yaŋ nayɨsal? Piŋkop kaloŋɨ gɨn uŋun amɨn tagɨsi.
42018020	Gen teban uŋun gaga nandɨsal. ‘Mɨŋat eyo kɨlɨ abi ji yumabi dɨma ani. Amɨn dɨma dapba kɨmotni. Yo kabo dɨma noni. Top gen yaŋek amɨn ɨsal dogɨn gen pikon dɨma yopni. Meŋ dat do nandaba wukwanek geni guramɨtni.’ ”
42018021	Iyɨŋban kɨla amɨn da yagɨt, “Nak monɨŋɨsogon da gen teban morap uŋun kɨsi guramɨk aŋaŋ opgum.”
42018022	Gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak yo kaloŋɨsi kɨnda gɨn dɨma asal. Yo morapgo kɨsi yumaŋ naŋ mudaŋek, uŋun dakon moneŋɨ yoni mɨni amɨn do yobi. Yaŋ aŋaki yogo tagɨsi Kwen Kokupmon taŋ gamdɨsak. Yaŋ aŋek abɨŋ nak nol.”
42018023	Yaŋ iyɨŋban kɨla amɨn uŋun yoni morapmɨsi do but yokwi madepsi nandagɨt.
42018024	Yesu da amɨn uŋun kaŋek yagɨt, “Yoni morapmɨ amɨn Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun da kagagwan pɨgɨk do aŋtɨdok aŋ.
42018025	Asisi, bɨt madepsi kamel uŋun da ɨmal bupbup da kosit gwagagon arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨgɨ asak. Mani uŋun yapmaŋek yoni morapmɨ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun da kagagwan arɨpmɨ dɨmasi pɨgɨgɨ asak.”
42018026	Amɨn da gen uŋun nandaŋek yawit, “Yaŋ kaŋ, namɨn da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdosak?”
42018027	Yaŋba Yesu da yagɨt, “Yo amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma agagɨ, uŋun Piŋkop da arɨpmɨ tagɨ asak.”
42018028	Yaŋban Pita da yagɨt, “Nin yo morapnin yopmaŋek gak naŋ gol awɨlgamaŋ.”
42018029	Yaŋban Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn morap Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni dakon pi do nandaŋek yutni, bo mɨŋatni, bo peni padɨk padɨkyo, bo meŋi datni, bo ae monjɨ gwayoni yopmaŋ detjak kaŋ,
42018030	on mɨktɨmon egɨpni bɨsapmon, Piŋkop da yo morapni yopmaŋ dekgwit uŋun si yapmaŋek morapmɨsi yoban tɨmɨtdaŋ. Ae buŋon bɨsap madep noman taŋban egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokdaŋ.”
42018031	Yesu da yabekbini 12 kabɨ tɨmɨk iyɨ baŋgɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nandani. Nin Jerusalem kɨkdamaŋ. Kɨŋapno gen morap kalɨp kombɨ amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji do mandawit uŋun kɨsisi bamɨ toŋ akdaŋ.
42018032	Amɨn da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da kɨsiron yɨpba jɨgɨlagon da abɨŋ yɨpdaŋ, ae yokwi aŋɨmɨŋek ɨlɨp sul ɨmdaŋ.
42018033	Yaŋ aŋek nap naŋ baljaŋek aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak. Mani gɨldat kapbɨ mudaŋakwa aeni kɨmoron da pɨdokdɨsak.”
42018034	Paŋdetni gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaba pɨsawit. Mibɨlɨ pasɨlɨ tagɨt, do gen uŋun mibɨlɨ nido yosok uŋun dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt.
42018035	Yesu Jeriko kokup pap kɨŋ aŋkapmat aŋakwan dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn kɨnda da kosit ɨleŋon yɨgek amɨn da moneŋ ɨmni do bɨsit yoyɨgɨt.
42018036	Uŋun amɨn nandaban amɨn morapmɨ obɨŋ yapmaŋ kɨŋakwa nandaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nibaŋ aŋ?”
42018037	Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Yesu Nasaret amɨn da obɨgɨsak.”
42018038	Iyɨŋba yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yesu, Dewit Dakon Monji, bupmɨ nandaŋ nam!”
42018039	Amɨn mibɨltok opgwit uŋun da kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmɨŋek tayaŋgok yɨtjak do tebai iyɨwit. Mani tebai sigɨn yaŋ tɨdaŋek yagɨt, “Dewit Dakon Monji, bupmɨ nandaŋ nam!”
42018040	Yaŋban Yesu agek amɨn uŋun abɨdaŋ aŋopni do yoyɨgɨt. Yoyɨŋban kapmat aŋapba Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
42018041	“Niaŋsi aŋgabeŋ do nandɨsal?” Iyɨŋban yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nak sɨŋtok do nandɨsat.”
42018042	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Dabɨlgo kɨlek tosak. Nandaŋ gadatgo da aŋmɨlɨp asak.”
42018043	Iyɨŋban uŋudon gɨn dabɨlɨ kɨlek taŋban Yesu yolek Piŋkop aŋkɨsigɨt. Yaŋ aban mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi da kaŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiwit.
42019001	Yesu uŋun Jeriko kokup pap wɨgɨ yapmaŋek kɨk do agɨt.
42019002	Uŋun kokupmon amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut mani Sakius. Sakius uŋun takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn dakon amɨn madep kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun yoni morapmɨ amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut.
42019003	Yesu uŋun niaŋen amɨn kɨnda yaŋ kok do pi tebai agɨt. Mani Sakius uŋun amɨn pɨsɨpmɨ, ae amɨn morapmɨ da muwugek kosit sopgwit, do Yesu kok do aŋtɨdok agɨt.
42019004	Aŋtɨdok agɨt do Sakius uŋun tɨmtɨm yaŋek mibɨltaŋ kɨŋ pik kɨndap kɨndakon wɨgɨgɨt. Yesu uŋun onaŋ abɨsak do tagɨ kokeŋ yaŋon da nandaŋek wɨgɨgɨt.
42019005	Wɨgakwan Yesu uŋun pik kɨndap akgɨron abɨŋ kwen sɨŋtaŋek Sakius kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Sakius, gak tepmɨ pɨ. Nak abɨsok gak da yutnon paŋkɨ yɨtdeŋ dosi nandɨsat.”
42019006	Yaŋ yaŋban Sakius da tepmɨ pɨŋ but galak nandaŋek Yesu abɨdaŋban yutnikon wɨgɨgɨmal.
42019007	Wɨgakwal pɨndagek amɨn da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ yawit, “Uŋun yokwi pakpak amɨn kɨnda da yutnon wɨgɨk.”
42019008	Yaŋ yaŋakwa Sakius pɨdaŋ agek Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nandaki. Nak abɨsok yo kabɨ morapno kokwinɨk kabi bamorɨ aŋakwa kabi kɨnda yoni mɨni amɨn do yobeŋ. Ae amɨn kɨnda aŋkewalek yo kabɨni dɨ tɨmɨkgɨm kaŋ, uŋun dakon kobogɨ do yo tɨmɨkgɨm uŋun do yo 4 kabɨ gat saŋbeŋek yomɨŋ yomɨŋ abeŋ.”
42019009	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “On amɨn kɨsi uŋun Abraham dakon monji kɨnda. Abɨsok Piŋkop da on yut amɨn kɨsi yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨk mudosok.
42019010	Nido Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun amɨn pasɨlbi yokwikon baŋ wɨsɨŋek tɨmɨt do pɨgɨt.”
42019011	Gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋ egakwa Yesu tɨlak gen kɨnda yoyɨgɨt. Yesu uŋun Jerusalem kɨlɨ kɨŋ aŋkapmat agɨt, ae amɨn da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Akdɨsak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun kwaŋ tokdɨsak yaŋ nandawit do
42019012	yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ kɨnda kɨla amɨn madep man paŋek tobɨl abɨŋ don amɨn kabɨni kɨla asak do kokup dubagɨ kɨndakon kɨk do agɨt.
42019013	Amɨn uŋun kokup yɨp do aŋek oman monjɨni 10 kabɨ yaŋ yoban apba gol moneŋ tabɨlɨ kɨnda kaloŋ kaloŋ do yomɨŋ yomɨŋ agɨt. Yaŋ aŋek yoyɨgɨt, ‘Ji moneŋ uŋun baŋ moneŋ ɨlɨt pi aŋakwa tobɨl apbeŋ bɨsapmon uŋudon wɨgɨsak.’
42019014	“Mani kokup ɨsalni da nandaba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmgwit. Yaŋ nandawit do amɨn tagɨ uŋun kɨŋakwan kokup amɨn dɨ yabekba kɨŋ yawit, ‘Nin uŋun amɨn da kɨla amɨn madepnin egɨpjak do dɨma galak tomaŋ.’
42019015	“Mani kɨla amɨn madep man ɨba don tobɨl kokupnikon apgut. Kokupnikon abɨŋek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Moneŋ kokwinɨk yomgum oman monjɨ uŋun yaŋ yoba apba moneŋ ɨlɨt pi aba niaŋ da noman tawit uŋun do pɨndakgeŋ.’
42019016	“Yaŋban kɨnda da mibɨltok abɨŋek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, nak gol moneŋ tabɨlgo uŋun naŋ moneŋ ɨlɨt pi abo tabɨlɨ 10 kabɨ noman tawit.’
42019017	“Yaŋban amɨn madep uŋun da iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak oman monjɨ tagɨsi! Pi tagɨsi agɨl! Yo monɨŋɨsok mani kɨlani tagɨsi agɨl, do kokup pap 10 kabɨ kɨlani abi do man madep gamɨsat.’
42019018	“Ae oman monjɨ uŋun da buŋon nani da abɨŋ yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, nak gol moneŋ tabɨlgo uŋun naŋ moneŋ ɨlɨt pi abo tabɨl 5 kabɨ noman tawit.’
42019019	“Yaŋban amɨn tagɨni da yagɨt, ‘Kokup pap 5 kabɨ kɨla aki do man madep gamɨsat.’
42019020	-
42019021	“Ae kɨnda da abɨŋ yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, gol moneŋ tabɨlgo oni. Gak teban teban amɨn kɨnda yaŋ gandɨsat. Yo amɨn da yopmaŋgaŋ uŋun gak da sɨgo tɨmɨkdal. Ae jap amɨn da kwaokgaŋ uŋun yo kɨsi sɨgo pasal. Yaŋ asal do pasalek ɨmal dɨwatjok kɨndakon wamaŋ yɨpbo tagɨt.’
42019022	“Yaŋban amɨn tagɨ da oman monjɨ uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak oman monjɨ wagɨl yokwisi! Gaga gen yosol uŋun dogɨn gen pikon gepbeŋ. Nak teban teban amɨn kɨnda ae amɨn da yo yopmaŋgaŋ tɨmɨkdat, ae jap amɨn da kwaokgaŋ uŋun pɨlɨkdat yaŋ nandaŋ namɨsal.
42019023	Gak mibɨlɨ nido moneŋno beŋon dɨma yopgul? Beŋon yopgul tam beŋ da dɨwarɨ saŋbeŋ namɨŋakwan abɨŋ uŋun kɨsi tɨmɨkgom?’
42019024	Yaŋ iyɨŋek amɨn kapmatjok akgwit uŋun yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Gol moneŋ tabɨl uŋun gwayeŋ amɨn moneŋ tabɨlni 10 kabɨ taŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun do ɨmni.’
42019025	“Yaŋ yaŋban iyɨwit, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, uŋun amɨn moneŋ tabɨlni 10 kabɨ kɨlɨ tɨmak!’
42019026	“Yaŋba yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nandani. Amɨn morap yoni taŋ yomaŋ uŋun saŋbeŋek morapmɨ yomdɨsat. Mani amɨn kɨnda yoni mɨni kaŋ, yo kaloŋgok dɨ taŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun gwayekdɨsat.
42019027	Mani uwalno nak da kɨla amɨn madepni dɨma egɨ yobeŋ do nandawit, uŋun tɨmɨk ɨdon paŋabɨŋ dabɨlnokon dapba kɨmotni.’ ”
42019028	Yesu tɨlak gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋek aeni Jerusalem wɨgɨk do kosit wasagɨt.
42019029	Yesu kɨŋ Betpage ae Betani paŋkapmat agɨt. Uŋun kokup bamot Ɨleŋ Olipmon tomal. Uŋudon da paŋdetni bamorɨ yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
42019030	“Jil ason kokup tosok uŋudon kɨnjil. Uŋudon kɨŋ kaŋbal donki bɨlagɨ kɨnda amɨn da kwenikon dɨma yɨkbi uŋun napmon aŋteban abi da akban konjil. Napmɨ wɨtdalek aŋopjil.
42019031	Amɨn kɨnda da ‘Donki nido wɨtdalgamal?’ yaŋ dayɨŋban kaŋ, yaŋ iyɨnjil, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ da pisok kɨnda ak do aŋek yosok.’ ”
42019032	Amɨn bamot yabekban kɨŋ pɨndakbal gen yoyɨgɨt da arɨpmon yaŋ gɨn noman tawit.
42019033	Aba donki bɨlagɨ uŋun wɨtdalakwal donki uŋun dakon ami da yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Donki bɨlagɨ uŋun nido wɨtdalgamal?”
42019034	Yaŋba yoyɨgɨmal, “Amɨn Tagɨ da pisok kɨnda ak do aŋek yosok.”
42019035	Amɨn bamot donki bɨlagɨ uŋun aŋobɨŋek ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk dubakni donki kwenon yopmaŋek Yesu yɨpba uŋun kwenon yɨkgɨt.
42019036	Donkikon yɨgek kɨŋakwan amɨn da ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk dubakni kosiron yalɨŋ aŋaŋ kɨwit.
42019037	Aŋakwa Yesu abɨŋ Ɨleŋ Olip dakon kosit obandom naŋ pukwaŋ uŋun aŋkapmat aŋakwan paŋdet kabɨni madepsi da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ morap aban pɨndakgwit uŋun do nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi awit. Yaŋ aŋek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiwit.
42019038	Yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit: “Kɨla Amɨn Madep on Amɨn Tagɨ da manon abɨsak, uŋun Piŋkop da gɨsamɨgakwan abɨsak. Kwen Kokupmon but yawot tosak. Piŋkop Wɨkwisi aŋkɨsino!”
42019039	Yaŋakwa amɨn madep uŋun da bɨkbɨgon Parisi amɨn dɨ akgwit uŋun da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, paŋdetgoni kɨrɨŋɨk yom.”
42019040	Iyɨŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nandani. Gen kagani sopni kaŋ, tɨp da iyɨ yaŋ tɨdokdaŋ.”
42019041	Yesu Jerusalem aŋkapmat aŋek kokup pap uŋun kaŋek kunam tagek
42019042	yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak abɨsok but yawot dakon kosit kosol tam tagɨsi, mani uŋun pasɨlɨ taŋakwan dabɨlgo da arɨpmɨ dɨma kokdɨsal.
42019043	Nandaki. Don bɨsap kɨnda noman tokdɨsak. Uŋun bɨsapmon uwalgo da gak aŋgwasɨŋek mɨktɨm paŋabɨŋ dam madepgokon yopba tugaŋ wɨgɨkdaŋ. Aŋakwa terɨ terɨ da abɨŋ paŋdagat akdaŋ.
42019044	Aŋek gak gat ae mɨŋat amɨn gak da dam madepgwan ekwaŋ uŋun kɨsi wagɨlsi tuwɨl paŋtasɨk akdaŋ. Tuwɨlba tɨp notni da kwenon dɨma taŋ taŋ akdaŋ. Nido Piŋkop gagon kɨlɨ abɨk, mani butgo dɨma pɨsak.”
42019045	Yesu Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalon pɨgɨ amɨn moneŋ ɨlɨt pi awit uŋun wasaŋek yolakwan abɨgɨwit.
42019046	Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Nak dakon yut uŋun amɨn da abɨŋ bɨsit aŋnamni do tosok.’ Mani ji da kulabɨk aba ‘kabo noknok dakon pasɨlɨ tamo yombem asak.’ ”
42019047	Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ Telagɨ Yut Madepmon amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt. Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep gat, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat, ae amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn gat da Yesu niaŋ aŋek aŋatno kɨmotjak yaŋ do kosit wɨsɨwit.
42019048	Mani mɨŋat amɨn morapyo da geni nandak do galagɨ madepsi nandawit, do aŋakba kɨmotjak dakon kosit kɨnda dɨma kawit.
42020001	Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu da amɨn Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan yoyɨŋdet aŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat, ae kɨla amɨn gat kɨsi da Yesukon abɨŋ
42020002	yaŋ iyɨwit, “Namɨn da pi uŋun abi do yaŋ mudaŋ gamgut da yo uŋun asal? Ae namɨn da man madep gamgut?”
42020003	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nakyo kɨsi gen kɨnda dayɨko kobogɨ nayɨni.
42020004	Jon telagɨ pakbi sogɨt bɨsapmon, pi agɨt uŋun Kwen Kokup dakon pi, bo amɨn dakon pi naŋ agɨt?”
42020005	Yaŋban iyɨ gɨn notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yawit, “ ‘Kwen Kokup dakon pi’ yaŋ iyɨneŋ kaŋ, gen kobogɨ yaŋ niyɨkdɨsak, ‘Yaŋ kaŋ ji nido dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit?’
42020006	Mani amɨn morapmɨ da Jon do kombɨ amɨn bamɨsi kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋ, do ‘Amɨn dakon pi’ yaŋ iyɨneŋ kaŋ, uŋun kɨsi tagɨ dɨma asak. Yaŋ kaŋ Jon dakon man bin aŋupbal ano mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep da tɨp baŋ nindapdaŋ.”
42020007	Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu do gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin dɨma nandamaŋ.”
42020008	Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Nakyo kɨsi namɨn da yaŋ mudaŋ namgut da pi asat uŋun dɨma dayɨkeŋ.”
42020009	Yesu da saŋbeŋek tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da wain pini aŋek amɨn da moneŋ pini dɨ aŋek pi ami do bamɨ dɨ paŋ ɨmni yaŋ nandaŋek pi uŋun da kɨsiron yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm tɨmɨ dɨgwan bɨsap dubagɨ egɨp do kɨgɨt.
42020010	Kɨŋ egɨ don wain sop pakpak bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan oman monjɨ kɨnda yabekban wain bamɨ tɨmɨk paŋopjak do kɨgɨt. Mani pi kɨla awit amɨn da oman monjɨ obɨsi aŋagek bamɨ dɨ dɨma ɨmɨŋek yolba kɨgɨt.
42020011	Yaŋ aba pi ami da aeni oman monjɨ kɨnda yabekgɨt. Mani uŋun pi monjɨ kɨsi obɨsi aŋagek yo yokwisi aŋ ɨmɨŋek bamɨ dɨ dɨma ɨmɨŋek yɨpba kɨgɨt.
42020012	Yaŋ aba kɨnda gat yabekban kwan madepsi aŋagek maba wain pi da waŋga pɨgɨgɨt.
42020013	“Yaŋ aba wain pi dakon ami da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak niaŋsi abeŋ? Nak monjino but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat uŋun naŋ yabekgo kwan nandaba wukwan ɨmni bo.’
42020014	“Mani pi kɨla amɨn da monjɨ kaŋek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, ‘Amɨn on da egɨ don datni dakon yo morap tɨmɨtdɨsak, do amɨn on aŋagek wain pini nin do aŋawatneŋ.’
42020015	Yaŋ yaŋek monjɨ uŋun abɨdaŋ maba waŋga pɨgakwan aŋakba kɨmakgɨt. “Ji niaŋ nandaŋ? Don pi dakon ami da abɨŋ pi kɨla amɨn niaŋsi aŋyomdɨsak?
42020016	Pi ami da abɨŋ uŋun pi kɨla amɨn dapban kɨmotdaŋ. Dapban kɨmagakwa wain pi uŋun amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ da kɨsiron yɨpdɨsak.” Yaŋban nandaŋek amɨn da yaŋ yawit, “Uŋun dɨmasi agagɨ!”
42020017	Yaŋba Yesu da amɨn pɨndagek yoyɨgɨt, “Yaŋ kaŋ Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ niaŋ? Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Yut agak amɨn da gwak yokwi yaŋ yaŋek maba kɨgɨt, uŋun gwak yut kodɨgɨkon tɨp kɨnda naŋ tɨdawit da akdak.’
42020018	Amɨn morap gwak kwenon da maŋ dapba bɨsal kɨkdaŋ, ae gwak da amɨn morap da kwenon mosak uŋun wagɨl bɨsal kɨ mudokdaŋ.”
42020019	Yesu da tɨlak gen uŋun yaŋban gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat ae mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat da nin pabɨŋ nip do aŋek yosok yaŋ nandawit. Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu uŋudon gɨn abɨdokdosi nandawit, mani mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep uŋun do si pasalgwit.
42020020	Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da Yesu aŋman ak do pi madep awit. Yaŋ aŋek amɨn dɨ yabekba abɨŋ Yesu aŋman awit. Uŋun amɨn topmon da Yesu dakon gen nandaŋ galak tawit. Suŋ kɨnda yaŋban abɨdaŋ gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn madepmon yɨpno gen pikon yɨpjak yaŋ do aŋkewal do awit.
42020021	Aŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, gen yosol ae yoyɨŋdet asal uŋun kɨlegɨsi asal yaŋ nandaŋ gadamaŋ. Amɨn mani toŋ ae mani mɨni uŋun kɨsi gen bamɨsikon da Piŋkop dakon aŋpak yoyɨŋ dekdal.
42020022	Do, niaŋ nandɨsal, Sisa do takis ɨmno tagɨ asak, bo dɨma?”
42020023	Yaŋba Yesu da niaŋon da aŋkewal do awit uŋun pɨndak mudaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
42020024	“Moneŋ tabɨlɨ kɨnda nolɨŋba koko. On wup gat ae man mandabi gat uŋun namɨn dakon?” Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Sisa dakon.”
42020025	Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Yo Sisa dakon uŋun Sisa iyɨ do ɨmdo, ae yo Piŋkop dakon uŋun Piŋkop iyɨ do ɨmdo.”
42020026	Yaŋban mɨŋat amɨn morapyo da dabɨlon Yesu aŋkewalno suŋ kɨnda yaŋban abɨdoneŋ yaŋ dakon kosit kɨnda dɨma kawit. Geni kobogɨ yoyɨgɨt do nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi aban tayaŋgok akgwit.
42020027	Sadyusi amɨn kabɨ dɨ Yesukon apgwit. (Sadyusi amɨn uŋun amɨn kɨmakbi arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨdoni yaŋ nandaŋ.)
42020028	Uŋun da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, Moses da gen kɨnda yaŋ mandagɨt: Amɨn kɨnda monjɨ mɨni da kɨmotjak kaŋ, sakwabatni padɨge da paban monjɨ paŋalanjil. Yaŋ aban peni dɨwatni toŋ da egɨpni.
42020029	“Kalɨp peni padɨgeyo 7 kabɨ egɨpgwit. Peni mibɨltok amɨn mɨŋat paŋek monjɨ mɨni da kɨmakgɨt.
42020030	Yaŋ aban uŋun da buŋon nani da kwabatni uŋun paŋek monjɨ mɨni da kɨmakgɨt.
42020031	Kɨmagakwan ae kɨnda da pagɨt. Peni padɨgeyo 7 kabɨ kɨsi da paŋek monjɨ mɨni egek kɨmakgwit.
42020032	Ae don mɨŋat uŋun kɨsi kɨmakgɨt.
42020033	Wɨli 7 kabɨ kɨsi da pawit, do pɨdot pɨdot bɨsap madepmon namɨn dakon mɨŋatni asak?”
42020034	Yaŋba Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn mɨktɨmon ekwaŋ uŋun mɨŋat eyo aŋek ekwaŋ.
42020035	Mani amɨn kɨmoron da pɨdaŋek egɨp egɨpmon tagɨ egɨpni do kokwinɨkbi kabɨ uŋun bɨsapmon mɨŋat eyo dɨma akdaŋ.
42020036	Uŋun aŋelo da yaŋ egɨpdaŋ, do ae kɨnda gat arɨpmɨ dɨma kɨmotni. Uŋun kɨmoron da pɨdokdaŋ, do Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat monjɨyo egɨpdaŋ.
42020037	“Moses da kɨndap wal monɨŋgok sogɨt uŋun do gen mandagɨt uŋun manjɨŋek asisi nandamaŋ, amɨn kɨmoron da pɨdokdaŋ. Moses da Amɨn Tagɨ do yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Uŋun Abraham, Aisak, ae Jekop dakon Piŋkop.’
42020038	Piŋkop da amɨn kɨsi morap pɨndakban egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ ekwaŋ, do Piŋkop uŋun amɨn kɨmakbi dakon Piŋkop dɨma, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ dakon Piŋkop.”
42020039	Yaŋban gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn dɨwarɨ da nandaŋek iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, gen tagɨsi yosol.”
42020040	Amɨn da Yesu gen kɨnda gat saŋbeŋek iyɨk do pasalgwit.
42020041	Mani Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn mibɨlɨ nido Kristo uŋun Dewit dakon monji yaŋ yoŋ?
42020042	Dewit da iyɨ Kap Papiakon gen yaŋ mandagɨt: ‘Amɨn Tagɨ da nak dakon Amɨn Tagɨno yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak abɨŋ nak da amɨnsi tet do yɨkbɨ
42020043	don uwalgo kandap mibɨlgogwan yopbo gengo guramɨtdaŋ.” ’
42020044	Dewit da Kristo uŋun Amɨn Tagɨno yaŋ iyɨgɨt. Do niaŋon da Kristo uŋun Dewit dakon monji egɨsak?”
42020045	Amɨn kɨsisi mɨrak paŋ egakwa Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
42020046	“Ji gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn do pɨndak kɨmotni. Uŋun ɨmal dubagɨ baŋ paŋek agɨp do galak toŋ. Ae yumaŋ gwayek tamokon amɨn da gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ yoyɨni do galagɨ nandaŋ. Ae muwut muwut yutnon tamo tagɨsikon yɨt do galak toŋ. Ae jap noknok bɨsap madepmon tamo amɨn mani toŋ do tɨlak abi uŋudon yɨt do galak toŋ.
42020047	Uŋun amɨn sakwabat paŋkewalek yutni tɨmɨkgaŋ. Ae amɨn da pɨndatni yaŋ do bɨsit dubagɨsi aŋ. Uŋuden amɨn gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon kobogɨ do yo jɨgɨsi pakdaŋ.”
42021001	Yesu pɨndak egakwan yoni morapmɨ amɨn Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon paret ɨdapmon paretni yopgwit.
42021002	Ae kaŋakwan sakwabat kɨnda uŋun yoni mɨni, uŋun da moneŋ gɨmanjok bamorɨ paret ɨdapmon yopgut.
42021003	Aban Yesu da yagɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, sakwabat yoni mɨni on da amɨn morap da paret yopmaŋ uŋun yapmaŋek moneŋ madepsi yopmaŋdak.
42021004	Amɨn morap uŋun moneŋni morapmɨ taŋ yomaŋakwa dɨwarɨ gɨn paret ɨdapmon yopmaŋ. Mani on mɨŋat wadak wadaksi aŋek moneŋni kɨsi yopmaŋdak. Kɨlɨ jap yumaŋ nosak moneŋni dɨ dɨma taŋ ɨmaŋ.”
42021005	Paŋdetni dɨwarɨ da Telagɨ Yut Madep kaŋek yawit, “Amɨn da tɨp kɨldani toŋ tagɨsi gat, ae yo dɨwarɨ yo kɨldani tagɨsi Piŋkop do paret awit uŋun baŋ aŋtɨlɨm awit.” Yaŋba Yesu da yagɨt,
42021006	“Yo on pɨndakgaŋ uŋun bɨsap kɨnda apdɨsak uŋun bɨsapmon uŋun dakon tɨp notni kwenon dɨma taŋ taŋ akdaŋ. Tuwɨlba kɨsisi maŋ mudokdaŋ.”
42021007	Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, yo uŋun ni bɨsapmonsi altokdaŋ? Ni tɨlak da mibɨltok altaŋakwan kaŋek yo kɨlɨ uŋun altokdaŋ yaŋ nandaneŋ?”
42021008	Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn da paŋkewalni do kaŋ kɨmotni. Amɨn morapmɨ da nak da manon abɨŋek ‘Nak uŋun amɨn’, ae ‘Bɨsap madep kɨlɨ kwaŋ tosok’ yaŋ yokdaŋ. Mani uŋun amɨn dɨma yolni.
42021009	Amɨn morapmɨ emat aŋ, bo gapman gat emat aŋ, uŋun dakon geni apba nandaŋ kaŋ dɨma pasolni. Yo uŋun da mibɨltok altokdaŋ. Mani mibɨ bɨsap madep uŋudon gɨn dɨma altokdɨsak.”
42021010	Sigɨn saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn da pɨdaŋba mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn gat emat wamdaŋ. Ae kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda dakon amɨn da pɨdaŋba kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda dakon amɨn gat emat wamdaŋ.
42021011	Wudɨp madepsi akdaŋ, ae mɨktɨm dɨkon amɨn da jap do madepsi aŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ da kɨmotdaŋ, ae amɨn morapmɨsi sot akdaŋ. Ae kundukon tɨlak masɨ masɨmɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ altaŋakwa pɨndagek pasal nɨmnɨmɨkyo akdaŋ.
42021012	“Mani uŋun yo morap dɨma noman taŋakwa amɨn da ji tɨmɨk yo yokwisi aŋdamdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon gen yaŋ damɨŋek dam tebanon depdaŋ. Ae nak dakon man abɨŋ yɨp do aŋek ji tɨmɨk paŋkɨ depba kɨla amɨn madep gat ae gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat da ɨŋamon atdaŋ.
42021013	Uŋun bɨsapmon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋoni dakon bɨkbɨk pɨsaŋ damdɨsak.
42021014	-
42021015	Nak da naga gen dulumji paŋtagap aŋek nandak nandak tagɨsi damdɨsat. Dabo amɨn gen yaŋ damni uŋun da gen yoni uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma pabɨŋ depni. Do ji dɨsi kutnok do aŋek ni gen baŋ paŋtobɨl yomneŋ yaŋ do nandaba kɨk dɨma ani.
42021016	Meŋji datji, ae padɨk padɨkji, ae yawi dɨwatji, ae notji uŋunyo kɨsi da ji uwal da kɨsiron depba ji kabɨkon dɨ si dɨkba kɨmotdaŋ.
42021017	Nak dakon man jikon tosok do aŋek amɨn kɨsi da nandaba yokwi tok madepsi aŋdamdaŋ.
42021018	Mani busuŋ daŋgwanji kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma tasɨk tokdɨsak.
42021019	Ji tebai agek egɨp egɨp bamɨsi abɨdoni.”
42021020	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji pɨndakba emat amɨn da abɨŋ Jerusalem aŋgwasɨŋek akba kaŋ, yaŋ nandani, kokup pap wagɨl tasɨk tosak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun abɨsak.
42021021	Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn Judia mɨktɨmon egɨpni uŋun pasal kabapgwan tepmɨsi wugɨni. Amɨn Jerusalem egɨpni uŋun wɨŋ waŋga kɨni. Ae amɨn kokup pap da waŋga egɨpni ae tobɨl kokup papgwan dɨma pɨgɨni.
42021022	Uŋun bɨsap uŋun Piŋkop da amɨn do kobogɨ yokwisi yomdɨsak dakon bɨsap. Yaŋ aban gen mandabi uŋun kɨsi bamɨ toŋ akdaŋ.
42021023	Uŋun bɨsapmon jɨgɨ madepsi Juda mɨktɨmon noman taŋakwan Piŋkop dakon butjap amɨn da kwenon mokdɨsak. Do mɨŋat monjɨ kwapni toŋ, ae mɨŋat monjɨ mum noŋ uŋun bupmɨsi.
42021024	Uwal da abɨŋ amɨn dɨwarɨ emat agak sɨbabaŋ dapba kɨmotdaŋ. Ae dɨwarɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ paŋkɨ yopba oman amɨni do egɨpdaŋ. Aŋakwa Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da Jerusalem bamaŋ ɨktagɨldaŋ. Uŋun amɨn da Jerusalem kɨlani aŋakwa Piŋkop da bɨsap yɨpgut uŋun mudosak.”
42021025	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Uŋun bɨsapmon tɨlak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gɨldat dabɨlon, ae kanegon, ae gɨgon noman tokdaŋ. Aŋakwa mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morapmɨ nandaŋakwa tap da madepsi tamalɨgakwan pasol pasol madepsi aŋek butni tagɨ dɨma tokdɨsak.
42021026	Kwen kundukon yo tebai toŋ uŋun da kwakwalɨtdaŋ, do amɨn morapmɨ da jɨgɨ morap mɨktɨmon noman tokdɨsak do nandaba kɨk aŋek pasol pasol madepsi aŋek ɨŋam kɨmot akdaŋ.
42021027	Uŋun bɨsapmon kaŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji gɨkwemon da tapmɨmni gat tɨlɨm madepni gat apdɨsak.
42021028	Yo morap uŋun wasaŋek altoni bɨsapmon Piŋkop da ji tɨmɨtjak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun kwaŋ tosok, do ji pɨdaŋ agek busuŋji kwen gwaŋ pɨdaŋ mudoni.”
42021029	Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yoyɨŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji pik kɨndap ae kɨndap morap kɨsi do pɨndatni.
42021030	Tamɨ kaluk apmeŋon yopmaŋakwa pɨndagek gɨldat bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun abɨsak yaŋ nandaŋ.
42021031	Uŋudeŋ gɨn yo morap dayɨt uŋun da altaŋakwa Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Akdɨsak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ kwaŋ tosok yaŋsi nandani.
42021032	“Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn uŋun bɨsapmon nani dɨma kɨmagakwa yo morap uŋun kɨsi altaŋ mudokdaŋ.
