42021033	Kundu gat mɨktɨm gat pasɨldamal, mani nak dakon gen uŋun dɨmasi pasɨldɨsak.”
42021034	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Bɨsap morapmɨ pakbi teban naŋek but upbal dɨ abam. Ae on mɨktɨm dakon yo do nandaba kɨk dɨ abam. Uŋuden da ji pabɨŋ depjak kaŋ, uŋun bɨsap madep da but pɨso mɨni paron yaŋ depban yokwaldaŋ.
42021035	Mɨŋat amɨn morapyo mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun bɨsap madep altaŋban kokdaŋ.
42021036	Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kalugɨsi egek Piŋkop da tapmɨm daban yo morap uŋun altokdaŋ uŋun tagɨ yapni, ae Amɨn Dakon Monji da ɨŋamon tagɨ atni yaŋ do bɨsit pi ani.”
42021037	Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ Yesu da amɨn Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan yoyɨŋ dekgɨt. Aŋek kalbi Ɨleŋ Olipmon yut kɨndakon paŋkɨ pak pak agɨt.
42021038	Aŋakwan amɨn kɨsi da wɨsa dagokdosi pɨdaŋ Telagɨ Yut Madepmon geni nandak do kɨŋ kɨŋ awit.
42022001	Bret Yisni Mɨni dakon bɨsap madep uŋun kwaŋ tagɨt. Uŋun bɨsap do Yapyap Bɨlak yaŋ yoŋ.
42022002	Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep uŋun do pasalgwit, do Yesu niaŋon da abɨdaŋek aŋatno kɨmotjak uŋun do nandak nandak awit.
42022003	Aŋakwa Sunduk Judas da buron pɨgɨgɨt. (Mani kɨnda Iskariot yaŋ iyɨwit. Uŋun paŋdetni 12 kabɨkon nani kɨnda.)
42022004	Judas kwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon obip amɨn uŋun dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat gen yawit. Niaŋon da Yesu kɨsitnikon yɨpjak yaŋ do yaŋ nandat awit.
42022005	Aŋek but galak nandaŋek moneŋ dɨ tagɨ gamneŋ yaŋ iyɨwit.
42022006	Judas gen iyɨwit uŋun nandaban tagɨ aŋakwan Yesu abɨdaŋ kɨsitnikon yɨp do kosit wusɨk agɨt. Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu amɨn morapmɨ gat dɨma egakwa uŋudon uwal da kɨsiron yɨpbeŋ yaŋ do jomjom agɨt.
42022007	Uŋun bɨsapmon Bret Yisni Mɨni dakon bɨlak bɨsap madep noman tagɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon Yapyap Bɨlak do sipsip bulagɨ baŋ dapmaŋgaŋ.
42022008	Do Yesu da Pita gat Jon gat yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil kɨŋ Yapyap Bɨlak uŋun dakon jap paŋkosit abal noneŋ.”
42022009	Yaŋban iyɨgɨmal, “Kɨŋ dukwan paŋkosit andeŋ do nandɨsal?”
42022010	Yaŋbal yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil kɨŋ kokup papmon pɨgakwal amɨn kɨnda pakbi kwoba kɨnda guramɨk apban jil gat domdom akdaŋ. Uŋun amɨn da yut wɨgɨsagon jil uŋudon yol aŋaŋ wɨgɨnjil.
42022011	Wɨgɨ yut uŋun dakon ami yaŋ iyɨnjil, ‘Yoyɨŋdet da yaŋ yosok, “Nak gat paŋdetnoni gat da Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap noneŋ dakon yut burɨ dukwan tosok?” ’
42022012	Yaŋ iyɨŋbal yut burɨ madep kwen nani do dolɨkdɨsak. Uŋudon jap noknok tamo gat ae amɨn yɨtyɨt tamo gat kɨsi toŋ. Uŋudon jap paŋkosit anjil.”
42022013	Yesu da gen yoyɨgɨt da arɨpmon yaŋ gɨn pɨndakgɨmal. Yaŋ pɨndagek Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap paŋkosit agɨmal.
42022014	Jap noknok bɨsap aŋakwan Yesu jap noknok tamokon yabekbi kabɨni gat kɨsi yɨkgwit.
42022015	Yɨgek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak tepmɨ dɨma paŋek ji gat on Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap noneŋ uŋun do tagɨsi kɨlɨ nandagɨm da sigɨn nandaŋ egɨsat.
42022016	Nak yaŋ dayɨsat, jap on ae dɨma nokeŋ. Yaŋ aŋapbo wɨgɨ on jap dakon mibɨlɨsi Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak kagagwan bamɨ don noman tokdɨsak.”
42022017	-
42022018	Yaŋ yaŋek wain kɨnam abɨdaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek yagɨt, “Nak yaŋ dayɨsat, nak wain ae dɨma naŋek egɨ wɨgɨ Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asagon don nokeŋ. Do abɨdaŋek dɨsi kokwin aŋek noni.”
42022019	Ae bret abɨdaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek bret uŋun paŋdagaŋ yomɨŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “On nak dakon gɨptɨm tɨmno ji do parekdat. On naŋek nak do nandaŋek egɨpni.”
42022020	Naŋakwa ae wain kɨnam abɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Wain kɨnam on nak da ji gat saŋbek saŋbek kalugɨ asat uŋun dakon tɨlak. Nak yawino naŋ ji do tagaldat.
42022021	Mani uwal da kɨsiron nepjak amɨn nak gat kɨsi tamokon oni yɨkgamak.
42022022	Amɨn Dakon Monji niaŋon da kɨmotdɨsak do yaŋbi uŋun da tɨlak kɨmotdɨsak. Mani uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak amɨn, awa!”
42022023	Paŋdetni gen uŋun nandaŋek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yawit, “Nin kabɨkon da namɨn dasi akdɨsak?”
42022024	Paŋdetni da namɨn dasi mibɨltok amɨnin egɨsak yaŋ do gen emat awit.
42022025	Aba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ dakon kɨla amɨn madepni uŋun man madepni toŋ, do iyɨ do nandaba wukwanek gen tebai yaŋek amɨn kabɨni kɨla aŋ. Aŋek ‘Nin amɨn dakon paŋpulugokni ekwamaŋ’ yaŋ topmon da yoŋ.
42022026	Mani ji yaŋ dɨma egɨpni. Amɨn kɨnda jikon man madepni toŋ, uŋun amɨn monjɨ kɨnda buŋonsi altagɨt uŋun da tɨlagon egɨpjak. Ae kɨla amɨnji da oman monjɨ da tɨlak egɨpjak.
42022027	Nandani. Jap nosok amɨn da mibɨltok amɨn bo jap pɨlɨkdak amɨn da mibɨltok amɨn? Jap naŋek yɨkdak amɨn uŋun da mibɨltok amɨn asak. Mani nak ji da binapmon oman monjɨsi egɨsat.
42022028	Paŋkewal altaŋ namgwit bɨsapmon ji nak dɨma nepmaŋ dekgwit. Nak gat kɨsi egɨpgumaŋ.
42022029	Datno da nak kɨla amɨn madep egɨpbeŋ do yaŋ mudaŋ namgut, yaŋ gɨn nak da ji kɨla amɨn madep pi ani do yaŋ mudaŋ damɨsat.
42022030	Do nak kɨla amɨn madep egɨpbeŋ bɨsapmon ji jap noknok tamonokon yɨgek jap pakbiyo akdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek kɨla amɨn madep yɨyɨt tamokon yɨgek Israel amɨn 12 kabɨ gen kokwin pi aŋ yomdaŋ.”
42022031	Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Saimon, nandaki. Wit dakon sɨbɨt sɨbɨtni tarapmɨkgaŋ uŋudeŋ Sunduk da nandaŋ gadatgo aŋkewalban moki do yagɨt.
42022032	Mani nandaŋ gadatgo dɨma mosak yaŋ do bɨsit kɨlɨ agɨm. Gak tobɨl apbi bɨsapmon notgoni paŋteban abi.”
42022033	Mani Pita da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nak gak gat dam tebanon kɨŋek ae gak gat kɨsi kɨmotdeŋ do tagap tosot.”
42022034	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Pita, nak yaŋ gayɨsat, abɨsok kalbi pup gen dɨma yaŋakwan gak da kosirɨ kapbɨ nak do wasɨp yokdɨsal.”
42022035	Yaŋ yaŋek paŋdet kabɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nak da pino ani do yabekgɨm bɨsapmon, moneŋ sɨmɨl yɨk monɨŋ, ae yɨk madep, ae kandap gwɨlyo dɨma tɨmɨkgwit. Uŋun bɨsapmon ji yo kabɨ do wadak wadak awit bo dɨma?” Yaŋ yoyɨŋban iyɨwit, “Dɨma.”
42022036	Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Mani abɨsok moneŋ sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨk monɨŋji taŋ damaŋ kaŋ, uŋun si tɨmɨtni. Ae yɨk madepji kɨsi tɨmɨtni. Ae emat agak sɨbani mɨni amɨn uŋun ɨmal dubakni yumaŋ naŋek uŋun dakon moneŋ baŋ emat agak sɨbani yumni.
42022037	Piŋkop gen papiakon gen kɨnda nak do mandabi uŋun bamɨ noman tokdɨsak. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn da kaŋba amɨn yokwisi kɨnda agɨt.’ Yaŋsi dayɨsat, gen morap nak do mandabi uŋun kɨsi bamɨ noman tokdaŋ.”
42022038	Yaŋ yaŋban iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, pɨndat! Nin emat agak sɨbanin bamorɨ oni.” Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Uŋun arɨpmɨ.”
42022039	Yesu bɨsap morapmɨ agɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn kokup pap yɨpmaŋek Ɨleŋ Olipmon wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgakwan paŋdetni kɨsi yolba wɨgɨwit.
42022040	Ɨleŋon wɨgɨ altaŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Paŋkewalon dɨma moni yaŋ do bɨsit ani.”
42022041	Yaŋ yoyɨŋek dubagɨsok amɨn da tɨp maba kwaŋ uŋun da arɨpmon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋ ŋwakbeŋ aŋek bɨsit aŋek yaŋ yagɨt,
42022042	“Dat, gak tagɨ nandɨsal kaŋ, tepmɨ dɨma pakeŋ. Mani nak dakon galaktok dɨma yolgi. Gaga dakon galaktok yolgi.”
42022043	Yaŋakwan Kwen Kokup aŋelo kɨnda da pɨŋ Yesu aŋteban agɨt.
42022044	Yesu nandaban jɨgɨ madepsi aŋakwan bɨsit tebai sigɨn agɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan kɨŋkɨŋni yawi da yaŋ mɨktɨmon mawit.
42022045	Bɨsit aŋ mudaŋek pɨdaŋ paŋdetnikon tobɨl kɨŋ pɨndakban bupmɨ but yokwiyo madepsi nandawit do dɨpmɨn pakgwit.
42022046	Yaŋ pɨndagek yoyɨgɨt, “Nido dɨpmɨn pokgoŋ? Paŋkewalon dɨma moni yaŋ do pɨdaŋ bɨsit abɨt.”
42022047	Yesu gen sigɨn yaŋakwan amɨn kabɨ madep kɨnda apgwit. Paŋdet 12 kabɨkon da kɨnda mani Judas uŋun da mibɨltok aban apgwit. Uŋun da Yesu mandaŋ nok do kapmatjok apgut.
42022048	Mani Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Judas, gak Amɨn Dakon Monji mandaŋ naŋek uŋun kosiron da uwal da kɨsiron yɨpdɨsal, ma?”
42022049	Paŋdet kabɨ yo uŋun noman tok do aban kaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, emat agak sɨbanin baŋ tagɨ dapneŋ?”
42022050	Yaŋ iyɨŋek kɨnda da emat agak sɨbanaŋ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon oman monjɨ aŋagek mɨrakni amɨn tet nani mandaban dagaŋ kɨgɨt.
42022051	Mani Yesu da yagɨt, “Yaŋ dɨma a!” Yaŋ iyɨŋek kɨsitni uŋun amɨn da mɨragon wɨtjɨŋban aeni kɨlek tagɨt.
42022052	Aŋek Yesu da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon obip amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn, ae kɨla amɨn gat Yesu abɨdok do apgwit uŋun yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji emat agak sɨba gat ae kɨndap kɨrɨŋ gat tɨmɨgek kabo noknok amɨn kɨnda naŋ yaŋ abɨdok do abaŋ, ma?
42022053	Nak gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalon ji gat kɨsi egɨ egɨ agɨmaŋ, mani nak dɨma abɨdawit. Mani abɨsok on ji dakon bɨsap. Abɨsok pɨlɨn tuk dakon tapmɨm da madepsi asak.”
42022054	Yesu gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋakwan abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn uŋun da yutnon awɨgɨwit. Aŋakwa Pita kagɨsok da yolgɨt.
42022055	Amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋun yut da nagalon kɨndap soŋek yɨgakwa Pita yo kɨsi uŋun gat yɨkgwit.
42022056	Yɨgakwa oman mɨŋat kɨnda da Pita uŋun kɨndap da teŋteŋɨkon yɨkban kagɨt. Pakyaŋsi kaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “On amɨn Yesu gat kɨsi egɨpgumal.”
42022057	Mani Pita da wasɨp yaŋek yagɨt, “Mɨŋat, uŋun amɨn dɨma nandaŋ ɨmɨsat.”
42022058	Tɨmɨsok dɨ egek amɨn kɨnda da kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gakyo kɨsi uŋun da kabɨkon nani kɨnda.” Iyɨŋban Pita da yagɨt, “Nak dɨma!”
42022059	Awa kaloŋɨ da tɨlagon egek amɨn kɨnda da tebaisi yagɨt, “On Galili amɨn kɨnda! Do asisi, on amɨn uŋun gat kɨsi egɨpgumal!”
42022060	Mani Pita da yagɨt, “Gen yosol uŋun dɨmasi nandɨsat.” Gen uŋun yaŋakwan pup uŋudon gɨn yagɨt.
42022061	Yaŋban Amɨn Tagɨ da tobɨl Pita nomansi sɨŋtaŋban kwanek kagɨt. Kaŋakwan Pita Amɨn Tagɨ da gen iyɨgɨt uŋun do nandagɨt: “Abɨsok kalbi pup gen dɨma yaŋakwa gak da kosirɨ kapbɨ nak do wasɨp yokdɨsal.”
42022062	Pita uŋun do nandaŋek nagalon da waŋga pɨgɨ kunam madepsi takgɨt.
42022063	Yesu abɨdawit amɨn da Yesu abɨŋ yɨp do jɨgɨlak yaŋ ɨmɨŋek baljawit.
42022064	Aŋek ɨmal naŋ dabɨlɨ wamaŋ sopmaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Uŋun namɨn da gɨkdak yaŋ do kombɨ gen yaŋ ka!”
42022065	Ae abɨŋ yɨp do aŋek gen yokwi morapmɨ dɨ gat kɨsi iyɨwit.
42022066	Wɨsa dagaŋakwan Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn gat mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat gen kokwin ak do muwukgwit. Muwugek Yesu gen kokwin tamokon aŋkɨ yaŋ iyɨwit,
42022067	“Gak asi Kristo kaŋ, niyɨŋbɨ nandano.” Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Dayɨkeŋ kaŋ, ji arɨpmɨ dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namni.
42022068	Ae nak da dayɨkeŋ kaŋ, kobogɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma nayɨkdaŋ.
42022069	Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami da amɨn tet do kɨlɨ uŋun yɨtdɨsak.”
42022070	Yaŋban amɨn morap kɨsi da iyɨwit, “Do asi gak Piŋkop dakon Monji, ma?” Iyɨŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji bamɨsi yoŋ. Nak uŋun mani.”
42022071	Yaŋban yawit, “On amɨn gulusuŋni dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do amɨn dɨ gat yaŋ yomno nido apni? Iyɨ dakon gen kaga da kɨlɨ uŋun yaŋban nandamaŋ.”
42023001	Yaŋ yaŋek uŋun amɨn kabɨ muwukgwit kɨsi da pɨdaŋ Yesu iyɨŋ ɨlɨk aŋaŋ Pailaron kɨwit.
42023002	Aŋkɨ wasaŋek gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋek yawit, “On amɨn da Israel amɨn kabɨ nin paŋupbal aŋek nin da Sisa do takis dɨma ɨmneŋ do yosok. Ae iyɨ do nak kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda, nak Kristo yaŋ yosok.”
42023003	Yaŋ yaŋba Pailat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep, ma?” Yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yagɨt, “Yosol uŋun mani.”
42023004	Yaŋ iyɨŋban Pailat da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae mɨŋat amɨn morap egɨpgwit yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak on amɨn dakon yokwini kɨnda dɨma kosot.”
42023005	Yaŋban gen tebaisi yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn Juda mɨktɨm kɨsisi agek amɨn yoyɨŋ degakwan kwen wɨgɨk aŋ. Galili mɨktɨmon da pi wasaŋek aŋakwan obɨŋ ɨdon obɨk.”
42023006	Yaŋba nandaŋek Pailat da yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn Galili amɨn kɨnda bo dɨma?”
42023007	Erot da Galili mɨktɨm kɨla agɨt, do Yesu uŋun Galili amɨn kɨnda yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek Pailat da Yesu yɨpban Erot ron kɨgɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon Erot yo kɨsi Jerusalem egɨpgwit.
42023008	Erot da Yesu kaŋek tagɨsi nandagɨt. Bɨsap dubagɨsok amɨn da gen bini yaŋba nandagɨt, do Yesu da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda aban kokeŋ kaŋ tagɨsi yaŋ nandagɨt.
42023009	Erot da Yesu dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do gen morapmɨ iyɨgɨt, mani gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma yagɨt.
42023010	Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da kapmatjok agek gen yaŋ ɨm do pi tebaisi awit.
42023011	Aŋakwa Erot gat emat amɨn kabɨni gat da jɨgɨlak gen yaŋek abɨŋ yɨpgwit. Aŋek paba pɨgɨk dubak kɨldani tagɨsi kɨnda naŋ paŋ ɨmɨŋek yɨpba aeni tobɨl Pailat ron kɨgɨt.
42023012	Kalɨp Erot gat Pailat gat uwal aŋek egɨpgumal, mani uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn not agɨmal.
42023013	Pailat da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae kɨla amɨn gat, ae amɨn kɨsi yaŋ yoban opba
42023014	yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji da on amɨn nagon aŋabɨŋ uŋun da amɨn kwen wɨgɨk ani do yoyɨsak yaŋ nayeŋ. Mani kɨsin egek uŋun yo morap dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do iyɨt. Ji da gen morap yaŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun nak da koko bamɨ dɨma asak.
42023015	Ae Erot yo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn nandaŋek aeni yɨpban ninon tobɨl abɨsak. Aŋatno kɨmotjak da tɨlak yokwi kɨnda dɨma agɨt kosot.
42023016	-
42023017	Yaŋdo, nak yum baljaŋek yɨpbo kɨsak.”
42023018	Mani amɨn kɨsi da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “On amɨn aŋakbɨ kɨmagakwan Barabas naŋ yɨpbɨ ninon apjak!”
42023019	(Barabas uŋun kalɨp amɨn kɨnda aŋakban kɨmakgɨt, ae Jerusalem kokup papmon Rom gapman gat emat wamgwit, uŋun do dam tebanon yɨpgwit.)
42023020	Pailat da Yesu pulugaŋ yɨpban kɨsak dosi nandagɨt, do mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep dakon burɨ moni do aeni gen yoyɨgɨt.
42023021	Mani aeni sigɨn yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgɨt! Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgɨt!”
42023022	Yaŋ yaŋba aeni yoyɨŋakwan kosirɨ kapbɨ aŋakwan yaŋ yagɨt, “Mibɨlɨ nido? Ni gulusuŋ naŋ agɨt? Aŋatno kɨmotjak da arɨpmon yokwi kɨnda dɨma agɨt kosot. Do yum baljaŋek yɨpbo kɨsak.”
42023023	Yaŋban amɨn da Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋatni do tebaisi sigɨn yawit. Yaŋ yaŋakwa Pailat dakon gen tapmɨmni maŋakwan
42023024	amɨn dakon geni nandaŋ yomɨŋek Yesu kɨmotjak do yaŋ dagok agɨt.
42023025	Aŋek amɨn dakon galaktok yolek amɨn uŋun kalɨp gapman gat emat wamgut, ae amɨn kɨnda aŋakban kɨmakban dam tebanon yɨpgwit, uŋun yɨpban kɨgɨt. Ae galaktokni yolek Yesu aŋakba kɨmotjak do emat amɨn da kɨsiron yɨpgut.
42023026	Emat amɨn da Yesu abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ kosiron kɨŋakwa amɨn kɨnda kokup papmon kɨk do apban kawit, mani Saimon, uŋun Sairini kokupmon nani kɨnda. Saimon gen tebai iyɨŋek tɨlak kɨndapni kwapmɨkon yɨpba guramɨgek Yesu yolban kɨwit.
42023027	Kɨŋakwa amɨn morapmɨsi yolba kɨwit. Aŋakwa mɨŋat dɨwarɨ da yolek Yesu do bupmɨ kap kɨnda yaŋek kunam tagek yolgwit.
42023028	Mani Yesu uŋun mɨŋat kabɨ tobɨl pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jerusalem dakon gwani, ji nak do kunam dɨma tatni. Dɨsi gat ae mɨŋat monjɨyosi gat do tatni.
42023029	Bɨsap kɨnda apdɨsak uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da yaŋ yokdaŋ, ‘Mɨŋat monjɨ suŋ ekwaŋ ae mɨŋat monjɨ mɨni ae mɨŋat monjɨ da mumɨ dɨma naŋbi, uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.’
42023030	Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da kabap yaŋ yoyɨkdaŋ, ‘Ji tuwɨl kɨ maŋ nin wɨtjɨŋba pasɨlneŋ!’
42023031	Wasok yokwi on kɨndap kalugɨ pakbini toŋon aŋ kaŋ, ae si kɨbɨdosagon niaŋ ani?”
42023032	Emat amɨn da uŋun bɨsapmon yokwi pakpak bamorɨ gat kɨsi Yesu gat dapba kɨmotni do tɨmɨk paŋpaŋ kɨwit.
42023033	Kɨŋek mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda mani Busuŋ Kɨdat uŋudon Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋagek yokwi pakpak kɨnda amɨn tet do, ae kɨnda gwandeŋ tet do yaŋ dapgwit.
42023034	Aŋakwa Yesu da yagɨt, “Dat, dɨwarɨni wɨrɨrɨk yobi. Yo aŋ uŋun dɨma nandaŋ pɨsaŋek aŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋakwan emat amɨn da ɨmalni namɨn da tɨmɨtjak yaŋ do wasok kɨnda awit.
42023035	Aŋakwa amɨn kaŋ agakwa kɨla amɨn da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋpulugagɨt, do uŋun asi Kristo, Piŋkop da pini asak do manjɨgɨt amɨn kaŋ, iyɨ tagɨ aŋpulugosak.”
42023036	Yaŋ yaŋakwa emat amɨn uŋun kɨsi da abɨŋek jɨgɨlak gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋek wain ɨsɨpmɨ ɨba nosak do
42023037	aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Gak asi Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep kaŋ gaga aŋpuluga!”
42023038	Tɨlak kɨndapmon but pɨso gen kɨnda busuŋni da kwen yaŋ mandawit: ON AMƗN UŊUN JUDA AMƗN DAKON KƗLA AMƗN MADEPNI
42023039	Yokwi pakpak kɨnda Yesu gat dapbi uŋun da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Kristo, ma? Gak gaga aŋpulugaŋek nityo kɨsi paŋpuluga!”
42023040	Yaŋ yaŋban yokwi pakpak terɨ kɨnda aŋakbi uŋun da gen tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Piŋkop do dɨma pasoldol, ma? On amɨn da tepmɨ pasak nityo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn pamak.
42023041	Nit asi yokwi agɨmak, do kobogɨ yokwi pamak, mani on amɨn yokwi kɨnda dɨma agɨt.”
42023042	Yaŋ yaŋek yagɨt, “Yesu, gak kɨla amɨn madep man paki bɨsapmon nandaŋ nabi.”
42023043	Yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Asisi gayɨsat, gak abɨsok nak gat Paradais kon egɨpdamak.”
42023044	-
42023045	Uŋun bɨsapmon gɨldat dabɨl pɨlɨn tuksi agɨt, do 12 kilok aŋakwan mɨktɨm kɨsi pɨlɨn tuk aŋakwan kɨŋ pɨlɨndo 3 kilok agɨt. Aŋakwan Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon yoma ɨmal uŋun kwen da sulugɨ pɨŋ mibɨlɨkon dagaŋ kɨ tɨmɨ bamorɨ agɨt.
42023046	Aŋakwan Yesu uŋun gen papmon da yaŋ yagɨt, “Dat, wupno gak da kɨsiron yɨpmaŋdat!” Yaŋ yaŋek kɨmakgɨt.
42023047	Yaŋ aban kaŋek emat amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn da Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Asisi, on amɨn kɨlegɨsi egɨpgut.”
42023048	Amɨn kabɨ madepsi yo noman tawit uŋun pɨndat do apgwit uŋun pɨndagek bupmɨsi nandaŋek tobɨl yutnikon kɨwit.
42023049	Mani mɨŋat amɨn morap nandaŋ ɨmgwit gat, ae mɨŋat Galili da Yesu yolek apgwit uŋun gat dubagɨkon da agek yo noman tawit uŋun pɨndakgwit.
42023050	-
42023051	Amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut mani Josep. Uŋun Juda dakon kokup pap kɨnda mani Arimatea uŋudon nani. Uŋun amɨn tagɨsi ae aŋpakni kɨlegɨsi. Ae uŋun Piŋkop da amɨn kɨla akdɨsak uŋun do jomjom aŋek egɨpgut. Uŋun Juda amɨn dakon gen kokwin amɨn kabɨkon nani kɨnda, mani gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ notni Yesu do nandak nandak awit ae yo awit uŋun do but kaloŋ dɨma agɨt.
42023052	Josep uŋun Pailat ron kɨŋ Yesu dakon bumjotni abɨdok do iyɨŋban nandaŋ ɨmgut.
42023053	Aban Yesu dakon bumjotni tɨlak kɨndapmon naŋ abɨdaŋ abɨŋ ɨmal kwakwagɨ kɨnda naŋ wamgut. Wamaŋek aŋkɨ kɨmakbi tamo kɨnda kalɨp tɨpnaŋ pasɨwit, ae bumjot kɨnda uŋudon dɨma yɨpbi, uŋudon yɨpgut.
42023054	Sabat dakon yo paŋtagap ak bɨsap, Neŋgokon yɨpgut. Sabat bɨsap uŋun kɨlɨ wasok do agɨt.
42023055	Mɨŋat Galili da Yesu gat apgwit uŋun Josep yol aŋkɨŋek tɨp kɨnam uŋun kawit. Ae Josep da Yesu dakon bumjotni niaŋon da yɨpgut uŋun kɨsi kawit.
42023056	Kaŋek yutnikon tobɨl kɨŋ bumjotnikon yop do marasin gat ae pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi gat paŋkosit awit. Mani Sabat dakon gen teban yolek yɨk yawot awit.
42024001	Sonda wɨsa dagokdosi mɨŋat kabɨ uŋun yo kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi kɨlɨ paŋkosit awit uŋun tɨmɨgek tɨp kɨnamon kɨwit.
42024002	Kɨŋ kaŋba tɨp madep tɨp kɨnam sopgut uŋun kɨlɨ aŋtobɨlba kɨgɨt kawit.
42024003	Mani pɨgɨ Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu dakon bumjotni dɨma kawit.
42024004	Bumjotni dukwan tosok yaŋ nandaŋek but morap aŋek egakwa uŋudon gɨn amɨn bamorɨ kapmatjok altaŋek akbal pɨndakgwit. Uŋun dakon ɨmalni da mal dakon teŋteŋɨ yombem madepsi teŋteŋawit.
42024005	Aŋakwan mɨŋat da pasol pasol madepsi nandaŋek mukgwan gawagakwa amɨn bamot da yaŋ yoyɨgɨmal, “Ji nido kɨmakbi tamokon amɨn egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun wɨsaŋ?
42024006	Uŋun ɨdon dɨma egɨsak. Kɨlɨ pɨdak. Galili mɨktɨmon egek gen kɨnda dayɨgɨt do nandani.
42024007	Yaŋ dayɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji yokwi pakpak da kɨsiron yɨpba tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak. Ae gɨldat kapbɨ egɨ mudaŋek aeni pɨdokdɨsak.’ ”
42024008	Yaŋ yaŋbal nandaŋek Yesu da gen kɨlɨ yoyɨgɨt uŋun do burɨ pɨsawit.
42024009	Burɨ pɨsaŋba tɨp kɨnamon da tobɨl kɨŋek yo pɨndak nandaŋyo awit uŋun yabekbi 11 kabɨ gat, ae amɨn dɨwarɨ gat kɨsi yoyɨwit.
42024010	Mɨŋat gen yoyɨwit dakon mani uŋun yaŋ: Maria Makdala kokupmon nani, Joana, Maria Jems dakon meŋi, ae mɨŋat notni dɨwarɨ uŋun kɨsi da yoyɨwit.
42024011	Gen uŋun yoyɨŋba yabekbi kabɨ da nandaba ŋugɨgɨ gen aban dɨma nandaŋ yomgwit.
42024012	Mani Pita pɨdaŋ tɨmtɨm yaŋek tɨp kɨnamon kɨŋ pagadaŋek pɨndakban ɨmal dagɨn tawit. Yaŋ pɨndagek yutnon tobɨl kɨŋek uŋun yo morap niaŋon da altawit yaŋ do nandak nandak agɨt.
42024013	Uŋun gɨldaron gɨn paŋdetni bamorɨ Emeas kokupmon kɨk do kɨgɨmal. Emeas uŋun Jerusalem da dubagɨsi, 11 kilomita da arɨp tosok.
42024014	Uŋun amɨn bamot kɨŋek yo morap altawit dakon geni yaŋ nandat agɨmal.
42024015	Yo morap uŋun do yaŋ nandat aŋek kɨŋakwal Yesu iyɨ opban kɨsi kɨwit.
42024016	Dabɨl da kagɨmal, mani uŋun Yesu yaŋ dɨma kaŋ nandaŋyo agɨmal.
42024017	Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil ni gen baŋ yaŋ nandat aŋek kwamal?” Yaŋ yoyɨŋban bupmɨ tomno dabɨlyo aŋek akgɨmal.
42024018	Kɨnda, uŋun mani Kliopas, uŋun da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Dubagɨkon amɨn Jerusalem apgwit da ekwaŋ uŋun da bɨkbɨgon gak kaloŋ dagɨn yo on bɨsapmon noman taŋ uŋun dɨma nandal?”
42024019	Yaŋban Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ni yo?” Yaŋban yagɨmal, “Yesu Nasaret amɨnon yo altawit uŋun do yomak. Uŋun kombɨ amɨn kɨnda. Gen yagɨt, ae pi agɨt, uŋun Piŋkop da dabɨlon, ae amɨn kɨsi da dabɨlon, tapmɨmɨ toŋsi aban kawit.
42024020	Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae kɨla amɨnin gat da Yesu gapman da kɨsiron yɨpgwit. Yaŋ aba gapman da si aŋakba kɨmotjak do gen yaŋ aŋteban aŋek tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt.
42024021	Mani nin uŋun amɨn Israel amɨn yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋ nipdɨsak amɨn yaŋon da nandaŋ ɨmgumaŋ. Uŋun yo morap altaŋakwa Yesu aŋakba kɨmakgɨt dakon gɨldatni abɨsok kapbɨ asak.
42024022	Ae nin da kabɨkon nani mɨŋat dɨ da gen ŋwakŋwarɨsi niyɨŋba nandamaŋ. Uŋun wɨsa dagokdosi tɨp kɨnamon kɨŋ
42024023	Yesu dakon bumjotni dɨma taŋban kaŋek tobɨl abɨŋ yaŋ niyɨmal, ‘Nin kɨŋ dɨpmɨn yombem kɨnda kaŋapno aŋelo da yaŋ niyeŋ “Uŋun kalugɨ egɨsak.” ’
42024024	Yaŋ niyɨŋba notnin dɨ da tɨp kɨnamon kɨŋ yo mɨŋat da niyeŋ yaŋ gɨn taŋba pɨndaŋ. Mani Yesu iyɨ dɨma kaŋ.”
42024025	Yaŋ yaŋbal Yesu da amɨn bamot yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil nandaŋ kokwinjil tagɨ mɨni. Kombɨ amɨn da gen morap yawit uŋun butjilon da tepmɨ dɨma nandaŋ gadamal.
42024026	Kristo mibɨltok tepmɨ madep paŋek don Piŋkop da man madep ɨmjak, jil uŋun dɨma nandamal, ma?”
42024027	Yaŋ yaŋek Moses gat ae kombɨ amɨn morap dakon gen gat baŋ wasaŋek Piŋkop da papia morapmon gen iyɨ do mandabi uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
42024028	Kokup uŋun kɨk do agɨmal uŋun aŋkapmat aŋakwa Yesu da saŋbeŋek kɨk do yaŋ agɨt.
42024029	Mani amɨn bamot da kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Pɨlɨn tokdɨsak do gak nit gat egɨpneŋ.” Yaŋ iyɨŋbal amɨn bamot gat kɨsi yutnon wɨgɨwit.
42024030	Wɨgɨ jap noknok tamokon yɨgek bret abɨdaŋ Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek bret pudaŋek yomgut.
42024031	Yaŋ aban amɨn bamot dabɨlni pɨsaŋban kaŋ nandaŋyo agɨmal. Yaŋ aŋakwal uŋudon gɨn pasɨlakwan ae saŋbeŋek dɨma kagɨmal.
42024032	Aŋakwan amɨn bamot yaŋ yagɨmal, “Kosiron Piŋkop da papiakon gen toŋ dakon mibɨlɨ niyɨŋakwan butnit madepsi pɨdaŋ.”
42024033	Amɨn bamot yaŋ yaŋek uŋudon gɨn tobɨl Jerusalem kɨgɨmal. Kɨŋ paŋdet 11 kabɨ gat ae notni dɨwarɨ gat muwuk egɨpgwit uŋun pɨndagakwal
42024034	yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn Tagɨ kɨlɨ pɨdak da Saimon altaŋ ɨmɨk!”
42024035	Yaŋ yaŋba amɨn bamot da yo kosiron altawit uŋun do yoyɨŋek yagɨmal, “Bret pudaŋakwan uŋudon kaŋ nandaŋyo amak.”
42024036	Uŋun dakon gen yaŋ nandaŋek egakwa Yesu bɨkbɨk nikon altaŋ yomɨŋek akgɨt. Agek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “But yawot jikon tosak.”
42024037	Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn wup kɨnda da agek yosok yaŋ nandaŋek wurɨpdagek pasalgwit.
42024038	Pasalakwa yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido pasalek but bamot aŋ?
42024039	Kɨsit kandapyono do pɨndakgɨt. Nak naga akdat. Gɨptɨmno abɨdaŋek nandabɨt. Nak kɨdat sabamyono toŋ do nandani. Amɨn wup uŋun kɨdat sabamyoni mɨni.”
42024040	Yaŋ yoyɨŋek kɨsit kandapyoni yolɨgɨt.
42024041	Yolɨŋban pɨndagek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madep awit, mani but morap nandaŋek nandaba bamɨ dɨma agɨt. Yaŋ nandaŋakwa yoyɨgɨt, “Jikon jap dɨ toŋ?”
42024042	Yaŋban tap kɨlap kɨlɨ paŋkɨbɨt abi tɨmɨsok kɨnda ɨmɨŋba
42024043	abɨdaŋek naŋban kawit.
42024044	Kaŋakwa yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak ji gat egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon yaŋ kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm: Moses da gen tebanon, ae kombɨ amɨn da genon, ae Kap Papiakon nak do gen mandabi da toŋ uŋun kɨsisi bamɨ altaŋ mudokdaŋ.”
42024045	Yaŋ yaŋek Piŋkop da papiakon gen toŋ uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandaba pɨsoni do paŋpulugagɨt.
42024046	Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ mandabi: Kristo uŋun tepmɨ paŋek gɨldat kapbɨ egek kɨmoron da pɨdokdɨsak.
42024047	Aban paŋdet kabɨni da uŋun da manon but tobɨl dakon gen gat, ae dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt dakon gen gat yoyɨŋ teŋteŋaŋba amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun da nandakdaŋ. Pi uŋun Jerusalem kokup papmon da wasaŋek akdaŋ.
42024048	Ji uŋun yo morap altawit uŋun pɨndakgwit, do uŋun dakon gen bin mɨŋat amɨn morapyo yoyɨŋ teŋteŋokni.
42024049	Nandani! Dat da yo dam do yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun nak da jikon yabetdɨsat. Ji tepmɨ dɨma kɨŋek kokup papmon egakwa Piŋkop dakon tapmɨm Kwen Kokup da jikon pɨkdɨsak.”
42024050	Yaŋ yoyɨŋek paŋdetni mibɨltaŋ yomɨŋek Betani kokupmon kɨwit. Kɨŋ uŋudon kɨsirɨ paŋenagek gɨsam yomgut.
42024051	Gɨsam yomɨŋakwan gɨn paŋdetni yopmaŋ degek Piŋkop da aŋaŋ Kwen Kokup wɨgɨgɨt.
42024052	Wɨgɨkwan gawak ɨmɨŋek tobɨl kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi nandaŋek Jerusalem kɨwit.
42024053	Kɨŋ Telagɨ Yut Madepmon saŋbek saŋbek egek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiwit.
43001001	Yo morap dɨma altaŋakwa wasok wasogɨkon Gen uŋun egɨpgut. Gen uŋun Piŋkop gat egɨpgumal, ae Gen iyɨ Piŋkop uŋun.
43001002	Uŋun kalɨpsigwan yo morap dɨma altaŋakwa Piŋkop gat egɨpgumal.
43001003	Piŋkop da uŋun Gen naŋ gɨn yo morap kɨsisi wasaŋ mudagɨt. Kosit ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨndakon da yo kɨnda dɨma noman tagɨt.
43001004	Iyɨ uŋun egɨp egɨp dakon malunsi egɨpgut. Uŋun egɨp egɨp da amɨn teŋteŋaŋ yomgut.
43001005	Aŋakwan uŋun teŋteŋɨ da pɨlɨn tukgwan teŋteŋaŋban pɨlɨn tuk da dɨma aban kɨmakgɨt.
43001006	Piŋkop da amɨn kɨnda yabekban apgut, uŋun mani Jon.
43001007	Uŋun da abɨŋ amɨn kɨsisi geni nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek teŋteŋɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni do teŋteŋɨ dakon but pɨso gen yagɨt.
43001008	Jon iyɨ teŋteŋɨ dɨma. Uŋun da teŋteŋɨ dakon but pɨso gen gɨn yagɨt.
43001009	Teŋteŋɨ bamɨsi uŋun mɨktɨmon pɨŋek mɨŋat amɨn morapyo teŋteŋaŋ yomɨsak.
43001010	Gen uŋun mɨktɨmon pɨŋ egɨpgut. Mɨktɨm gat ae yo morap mɨktɨmon toŋ uŋun iyɨ wasagɨt, mani mɨktɨmon ekwan mɨktɨm amɨn da niaŋen amɨn kɨnda yaŋ dɨma kaŋba pɨsagɨt.
43001011	Iyɨ da kokupmon apban dabɨni da dɨma abɨdawit.
43001012	Mani amɨn morap not aŋ ɨmɨŋek mani nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dakon monjɨ gwayonisi ani do yagɨt.
43001013	Uŋun meŋ datyo da yawikon da dɨma altawit. Ae amɨn da galak togon da dɨma. Piŋkopmon da altawit.
43001014	Gen uŋun amɨn dagaŋban nin gat egɨpgumaŋ. Egakwan Dat da monji kaloŋɨ yabekban pɨgɨt uŋun dakon tɨlɨmni kagɨmaŋ. Nandaŋ yawot ae aŋpak bamɨsi uŋun amɨnon tugagɨt.
43001015	Uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ Jon da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak uŋun amɨn dakon mibɨlni do yaŋ kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm, ‘Uŋun amɨn nak da buŋon abɨsak, mani nak dɨma altaŋapbo kɨlɨsi egɨpgut, do nak ŋwapmaŋdak.’ ”
43001016	Nandaŋ yawot uŋun amɨnon tugagɨt da tosok, do nin kɨsisi gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ paŋpulugaŋakwan gɨsamɨ toŋ ekwamaŋ.
43001017	Nido Piŋkop da Moses iyɨŋban gen teban nimgut, mani nandaŋ yawot gat ae aŋpak bamɨsi uŋun Yesu Kristokon da apgut.
43001018	Piŋkop uŋun amɨn kɨnda da dɨmasi kagɨt. Mani Monjɨsi kaloŋɨ, Datni da kapmatjok egɨsak, uŋun da Piŋkop dakon mibɨlɨ kɨlɨ nolɨgɨt.
43001019	Juda amɨn Jerusalem egɨpgwit uŋun da mukwa sogok amɨn ae Liwai amɨn yabekba Jonon kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak niaŋen amɨn kɨnda?”
43001020	Yaŋba Jon da iyɨ dakon mibɨlni dɨma aŋkɨsɨbɨgɨt. Yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak Kristo dɨma.”
43001021	Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Yaŋ kaŋ gak namɨn? Gak Elaija bo?” Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨma.” Aeni iyɨwit, “Gak kombɨ amɨn uŋun apjak do jomjom amaŋ, uŋun bo?” Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨma.”
43001022	Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Gak namɨn? Gak da gen kobogɨ niyɨŋbɨ kɨŋ amɨn yabekba abɨmaŋ yoyɨno. Gak gaga do namɨn yaŋ yosol?”
43001023	Iyɨŋba Jon da kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da kalɨpsigwan gen kɨnda yagɨt uŋun da arɨpmon yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak amɨn kɨnda mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yosot, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ dakon kosit yulba kɨlegɨsi asak.’ ”
43001024	Parisi amɨn da uŋun amɨn yabekba apgwit.
43001025	Uŋun amɨn da Jon saŋbeŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak Kristo dɨma, ae Elaija dɨma, ae uŋun kombɨ amɨn dɨma kaŋ, nido amɨn telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomɨsal?”
43001026	Yaŋ yaŋba Jon da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak amɨn pakbisi baŋ telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomɨsat, mani amɨn kɨnda ji da bɨkbɨgon akdak, uŋun amɨn ji dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ.
43001027	Uŋun nak da manjikon noldak. Nak yombem yokwi da kandap gwɨl napni tagɨ dɨma wɨtdalgeŋ.”
43001028	Jon gat gen yaŋ nandat awit uŋun Betani kokupmon Jodan Pakbi usugap tet uŋudon awit. Jon uŋudon egek amɨn telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgut.
43001029	Gɨldat kɨnda do Jon da Yesu iyɨkon opban kaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Kabɨt, on Piŋkop dakon Sipsip Monɨŋni. Uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn dakon dɨwarɨni wɨrɨrɨkdak.
43001030	On amɨn do nak kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm, ‘Amɨn kɨnda nak da buŋon abɨsak uŋun da nak si ŋwapmaŋdak, nido nak dɨma altaŋapbo kɨlɨsi egɨpgut.’
43001031	Nak naga dɨma nandaŋ ɨmgum, mani Israel amɨn kabɨ da uŋun amɨn kaŋ nandaŋyo ani do aŋek telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomɨŋek apgum.”
43001032	Jon yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek aeni yagɨt, “Nak kaŋapbo Telagɨ Wup kɨnarɨm da mɨktɨmon paŋ uŋun da tɨlak Kwen Kokup da Yesukon pɨgɨt.
43001033	Nak naga uŋun amɨn dɨma nandaŋ ɨmgum. Mani Piŋkop da nak telagɨ pakbi soŋ yobeŋ do yabegek yaŋ nayɨgɨt, ‘Gak kaŋbɨ Telagɨ Wup amɨn kɨnda da kwenon pɨŋ yɨkban kaŋ yaŋ nandaki, uŋun amɨn da amɨn Telagɨ Wup naŋ telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomdɨsak.’
43001034	Uŋun amɨn nak naga kagɨm, do yaŋsi dayɨsat, uŋun amɨn uŋun Piŋkop dakon Monji.”
43001035	Gɨldat kɨnda do Jon gat paŋdetni bamorɨ gat uŋudon gɨn akgwit.
43001036	Agek Yesu obɨŋakwan kaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kabɨt, on Piŋkop dakon Sipsip Monɨŋni!”
43001037	Jon da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek paŋdetni bamot Yesu yolgɨmal.
43001038	Yolakwal Yesu da tobɨl pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yo ninaŋ wɨsamal?” Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Rabai, gak dukon egɨsal?” (“Rabai” uŋun gen dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun “Yoyɨŋdet.”)
43001039	Yaŋ yaŋbal Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Jil abɨŋ konjil.” Yaŋ yaŋban kɨŋ yutni kagɨmal. Kaŋek pɨlɨndo 4 kilok agɨt do Yesu gat egɨpgwit.
43001040	Amɨn bamot Jon dakon gen nandaŋek Yesu yolgɨmal, kɨnda mani Andru uŋun Saimon Pita dakon padɨge.
43001041	Andru Yesu yɨpmaŋek uŋudon gɨn Saimon wɨsɨŋ kaŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nin Mesaia kɨlɨ kamaŋ.” (“Mesaia” dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun “Kristo”).
43001042	Yaŋ iyɨŋek abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ Yesukon kɨŋ altaŋbal Yesu da Saimon kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Saimon, Jon dakon monji. Buŋon amɨn da Sipas yaŋ gayɨni.” (“Sipas” uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun “Pita”)
43001043	Wɨsa dagokdo Yesu Galili Provinskon kɨk do aŋek Pilip kaŋ kwaŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nol.”
43001044	Pilip uŋun Betsaida kokupmon nani, Andru gat Pita gat dakon kokup ɨsalni.
43001045	Pilip uŋun kɨŋ Nataniel kaŋ kwaŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Moses da gen teban papiakon amɨn kɨnda do gen mandagɨt, ae kombɨ amɨn da gen mandawit, uŋun amɨn kɨlɨ kaŋ kwamaŋ. Uŋun Yesu, Nasaret kokupmon amɨn, Josep dakon monji.”
43001046	Yaŋban Nataniel da iyɨgɨt, “Yo tagɨ kɨnda Nasaret kokupmon tagɨ dɨma altogɨ nandɨsat.” Yaŋban Pilip da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋek ka.”
43001047	Yesu da Nataniel apban kaŋek Nataniel do yaŋ yagɨt, “Kabɨt, Israel amɨn bamɨsi kɨnda abɨsak. Uŋun amɨn topni mɨnisi.”
43001048	Yaŋban Nataniel da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Niaŋ aŋek nak dakon mibɨlno nandɨsal?” Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Pilip dɨma yaŋ gamɨŋakwan gak pik kɨndap mibɨlon yɨgaki kɨlɨ gandat.”
43001049	Nataniel uŋun gen nandaŋek yaŋkwok yaŋ agɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, gak Piŋkop dakon Monji. Gak Israel amɨn dakon Kɨla Amɨn Madep.”
43001050	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da gak pik kɨndap mibɨlon yɨkbɨ gandat yaŋ gayɨko uŋun do aŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨsal. Don uŋun si yapmaŋek wasok ŋwakŋwarɨsi pɨndatdɨsal.
43001051	Nak asisi gayɨsat, don Kwen Kokup wɨtdal kɨŋakwan kokdɨsal. Kaŋaki Piŋkop dakon aŋelo kabɨ da Amɨn Dakon Monjikon wɨkwaŋ paŋgɨn akdaŋ.”
43002001	Pi agak bamorɨ mudaŋakwal Kana kokup, Galili mɨktɨmon mɨŋat pakpak kɨnda dakon soŋnok madep kɨnda awit. Aba Yesu dakon meŋi da kɨŋ pɨndakgɨt.
43002002	Yesu gat paŋdet kabɨni gat kɨsi yaŋ yoba opba uŋun mɨŋat pawiron kɨsi egɨpgwit.
43002003	Egek wain naŋ mudaŋba Yesu meŋi da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Wain kɨlɨ mudaŋ.”
43002004	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Meŋ, gak da nak dɨwat dɨma nayɨki. Abɨsok uŋun nak dakon bɨsap dɨma.”
43002005	Yaŋban meŋi da oman amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yo kɨnda do dayɨŋban kaŋ uŋun ani.”
43002006	Pakbi tɨbɨt madep daman 100 lita da tɨlak tɨp baŋ wasaŋbi 6 kabɨ yaŋ tawit. Juda amɨn da aŋpakni yolek Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek tok do uŋun pakbi tɨbɨt baŋ koleŋ soŋ soŋ ani do tawit.
43002007	Yesu da oman amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji pakbi koleŋ tɨbɨrɨkon tagalba pɨkwan.” Yoyɨŋban yaŋ aba genikon wɨŋ tugawit.
43002008	Yaŋ aba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dɨwarɨ koleŋ paŋpaŋ jap noknok kɨla amɨnon paŋkɨt.” Yoyɨŋban paŋkɨ ɨmgwit.
43002009	Pakbisi da wain dagagɨt do jap noknok kɨla amɨn da aŋkɨlɨk kok do naŋ nandaban galagɨsi agɨt. Oman amɨn pakbi kolewit uŋun da Yesu da yo agɨt uŋun kawit, mani kɨla amɨn dɨma kagɨt, do wɨli mɨŋat pagɨt uŋun yaŋ ɨban
43002010	opban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mibɨltok wain galagɨsi yomno morapmɨ naŋakwa, don wain ɨsalɨbaŋ yomno noŋ. Kositnin yaŋ tosok, mani gak wain tagɨsi paŋkutnaŋbɨ taŋ baŋ buŋon don yomɨsal.”
43002011	Uŋun wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ Yesu da Kana kokup Galili mɨktɨm uŋudon mibɨltoksi wasaŋek agɨt. Yaŋ aŋek tɨlɨmni yolɨŋban paŋdetni da uŋun kaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
43002012	Yesu Kana kokup yɨpmaŋek meŋi gat padɨge kabɨ gat ae paŋdet kabɨni gat Kapaneam kokupmon kɨŋ uŋudon gɨldat kabi kɨnda egɨpgwit.
43002013	Juda amɨn dakon Yapyap Bɨlak kapmat taŋakwan Yesu Jerusalem kɨgɨt.
43002014	Kɨŋ Telagɨ Yut Madep uŋun da nagalgwan pɨgɨ pɨndakban amɨn moneŋ ɨlɨt pi awit. Amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋun bulmakau, sipsip ae mɨnam baŋ moneŋ ɨlɨt pi awit. Aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ da tamonikon yɨgek moneŋ kulabɨk aba pɨndakgɨt.
43002015	Yaŋ pɨndagek nap dɨwat dɨwat tɨmɨgek uŋun baŋ amɨn ae bulmakau ae sipsip kɨsi baljaŋ yolban telagɨ yut yɨpmaŋek waŋga abɨgɨwit. Yaŋ aŋek Rom dakon moneŋ baŋ Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon moneŋ kulabɨk aŋ aŋ awit amɨn dakon moneŋni wɨrɨrɨkban kɨŋakwa tamoni paŋtobɨlgɨt.
43002016	Aŋek mɨnam baŋ moneŋ ɨlɨt pi awit yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨnamji tɨmɨk waŋga paŋabɨgɨt! Ji da kulabɨk aba Datno dakon yut moneŋ ɨlɨt tamo yombem dɨma asak!”
43002017	Yaŋban paŋdetni da gen kɨnda Piŋkop da papiakon tosok uŋun do nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ tosok: “Gak dakon yut do galagɨsi nandɨsat, uŋun do aŋek uŋun yut da tagɨsi tosak do pini asat.”
43002018	Juda amɨn da yo agɨt uŋun kaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Ni wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda naŋ nolɨŋbɨ kaŋek gak yaŋ mudaŋ gamɨŋbi da uŋun yo asal yaŋ gandaneŋ?”
43002019	Yaŋba Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On telagɨ yut tuwɨlba gɨldat kapbɨ da butgwan nak da kaluk wɨtjɨkdɨsat.”
43002020	Yaŋban Juda amɨn da yawit, “Nin bɨlak 46 kabɨ da butgwan telagɨ yut on agɨmaŋ. Gak da gɨldat kapbɨ dogɨn wɨtjɨk do yosol, ma?”
43002021	Mani telagɨ yut uŋun iyɨ dakon gɨptɨm do yagɨt.
43002022	Don Piŋkop da Yesu kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt uŋun bɨsapmon paŋdetni da gen uŋun yagɨt uŋun do nandawit. Aŋek Piŋkop dakon gen gat ae Yesu da gen yagɨt kɨsi do nandaba bamɨsi agɨt.
43002023	Yesu Yapyap Bɨlagon Jerusalem kokup papmon egɨpgut bɨsapmon amɨn morapmɨ da wasokni tapmɨmɨ toŋ madepsi aban pɨndagek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
43002024	-
43002025	Mani Yesu da mibɨlni nandaŋ mudagɨt, do but uŋun do dɨma yopgut. Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn dakon mibɨlni iyɨŋdetjak do dɨma nandagɨt, nido iyɨ amɨn dakon butni kɨlɨ pɨndak mudagɨt.
43003001	Parisi amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut mani Nikodemus. Uŋun Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn kɨnda.
43003002	Uŋun amɨn kalbi kɨnda Yesukon kɨŋ altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop gat gadat gadat dɨma asak tam, gak da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ asal uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma aban. Do gak yoyɨŋdet kɨnda Piŋkopmon da apgul yaŋ nandaŋ gamamaŋ.”
43003003	Yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi gayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda aeni dɨma altosak kaŋ, Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni arɨpmɨ dɨma kosak.”
43003004	Iyɨŋban Nikodemus da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn pelaŋ kɨlɨ abi kɨnda da niaŋ aŋek aeni altosak? Meŋi da butgwan pɨgek aeni tagɨ altosak?”
43003005	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi gayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda pakbi ae Telagɨ Wupmon dɨma altosak kaŋ, Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asagon arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨsak.
43003006	Amɨnon da altaŋbi uŋun amɨn, ae Wupmon da altaŋbi uŋun wup.
43003007	Gak aego altoki dosi gayɨt uŋun do dɨma wɨrɨpdakgi.
43003008	Mɨrɨm uŋun galaktokni yolek dukwan dukwan tagɨni kɨsak. Wuwɨgɨ nandamaŋ mani dukwan da abɨsak ae dukwan kɨsak uŋun dɨma kaŋ pɨsomaŋ. Amɨn morap Wupmon da altoŋ uŋun yaŋ gɨn.”
43003009	Yaŋban Nikodemus da iyɨgɨt, “Uŋun niaŋon da noman toni?”
43003010	Yaŋban Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Israel amɨn dakon yoyɨŋdet kɨnda da yo morap on dɨma nandabɨ pɨsosok, ma?
43003011	Nak asisi gayɨsat, nin yo si nandamaŋ uŋun do yomaŋ, ae yo si pɨndakgɨmaŋ uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok amaŋ. Mani dayɨno ji gen uŋun tɨmɨt do dɨma galak toŋ.
43003012	Nak mɨktɨmon yo toŋ uŋun do dayɨko nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak. Yaŋ aŋ do Kwen Kokupmon yo toŋ uŋun do dayɨko niaŋsi aŋek nandaba bamɨ asak?
43003013	Amɨn kɨnda da Kwen Kokup dɨmasi wɨgɨgɨt. Amɨn Dakon Monji Kwen Kokup da pɨgɨt uŋun dagɨn wɨgɨgɨt.
43003014	Kalɨp Moses da mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon tuŋon amɨn aŋenakgɨt, yaŋ gɨn amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji aŋenotdaŋ.
43003015	Aŋenakba nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni amɨn uŋun kɨsisi egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokdaŋ.
43003016	“Piŋkop amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek Monjɨ kaloŋɨ yomgut. Uŋun do nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni amɨn Tɨpdom do amɨn dɨma ani. Egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn ani.
43003017	Piŋkop da Monji mɨŋat amɨnyo aŋpakni kokwin aŋek gen pikon yopjak do mɨktɨmon dɨma yabekgɨt. Yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak do yabekban pɨgɨt.
43003018	Monjɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun kobogɨ yokwi dɨma tɨmɨtni. Mani nandaŋ gadagɨ mɨni amɨn uŋun Piŋkop dakon Monji kaloŋɨ dakon mani dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ, do kobogɨ yokwi tɨmɨtni dakon yaŋ dagok kɨlɨ aŋyobi.
43003019	-
43003020	Kobogɨ yokwi tɨmɨtdaŋ dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ: Teŋteŋɨ da mɨktɨmon teŋteŋaŋban amɨn da aŋpakni yokwi noman toni do pasalek teŋteŋɨ manji ɨmɨŋek pɨlɨn tuk do galak tawit.
43003021	Mani gen bamɨ paŋek egɨsak amɨn uŋun teŋteŋɨkon abɨsak. Abɨŋek teŋteŋɨkon egakwan amɨn da kaŋba Piŋkop da aŋpulugaŋban aŋpak tagɨsi asak.”
43003022	Uŋun da kwenon Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Judia mɨktɨmon kɨwit. Paŋkɨ paŋdetni gat egek amɨn telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgut.
43003023	Aŋakwan Jonyo kɨsi amɨn telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgut. Ainon kokupmon pakbi morapmɨ tawit do amɨn uŋudon apba telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgut. Ainon uŋun Salim kokup da kapmatjok tosok.
43003024	(Uŋun bɨsapmon Jon dam tebanon dɨma yɨpbi.)
43003025	Uŋun bɨsapmon Jon dakon paŋdetni gat ae Juda amɨn kɨnda gat gen emat awit. Ni kosiron da pakbi soŋek Piŋkop da dabɨlon tagɨ kɨlek togɨ yaŋ do gen emat awit.
43003026	Aŋek Jon dakon paŋdetni da kɨŋ Jon yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, amɨn uŋun Jodan Pakbi terɨ kɨnda gak gat egek mibɨlni yaŋbɨ nandagɨmaŋ, abɨsok amɨn kɨsisi da uŋun amɨnon kwa telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomɨsak.”
43003027	Yaŋba Jon da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun da amɨn kɨnda do pi kɨnda dɨma ɨmɨsak kaŋ tagɨ dɨma asak.
43003028	Nak kalɨp gen yagɨm uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ, uŋun yaŋ: ‘Nak Kristo dɨma. Piŋkop da nak yabekban mibɨltaŋ ɨmɨŋek abɨsat.’
43003029	Wɨli kɨnda da mɨŋat kɨnda pasak kaŋ, mɨŋat uŋun iyɨ do pasak. Paŋakwan wɨli dakon notni da agek mɨrak yopmaŋek geni nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk asak. Abɨsok kɨsɨk kɨsɨk da nak da buron tugosok.
43003030	Uŋun dakon man da wukwisi tosak, aŋakwan nak dakon man da pɨŋbi tosak.
43003031	“Amɨn kwen da pɨgɨt uŋun da amɨn morap kɨsi yapmaŋ mudosok. Mɨktɨm amɨn uŋun on mɨktɨm dakon, ae nandak nandakni uŋun on mɨktɨm dakon. Amɨn Kwen Kokup da pɨgɨt uŋun da amɨn morap kɨsi yapmaŋ mudosok.
43003032	Uŋun da yo morap pɨndak nandaŋyo agɨt uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok asak, mani amɨn da nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak.
43003033	Geni do nandaba bamɨ asak amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da gen bamɨ yosok yaŋ nandaŋ gadaŋ.
43003034	Amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da yabekban apgut uŋun Telagɨ Wupni tagapmɨsok dɨma, tugok tugogɨsi taŋ ɨmɨsak, do Piŋkop dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋosok.
43003035	Dat da Monji but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek yo morap kɨlani asak do uŋun da kɨsiron yopgut.
43003036	Amɨn morap Monjɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdoŋ. Mani amɨn morap Monjɨ dakon gen dɨma guramɨkgaŋ uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dɨma abɨdoni. Piŋkop dakon butjapni uŋun amɨnon toktogɨsi tosok.”
43004001	-
43004002	Yesu da amɨn telagɨ pakbi soŋ yoban paŋdetni morapmɨsi awit, yaŋ Parisi amɨn da gen bini nandawit. Jon da paŋdet tɨmɨkgɨt dakon tɨlakni uŋun yapgut yaŋ amɨn da yaŋba nandawit. (Yesu iyɨ telagɨ pakbi dɨma soŋ yomgut, paŋdetni da soŋ yomgwit.)
43004003	Yesu da Parisi amɨn da gen bino kɨlɨ nandaŋ nameŋ yaŋ nandaŋek Judia Provins yɨpmaŋek tobɨl aeni Galili Provinskon kɨgɨt.
43004004	Galili kɨk do Samaria Provins binap naŋ kɨgɨt.
43004005	Kɨŋ Samaria dakon kokup pap kɨnda mani Sika uŋudon kɨŋ altagɨt. Sika uŋun da kapmatjok mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda tosok, uŋun mɨktɨm tɨm kalɨpsigwan Jekop da monji Josep do ɨmgut.
43004006	Pakbi gapma kɨnda Jekop da kalɨp wayɨkgɨt uŋun mɨktɨmon tagɨt. Gɨldat binap aŋakwan Yesu kosit agɨpgut do wararɨ nandaŋek uŋun pakbi gapma da ɨleŋɨkon yɨk yawokgɨt.
43004007	Yɨk yawogakwan Samaria mɨŋat kɨnda pakbini kolek do apgut. Apban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Pakbi tagɨ koleŋ nabɨ nokeŋ?”
43004008	(Paŋdetni jap yum do kokup papmon kɨlɨ kɨwit.)
43004009	Yaŋban Samaria mɨŋat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Juda amɨn kɨnda, ae nak Samaria mɨŋat kɨnda, do nido pakbi nabɨ noko yaŋ nayɨsal?” (Mɨŋat uŋun mibɨlɨ yaŋ do yagɨt, Juda amɨn da Samaria amɨn gat not dɨma aŋek egɨpgwit.)
43004010	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gak Piŋkop da but galak yo amɨn do ɨsal yomɨsak uŋun nandɨsal tam, ae namɨn da pakbi nabɨ noko yaŋ gayɨk uŋun nandɨsal tam, iyɨŋbɨ uŋun amɨn da pakbi egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ tagɨ gaban.”
43004011	Yaŋban mɨŋat da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, gak pakbi tɨbɨtgo mɨni, ae pakbi gapma uŋun dubagɨ. Do gak pakbi egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun dukon naŋ aŋapbi?
43004012	Babɨknin Jekop da pakbi gapma on nin do nimgut. Jekop iyɨ gat ae monjini gat on gapmakon pakbi koleŋ nawit, ae bulmakau sipsipyoni gat kɨsi nawit. Gak da Jekop yapmaŋdal, ma?”
43004013	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn morap on pakbi naŋek ae pakbi do akdaŋ.
43004014	Mani nak da amɨn kɨnda do pakbi ɨbo nosak kaŋ, ae pakbi do dɨma akdɨsak. Nak da pakbi ɨbeŋ uŋun da butnikon pakbi dabɨl kɨnda mudok mudogɨ mɨni taŋ ɨmdɨsak. Pakbi dabɨl uŋun da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni ɨmdɨsak.”
43004015	Yaŋ yaŋban mɨŋat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, uŋun pakbi nam. Nabɨ naŋek pakbi do dɨma akeŋ. Aŋek buŋon pakbi kolek do ɨdon saŋbeŋek dɨma apbeŋ.”
43004016	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨŋ ego iyɨŋbɨ tobɨl apjil.”
43004017	-
43004018	Yaŋ yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Nak eno mɨni.” Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gak kalɨp amɨn paŋ kwɨnɨt abɨ kosirɨ 5 agɨt, da abɨsok amɨn yɨkgamal uŋun ego dɨma. Gak eno mɨni yaŋ bamɨsi yosol.”
43004019	Yaŋban mɨŋat da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, gak kombɨ amɨn kɨnda yaŋ gandɨsat.
43004020	Samaria amɨn nin dakon babɨknin on ɨleŋon Piŋkop gawak ɨmgwit. Mani Juda amɨn ji da yaŋ yoŋ, Jerusalem gɨn kɨŋek Piŋkop gawak ɨmneŋ kaŋ tagɨsi.”
43004021	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat, nak gen gayɨsat uŋun nandabɨ bamɨ asak. Bɨsap kɨnda apdɨsak, uŋun bɨsapmon Dat gawak ɨmɨm uŋun on ɨleŋon dɨma tokdɨsak, ae Jerusalemyo kɨsikon dɨma tokdɨsak.
43004022	Samaria amɨn ji Piŋkop dakon mibɨlɨ pakyaŋsi dɨma nandaŋek gawak ɨmaŋ. Amɨn yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt dakon kosit uŋun Juda amɨn ninon tosak do yaŋbi, do nin Piŋkop bamɨsi nandaŋek gawak ɨmamaŋ.
43004023	Mani bɨsap kɨnda apjak, ae kɨlɨ abɨk, uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon da, ae aŋpak bamɨsikon da Dat gawak ɨmdaŋ. Dat da uŋuden amɨn da gawak ɨmni do galak tosok.
43004024	Piŋkop iyɨ uŋun Wup, uŋun do aŋek gawak ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon da, ae aŋpak bamɨsikon da gawak ɨmni kaŋ uŋun kɨlegɨsi.”
43004025	Yaŋ yaŋban mɨŋat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mesaia, mani Kristo yaŋ iyaŋ, uŋun don apjak yaŋ nandɨsat. Uŋun da abɨŋ yo morap niyɨŋ paŋteŋteŋ aŋ mudokdɨsak.”
43004026	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Nak gak gat gen yomak nak uŋun amɨn mani.”
43004027	Yesu gen yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn paŋdetni da tobɨl abɨŋ kaŋba Yesu mɨŋat kɨnda gat gen yaŋbal pɨndagek wɨrɨpdakgwit. Mani “Gak yo nido galak tosol?” bo “Nido on mɨŋat gat gen yomal?” yaŋ kɨnda da Yesu dɨma iyɨwit.
43004028	Aŋakwa mɨŋat uŋun pakbi tɨbɨtni yɨpmaŋek tobɨl kokup papmon kɨŋek amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
43004029	“Ji abɨŋ amɨn kɨnda koni. Uŋun amɨn da yo morap kalɨp agɨm uŋun nayɨŋ mudak. Uŋun Kristo bo?”
43004030	Yoyɨŋban kokup pap yɨpmaŋek Yesukon apgwit.
43004031	Kosiron abɨŋakwa paŋdetni da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, gak jap dɨ na.”
43004032	Mani yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak japno toŋ, uŋun jap dakon mibɨlɨ ji dɨma nandaŋ.”
43004033	Yoyɨŋban paŋdetni da notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn kɨnda da jap paŋabɨŋ ɨmɨk bo?”
43004034	Yaŋakwa Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun dakon galaktokni yolek pi namgut uŋun aŋ mudokeŋ uŋun da japno asak.
43004035	Ji da yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Kanek 4 kabɨ mudaŋakwan jap pakpagɨ.’ Mani nak da yaŋ dayɨsat, ji sɨŋtaŋek jap pi do pɨndak mudoni. Jap morap uŋun kɨlɨ bamɨ taŋ mudaŋ.
43004036	Jap bamɨ pakpak amɨn uŋun tomni tɨmɨkdak. Jap bamɨ paŋmuwukdak uŋun egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do paŋmuwukdak. Yaŋdo, jap kwaot kwaot amɨn gat ae jap bamɨ pakpak amɨn gat kɨsi da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ anjil.
43004037	Yaŋdo, gen kɨnda yoŋ uŋun bamɨ, ‘Amɨn kɨnda da jap kwaokdak, ae kɨnda da bamɨ pasak.’
43004038	Ji pigaga kɨnda pi dɨma awiron jap bamɨ pani do nak da yabekgɨm. Amɨn da pi madepsi awiron ji da pini dakon bamɨ paŋ.”
43004039	Mɨŋat da, “Uŋun amɨn da yo morap kalɨp agɨm uŋun nayɨŋ mudak” yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek Samaria amɨn morapmɨ uŋun kokup papmon nani da Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
43004040	Yaŋ awit do Yesukon abɨŋek “Gak nin gat egɨpneŋ” yaŋ iyɨŋba gɨldat bamorɨ uŋun kokupmon egɨpgwit.
43004041	Egek amɨn morapmɨsi Yesu iyɨ dakon geni nandaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
43004042	Aŋek mɨŋat yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gen yaŋbɨ nandaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmamaŋ. Mani uŋun dogɨn dɨma. Nin da nin iyɨ dakon gen nandaŋek yaŋsi nandamaŋ, uŋun amɨn asi mɨktɨm amɨn morap yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn yaŋ nandamaŋ.”
43004043	Yesu uŋun gat gɨldat bamorɨ egɨ mudaŋek uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek Galili Provinskon kɨgɨt.
43004044	Yesu iyɨ gen kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt, “Kombɨ amɨn kɨnda iyɨ da mɨktɨmon amɨn da dɨma nandaba wɨkwan ɨmaŋ.”
43004045	Galili amɨn uŋun kɨsi Yapyap Bɨlak bɨsapmon Jerusalem kokup papmon egek Yesu da yo morap agɨt uŋun pɨndak nandaŋyo awit, do Yesu uŋun Galili kɨŋ altaŋakwan but galagon da abɨdawit.
43004046	Yesu aeni Galili mɨktɨmon Kana kokupmon kɨgɨt. Kalɨp uŋun kokupmon uŋun da wasok aban pakbisi uŋun da wain dagagɨt. Kana kokupmon kɨla amɨn madep dakon kɨla amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut. Monji Kapaneam kokupmon sot agɨt.
43004047	Uŋun kɨla amɨn da Yesu Judia yɨpmaŋek Galili abɨk uŋun dakon geni nandaŋek Yesukon kɨŋek monji sot aŋ palɨ kɨmot do agɨt uŋun aŋmɨlɨp asak do bɨsit tebai iyɨgɨt.
43004048	Iyɨŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ji wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ dɨma pɨndatni kaŋ, nandaŋ gadat dɨma akdaŋ.”
43004049	Yaŋban kɨla amɨn da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, monjino dɨma kɨmagakwan tepmɨ pɨki.”
43004050	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨki. Monjɨgo egɨpdɨsak.” Yaŋban kɨla amɨn Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun do nandaban bamɨ aban tobɨl kɨgɨt.
43004051	Tobɨl kɨŋakwan pi monjɨni da apba kosiron domdom aŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Monjɨgo sot yɨpmak da tagɨ egɨsak.”
43004052	Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ni bɨsapmon sotni yɨpmaŋ dek?” Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Apma gɨldat tobɨl do 1 kilok gɨptɨmɨ kɨndap sogɨt uŋun yawokgɨt.”
43004053	Yaŋba datni da yaŋ nandagɨt, apma uŋun bɨsapmonsi Yesu da yaŋ nayɨgɨt, “Monjɨgo egɨpdɨsak.” Yaŋ nandaŋek iyɨ gat ae amɨn kabɨni yutnikon egɨpgwit uŋun gat kɨsi nandaŋ gadat awit.
43004054	Yesu Judia yɨpmaŋek Galili kɨŋ wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ uŋun aban kosit bamot agɨt.
43005001	Egɨ don Juda amɨn dakon jap noknok bɨsap madep kɨnda altaŋakwan Yesu Jerusalem kɨgɨt.
43005002	Jerusalem kokup papmon pakbi ɨdap kɨnda tosok, Ibru genon da Betesda yaŋ yoŋ. Uŋun pakbi ɨdap tɨp dam madep dakon wigat kɨnda mani Sipsip Wigat uŋun da kapmatjok tosok. Pakbi ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon yɨk nandat yut 5 yaŋ toŋ.
43005003	-
43005004	Uŋun yɨk nandat tamokon sot amɨn morapmɨ egɨpgwit: dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn, ae kandapmɨ yokwi amɨn, ae kɨdarɨ alek taŋbi amɨn kɨsi egɨpgwit.
43005005	Amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut uŋun sotni taŋ ɨmɨŋakwan gɨn egakwan bɨlak 38 agɨt.
43005006	Yesu da uŋun amɨn pagakwan kaŋek sot kɨlɨsi agɨt yaŋ nandaŋek iyɨgɨt, “Gak gɨptɨmgo kɨlek tosak do nandɨsal?”
43005007	Yaŋban sot amɨn da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, pakbi da wayɨŋ asak bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda da nak aŋpulugaŋ pakbi ɨdapmon abɨgɨ dɨma nepmaŋdak. Nak pɨgɨk do aŋapbo amɨn dɨwarɨ da ŋwapmaŋek pɨgɨ pɨgɨ aŋ.”
43005008	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gak pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek kosit agɨp!”
43005009	Gen yaŋ iyɨŋakwan uŋudon gɨn amɨn uŋun gɨptɨmɨ kɨlek taŋban yalɨŋ potni tɨmɨgek kosit agɨpgut. Yo uŋun Sabat bɨsapmon altagɨt,
43005010	do Juda amɨn da kɨlek tagɨt amɨn yaŋ iyɨwit, “Abɨsok uŋun Sabat bɨsap. Gak gen teban yapmaŋek yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek agɨsal.”
43005011	Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn uŋun nak aŋmɨlɨp ak uŋun da yaŋ nayɨk, ‘Gak pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek kosit agɨp!’ ”
43005012	Yaŋban iyɨwit, “ ‘Gak pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek kosit agɨp!’ yaŋ uŋun namɨn da gayɨk?”
43005013	Yesu amɨn morapmɨ da bɨkbɨgon da kɨlɨ kɨgɨt, do kɨlek tagɨt amɨn uŋun namɨn da iyɨgɨt uŋun dɨma nandagɨt.
43005014	Don Yesu da Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalon pɨgek amɨn uŋun kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nandaki, gak kɨlek tal. Yo yokwi saŋbeŋek dɨma aki. Aki kaŋ sot agɨl uŋun yapmaŋek yo jɨgɨsi da altaŋ gamdɨsak.”
43005015	Iyɨŋban amɨn uŋun kɨŋ Juda amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yesu da nak aŋmɨlɨp agɨt.”
43005016	Yesu uŋun Sabat bɨsapmon yo yaŋ agɨt, do Juda amɨn da wasaŋek yo yokwi aŋɨmgwit.
43005017	Mani Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Datno yɨk nandarɨ mɨni pi agɨt da aŋaŋ obɨsak, ae nakyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn asat.”
43005018	Yesu Sabat dakon gen teban yapgut, ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, Piŋkop uŋun naga dakon Datno yaŋ yaŋek nak Piŋkop gat arɨp yaŋ nandagɨt. Uŋun yagɨt do Juda amɨn da mibɨltok aŋakba kɨmotjak do nandawit uŋun si yapmaŋek wagɨlsi aŋatno kɨmotjak yaŋ nandaba teban tagɨt.
43005019	Juda amɨn da yaŋ nandaŋakwa Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, Monjɨ uŋun iyɨ da nandak nandagon yo kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma asak. Datni da yo asak uŋun kaŋek uŋun naŋ gɨn asak. Dat da pi asak, Monji kɨsi yaŋ gɨn asak.
43005020	Dat da Monji but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek yo morap asak uŋun Monji yolɨsak. Wasok agɨt uŋun si yapmaŋek Dat da wasok masɨ masɨmɨ yolɨŋban ji uŋun pɨndagek tamtam yokdaŋ.
43005021	Dat da amɨn kɨmakbi paban pɨdaŋakwa egɨp egɨp yomɨsak, uŋudeŋ gɨn Monjɨ da namɨn amɨn do egɨp egɨp yom do nandɨsak uŋun iyɨ dakon galaktok yolek yomɨsak.
43005022	-
43005023	Dat da amɨn kɨnda dakon aŋpakni dɨma kokwinɨkdak. Amɨn da Dat do man madep ɨmaŋ, yaŋ gɨn Monjɨ do man madep ɨmni do aŋek amɨn kokwin agak pi kɨsi morap uŋun Monji do ɨmɨŋ mudagɨt. Amɨn kɨnda Monji man madep dɨma ɨmɨsak kaŋ, Dat Monji yabekban pɨgɨt uŋunyo kɨsi man madep dɨma ɨmɨsak.
43005024	“Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda nak dakon gen nandaŋek Dat yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdosak. Uŋun amɨn gen pi tamokon dɨma atjak. Uŋun kɨmot yɨpmaŋek egɨp egɨp kɨlɨ abɨdosok.
43005025	Nak asisi dayɨsat, bɨsap kɨnda apdɨsak, ae kɨlɨ abɨk, uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨmakbi Piŋkop Monji dakon gen nandaŋek egɨp egɨp abɨdokdaŋ.
43005026	Nido Dat uŋun iyɨkon egɨp egɨp tosok, do Monji kɨsi iyɨkon egɨp egɨp taŋ ɨmjak do yaŋ dagok agɨt.
43005027	Monjɨ uŋun Amɨn Dakon Monji egɨsak, do Dat da yaŋ mudaŋ ɨban gen kokwin asak.
43005028	Nak da gen yosot uŋun do but morap dɨma ani. Bɨsap kɨnda apdɨsak, uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn morap kɨmakbi kokupmon pokgoŋ uŋun Monjɨ dakon gen nandaŋek
43005029	waŋga kɨŋ mudokdaŋ. Aŋpak kɨlegɨ awit amɨn uŋun pɨdaŋek kalugɨ egɨpdaŋ. Ae aŋpak yokwi awit amɨn uŋun pɨdaŋek gen kokwin tamokon kwa gen kokwin amɨn da pasɨlni do yoyɨkdɨsak.”
43005030	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak naga da nandak nandagon yo kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma abeŋ. Datno dakon gen nandaŋek gen kokwin asat. Naga dakon galaktok yolek dɨma asat, Dat nak yabekgɨt uŋun dakon galaktok yoldat, do gen kokwin kɨlegɨ asat.
43005031	“Pi asat uŋun joŋɨgek naga do yaŋ teŋteŋok abeŋ kaŋ, amɨn da nak dakon gen tagɨ dɨma nandaŋ teban toni.
43005032	Mani amɨn kɨnda egɨsak uŋunyo kɨsi nak da pi asat uŋun joŋɨgek yaŋ teŋteŋok asak. Nak nandɨsat, gen yaŋ teŋteŋok asak uŋun bamɨsi yosok.
43005033	“Ji da amɨn yabekba Jonon kwa Jon da nak do yaŋkwok bamɨsi agɨt.
43005034	Mɨktɨm amɨn kɨnda da nak dakon gen aŋteban asak uŋun da yo madep dɨma asak. Mani ji yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋ kɨni yaŋ do Jon da yaŋkwok agɨt uŋun do dayɨsat.
43005035	Jon uŋun lam kɨnda da yaŋ soŋek teŋteŋagɨt. Ji bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok uŋun dakon teŋteŋɨ do galak tawit.
43005036	“Mani pi asat uŋun yo kɨnda da joŋɨgek nak do yaŋ teŋteŋok asak uŋun da Jon da yaŋkwok agɨt uŋun yapmaŋdak. Yo uŋun pi morap Datno da aŋ mudokeŋ do namgut uŋun. Uŋun aŋapbo asi Dat da nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun nandaba bamɨsi asak.
43005037	Datno nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun da iyɨ pi asat uŋun joŋɨgek yaŋ teŋteŋok asak. Ji tekni bɨsap kɨnda dɨma nandawit, bo tomni bɨsap kɨnda dɨma kawit.
43005038	Dat dakon geni ji dɨma abɨdoŋ, nido amɨn yabekban pɨgɨt uŋun dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ.
43005039	Piŋkop da papiakon gen toŋ uŋun da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni nimaŋ ji yaŋ nandaŋ. Yaŋdo, ji pini tebaisi aŋek manjɨŋek nandaŋ kokwinɨk mudoŋ. Uŋun papia da nak do yaŋkwok asak,
43005040	mani ji da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdok do nagon ap do dɨmasi galak toŋ.
43005041	“Nak amɨn da man madep namni do gen uŋun dɨma yosot.
43005042	Mani nandaŋ damɨsat, ji Piŋkop do but dasi dɨma galak taŋ ɨmaŋ.
43005043	Nak Datno da manon apbo ji da nak dɨma abɨdoŋ. Mani amɨn kɨnda da iyɨ da manon apjak kaŋ, ji tagɨsi abɨdoni.
43005044	Ji notji da man madep damni do nandaŋ, mani Piŋkop kaloŋɨ da man madep damjak do dɨma nandaŋ. Ji yaŋ aŋek niaŋon da nandaŋ gadat ani?
43005045	“Nak Daron kɨŋek ji gen pikon depdɨsat yaŋ dɨma nandani. Moses da ji paŋpulugosak yaŋ nandaŋ teban toŋ, mani dɨma. Moses da iyɨ gen pikon depdɨsak.
43005046	Moses da nak do gen mandagɨt. Geni do nandaba bamɨ asak tam, nakyo kɨsi nandaŋ gadaŋ nabam.
43005047	Mani uŋun gen mandagɨt uŋun do nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak, do nikon da nak dakon gen do nandaba bamɨ asak?”
43006001	Don Yesu Galili Pakbi Ɨdap terɨ kɨnda do wɨgɨgɨt. (Uŋun pakbi ɨdap mani kɨnda Taiberias.)
43006002	Yesu da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ aŋek sot amɨn paŋkɨlek aban kawit, do amɨn morapmɨsi da buŋon yolgwit.
43006003	Yolakwa Yesu ɨleŋon wɨkwan paŋdet kabɨni gat yɨkgwit.
43006004	Uŋun bɨsapmon Juda amɨn dakon Yapyap Bɨlak Madep kwaŋ tagɨt.
43006005	Yesu amɨn morapmɨsi apba pɨndagek Pilip yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “On mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ do bret dukon baŋ yumaŋ yomno noni?”
43006006	(Pilip si aŋkewalek kok do yaŋ iyɨgɨt. Yesu uŋun yaŋ akeŋ yaŋ uŋun iyɨ kɨlɨ nandagɨt.)
43006007	Yaŋban Pilip da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nin moneŋ 200 danari baŋ bret yumaŋ yomno amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ da bret jɨmjɨmjok kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma tɨmɨk tɨmɨk agagɨ.”
43006008	Yaŋban paŋdetni kɨnda mani Andru, uŋun Saimon Pita dakon padɨge, uŋun da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
43006009	“Monjɨsok kɨnda oni uŋun dakon bret tɨmɨ 5 bali baŋ wasaŋbi uŋun gat ae tap kɨlap bamorɨ gat taŋ ɨmaŋ. Mani on mɨŋat amɨn morapyo do yomno arɨpmɨ dɨma asak.”
43006010	Yaŋban Yesu da yagɨt, “Yoyɨŋba mɨŋat amɨnyo pabɨŋ yɨtni.” Uŋun tɨmon joŋ tɨm madep tagɨt. Wɨli 5 tausen yaŋ da tɨlak pabɨŋ yɨkgwit.
43006011	Yɨk mudaŋakwa Yesu da bret tɨmɨgek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek amɨn yɨkgwit uŋun do yoban galaktokni da arɨpmon nawit. Ae tap kɨlap tɨmɨgek yaŋ gɨn agɨt.
43006012	Jap naŋba arɨpmɨ aŋakwa Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jap dɨwat naŋ dɨwaraŋ uŋun kɨsi tɨmɨk paŋmuwutni. Jɨmjɨmɨ kɨnda dɨma taŋ yokwi toni.”
43006013	Yaŋ yoyɨŋban bret tɨmɨ 5 bali baŋ wasaŋbi naŋ dɨwarɨkgwit uŋun yɨk madep 12 kabɨ sɨmɨlba tugawit.
43006014	Yesu da uŋun wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ aban kaŋek amɨn da yaŋ yawit, “Asisi, Piŋkop da kombɨ amɨn mɨktɨmon yabet do yagɨt oni.”
43006015	Amɨn da Yesu uŋun kɨla amɨn madepnin egɨ nimjak do aŋteban aneŋ yaŋ nandaŋakwa Yesu da butni pɨndak mudagɨt, do yopmaŋek iyɨ gɨn tobɨl ɨleŋon wɨgɨgɨt.
43006016	Pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo paŋdetni pakbi ɨdapmon pɨgɨwit.
43006017	Aŋakwa pɨlɨn taŋakwan Yesu dɨma opban kaŋ iyɨ gɨn bot kɨndakon wɨgek Kapaneam kokupmon kɨk do pakbi ɨdap binap naŋ kɨwit.
43006018	Kɨŋakwa mɨrɨm madepsi aŋakwan pakbi madepsi tamalɨkgɨt.
43006019	Aŋakwan paŋdetni pakbi wayɨgek 5 bo 6 kilomita da tɨlak kɨŋek kaŋakwa Yesu pakbi ɨdap kwenon bamaŋ bamaŋ bot da kapmatjok opban kaŋek pasalgwit.
43006020	Pasalba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak da naga obɨsat. Ji dɨma pasolni.”
43006021	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu boron wɨsak do but galaksi nandawit. Boron wɨkwan uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn kokup kɨk do nandawit bot uŋudon akgɨt.
43006022	Gɨldat kɨnda do mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda do egɨpgwit uŋun sigɨn egɨpgwit. Egek yaŋ nandawit, apma bot kaloŋɨ kɨnda gɨn tagɨt, mani Yesu uŋun boron paŋdetni gat dɨma wɨgɨwit. Paŋdetni dagɨn wɨgek kɨwit.
43006023	Yaŋ nandaŋek egakwa bot dɨwarɨ Taiberias kokup da apgwit. Abɨŋ Amɨn Tagɨ da bret gɨsamɨgek yoban nawit, uŋun kokup da kapmatjok paŋabɨŋ akgwit.
43006024	Aŋakwa amɨn da Yesu gat paŋdetni gat dɨma ekwaŋ yaŋ pɨndakgwit, do bot tɨmɨgek Kapaneam kokupmon Yesu wɨsɨŋ kok do kɨwit.
43006025	Kɨŋ pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda Yesu kaŋkwaŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, gak ni bɨsapmon ɨdon abɨl?”
43006026	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, ji bret dabo naŋek butji tugawit uŋun do aŋek nak wɨsɨŋ aŋaŋ obeŋ. Wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ dolɨko pɨndagek uŋun tɨlak dakon mibɨlɨ nandawit, uŋun do aŋek dɨma obeŋ.
43006027	Ji jap taŋ yokwi togɨ pak do pi dɨma ani, egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni dakon jap uŋun pak do pi ani. Jap uŋun Amɨn Dakon Monji da damdɨsak. Yaŋ asak do Piŋkop Dat da tɨlak agɨt.”
43006028	Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Nin niaŋsi aŋek Piŋkop dakon pi aneŋ?”
43006029	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop dakon pi uŋun yaŋ: Ji Piŋkop da amɨn yabekban apgut uŋun nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni.”
43006030	-
43006031	Gen uŋun yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Babɨknin da mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon mana nawit. Uŋun dakon gen Piŋkop da papiakon yaŋ mandabi da tosok: ‘Kwen Kokup dakon bret amɨn do yoban nawit.’ Do gak niaŋ abi? Tɨlak tapmɨmɨ toŋ niaŋensi kɨnda naŋ abɨ kaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ gamneŋ?”
43006032	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, Kwen Kokup dakon bret Moses da dɨma damgut. Datno da Kwen Kokup dakon bret bamɨsi ji do damɨsak.
43006033	Amɨn Kwen Kokup da pɨŋ mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨn morapyo do egɨp egɨp yomɨsak uŋun Piŋkop dakon bretni.”
43006034	Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Amɨn tagɨ, uŋun bret bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nin do nibi.”
43006035	Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Nak naga egɨp egɨp dakon bret. Amɨn kɨnda nagon apjak kaŋ, jap do ae saŋbeŋek dɨma akdɨsak, ae amɨn kɨnda nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namjak kaŋ, pakbi do ae saŋbeŋek dɨmasi akdɨsak.
43006036	“Nak yaŋ dayɨt, ji nak kɨlɨ nandawit mani sigɨn dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namaŋ.
43006037	Dat da mɨŋat amɨn morapyo namɨsak uŋun da nagon apdaŋ. Amɨn morap nagon abaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma yolbo kɨni.
43006038	Nido nak naga dakon galaktok yolek Kwen Kokup da dɨma pɨgɨm. Namɨn da nak yabekgɨt nak uŋun dakon galaktok yol do pɨgɨm.
43006039	Datno nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun dakon galaktok uŋun yaŋ: Nak Datno da amɨn kɨlɨ namgut uŋun kɨnda dɨma yɨpbo pasɨljak. Mibɨ gɨldaron kɨsisi pabo pɨdoni.
43006040	Datno dakon galaktok uŋun yaŋ: amɨn morap Monjɨ kaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni, uŋun kɨsisi egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn ani do nandɨsak. Ae mibɨ gɨldaron kɨsisi pabo pɨdoni do nandɨsak.”
43006041	Yesu da nak naga bret Kwen Kokup da pɨgɨm yaŋ yagɨt do Juda amɨn da nandaba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek gen morapmɨ yawit.
43006042	Yaŋ yawit, “On Yesu, Josep dakon monji gɨn, ma? Meŋi ae datni uŋun nandaŋ yomamaŋ. ‘Nak Kwen Kokup da pɨgɨm’ yaŋ niaŋon da yosok?”
43006043	Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nandaba yokwi tok aŋek dɨsi gen gen dɨma abɨt.
43006044	Dat da nak yabekban pɨgɨm. Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ da galak togon nagon arɨpmɨ dɨma apjak. Dat da nandak nandakni aŋtagap aban nagon tagɨ opjak. Ae mibɨ gɨldaron nak da kɨmoron naŋ abo pɨdokdɨsak.
43006045	Kombɨ amɨn da papiakon gen yaŋ toŋ: ‘Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨn morapyo yoyɨŋdetdɨsak.’ Amɨn morap Dat dakon gen do mɨrak paŋek nandak nandak paŋ uŋun nagon obaŋ.
43006046	Mɨktɨm amɨn kɨnda da Dat dɨmasi kagɨt. Amɨn uŋun Piŋkop gat egɨpgumal da apgut uŋun dagɨn Dat kagɨt.
43006047	Nak asisi dayɨsat, nandaŋ gadat asak amɨn uŋun egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn asak.
43006048	Nak naga egɨp egɨp dakon bret.
43006049	Babɨkji mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon mana nawit uŋun kɨmak mudawit.
43006050	Mani bret Kwen Kokup da pɨgɨt, amɨn da uŋun naŋek arɨpmɨ dɨma kɨmotni.
43006051	Nak egɨp egɨp dakon bret Kwen Kokup da pɨgɨm. Amɨn kɨnda uŋun bret nosak kaŋ, egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨpjak. Bret uŋun yomdɨsat uŋun naga dakon sabamno, mɨktɨm amɨn da egɨp egɨp abɨdoni do yomdɨsat.”
43006052	Yaŋ yaŋban Juda amɨn da iyɨ gɨn gen emat madepsi aŋek yawit, “Uŋun amɨn niaŋon da sabamni niban noneŋ do yosok?”
43006053	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, ji Amɨn Dakon Monji dakon sabam ae yawiyo dɨma noni kaŋ, jikon egɨp egɨp dɨma taŋ damjak.
43006054	-
43006055	Sabamno uŋun jap bamɨsi ae yawino uŋun pakbi bamɨsi, do amɨn kɨnda nak dakon sabamno ae yawino nosak kaŋ, egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨpjak. Aŋakwan mibɨ gɨldaron kɨmoron naŋ abo pɨdosak.
43006056	Nak dakon sabamno ae yawino nosak amɨn uŋun nagon egakwan nak uŋun amɨnon egɨpbeŋ.
43006057	Dat egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ da nak yabekban pɨgɨm. Uŋun egɨsak do aŋek nak egɨsat. Uŋun da tɨlak nak egɨsat do aŋek nak nosak amɨn uŋun kɨsi egɨpjak.
43006058	Bret on dasi Kwen Kokup da pɨgɨt. Kalɨp babɨkji bret uŋun naŋ egek don kɨmakgwit. On bret uŋuden dɨma. Amɨn kɨnda bret on nosak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨpjak.”
43006059	Yesu gen on Kapaneam kokupmon Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon egek amɨn yoyɨŋ degek yagɨt.
43006060	Yesu da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek paŋdetni morapmɨ da yaŋ yawit, “Gen on yosok uŋun jɨgɨsi. Namɨn da arɨpmɨ abɨdosak?”
43006061	Paŋdetni da gen uŋun do yaŋba yokwi tok aba burɨ pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen uŋun do nandaŋ gadatji wɨtdal kɨsak, ma?
43006062	Ji kaŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji kalɨp egɨpgut kokupmon aeni tobɨl wɨgɨsak kaŋ, ji niaŋ nandani?
43006063	Telagɨ Wup da iyɨ amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni yomɨsak. Amɨn da iyɨ egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni arɨpmɨ dɨma tɨmɨtni. Gen dayɨsat uŋun da Wup egɨp egɨp damɨsak uŋun jikon aŋabɨsak.
43006064	Mani jikon da amɨn dɨwarɨ nandaŋ gadat dɨma aŋ.” (Nandaŋ gadat dɨma awit amɨn uŋun Yesu da pini wasaŋek agɨron da kɨlɨ nandaŋ yomɨŋ mudagɨt. Ae namɨn da uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak uŋun kɨlɨ nandaŋ ɨmgut.)
43006065	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do nak yaŋ kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm, ‘Amɨn kɨnda Dat da dɨma aŋtagap asak kaŋ, nagon arɨpmɨ dɨma opjak.’ ”
43006066	Yesu da gen uŋun yoyɨŋban paŋdetni dɨwarɨ tobɨl kɨŋek Yesu saŋbeŋek dɨma yolgwit.
43006067	Yaŋ aŋakwa Yesu paŋdetni 12 kabɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ae jiyo kɨsi nepmaŋ dek kɨkdaŋ?”
43006068	Yoyɨŋban Saimon Pita da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nin namɨnon kɨneŋ? Gak dakon gen da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni nimɨsak.
43006069	Nin nandaŋ gadat aŋek yaŋsi nandamaŋ, gak Piŋkop dakon Telagɨ Amɨni.”
43006070	Yaŋban Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Nak ji 12 kabɨ manjɨgɨm, mani ji kabɨkon da kɨnda uŋun Sunduk yombem.”
43006071	(Uŋun Judas, Saimon Iskariot dakon monji do yagɨt. Uŋun paŋdetni 12 kabɨkon nani kɨnda, mani uŋun bin amɨn do Yesu uwal da kɨsiron yɨpgut.)
43007001	Uŋun da kwenon Yesu Galili Provinskon gɨn agɨpgut. Juda amɨn da Yesu si aŋatno kɨmotjak yaŋ nandawit, do Judia Provinskon agɨp do dɨma nandagɨt.
43007002	Juda amɨn dakon Ɨmal Yut Kabeŋ Bɨlak uŋun dakon bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan
43007003	Yesu dakon padɨk padɨkni da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak on kokup yɨpmaŋek Judia Provinskon kɨŋek wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ aŋaki paŋdetgoni da koni.
43007004	Amɨn kɨnda amɨn morapmɨ da nandaŋ ɨmni do nandɨsak kaŋ, yo pasɨlɨ dɨma asak. Gak yaŋ asal do amɨn morapmɨ da dabɨlon abɨ koni.”
43007005	(Padɨk padɨkniyo kɨsi dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit do gen uŋun yawit.)
43007006	Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji galak tokjikon tagɨ agɨpni, mani nak dakon bɨsap uŋun dɨma kwaŋtak.
43007007	Mɨktɨm amɨn morap da ji nandaba yokwi tok arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋ damni, mani nak aŋpak yokwi aŋ uŋun do yaŋ kwok asat, do uŋun do nandaba yokwi tok aŋ namaŋ.
43007008	Ji jap noknok bɨsap madep do Jerusalem kɨni. Nak dakon bɨsap dɨma ak, do naga dɨma kɨkeŋ.”
43007009	Gen uŋun yaŋ yaŋek Galili Provinskon sigɨn egɨpgut.
43007010	Mani padɨk padɨkni jap noknok bɨsap madepmon kɨŋ mudaŋakwa noman da dɨma, pasɨlɨkon da buŋon don kɨgɨt.
43007011	Uŋun bɨlak bɨsap madepmon Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn da Yesu wɨsɨŋek yaŋ yawit, “Uŋun amɨn dukwan egɨsak?”
43007012	Yaŋ yaŋakwa amɨn kabɨ madep Jerusalem egɨpgwit da gen pɨsɨgon da gen yawit. Dɨwarɨ da “Uŋun amɨn tagɨsi” yaŋ yawit. Ae dɨwarɨ da “Dɨma, uŋun amɨn top paŋkewaldak” yaŋ yawit.
43007013	Mani Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn do pasalek mibɨlni noman dɨma yawit.
43007014	Jap noknok bɨsap madep binapgwan Yesu uŋun Telagɨ Yut Madep uŋun da nagalon pɨgek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
43007015	Aŋakwan Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn da geni uŋun nandaŋ wurɨpdagek yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn papia yut dɨma wɨgek nandak nandak madep dukon pagɨt?”
43007016	Yaŋ yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Gen uŋun dayɨŋ dekdat uŋun naga dakon gen dɨma. Piŋkop yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun dakon gen naŋ dayɨsat.
43007017	Amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop dakon gen guramɨtjak kaŋ, uŋun da geno dakon mibɨlɨ tagɨ nandɨsak. Piŋkop dakon gen naŋ yosot, bo naga da nandak nandagon da yosot uŋun tagɨ kokwinɨtjak.
43007018	Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon gen yosok, uŋun amɨn iyɨ man madep pak do yosok. Mani amɨn kɨnda yabet amɨni man madep pasak do nandɨsak uŋun amɨn topni mɨni, amɨn kɨlegɨsi.
43007019	Kalɨp Moses da gen teban damgut, mani jikon da amɨn kɨnda da uŋun gen teban dɨma guramɨkdak. Ji nak nido nɨkba kɨmokgeŋ do nandaŋ?”
43007020	Yaŋban kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Koŋ kɨnda gagon egɨsak. Namɨn da gɨkban kɨmokgi do nandɨsak?”
43007021	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kaloŋɨ kɨnda agɨm uŋun do wɨrɨpdakgwit.
43007022	Kalɨp Moses da monjɨsi dakon gɨptɨm mandak dakon aŋpak ani do dayɨgɨt. (Asi, Moses iyɨ dɨma wasaŋek agɨt, babɨkji Abraham da wasaŋek agɨt.) Ji Moses dakon gen teban yolek monjɨsi dakon gɨptɨm Sabat bɨsapmon kɨsi mandaŋ.
43007023	Ji Moses dakon gen teban dɨma yapni do aŋek monjɨsi dakon gɨptɨmni Sabat bɨsapmon kɨsi mandaŋ gɨn. Ji yaŋ aŋ, do nak da Sabat bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda aŋmɨlɨp agɨm uŋun do butjap nido nandaŋ namaŋ?
43007024	Ji dabɨl dagɨn pɨndagek nandaŋ kokwin aŋ. Yo morap kokwin agak bamɨsi ani kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi.”
43007025	Jerusalem kokup papmon amɨn dɨwarɨ da yawit, “On amɨn naŋ kɨla amɨn da aŋakba kɨmotjak do nandaŋ, ma?
43007026	Kabɨt, nomansi agek gen yaŋakwan gen kɨnda dɨma iyaŋ. Kɨla amɨn da asi uŋun Kristo yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmaŋ?
43007027	Uŋun amɨn kokupni uŋudon yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmamaŋ. Kristo apjak bɨsapmon amɨn da dukon amɨn kɨnda yaŋ dɨma nandaŋ ɨmdaŋ.”
43007028	Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu uŋun Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalon amɨn yoyɨŋ degek gen papmon da yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji nak dakon mibɨlno ae kokupno dukwan tosok uŋun nandaŋ. Mani nak naga da galak togon dɨma pɨgɨm. Datno nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun topni mɨnisi. Ji uŋun dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ,
43007029	mani nak uŋun gat egɨpgumak, ae uŋun da nak yabekban pɨgɨm, do uŋun nandaŋ ɨmɨsat.”
43007030	Gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek dam tebanon yɨp do awit, mani bɨsapni dɨma agɨt do amɨn kɨnda da dɨma abɨdagɨt.
43007031	Amɨn morapmɨ da nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn kɨnda da don abɨŋek on amɨn da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ asak uŋun yapmaŋek morapmɨsi asak? Arɨpmɨ dɨma, do on Kristo bo?”
43007032	Amɨn da Yesu do gen pɨsɨgon da yaŋ nandat aŋ ɨmɨŋakwa Parisi amɨn da nandawit. Nandaŋek mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat Parisi amɨn gat da Yesu abɨdok do obip amɨn yabekgwit.
43007033	Aŋakwa Yesu da gen yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok ji gat egek yabekban pɨgɨm amɨnon tobɨl wɨgɨkeŋ.
43007034	Wɨgapbo ji nak wɨsɨkdaŋ, mani dɨma nandakdaŋ. Ae nak da kokup egɨpbeŋ uŋudon ji arɨpmɨ dɨma wɨgɨkdaŋ.”
43007035	Yaŋban Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn da notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Uŋun dukwan kɨŋakwan dɨma koneŋ do yosok? Juda amɨn notnin Grik amɨn kabɨkon ekwaŋ uŋudon kɨŋek Grik amɨn yoyɨŋ detjak do yosok?
43007036	Uŋun da yaŋ yak, ‘Wɨgapbo ji nak wɨsɨkdaŋ, mani dɨma nandakdaŋ.’ Ae ‘Ji nak da kokup egɨpbeŋ uŋudon arɨpmɨ dɨma wɨgɨkdaŋ’ yaŋ yak. Gen uŋun niaŋon da yak?”
43007037	Jap noknok bɨsap madep egɨpgwit uŋun dakon mibɨ gɨldat uŋun bɨsap madepsi. Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu da pɨdaŋ agek gen papmon da yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda pakbi do asak kaŋ, nagon abɨŋek nosak.
43007038	Amɨn kɨnda nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namjak kaŋ, Piŋkop gen da yosok uŋun da arɨpmon burɨkon da pakbi morapmɨ egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ dasi pak aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak.”
43007039	(Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni amɨn da don Telagɨ Wup abɨdoni do gen uŋun yagɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu man madep dɨma pagɨt, do Telagɨ Wup dɨma yobi.)
43007040	Amɨn dɨwarɨ da Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Asisi, on Kombɨ Amɨn Piŋkop da yabekban mɨktɨmon pɨsak do yagɨt oni.”
43007041	Yaŋakwa dɨwarɨ da yawit, “On amɨn uŋun Kristo.” Ae dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Dɨma. Kristo uŋun Galili Provinskon da dɨma altosak.
43007042	Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: Kristo uŋun kɨla amɨn madep Dewit dakon yawi dɨwat kabɨkon da altosak. Uŋun kalɨp Dewit da egɨpgut kokup Betlehem uŋudon altokdɨsak.”
43007043	Amɨn da Yesu do nandak nandak yaŋ paŋek waseŋ kɨ kabi bamorɨ awit.
43007044	Dɨwarɨ da dam tebanon yɨp do nandawit, mani amɨn kɨnda da dɨma abɨdagɨt.
43007045	Obip amɨn uŋun tobɨl mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat Parisi amɨn garon kwa yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ji nido uŋun amɨn dɨma abɨdaŋ aweŋ?”
43007046	Yaŋba obip amɨn da yoyɨwit, “Amɨn kɨnda da uŋun amɨn da gen yosok uŋuden kɨnda dɨma yagɨt.”
43007047	Yaŋba Parisi amɨn da yoyɨwit, “Ji kɨsi bo paŋkewalak?
43007048	Kɨla amɨn kɨnda bo Parisi amɨn kɨnda da uŋun amɨn dɨmasi nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgut.
43007049	Uŋun amɨn kabɨ madep gen teban dɨma nandaba pɨsosok, do Piŋkop da uŋun amɨn kabɨ jobɨt tɨmɨtni do yagɨt.”
43007050	Nikodemus, uŋun kalɨp Yesukon kɨgɨt, uŋun kɨla amɨn gat Parisi gat da kabɨkon nani kɨnda. Uŋun da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
43007051	“Gen tebanin da yaŋ yosok, Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon mibɨlni dɨma yaŋban nandaŋek ɨsal dogɨn yokwi al yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma iyɨgɨ.”
43007052	Yaŋ yaŋban iyɨwit, “Gak kɨsi Galili amɨn, ma? Gak Piŋkop da papiakon gen toŋ uŋun pakyaŋsi manjɨŋek nandaki kaŋ, kombɨ amɨn kɨnda Galili Provinskon da arɨpmɨ dɨma altokdɨsak yaŋ nandakdɨsal.”
43007053	Yaŋ iyɨŋakwa amɨn kɨsi yutnikon kɨŋ kɨŋ awit.
43008001	Mani Yesu Ɨleŋ Olipmon wɨgɨgɨt.
43008002	Wɨsa dagokdosi aeni Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan pɨgakwan amɨn morapmɨ iyɨkon apgwit. Abɨŋakwa Yesu pabɨŋ yɨgek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
43008003	Aŋakwan gen teban yoyɨŋdet gat Parisi amɨn gat da mɨŋat kɨnda abɨdaŋ aŋapgwit. Amɨn da kaŋakwa uŋun mɨŋat da yumabi agɨt. Aŋabɨŋ amɨn da dabɨlon yɨpba
43008004	agakwan Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, on mɨŋat da yumabi si aŋakwan amɨn da kaŋ.
43008005	Gen tebanon Moses da gen kɨnda yagɨt uŋun yaŋ: mɨŋat uŋuden tɨpbaŋ aŋakba kɨmotjak. Gak da uŋun do niaŋ nandɨsal?”
43008006	Yesu da gen yokwi kɨnda yaŋban gen pikon yɨpneŋ yaŋ nandaŋek aŋkewalgwit. Mani Yesu gawak pɨgek kɨsirɨ da mɨktɨmon kɨlda mandagɨt.
43008007	Aŋakwan gen sigɨn iyɨŋakwa pɨdaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jikon da amɨn kɨnda yokwi kɨnda dɨma agɨt kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da mibɨltok mɨŋat da kwenon tɨp aŋatjak.”
43008008	Yaŋ yaŋek aeni gawagek mɨktɨmon kɨlda mandagɨt.
43008009	Gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek amɨn iyɨ kaloŋ kaloŋ kɨŋ kɨŋ awit. Bɨlakni morapmɨ amɨn da mibɨl taŋek kɨŋakwa bɨlakni kaloŋɨsok amɨn da buŋon kɨwit. Kɨŋ mudaŋakwa Yesu iyɨ gɨn egakwan mɨŋat uŋun ɨŋamnikon akgɨt.
43008010	Agakwan Yesu pɨdaŋ agek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat, amɨn morap uŋun dukwan keŋ? Amɨn kɨnda gen pikon gep do dɨma akdak on?”
43008011	Yaŋban mɨŋat da yagɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, amɨn kɨnda dɨma akdak.” Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Nakyo kɨsi gen pikon dɨma gepbeŋ. Gak kɨŋ aego yo yokwi dɨma aki.”
43008012	Yesu da mɨŋat amɨnyo yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak naga mɨktɨm dakon teŋteŋɨ. Amɨn kɨnda nak noljak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn pɨlɨn tukgwan dɨma agɨpjak. Egɨp egɨp dakon teŋteŋɨ da uŋun amɨnon tosak.”
43008013	Yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek Parisi amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak gaga naŋ joŋɨgek gaga do yaŋkwok asal, do nandano bamɨ dɨma asak.”
43008014	Yaŋba Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Uŋun asi, nak naga joŋɨgek yaŋkwok asat. Nak dukwan da apgum ae dukwan kɨkeŋ uŋun nandɨsat, do yaŋkwok asat uŋun bamɨsi yosot. Mani nak dukwan da apgum ae dukwan kɨkeŋ uŋun ji dɨma nandaŋ.
43008015	Ji amɨn kokwin aŋ uŋun mɨktɨm da aŋpagon kokwin aŋ. Nak amɨn kɨnda dɨma kokwinɨkdat.
43008016	Mani nak amɨn kokwin abom tam bamɨsi kokwinɨkgom. Nido nak naga gɨn amɨn kokwin dɨma asat, Datno nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun da nak aŋpulugaŋban kokwin amak.
43008017	Ji da gen tebanon gen yaŋ tosok, Amɨn bamorɨ da gen kaloŋɨ naŋgɨn yaŋkwok amal kaŋ, uŋun da gen bamɨ asak.
43008018	Nak naga naŋ joŋɨgek naga do yaŋkwok asat, ae Dat nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋunyo kɨsi nak naŋ joŋɨgek yaŋkwok asak.”
43008019	Yaŋban Parisi amɨn da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Datgo dukwan egɨsak?” Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nak dɨma nandaŋ namaŋ, ae Datno kɨsi dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ. Nandaŋ namaŋ tam, Datnoyo kɨsi tagɨ nandaŋ ɨbam.”
43008020	Yesu uŋun Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon burɨ kɨnda paret yopgwit uŋudon egek amɨn yoyɨŋ degek gen uŋun yagɨt. Mani bɨsapni dɨma agɨt, do amɨn kɨnda da dɨma abɨdagɨt.
43008021	Yesu da saŋbeŋek amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak depmaŋ kɨko ji nak wɨsɨkdaŋ, mani yokwisi taŋ damɨŋakwa kɨmotdaŋ. Nak da kɨkeŋon arɨpmɨ dɨma apni.”
43008022	Gen yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek Juda amɨn da iyɨ gɨn yaŋ yawit, “ ‘Nak kɨkeŋon arɨpmɨ dɨma apni’ yaŋ uŋun nido yosok? Iyɨ naŋ aŋagek kɨmot do yosok?”
43008023	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji mɨgon amɨn. Nak kwen amɨn. Ji mɨktɨm amɨn, mani nak mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma.
43008024	Yaŋdo, kɨlɨ dayɨt, ji yokwisi taŋ damɨŋakwa kɨmotdaŋ. Ji nak Uŋun Amɨn yaŋ dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namni kaŋ, yokwisi taŋ damɨŋakwa kɨmotdaŋ.”
43008025	Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Gak namɨn?” Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Nak kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm da dayɨŋ aŋaŋ obɨsat.
43008026	Ji dakon aŋpak kokwinɨgek gen morapmɨsi tagɨ yokeŋ. Mani Amɨn nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun top dɨma yosok. Gen morap uŋun yaŋban nandagɨm uŋun baŋ mɨktɨm amɨnon yaŋ teŋteŋosot.”
43008027	Gen uŋun yoyɨŋakwan Datni do yosok yaŋ dɨma nandawit,
43008028	do Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Amɨn Dakon Monji aŋenagek nak Uŋun Amɨn yaŋ nandaŋ namdaŋ. Uŋun bɨsapmon nak naga da nandak nandagon yo dɨma asat yaŋ nandakdaŋ. Dat da nayɨŋ dekgɨt uŋun baŋgɨn yosot yaŋ nandakdaŋ.
43008029	Nak yabekban pɨgɨm amɨn uŋun nak gat ekwamak. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nak Dat dakon galaktok yoldat, do dɨma nepmaŋ dekdak.”
43008030	Gen uŋun yaŋakwan gɨn amɨn morapmɨ da nandaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
43008031	Yesu da Juda amɨn nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak dakon gen guramɨtni kaŋ, nak dakon paŋdetnoni bamɨsi egɨpdaŋ.
43008032	Yaŋ egek gen bamɨ nandaŋ pɨsaŋba uŋun da pulugaŋ depdɨsak.”
43008033	Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin Abraham dakon babɨkni kabɨ ekwamaŋ. Nin bɨsap kɨndakon amɨn kɨnda dakon oman monjɨni dɨma egɨpgumaŋ. Do niaŋon da amɨn tagɨnin da kɨsiron da pulugaŋ kɨneŋ do yosol?”
43008034	Yaŋba Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn morap yokwi aŋ uŋun yokwi dakon oman monjɨni ekwaŋ.
43008035	Oman monjɨ amɨn yurɨ kɨnda gat toktogɨsi dɨma ekwaŋ. Monjɨ dagɨn toktogɨ ekwaŋ.
43008036	Yaŋdo, Monjɨ da pulugaŋ depjak kaŋ, ji wagɨlsi pulugaŋ depbi.
43008037	“Ji Abraham dakon amɨn kabɨ yaŋ nandaŋ damɨsat. Mani nak dakon gen abɨdok do dɨma nandaŋ, do nɨkba kɨmokgeŋ do nandaŋ.
43008038	Datno da yo morap nolɨgɨt uŋun do dayɨsat. Ae datji da aŋpak ani do dayɨgɨt, ji uŋun baŋ aŋ.”
43008039	Yaŋban nandaŋek Juda amɨn da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Datnin uŋun Abraham.” Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji asi Abraham dakon monjini tam, Abraham da iyɨ aŋpak agɨt uŋun baŋ abam.
43008040	Piŋkop da gen bamɨ morap yaŋban nandagɨm uŋun baŋ dayɨsat. Aŋapbo ji nak nɨkba kɨmokgeŋ do nandaŋ. Abraham yaŋ dɨma agɨt.
43008041	Ji datji dakon aŋpak uŋun baŋgɨn aŋ.” Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Nin gwamda dɨma. Datnin uŋun Piŋkop kaloŋ gɨn.”
43008042	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak Piŋkop gat egɨpgumak da pɨgɨm. Nak naga da galak togon dɨma pɨgɨm. Piŋkop da yabekban pɨgɨm, do Piŋkop uŋun asi Datji tam, ji da nak do but dasi galak taŋ nabam.
43008043	Gen yosot uŋun ji da dɨma nandaba pɨsosok. Nido geno abɨdok do dɨma nandaŋ.
43008044	Ji datji Sunduk uŋun dakon monjini egek galaktokni yol do tagɨsi nandaŋ. Kalɨpsi wasok wasogɨkon amɨn dapdap kɨnda egɨpgut. Gen bamɨ uŋun iyɨkon dɨma tosok, do gen bamɨ uŋun dɨma yoldak. Uŋun top gen dakon datni egɨsak, do iyɨ dakon gen yaŋek top yosok.
43008045	Mani nak gen bamɨ yosot, ae ji geno do nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak.
43008046	Nak yokwi asat yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Yaŋ nandaŋ kaŋ yokwi asat uŋun ji da tagɨ aŋteŋteŋ ani. Mani gen bamɨ yosot kaŋ, nido geno do nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak?
43008047	Piŋkop dakon amɨn ekwaŋ uŋun da gen morap yosok uŋun nandaŋ. Mani ji Piŋkop dakon amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ, do geni dɨma nandaŋ.”
43008048	Yesu da gen yaŋ yaŋban Juda amɨn da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak Samaria amɨn kɨnda, koŋ kɨnda da gak da buron egɨsak. Uŋun gen bamɨ yomaŋ?”
43008049	Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Nak da buron koŋ kɨnda dɨma egɨsak. Nak da Datno nandabo wukwan ɨmɨŋapbo, ji da nak do nandaba pɨsak.
43008050	Amɨn da nandaba wukwan namni do pi dɨma asat. Amɨn kɨnda gen kokwin amɨn egɨsak, uŋun da mano wukwisi tosak do pini asak.
43008051	Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda da nak dakon gen guramɨtjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn dɨmasi kɨmotjak.”
43008052	Yaŋban nandaŋek Juda amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yaŋ yaŋaki gak da buron koŋ kɨnda asisi egɨsak yaŋsi nandamaŋ. Abraham gat kombɨ amɨn gat uŋun kɨsi kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit, mani gak da yosol ‘Amɨn kɨnda da nak dakon gen guramɨtjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn dɨmasi kɨmotjak.’
43008053	Gak datnin Abraham uŋun yapmaŋdat yaŋ nandɨsal, ma? Abraham gat kombɨ amɨn gat kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit. Gak niaŋen amɨn kɨnda yaŋ nandɨsal?”
43008054	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak amɨn da nandaba wukwan namni do pi abeŋ kaŋ, mano pɨŋbisi asak. Mani Datno da mano madepsi tosak do pini asak. Ji da Datno do uŋun nin dakon Piŋkop yaŋ yoŋ.
43008055	Ji uŋun dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ, mani nak nandaŋ ɨmɨsat. Nak naga dɨma nandaŋ ɨmɨsat yaŋ yokeŋ kaŋ, ji yombem gɨn top amɨn akeŋ. Mani nak nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek geni guramɨkdat.
43008056	Babɨkji Abraham uŋun nak dakon bɨsap kok do tagɨsi nandagɨt. Uŋun kaŋek but kwaktok nandagɨt.”
43008057	Juda amɨn da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak dakon bɨlakgo 50 dɨma aŋakwan gak da nak Abraham kagɨm yaŋ yosol, ma?”
43008058	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, Abraham dɨma altaŋakwan nak kɨlɨ egɨpgum da egɨsat.”
43008059	Yaŋ yaŋakwan tɨp tɨmɨgek aŋakba kɨmotjak do nandawit. Mani Yesu uŋun pasɨlek Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon nagal yɨpmaŋek waŋga kɨgɨt.
43009001	Yesu kosit agek amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni kɨnda meŋi da yaŋ aŋalagɨt kagɨt.
43009002	Kaŋakwan paŋdetni da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, namɨn da yokwi aban on amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni da altagɨt. Iyɨ agɨt bo meŋi datniyo da agɨmal?”
43009003	Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn iyɨ yokwi agɨt bo ae meŋ datniyo da yokwi agɨmal uŋun do dɨma. Piŋkop da wasok kɨnda on amɨnon noman aban amɨn da koni do dabɨlɨ mɨni altagɨt.
43009004	Piŋkop da nak yabekban apgum uŋun dakon pini gɨldat kalba aneŋsi. Pɨlɨn tokdɨsak. Amɨn kɨnda da kalbi pi arɨpmɨ dɨma asak.
43009005	Nak mɨktɨmon egɨsaron nak naga on mɨktɨm dakon teŋteŋɨ.”
43009006	Yesu gen uŋun yaŋek mɨktɨmon ɨlɨp sulek mɨktɨm gat dagapmɨkban neŋak aban dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn da dabɨlon wɨrɨrɨkgɨt.
43009007	Yaŋ aŋek iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨŋ Silom Pakbi Ɨdapmon pakbi soki.” (Silom dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun “Yabekbi.”) Dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn uŋun kɨŋ pakbi soŋ dabɨlɨ sɨŋtaŋakwan yomanikon apgut.
43009008	Apban kokup ɨsalni gat ae yo do bɨsit yaŋakwan kawit amɨn gat da yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn uŋun kalɨp yɨgek amɨn da moneŋ ɨmni do bɨsit yoyɨgɨt uŋun amɨn bo?”
43009009	Dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Asi, on uŋun amɨn.” Aŋakwa dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Kagɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun yombem, mani on uŋun amɨn dɨma.” Yaŋ yaŋakwa amɨn uŋun iyɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak uŋun mani.”
43009010	Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Niaŋsi aŋek dabɨlgo kɨlek tak?”
43009011	Yaŋba gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda mani Yesu yaŋ iyaŋ uŋun da mɨktɨm baŋ neŋak wasaŋek dabɨlnokon wɨrɨrɨgek yaŋ nayɨk, ‘Gak kɨŋ Silom Pakbi Ɨdapmon pakbi soki.’ Yaŋ nayɨŋban kɨŋ pakbi soŋek dabɨlno kɨlek taŋban yo pɨndat.”
43009012	Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Uŋun amɨn dukwan egɨsak?” Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Nak dɨma nandɨsat.”
43009013	Amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni egɨpgut da sɨŋtagɨt uŋun iyɨŋ aŋaŋ Parisi amɨnon kɨwit.
43009014	Yesu da mɨktɨm baŋ neŋak wasaŋek dabɨlnikon wɨrɨrɨkban sɨŋtagɨt uŋun Sabat bɨsapmon agɨt.
43009015	Uŋun do aŋek Parisi amɨn da aeni iyɨwit, “Dabɨlgo niaŋsi aŋek kɨlek taŋban sɨŋtal?” Yaŋba yagɨt, “Uŋun da neŋak dabɨlnokon wɨrɨrɨkban pakbikon sugaŋek sɨŋtat da yo pɨndakdat.”
43009016	Yaŋban Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ da yaŋ yawit, “Uŋun amɨn Sabat dakon gen teban yapmaŋdak, do Piŋkop da dɨma yabekban apgut, yaŋ nandamaŋ.” Mani dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Uŋun yokwi pakpak amɨn tam wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ yaŋ dɨma aban.” Parisi amɨn gen bamorɨ yaŋ yaŋek waseŋ kɨ kabi bamorɨ awit.
43009017	Aeni dabɨlɨ sɨŋtagɨt amɨn yaŋ iyɨwit, “Uŋun amɨn wasok aban dabɨlgo sɨŋtak amɨn do niaŋen amɨn kɨnda yaŋ nandɨsal?” Yaŋba yagɨt, “Uŋun kombɨ amɨn kɨnda.”
43009018	Juda amɨn da uŋun amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni egɨpgut da sɨŋtagɨt uŋun do nandaba bamɨ dɨma agɨt. Yaŋ nandawit do uŋun amɨn dakon meŋi datniyo apjil do gen yɨpgwit.
43009019	Gen yɨpba kwan apbal yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Asi on monjɨ jil dakon? Dabɨlɨ mɨni altagɨt yaŋ yomal amɨn on uŋun? Yaŋ kaŋ niaŋ aŋek dabɨlɨ kɨlektak?”
