43009020	Yoyɨŋba meŋi datniyo da yaŋ yoyɨgɨmal, “Asi, on monjɨ nit dakon, dabɨlɨ mɨni naŋ meŋi da yaŋ aŋalagɨt.
43009021	Mani niaŋon da dabɨlɨ sɨŋtak uŋun nit dɨma nandamak. Ae namɨn da dabɨlɨ aban pɨsak, uŋunyo kɨsi nit dɨma nandamak. Uŋun amɨn madep kɨlɨ agɨt, do iyɨnaŋ iyɨŋba kobogɨ tagɨ dayɨsak.”
43009022	Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn da gen teban kɨnda yaŋ yɨpgwit, Amɨn kɨnda da Yesu uŋun Kristo yaŋ yosak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon dɨmasi wɨgɨsak. Gen teban yaŋ yɨpgwit, do meŋi datni da Juda amɨn do pasalek yaŋ yagɨmal,
43009023	“Uŋun amɨn madep kɨlɨ agɨt, do iyɨ naŋ iyɨŋba kobogɨ dayɨsak.”
43009024	Kalɨp dabɨlɨ mɨni egɨpgut amɨn uŋun ae kosirɨ kɨnda gat iyɨŋba opban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Piŋkop man madep ɨmɨŋek yaŋ teban tok tebaisi kɨnda aŋek gen bamɨ gɨn yoki. Uŋun amɨn uŋun yokwi pakpak amɨn kɨnda yaŋ nandamaŋ.”
43009025	Yaŋba amɨn uŋun da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Uŋun amɨn uŋun yokwi pakpak amɨn kɨnda bo dɨma uŋun dɨma nandɨsat. Mani yo kaloŋɨ nandɨsat, uŋun nak dabɨlno mɨni egɨpgum da abɨsok sɨŋtosot.”
43009026	Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Uŋun da niaŋsi aŋgamɨk? Niaŋon da dabɨlgo sɨŋtak?”
43009027	Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Nak kɨlɨ dayɨko dɨma nandayɨŋ. Ae nido sigɨn nandak do yoŋ? Ji kɨsi paŋdetni egɨp do aŋek yoŋ, ma?”
43009028	Yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek gen yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak uŋun amɨn dakon paŋdetni, mani nin Moses dakon paŋdetni ekwamaŋ.
43009029	Piŋkop da Moses gen iyɨgɨt yaŋ nandamaŋ, mani uŋun amɨn dukwan da apgut uŋun nin dɨma nandamaŋ.”
43009030	Yaŋ yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji da gen ŋwakŋwarɨsi kɨnda yoŋ. Uŋun amɨn da dabɨlno aŋmɨlɨp ak, mani ji da ‘uŋun amɨn dukwan da apgut uŋun nin dɨma nandamaŋ’ yaŋ yoŋ.
43009031	Piŋkop da yokwi pakpak dakon geni dɨma nandaŋ yomɨsak yaŋ nandamaŋ. Mani amɨn galaktokni yolek gawak ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun geni nandaŋ yomɨsak.
43009032	Amɨn kɨnda dabɨlɨ mɨni meŋi da yaŋ aŋalagɨt naŋ amɨn kɨnda da wasok aban dabɨlɨ pɨsagɨt yaŋ kɨnda dɨma nandagɨmaŋ. Mɨktɨm wasok wasogɨkon da egɨ aŋaŋ obɨŋek abɨsok ekwamaŋon gen bin kɨnda yaŋ dɨma nandamaŋ.
43009033	Uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da dɨma yabekban apgut tam, yo kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma aban.”
43009034	Yaŋban Parisi amɨn da uŋun gen nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Meŋgo da gak aŋalagɨron da abɨsok ekwamaŋon yokwigo madepsi taŋ gamgwit da taŋ gamaŋ, do gak nido nin niyɨŋ dekdal?” Yaŋ yaŋek yolba waŋga abɨgɨgɨt.
43009035	Yesu da yolba abɨgɨgɨt dakon gen uŋun nandaŋek wɨsɨŋ kaŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Amɨn Dakon Monji nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨsal bo dɨma?”
43009036	Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun namɨn? Nayɨŋbɨ uŋun amɨn nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨbeŋ.”
43009037	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak uŋun amɨn kɨlɨ kal. Gen gayɨsak amɨn uŋun mani.”
43009038	Yaŋban amɨn uŋun da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nak nandaŋ gadaŋ gamɨsat.” Yaŋ yaŋek gawak ɨmgut.
43009039	Aŋakwan Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak mɨktɨmon gen kokwin ak do pɨgɨm. Yaŋdo, dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn uŋun sɨŋtoni, ae dabɨlɨ sɨŋtoŋ amɨn uŋun dabɨlɨ mɨni ani.”
43009040	Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ kapmatjok akgwit uŋun da gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin kɨsi dabɨlnin mɨni ekwamaŋ yaŋ yosol, ma?”
43009041	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dabɨlji mɨni ekwaŋ tam, yokwisi mɨni. Mani ‘dabɨlnin toŋ’ yaŋ yoŋ, do yokwisi dakon gen uŋun sigɨn taŋ damɨŋ aŋaŋ kɨsak.”
43010001	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda sipsip dam dakon wigat naŋ dɨma pɨgek kosit ŋwakŋwarɨkon da dam ɨrak pɨgɨsak kaŋ, uŋuden amɨn uŋun kabo noknok ae amɨn dapmaŋek yoni gwayaŋ amɨn.
43010002	Mani wigat naŋ pɨgɨsak amɨn uŋun sipsip dakon kɨla amɨn.
43010003	Wigat kɨla amɨn da uŋun amɨn do yoma wɨtdal ɨban pɨgɨsak. Pɨgɨ sipsipni kaloŋ kaloŋ dakon mani yaŋban tegɨ nandaŋakwa mibɨltaŋ yoban waŋga kwaŋ.
43010004	Kɨsisi waŋga kɨŋ mudaŋakwa sipsip kɨla amɨn da mibɨltaŋ yoban tegɨ nandaŋ ɨmaŋ, do buŋon yol aŋaŋ kwaŋ.
43010005	Sipsip da amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ dɨma yolgaŋ. Tegɨ dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ do yaŋ yoban sipsip si pasal kɨŋ mudoŋ.”
43010006	Yesu da tɨlak gen uŋun yaŋban dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt.
43010007	Dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt do Yesu da aeni yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, nak naga sipsip dam dakon wigat.
43010008	Amɨn morap mibɨltok apgwit uŋun kabo noknok ae amɨn dapmaŋek yoni gwayaŋ amɨn. Mani sipsip da geni dɨma nandaŋ yomgwit.
43010009	Nak naga wigat. Amɨn kɨnda nagon abɨŋek damon pɨgɨsak kaŋ, Piŋkop da yokwikon naŋ abɨdokdɨsak. Aŋakwan uŋun amɨn damon pɨgɨ ae waŋga kɨŋ gɨn aŋek jap do arɨpmɨ dɨma akdɨsak.
43010010	Kabo noknok uŋun yo kɨnda do dɨma abɨsak. Uŋun sipsip kabo tɨmɨt do, ae dapban kɨmotni do, ae paŋupbal ak do abɨsak. Mani nak yaŋ do dɨma abɨsat. Nak wadak wadagɨ mɨni tagɨsi egɨpni do abɨsat.
43010011	“Nak naga sipsip dakon kɨla amɨn tagɨsi. Sipsip dakon kɨla amɨn tagɨsi uŋun iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨp paregek sipsipni paŋpulugosok.
43010012	Sipsip dakon kɨla amɨn yokwi moneŋ do nandaŋek pi asak uŋun sipsip dakon ami dɨma, do joŋ pɨŋan abɨsak bɨsapmon si pasalek sipsip yopmaŋ kɨsak. Yopmaŋ kɨŋakwan joŋ pɨŋan da obɨŋ sipsip dapmaŋ nok do aŋakwan waseŋ kwaŋ.
43010013	Uŋun amɨn tomni tɨmɨt dogɨn nandɨsak do yaŋ asak. Sipsip tagɨ egɨpni do dɨma nandɨsak.
43010014	-
43010015	“Nak naga sipsip dakon kɨla amɨn tagɨsi. Datno da nak nandaŋ namɨŋakwan nak da Datno nandaŋ ɨmɨsat. Uŋudeŋ gɨn sipsipno da nak nandaŋ namɨŋakwa nak da sipsipno nandaŋ yomɨsat. Aŋek sipsipno do aŋek naga dakon egɨp egɨpno parekdat.
43010016	“Nak sipsipno dɨwarɨ uŋun on damon nani dɨma. Uŋun waŋga ekwaŋ. Uŋun sipsip kabɨ nak da ɨlɨk paŋabɨŋ yopbo naga dakon tek nandakdaŋ. Aŋek sipsip kabi kaloŋɨ gɨn egakwa kɨla amɨn kaloŋɨ da kɨlani akdɨsak.
43010017	Nak egɨp egɨpno paregek aeno abɨdokdɨsat, yaŋ do Dat da nak do but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak.
43010018	Amɨn kɨnda da egɨp egɨpno arɨpmɨ dɨma gwayesak. Naga dakon galaktok yolek egɨp egɨpno parekgeŋ. Egɨp egɨpno parekgeŋ ae abɨdokeŋ uŋun dakon yaŋ dagok uŋun nagon tosok. Dat da yaŋsi abeŋ dosi yagɨt.”
43010019	Juda amɨn gen uŋun nandaŋek aeni waseŋ kɨ kabi bamorɨ awit.
43010020	Morapmɨ da yaŋ yawit, “Koŋ kɨnda burɨkon egakwan but upbal asak. Ji nido geni nandaŋ?”
43010021	Yaŋ yaŋakwa dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Gen yosok uŋun koŋni toŋ amɨn dakon gen naŋ dɨma yosok. Koŋ da dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋmɨlɨp agagɨ.”
43010022	Uŋun bɨsapmon Juda amɨn dakon jap noknok bɨsap madep kɨnda Jerusalem ais bɨsapmon noman tagɨt. Uŋun kalɨp Telagɨ Yut Madepni aŋkaluk awit uŋun do nandaŋek egɨpgwit.
43010023	Yesu uŋun Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan tamo kɨnda Solomon Dakon Kɨŋ Ap Tamo yaŋ yawit uŋudon agɨpgut.
43010024	Agakwan Juda amɨn da abɨŋ Yesu aŋgwasɨŋ agek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak gaga dakon mibɨlgo ni bɨsapmon niyɨŋ teŋteŋoki? Gak asi Kristo kaŋ, yaŋkwok nomansi a.”
43010025	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm, mani ji da nandaba bamɨ dɨma agɨt. Nak namɨn amɨnsi kɨnda Datno da manon pi morap asat uŋun da tagɨ dolɨsak.
43010026	Mani ji uŋun nak dakon sipsip kabɨ dɨma, do dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namaŋ.
43010027	Nak sipsip kabɨno nandaŋ yomɨsat. Uŋun tekno nandaŋek nolgaŋ.
43010028	Nak da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni yobo arɨpmɨ dɨmasi pasɨlni. Amɨn kɨnda da nak da kɨsiron baŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma gwayesak.
43010029	Datno da sipsip kabɨno namgut, ae Datno yo morap yapmaŋek wukwisi egɨsak, do amɨn kɨnda da kɨsitnikon baŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma gwayesak.
43010030	Dat gat nit kaloŋɨ ekwamak.”
43010031	Juda amɨn da gen uŋun nandaŋek aeni tɨp tɨmɨgek aŋakba kɨmotjak do awit.
43010032	Aŋakwa Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak Datno dakon pi tagɨsi morapmɨ ji dolɨk do aŋapbo pɨndakgwit. Uŋun pi agɨmgwan ni pi naŋ agɨm do nandaŋek tɨpbaŋ nɨt do aŋ?”
43010033	Yaŋban Juda amɨn da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak da pi tagɨsi kɨnda agɨl do aŋek tɨpbaŋ dɨma gɨtneŋ. Gak amɨn ɨsalɨ kɨnda da nak Piŋkop yaŋ yaŋek Piŋkop kulabɨsal uŋun do aŋek gɨtdamaŋ.”
43010034	Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Gen teban papiajikon Piŋkop dakon gen kɨnda yaŋ tosok: ‘Nak yaŋ dayɨsat, ji uŋun piŋkop.’
43010035	Piŋkop da papiakon gen toŋ uŋun bamɨsi gɨn. Kalɨp Piŋkop da amɨn do geni yoyɨŋ teŋteŋaŋek ji piŋkop yaŋ yoyɨgɨt.
43010036	Ae Dat da iyɨ nak tɨlak aŋek yabekban mɨktɨmon pɨgɨm. Do ‘Nak Piŋkop dakon Monji’ yaŋ yaŋapbo ji nido ‘Gak Piŋkop kulabɨsal’ yaŋ yoŋ?
43010037	Nak Dat dakon pi dɨma asat kaŋ, geno do nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak.
43010038	Mani nak asi pini asat. Yaŋdo, ji geno do nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak kaŋ, pi asat uŋun kaŋek nandaŋ gadat ani. Aŋek yaŋsi nandani, Dat uŋun nagon egɨsak ae nak Daron egɨsat.”
43010039	Yaŋ yaŋban aeni Yesu abɨdok do awit, mani dɨma abɨdaŋakwa kɨgɨt.
43010040	Kɨŋ Jodan Pakbi pudaŋek aeni Jon da kalɨp amɨn telagɨ pakbi soŋ ɨmgut uŋun kokupmon paŋkɨ egɨpgut.
43010041	Uŋudon egakwan amɨn morapmɨ Yesukon abɨŋ yaŋ yawit, “Jon uŋun geni paŋteban asak do wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ dɨma agɨt, mani gen morap on amɨn do yagɨt uŋun gen bamɨsi gɨn yagɨt.”
43010042	Uŋun kokupmon amɨn morapmɨ da Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
43011001	Amɨn kɨnda mani Lasarus uŋun sot agɨt. Kokupni uŋun Betani, uŋun Maria gat peni Mata gat dakon kokupni.
43011002	Uŋun Maria da pakbi kɨbaŋɨ toŋ tagɨsi Amɨn Tagɨ da kandapmon tagalek busuŋ daŋgwi naŋ ɨkdɨgaŋban kɨbɨdagɨt. Lasarus uŋun Maria gat peni gat dakon olapmɨ.
43011003	Sami bamot da Yesu do gen yɨpbal kɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, notgo but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsal uŋun sot asak.”
43011004	Yesu gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Uŋun sot asak mani wagɨl dɨma kɨmotjak. Piŋkop gat Monji gat da man madep panjil do sot uŋun asak.”
43011005	Yesu da Mata gat padɨge gat ae Lasarus gat do but dasi galak taŋ yomgut.
43011006	Yesu Lasarus da sot agɨt uŋun dakon geni nandaŋek kokup egɨpguron gɨldat bamorɨ gat egɨpgut.
43011007	Egɨ mudaŋek paŋdetni yoyɨgɨt, “Nin aenin tobɨl Judia Provinskon kɨneŋ.”
43011008	Yaŋban paŋdetni da iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, apmasok Juda amɨn da gak tɨpbaŋ gɨkba kɨmokgi do awit. Uŋun do dɨma nandaŋek aego tobɨl kɨk do yosol?”
43011009	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gɨldat kɨnda dakon teŋteŋɨ uŋun 12 awa toŋ. Amɨn kɨnda gɨldat kalba kosit agɨpjak kaŋ, mɨktɨm dakon teŋteŋɨ kosok, do arɨpmɨ dɨma maŋ potjak.
43011010	Mani kalbi kosit agɨpjak kaŋ, teŋteŋɨ mɨni do aŋek kesal aŋatjak.”
43011011	Yesu yaŋ yaŋek ae kɨnda gat yaŋ yagɨt, “Notnin Lasarus uŋun yum dɨpmɨni pokdok, do nak da kɨŋ aŋyolbo pɨdosak.”
43011012	Paŋdetni gen uŋun nandaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, yum dɨpmɨn pokdok kaŋ, sotni dagaŋ kɨŋakwan kɨlek tosak.”
43011013	Yesu da Lasarus kɨmakgɨt dakon gen yaŋban paŋdetni da asi dɨpmɨn pokdok yaŋ nandawit.
43011014	Yaŋ nandawit, do Yesu da nomansi yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Lasarus uŋun kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨt,
43011015	mani nak uŋudon dɨma egapbo kɨmakgɨt do tagɨ nandɨsat. Nido nak ji dakon nandaŋ gadat paŋteban ak do nandɨsat. Kɨlɨ uŋudon kɨno.”
43011016	Yesu da gen yaŋ mudaŋakwan Tomas, mani kɨnda Yayat yaŋ iyɨwit, uŋun da paŋdet notni dɨwarɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ninyo kɨsi uŋun gat kɨŋek kɨsi kɨmotneŋ.”
43011017	Yesu Betani kokupmon altaŋek Lasarus uŋun kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨt da gɨldat 4 kabɨ kɨmakbi tamogwan tosok yaŋ nandagɨt.
43011018	Betani kokup uŋun Jerusalem da kapmatjok 3 kilomita da tɨlak tosok.
43011019	Do Juda amɨn morapmɨ da Mata ae Maria dakon but paŋteban ak do apba olapmɨ kɨmakgɨt dakon gwayam egɨpgwit.
43011020	Mata uŋun Yesu obɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek Maria yutnon yɨpmaŋek kosiron kwan Yesu gat domdom agɨmal.
43011021	Aŋek Mata da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak ɨdon egɨpgul tam, olapno dɨma kɨmakgɨt.
43011022	Uŋun kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨt, mani abɨsok gak da Piŋkop yo niaŋen kɨnda do bɨsit iyɨŋbɨ uŋun da tagɨ gamjak yaŋ nandɨsat.”
43011023	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Olapgo uŋun pɨdokdɨsak.”
43011024	Yaŋban Mata da iyɨgɨt, “Asi, mibɨ gɨldaron pɨdot pɨdot bɨsap madepmon don pɨdokdɨsak yaŋ nandɨsat.”
43011025	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Nak naga pɨdot pɨdot ae egɨp egɨp ami. Amɨn kɨnda nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨŋek kɨmotjak kaŋ, kalugɨ sigɨn egɨpdɨsak.
43011026	Ae amɨn morap kalugɨ egek nandaŋ gadaŋ namni uŋun amɨn wagɨl dɨma kɨmotdaŋ. Gen uŋun yosot uŋun nandabɨ bamɨ asak, bo dɨma?”
43011027	Yaŋ yaŋban Mata da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, asi gak Kristo, Piŋkop dakon Monji, mɨktɨmon apjak do yaŋbi amɨn yaŋ nandaŋ gamɨsat.”
43011028	Mata gen uŋun yaŋek tobɨl kɨŋ padɨge Maria iyɨndage tayaŋgok yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet da abɨk da gak do yosok.”
43011029	Maria gen uŋun nandaŋek tepmɨsi pɨdaŋ Yesu kok do kɨgɨt.
43011030	Yesu uŋun kokupmon dɨma obɨŋek Mata gat domdom agɨmal tamokon uŋudon gɨn sigɨn akgɨt.
43011031	Juda amɨn Maria dakon but aŋteban ak do yutnon egɨpgwit uŋun da kaŋba Maria tepmɨsi pɨdaŋ waŋga pɨkwan kaŋ, kɨmakbi tamokon kunam tat do kɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek buŋon yolgwit.
43011032	Maria Yesu akgɨron kɨŋ kaŋek kandapmɨkon maŋ pagek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak ɨdon kɨsi egɨpgumaŋ tam olapno dɨma kɨmakgɨt.”
43011033	Yesu da Maria gat Juda amɨn Maria gat apgwit uŋun kunam takba pɨndagek bupmɨ madepsi nandaŋek burɨ da yokwi tagɨt.
43011034	Aŋek yoyɨgɨt, “Ji bumjotni dukwan yɨpgwit?” Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, abɨŋek ka.”
43011035	Yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek Yesu kunam takgɨt.
43011036	Yaŋ aban kaŋek Juda amɨn da yaŋ yawit, “Kabɨt. Uŋun da uŋun amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmgut.”
43011037	Mani amɨn dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Uŋun da dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn aŋmɨlɨp aban sɨŋtagɨt. Yaŋ agɨt, do ae nido uŋun amɨn dɨma aŋpulugaŋakwan kɨmakgɨt?”
43011038	Yesu uŋun aeni bupmɨsi nandaŋek kɨmakbi tamokon kɨŋ altagɨt. Kɨmakbi tamo uŋun tɨp kɨnam kɨnda tɨp madep naŋ sopgwit.
43011039	Yesu yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji tɨp madep aba kwan.” Yaŋ yaŋban Mata uŋun amɨn kɨmakgɨt dakon sami da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, abɨsok taŋban gɨldat 4 kabɨ asak, do yaŋ aneŋ kaŋ, kɨbaŋ madepsi akdɨsak.”
43011040	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Nak kɨlɨ gayɨgɨm, nak nandaŋ gadaŋ nabi kaŋ, gak Piŋkop dakon tapmɨm madepni kokdɨsal.”
43011041	Yaŋ yaŋakwan tɨp madep aba kɨŋakwan Yesu kwen sɨŋtaŋban wɨgakwan yaŋ yagɨt, “Dat, gak bɨsitno kɨlɨ nandal, do ya yaŋ gayɨsat.
43011042	Gak bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ bɨsitno nandɨsal, mani abɨsok on amɨn ɨdon akgaŋ uŋun da gak da nak yabekbɨ pɨgɨm yaŋ nandani uŋun do aŋek gen uŋun gayɨsat.”
43011043	Yesu yaŋ yaŋek gen papmon da yagɨt, “Lasarus, waŋga pɨ!”
43011044	Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn kɨmakbi ɨmal naŋ kɨsit kandap tomni dabɨlyo wamgwit walɨmbɨl waŋga pɨgɨt. Pɨŋban Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ɨmalni wɨtdalek yɨpba kɨsak.”
43011045	Juda amɨn morapmɨ Maria gat gwayam egɨp do opgwit uŋun da Yesu da yo agɨt uŋun kaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
43011046	Mani dɨwarɨ da Parisi amɨnon kɨŋek Yesu da yo agɨt uŋun do yoyɨwit.
43011047	Yaŋ aŋakwa mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat Parisi amɨn gat da gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ yoyɨŋba abɨŋ muwukba yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Niaŋ ano? Uŋun amɨn wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ morapmɨ asak.
43011048	Nin yum koneŋ kaŋ, uŋun da wasok morapmɨ yaŋ gɨn aŋakwan amɨn kɨsi da nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmdaŋ. Aŋakwa Rom gapman da abɨŋ Telagɨ Yut Madep gat ae Juda amɨn nin kɨsi paŋupbal akdaŋ.”
43011049	Yaŋ yaŋba amɨn kɨnda bɨkbɨknikon yɨkgɨt, mani Kaiapas, uŋun bɨlak do mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn egɨpgut, uŋun da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nandak nandakji mɨni.
43011050	Juda amɨn nin morap kɨsi do aŋek amɨn kaloŋɨ da kɨmotjak kaŋ, uŋun da tagɨsi asak. Ji uŋun dɨma nandaŋ? Nin kɨsi pasɨl mudoneŋ kaŋ, uŋun da tagɨ dɨma asak.”
43011051	Kaiapas gen yagɨt uŋun iyɨ da nandak nandagon da dɨma yagɨt. Uŋun bɨlak do mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn egek kombɨ gen yaŋek Yesu da Juda amɨn kɨsi do aŋek kɨmotjak do yagɨt.
43011052	Ae Juda amɨn dogɨn dɨma, Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat monjɨyo dukwan dukwan ekwaŋ, uŋun kɨsi paŋmuwuk kabɨ kaloŋ yop do aŋek kɨmotdɨsak.
43011053	Uŋun gɨldaron gɨn kɨla amɨn da wasaŋek Yesu aŋakba kɨmotjak do gen yaŋ paŋkosit awit.
43011054	Yaŋ awit, do Yesu Juda amɨn da bɨkbɨgon noman dɨma agɨpgut. Aŋek uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋon uŋun da kapmatjok kokup kɨnda mani Epraim uŋudon kwan paŋdetni gat egɨpgwit.
43011055	Yapyap Bɨlak kwaŋ taŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ kokup dukwan dukwan da Jerusalem apgwit. Abɨŋ aŋpakni yolek iyɨ Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek taŋek bɨsap madepmon kɨlegɨsi egɨpni yaŋ do pini awit.
43011056	Aŋek Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalon muwuk egek Yesu wɨsɨŋek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Niaŋ nandaŋ? Jap noknok bɨsap madep abɨŋ kosak bo dɨma?”
43011057	Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat Parisi amɨn gat da amɨn yaŋ kɨlɨ yoyɨwit, “Amɨn kɨnda da Yesu uŋudon egɨsak yaŋ nandɨsak kaŋ, niyɨŋban abɨdaŋ dam tebanon yɨpneŋ.”
43012001	Gɨldat 6 kabɨ taŋakwa don Yapyap Bɨlak altosak uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu Betani kokupmon kɨgɨt. Betani kokup uŋun Lasarus Yesu da kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt amɨn dakon kokupni.
43012002	Uŋudon Yesu do nandaba wukwan ɨmɨŋek jap pakbiyo madep awit. Aba Mata da jap pɨlɨk yomɨŋakwan Lasarus gat amɨn dɨwarɨ gat kɨsi yɨgek Yesu gat jap nawit.
43012003	Naŋakwa Maria da pakbi kɨbaŋɨ toŋ tagɨsi kɨnamɨ kɨnda abɨdagɨt. Uŋun pakbi dakon tɨlakni uŋun 1 lita dakon binap, ae yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun wukwisi. Uŋun pakbi kɨnam abɨdaŋek Yesu da kandapmon tagalek iyɨ dakon busuŋ daŋgwani baŋ ɨkdɨgagɨt. Aban uŋun pakbi dakon kɨbaŋɨ da yut kɨsi ɨlɨmɨk mudagɨt.
43012004	Yaŋ aŋakwan paŋdetni kɨnda mani Judas Iskariot, uŋun don Yesu uwal da kɨsiron yɨpgut, uŋun da yaŋ yagɨt,
43012005	“Uŋun pakbi kɨbaŋɨ toŋ tagɨsi amɨnon moneŋ 300 danari da arɨp tɨmɨgek yoni mɨni amɨn do yomnom tam uŋun tagɨsi.”
43012006	Judas uŋun yoni mɨni amɨn do nandaba kɨk aŋek dɨma yagɨt. Iyɨ uŋun kabo noknok amɨn kɨnda Yesu gat paŋdetni gat dakon moneŋ kɨnam kɨla agɨt, do bɨsap morapmɨ moneŋ yopgwit uŋun Judas da kabo tɨmɨkgɨt.
43012007	Yesu da gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Mɨŋat on yum koni. Nak kɨmokgo soŋ namɨŋek kɨmakbi tamokon nepni uŋun bɨsap do pakbi on aŋnoman agɨt.
43012008	Yoni mɨni amɨn uŋun bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ ji gat egɨpdaŋ, mani nak bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ ji gat dɨma egɨpdamaŋ.”
43012009	Juda amɨn morapmɨ Yesu Betani kokupmon egɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek uŋudon apgwit. Yesu kok do gɨn dɨma, Lasarus kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt uŋunyo kɨsi kok do apgwit.
43012010	-
43012011	Yesu da Lasarus aban pɨdaŋban kaŋek Juda amɨn morapmɨ da kɨla amɨni yopmaŋ degek Yesukon kɨŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit. Yaŋdo, mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ da Lasarus kɨsi aŋakba kɨmotjak do gen paŋkosit awit.
43012012	Gɨldat kɨnda do amɨn kabɨ madep Yapyap Bɨlak kok do apgwit uŋun da Yesu Jerusalem kokup papmon abɨsak yaŋ nandawit.
43012013	Nandaŋek jopbaŋ dakon tamɨ mandaŋ tɨmɨk Yesu kok do kokup pap da waŋga pɨgɨwit. Pɨgek gen papmon da yaŋ yawit: “Osana! Piŋkop aŋkɨsino! ‘Amɨn Tagɨ da manon abɨsak amɨn uŋun gɨsamɨ toŋ egɨsak.’ Israel amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep uŋun gɨsamɨ toŋ egɨsak.”
43012014	Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da donki kɨnda kaŋ uŋun da kwenon yɨkgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt.
43012015	Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Saion kokup pap dakon amɨn, ji dɨma pasolni. Kabɨt, ji dakon kɨla amɨn madep donki bɨlagɨ da kwenon yɨgek abɨsak.”
43012016	Uŋun bɨsapmon paŋdetni gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt. Mani buŋon don man madep paŋakwan gen papiakon mandabi uŋun Yesu dosi yosok yaŋ nandaba pɨsagɨt. Ae amɨn da yo aŋɨmgwit uŋun papiakon gen toŋ uŋunyo kɨsi do nandaba pɨsagɨt.
43012017	Yesu da Lasarus kɨmakbi tamokon naŋ yaŋ ɨban pɨdagɨt bɨsapmon amɨn morapmɨ da kaŋek kɨŋ gen bini yaŋba ɨreŋ tagɨt.
43012018	Wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨt uŋun dakon gen bini kɨlɨ yaŋba nandawit, do amɨn morapmɨ da kosiron kok do kɨwit.
43012019	Yaŋ aŋakwa Parisi amɨn da pɨndagek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Yo morap aŋ ɨm do nandamaŋ uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma aneŋ. Pɨndakgɨt, mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo morap kɨsi da yolgaŋ.”
43012020	Yapyap Bɨlagon amɨn Piŋkop gawak ɨm do Jerusalem egɨpgwit uŋun bɨkbɨkgwan Grik amɨn dɨwarɨ kɨsi egɨpgwit.
43012021	Uŋun Grik amɨn da Pilip kɨŋ kawit. (Pilip uŋun Galili provins Betsaida kokupmon nani.) Yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn tagɨ, nin Yesu kok do abamaŋ.”
43012022	Yaŋba Pilip da kɨŋ Andru iyɨŋban kɨsi Yesukon kɨŋek gen uŋun iyɨgɨmal.
43012023	Iyɨŋbal yagɨt, “Amɨn Dakon Monji man madep pasak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun kwaŋ tosok.
43012024	Nak asisi dayɨsat, wit yet mɨktɨmon maŋek dɨma kɨmotjak kaŋ, ɨsal tokdɨsak. Mani kɨmotjak kaŋ, bamɨ morapmɨ tokdaŋ.
43012025	Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨpni do but dasi galak tosak kaŋ pasɨl ɨmjak. Mani amɨn kɨnda mɨktɨmon egɨp egɨpni uwal aŋɨmjak kaŋ, egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdosak.
43012026	Nak do oman asak amɨn uŋun nak nol kɨmotjak. Aŋek nak da egɨsaron oman amɨno kɨsi egɨpdeŋ. Nak do oman asak amɨn uŋun Datno da man madep ɨmdɨsak.”
43012027	Yesu da gen saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Abɨsok butno jɨk tosok. Ni gen naŋ yokeŋ? ‘Dat yo jɨgɨ nagon apdɨsak gwayeki’ yaŋ yokeŋ? Dɨma. Yo jɨgɨ nagon apdɨsak uŋun pak do apgum.
43012028	Dat, mango aŋpap abɨ madepsi asak.” Yesu yaŋ yaŋban Kwen Kokupmon da gen kɨnda yaŋ pɨgɨt, “Nak mano aŋpap abo madepsi agɨt da aeno akdɨsat.”
43012029	Amɨn kapmatjok akgwit da gen uŋun nandaŋek dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Kɨrɨrɨŋ asak” ae dɨwarɨ da “Aŋelo kɨnda da gen iyɨk” yaŋ yawit.
43012030	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen uŋun nandayɨŋ uŋun naga do aŋek dɨma, ji do aŋek altak.
43012031	Abɨsok Piŋkop da on mɨktɨmon amɨn kokwin akdɨsak. Abɨsok on mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep yolban kɨkdɨsak.
43012032	Nak mɨktɨmon naŋ aŋenotni bɨsapmon amɨn kɨsisi ɨlɨkgo nagakon apdaŋ.”
43012033	(Yesu uŋun kosit niaŋon da kɨmotjak uŋun nandani do tɨlak gen uŋun yagɨt.)
43012034	Yaŋban amɨn da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Kristo uŋun altaŋek dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨpdɨsak, Piŋkop dakon gen teban papia da yaŋ yosok. Do gak da Amɨn Dakon Monji aŋenotdaŋ yaŋ nido yosol? Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun namɨn amɨn kɨnda?”
43012035	Yaŋba Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok teŋteŋɨ ji gat egɨpjak. Pɨlɨn tuk tepmɨ apban kosit dɨma kokdaŋ, do abɨsok teŋteŋɨ taŋakwan gɨn teŋteŋɨkon agɨpni. Amɨn pɨlɨn tukgwan akwaŋ uŋun dukwan kwaŋ uŋun dɨma nandaŋ.
43012036	Abɨsok teŋteŋɨ ji gat egakwan gɨn egɨp egɨpji teŋteŋɨkon tosok yaŋsi nandaŋek teŋteŋɨ dakon monjɨni dagoni.” Yesu gen uŋun yoyɨŋ mudaŋek dɨma koni do yopmaŋ kɨŋ pasɨlɨkon egɨpgut.
43012037	Wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ morapmɨ aban kawit, mani sigɨn dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
43012038	Yaŋ aŋakwa kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da gen yagɨt uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Amɨn Tagɨ, gen yagɨmaŋ uŋun namɨn da nandaban bamɨ agɨt? Ae Amɨn Tagɨ da tapmɨmni namɨn do yolɨŋban kagɨt?”
43012039	-
43012040	Ae gen kɨnda gat yaŋ yagɨt: “Yo kɨnda dɨma koni yaŋ do Piŋkop da dabɨlɨ paŋsopgut. Ae but da nandaŋ pɨsaŋek nagon apba dɨma paŋmɨlɨp abeŋ yaŋ do but yomani dakon kosit sopmaŋ yomgut.” Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do arɨpmɨ dɨma nandaŋ gadawit.
43012041	Aisaia da Yesu dakon tɨlɨmni kaŋek gen uŋun Yesu dosi yagɨt.
43012042	Yaŋ di aŋakwa kɨla amɨn morapmɨ Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit. Mani Parisi amɨn do pasalek yaŋkwok dɨma awit. Parisi amɨn da muwut muwut yutnikon baŋ yolba waŋga egɨpni uŋundo si pasalek yaŋkwok dɨma awit.
43012043	Amɨn da mani pawɨgɨni do galagɨsi nandawit. Mani Piŋkop da mani pawɨgɨsak do dɨma nandawit.
43012044	Yesu da tebaisi yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨsak, uŋun amɨn nak kaloŋ naŋgɨn dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨsak. Uŋun Dat yabekban pɨgɨm uŋunyo kɨsi nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨsak.
43012045	Nak nandɨsak amɨn da nak yabekban pɨgɨm amɨn uŋun kosok.
43012046	Nak mɨktɨmon teŋteŋɨ da yaŋ apgum. Do nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namni amɨn uŋun pɨlɨn tukgwan dɨma egɨpdaŋ.
43012047	Amɨn kɨnda geno nandaŋek dɨma guramɨtjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn dɨma kokwinɨkgeŋ. Nak on mɨktɨmon amɨn kokwin ak do dɨma pɨgɨm. Yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do pɨgɨm.
43012048	Mani amɨn kɨnda nak manji namɨŋek geno dɨma abɨdosak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn gen yagɨm uŋun da mibɨ gɨldaron kokwin akdɨsak.
43012049	Nido nak naga da nandak nandagon da dɨma yosot. Dat yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun da iyɨ niaŋ yokeŋ ae niaŋon da yokeŋ do nayɨgɨt uŋun baŋ yosot.
43012050	Dat da gen yokeŋdosi nayɨgɨt uŋun gen da amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni paŋalon aŋyomɨsak yaŋsi nandɨsat. Yaŋ do aŋek gen nayɨgɨt uŋun baŋgɨn yosot.”
43013001	Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap noknok bɨsap dɨma altaŋakwan Yesu on mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋek Daron wɨgɨkdɨsat dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandagɨt. Yesu on mɨktɨmon paŋdetni egɨpgwit uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ yomgut. Sigɨn yaŋ gɨn nandaŋ yomɨŋakwan wɨgɨ bɨsapni mudagɨt.
43013002	Pɨlɨndo Yesu gat paŋdetni gat jap naŋek yɨkgwit. Sunduk da Judas, Saimon Iskariot dakon monji, uŋun da Yesu uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak do nandak nandak kɨlɨ ɨmgut.
43013003	Yesu yaŋsi nandagɨt, Dat da yo morap kɨla abeŋ do tapmɨm namgut yaŋ nandagɨt. Ae Piŋkopmon da apgum, do ae Piŋkopmon tobɨl kɨkdɨsat yaŋ kɨsi nandagɨt.
43013004	Do Yesu jap noknok tamokon da pɨdaŋ ɨmal dubakni kukwaŋ yɨpmaŋek pakbi soŋ wɨrɨrɨt ɨmal kɨnda abɨdaŋek kogɨkon wamgut.
43013005	Yaŋ aŋek pakbi tagalban ɨdap madep kɨndakon pɨgakwa paŋdetni dakon kandap wasaŋek sugagɨt. Yaŋ aŋek pakbi soŋ wɨrɨrɨt ɨmal kogɨkon wamgut uŋun naŋ wɨrɨrɨkgɨt.
43013006	Yaŋ aŋek Yesu Saimon Pitakon opban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak nak dakon kandap sugokdɨsal, ma?”
43013007	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da yo asat uŋun abɨsok dɨma nandabɨ pɨsosok, mani don nandabɨ pɨsokdaŋ.”
43013008	Yaŋban Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak dakon kandap dɨmasi sugoki.” Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Dɨma sugaŋ gabeŋ kaŋ, gak paŋdetno dɨma egɨpdɨsal.”
43013009	Yaŋban Saimon Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, yaŋ kaŋ kandapno gɨn dɨma sugoki. Kɨsitno ae busuŋno kɨsi sugoki.”
43013010	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda pakbi kɨlɨ sogɨt kaŋ, uŋun amɨn kandapni baŋgɨn sugosak. Yaŋ aban gɨptɨmni kɨsi kɨlegɨsi akdaŋ. Ji kɨlɨ kɨlek tawit. Mani ji kɨsi do dɨma yosot.”
43013011	Yesu namɨn amɨn da uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak uŋun amɨn kɨlɨ kagɨt. Uŋun do aŋek ji kɨsi dɨma kɨlek taŋ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt.
43013012	Yesu paŋdetni dakon kandap sugaŋ mudaŋ ɨmal dubakni paŋek tobɨl paŋkɨ tamonikon yɨkgɨt. Paŋkɨ yɨgek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak da yo aŋ damɨsat uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨ nandaŋ?
43013013	Ji da nak Yoyɨŋdet ae Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ nayaŋ. Uŋun tagɨsi yoŋ. Nak uŋun mani.
43013014	Nak Amɨn Tagɨsi ae Yoyɨŋdetji da kandapji sugat. Do jiyo kɨsi notji dakon kandap sugaŋ sugaŋ ani.
43013015	Nak da yo ani do dolɨsat, uŋun kaŋek uŋun naŋ gɨn ani.
43013016	Asisi dayɨsat, oman monjɨ amɨn tagɨni dɨma yapmaŋdak. Ae gen aŋkɨsak amɨn da yabet amɨn dɨma yapmaŋdak.
43013017	Ji nak da aŋpak uŋun at dakon mibɨlɨ kɨlɨ uŋun nandaŋ. Ji yaŋ gɨn ani kaŋ, kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ.
43013018	Nak ji kɨsi do dɨma yosot. Nak naga amɨn kabɨ naga do manjɨgɨm uŋun nandaŋ yomɨsat. Mani Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun bamɨ toŋ akdɨsak. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Nak gat bret nomak amɨn uŋun nak bamaŋ nam do kandapmɨ aŋenokdok.’
43013019	Yo uŋun dɨma altaŋakwa gen uŋun kɨlɨ dayɨt. Do don yo uŋun bamɨ noman taŋakwa yaŋsi nandaŋ gadani, Nak Naga Uŋun Amɨn.
43013020	Asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda pi monjɨno yabekgo kwa but dasi abɨdosok kaŋ, uŋun amɨn nak naŋ but dasi abɨdosok. Ae nak but dasi abɨdosok amɨn Piŋkop nak yabekgɨt uŋun naŋ but dasi abɨdosok.”
43013021	Yesu gen uŋun yaŋek burɨgwan da jɨgɨsi nandaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, jikon da kɨnda da nak uwal da kɨsiron nepdɨsak.”
43013022	Gen uŋun yaŋban paŋdetni notni pɨndak pɨndak awit. Namɨn amɨn do yosok uŋun dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt.
43013023	Paŋdetni kɨnda Yesu da but dasi galak taŋ ɨmgut uŋun Yesu da ɨleŋɨkon yɨkgɨt.
43013024	Saimon Pita da busuŋɨ da tɨlak aŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Namɨn do yosok yaŋ do iyɨŋ ka.”
43013025	Iyɨŋban uŋun paŋdetni da Yesu da kapmatsisok kɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, namɨn do yosol?”
43013026	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda bret dɨwat on ɨdapgwan sɨbɨŋek ɨbo nokdɨsak uŋun amɨn do yosot.” Yaŋ yaŋek bret ɨdapgwan sɨbɨŋek Judas do ɨmgut. Judas uŋun Saimon Iskariot dakon monji.
43013027	Judas bret uŋun abɨdaŋakwan Sunduk da burɨkon pɨgɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Yo ak do nandal uŋun tepmɨsi abi.”
43013028	Amɨn morap jap noknok tamokon yɨkgwit uŋun Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt.
43013029	Judas uŋun moneŋ kɨla agɨt. Do amɨn dɨwarɨ da Judas kɨŋ Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨm dakon bɨsap madep dakon yo dɨ yumjak, bo ae bupmɨ amɨn do moneŋ yomjak do iyɨsak yaŋ nandawit.
43013030	Judas bret dɨwat uŋun abɨdaŋek uŋudon gɨn waŋga pɨgɨgɨt. Waŋga uŋun pɨlɨn tuk kɨlɨ agɨt.
43013031	Judas uŋun yomakon pɨgakwan Yesu yaŋ yagɨt, “Abɨsok Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun man madep pakdɨsak. Ae Monji do aŋek Piŋkop yo kɨsi man madep paŋek
43013032	Monji do man madep ɨmdɨsak. Yaŋ uŋun tepmɨsi akdɨsak.
43013033	“Gwakno kabɨ, nak ji gat bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gɨn egɨpneŋ. Nak kɨŋapbo ji da nak wɨsɨkdaŋ. Mani Juda amɨn yoyɨgɨm yaŋ gɨn abɨsok ji baŋ dayɨsat, nak da kɨsaron ji arɨpmɨ dɨma apdaŋ.
43013034	“Nak gen teban kalugɨ kɨnda damɨsat uŋun yaŋ: ji dɨsikon notji do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ yomɨŋ ani. Nak ji do but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat, yaŋ gɨn ji dɨsikon notji do yaŋ gɨn nandani.
43013035	Ji dɨsikon notji do but dasi galak taŋ yomni kaŋ, amɨn kɨsi da dandaba ji nak dakon paŋdet kabɨno akdaŋ.”
43013036	Kɨlɨ Saimon Pita da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak dukon kɨkdɨsal?” Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da kokup kɨkdɨsat uŋudon abɨsok gak arɨpmɨ dɨma noldɨsal. Mani don nak noldɨsal.”
43013037	Yaŋban Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, mibɨlɨ niaŋon da nak abɨsok gak tagɨ dɨma golbeŋ? Nak gak do aŋek tagɨ kɨmokgeŋ.”
43013038	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak nak do aŋek tagɨsi kɨmokgeŋ yaŋ nandɨsal, ma? Asisi gayɨsat, pup gen dɨma yaŋakwa gak da ‘nak do uŋun amɨn dɨma nandaŋ ɨmɨsat’ yaŋ kosirɨ kapbɨ yokdɨsal.”
43014001	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji butji dɨma jɨk toni. Egɨp egɨpji Piŋkopmon tosok yaŋsi nandani, ae egɨp egɨpji nagon tosok yaŋsi nandaŋ namni.
43014002	Datno da yutnon yut burɨ morapmɨsi toŋ. Yaŋ dɨma kaŋ, gen uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma dayɨkom.
43014003	Nak kɨŋ ji dakon tamo paŋnoman aŋek, aeno tobɨl abɨŋ ji tɨmɨkgo paŋkɨ nak gat egɨpneŋ.
43014004	Nak da kokup kɨkdɨsat dakon kosit uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ.”
43014005	Yaŋban Tomas da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak dukon kɨkdɨsal, nin dɨma nandamaŋ. Do niaŋon da kosit uŋun koneŋ?”
43014006	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak naga kosit, ae gen bamɨ, ae egɨp egɨp. Daron kɨgɨk kosit ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda dɨmasi tosok. Nak kaloŋgɨn.
43014007	Nak do pakyaŋsi nandaŋ nameŋ tam, Datnoyo kɨsi tagɨ nandaŋ ɨbam. Abɨsok da wasaŋek uŋun nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek kɨlɨ uŋun koŋ.”
43014008	Yaŋ yaŋban Pilip da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak da Dat nolɨŋbɨ nin dakon but mudaŋban.”
43014009	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Pilip, nak bɨsap dubagɨ ji gat egɨpgumaŋ, mani nak dɨma nandaŋ namɨsal, ma? Amɨn kɨnda nak nandɨsak uŋun Dat naŋ kosok. Gak niaŋon da Dat nolɨŋbɨ kono yaŋ yosol?
43014010	Bo Dat nagon egakwan nak Daron egɨsat uŋun nandabɨ bamɨ dɨma ak? Nak gen dayɨt uŋun naga da nandak nandagon da dɨma dayɨt. Dat nagon egɨsak uŋun da pini asak.
43014011	Nak Daron egapbo Dat nagon egɨsak yaŋ dayɨsat uŋun nandaba bamɨ asak. Mani geno do nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak kaŋ, wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ morap agɨm uŋun da mibɨlno tagɨ dolɨsak.
43014012	“Asisi dayɨsat, nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namjak amɨn da nak da pi asat uŋun akdɨsak. Nak Daron wɨgɨkdɨsat, do nak da pi agɨm si yapmaŋek madepsi akdɨsak.
43014013	Yo morap abeŋ do nak da manon da nayɨni, uŋun akdɨsat. Yaŋ abo Dat da Monjikon man madep pakdɨsak.
43014014	Yo morap do nak da manon bɨsit yoni, uŋun nak akdɨsat.”
43014015	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji nak do but dasi galak taŋ namaŋ kaŋ, yo morap ani do yagɨm uŋun guramɨtni.
43014016	Nak Datno iyɨko uŋun da Paŋpulugok kɨnda gat damdɨsak. Uŋun da ji gat bɨsap mudok mudogɨ mɨni egɨpdɨsak.
43014017	Paŋpulugok damdɨsak uŋun gen bamɨ dakon Wup. Mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨdogɨ, nido dɨma koŋ, ae dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ. Mani ji da nandaŋ ɨmaŋ. Ji gat egɨsak, ae don ji da butgwan egɨpdɨsak.
43014018	Nak ji depmaŋ dekgo meŋ datyoni mɨni da tɨlagon dɨma egɨpdaŋ. Nak jikon tobɨl apdɨsat.
43014019	Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok egek mɨktɨm amɨn da nak dɨma nandakdaŋ. Mani ji da nak nandakdaŋ. Nak egɨsat, do jiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn egɨpdaŋ.
43014020	Uŋun bɨsapmon nak Daron egɨsat, ae ji nagon ekwaŋ, ae nak jikon egɨsat, yaŋsi nandaba pɨsokdɨsak.
43014021	Amɨn kɨnda yo morap ani do yagɨm uŋun nandaŋek guramɨkdak, uŋun amɨn da nak do but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak. Amɨn kɨnda nak do but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak uŋun amɨn do Datno da but dasi galak taŋ ɨmdɨsak. Ae nakyo kɨsi uŋun amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek naga naŋ yolɨko kokdɨsak.”
43014022	Yesu da yaŋ yaŋban Judas kɨnda, uŋun Judas Iskariot dɨma, uŋun da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak niaŋon da gaga ninbaŋ gɨn nolɨkdɨsal, mani mɨktɨm amɨn morap dɨma yolɨkdɨsal?”
43014023	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda but dasi galak taŋ namjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da nak dakon gen guramɨtjak. Datno da uŋun amɨn but dasi galak taŋ ɨmjak. Aŋakwan nit op do uŋun amɨn gat egɨpneŋ.
43014024	Amɨn kɨnda but dasi dɨma galak taŋ namɨsak, uŋun amɨn nak dakon gen dɨma guramɨkdak. Gen on nandaŋ uŋun nak dakon gen dɨma, gen on Dat yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun dakon gen.
43014025	“Nak ji gat sigɨn egek gen on dayɨsat.
43014026	Mani Paŋpulugok, Telagɨ Wup, nak da manon Dat da yabekban pɨkdɨsak. Uŋun da yo morap do dayɨŋdetdɨsak. Ae ji paŋpulugaŋban gen morap dayɨgɨm da dayɨsat uŋun ae nandaba pɨsokdaŋ.
43014027	“But yawot jikon yɨpmaŋdat. But yawotno ji do damɨsat. But yawot on mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨn da damaŋ uŋuden dɨma. Do butji jɨk taŋakwa pasol pasol dɨma ani.
43014028	Gen kɨnda dayɨko nandawit uŋun yaŋ ‘Nak depmaŋ kɨkdɨsat. Aŋek aeno tobɨl jikon opdɨsat.’ Ji da nak but dasi galak taŋ namaŋ kaŋ, nak Daron wɨgɨkdɨsat uŋun da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk damdɨsak, nido Dat da nak ŋwapmaŋdak.
43014029	Yo morap don noman taŋ mudaŋakwa nandaŋ gadat ani yaŋ do mibɨltok gen on dayɨsat.
43014030	“Bɨsap dubak gen dɨma yoneŋ, nido on mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep kɨlɨ uŋun apdɨsak. Uŋun da nak arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ nepjak.
43014031	Mani mɨktɨm amɨn da nak da Dat but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat yaŋ nandani uŋun do aŋek yo morap abeŋ do Dat da nayɨgɨt uŋun da arɨpmonsi asat. Kɨlɨ pɨdaŋba kɨno.”
43015001	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak naga wain nap obɨsi. Ae Datno uŋun wain pi dakon kɨla amɨn.
43015002	Kɨlɨŋno morap bamɨ dɨma toŋ uŋun Dat da mandaŋ maban kwaŋ. Aŋek kɨlɨŋno morap bamɨ toŋ uŋun Dat da bamɨ madepsi toni do paŋmɨlɨp asak.
43015003	Gen dayɨgɨm uŋun da ji kɨlɨ sugaŋ paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
43015004	Ji nagon saŋbeŋba nak da jikon saŋbekeŋ. Wain kɨlɨŋɨ obikon dɨma saŋbesak kaŋ, bamɨ dɨma tosak. Yaŋgɨn jiyo nagon dɨma saŋbeni kaŋ, bamɨ dɨma tokdaŋ.
43015005	“Nak naga wain obi ae ji kɨlɨŋno morap. Amɨn kɨnda nagon saŋbeŋban nak uŋun amɨnon saŋbekeŋ kaŋ, bamɨ morapmɨ tokdɨsak. Ji nak nipmaŋ degek yo kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma ani.
43015006	“Amɨn kɨnda nagon toktogɨ dɨma saŋbesak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn kɨlɨŋɨ yokwi yombem. Kɨlɨŋɨ uŋuden amɨn da mandaŋ yopba kɨbɨdaŋba paŋ muwuk kɨndapmon sosoŋ.
43015007	“Ji nagon toktogɨ saŋbeni ae geno jikon tosak kaŋ, yo nido galak taŋek bɨsit ani uŋun dakon bamɨ noman taŋ damdɨsak.
43015008	Ji bamɨ morapmɨsi taŋba amɨn da dandaba nak dakon paŋdetnosi akdaŋ. Yaŋ aba Datno da man madep pakdɨsak.
43015009	“Dat da nak do but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak, yaŋ gɨn nak da ji do but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat. Nak ji do but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat, ji toktogɨsi uŋun kagagwan egɨpni.
43015010	Nak Datno dakon gen teban guramɨgek but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak uŋun da kagagwan egɨsat. Ji yaŋ gɨn nak dakon gen teban guramɨtni kaŋ, but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat uŋun da kagagwan egɨpdaŋ.
43015011	Nak dakon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk da jikon taŋakwan ji dakon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk da madepsi tugosak, mibɨlɨ yaŋ do aŋek gen on dayɨsat.
43015012	“Gen tebano uŋun yaŋ: nak da ji do but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat, jiyo yaŋ gɨn dɨsikon notji do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ yomɨŋ ani.
43015013	Amɨn kɨnda da notni do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek uŋun paŋpulugok do aŋek egɨp egɨpni paretjak kaŋ, amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyomni uŋun da aŋpak bamɨsi ae wukwisi asak. Amɨn dɨwarɨ morap dakon si yapmaŋdak.
43015014	Ji gen teban on dayɨsat uŋun guramɨtni kaŋ, ji nak dakon notnoni kabɨ akdaŋ.
43015015	Oman monjɨ uŋun amɨn tagɨni da yo morap asak uŋun dɨma nandaŋ. Uŋun do oman monjɨno yaŋ aeno dɨma dayɨkeŋ. Gen morap Datnokon nandagɨm uŋun kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm. Yaŋ agɨm do ji notnoni yaŋ dayɨsat.
43015016	Nak ji gat egɨpneŋ do ji da dɨma manjɨŋ nepgwit. Nak ji gat egɨpneŋ do manjɨgɨm. Aŋek ji kɨŋ pi aba bamɨ dɨma yokwi taŋek toktogɨ toni do manjɨgɨm. Do nak da manon yo nido bɨsit ani uŋun Dat da tagɨ damjak.
43015017	Gen tebano uŋun yaŋ: Ji dɨsikon notji do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ yomɨŋ ani.”
43015018	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yagɨt, “Mɨktɨm amɨn da nandaba yokwi tok aŋdaba kaŋ, yaŋsi nandani, mibɨltok nak do yaŋ gɨn awit.
43015019	Ji mɨktɨm amɨn da tɨlagon egɨpni kaŋ, mɨktɨm amɨn da notnin dɨ yaŋon da but dasi galak taŋ damdaŋ. Mani ji on mɨktɨm dakon amɨn dɨma. Nak da ji on mɨktɨmon baŋ kɨlɨ manjɨŋ depgum. Uŋun do aŋek mɨktɨm amɨn da nandaba yokwi tok aŋdamaŋ.
43015020	Gen dayɨgɨm uŋun do nandani, ‘Oman monjɨ amɨn tagɨni dɨma yapmaŋgaŋ.’ Nak yokwi aŋnamgwit kaŋ, jiyo kɨsi yokwi yaŋ gɨn aŋdamdaŋ. Ae nak dakon gen guramɨkgwit kaŋ, ji dakon gen kɨsi guramɨtdaŋ.
43015021	Ji nak nolgaŋ do aŋek yokwi aŋdamdaŋ, nido Dat nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ.
43015022	“Nak pɨŋek gen dɨma yoyɨgɨm tam, yokwini dakon gen kɨnda dɨma tosok. Mani nak pɨŋek gen kɨlɨ yoyɨgɨm, do amɨn kɨnda da ‘nak dɨma nandaŋek suŋ agɨm’ yaŋ yogogɨ mɨni.
43015023	Amɨn kɨnda nak do nandaban yokwi tok aŋ namɨsak, uŋun amɨn Datno kɨsi do nandaban yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨsak.
43015024	Nak uŋun da binapmon pi tapmɨmɨ toŋ amɨn kɨnda da dɨma agɨt uŋun baŋ agɨm. Yaŋ dɨma agɨm tam, yokwini dakon gen kɨnda dɨma tosok. Mani nak da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨm uŋun pɨndakgwit, mani nak gat Datno gat kɨsi do nandaba yokwi tok aŋnimaŋ.
43015025	Yaŋ aba gen teban papianikon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Ɨsal dogɨn amɨn da nandaba yokwi tok aŋ namgwit.’
43015026	“Paŋpulugokji, Gen Bamɨ Dakon Wup, Daron egɨsak. Nak da jikon yabekgo pɨkdɨsak. Uŋun da Daron da pɨŋek mibɨlno do yaŋ teŋteŋok akdɨsak.
43015027	Ae ji nak da pi si wasagɨmon da wasaŋek egɨpgumaŋ da ekwamaŋ, do jiyo kɨsi nak do yaŋ teŋteŋok ani.”
43016001	“Gen uŋun nandaŋ gadatji dɨma wɨtdal kɨni do aŋek dayɨsat.
43016002	Muwut muwut yutnikon baŋ ji dolek uŋun gat dɨma muwutni do yaŋsop aŋ damdaŋ. Bɨsap kɨnda apjak, uŋudon amɨn da dɨkba kɨmagakwa uŋun amɨn da nin da Piŋkop do yo tagɨsi aŋ ɨmamaŋ yaŋ nandakdaŋ.
43016003	Uŋun Dat dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ, ae nakyo kɨsi dɨma nandaŋ namaŋ. Yaŋdo, yo morap uŋun aŋ damdaŋ.
43016004	Mani abɨsok yo uŋun altokdaŋ do kɨlɨ dayɨŋ mudat, do don amɨn da yo uŋun aŋ daba gen on dayɨsat uŋun do nandani.” Yesu da saŋbeŋek yagɨt, “Kalɨp naga gat kɨsi egɨpgumaŋ do aŋek on gen morap dɨma dayɨgɨm.
43016005	Abɨsok nak Dat yabekban pɨgɨmon tobɨl wɨgɨkdɨsat. Mani jikon da kɨnda da ‘Gak dukon kɨsal?’ yaŋ dɨma nayaŋ.
43016006	Abɨsok gen on dayɨko jɨgɨsi nandaŋ.
43016007	Mani asisi dayɨsat, nak ji paŋpulugok do depmaŋ dek wɨgɨkdɨsat. Dɨma wɨgɨkeŋ kaŋ, Paŋpulugokji jikon dɨma pɨkdɨsak. Mani nak wɨgɨkeŋ kaŋ, nak da yabekgo jikon pɨkdɨsak.
43016008	Uŋun da pɨŋ pi aban mɨktɨm amɨn morap aŋpak yokwi gat, ae aŋpak kɨlegɨ gat, ae Piŋkop da amɨn gen pikon yopdɨsak gat dakon mibɨlɨ kɨsi pakyaŋsi nandaba pɨsokdɨsak.
43016009	Pi aban yokwinin madepsi taŋ nimaŋ yaŋ pɨndatdaŋ. Yokwini dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun nak dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namaŋ.
43016010	Ae pi aban aŋpak kɨlegɨ dakon mibɨlɨ nandaba pɨsokdɨsak, nido nak Daron wɨgapbo ae saŋbeŋek dɨma nandakdaŋ.
43016011	Ae pi aban amɨn gen pikon yopyop dakon bɨsap apdɨsak yaŋ nandani, nido on mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep uŋun kobogɨ yokwi tɨmɨtdɨsak.
43016012	“Gen yogogɨ morapmɨ toŋ, mani abɨsok dayɨkeŋ kaŋ, ji arɨpmɨ dɨma tɨmɨtdaŋ.
43016013	Mani Gen Bamɨsi Dakon Wup uŋun da abɨŋ ji paŋpulugaŋban gen bamɨ morap nandaba pɨsokdaŋ. Uŋun iyɨ dakon gen baŋ dɨma dayɨkdɨsak, gen nandɨsak uŋun baŋgɨn dayɨkdɨsak. Aŋek yo don altokdaŋ uŋun do dayɨkdɨsak.
43016014	Uŋun da nak dakon gen abɨdaŋek dayɨŋ teŋteŋaŋban uŋun da nak dakon tɨlɨm madepno akdɨsak.
43016015	Daron yo morap toŋ uŋun nak dakon. Uŋun do mani yat, Wup da nak dakon gen abɨdaŋek yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ damdɨsak.”
43016016	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok nak saŋbeŋek ae dɨma nandakdaŋ. Ae tɨmɨsok dɨ egek donjok nandakdaŋ.”
43016017	Paŋdet dɨwarɨ notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yawit, “Gen uŋun niyɨsak dakon mibɨlɨ niaŋ? Yaŋ yak, ‘Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok nak saŋbeŋek ae dɨma nandakdaŋ. Ae tɨmɨsok dɨ egek donjok nandakdaŋ.’ Ae yaŋ yak, ‘Uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ: nak Daron kɨkdɨsat.’
43016018	‘Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok’ yaŋ uŋun mibɨlɨ nido yak? Gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandamaŋ.”
43016019	Yesu uŋun do nayɨkdaŋ yaŋ pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen uŋun yat dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do dɨsi gɨn yoŋ, ma? Yaŋ dayɨt, ‘Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok nak saŋbeŋek ae dɨma nandakdaŋ. Ae bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok egek ae donjok nandakdaŋ.’
43016020	Asisi dayɨsat, ji kunam madepsi tatdaŋ, ae bupmɨ kunamyo kɨsi madepsi akdaŋ. Mani mɨktɨm amɨn da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ. Butji wagɨlsi yokwi tokdaŋ, mani but yokwisi dakon kulabɨgɨ don kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi nandakdaŋ.
43016021	Mɨŋat kɨnda monjɨ altok do aŋakwan tepmɨ madepsi nandɨsak. Mani monjɨ altaŋakwan tepmɨ uŋun pasak dakon nandak nandak dɨma asak. Monjɨ mɨktɨmon kɨlɨ altosok uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk asak.
43016022	Uŋun da tɨlak ji abɨsok but yokwi aŋ. Mani aeno dandakeŋ bɨsapmon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ. Ae amɨn kɨnda da kɨsɨk kɨsɨkji arɨpmɨ dɨma gwayesak.
43016023	Uŋun bɨsapmon ji da nak yo kɨnda do bɨsit dɨma nayɨkdaŋ. Asisi dayɨsat, yo kɨnda do nak da manon da Dat bɨsit iyɨni kaŋ, uŋun damdɨsak.
43016024	Ji kalɨp nak da manon da yo kɨnda abɨdok do bɨsit kɨnda dɨma awit. Ji bɨsit ani. Yaŋ aŋek yo tɨmɨgakwa kɨsɨk kɨsɨk da butjikon tugosak.”
43016025	Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak on gen morap tɨlagon da dayɨsat. Don tɨlak gen ae dɨma dayɨkeŋ. Dat do nomansi dayɨŋ teŋteŋokdɨsat.
43016026	-
43016027	Nak da ji do aŋek Dat bɨsit iyɨkeŋ yaŋ dɨma dayɨsat. Dɨma. Ji nak do but dasi galak taŋ namaŋ, ae nak Piŋkopmon da apgum yaŋ nandaba bamɨ asak. Yaŋ aŋ, do Dat da iyɨ but dasi galak taŋ damɨsak. Do uŋun bɨsapmon ji nak da manon Dat bɨsit iyɨkdaŋ.
43016028	Nak Daron da mɨktɨmon pɨgɨm. Ae abɨsok mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋek Daron wɨgɨkdɨsat.”
43016029	Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdet kabɨni da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Abɨsok nomansi niyɨsal. Tɨlak gen dɨma yosol.
43016030	Nin abɨsok yaŋsi nandamaŋ, gak yo morap kɨlɨ nandaŋ mudosol, ae amɨn da dɨma gayɨŋakwa gaga tagɨ yoki. Uŋun do aŋek gak Piŋkopmon da apgul yaŋsi nandano bamɨ asak.”
43016031	Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Abɨsok ji kɨlɨ nandaŋ gadat aŋ, ma?
43016032	Nandani, bɨsap kɨlɨ kwaŋtak. Asi bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun, do ji bɨrɨpmɨgɨ yutjikon kɨŋ kɨŋ akdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek nak nepba naga gɨn egɨpdɨsat. Mani Dat nak gat egɨsak do naga gɨnsi dɨma egɨpbeŋ.
43016033	Ji nagon gadaŋek butji yaworɨsi taŋakwa egɨpni, yaŋ do aŋek gen on dayɨsat. Mɨktɨmon egɨpni bɨsapmon jɨgɨ noman taŋ damdaŋ. Mani ji pasol pasolɨ mɨni tebaisi atni. Nak da mɨktɨm dakon tapmɨm kɨlɨ abɨŋ yɨpgum.”
43017001	Yesu paŋdet kabɨni gen uŋun yoyɨŋ mudaŋek Kwen Kokup sɨŋtaŋek bɨsit yaŋ agɨt, “Dat, bɨsap kɨlɨ abɨk. Monjɨgo dakon man awɨgaki kaŋdo Monjɨgo da gak dakon man awɨgɨsak.
43017002	Amɨn morap Monjɨgo da kɨla asak do yaŋ mudaŋ ɨmgul. Yaŋdo, amɨn morap ɨmɨsal uŋun da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni tagɨ yomjak.
43017003	Egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ: amɨn da gak Piŋkop kaloŋɨsi bamɨsi yaŋ nandaŋ gamaŋ, ae Yesu Kristo gak da yabekbɨ pɨgɨt yaŋ gɨn nandaŋ ɨmaŋ.
43017004	Gak da pi morap namgul, uŋun pi aŋ mudoko mɨktɨm amɨn da tɨlɨmgo kɨlɨ kawit.
43017005	Dat, mɨktɨm dɨma noman taŋakwan nak gak gat egek tɨlɨmno taŋ namgut. Abɨsok gak da ɨŋamon uŋun tɨlɨm aego nabi.
43017006	“Amɨn morap on mɨktɨmon baŋ namgul kabɨkon gak dakon mibɨlgo kɨlɨ yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨm. Uŋun amɨn gak dakon baŋ nak do nabɨ gak dakon gen guramɨkgwit.
43017007	Abɨsok yaŋsi nandaŋ, yo morap namgul uŋun gak dasi namgul yaŋ nandaŋ.
43017008	Nido gen morap namgul uŋun yoyɨko abɨdawit. Aŋek asi nak gagon da apgum ae gak da nak yabekgɨl, yaŋsi nandaba bamɨsi asak.
43017009	Nak uŋun amɨn kabɨ do bɨsit asat. Mɨktɨm amɨn kɨsi do dɨma asat. Uŋun amɨn kabɨ namgul uŋun gak dakon amɨn kabɨgo, do uŋun do bɨsit asat.
43017010	Nak dakon amɨn kabɨ uŋun gak dakon. Ae gak dakon amɨn kabɨ uŋun nak dakon. Amɨn da nak dakon amɨn kabɨno pɨndagek tɨlɨmno kaŋek man madep namaŋ.
43017011	“Nak gagon obɨŋek mɨktɨmon saŋbeŋek dɨma egɨpbeŋ. Mani uŋun amɨn kabɨ da mɨktɨmon sigɨn egɨpdaŋ. Telagɨ Dat, mango tapmɨmɨ toŋsi namgul uŋun naŋ paŋkutnoki. Yaŋ aŋaki nit da kaloŋɨsi ekwamak, uŋun amɨn kabɨ da kaloŋɨsi yaŋ gɨn egɨpni.
43017012	Nak uŋun gat egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon man namgul uŋun naŋ paŋkutnaŋapbo tagɨsi egɨpgwit. Uŋun amɨn kabɨkon da amɨn pasɨljak do yaŋbi uŋun dagɨn pasɨlgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan Piŋkop da papiakon gen uŋun do mandabi uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt.
43017013	“Nak abɨsok gagon opbeŋ, mani kɨsɨk kɨsɨkno da uŋun amɨn kabɨkon tugosak yaŋ do mɨktɨmon sigɨn egek gen on yosot.
43017014	Nak naga on mɨktɨmon nani dɨma, ae amɨn kabɨno uŋun kɨsi on mɨktɨmon nani dɨma, do nak gengo amɨn kabɨno do yobo mɨktɨm amɨn da nandaba yokwi tok aŋ yomgwit.
43017015	Amɨn kabɨno mɨktɨmon baŋ tɨmɨkgi do bɨsit dɨma asat. Paŋkutnaŋaki Yokwi Ami da dɨma paŋupbal asak yaŋ do bɨsit asat.
43017016	Nak naga on mɨktɨmon nani dɨma, ae amɨn kabɨno uŋun kɨsi on mɨktɨmon nani dɨma.
43017017	Gak dakon gen uŋun gen bamɨsi. Amɨn kabɨnokon pi abɨ gengo bamɨsi uŋun da burɨkon pi aban gakdosi amɨn ani.
43017018	Gak da nak yabekbɨ mɨktɨmon pɨgɨm. Yaŋgɨn nak da amɨn kabɨno mɨktɨmon yabekdat.
43017019	Uŋun amɨn da gakdosi amɨn ani do aŋek egɨp egɨpno kaloŋ gak do gamɨsat.
43017020	“Nak uŋun amɨn kabɨ do gɨn bɨsit dɨma asat. Uŋun amɨn kabɨ da gen yaŋakwa nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namni amɨn uŋun kɨsi do asat.
43017021	Dat nak gagon egapbo gak nagon egɨsal yaŋ gɨn uŋun amɨn kabɨ da but kaloŋsi egɨpni do bɨsit asat. Uŋun amɨn nit gat egapno mɨktɨm amɨn da asi gak da nak yabekbɨ pɨgɨm yaŋ nandaba bamɨsi asak dosi nandɨsat.
43017022	Nit kaloŋɨ ekwamak yaŋ gɨn uŋun amɨn kaloŋɨsi egɨpni, yaŋ do tɨlɨm namgul uŋun kɨlɨ yomgum.
43017023	Nak uŋun amɨn kabɨkon egapbo gak nagon egɨsal. Kaloŋɨsi egɨpni do nandɨsat. Yaŋ egakwa mɨktɨm amɨn da gak da nak yabekbɨ pɨgɨm yaŋ nandani dosi nandɨsat. Ae gak da nak do but dasi galak taŋ namɨsal yaŋ gɨn gak da uŋun amɨn do galak taŋ yomɨsal yaŋ nandani dosi nandɨsat.
43017024	“Dat, mɨŋat amɨn nak do namgul uŋun nak da egɨpbeŋ kokupmon nak gat kɨsin egɨpneŋ do nandɨsat. Tɨlɨm namgul uŋun koni do nandɨsat. Yo morap dɨma noman taŋakwa but dasi kɨlɨsi galak taŋ namgul, uŋun do aŋek uŋun tɨlɨm namgul.
43017025	Dat Kɨlegɨsi, mɨktɨm amɨn gak dɨma nandaŋ gamaŋ. Mani nak nandaŋ gamɨsat. Ae amɨn kabɨno da gak da nak yabekbɨ pɨgɨm yaŋsi nandaba bamɨ asak.
43017026	Nak da gak uŋun amɨn kabɨkon yolɨgɨm. Ae gak da but dasi galak taŋ namɨsal yaŋ gɨn uŋun amɨn kabɨ da amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomni, ae nak uŋun amɨn kabɨkon egɨpbeŋ, yaŋ do sigɨn saŋbeŋek gak yolɨkdɨsat.”
43018001	Yesu bɨsit aŋ mudaŋban paŋdet kabɨni gat kɨsi Kidron Pakbi Kɨdat yapmaŋek kɨwit. Uŋun pakbi da usugap da pigaga kɨnda tosok. Yesu gat paŋdet kabɨni gat uŋun pigagagwan pɨgɨwit.
43018002	Bɨsap morapmɨ Yesu gat paŋdet kabɨni gat uŋun pigaga muwuk muwuk awit, do uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak amɨn Judas kɨsi uŋun pigaga kaŋ nandaŋyo agɨt.
43018003	Do Judas da Rom dakon emat amɨn dɨ gat ae Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon obip amɨn dɨwarɨ gat tɨmɨkban uŋudon kɨwit. Obip amɨn uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat Parisi amɨn gat da yabekgwit. Uŋun amɨn kabɨ lam ae kalɨŋ ae emat dakon yo kɨsi tɨmɨkgwit.
43018004	Yesu yo morap noman taŋ ɨmdaŋ uŋun kɨlɨ nandaŋ mudagɨt. Do kapmatjok da kɨŋ uŋun amɨn kabɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji namɨn naŋ wɨsaŋ?”
43018005	Yoyɨŋban yaŋ yawit, “Nin Yesu Nasaret amɨn naŋ wɨsamaŋ.” Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Nak uŋun mani.” Yesu uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak amɨn Judas uŋun amɨn kabɨ gat kɨsi akgwit.
43018006	Yesu da “Nak uŋun mani” yaŋ yaŋakwan amɨn uŋun tɨmɨsok dɨ duwalɨk kɨŋek mɨktɨmon pɨlɨgɨ pakgwit.
43018007	Yesu da aeni yoyɨgɨt, “Ji namɨn naŋ wɨsaŋ?” Yoyɨŋban yawit, “Yesu Nasaret amɨn.”
43018008	Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak kɨlɨ dayɨt, nak uŋun mani. Ji nak wɨsaŋ kaŋ, on amɨn kabɨ yopba kɨni.”
43018009	Yaŋ yaŋban gen kɨnda kalɨp yagɨt uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Amɨn kabɨ uŋun nak do namgul uŋun kɨnda dɨma yɨpbo pasɨlgɨt.”
43018010	Saimon Pita da emat agak sɨbani ɨlɨk mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon oman monjɨ dakon mɨragɨ amɨn tet nani mandaŋ dagagɨt. Oman monjɨ uŋun dakon mani Malkus.
43018011	Yaŋ aban Yesu da tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Emat agak sɨba yɨgɨkon sɨmɨl! Dat da tepmɨ pakeŋ do nandɨsak uŋun dɨma pakeŋ yaŋ nandɨsal, ma?”
43018012	Emat amɨn gat ae mibɨltok amɨn madepni gat, ae Juda amɨn dakon obip amɨn gat da Yesu abɨdaŋek nap teban naŋ abɨsɨwit.
43018013	Yaŋ aŋek mibɨltok Anaskon aŋkɨwit. Anas uŋun Kaiapas dakon yopmi. Uŋun bɨlagon Kaiapas da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn egɨpgut.
43018014	Uŋun da kalɨp Juda amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kaloŋ kɨnda dagɨn amɨn morap kɨsi do aŋek kɨmotjak kaŋ, uŋun tagɨ.”
43018015	Saimon Pita gat ae paŋdet kɨnda gat Yesu yol aŋaŋ kɨgɨmal. Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da uŋun paŋdet nandaŋ ɨmgut, do Yesu yol aŋaŋ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da nagalon pɨgɨgɨt.
43018016	Mani Pita waŋga yoma kaga da kapmatjok akgɨt. Do paŋdet uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da nandaŋ ɨmgut uŋun da kɨŋ oman mɨŋat kɨnda yoma kɨla agɨt uŋun iyɨŋek Pita abɨdaŋban nagalgwan pɨgɨgɨmal.
43018017	Oman mɨŋat uŋun yoma kɨla agɨt uŋun da Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak uŋun amɨn dakon paŋdetni kɨnda bo?” Iyɨŋban Pita da yagɨt, “Nak dɨma.”
43018018	Kokup mɨrɨmɨsi agɨt, do oman monjɨ gat ae obip amɨn gat kɨndapni alɨk do kɨndap kɨnda sogɨt da patderɨkon aŋgwasɨŋek akgwit. Aŋakwa Pita yo kɨsi agek kɨndapni alɨwit.
43018019	Uŋun bɨsapmon mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da Yesu paŋdet kabɨni do iyɨgɨt ae yoyɨŋdet agɨt kɨsi do iyɨgɨt.
43018020	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak gen nomansi amɨn kɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨm. Muwut muwut yutnikon yoyɨŋ dekgɨm, ae Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalon Juda amɨn da abɨŋ muwuk muwuk aŋ uŋudon bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ yoyɨŋ dekgɨm. Gen kɨnda pasɨlɨkon dɨmasi yagɨm.
43018021	Do nido nak nayɨsal? Gen yaŋapbo nandawit amɨn baŋ yoyɨ. Gen yagɨm uŋun da nandaŋ.”
43018022	Yesu yaŋ yaŋakwan obip amɨn kɨnda da mogɨm kulbak aŋagek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon geni kobogɨ gen tagɨ naŋ iyɨsat yaŋ nandɨsal ma?”
43018023	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gulusuŋ yat kaŋ, uŋun do nayɨ. Ae gen kɨlegɨ yat kaŋ, nido nɨkdal?”
43018024	Nap kɨsirɨkon abɨsɨwit dɨma wɨtdalek Anas da Yesu yabekban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn Kaiapaskon aŋkɨwit.
43018025	Saimon Pita kɨndapni alɨŋ agakwan yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak Yesu dakon paŋdetni kɨnda, ma?” Yaŋ iyɨŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Nak paŋdetni kɨnda dɨma.”
43018026	Mani mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon oman amɨn kɨnda, uŋun Pita da mɨragɨ mandaŋ dagagɨt amɨn uŋun dakon dɨwatni kɨnda, uŋun da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gakyo kɨsi Yesu gat pigaga ekwa dandat, ma?”
43018027	Iyɨŋban Pita da yagɨt, “Dɨma!” Wasɨp yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn pup gen yagɨt.
43018028	Juda amɨn da Yesu abɨdaŋ Kaiapas dakon yut yɨpmaŋek gapman dakon amɨn madep da yutnon aŋkɨwit. Uŋun kɨlɨ wɨsa dagagɨt, do iyɨ gapman dakon amɨn madep da nagalon dɨma pɨgɨwit, nido pɨgɨneŋ kaŋ Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek taŋek Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap noknoknin aŋsuŋ akdamaŋ yaŋ nandawit.
43018029	Waŋga jomaŋ agakwa Pailat da pɨŋ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji on amɨn mibɨlɨ nido gen yaŋ ɨmeŋ?”
43018030	Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Uŋun yokwi pakpak kɨnda dɨma tam, gagon dɨma aŋopnom.”
43018031	Yaŋba Pailat da yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨsi abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ dɨsi dakon gen tebanji yolek gen pikon yɨpni.” Yaŋban Juda amɨn da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin da amɨn kɨnda aŋatno kɨmotjak dakon yaŋ dagok ninon dɨmasi tosok.”
43018032	Gen uŋun yaŋba kalɨp Yesu da kosit niaŋon da kɨmotjak do yagɨt, uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt.
43018033	Pailat da aeni gapman da yutnon wɨgɨ Yesu iyɨŋban opban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep, ma?”
43018034	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Uŋun gaga nandaŋek yosol, bo amɨn dɨ da nak do yaŋ gayɨwit?”
43018035	Yaŋban Pailat da yagɨt, “Nak Juda amɨn kɨnda dɨma! Gaga dakon amɨn kabɨgo gat ae mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨgo gat da gak abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ nagon aŋobeŋ. Gak ninaŋ agɨl?”
43018036	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da Amɨn Kɨla Asat uŋun on mɨktɨm dakon yo dɨma. On mɨktɨm dakon tam nak dakon oman monjɨno gat emat wamaŋakwa amɨn kɨnda da nak Juda amɨn da kɨsiron arɨpmɨ dɨma nepbam. Nak da Amɨn Kɨla Asat uŋun kokup ŋwakŋwarɨ dakon yo.”
43018037	Yaŋban Pailat da iyɨgɨt, “Asi gak kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda, ma?” Yaŋban Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda yaŋ nayɨsal uŋun asi bamɨ yosol. Nak gen bamɨ mɨŋat amɨn morap yoyɨkeŋ do on mɨktɨmon pɨgɨm. Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do meŋ da aŋalagɨt. Gen bamɨ yolgaŋ amɨn morap uŋun nak dakon gen do mɨrak yopmaŋgaŋ.”
43018038	Yaŋban Pailat da iyɨgɨt, “Gen bamɨ uŋun yo kɨnda ni?” Pailat gen uŋun iyɨŋek aeni waŋga Juda amɨnon pɨgek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak da gulusuŋ kɨnda agɨt do gen yaŋ ɨmneŋ da arɨp dɨmasi kosot.
43018039	Mani Yapyap Bɨlagon aŋpakji yolek amɨn kɨnda dam tebanon naŋ wɨtdal yɨpbo kɨŋ kɨŋ aŋ. Do Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep naŋ yɨpbo kɨsak bo niaŋ nandaŋ?”
43018040	Yaŋban yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Barabas naŋ yɨpbɨ kɨsak.” Barabas uŋun kabo noknok, ae amɨn dapmaŋek yoni gwayaŋ amɨn kɨnda.
43019001	Pailat da yaŋban Yesu abɨdaŋek baljawit.
43019002	Aŋakwa emat amɨn da nap kelɨ toŋ kɨndanaŋ kɨla amɨn madep dakon pelɨt yombem kɨnda wasaŋek Yesu da busuŋon yɨpgwit. Yaŋ aŋek ɨmal dubak gami kɨnda naŋ paŋ ɨmgwit.
43019003	Aŋek kapmatjok da kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gɨldat tagɨ, Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep!” Yaŋ iyɨŋek mogɨm kulbak aŋakgwit.
43019004	Aŋakwa Pailat waŋga aeni pɨgɨ Juda amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak da uŋun amɨn jikon abɨko yaŋsi nandaŋ ɨmni, nak da uŋun amɨn gulusuŋni kɨnda agɨt do gen yaŋ ɨmneŋ da arɨp dɨmasi kosot.”
43019005	Yesu nap kelɨ toŋ baŋ pelɨtni wamaŋ ɨmgwit gat ae ɨmal dubak gami kɨsi kwenikon sigɨn taŋakwa waŋga pɨgɨt. Pɨŋakwan Pailat da amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kabɨt, uŋun amɨn oni.”
43019006	Yaŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae obip amɨn gat da Yesu kaŋek tebai yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmakban! Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmakban!” Yaŋba Pailat da yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨsi abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak. Nak da gulusuŋni kɨnda agɨt do gen yaŋ ɨmneŋ da arɨp dɨma kat.”
43019007	Mani Juda amɨn da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Uŋun amɨn da iyɨ do ‘Nak Piŋkop dakon Monji’ yaŋ yagɨt. Nin dakon gen teban da uŋuden amɨn si kɨmotni do yosok.”
43019008	Pailat gen uŋun nandaŋek mibɨltok pasalgɨt uŋun si yapmaŋek madepsi pasalgɨt.
43019009	Aŋek aeni gapman yutnon wɨgɨ Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak dukon nani?” Mani Yesu da gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma iyɨgɨt.
43019010	Aŋakwan Pailat da iyɨgɨt, “Kobogɨ nayɨk do dɨma nandɨsal, ma? Gepbo kɨki bo ae tɨlak kɨndapmon gɨtni dakon yaŋ dagok nagon gɨn tosok. Gak uŋun dɨma nandɨsal, ma?”
43019011	Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop kwen egɨsak uŋun da tapmɨm dɨma gamgut tam, gak da nak abɨŋ nepbi dakon tapmɨm kɨnda dɨma taŋ gaban. Do amɨn gak da kɨsiron nepmak uŋun dakon yokwi da gak dakon yokwi yapmaŋdak.”
43019012	Pailat gen uŋun nandaŋek Yesu yɨpban ɨsal kɨsak do kosit wɨsɨk agɨt. Mani Juda amɨn da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Gak uŋun amɨn yɨpbɨ kɨsak kaŋ, gak Sisa dakon notni dɨma. Amɨn iyɨ do nak kɨla amɨn madep yaŋ yosok uŋun Sisa dakon uwalni.”
43019013	Pailat gen uŋun nandaŋek Yesu aŋaŋ waŋga abɨgɨgɨt. Abɨgek tamo kɨnda mani Tɨp Baŋ Yalɨŋbi Tamo yaŋ yoŋ uŋudon gen kokwin aŋ yɨtyɨt tamo kɨnda tosok uŋudon yɨkgɨt. (Uŋun tamo Ibru genon da Gabata yaŋ yoŋ.)
43019014	Aŋwa Yapyap Bɨlak do nandaŋek jap paŋkosit ak bɨsap, gɨldat binap 12 kilok agɨt. Pailat da Juda amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kabɨt, kɨla amɨn madepji oni.”
43019015	Yaŋban yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Aŋabɨgɨt! Aŋabɨgɨt! Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgɨt!” Yaŋba Pailat da yoyɨgɨt, “Kɨla amɨn madepji tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgeŋ do nandaŋ?” Yaŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ da yaŋ yawit, “Ninon kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda dɨma egɨsak. Sisa kaloŋgɨn!”
43019016	Pailat da Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋatni do emat amɨn da kɨsiron yɨpban abɨdaŋ aŋkɨwit.
43019017	Yesu iyɨ tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨgek kokup pap yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm tɨm kɨndakon kɨwit, mani Busuŋ Kɨdat. Ibru genon da Golgata yaŋ yoŋ.
43019018	Uŋudon tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgwit. Amɨn bamorɨ kɨsi tɨlak kɨndap terɨ terɨ dapmaŋakwa Yesu binapmon akgɨt.
43019019	Pailat da yaŋban but pɨso gen kɨnda mandaŋ tɨlak kɨndapmon yɨpgwit. Gen uŋun yaŋ, YESU NASARET AMƗN, JUDA AMƗN DAKON KƗLA AMƗN MADEPNI
43019020	Uŋun kosirɨ kapbɨ mandawit. Ibru gen, ae Rom gen, ae Grik genon da kɨsi mandawit. Yesu aŋakgwit mɨktɨm tɨm uŋun kokup pap da kapmatjok tagɨt, do Juda amɨn morapmɨ da gen uŋun manjɨwit.
43019021	Juda amɨn dakon mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ da Pailat yaŋ iyɨwit, “ ‘Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madepni’ yaŋ dɨma mandaki. Gen yaŋ mandaki: ‘On amɨn da yagɨt, Nak Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madepni.’ ”
43019022	Yaŋba Pailat da yagɨt, “Yum koni. Gen kɨlɨ mandat uŋun dagɨn tosak.”
43019023	Emat amɨn da Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋagek ɨmalni tɨmɨkgwit. Tɨmɨgek kokwin 4 kabɨ aŋakwa kaloŋ kaloŋ da ɨmalni kaloŋ kaloŋ tɨmɨkgwit. Ae paba pɨgɨk dubakni kɨsi abɨdawit. Paba pɨgɨkni saŋbekni uŋun mɨni ɨmal dɨwat kaloŋɨ naŋ bupbi kawit.
43019024	Yaŋ kaŋek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Dɨma pudoneŋ. Namɨn da abɨdosak yaŋ do satu wasok aneŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋek yaŋ gɨn aba Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Ɨmalno kokwinɨgek tɨmɨkgwit, ae namɨn da paba pɨgɨkno abɨdosak yaŋ do satu wasok awit.” Do emat amɨn da yaŋ awit.
43019025	Yesu dakon meŋi, ae meŋi dakon padɨge, ae Maria uŋun Klopas dakon mɨŋatni, ae Maria Makdala kokup papmon nani, uŋun mɨŋat kabɨ da Yesu dakon tɨlak kɨndap da kapmatjok akgwit.
43019026	Yesu da meŋi gat ae paŋdet but dasi galak taŋ ɨmgut uŋun kapmatjok akbal pɨndagek meŋi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat, on gak dakon monjɨgo.”
43019027	Ae paŋdet uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “On gak dakon meŋgo.” Uŋun bɨsapmon da wasaŋek paŋdet uŋun da Maria aŋkɨ yutnikon kɨla agɨt.
43019028	Yesu pi morapni kɨlɨ uŋun mudosok yaŋ nandaŋek, ae Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun bamɨ toŋ asak dosi nandaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Tekno bap tosok.” Gen uŋun yaŋakwan
43019029	wain kɨnam kɨnda kapmatjok tagɨt. Do yo kɨnda gugɨdan yombem abɨdaŋ wainon sɨbɨŋba tugaŋban, isop kɨndap dakon kɨlɨŋɨkon walɨk yɨpba Yesu da dulumon wɨgɨgɨt.
43019030	Wɨkwan Yesu da wain naŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Kɨlɨ uŋun mudosok.” Yaŋ yaŋek busuŋɨ tadɨk pɨŋek wupni yɨpban kɨgɨt.
43019031	Kɨlɨ Sabat bɨsap dakon yo paŋtagap ak gɨldat agɨt. Uŋun Sabat uŋun bɨsap madepsi kɨnda, do Juda amɨn da tɨlak kɨndapmon bumjot dɨma toni do nandawit. Yaŋ nandawit do amɨn tɨlak kɨndapmon akgwit dakon kandapni dapmaŋ jokgal do Pailat iyɨwit. Yaŋ aba tepmɨ kɨmakba bumjotni paŋkɨni yaŋon da yawit.
43019032	Yaŋba emat amɨn da kɨŋ amɨn bamot Yesu gat dapgwit dakon kandapni dapmaŋ jokgalgwit.
43019033	Mani Yesukon abɨŋ kaŋba kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨt kawit, do kandapni dɨma aŋak jokgalgwit.
43019034	Mani emat amɨn kɨnda da Yesu dakon gekgegɨ gwawia naŋ sugagɨt. Sugaŋban uŋudon gɨn pakbi yawiyo da pakgwit.
43019035	Yo uŋun si kagɨt amɨn uŋun da iyɨ uŋun dakon yaŋ teŋteŋok asak. Ae iyɨ bamɨsi yosot yaŋ nandɨsak, do jiyo kɨsi nandaŋ gadat ani yaŋ do gen uŋun yaŋ teŋteŋosok.
43019036	Yo uŋun aba Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Kɨdatni kɨnda dɨma aŋak jokgaldaŋ.”
43019037	Ae Piŋkop dakon gen kɨnda gat yaŋ tosok: “Amɨn da gɨptɨmɨ sugawit uŋun kokdaŋ.”
43019038	Kɨlɨ don Josep Arimatea kokupmon nani da kɨŋ Yesu dakon bumjotni Pailat da nandaŋ ɨban aŋkɨsak do iyɨgɨt. (Josep uŋun Yesu dakon paŋdetni kɨnda. Mani Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn do pasalek Yesu do nandaŋ gadatni si aŋkɨsɨbɨgɨt.) Pailat da nandaŋ ɨban Josep da kɨŋ Yesu dakon bumjotni aŋkɨgɨt.
43019039	Ae Nikodemus kalɨp Yesu kalbi kɨŋ kagɨt uŋunyo kɨsi uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn apgut. Uŋun yo kɨbaŋɨ toŋ tagɨsi dɨ tɨmɨk paŋapgut. Uŋun kɨndap bamorɨ dakon gawoŋɨ baŋ ɨktagɨlek wasawit. Yo kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi uŋun dakon jɨgɨni uŋun 30 kilo da arɨp.
43019040	Josep gat Nikodemus gat da Yesu dakon bumjotni abɨdaŋek yo kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi uŋun tagal ɨmgumal. Yaŋ aŋek ɨmal tagɨsi baŋ gwɨlɨkgɨmal. Uŋun Juda amɨn da aŋpagon amɨn kɨmakbi do yaŋ aŋ.
43019041	Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgwit da kapmatjok pi kɨnda tagɨt. Uŋun pigagagwan kɨmakbi tamo kalugɨ kɨnda tagɨt. Uŋun tamokon bumjot kɨnda dɨma yɨpbi.
43019042	Uŋun Juda amɨn da Sabat bɨsap dakon yo paŋtagap ak bɨsap, ae kɨmakbi tamo uŋun kapmatjok tagɨt, do amɨn bamot Yesu dakon bumjotni aŋkɨ uŋungwan yɨpgumal.
43020001	Sonda wɨsa dagokdo pɨlɨn tuk taŋakwan gɨn Maria Makdala kokupmon nani kɨmakbi tamokon apgut. Abɨŋ kaŋban kɨmakbi tamo dakon yoma sopgwit dakon tɨp kɨlɨ aŋtobɨlba kɨgɨt kagɨt.
43020002	Yaŋ kaŋek tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨŋ Saimon Pita gat ae Yesu da paŋdetni kɨnda but dasi galak taŋ ɨmgut uŋun bamot yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ kɨmakbi tamokon naŋ aŋabɨgeŋ. Aŋkɨ dukwan yɨpmaŋ uŋun dɨma nandamaŋ.”
43020003	Yaŋban Pita gat ae paŋdet kɨnda uŋun gat kɨmakbi tamokon kɨgɨmal.
43020004	Amɨn bamot kɨsi tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨgɨmal, mani paŋdet kɨnda uŋun da Pita yapmaŋek uŋun da kalɨp kɨmakbi tamokon kɨŋ altagɨt.
43020005	Kɨŋ pagadaŋek kɨmakbi tamogwan wusɨgɨt. Wusɨŋek ɨmal tagɨsi Yesu dakon bumjotni wamgwit uŋun taŋba pɨndakgɨt. Mani dɨma wɨgɨgɨt.
43020006	Saimon Pita uŋun da buŋon abɨŋek uŋun kɨmakbi tamogwan wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgek ɨmal taŋba pɨndakgɨt.
43020007	Ae ɨmal kɨnda kagɨt uŋun Yesu da busuŋon wabi. Ɨmal uŋun ɨmal dɨwarɨ gat dɨma tawit. Uŋun gɨroŋɨkbi da iyɨndage taŋban kagɨt.
43020008	Ae paŋdet uŋun kɨnda mibɨltok kɨmakbi tamokon kɨgɨt uŋun kɨsi wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgɨ pɨndagek nandaŋ gadat agɨt.
43020009	Uŋun bɨsapmon Piŋkop da papiakon Yesu kɨmoron da ae pɨdokdɨsak dakon gen tosok uŋun do dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt.
43020010	Yo uŋun pɨndagek paŋdet bamot tobɨl kokupmon kɨgɨmal.
43020011	Maria kɨmakbi tamo da waŋga agek kunam takgɨt. Kunam tagek tagek pagadaŋek kɨmakbi tamogwan wɨsɨgɨt.
43020012	Wɨsɨŋek aŋelo bamorɨ ɨmalni kwakwagɨ pɨndakgɨt. Uŋun aŋelo bamot Yesu dakon bumjotni da tagɨt uŋudon yɨkgɨmal. Kɨnda busuŋɨ da tagɨron yɨkgɨt, aŋakwan kɨnda kandapni da tagɨron yɨkgɨt.
43020013	Maria yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Mɨŋat gak kunam nido takdal?” Yaŋbal yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨno abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ dukwan yɨpmaŋ uŋun dɨma nandɨsat.”
43020014	Yaŋ yaŋek tobɨl Yesu akban kagɨt. Mani Maria da uŋun Yesu yaŋ dɨma kaŋban pɨsagɨt.
43020015	Kɨlɨ Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat gak nido takdal? Gak namɨn naŋ wɨsɨsal?” Maria da pikaga uŋun dakon pi monjɨ kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, gak da bumjot aŋkɨl kaŋ, dukwan yɨpmal nayɨŋbɨ kɨŋ abɨdaŋ aŋopbeŋ.”
43020016	Yaŋban Yesu da yagɨt, “Maria!” Yaŋban Maria da tobɨl Ibru genon da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Rabonai.” (Rabonai uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun Yoyɨŋdet.)
43020017	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak Datnokon dɨma wɨgɨt, do nak dɨma abɨdoki. Kɨŋ notno kabɨ yaŋ yoyɨki, ‘Nak Datno ae ji dakon Datji uŋudon wɨgɨkeŋ. Piŋkopno ae ji dakon Piŋkopji uŋudon wɨgɨkeŋ.’ ”
43020018	Iyɨŋban Maria Makdala kokupmon nani da kɨŋ paŋdet kabɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ nak da kɨlɨ kat.” Yaŋ yoyɨŋek Yesu da gen iyɨgɨt uŋun yoyɨgɨt.
43020019	Sonda pɨlɨn kaga paŋdetni Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn do pasalek yut kɨndakon muwugek yoma beŋgan aŋek yɨkgwit. Yɨgakwa Yesu da abɨŋ bɨkbɨk nikon agek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Butji yaworɨ tosak.”
43020020	Yaŋ yaŋek kɨsit bamotni ae gekgekniyo yolɨŋban paŋdetni Amɨn Tagɨni kaŋek but galak madepsi nandawit.
43020021	Aeni Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Butji yaworɨ tosak. Dat da nak yabekgɨt, yaŋ gɨn nak da ji yabekdat.”
43020022	Yaŋ yaŋek mɨgani pɨsoŋban paŋdetnikon kɨŋakwan yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji Telagɨ Wup abɨdoni.
43020023	Ji amɨn dakon yokwini yopmaŋ yomni kaŋ, dɨwarɨni pasɨl yomdaŋ, ae dɨma yopmaŋ yomni kaŋ, dɨwarɨni taŋ yomdaŋ.”
43020024	Paŋdetni dɨwarɨ Yesu kawit bɨsapmon kɨnda uŋun notni gat dɨma egɨpgwit, mani uŋun Tomas (ae mani kɨnda Yayat).
43020025	Paŋdet dɨwarɨ da Tomas yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin Amɨn Tagɨnin kamaŋ!” Yaŋ iyɨŋba Tomas da yoyɨgɨt, “Kɨsirɨkon birɨŋ tamo dɨma pɨndagek wɨtjɨkeŋ, ae gekgegɨkon wuda gwaljɨk dɨma wɨtjɨkeŋ kaŋ, ji da gen nayaŋ uŋun do nandabo bamɨ dɨma asak.”
43020026	Gɨldat 7 kabɨ mudaŋakwa paŋdet kabɨ ae notni Tomas gat kɨsi yutnon muwugek yoma beŋgan awit. Mani Yesu abɨŋ bɨkbɨk nikon altaŋban kawit. Altaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Butji yaworɨ tosak.”
43020027	Yaŋ yoyɨŋek Tomas yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak abɨŋ kɨsitno wɨtjɨŋek pɨndat. Aŋek kɨsitgo awɨŋ gekgeknokon wɨtjɨki. Gak but bamot dɨma aŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ nabi.”
43020028	Yaŋban Tomas da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨno ae Piŋkopno.”
43020029	Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨlɨ nandal, do nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨsal. Amɨn nak dɨma nandaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ namaŋ, uŋun amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani.”
43020030	Yesu da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ dɨwarɨ morapmɨsi aŋakwan paŋdetni da pɨndakgwit, uŋun on papiakon dɨma mandabi.
43020031	Mani papia on yaŋ do mandabi. Ji da Yesu uŋun Kristo yaŋsi nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni. Ae Yesu uŋun Piŋkop dakon Monjisi yaŋ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋakwa, uŋun da manon egɨp egɨp abɨdoni, mibɨlɨ yaŋ do papia on mandabi.
43021001	Don aeni Yesu da paŋdetni Galili Pakbi Ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon egakwa altaŋ yomgut. Altaŋ yomgut dakon gen uŋun yaŋ.
43021002	Saimon Pita, ae Tomas (Yayat yaŋ iyɨwit), ae Nataniel (Galili mɨktɨm, Kana kokupmon nani kɨnda), ae Sebedi dakon monji bamot gat, ae Yesu dakon paŋdetni bamorɨ gat kɨsi egɨpgwit.
43021003	Saimon Pita da notni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak tap kɨlap ɨlɨt do kɨsat.” Yaŋban yawit, “Nin kɨsin kɨneŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋek boron wɨgek kɨwit. Mani uŋun kalbi tap kɨlap kɨnda dɨma ɨlɨkgwit.
43021004	Wɨsa dagokdosi gɨldat dɨma wɨŋakwan Yesu uŋun pakbi ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon akban kawit, mani uŋun Yesu yaŋ dɨma kaŋba pɨsagɨt.
43021005	Aŋakwa Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Not kabɨ, ji tap kɨlap dɨ ɨlaŋ?” Yaŋban yawit, “Dɨma.”
43021006	Yaŋba yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji yɨkji bot amɨn tet do maba kwan tap kɨlap dɨ ɨlɨtni.” Yaŋ yaŋban yɨkni maba pɨkwan tap kɨlap morapmɨsi pɨgɨ tugaŋba yɨk ɨlɨk awɨk do aŋtɨdok awit.
43021007	Yaŋ aŋakwa paŋdet Yesu da galak taŋ ɨmgut uŋun da Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ mani!” Saimon Pita uŋun pi do aŋek ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk kadɨmni kɨlɨ ɨlɨk yɨpgut. Do notni da “Uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ mani!” yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk kadɨmni ae paŋek pakbigwan paŋ magɨt.
43021008	Maŋek ɨleŋɨkon kɨŋakwan notni boron da buŋon yolgwit. Yolek yɨkni tap kɨlap tugaŋbi walɨmbɨl ɨlɨk aŋaŋ kɨwit, nido bot uŋun pakbi dubagɨkon dɨma tagɨt, 100 mita uŋun da tɨlagon gɨn tagɨt.
43021009	Kɨŋ ɨleŋɨkon wɨgek yaŋ pɨndakgwit: kɨndap kɨnda sogɨt da patderɨkon tap kɨlap kɨnda tagɨt, ae bretyo kɨsi taŋba pɨndakgwit.
43021010	Pɨndagakwa Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji abɨsok tap kɨlap ɨlaŋ dɨ paŋapgut.”
43021011	Yaŋban Saimon Pita da boron wɨgek tap kɨlap yɨk ɨlɨkban ɨleŋɨkon wɨgɨgɨt. Yɨgon tap kɨlap madep madep 153 yaŋ da pɨgɨ tugawit, mani yɨk uŋun dɨma dagagɨt.
43021012	Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji abɨŋ jap nabɨt.” Uŋun Amɨn Tagɨni yaŋ kɨlɨ nandaŋ mudawit, do gen uŋun yaŋban paŋdetni si pasalek kɨnda da “Gak namɨn?” yaŋ dɨma iyɨwit.
43021013	Aŋakwa Yesu kɨndapmon kɨŋek bret ae tap kɨlap tɨmɨgek paŋdetni do yomgut.
43021014	Yesu kɨmoron da pɨdaŋ paŋdet kabɨnikon on altaŋ yomgut uŋun da aban kosirɨ kapbɨ agɨt.
43021015	Jap naŋ mudaŋek Yesu da Saimon Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Saimon, Jon dakon monji, gak nak do but dasi galak taŋ namɨŋ kɨmagek on amɨn kabɨ da but dasi galak taŋ namaŋ uŋun yapmaŋdal, ma?” Yaŋban Pita da yagɨt, “Asi, Amɨn Tagɨ, gaga nandɨsal. Nak but dasi galak taŋ gamɨsat.” Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Sipsip monɨŋ kabɨno upmokgi.”
43021016	Ae kosirɨ kɨnda gat yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Saimon, Jon dakon monji, gak nak do but dasi galak taŋ namɨsal, bo dɨma?” Yaŋban Pita da yagɨt, “Asi, Amɨn Tagɨ, gaga nandɨsal. Nak but dasi galak taŋ gamɨsat.” Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Sipsipno kɨla abi.”
43021017	Ae Yesu da iyɨŋban kosirɨ kapbɨ aŋakwan aeni yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Saimon, Jon dakon monji. Gak but dasi galak taŋ namɨsal?” Pita uŋun Yesu da kosirɨ kapbɨ “Gak but dasi galak taŋ namɨsal?” yaŋ iyɨgɨt, do burɨ jɨk tagɨt. Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, yo morap uŋun nandaŋ mudosol. Nak but dasi galak taŋ gamɨsat, gaga nandɨsal.” Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak sipsipno upmokgi.
43021018	Asisi gayɨsat, gak monjɨ gɨmoŋɨ egɨpgul bɨsapmon ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkgo paŋek kokup dukwan kɨk do nandagɨl uŋudon kɨŋ kɨŋ agɨl. Mani amɨn pelaŋ aki bɨsapmon, kɨsitgo aŋenagaki amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ da ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkgo paŋ gamɨŋek gak aŋaŋ kosit dɨma kɨk do nandaki uŋun naŋ aŋkɨkdaŋ.”
43021019	Yesu gen on Pita kosit niaŋon da kɨmagek Piŋkop man madep ɨmjak uŋun do yagɨt. Yaŋ yaŋek iyɨgɨt, “Nak nolgi.”
43021020	Pita da tobɨl paŋdet kɨnda Yesu da but dasi galak taŋ ɨmgut uŋun kagɨt. Uŋun buŋon yol paŋpaŋ apgut. (Uŋun amɨn jap nawit bɨsapmon Yesu dakon pɨbɨt da kapmatjok busuŋɨ uŋudonjok yɨpmaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, namɨn da gak uwal da kɨsiron gepjak?”)
43021021	Pita da uŋun amɨn kaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, ae on amɨn ɨwa?”
43021022	Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Egakwan gɨn nak aeno tobɨl apbeŋ do nandakeŋ bo dɨma, uŋun nak dakon yo. Gak nak nol.”
43021023	Yaŋ yaŋban binap gen kɨnda paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon kɨŋ ɨreŋ tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Uŋun paŋdet dɨma kɨmotdɨsak.” Mani Yesu da paŋdet uŋun dɨma kɨmotjak yaŋ dɨma yagɨt. “Egakwan gɨn nak aeno tobɨl apbeŋ do nandakeŋ bo dɨma, uŋun nak dakon yo”, uŋun gɨn yagɨt.
43021024	Uŋun paŋdet da uŋun yo morap dakon yaŋ teŋteŋok aŋek gen uŋun mandagɨt. Nin nandamaŋ, gen uŋun yaŋ teŋteŋosok uŋun bamɨsi.
43021025	Yesu da yo dɨwarɨ morapmɨsi gat agɨt. Yo morap agɨt kɨsi morap papiakon mandaneŋ kaŋ, mɨktɨmon papia uŋun da toni dakon tamo arɨpmɨ dɨma bo toni.
44001001	-
44001002	Tiopilas, nak kalɨp papia kɨnda mandagɨm. Uŋun papiakon Yesu wasaŋek pi agɨt ae Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋ dekgɨron da kwen wɨgɨgɨt uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ mandagɨm. Yesu yabekbi kabɨni manjɨgɨt uŋun altaŋ yomɨŋek Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨm ɨmɨŋakwan pi ani do yoyɨŋ mudaŋakwan Piŋkop da abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ Kwen Kokup wɨgɨgɨt.
44001003	Mibɨltok tepmɨ madep paŋek kɨmakgɨt da buŋon egɨp egɨp aeni abɨdaŋek uŋun amɨn kabɨnikon altaŋ yomgut. Altaŋ yomɨŋek asi kalugɨ egɨsak yaŋ nandani do yo morapmɨ agɨt. Gɨldat 40 uŋun gat egek Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨgɨt.
44001004	Bɨsap kɨnda uŋun gat egek yaŋsi ani do yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Jerusalem kokup pap dɨma yɨpmaŋ detni. Datno da yo dam do yaŋ teban tagɨt uŋun abɨdok do jomjom ani. Nak kalɨp yo uŋun do kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm.
44001005	Jon da amɨn pakbi soŋ yomgut, mani gɨldat kabisok kɨnda egek Piŋkop da Telagɨ Wup soŋ damdɨsak.”
44001006	Uŋun bɨsapmon yabekbi kabɨni gat muwugek Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak abɨsok Israel amɨn nin paŋpulugaŋbɨ aenin mɨktɨmnin kɨla aŋek egɨpneŋ bo dɨma?”
44001007	Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Dat da yo morap ak do bɨsap manjɨgɨt uŋun ji dakon yo dɨma. Dat da yo morap uŋun iyɨ kɨla asak.
44001008	Mani Telagɨ Wup jikon pɨŋban tapmɨm pakdaŋ. Tapmɨm paŋek nak dakon gen Jerusalem kokup papmon yaŋ teŋteŋoni. Ae uŋudon da Judia kokup morap kɨsi, ae Samaria mɨktɨm kɨsi, ae mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋoni.”
44001009	Yesu da gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋakwan, kaŋakwa kwen wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgakwan gɨkwem da wamaŋakwan aeni dɨma kawit.
44001010	Kwen tebai sɨŋtaŋakwa uŋudon gɨn amɨn bamorɨ ɨmalni kwakwagɨ uŋun da altaŋbal yabekbi kabɨ gat akgwit.
44001011	Altaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨmal, “Galili amɨn ji nidosi kwen sɨŋtaŋek akgaŋ? Yesu uŋun abɨsok Piŋkop da abɨdaŋban ji depmaŋ dek Kwen Kokup wɨgɨk. Abɨsok kaŋakwa wɨgɨk yaŋ gɨn apjak bɨsapmon yaŋ da tɨlagon apdɨsak.”
44001012	Yaŋ yoyɨŋbal ɨleŋ Olip yɨpmaŋek tobɨl Jerusalem kokup papmon kɨwit. Ɨleŋ Olip uŋun Jerusalem da kapmatjok tosok.
44001013	Kɨŋ altaŋek yut kwen nani si egɨpgwiron wɨgɨwit. Amɨn egɨpgwit uŋun mani yaŋ: Pita, Jon, Jems, Andru, Pilip, Tomas, Batolomiu, Matyu, Jems Alpius dakon monji, Saimon Selot da kabɨkon nani, ae Judas Jems dakon monji.
44001014	Uŋun amɨn kabɨ gat ae mɨŋat dɨwarɨ gat ae Yesu dakon meŋi gat ae padɨk padɨkni gat kɨsi but kaloŋon da muwugek bɨsit pi saŋbek saŋbek awit.
44001015	Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn 120 yaŋ da Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit. Pita uŋun kabɨkon da pɨdaŋ agek yaŋ yagɨt,
44001016	“Not kabɨ, kalɨpsigwan Telagɨ Wup da Dewit aŋtagap aban Piŋkop da papiakon Judas do gen kɨnda mandagɨt uŋun gen bamɨ toŋ agɨt. Judas uŋun Yesu aŋnoman aŋyoban obip amɨn da abɨdawit.
44001017	Judas kalɨp nin da kabɨkon ekwan pi kaloŋɨ agɨmaŋ.”
44001018	Judas uŋun yo yokwi agɨt dakon tomni tɨmɨgek mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda yumaŋ nagɨt. Uŋun mɨktɨmon Judas da maŋ sulugakwan kok wamɨyo kɨsisi mɨktɨmon maŋ mudawit.
44001019	Amɨn morap Jerusalem egɨpgwit uŋun dakon gen nandaŋek uŋun mɨktɨm tɨm mani Yawi Mɨktɨm yaŋ yawit. Iyɨ da genon da Akeldama yaŋ yawit.
44001020	Pita da saŋbeŋek gen yaŋ yagɨt, “Kap Papia madepmon gen kɨnda yaŋ mandabi: ‘Yut kokupyonikon amɨn dɨ dɨma egɨpdo, ɨsal tosak dosi nandɨsat.’ Ae uŋun papiakon gen kɨnda yaŋ mandabi: ‘Kɨla amɨn pi agɨt uŋun amɨn kɨnda da kulabɨsak dosi nandɨsat.’
44001021	-
44001022	Gen yaŋ tosok do amɨn kɨnda kulabɨgɨ aŋnoman aneŋ. Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨnon da wasaŋek Yesu nipmaŋ wɨgɨgɨt, ae amɨn morap nin gat saŋbek saŋbek egapno Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu kɨŋ ap agɨt, uŋun amɨn kɨnda naŋ kulabɨk aneŋ. Uŋun amɨn dasi nin gat pi aŋek Yesu kɨmoron da pɨdagɨt uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok aneŋ.”
44001023	Pita da yaŋ yaŋban amɨn bamorɨ do yaŋ yomgwit, kɨnda mani Josep uŋun Basabas yaŋ iyɨwit, ae mani kɨnda Jastus. Ae amɨn kɨnda uŋun mani Matias.
44001024	-
44001025	Amɨn bamot uŋun manjɨŋek bɨsit yaŋ awit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak amɨn morap dakon but kɨsi pɨndak mudosol. Uŋun bamoron da namɨn dasi Judas dakon tamo abɨdaŋek yabekbi pi asak uŋun amɨn nolɨki. Bupmɨsi, Judas uŋun tamoni yɨpmaŋek kɨmak tamo iyɨ do yaŋ mudaŋbikon kɨgɨt.”
44001026	Bɨsit yaŋ aŋek namɨn da noman tosak yaŋ do wasok kɨnda awit. Tɨp wasok aba Matias da noman tagɨt. Noman taŋek yabekbi 11 kabɨkon saŋbegɨt.
44002001	Pentikos Bɨsap Madepmon Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn kabɨ yut kɨndakon gɨn muwugek egɨpgwit.
44002002	Uŋudon gɨn nandaŋakwa wuwɨk madep kɨnda mɨrɨm madep aŋ uŋun da tɨlagon Kwen Kokup da pɨgɨt. Pɨŋ uŋun yut yɨkgwiron tugagɨt.
44002003	Aŋakwan yaŋ pɨndakgwit: mɨleŋ asɨp amɨn mel yombem da noman taŋ waseŋ kɨ amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ da kwenon yɨkgwit.
44002004	Aŋek Telagɨ Wup da amɨn kɨsi morap burɨkon pɨgɨ tugagɨt. Aŋek Wup da paŋpulugaŋban wasaŋek gen mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yawit.
44002005	Uŋun bɨsapmon Juda amɨn dɨ Jerusalem kokup papmon egɨpgwit. Uŋun amɨn mɨktɨm morap taŋ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋudon da apgwit. Uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨŋek egɨpgwit.
44002006	Wuwɨk uŋun nandaŋek uŋun mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi da muwugek amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ mɨrak paŋ nandaba Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn kabɨ da iyɨ da genonsi da gen yawit. Yaŋba nandaŋek nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi
44002007	aban yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn kabɨ gen yoŋ uŋun kɨsi morap Galili amɨn gɨn, ma?
44002008	Kosit niaŋon da nin dakon gen kaloŋ kaloŋ yoŋ?
44002009	Nin mɨktɨmnin Patia, Midia, Elam, Mesopotemia, Judia, Kapadosia, Pontus, Esia,
44002010	Prigia, Pampilia, Isip, ae Libia mɨktɨm Sairini kokup pap da kapmatjok tosogon amɨn. Nin Rom amɨn dɨwarɨ apgumaŋ da ɨdon ekwamaŋ
44002011	(Juda amɨn ae amɨn dɨwarɨ Juda amɨn kabɨkon saŋbeŋbi kɨsi). Dɨwarɨ nin Krit amɨn, ae dɨwarɨ Arebia amɨn. Nin kɨsi morap da nandaŋapno uŋun amɨn kabɨ da nin da genon da Piŋkop dakon wasokni masɨ masɨmɨ uŋun do yaŋba nandamaŋ.”
44002012	Amɨn wurɨpdak pasalek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Yo on altaŋban komaŋ uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ niaŋ?”
44002013	Yaŋ yaŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ da jɨgɨlak gen yaŋek yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn kabɨ wain kalugɨ morapmɨ naŋ da but upbal aŋ.”
44002014	Yaŋba nandaŋek Pita notni 11 kabɨ gat kɨsi pɨdaŋ agek gen papmon da amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Juda amɨn not kabɨ, ae ji Jerusalem kokup papmon ekwaŋ amɨn morap, mɨrak pakyaŋsi yopmaŋakwa yo on altosok uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dayɨko nandani.
44002015	“Ji on amɨn kabɨ but upbal aŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Dɨmasi! Bɨsap apmeŋon wɨsa dagokdo 9 kilok gɨn asak. Pakbi teban noknok bɨsap uŋun pɨlɨndo.
44002016	Abɨsok yo on altosok uŋun kombɨ amɨn Joel da uŋun do kalɨpsigwan yaŋ yagɨt:
44002017	‘Piŋkop da yaŋ yosok, Mibɨ gɨldat kwaŋ taŋakwan Wupno amɨn morap kɨsi do tagal yobeŋ. Aŋapbo monjɨ gwayosi da kombɨ gen yokdaŋ. Ae monjɨ bɨlagɨ da dɨpmɨn yombem pɨndatdaŋ. Ae amɨn pelaŋ da dɨpmɨn pɨndatdaŋ.
44002018	Uŋun bɨsapmon oman amɨn kabɨno mɨŋat ae wɨli kɨsi do Wupno tagal yobo uŋun da kombɨ gen yokdaŋ.
44002019	Aŋakwa kwen binap yo masɨ masɨmɨ uŋun dolɨko pɨndatni. Ae mɨktɨmon wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ ako bɨsap madep uŋun dakon tɨlak yaŋ pɨndatni. Yawi ae kɨndap ae mukwa madep altokdaŋ.
44002020	Uŋun bɨsapmon gɨldat dabɨl pɨlɨn tuk aŋakwan kanek yawi dom akdɨsak. Yaŋ aŋakwan Amɨn Tagɨ apjak dakon bɨsap madep don altosak. Uŋun bɨsap madepmon Amɨn Tagɨ dakon tapmɨm madepni ae tɨlɨm madepni uŋun altokdɨsak.
44002021	Uŋun bɨsapmon mɨŋat amɨn morap Amɨn Tagɨ da paŋpulugosak do bɨsit iyaŋ uŋun amɨn kabɨ iyɨ do paŋkutnosak.’ ”
44002022	Pita saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Israel amɨn kabɨ, ji mɨrak yopmaŋek Yesu Nasaret amɨn do yoko nandabɨt. Uŋun amɨn Piŋkopmon da apgut yaŋ nandani do Piŋkop da tapmɨm ɨmɨŋakwan wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ, ae yo masɨ masɨmɨ ae tɨlak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ agɨt. Yo morap agɨt uŋun dɨsi kawit.
44002023	Piŋkop da yaŋ abeŋ yaŋ kɨlɨ nandagɨt, do amɨn uŋun ji da kɨsiron yɨpgut. Yɨpban ji da amɨn yokwi da kɨsiron yɨpba uŋun da abɨdaŋek tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt.
44002024	Kɨmot dakon jɨgɨ da amɨn uŋun bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok wagɨl arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ yɨpmɨ, do Piŋkop da kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt.
44002025	Kalɨp Dewit da Yesu tepmɨ pasak do yaŋ yagɨt: ‘Nak Amɨn Tagɨ koko nak gat saŋbek saŋbek egɨsak. Uŋun nak da kapmatjok egek tapmɨm namɨŋakwan yo kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋkwakwalɨtjak.
44002026	Yaŋ asak, do butno da tagɨsi aŋakwan kɨsɨk kɨsɨk gen yosot. Ae gɨptɨmno Piŋkop da aŋpulugosak do jomjom asat.
44002027	Gak nipbɨ kɨmakbi tamokon dɨma tokeŋ. Telagɨ amɨngo dakon gɨptɨm aŋkutnaŋaki dɨma mɨktosak.
44002028	Gak egɨp egɨp dakon kosit kɨlɨ nolɨŋbɨ kagɨm. Nak gak gat egek kɨsɨk kɨsɨkgo da butnokon pɨgɨ tugosak.’
44002029	Not kabɨ, babɨknin Dewit uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ do asisi dayɨŋ teŋteŋoko. Dewit uŋun kɨmakban kɨlɨsi wayɨkgwit. Bumjotni dakon tamo abɨsok on kokupmon komaŋ.
44002030	Mani Dewit uŋun kombɨ amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut. Piŋkop da yaŋ teban tok gen kɨnda yaŋ iyɨgɨt: ‘Gak dakon babɨgo kɨnda da gak da tamokon kɨla amɨn madep egɨpjak.’
44002031	Yo don altoni uŋun pɨndagek Kristo kɨmoron da pɨdosak do kɨlɨ yagɨt. Gɨptɨmɨ kɨmakbi tamokon dɨma tosak ae dɨma mɨktosak yaŋ Dewit da kɨlɨ yagɨt.
44002032	Yesu uŋun Piŋkop da kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt. Nin si kagɨmaŋ do uŋun dakon yaŋ teŋteŋok amaŋ.
44002033	Piŋkop da man madep ɨmgut da iyɨ da amɨnsi tet do yɨkdak. Dat da Telagɨ Wup Monji do ɨbeŋ yaŋ kɨlɨ yaŋ teban tagɨt. Do Monji do ɨban uŋun da tagalban yo abɨsok noman tosok uŋun ji kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋ.
44002034	Dewit iyɨ Kwen Kokup dɨma wɨgɨgɨt mani yaŋ yagɨt: ‘Amɨn Tagɨ da nak dakon Amɨn Tagɨno yaŋ iyɨsak, Gak nak da amɨnsi tet do yɨgaki
44002035	uwalgo dakon tapmɨm pabɨŋ yopbo gak dakon pɨŋbisi egɨpni.’
44002036	Yaŋdo, Israel amɨn kabɨ ji yaŋsi nandani, Yesu uŋun ji da tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgwit, mani Piŋkop da uŋun amɨn yɨpban Amɨn Tagɨ ae Kristo egɨsak.”
44002037	Pita da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaba burɨ sugaŋba amɨn da Pita gat yabekbi kabɨ dɨwarɨ gat yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Not kabɨ, nin abɨsok niaŋsi ano kɨlek tosak?”
44002038	Yaŋba Pita da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kaloŋ kaloŋ but tobɨl aŋek Yesu Kristo da manon telagɨ pakbi soŋakwa Piŋkop da yokwisi wɨrɨrɨtjak. Yaŋ aŋakwa Piŋkop da but galak do Telagɨ Wup damjak.
44002039	Piŋkop da Telagɨ Wupni dam do kɨlɨ yaŋ teban tok agɨt. Ji ae mɨŋat monjɨyosi ae amɨn dubagɨkon ekwaŋ, ae amɨn kɨsi morap Piŋkop da yaŋ yomɨsak uŋun Telagɨ Wupni damjak.”
44002040	Pita da gen morapmɨ saŋbeŋek nawa gen tebaisi yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Yokwi pakpak kabɨkon da tobɨl apba Piŋkop da ji tɨmɨtjak.”
44002041	Uŋun gɨldaron gɨn amɨn 3 tausen Pita dakon gen nandaba bamɨ agɨt. Yaŋ aŋek telagɨ pakbi soŋek Yesu da paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon saŋbewit.
44002042	Paŋmuwukbi kabɨ da yabekbi dakon gen nandak do galagɨ madepsi nandawit. Ae but da notni baŋgal baŋgal aŋek, jap aŋwa nok do ae bɨsit ak do saŋbek saŋbek muwukgwit.
44002043	Yaŋ aŋakwa Piŋkop da paŋpulugaŋban yabekbi kabɨ da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ morapmɨ aba amɨn da pɨndagek pasal kɨmakgwit.
44002044	Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn kabɨ but kaloŋ aŋek yo kabɨni kaloŋɨ dɨ baŋgɨn paŋ egɨpgwit.
44002045	Yo kabɨni gat mɨktɨmni gat yopba amɨn da yumaŋ naŋba moneŋ uŋun baŋ bupmɨ amɨn paŋpulugawit.
44002046	Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ Telagɨ Yut Madepmon muwukgwit. Ae notni da yutnon muwuk muwuk aŋek but galagon da not paŋpulugok dakon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek jap nawit.
44002047	Aŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek egɨpgwit ae amɨn kɨsi morap da uŋun amɨn do nandaba tagɨsi agɨt. Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ amɨn dɨwarɨ but tobɨl aba Amɨn Tagɨ da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkban paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon saŋbeŋba kabi madepsi agɨt.
44003001	Bɨsap kɨndakon gɨldat tobɨl do aŋakwan Pita gat Jon gat bɨsit agak bɨsapmon Telagɨ Yut Madepmon kɨk do kɨgɨmal.
44003002	Kɨŋ pɨndakbal amɨn kabi kɨnda da kandap yokwi kɨnda wamaŋ aŋapgwit. Uŋun amɨn meŋi da yaŋ aŋalagɨt. Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ amɨn uŋun aŋabɨŋ Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon yoma kaga kɨnda mani Kɨldani Tagɨsi uŋudon yɨpmaŋ yɨpmaŋ awit. Amɨn Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan pɨgakwa uŋun amɨn da moneŋ ɨmni do bɨsit yoyɨgɨt.
44003003	Pita gat Jon gat nagalgwan pɨgɨk do aŋakwal moneŋ ɨmjil do bɨsit yoyɨgɨt.
44003004	Pita gat Jon gat da amɨn uŋun tebai kaŋek Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak nit ninda!”
44003005	Yaŋ iyɨŋban yo dɨ namdamal yaŋ nandaŋek tebai pɨndakgɨt.
